ayah.translation: Fakhalafa mim ba'dihim khalfunw warisul Kitaaba yaa khuzoona 'arada haazal adnaa wa yaqooloona sayughfaru lanaa wa iny yaatihim 'aradum misluhoo yaakhuzooh; alam yu'khaz 'alaihim 'aradum misluhoo yaakhuzooh; alam yu'khaz 'alaihim meesaaqul Kitaabi al laa yaqooloo 'alal laahi illal haqqa wa darasoo maa feeh; wad Daarul Aakhirtu khairul lillazeena yattaqoon; afalaa ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yumassikūna bil-kitābi wa aqāmuṣ-ṣalāh(ta), innā lā nuḍī‘u ajral-muṣliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yumas sikoona bil Kitaabi wa aqaamus Salaata innaa laa nudee'uajral musliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż nataqnal-jabala fauqahum ka'annahum ẓullatuw wa ẓannū annahū wāqi‘um bihim, khużū mā ātainākum biquwwatiw ważkurū mā fīhi la‘allakum tattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz nataqnal jabala fawqahum ka annahoo zullatunw wa zannooo annahoo waaqi'um bihim khuzoo maaa aatainaakum biquwwatinw wazkuroo maa feehi la'allakum tattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż akhaża rabbuka mim banī ādama min ẓuhūrihim żurriyyatahum wa asyhadahum ‘alā anfusihim, alastu birabbikum, qālū balā - syahidnā - an taqūlū yaumal-qiyāmati innā kunnā ‘an hāżā gāfilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz akhaza Rabbuka mim Baneee Aadama min zuhoorihim zurriyyatahum wa ash hadahum 'alaa anfusihim alastu bi Rabbikum qaaloo balaa shahidnaaa; an taqooloo Yawmal Qiyaamati innaa kunnaa 'an haazaa ghaafileen

ayah.transliteration: Au taqūlū innamā asyraka ābā'unā min qablu wa kunnā żurriyyatam mim ba‘dihim, afatuhlikunā bimā fa‘alal-mubṭilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Aw taqoolooo innamaaa ashraka aabaaa 'unaa min qablu wa kunnaa zurriyyatam mim ba'dihim afatuhlikunna bimaa fa'alal mubtiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika nufaṣṣilul-āyāti wa la‘allahum yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika nufassihul Aayaati wa la'allahum yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Watlu ‘alaihim naba'al-lażī ātaināhu āyātinā fansalakha minhā fa atba‘ahusy-syaiṭānu fa kāna minal-gāwīn(a).
ayah.translation: Watlu 'alaihim naba allazeee aatainaahu Aayaatinaa fansalakha minhaa fa atba'a hush Shaytaano fakaana minal ghaaween

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau syi'nā larafa‘nāhu bihā wa lākinnahū akhlada ilal-arḍi wattaba‘a hawāh(u), fa maṡaluhū kamaṡalil-kalb(i), in taḥmil ‘alaihi yalhaṡ au tatrukūhu yalhaṡ, żālika maṡalul-qaumil-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātinā, faqṣuṣil-qaṣaṣa la‘allahum yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law shi'naa larafa'naahu bihaa wa laakin nahooo akhlada ilal ardi watta ba'a hawaah; famasaluhoo kamasalil kalb; in tahmil 'alaihi yalhas aw tatruk hu yalhas; zaalika masalul qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa; faqsusil qasasa la'allahum yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Sā'a maṡalanil-qaumul-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātinā wa anfusahum kānū yaẓlimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Saaa'a masalanil qawmul lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa wa anfusahum kaanoo yazlimoon

ayah.transliteration: May yahdillāhu fa huwal-muhtadī, wa may yuḍlil fa ulā'ika humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: mai yahdil laahu fa huwal muhtadee wa mai yudlil fa ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad żara'nā lijahannama kaṡīram minal-jinni wal-ins(i), lahum qulūbul lā yafqahūna bihā wa lahum a‘yunul lā yabṣirūna bihā wa lahum āżānul lā yasma‘ūna bihā, ulā'ika kal-an‘āmi bal hum aḍall(u), ulā'ika humul-gāfilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad zaraanaa li jahannama kaseeram minal jinni wal insi lahum quloobul laa yafqahoona bihaa wa lahum a'yunul laa yubisiroona bihaa wa lahum aazaanul laa yasma'oona bihaa; ulaaa'ika kal an'aami bal hum adall; ulaaa'ika humul ghaafiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhil-asmā'ul-ḥusnā fad‘ūhu bihā, wa żarul-lażīna yulḥidūna fī asmā'ih(ī), sayujzauna mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahil Asmaaa 'ul Husnaa fad'oohu bihaa wa zarul lazeena yulhidoona feee Asmaaa'ih; sa yujzawna maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mimman khalaqnā ummatuy yahdūna bil-ḥaqqi wa bihī ya‘dilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa mimman khalaqnaaa ummatuny yahdoona bilhaqqi wa bihee ya'diloon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātinā sanastadrijuhum min ḥaiṡu lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa sanastadrijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa umlī lahum, inna kaidī matīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa umlee lahum; inna kaidee mateen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yatafakkarū mā biṣāḥibihim min jinnah(tin), in huwa illā nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Awalam yatafakkaroo maa bisaahibihim min jinnah; in huwa illaa nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yanẓurū fī malakūtis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā khalaqallāhu min syai'iw wa an ‘asā ay yakūna qadiqtaraba ajaluhum, fa bi'ayyi ḥadīṡim ba‘dahū yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yanzuroo fee malakootis samaawaati wal ardi wa maa khalaqal laahu min shai'inw wa an 'asaaa ai yakoona qadiqtaraba ajaluhum fabi aiyi hadeesim ba'dahoo yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: May yuḍlilillāhu falā hādiya lah(ū), wa yażaruhum fī ṭugyānihim ya‘mahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Mai yadlilil laahu falaa haadiyaa lah; wa yazaruhum fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

ayah.transliteration: Yas'alūnaka ‘anis-sā‘ati ayyāna mursāhā, qul innamā ‘ilmuhā ‘inda rabbī, lā yujallīhā liwaqtihā illā huw(a), ṡaqulat fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), lā ta'tīkum illā bagtah(tan), yas'alūnaka ka'annaka ḥafiyyun ‘anhā, qul innamā ‘ilmuhā ‘indallāhi wa lākinna akṡaran nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yas'aloonaka 'anis Saa'ati aiyaana mursaahaa qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabbee laa yujallaeehaa liwaqtihaaa illaa Hoo; saqulat fis samaawaati wal ard; laa taateekum illaa baghtah; yas'aloonaka ka annaka hafiyyun 'anhaa qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'indal laahi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul lā amliku linafsī naf‘aw wa lā ḍarran illā mā syā'allāh(u), wa lau kuntu a‘lamul gaiba-lastakṡartu minal-khair(i) - wa mā massaniyas-sū'(u) - in ana illā nażīruw wa basyīrul liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul laaa amliku linafsee naf'anw wa laa darran illaa maa shaaa'al laah; wa law kuntu a'alamul ghaiba lastaksartu minal khairi wa maa massaniyas soo'; in ana illaa nazeerunw wa basheerul liqawminy yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī khalaqakum min nafsiw wāḥidatiw waja‘ala minhā zaujahā liyaskuna ilaihā, falammā tagasysyāhā ḥamalat ḥamlan khafīfan fa marrat bih(ī), falammā aṡqalad da‘awallāha rabbahumā la'in ātaitanā ṣāliḥan lanakūnanna minasy-syākirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatinw wa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa liyas kuna ilaihaa falammaa taghash shaahaa hamalat hamlan khafeefan famarrat bihee falammaaa asqalad da'awal laaha Rabbahumaa la'in aayaitanaa saalihal lanakoo nanna minash shaakireen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā ātāhumā ṣāliḥan ja‘alā lahū syurakā'a fīmā ātāhumā, fa ta‘ālallāhu ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa aataahumaa saalihan ja'alaa lahoo shurakaaa'a feemaaa aataahumaa; fata'aalal laahu 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Ayusyrikūna mā lā yakhluqu syai'aw wa hum yukhlaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: A yushrikoona maa laa yakhluqu shai'anw wa hum yukhlaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yastaṭī‘ūna lahum naṣraw wa lā anfusahum yanṣurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yastatee'oona lahum nasranw wa laaa anfusahum yansuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in tad‘ūhum ilal-hudā lā yattabi‘ūkum, sawā'un ‘alaikum ada‘autumūhum am antum ṣāmitūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in tad'oohum ilalhudaa laa yattabi'ookum; sawaaa'un 'alaikum a-da'awtumoohum am antum saamitoon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna tad‘ūna min dūnillāhi ‘ibādun amṡālukum fad‘ūhum falyastajībū lakum in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi 'ibaadun amsaalukum fad'oohum fal yastajeeboo lakum in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Alahum arjuluy yamsyūna bihā am lahum aidiy yabṭisyūna bihā am lahum a‘yunuy yubṣirūna bihā am lahum āżānuy yasma‘ūna bihā, qulid‘ū syurakā'akum ṡumma kīdūni falā tunẓirūn(i).
ayah.translation: A lahum arjuluny yamshoona bihaa am lahum aidiny yabtishoona bihaaa am lahum a'yunuy yubsiroona bihaaa am lahum aazaanuny yasma'oona bihaa; qulid'oo shurakaaa'akum summa keedooni falaa tunziroon

ayah.transliteration: Inna waliyyiyallāhul-lażī nazzalal-kitāb(a), wa huwa yatawallaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna waliyyial laahul lazee nazzalal Kitaaba wa Huwa yatawallas saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna tad‘ūna min dūnihī lā yastaṭī‘ūna naṣrakum wa lā anfusahum yanṣurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena tad'oona min doonihee laa yastatee'oona nasrakum wa laaa anfusahum yansuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in tad‘ūhum ilal-hudā lā yasma‘ū, wa tarāhum yanẓurūna ilaika wa hum lā yubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in tad'oohum ilal hudaa laa yasm'oo wa taraahum yanzuroona ilaika wa hum laa yubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Khużil-‘afwa wa'mur bil-‘urfi wa a‘riḍ ‘anil-jāhilīn(a).
ayah.translation: khuzil 'afwa waamur bil'urfi waa'rid 'anil jaahileen

ayah.transliteration: Wa immā yanzagannaka minasy-syaiṭāni nazgun fasta‘iż billāh(i), innahū samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaah; innahoo Samee'un Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīnattaqau iżā massahum ṭā'ifum minasy-syaiṭāni tażakkarū fa iżā hum mubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeenat taqaw izaa massahum taaa'ifum minash Shaitaani tazakkaroo fa izaa hum mubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ikhwānuhum yamuddūnahum fil-gayyi ṡumma lā yuqṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ikhwaanuhum yamuddoonahum fil ghaiyi summa laa yuqsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā lam ta'tihim bi'āyatin qālū lau lajtabaitahā, qul inamā attabi‘u mā yūḥā ilayya mir rabbī, hāżā baṣā'iru mir rabbikum wa hudaw wa raḥmatul liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa lam taatihim bi aayatin qaaloo law lajtabai tahaa; qul innamaaa attabi'u maa yoohaaa ilaiya mir Rabbee; haazaa basaaa'iru mir Rabbikum wa hudanw wa rahmatul liqawminy yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā quri'al-qur'ānu fastami‘ū lahū wa anṣitū la‘allakum turḥamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa quri'al Quraanu fastami'oo lahoo wa ansitoo la 'allakum turhamoon

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur rabbaka fī nafsika taḍarru‘aw wa khīfataw wa dūnal-jahri minal-qauli bil-guduwwi wal-āṣāli wa lā takum minal-gāfilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wazkur Rabbaka fee nafsika tadarru'anw wa kheefatanw wa doonal jahri minal qawli bilghuduwwi wal aasali wa laa takum minal ghaafileen

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna ‘inda rabbika lā yastakbirūna ‘an ‘ibādatihī wa yusabbiḥūnahū wa lahū yasjudūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena 'inda Rabbika laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaadatihee wa yusabbihoonahoo wa lahoo yasjudoon

ayah.transliteration: Yas'alūnaka ‘anil-anfāl(i), qulil-anfālu lillāhi war-rasūl(i), fattaqullāha wa aṣliḥū żāta bainikum, wa aṭī‘ullāha wa rasūlahū in kuntum mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yas'aloonaka 'anil anfaali qulil anfaalu lillaahi war Rasooli fattaqul laaha wa ahlihoo zaata bainikum wa atee'ul laaha wa Rasoolahooo in kuntum mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Innamal-mu'minūnal-lażīna iżā żukirallāhu wajilat qulūbuhum wa iżā tuliyat ‘alaihim āyātuhū zādathum īmānaw wa ‘alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamal mu'minoonal lazeena izaa zukiral laahu wajilat quloobuhum wa izaa tuliyat 'alaihim Aayaatuhoo zaadat hum eemaananw wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

ayah.transliteration: Al-lażīna yuqīmūnaṣ-ṣalāta wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika humul-mu'minūna ḥaqqā(n), lahum darajātun ‘inda rabbihim wa magfiratuw wa rizqun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika humul mu'minoona haqqaa; lahum darajaatun 'inda Rabbihim wa magh firatunw wa rizqun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Kamā akhrajaka rabbuka mim baitika bil-ḥaqq(i), wa inna farīqam minal-mu'minīna lakārihūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kaamaaa akhrajaka Rabbuka mim baitika bilhaqq; wa inna fareeqam minal mu'mineena lakaarihoon

ayah.transliteration: Yujādilūnaka fil-ḥaqqi ba‘da mā tabayyana ka'annamā yusāqūna ilal-mauti wa hum yanẓurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yujaadiloonaka fil haqqi ba'da maa tabaiyana kaannamaa yasaaqoona ilal mawti wa hum uanzuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż ya‘idukumullāhu iḥdaṭ-ṭā'ifataini annahā lakum wa tawaddūna anna gaira żātisy-syaukati takūnu lakum wa yurīdullāhu ay yuḥiqqal-ḥaqqa bikalimātihī wa yaqṭa‘a dābiral-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz ya'idukumul laahu ihdat taaa'ifataini annahaa lakum wa tawaddoona anna ghaira zaatish shawkati takoonu lakum wa yureedul laahu ai yuhiqqal haqqa bikalimaatihee wa taqta'a daabiral kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Liyuḥiqqal-ḥaqqa wa yubṭilal-bāṭila wa lau karihal-mujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Liyuhiqqal haqqa wa tubtilal baatila wa law karihal mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Iż tastagīṡūna rabbakum fastajāba lakum annī mumiddukum bi'alfim minal-malā'ikati murdifīn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz tastagheesoona Rabbakum fastajaaba lakum annee mumiddukum bi alfim minal malaaa'ikati murdifeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ja‘alahullāhu illā busyrā wa litaṭma'inna bihī qulūbukum, wa man-naṡru illā min ‘indillāh(i), innallāha ‘azīzun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maa ja'alahul laahu illaa bushraa wa litatma'inna bihee quloobukum; wa man nasru illaa min 'indil laah; innal laaha Azeezun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Iż yugasysyīkumun-nu‘āsa amanatam minhu wa yunazzilu ‘alaikum minas-samā'i mā'al liyuṭahhirakum bihī wa yużhiba ‘ankum rijzasy-syaiṭāni wa liyarbiṭa ‘alā qulūbikum wa yuṡabbita bihil-aqdām(a).
ayah.translation: Iz yughashsheekumun nu'assa amanatam minhu wa yunazzilu 'alaikum minas samaaa'i maaa'al liyutah hirakum bihee wa yuzhiba 'ankum rijzash Shaitaani wa liyarbita 'ala quloobikum wa yusabbita bihil aqdaam

ayah.transliteration: Iż yūḥī rabbuka ilal-malā'ikati annī ma‘akum fa ṡabbitul-lażīna āmanū, sa'ulqī fī qulūbil-lażīna kafarur-ru‘ba faḍribū fauqal-a‘nāqi waḍribū minhum kulla banān(in).
ayah.translation: Iz yoohee Rabbuka ilal malaaa'ikati annee ma'akum fasabbitul lazeena aamanoo; sa ulqee fee quloobil lazeena kafarur ru'ba fadriboo fawqal a'naaqi wadriboo minhum kulla banaan

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahum syāqqullāha wa rasūlah(ū), wa may yusyāqiqillāha wa rasūlahū fa innallāha syadīdul-‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahum shaaaqqul laaha wa Rasoolah; wa mai yushaqiqil laaha wa Rasoolahoo fa innal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Żālikum fa żūqūhu wa anna lil-kāfirīna ‘ażāban-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalikum fazooqoohu wa anna lilkaafireena 'azaaban Naar

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā laqītumul-lażīna kafarū zaḥfan falā tuwallūhumul-adbār(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa laqeetumul lazeena kafaroo zahfan falaa tuwalloohumul adbaar

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yuwallihim yauma'iżin duburahū illā mutaḥarrifal liqitālin au mutaḥayyizan ilā fi'atin faqad bā'a bigaḍabim minallāhi wa ma'wāhu jahannam(u), wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa mai yuwallihim yawma'izin duburahooo illaa mutaharrifal liqitaalin aw mutahaiyizan ilaa fi'atin faqad baaa'a bighadabim minal laahi wa maawaahu Jahannamu wa bi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Falam taqtulūhum wa lākinnallāha qatalahum, wa mā ramaita iż ramaita wa lākinallāha ramā, wa liyubliyal-mu'minīna minhu balā'an ḥasanā(n), innallāha samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Falam taqtuloohum wa laakinnal laaha qatalahum; wa maa ramaita iz ramaita wa laakinnal laaha ramaa; wa liyubliyal mu'mineena minhu balaaa'an hasanaa; innal laaha Samee'un Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Żālikum wa annallāha mūhinu kaidil-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalikum wa annal laaha moohinu kaidil kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: In tastaftiḥū faqad jā'akumul-fatḥ(u), wa in tantahū fa huwa khairul lakum, wa in ta‘ūdū na‘ud, wa lan tugniya ‘ankum fi'atukum syai'aw wa lau kaṡurat, wa anallāha ma‘al-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: In tastaftihoo faqad jaaa'akumul fathu wa in tantahoo fahuwa khairul lakum wa in ta'oodoo na'ud wa lan tughniya 'ankum fi'atukum shai'anw wa law kasurat wa annal laaha ma'al mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū aṭī‘ullāha wa rasūlahū wa lā tawallau ‘anhu wa antum tasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo atee'ul laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa laa tawallaw 'anhu wa antum tasm'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā takūnū kal-lażīna qālū sami‘nā wa hum lā yasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa takoonoo kallazeena qaaloo sami'naa wa hum laa yasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Inna syarrad-dawābbi ‘indallāhiṣ-ṣummul-bukmul-lażīna lā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna sharrad dawaaabbi 'indal laahis summul bukmul lazeena laa ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau ‘alimallāhu fīhim khairal la'asma‘ahum, wa lau asma‘ahum latawallau wa hum mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law 'alimal laahu feehim khairal la asma'ahum; wa law asma'ahum latawallaw wa hum mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanustajībū lillāhi wa lir-rasūli iżā da‘ākum limā yuḥyīkum, wa‘lamū annallāha yaḥūlu bainal-mar'i wa qalbihī wa annahū ilaihi tuḥsyarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanus tajeeboo lillaahi wa lir Rasooli izaa da'aakum limaa yuhyeekum wa'lamooo annal laaha yahoolu bainal mar'i wa qalbihee wa anahooo ilaihi tuhsharoon

ayah.transliteration: Wattaqū fitnatal lā tuṣībannal-lażīna ẓalamū minkum khāṣṣah(tan), wa‘lamū annallāha syadīdul-‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wattaqoo fitnatal laa tuseebannal lazeena zalamoo minkum khaaaassatanw wa'lamooo annal laaha shadeedul 'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Ważkurū iż antum qalīlum mustaḍ‘afūna fil-arḍi takhāfūna ay yatakhaṭṭafakumun-nāsu fa āwākum wa ayyadakum binaṣrihī wa razaqakum minaṭ-ṭayyibāti la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wazkurooo iz antum qaleelum mustad 'afoona filardi takhaafoona ai yatakhat tafakumun naasu fa aawaakum wa aiyadakum binasrihee wa razaqakum minat taiyibaati la'allakum tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā takhūnullāha war-rasūla wa takhūnū amānātikum wa antum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa takhoonal laaha war Rasoola wa takhoonooo amaanaatikum wa antum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘lamū annamā amwālukum wa aulādukum fitnah(tun), wa annallāha ‘indahū ajrun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa'lamooo annamaaa amwaalukum wa awlaadukum fitnatunw wa annal laaha 'indahooo ajrun azeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū in tattaqullāha yaj‘al lakum furqānaw wa yukaffir ‘ankum sayyi'ātikum wa yagfir lakum, wallāhu żul-faḍlil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo in tattaqul laaha yaj'al lakum furqaananw wa yukaffir 'ankum saiyi aatikum wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu zul fadlil 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż yamkuru bikal-lażīna kafarū liyuṡbitūka au yaqtulūka au yukhrijūk(a), wa yamkurūna wa yamkurullāh(u), wallāhu khairul-mākirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz yamkuru bikal lazeena kafaroo liyusbitooka aw yaqtulooka aw yukhrijook; wa yamkuroona wa yamkurul laahu wallaahu khairul maakireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā tutlā ‘alaihim āyātunā qālū qad sami‘nā lau nasyā'u laqulnā miṡla hāżā, in hāżā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa qaaloo qad sami'naa law nashaaa'u laqulnaa misla haazaaa in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qālullāhumma in kāna hāżā huwal-ḥaqqa min ‘indika fa amṭir ‘alainā ḥijāratam minas-samā'i awi'tinā bi‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaalul laahumma in kaana haazaa huwal haqqa min 'indika fa amtir 'alainaa hijaaratam minas samaaa'i awi'tinaa bi 'azaabin alaeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kānallāhu liyu‘ażżibahum wa anta fīhim, wa mā kānallāhu mu‘ażżibahum wa hum yastagfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kanal laahu liyu'az zibahum wa anta feehim; wa maa kaanal laahu mu'az zibahum wa hum yastaghfiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā lahum allā yu‘ażżibahumullāhu wa hum yaṣuddūna ‘anil-masjidil-ḥarāmi wa mā kānū auliyā'ah(ū), in auliyā'uhū illal-muttaqūna wa lākinna akṡarahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa lahum allaa yu'az zibahumul laahu wa hum yasuddoona 'anil Masjidil-Haraami wa maa kaanooo awliyaaa'ah; in awliyaaa' uhooo illal muttaqoona wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna ṣalātuhum ‘indal-baiti illā mukā'aw wa taṣdiyah(tan), fa żūqul-‘ażāba bimā kuntum takfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana Salaatuhum 'indal Baiti illa mukaaa anw-wa tasdiyah; fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna kafarū yunfiqūna amwālahum liyaṣuddū ‘an sabīlillāh(i), fa sayunfiqūnahā ṡumma takūnu ‘alaihim ḥasratan ṡumma yuglabūn(a), wal-lażīna kafarū ilā jahannama yuḥsyarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena kafaroo yunfiqoona amwaalahum liyasuddoo 'an sabeelil laah; fasayunfiqoonahaa summa takoonu 'alaihim hasratan summa yughlaboon; wal lazeena kafarooo ilaa Jahannnama yuhsharoona

ayah.transliteration: Liyamīzallāhul-khabīṡa minaṭ-ṭayyibi wa yaj‘alal-khabīṡa ba‘ḍahū ‘alā ba‘ḍin fa yarkumahū jamī‘an fa yaj‘alahū fī jahannam(a), ulā'ika humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Liyameezal laahul khabeesa minat taiyibi wa yaj'alal khabeesa ba'dahoo 'ala ba'din fayarkumahoo jamee'an fayaj'alahoo fee Jahannnam; ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul lil-lażīna kafarū in yantahū yugfar lahum mā qad salaf(a), wa iy ya‘ūdū faqad maḍat sunnatul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul lillazeena kafarooo iny yantahoo yughfar lahum maa qad salafa wa iny ya'oodoo faqad madat sunnatul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qātilūhum ḥattā lā takūna fitnatuw wa yakunad-dīnu kulluhū lillāh(i),fa inintahau fa innallāha bimā ya‘malūna baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaatiloohum hattaa laa takoona fitnatunw wa yakoonaddeenu kulluhoo lillaah; fainin tahaw fa innallaaha bimaa ya'maloona Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa in tawallau fa‘lamū annallāha maulākum, ni‘mal-maulā wa ni‘man-naṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa in tawallaw fa'lamooo annal laaha mawlaakum; ni'mal mawlaa wa ni'man naseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘lamū annamā ganimtum min syai'in fa anna lillāhi khumusahū wa lir-rasūli wa liżil-qurbā wal-yatāmā wal-masākīni wabnis-sabīli in kuntum āmantum billāhi wa mā anzalnā ‘alā ‘abdinā yaumal-furqāni yaumal-taqal-jam‘ān(i), wallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa'lamooo annamaa ghanimtum min sha'in fa anna lillaahi khumusahoo wa lir Rasooli wa lizil qurba walyataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis sabeeli in kuntum aamantum billaahi wa maaa anzalnaa 'ala 'abdinaa yawmal Furqaani yawmaltaqal jam'aan; wal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Iż antum bil-‘udwatid-dun-yā wa hum bil-‘udwatil-quṣwā war-rakbu asfala minkum, wa lau tawā‘attum lakhtalaftum fil-mī‘ād(i), wa lākil liyaqḍiyallāhu amran kāna maf‘ūlā(n), liyahlika man halaka  ‘am bayyinatiw wa yaḥyā may ḥayya ‘am bayyinah(tin), wa innallāha lasamī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Iz antum bil'udwatid dunyaa wa hum bil'udwatil quswaa warrakbu asfala minkum; wa law tawaa'attum lakhtalaftum fil mee'aadi wa laakil liyaqdiyal laahu amran kaana maf'oolal liyahlika man halaka 'am baiyinatinw wa yahyaa man haiya 'am baiyinah; wa innal laaha la Samee'un 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Iż yurīkahumullāhu fī manāmika qalīlā(n), wa lau arākahum kaṡīral lafasyiltum wa latanāza‘tum fil-amri wa lākinnallāha sallam(a), innahū ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Iz yureekahumul laahu fee manaamika qaleela; wa law araakahum kaseeral lafashiltum wa latanaaza'tum fil amri wa laakinnal laaha sallam; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż yurīkumūhum iżil-taqaitum fī a‘yunikum qalīlaw wa yuqallilukum fī a‘yunihim liyaqḍiyallāhu amran kāna maf‘ūlā(n), wa ilallāhi turja‘ul-umūr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa iz yureekumoohum izil taqaitum feee a'yunikum qaleelanw wa yuqallilukum feee a'yunihim liyaqdiyal laahu amran kaana maf'oolaa; wa ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā laqītum fi'atan faṡbutū ważkurullāha kaṡīral la‘allakum tufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa laqeetum fi'atan fasbutoo wazkurul laaha kaseeral la'allakum tuflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa aṭī‘ullāha wa rasūlahū wa lā tanāza‘ū fa tafsyalū wa tażhaba rīḥukum waṣbirū, innallāha ma‘aṣ-ṣābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa atee'ul laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa laa tanaaza'oo fatafshaloo wa tazhaba reehukum wasbiroo; innal laaha ma'as saabireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā takūnū kal-lażīna kharajū min diyārihim baṭaraw wa ri'ā'an-nāsi wa yaṣuddūna ‘an sabīlillāh(i), wallāhu bimā ya‘malūna muḥīṭ(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laa takoonoo kallazeena kharajoo min diyaarihim bataranw wa ri'aaa'an naasi wa yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laah; wallaahu bimaa ya'maloona muheet

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż zayyana lahumusy-syaiṭānu a‘mālahum wa qāla lā gāliba lakumul-yauma minan-nāsi wa innī jārul lakum, falammā tarā'atil-fi'atāni nakaṣa ‘alā ‘aqibaihi wa qāla innī barī'um minkum innī arā mā lā tarauna innī akhāfullāh(a), wallāhu syadīdul-‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wa iz zaiyana lahumush shaitaanu a'ma alahum wa qaala laa ghaaliba lakumul yawma minan naasi wa innee jaarul lakum falammaa taraaa'atil fi'ataani nakasa 'alaa aqibaihi wa qaala innee bareee'um minkum innee araa maa laa tarawna inneee akhaaful laah; wallaahu shadeedul 'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Iż yaqūlul-munāfiqūna wal-lażīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun garra hā'ulā'i dīnuhum, wa may yatawakkal ‘alallāhi fa innallāha ‘azīzun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Iz yaqoolul munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradun gharra haaa'ulaaa'i deenuhum; wa mai yatawakkal 'alal laahi fa innal laaha 'azee zun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau tarā iż yatawaffal-lażīna kafarul-malā'ikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa adbārahum, wa żūqū ‘ażābal-ḥarīq(i).
ayah.translation: Wa law taraaa iz yatawaf fal lazeena kafarul malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum wa adbaarahum wa zooqoo 'azaabal hareeq

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bimā qaddamat aidīkum wa annallāha laisa biẓallāmil lil-‘abīd(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat aideekum wa anal laaha laisa bizallaamil lil 'abeed

ayah.transliteration: Kada'bi āli fir‘aun(a), wal-lażīna min qablihim, kafarū bi'āyātillāhi fa akhażahumullāhu biżunūbihim, innallāha qawiyyun syadīdul-‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Kadaabi Aali Fir'awna wal lazeena min qablihim; kafaroo bi Aayaatil laahi fa akhazahu mul laahu bizunoobihim; innal laaha qawiyyun shadeedul 'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annallāha lam yaku mugayyiran ni‘matan an‘amahā ‘alā qaumin ḥattā yugayyirū mā bi'anfusihim, wa annallāha samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annal laaha lam yaku mughaiyiran ni matan an'amahaa 'alaa qawmin hattaa yughaiyiroo maa bianfusihim wa annallaaha samee un 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Kada'bi āli fir‘aun(a), wal-lażīna min qablihim, każżabū bi'āyāti rabbihim fa ahlaknāhum biżunūbihim wa agraqnā āla fir‘aun(a), wa kullun kānū ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Kadaabi Aali Fir'awna wallazeena min qablihim; kazzaboo bi Aayaati Rabbihim faahlaknaahum bizunoobihim wa aghraqnaa Aala Fir'awn; wa kullun kaanoo zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Inna syarrad-dawābbi ‘indallāhil-lażīna kafarū fahum lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna sharrad dawaaabbi 'indal laahil lazeena kafaroo fahum laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna ‘āhatta minhum ṡumma yanquḍūna ‘ahdahum fī kulli marratiw wa hum lā yattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena'aahatta min hum summa yanqudoona 'ahdahum fee kulli marratinw wa hum laa yattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa immā taṡqafannahum fil-ḥarbi fa syarrid bihim man khalfahum la‘allahum yażżakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa immaa tasqafannahum fil harbi fasharrid bihim man khalfahum la'allahum yazzakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa immā takhāfanna min qaumin khiyānatan fambiż  ilaihim ‘alā sawā'(in), innallāha lā yuḥibbul-khā'inīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa immaa takhaafana min qawmin khiyaanatan fambiz ilaihim 'alaa sawaaa'; innal laaha laayuhibbul khaaa'ineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yaḥsabannal-lażīna kafarū sabaqū, innahum lā yu‘jizūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yahsabannal lazeena kafaroo sabaqooo; innahum laa yu'jizoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa a‘iddū lahum mastaṭa‘tum min quwwatiw wa mir ribāṭil-khaili turhibūna bihī ‘aduwwallāhi wa ‘aduwwakum wa ākharīna min dūnihim, lā ta‘lamūnahum, allāhu ya‘lamuhum, wa mā tunfiqū min syai'in fī sabīlillāhi yuwaffa ilaikum wa antum lā tuẓlamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa a'iddoo lahum mastata'tum min quwwatinw wa mirribaatil khaili turhiboona bihee 'aduwwal laahi wa 'aduwwakum wa aakhareena min doonihim laa ta'lamoo nahum Allaahu ya'lamuhum; wa maa tunfiqoo min shai'in fee sabeelil laahi yuwaf failaikum wa antum laa tuzlamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in janaḥū lis-salmi fajnaḥ lahā wa tawakkal ‘alallāh(i), innahū huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa in janahoo lissalmi fajnah lahaa wa tawakkal 'alal laah; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yurīdū ay yakhda‘ūka fa inna ḥasbakallāh(u), huwal-lażī ayyadaka binaṣrihī wa bil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iny yureedooo any-yakhda'ooka fainna hasbakal laah; Huwal lazeee aiyadaka binasrihee wa bilmu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa allafa baina qulūbihim, lau anfaqta mā fil-arḍi jamī‘am mā allafta baina qulūbihim wa lākinnallāha allafa bainahum, innahū ‘azīzun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa allafa baina quloobihim; law anfaqta maa fil ardi jamee'am maaa allafta baina quloobihim wa laakinnallaaha allafa bainahum; innaahoo 'Azeezun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu ḥasbukallāhu wa manittaba‘aka minal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu hasbukal laahu wa manittaba 'aka minal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu ḥarriḍil-mu'minīna ‘alal-qitāl(i), iy yakum minkum ‘isyrūna ṣabirūna yaglibū mi'atain(i), wa iy yakum minkum mi'atuy yaglibū alfam minal-lażīna kafarū bi'annahum qaumul lā yafqahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu harridil mu'mineena 'alal qitaal; iny-yakum minkum 'ishroona saabiroona yaghliboo mi'atayn; wa iny-yakum minkum min'atuny yaghlibooo alfam minal lazeena kafaroo bi anahum qawmul laa yafqahoon

ayah.transliteration: Al'āna khaffafallāhu ‘ankum wa ‘alima anna fīkum ḍa‘fā(n), fa iy yakum minkum mi'atun ṣābiratuy yaglibū mi'atain(i), wa iy yakum minkum alfuy yaglibū alfaini bi'iżnillāh(i), wallāhu ma‘aṣ-ṣābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Al'aana khaffafal laahu 'ankum wa 'alima anna feekum da'faa; fa-iny yakum minkum mi'atun saabiratuny yaghliboo mi'atayn; wa iny-yakum minkum alfuny yaghlibooo alfaini bi iznil laah; wallaahu ma'as saabireen

ayah.transliteration: Mā kāna linabiyyin ay yakūna lahū asrā ḥattā yuṡkhina fil-arḍ(i), turīdūna ‘araḍad-dun-yā, wallāhu yurīdul-ākhirah(ta), wallāhu ‘azīzun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Maa kaana li Nabiyyin ai yakoona lahooo asraa hatta yuskhina fil ard; tureedoona aradad dunyaa wallaahu yureedul Aakhirah; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Lau lā kitābum minallāhi sabaqa lamassakum fīmā akhażtum ‘ażābun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Law laa Kitaabum minal laahi sabaqa lamassakum fee maaa akhaztum 'azaabun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Fa kulū mimmā ganimtum ḥalālan ṭayyibā(n), wattaqullāh(a), innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fakuloo mimaa ghanimtum halaalan taiyibaa; watta qullaah; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu qul liman fī aidīkum minal-asrā, iy ya‘lamillāhu fī qulūbikum khairay yu'tikum khairam mimmā ukhiża minkum wa yagfir lakum, wallāhu gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu qul liman feee aideekum minal asraaa iny-ya lamillaahu fee quloobikum khairany yu'tikum khayram mimmaaa ukhiza minkum wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yurīdū khiyānataka faqad khānullāha min qablu fa amkana minhum wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakim(un).
ayah.translation: Wa iny-yureedoo khiyaa nataka faqad khaanullaaha min qablu fa amkana minhum; wallaahu 'aleemum Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa hājarū wa jāhadū bi'amwālihim wa anfusihim fī sabīlillāhi wal-lażīna āwaw wa naṣarū ulā'ika ba‘ḍuhum auliyā'u ba‘ḍ(in), wal-lażīna āmanū wa lam yuhājirū mā lakum miw walāyatihim min syai'in ḥattā yuhājirū, wa inistanṣarūkum fid-dīni fa ‘alaikumun naṣru illā ‘alā qaumim bainakum wa bainahum mīṡāq(un), wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa haajaroo wa jaahadoo bi amwaalihim wa anfusihim fee sabeelil laahi wallazeena aawaw wa nasarooo ulaaa'ika ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'd; wallazeena aamanoo wa lam yuhaajiroo maa lakum minw walaayatihim min shai'in hatta yuhaajiroo; wa inistan sarookum fid deeni fa'alaiku munnasru illaa 'alaa qawmim bainakum wa bainahum meesaaq; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna kafarū ba‘ḍuhum auliyā'u ba‘ḍ(in), illā taf‘alūhu takun fitnatun fil-arḍi wa fasādun kabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kafaroo ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'd; illaa taf'aloohu takun fitnatun fil ardi wa fasaadun kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna āmanū wa hājarū wa jāhadū fī sabīlillāhi wal-lażīna āwaw wa naṣarū ulā'ika humul-mu'minūna ḥaqqā(n), lahum magfirtuw wa rizqun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aamanoo wa haajaroo wa jaahadoo fee sabeelil laahi wallazeena aawaw wa nasarooo ulaaa'ika humul mu'minoona haqqaa; lahum maghfiratunw wa rizqun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna āmanū mim ba‘du wa hājarū wa jāhadū ma‘akum fa ulā'ika minkum, wa ulul-arḥāmi ba‘ḍuhum aulā biba‘ḍin fī kitābillāh(i), innallāha bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aamanoo mim ba'du wa haajaroo wa jaahadoo ma;akum faulaaa'ika minkum; wa ulul arhaami baduhum awlaa biba'din fee Kitaabil laah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Barā'atum minallāhi wa rasūlihī ilal-lażīna ‘āhattum minal-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Baraaa'atum minal laahi wa Rasooliheee ilal lazeena 'anhattum minal mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Fasīḥū fil-arḍi arba‘ata asyhuriw wa‘lamū annakum gairu mu‘jizillāh(i), wa anallāha mukhzil-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faseehoo fil ardi arba'ata ashhurinw wa'lamoooannakum ghairu mu'jizil laahi wa annal laaha mukhzil kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ażānum minallāhi wa rasūlihī ilan-nāsi yaumal-ḥajjil akbari annallāha barī'um minal-musyrikīn(a), wa rasūluh(ū), fa in tubtum fa huwa khairul lakum, wa in tawallaitum fa‘lamū annakum gairu mu‘jizillāh(i), wa basysyiril-lażīna kafarū bi‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa azaanum minal laahi wa Rasooliheee ilan naasi yawmal Hajjil Akbari annal laaha bareee'um minal mushrikeena wa Rasooluh; fa-in tubtum fahuwa khairullakum wa in tawallaitum fa'lamooo annakum ghairu mu'jizil laah; wa bashiril lazeena kafaroo biazaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Illal-lażīna ‘āhattum minal-musyrikīna ṡumma lam yanquṣūkum syai'aw wa lam yuẓāhirū ‘alaikum aḥadan fa atimmū ilaihim ‘ahdahum ilā muddatihim, innallāha yuḥibbul-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illal lazeena 'aahattum minal mushrikeena summa lam yanqusookum shai'anw-wa lam yuzaahiroo 'alaikum ahadan fa atimmooo ilaihim 'ahdahum ilaa muddatihim; innal laaha yuhibbul muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżansalakhal-asyhurul-ḥurumu faqtulul-musyrikīna ḥaiṡu wajattumūhum wa khużūhum  waḥṣurūhum waq‘udū lahum kulla marṣad(in), fa in tābū wa aqāmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātawuz-zakāta fa khallū sabīlahum, innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fa izansalakhal Ashhurul Hurumu faqtulul mushrikeena haisu wajattumoohum wa khuzoohum wahsuroohum qaq'udoo lahum kulla marsad; fa-in taaboo wa aqaamus Salaata wa aatawuz Zakaata fakhalloo sabeelahum; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa in aḥadum minal-musyrikīnastajāraka fa ajirhu ḥattā yasma‘a kalāmallāhi ṡumma ablighu ma'manah(ū), żālika bi'annahum qaumul lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in ahadum minal mushrikeenas tajaaraka fa ajirhu hattaa yasma'a Kalaamal laahi summa ablighhu maa manah; zaalika bi annahum qawmul laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Kaifa yakūnu lil-musyrikīna ‘ahdun ‘indallāhi wa ‘inda rasūlihī illal-lażīna ‘āhattum ‘indal-masjidil-ḥarām(i), famastaqāmū lakum fastaqīmū lahum, innallāha yuḥibbul-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Kaifa yakoonu lilmush rikeena 'ahdun 'indallaahi wa 'inda Rasoolihee illal lazeena 'aahattum 'indal Masjidil Haraami famas taqaamoo lakum fastaqeemoo lahum; innallaaha yuhibbul muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Kaifa wa iy yaẓharū ‘alaikum lā yarqubū fīkum illaw wa lā żimmah(tan), yurḍūnakum bi'afwāhihim wa ta'bā qulūbuhum, wa akṡaruhum fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kaifa wa iny-yazharoo 'alaikum laa yarquboo feekum illanw wa laa zimmah; yurdoo nakum biafwaahihim wa taabaa quloobuhum wa aksaruhum faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Isytarau bi'āyātillāhi ṡaman qalīlan fa ṣaddū ‘an sabīlih(ī), innahum sā'a mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ishtaraw bi Aayaatil laahi samanan qaleelan fasaddoo 'an sabeelih; innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yarqubūna fī mu'minin illaw wa lā żimmah(tan),ulā'ika humul-mu‘tadūn(a)
ayah.translation: Laa yarquboona fee mu'minin illanw wa laa zimmah wa ulaaa 'ika humulmu 'tadoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa in tābū wa aqāmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātawuz-zakāta fa ikhwānukum fid-dīn(i), wa nufaṣṣīlul-āyāti liqaumiy ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa in taaboo wa aqaamus Salaata wa aatawuz Zakaata fa ikhwaanukum fid deen; wa nufassilul Aayaati liqawminy ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in nakaṡū aimānahum mim ba‘di ‘ahdihim wa ṭa‘anū fī dīnikum fa qātilū a'immatal-kufr(i), innahum lā aimāna lahum la‘allahum yantahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in nakasooo aimaanahum mim ba'di 'ahdihim wa ta'anoo fee deenikum faqaatilooo a'immatal kufri innahum laaa aimaana lahum la'allahum yantahoon

ayah.transliteration: Alā tuqātilūna qauman nakaṡū aimānahum wa hammū bi'ikhrājir-rasūli wa hum bada'ūkum awwala marrah(tin), atakhsyaunahum, fallāhu aḥaqqu an takhsyauhu in kuntum mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Alaa tuqaatiloona qawman nakasooo aimaanahum wa hammoo bi ikhraajir Rasooli wa hum bada'ookum awwala marrah; atakhshawnahum; fallaahu ahaqqu an takhshawhu in kuntum mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Qātilūhum yu‘ażżibhumullāhu bi'aidīkum wa yukhzihim wa yanṣurkum ‘alaihim wa yasyfi ṣudūra qaumim mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaatiloohum yu'az zibhumul laahu bi aideekum wa yukhzihim wa yansurkum 'alaihim wa yashfi sudoora qawmim mu 'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yużhib gaiẓa qulūbihim, wa yatūbullāhu ‘alā may yasyā'(u), wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa yuzhib ghaiza quloobihim; wa yatoobullaahu 'alaa mai yashaaa'; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Am ḥasibtum an tutrakū wa lammā ya‘lamillāhul-lażīna jāhadū minkum wa lam yattakhiżū min dūnillāhi wa lā rasūlihī wa lal-mu'minīna walījah(tan), wallāhu khabīrum bimā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am hasibtum an turakoo wa lammaa ya'lamil laahul lazeena jaahadoo minkum wa lam yattakhizoo min doonil laahi wa laa Rasoolihee wa lalmu'mineena waleejah; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Mā kāna lil-musyrikīna ay ya‘murū masājidallāhi syāhidīna ‘alā anfusihim bil-kufr(i), ulā'ika ḥabiṭat a‘māluhum, wa fin-nāri hum khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: maa kaana lilmushrikeena ai ya'muroo masaajidal laahi shaahideena 'alaaa anfusihim bilkufr; ulaaa'ika habitat a'maaluhum wa fin naari hum khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā ya‘muru masājidallāhi man āmana billāhi wal-yaumil-ākhiri wa aqāmaṣ-ṣalāta wa ātaz-zakāta wa lam yakhsya illallāh(a), fa ‘asā ulā'ika  ay yakūnū minal-muhtadīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaa ya'muru masaa jidal laahi man aamana billaahi wal Yawmil Aakhiri wa aqaamas Salaata wa aataz Zakaata wa lam yakkhsa illal laaha fa'asaaa ulaaa'ika ai yakoonoo minal muhtadeen

ayah.transliteration: Aja‘altum siqāyatal-ḥājji wa ‘imāratal-masjidil-ḥarāmi kaman āmana billāhi wal-yaumil-ākhiri wa jāhada fī sabīlillāh(i), lā yastawūna ‘indallāh(i), wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Aja'altum siqaayatal haaajji wa 'imaaratal masjidil haraami kamman aamana billaahi wal Yawmil Aakhiri wa jaahada fee sabeelil laah; laa yastawoona 'indal laah; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna āmanū wa hājarū wa jāhadū fī sabīlillāhi bi'amwālihim wa anfusihim, a‘ẓamu darajatan ‘indallāh(i), wa ulā'ika humul-fā'izūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena aamanoo wa haajaroo wa jaahadoo fee sabeelil laahi bi amwaalihim wa anufsihim a'zamu darajatan 'indal laah; wa ulaaa'ika humul faaa'izoon

ayah.transliteration: Yubasysyiruhum rabbuhum biraḥmatim minhu wa riḍwāniw wa jannātil lahum fīhā na‘īmum muqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yubashshiruhum Rabbuhum birahmatim minhu wa ridwaaninw wa Jannaatil lahum feehaa na'eemum muqeem

ayah.transliteration: Khālidīna fīhā abadā(n), innallāha ‘indahū ajrun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Khaalideena feehaaa abadaa; innal laaha 'indahooo ajrun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tattakhiżū ābā'akum wa ikhwānakum auliyā'a inistaḥabbul-kufra ‘alal-īmān(i), wa may yatawallahum minkum fa ulā'ika humuẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizooo aabaaa 'akum wa ikhwaanakum awliyaaa'a inis tahabbul kufra 'alal eemaan; wa mai yatawal lahum minkum fa ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul in kāna ābā'ukum wa abnā'ukum wa ikhwānukum wa azwājukum wa ‘asyīratukum wa amwāluniqtaraftumūhā wa tijāratun takhsyauna kasādahā wa masākinu tarḍaunahā aḥabba ilaikum minallāhi wa rasūlihī wa jihādin fī sabīlihī fa tarabbaṣū ḥattā ya'tiyallāhu bi'amrih(ī), wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumal-fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul in kaana aabaaa'ukum wa abnaaa'ukum wa ikhwaanukum wa azwaajukum wa 'asheeratukum wa amwaaluniq taraftumoohaa wa tijaaratun takhshawna kasaadahaa wa masaakinu tardawnahaaa ahabba ilaikum minal laahi wa Rasoolihee wa Jihaadin fee Sabeelihee fatarabbasoo hattaa yaatiyallaahu bi amrih; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Laqad naṣarakumullāhu fī mawāṭina kaṡīrah(tin), wa yauma ḥunain(in), iż a‘jabatkum kaṡratukum falam tugni ‘ankum syai'aw wa ḍāqat ‘alaikumul-arḍu bimā raḥubat ṡumma wallaitum mudbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqad nasarakumul laahu fee mawaatina kaseeratinw wa yawma Hunainin iz a'jabatkum kasratukum falam tughni 'ankum shai'anw wa daaqat 'alaikumul ardu bimaa rahubat summa wallaitum mudbireen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma anzalallāhu sakīnatahū ‘alā rasūlihī wa ‘alal-mu'minīna wa anzala junūdal lam tarauhā wa ‘ażżabal-lażīna kafarū, wa żālika jazā'ul-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa anzalal laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaa Rasoolihee wa 'alalmu 'mineena wa anzala junoodal lam tarawhaa wa azzabal lazeena kafaroo; wa zaalika jazaaa'ul kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma yatūbullāhu mim ba‘di żālika ‘alā may yasyā'(u), wallāhu gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Summa yatoobul laahu mim ba'di zaalika 'alaa mai yashaaa'; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū innamal-musyrikūna najasun falā yaqrabul-masjidal-ḥarāma ba‘da ‘āmihim hāżā, wa in khiftum ‘ailatan fa saufa yugnīkumullāhu min faḍlihī in syā'(a), innallāha ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo innamal mushrikoona najasun falaa yaqrabul Masjidal Haraama ba'da 'aamihim haaza; wa in khiftum 'ailatan fasawfa yughnee kumul laahu min fadliheee in shaaa'; innallaaha 'Aleemun hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Qātilul-lażīna lā yu'minūna billāhi wa lā bil-yaumil-ākhiri wa lā yuḥarrimūna mā ḥarramallāhu wa rasūluhū wa lā yadīnūna dīnal-ḥaqqi minal-lażīna ūtul-kitāba ḥattā yu‘ṭul-jizyata ‘ay yadiw wa hum ṣāgirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaatilul lazeena laa yu'minoona billaahi wa laa bil yawmil Aakhiri wa laa yuharrimoona maa harramal laahu wa Rasooluhoo wa laa yadeenoona deenal haqqi minal lazeena ootul Kitaaba hattaa yu'tul jizyata ai yadinw wa hum saaghiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālatil-yahūdu ‘uzairunibnullāhi wa qālatin-naṣāral-masīḥubnullāh(i), żālika qauluhum bi'afwāhihim, yuḍāhi'ūna qaulal-lażīna kafarū min qabl(u), qātalahumullāh(u), annā yu'fakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Q qaalatil yahoodu 'Uzairunib nul laahi wa qaalatin Nasaaral Maseehub nul laahi zaalika qawluhum bi afwaahihim yudaahi'oona qawlal lazeena kafaroo min qabl; qatalahumul laah; annaa yu'fakoon

ayah.transliteration: Ittakhażū aḥbārahum wa ruhbānahum arbābam min dūnillāhi wal-masīḥabna maryam(a), wa mā umirū illā liya‘budū ilāhaw wāḥidā(n), lā ilāha illā huw(a), subḥānahū ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: ittakhazooo ahbaarahum wa ruhbaanahum arbaabammin doonil laahi wal Maseehab na Maryama wa maaa umirooo illaa liya'budooo Ilaahanw Waa hidan laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; Subhaanahoo 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Yurīdūna ay yuṭfi'ū nūrallāhi bi'afwāhihim wa ya'ballāhu illā ay yutimma nūrahū wa lau karihal-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yureedoona ai yutfi'oo nooral laahi bi'afwaahihim wa yaaballaahu illaaa ai yutimma noorahoo wa law karihal kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī arsala rasūlahū bil-hudā wa dīnil-ḥaqqi liyuẓhirahū ‘alad-dīni kullih(ī), wa lau karihal-musyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: huwal lazeee ar sala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullihee wa law karihal mushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū inna kaṡīram minal-aḥbāri war-ruhbāni laya'kulūna amwālan-nāsi bil-bāṭili wa yaṣuddūna ‘an sabīlillāh(i), wal-lażīna yaknizūnaż-żahaba  wal-fiḍḍata wa lā yunfiqūnahā fī sabīlillāh(i), fa basysyirhum bi‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo inna kaseeramminal ahbaari warruhbaani la yaakuloona amwaalan naasi bil baatili wa yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laah; wallazeena yaknizoonaz zahaba wal fiddata wa laayunfiqoonahaa fee sabeelil laahi fabashshirhum bi'azaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yuḥmā ‘alaihā fī nāri jahannama fa tukwā bihā jibāhuhum wa junūbuhum wa ẓuhūruhum, hāżā mā kanaztum li'anfusikum fa żūqū mā kuntum taknizūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma yuhmaa 'alaihaa fee naari jahannama fatukwaa bihaa jibaahuhum haazaa maa kanaztum li anfusikum fazooqoo maa kuntum taknizoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna ‘iddatasy-syuhūri ‘indallāhiṡnā ‘asyara syahran fī kitābillāhi yauma khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa minhā arba‘atun ḥurum(un), żālikad-dīnul-qayyim(u), falā taẓlimū fīhinna anfusakum wa qātilul-musyrikīna kāffatan kamā yuqātilūnakum kāffah(tan), wa‘lamū annallāha ma‘al-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna 'iddatash shuhoori 'indal laahis naa 'ashara shahran fee Kitaabil laahi yawma khalaqas samaawaati wal arda minhaaa arba'atun hurum; zaalikad deenul qaiyim; falaa tazlimoo feehinna anfusakum; wa qaatilul mushrikeena kaaaf fattan kamaa yuqaati loonakum kaaaffah; wa'lamooo annal laaha ma'al muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Innaman-nasī'u ziyādatun fil-kufri yuḍallu bihil-lażīna kafarū yuḥillūnahū ‘āmaw wa yuḥarrimūnahū ‘āmal liyuwāṭi'ū ‘iddata mā ḥarramallāhu fa yuḥillū mā ḥarramallāh(u), zuyyina lahum sū'u a‘mālihim, wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumal-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamma naseee'u ziyaadatun filkufri yudallu bihillazeena kafaroo yuhil loonahoo 'aamanw wa yuhar rimoonahoo 'aamalliyu watti'oo 'iddata maa harramal laah; zuyyina lahum sooo'u a'maalihim; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū mā lakum iżā qīla lakumunfirū fī sabīlillāhiṡ-ṡāqaltum ilal-arḍ(i), araḍītum bil-ḥayātid-dun-yā minal-ākhirah(ti), famā matā‘ul-ḥayātid-dun-yā fil-ākhirati illā qalīl(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo maa lakum izaa qeela lakumun firoo fee sabeelil laahis saaqaltum ilal ard; aradeetum bilhayaatid dunyaa minal Aakhirah; famaa ma taaul hayaatiddunyaa fil Aakhirati illaa qaleel

ayah.transliteration: Illā tanfirū yu‘ażżibkum ‘ażāban alīmā(n), wa yastabdil qauman gairakum wa lā taḍurrūhu syai'ā(n), wallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Illaa tanfiroo yu'az zibkum 'azaaban aleemanw wa yastabdil qawman ghairakum wa laa tadurroohu shai'aa; wal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Illā tanṣurūhu faqad naṣarahullāhu iż akhrajahul-lażīna kafarū ṡāniyaṡnaini iż humā fil-gāri iż yaqūlu liṣāḥibihī lā taḥzan innallāha ma‘anā, fa anzalallāhu sakīnatahū ‘alaihi wa ayyadahū bijunūdil lam tarauhā wa ja‘ala kalimatal-lażīna kafarus-suflā, wa kalimatullāhi hiyal-‘ulyā, wallāhu ‘azīzun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Illaa tansuroohu faqad nasarahul laahu iz akhrajahul lazeena kafaroo saaniyasnaini iz humaa filghaari iz yaqoolu lisaahibihee la tahzan innnal laaha ma'anaa fa anzalallaahu sakeenatahoo 'alaihi wa aiyadahoo bijunoodil lam tarawhaa wa ja'ala kalimatal lazeena kafarus suflaa; wa Kalimatul laahi hiyal 'ulyaa; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem;

ayah.transliteration: Infirū khifāfaw wa ṡiqālaw wa jāhidū bi'amwālikum wa anfusikum fī sabīlillāh(i), żālikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Infiroo khifaafanw wa siqaalanw wa jaahidoo bi amwaalikum wa anfusikum fee sabeelil laah; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Lau kāna ‘araḍan qarībaw wa safaran qāṣidal lattaba‘ūka  wa lākim ba‘udat ‘alaihimusy-syuqqah(tu), wa sayaḥlifūna billāhi lawistaṭa‘nā lakharajnā ma‘akum, yuhlikūna anfusahum, wallāhu ya‘lamu innahum lakāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Law kaana 'aradan qareebanw wa safaran qaasidal lattaba'ooka wa laakim ba'udat 'alaihimush shuqqah; wa sayahlifoona billaahi lawis tata'naa lakharajnaa ma'akum; yuhlikoona anfusahum wal laahu ya'lamu innahum lakaa ziboon

ayah.transliteration: ‘Afallāhu ‘ank(a), lima ażinta lahum ḥattā yatabayyana lakal-lażīna ṣadaqū wa ta‘lamal-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Afal laahu 'anka lima azinta lahum hattaa yatabai yana lakal lazeena sadaqoo wa ta'lamal kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Lā yasta'żinukal-lażīna yu'minūna billāhi wal-yaumil-ākhiri ay yujāhidū bi'amwālihim wa anfusihim, wallāhu ‘alīmum bil-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yastaazinukal lazeena yu'minoona billaahi wal Yawmil Aakhiri ai yujaa hidoo bi amwaalihim wa anfusihim; wallaahu 'aleemum bilmut taqeen

ayah.transliteration: Innamā yasta'żinukal-lażīna lā yu'minūna billāhi wal-yaumil-ākhiri wartābat qulūbuhum fahum fī raibihim yataraddadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaa yastaazinukal lazeena laa yu'minoona billaahi wal Yawmil Aakhiri wartaabat quloobuhum fahum fee raibihim yataraddadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau arādul-khurūja la'a‘addū lahū ‘uddataw wa lākin karihallāhumbi‘āṡahum fa ṡabbaṭahum wa qīlaq‘udū ma‘al-qā‘idīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law araadul khurooja la-'addoo lahoo 'uddatanw wa laakin karihal laahum bi'aasahum fasabbatahum wa qeelaq 'udoo ma'al qaa'ideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau kharajū fīkum mā zādūkum illā khabālaw wa la'auḍa‘ū khilālakum yabgūnakumul-fitnah(ta), wa fīkum sammā‘ūna lahum, wallāhu ‘alīmum biẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Law kharajoo feekum maa zaadookum ilaa Khabaalanw wa la awda'oo khilaalakum yabghoona kumul fitnata wa feekum sammaa'oona lahum; wallaahu 'aleemum biz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Laqadibtagawul-fitnata min qablu wa qallabū lakal-umūra ḥattā jā'al-ḥaqqu wa ẓahara amrullāhi wa hum kārihūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqadib taghawul fitnata min qablu wa qallaboo lakal umoora hattaa jaaa'al haqqu wa zahara amrul laahi wa hum kaarihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa minhum may yaqūlu'żal lī wa lā taftinnī, alā fil-fitnati saqaṭū, wa inna jahannama lamuḥīṭatum bil-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa minhum mai yaqoolu' zal lee wa laa taftinneee; alaa fil fitnati saqatoo; wa inna Jahannama lamuheetatum bil kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: In tuṣibka ḥasanatun tasu'hum, wa in tuṣibka muṣībatuy yaqūlū qad akhażnā min qablu wa yatawallau wa hum fariḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: in tusibka hasanatun tasu'hum; wa in tusibka museebatuny yaqooloo qad akhaznaaa amranaa min qablu wa yatawallaw wa hum farihoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul lay yuṣībanā illā mā kataballāhu lanā, huwa maulānā wa ‘alallāhi falyatawakkalil-mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul lany-yuseebanaaa illaa maa katabal laahu lanaa Huwa mawlaanaa; wa 'alal laahi falyatawak kalimu 'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul hal tarabbaṣūna binā illā iḥdal-ḥusnayain(i), wa naḥnu natarabbaṣu bikum ay yuṣībakumullāhu bi‘ażābim min ‘indihī au bi'aidīnā, fa tarabbaṣū innā ma‘akum mutarabbiṣūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul hal tarabbasoona binaaa illaaa ihdal husnayayni wa nahnu natrabbasu bikum ai yus eebakumul laahu bi'azaa bim min 'indiheee aw biaidee naa fatarabbasooo innaa ma'akum mutarabbisoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul anfiqū ṭau‘an au karhal lay yutaqabbala minkum, innakum kuntum qauman fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul anfiqoo taw'an aw karhal lany yutaqabbala min kum innakum kuntum qawman faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā mana‘ahum an tuqbala minhum nafaqātuhum illā annahum kafarū billāhi wa birasūlihī wa lā ya'tūnaṣ-ṣalāta illā wa hum kusālā wa lā yunfiqūna illā wa hum kārihūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa mana'ahum an tuqbala minhum nafaqaatuhum illaaa annnahum kafaroo billaahi wa bi Rasoolihee wa laa yaatoonas Salaata illaa wa hum kusaalaa wa laa yunfiqoona illaa wa hum kaarihoon

ayah.transliteration: Falā tu‘jibka amwāluhum wa lā aulāduhum, innamā yurīdullāhu liyu‘ażżibahum bihā fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa tazhaqa anfusuhum wa hum kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaa tu'jibka amwaaluhum wa laaa awlaaduhum; innamaa yureedul laahu liyu'az zibahum bihaa fil hayaatid dunyaa wa tazhaqa anfusuhum wa hum kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaḥlifūna billāhi innahum laminkum, wa mā hum minkum wa lākinnahum qaumuy yafraqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yahlifoona billaahi innnahum laminkum wa maa hum minkum wa laakinnahum qawmuny yafraqoon

ayah.transliteration: Lau yajidūna malja'an au magārātin au muddakhalal lawallau ilaihi wa hum yajmaḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Law yajidoona malja'an aw maghaaraatin aw mudda khalal lawallaw ilaihi wa hum yajmahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa minhum may yalmizuka fiṣ-ṣadaqāt(i), fa in u‘ṭū minhā raḍū wa illam yu‘ṭau minhā iżā hum yaskhaṭūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa minhum mai yalmizuka fis sadaqaati fa-in u'too minhaa radoo wa illam yu'taw minhaaa izaa hum yaskhatoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau annahum raḍū mā ātāhumullāhu wa rasūluh(ū), wa qālū ḥasbunallāhu sayu'tīnallāhu min faḍlihī wa rasūluhū innā ilallāhi rāgibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law annahum radoo maaa aataahumul laahu wa Rasooluhoo wa qaaloo hasbunal laahu wayu'teenallaahu min fadlihee wa Rasooluhooo innaaa ilallaahi raaghiboon

ayah.transliteration: Innamaṣ-ṣadaqātu lil-fuqarā'i wal-masākīni wal-‘āmilīna ‘alaihā wal-mu'allafati qulūbuhum wa fir-riqābi wal-gārimīna wa fī sabīlillāhi wabnis-sabīl(i), farīḍatam minallāh(i), wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innamas sadaqaatu lilfuqaraaa'i walmasaakeeni wal 'aamileena 'alaihaa wal mu'al lafati quloobuhum wa fir riqaabi walghaarimeena wa fee sabeelil laahi wabnis sabeeli fareedatam minal laah; wal laahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa minhumul-lażīna yu'żūnan nabiyya wa yaqūlūna huwa użun(un), qul użunu khairil lakum yu'minu billāhi wa yu'minu lil-mu'minīna wa raḥmatul lil-lażīna āmanū minkum, wal-lażīna yu'żūna rasūlallāhi lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa minhumul lazeena yu'zoonan nabiyya wa yaqooloona huwa uzun; qul uzunu khairil lakum yu'minu billaahi wa yu'minu lilmu mi neena wa rahmatul lillazeena aamanoo minkum; wallazeena yu'zoona Rasoolal laahi lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Yaḥlifūna billāhi lakum liyurḍūkum wallāhu wa rasūluhū aḥaqqu ay yurḍūhu  in kānū mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: yahlifoona billaahi lakum liyurdookum wallaahu wa Rasooluhoo ahaqqu ai yurdoohu in kaanoo mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Alam ya‘lamū annahū may yuḥādidillāha wa rasūlahū fa anna lahū nāru jahannama khālidan fīhā, żālikal khizyul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Alam ya'lamooo annahoo mai yuhaadidillaaha wa Rasoolahoo faanna lahoo Naara jahannama khaalidan feehaa; zaalikal khizyul 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Yaḥżarul-munāfiqūna an tunazzala ‘alaihim sūratun tunabbi'uhum bimā fī qulūbihim, qulistahzi'ū, innallāha mukhrijum mā taḥżarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yahzarul munaafiqoona an tunaz zala 'alaihim Sooratun tunabbi 'uhum bimaa feequloobihim; qulistahzi'oo innal laaha mukhrijum maa tahzaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in sa'altahum layaqūlunna innamā kunnā nakhūḍū wa nal‘ab(u), qul abillāhi wa āyātihī wa rasūlihī kuntum tastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wala'in sa altahum layaqoolunna innamaa kunnaa nakhoodu wa nal'ab; qul abillaahi wa 'Aayaatihee wa Rasoolihee kuntum tastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Lā ta‘tażirū qad kafartum ba‘da īmānikum, in na‘fu ‘an ṭā'ifatim minkum nu‘ażżib ṭā'ifatam bi'annahum kānū mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa ta'taziroo qad kafartum ba'da eemaanikum; in na'fu 'an taaa'ifatim minkum nu'az zib taaa'ifatam bi annahum kaanoo mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Al-munāfiqūna wal-munāfiqātu ba‘ḍuhum mim ba‘ḍ(in), ya'murūna bil-munkari wa yanhauna ‘anil-ma‘rūfi wa yaqbiḍūna aidiyahum, nasullāha fa nasiyahum, innal-munāfiqīna humul-fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Almunaafiqoona wal munaafiqaatu ba'duhum mim ba'd; yaamuroona bilmunkari wa yanhawna 'anil ma'roofi wa yaqbidoona aidiyahum; nasul laaha fanasiyahum; innal munaafiqeena humul faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘adallāhul-munāfiqīna wal-munāfiqāti wal-kuffāra nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā, hiya ḥasbuhum, wa la‘anahumullāh(u), wa lahum ‘ażābum muqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa'adal laahul munafiqeena wal munaafiqaati wal kuffaara naara jahannnamma khaalideena feehaa; hiya hasbuhum; wa la'annahumul laahu wa lahum 'azaabum muqeem

ayah.transliteration: Kal-lażīna min qablikum kānū asyadda minkum quwwataw wa akṡara amwālaw wa aulādā(n), fastamta‘ū bikhalāqihim fastamta‘tum bikhalāqikum kamastamta‘al-lażīna min qablikum bikhalāqihim wa khuḍtum kal-lażī khāḍū, ulā'ika ḥabiṭat amāluhum fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirah(ti), ulā'ika humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kallazeena min qablikum kaanoo ashadda minkum quwwatanw wa aksara amwaalanw wa awlaadan fastamta'oo bikhalaaqihim fastamta'tum bikhalaaqikum kamas tamta'al lazeena min qablikum bikhalaa qihim wa khudtum kallazee khaadooo; ulaaa'ika habitat a'maaluhum fid dunyaa wal Aakhirati wa ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Alam ya'tihim naba'ul-lażīna min qablihim qaumi nūḥiw wa ‘ādiw wa ṡamūd(a), wa qaumi ibrāhīma wa aṣḥābi madyana wal-mu'tafikāt(i), atathum rusuluhum bil-bayyināt(i), famā kānallāhu liyaẓlimahum wa lākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam yaatihim naba ul lazeena min qablihim qawmi Noohinw wa 'Aadinw wa Samooda wa qawmi Ibraaheema wa ashaabi adyana walmu'tafikaat; atathum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati famaa kaanal laahu liyazlimahum wa laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-mu'minūna wal-mu'minātu ba‘ḍuhum auliyā'u ba‘ḍ(in), ya'murūna bil-ma‘rūfi wa yanhauna  ‘anil-munkari wa yuqīmūnaṣ-ṣalāta wa yu'tūnaz-zakāta wa yuṭī‘ūnallāha wa rasūlah(ū), ulā'ika sayarḥamuhumullāh(u), innallāha ‘azīzun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Walmu'minoona wal mu'minaatu ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba;d; yaamuroona bilma'roofi wa yanhawna 'anil munkari wa yuqeemoonas Salaata wa yu'toonaz Zakaata wa yutee'oonal laaha wa Rasoolah; ulaaa'ika sayarhamuhumul laah; innallaaha 'Azeezun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘adallāhul-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wa masākina ṭayyibatan fī jannāti ‘adn(in), wa riḍwānum minallāhi akbar(u), żālika huwal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa'adal laahulmu' mineena walmu'minaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa wa masaakina taiyibatan fee Jannnaati 'adn; wa ridwaanum minal laahi akbar; zaalika hual fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu jāhidil-kuffāra wal-munāfiqīna wagluẓ ‘alaihim, wa ma'wāhum jahannamu wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu jaahidil kuffaara walmunaafiqeena waghluz 'alaihim; wa maawaahum jahannnamu wa bi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Yaḥlifūna billāhi mā qālū, wa laqad qālū kalimatal-kufri wa kafarū ba‘da islāmihim wa hammū bimā lam yanālū, wa mā naqamū illā an agnāhumullāhu wa rasūluhū min faḍlih(ī),  fa iy yatūbū yaku khairal lahum, wa iy yatawallau yu‘ażżibhumullāhu ‘ażāban alīman fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirah(ti), wa mā lahum fil-arḍi miw waliyyiw wa lā naṣīr(in).
ayah.translation: Yahlifoona billaahi wa qaaloo wa laqad qaaloo kalimatal kufri wa kafaroo ba'da Islaamihim wa hammoo bimaa lam yanaaloo; wa maa naqamooo illaaa an aghnaa humullaahu wa Rasooluhoo min fadlih; fainy yatooboo yaku khairal lahum wa iny yatawal law yu'az zibhumullaahu 'azaaban aleeman fiddunyaa wal Aakhirah; wamaa lahum fil ardi minw waliyyinw wa laa naseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa minhum man ‘āhadallāha la'in ātānā min faḍlihī lanaṣṣaddaqanna wa lanakūnanna minaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa minhum man 'aaha dal laaha la'in aataanaa min fadlihee lanas saddaqanna wa lanakoonanna minassaaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā ātāhum min faḍlihī bakhilū bihī wa tawallau wa hum mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa aataahum min fadlihee bakhiloo bihee wa tawallaw wa hum mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa a‘qabahum nifāqan fī qulūbihim ilā yaumi yalqaunahū bimā akhlafullāha mā wa‘adūhu wa bimā kānū yakżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa a'qabahum nifaaqan fee quloobihim ilaa Yawmi yalqaw nahoo bimaaa akhlaful laaha maa wa'adoohu wa bimaa kaanoo yakhziboon

ayah.transliteration: Alam ya‘lamū annallāha ya‘lamu sirrahum wa najwāhum wa annallāha ‘allāmul-guyūb(i).
ayah.translation: Alam ya'lamooo annal laaha ya'lamu sirrahum wa najwaahum wa annal laaha 'Allaamul Ghuyoob

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yalmizūnal-muṭṭawwi‘īna minal-mu'minīna fiṣ-ṣadaqāti wal-lażīna lā yajidūna illā juhdahum fa yaskharūna minhum, sakhirallāhu minhum, wa lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yalmizoonal mut tawwi'eena minalmu'mineena fis sadaqaati wallazeena laa yajidoona illaa juhdahum fayaskharoona minhum sakhiral laahu minhum wa lahum azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Istagfir lahum au lā tastagfir lahum, in tastagfir lahum sab‘īna marratan falay yagfirallāhu lahum, żālika bi'annahum kafarū billāhi wa rasūlih(ī), wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumal-fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: istaghfir lahum aw laa tastaghfir lahum in tastaghfir lahum sab'eena marratan falany yaghfiral laahu lahum; zaalika bi annahum kafaroo billaahi wa Rasoolih; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fariḥal-mukhallafūna bimaq‘adihim khilāfa rasūlillāhi wa karihū ay yujāhidū bi'amwālihim wa anfusihim fī sabīlillāhi wa qālū lā tanfirū fil-ḥarr(i), qul nāru jahannama  asyaddu ḥarrā(n), lau kānū yafqahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Farihal mukhallafoona bimaq'adihim khilaafa Rasoolil laahi wa karihooo ai yujaahidoo bi amwaalihim wa anfusihim fee sabeelil laahi wa qaaloo la tanfiroo fil harr; qul Naaru jahannama ashaddu harraa; law kaanoo yafqahoon

ayah.transliteration: Falyaḍḥakū qalīlaw walyabkū kaṡīrā(n), jazā'am bimā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falyadhakoo qaleelanw walyabkoo kaseeran jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ir raja‘akallāhu ilā ṭā'ifatim minhum  fasta'żanūka lil-khurūji faqul lan takhrujū ma‘iya abadaw wa lan tuqātilū ma‘iya ‘aduwwā(n), innakum raḍītum bil-qu‘ūdi awwala marrah(tin), faq‘udū ma‘al-khālifīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa ir raja'akal laahu ilaa taaa'ifatim minhum fastaaa zanooka lilkhurooji faqul lan takhrujoo ma'iya abadanw a lan tuqaatiloo ma'iya 'aduwwan innakum radeetum bilqu'oodi awwala marratin faq'udoo ma'al khaalifeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tuṣalli ‘alā aḥadim minhum māta abadaw wa lā taqum ‘alā qabrih(ī), innahum kafarū billāhi wa rasūlihī wa mātū wa hum fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tusalli 'alaaa ahadim minhum maata abadanw wa laa taqum 'alaa qabriheee innahum kafaroo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa maatoo wa hum faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tu‘jibka amwāluhum wa lā aulāduhum, innamā yurīdullāhu ay yu‘ażżibahum bihā fid-dun-yā wa tazhaqa anfusuhum wa hum kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tu'jibka amwaa luhum wa awlaaduhum; innamaa yureedul laahu ai yu'az zibahum bihaa fid dunyaa wa tazhaqa anfusuhum wa hum kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā unzilat sūratun an āminū billāhi wa jāhidū ma‘a rasūlihista'żanaka uluṭ-ṭauli minhum wa qālū żarnā nakum ma‘al-qā‘idīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaaa unzilat Sooratun an aaminoo billaahi wa jaahidoo ma'a Rasoolihis taazanaka uluttawli minhum wa qaaloo zarnaa nakum ma'alqaa 'ideen

ayah.transliteration: Raḍū bi'ay yakūnū ma‘al-khawālifi wa ṭubi‘a ‘alā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Radoo bi ai yakoonoo ma'al khawaalifi wa tubi'a 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yafqahoon

ayah.transliteration: Lākinir-rasūlu wal-lażīna āmanū ma‘ahū jāhadū bi'amwālihim wa anfusihim, wa ulā'ika lahumul-khairāt(u), wa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laakinir Rasoolu wal lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo jaahadoo bi amwaalihim wa anfusihim; wa ulaaa'ika lahumul khairaatu wa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

ayah.transliteration: A‘addallāhu lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā, żālikal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: A'addal laahu lahum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; zaalikal fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'al-mu‘ażżirūna minal-a‘rābi liyu'żana lahum wa qa‘adal-lażīna każabullāha wa rasūlah(ū), sayuṣībul-lażīna kafarū minhum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'al mu'az ziroona minal A'raabi liyu'zana lahum wa qa'adal lazeena kazabul laaha wa Rasoolah; sayuseebul lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Laisa ‘alaḍ-ḍu‘afā'i wa lā ‘alal-marḍā wa lā ‘alal-lażīna lā yajidūna mā yunfiqūna ḥarajun iżā naṣaḥū lillāhi wa rasūlih(ī), mā ‘alal-muḥsinīna min sabīl(in), wallāhu gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Laisa 'alad du'aaaa'i wa laa 'alal mardaa wa laa 'alal lazeena laa yajidoona maa yunfiqoona harajun izaa nasahoo lillaahi wa Rasoolih; maa 'alal muhsineena min sabeel; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā ‘alal-lażīna iżā mā atauka litaḥmilahum qulta lā ajidu mā aḥmilukum ‘alaih(i), tawallau wa a‘yunuhum tafīḍu minad dam‘i ḥazanan allā yajidū mā yunfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa 'alal lazeena izaa maaa atawka litahmilahum qulta laaa ajidu maaa ahmilukum 'alaihi tawallaw wa a'yunuhum tafeedu minaddam'i hazanan allaa yajidoo maa yunfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Innamas-sabīlu ‘alal-lażīna yasta'żinūnaka wa hum agniyā'(u), raḍū bi'ay yakūnū ma‘al-khawālif(i), wa ṭaba‘allāhu ‘alā qulūbihim fahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamas sabeelu 'alal lazeena yastaazinoonaka wa hum aghniyaaa'; radoo biany-yakoonoo ma'al khawaalifi wa taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘tażirūna ilaikum iżā raja‘tum ilaihim, qul lā ta‘tażirū lan nu'mina lakum qad nabba'anallāhu min akhbārikum wa sayarallāhu ‘amalakum wa rasūluhū ṡumma turaddūna ilā ‘ālimil-gaibi wasy-syahādati fa yunabbi'ukum bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: ya'taziroona ilaikum izaa raja'tum ilaihim; qul laa ta'taziroo lan nu'mina lakum qad nabba annal laahu min akhbaarikum; wa sa yaral laahu 'amalakum wa Rasooluhoo suma turaddoona ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi washshahaadati fa yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Sayaḥlifūna billāhi lakum iżanqalabtum ilaihim litu‘riḍū ‘anhum, fa a‘riḍū ‘anhum, innahum rijs(un), wa ma'wāhum jahannamu jazā'am bimā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Sa yahlifoona billaahi lakum izanqalabtum ilaihim litu'ridoo 'anhum fa a'ridoo 'anhum innahum rijsunw wa maawaahum jahannamu jazaaa 'ambimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Yaḥlifūna lakum litarḍau ‘anhum, fa in tarḍau ‘anhum fa innallāha lā yarḍā ‘anil-qaumil-fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yahlifoona lakum litardaw 'anhum fa in tardaw 'anhum fa innal laaha laa yardaa 'anil qawmil faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Al-a‘rābu asyaddu kufraw wa nifāqaw wa ajdaru allā ya‘lamū ḥudūda mā anzalallāhu ‘alā rasūlih(ī), wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Al A'raabu ashaddu kufranw wa nifaaqanw wa ajdaru allaa ya'lamoo hudooda maaa anzalal laahu 'alaa Rasoolih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa minal-a‘rābi may yattakhiżu mā yunfiqu magramaw wa yatarabbaṣu bikumud-dawā'ir(a), ‘alaihim dā'iratus-sau'(i), wallāhu samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa minal A'raabi mai yattakhizu maa yunfiqu maghramanw wa yatarabbasu bikumud dawaaa'ir; alaihim daaa'iratus saw'; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa minal-a‘rābi may yu'minu billāhi wal-yaumil-ākhiri wa yattakhiżu mā yunfiqu qurubātin ‘indallāhi wa ṣalawātir-rasūl(i), alā innahā qurbatul lahum, sayudkhiluhumullāhu fī raḥmatih(ī), innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa minal A'raabi mai yu'minu billaahi wal yawmil AAkhiri wa yattakhizu maa yunfiqu qurubaatin 'indal laahi wa salawaatir Rasool; alaaa innahaa qurbatul lahum; sayudkhiluhumul laahu fee rahmatih; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Was-sābiqūnal-awwalūna minal-muhājirīna wal-anṣāri wal-lażīnattaba‘ūhum bi'iḥsān(in), raḍiyallāhu ‘anhum wa raḍū ‘anhu wa a‘adda lahum jannātin tajrī  taḥtahal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā(n), żālikal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Was saabiqoonal awwa loona minal Muhaajireena wal Ansaari wallazeenat taba'oo hum bi ihsaanir radiyal laahu 'anhum wa radoo 'anhu wa a'adda lahum jannnaatin tajree tahtahal anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa abadaa; zaalikal fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mimman  ḥaulakum minal-a‘rābi munāfiqūn(a),wa min ahlil-madīnati maradū ‘alan nifāq(i), lā ta‘lamuhum, naḥnu na‘lamuhum, sanu‘ażżibuhum marrataini ṡumma yuraddūna ilā ‘ażābin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa mimmann hawlakum minal A'raabi munaafiqoona wa min ahlil Madeenati maradoo 'alan nifaaq, laa ta'lamuhum nahnu na'lamuhum; sanu'azzibuhum marrataini summa yuraddoona ilaa 'azaabin 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa ākharūna‘tarafū biżunūbihim khalaṭū ‘amalan ṣāliḥaw wa ākhara sayyi'ā(n), ‘asallāhu ay yatūba ‘alaihim, innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa aakharoona' tarafoo bizunoobihim khalatoo 'amalan saalihanw wa aakhara saiyi'an 'asal laahu ai yatooba 'alaihim; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Khuż min amwālihim ṣadaqatan tuṭahhiruhum wa tuzakkīhim bihā wa ṣalli ‘alaihim, inna ṣalātaka sakanul lahum, wallāhu samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Khuz min amwaalihim sadaqtan tutahhiruhum wa tuzakkeehim bihaa wa salli 'alaihim inna salaataka sakanul lahum; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Alam ya‘lamū annallāha huwa yaqbalut-taubata ‘an ‘ibādihī wa ya'khużuṣ-ṣadaqāti wa annallāha huwat-tawwābur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Alam ya'lamooo annnal laaha huwa yaqbalut tawbata 'an ibaadihee wa yaakhuzus sadaqaati wa annal laaha Huwat awwaabur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa quli‘malū fa sayarallāhu ‘amalakum wa rasūluhū wal-mu'minūn(a), wa saturaddūna ilā ‘ālimil-gaibi wasy-syahādati fa yunabbi'ukum bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa quli'maloo fasayaral laahu 'amalakum wa Rasooluhoo walmu'minoona wa saturaddoona ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi washshahaadati fa yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ākharūna murjaunal li'amrillāhi immā yu‘ażżibuhum wa immā yatūbu ‘alaihim, wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa aakharoona murjawna li amril laahi imaa yu'az zibuhum wa immaa yatoobu 'alaihim; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīnattakhażū masjidan ḍirāraw wa kufraw wa tafrīqam bainal-mu'minīna wa irṣādal liman ḥāraballāha wa rasūlahū min qabl(u), wa layaḥlifunna in aradnā illal-ḥusnā, wallāhu yasyhadu innahum lakāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeenat takhazoo masjidan diraaranw wa kufranw wa tafreeqam bainal mu'mineena wa irsaadal liman haarabal laaha wa Rasoolahoo min qabl; wa la yahlifunna in aradnaaa illal husnaa wallaahu yash hadu innahum lakaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Lā taqum fīhi abadā(n), lamasjidun ussisa ‘alat-taqwā min awwali yaumin aḥaqqu an taqūma fīh(i), fīhi rijāluy yuḥibbūna ay yataṭahharū, wallāhu yuḥibbul-muṭṭahhirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa taqum feehi abadaa; lamasjidun ussisa 'alat taqwaa min awwali yawmin ahaqqu an taqooma feeh; feehi rijaaluny yuhibbona ai yatatahharoo, wallaahu yuhibbul mmuttah hireen

ayah.transliteration: Afaman assasa bun-yānahū ‘alā taqwā minallāhi wa riḍwānin khairun am man assasa bun-yānahū ‘alā syafā jurufin hārin fanhāra bihī fī nāri jahannam(a), wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Afaman assasa bunyaa nahoo 'alaa taqwaa minal laahi wa ridwaanin khairun am man assasa bunyaanahoo 'alaa shafaa jurufin haarin fanhaara bihee fee Naari Jahannnam; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Lā yazālu bun-yānuhumul-lażī banau rībatan fī qulūbihim illā an taqaṭṭa‘a qulūbuhum, wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Laa yazaalu bunyaanu humul lazee banaw reebatan fee quloobihim illaaa an taqatta'a quloobuhum; wal laahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Innallāhasytarā minal-mu'minīna anfusahum wa amwālahum bi'anna lahumul-jannah(ta), yuqātilūna fī sabīlillāhi fa yaqtulūna wa yuqtalūna wa‘dan ‘alaihi ḥaqqan fit-taurāti wal-injīli wal-qur'ān(i), wa man aufā bi‘ahdihī minallāhi fastabsyirū bibai‘ikumul-lażī bāya‘tum bih(ī), wa żālika huwal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Innal laahash taraa minal mu'mineena anfusahum wa amwaalahum bi anna lahumul jannah; yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil laahi fa yaqtuloona wa yuqtaloona wa'dan 'alaihi haqqan fit Tawraati wal Injeeli wal Qur-aan; wa man awfaa be'ahdihee minal laah; fastabshiroo bibai'ikumul lazee baaya'tum bih; wa zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: At tā'ibūnal-‘ābidul-ḥāmidūnas-sā'iḥūnar-rāki‘ūnas-sājidūnal-āmirūna bil-ma‘rūfi wan-nāhūna ‘anil-munkari wal-ḥāfiẓūna liḥudūdillāh(i), wa basysyiril-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: At taaa'iboonal 'aabidoonal haamidoonas saaa'ihoonar raaki'oonas saajidoonal aamiroona bilma'roofi wannaahoona 'anil munkari walhaafizoona lihudoodil laah; wa bashshiril mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Mā kāna lin-nabiyyi wal-lażīna āmanū ay yastagfirū lil-musyrikīna wa lau kānū ulī qurbā mim ba‘di mā tabayyana lahum annahum aṣḥābul-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Maa kaana lin nabiyyi wallazeena aamanooo ai yastaghfiroo lilmushrikeena wa law kaanoo ulee qurbaa mim ba'di maa tabiyana lahum annahum Ashaabul jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kānastigfāru ibrāhīma li'abīhi illā ‘am mau‘idatiw wa‘adahā iyyāh(u), falammā tabayyana lahū annahū ‘aduwwul lillāhi tabarra'a minh(u), inna ibrāhīma la'awwāhun ḥalīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaanas tighfaaru ibraaheema li abeehi illaa 'ammaw 'idatinw wa 'adahaaa iyyaahu falammaa tabaiyana lahooo annahoo 'aduwwul lillaahi tabarra a minh; inna Ibraaheema la awwaahum haleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kānallāhu liyuḍilla qaumam ba‘da iż hadāhum ḥattā yubayyina lahum mā yattaqūn(a), innallāha bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaanal laahu liyudilla qawmam ba'da iz hadaahum hatta yubaiyina lahum maa yattaqoon; innal laaha bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), yuḥyī wa yumīt(u), wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi miw waliyyiw wa lā naṣīr(in).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi yuhyee wa yumeet; wa maa lakum min doonil laahi minw waliyyinw wa laa naseer

ayah.transliteration: Laqat tāballāhu ‘alan-nabiyyi wal-muhājirīna wal-anṣāril-lażīnattaba‘ūhu fī sā‘atil-‘usrati mim ba‘di mā kāda yazīgu qulūbu farīqim minhum ṡumma tāba ‘alaihim, innahū bihim ra'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Laqat taabal laahu 'alan nabiyyi wal Muhaajireena wal Ansaaril lazeenat taba'oohu fee saa'atil 'usrati mim ba'di maa kaada yazeeghu quloobu fareeqim minhum summma taaba 'alaihim; innahoo bihim Ra'oofur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘alaṡ-ṡalāṡatil-lażīna khullifū, ḥattā iżā ḍāqat ‘alaihimul-arḍu bimā raḥubat wa ḍāqat ‘alaihim anfusuhum wa ẓannū allā malja'a minallāhi illā ilaih(i), ṡumma tāba ‘alaihim liyatūbū, innallāha huwat-tawwābur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa 'alas salaasatil lazeena khullifoo hattaaa izaa daaqat 'alaihimul ardu bimaa rahubat wa daaqat 'alaihim anfusuhum wa zannnooo al laa malja-a minal laahi illaaa ilaihi summa taaba 'alaihim liyatooboo; innal laaha Huwat Tawwaabur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanuttaqullāha wa kūnū ma‘aṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha wa koonoo ma'as saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Mā kāna li'ahlil-madīnati wa man ḥaulahum minal-a‘rābi ay yatakhallafū ‘ar rasūlillāhi wa lā yargabū bi'anfusihim ‘an nafsih(ī), żālika bi'annahum lā yuṣībuhum ẓama'uw wa lā naṣabuw wa lā makhmaṣatun fī sabīlillāhi wa lā yaṭa'ūna mauṭi'ay yagīẓul-kuffāra wa lā yanālūna min ‘aduwwin nailan illā kutiba lahum bihī ‘amalun ṣāliḥ(un), innallāha lā yuḍī‘u ajral-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa kaana li ahlil Madeenati wa man hawlahum minal A'raabi ai yatakhallafoo 'ar-Rasoolil laahi wa laa yarghaboo bi anfusihim 'an nafsih; zaalika bi annahum laa yuseebuhum zama unw wa laa nasabunw wa laa makhmasatun fee sabeelil laahi wa laa yata'oona mawti'ai yagheezul kuffaara wa laa yanaaloona min 'aduwwin nailan illaa kutiba lahum bihee 'amalun saalih; innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yunfiqūna nafaqatan ṣagīrataw wa lā kabīrataw wa lā yaqṭa‘ūna wādiyan illā kutiba lahum liyajziyahumullāhu aḥsana mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yunfiqoona nafa qatan sagheeratanw wa laa kabeeratanw wa laa yaqta'oona waadiyan illaa kutiba lahum liyajziyahumul laahu ahsana maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kānal-mu'minūna liyanfirū kāffah(tan), falau lā nafara min kulli firqatim minhum ṭā'ifatul liyatafaqqahū fid-dīni wa liyunżirū qaumahum iżā raja‘ū ilaihim la‘allahum yaḥżarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaanal mu'minoona liyanfiroo kaaaffah; falaw laa nafara min kulli firqatim minhum taaa'ifatul liyatafaqqahoo fiddeeni wa liyunziroo qawmahum izaa raja'ooo ilaihim la'allahum yahzaroon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū qātilul-lażīna yalūnakum minal-kuffāri wal-yajidū fīkum gilẓah(tan), wa‘lamū annallāha ma‘al-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo qaatilul lazeena yaloonakum minal kuffaari walyajidoo feekum ghilzah; wa'lamooo annal laaha ma'al muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā mā unzilat sūratun fa minhum may yaqūlu ayyukum zādathu hāżihī īmānā(n), fa ammal-lażīna āmanū fa zādathum īmānaw wa hum yastabsyirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa maaa unzilat Sooratun faminhum mai yaqoolu aiyukum zaadat hu haazihee eemaanaa; fa ammal lazeena aamanoo fazaadat hum eemaananw wa hum yastabshiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal-lażīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun fa zādathum rijsan ilā rijsihim wa mātū wa hum kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ammal lazeena fee quloobihim maradun fazaadat hum rijsan ilaa rijsihim wa maatoo wa hum kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Awalā yarauna annahum yuftanūna fī kulli ‘āmim marrataini ṡumma lā yatūbūna wa lā hum yażżakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalaa yarawna annahum yuftanoona fee kulli 'aamim marratan aw marrataini summa laa yatooboona wa laa hum yazzakkkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā mā unzilat sūratun naẓara ba‘ḍuhum ilā ba‘ḍ(in), hal yarākum min aḥadin ṡummanṣarafū, ṣarafallāhu qulūbahum bi'annahum qaumul lā yafqahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa maaa unzilat Sooratun nazara ba'duhum ilaa ba'din hal yaraakum min ahadin summman sarafoo; sarafal laahu quloobahum bi annahum qawmul laa yafqahoon

ayah.transliteration: Laqad jā'akum rasūlum min anfusikum ‘azīzun ‘alaihi mā ‘anittum ḥarīṣun ‘alaikum  bil-mu'minīna ra'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Laqad jaaa'akum Rasoolum min anfusikum 'azeezun 'alaihi maa 'anittum hareesun 'alaikum bilmu'mineena ra'oofur raheem

ayah.transliteration: Fa in tawallau faqul ḥasbiyallāhu lā ilāha illā huw(a), ‘alaihi tawakkaltu wa  huwa rabbul-‘arsyil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Fa in tawallaw faqul lhasbiyal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa 'alaihi tawakkkaltu wa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām rā, tilka āyātul-kitābil-ḥakīm(i).
