ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Akāna lin-nāsi ‘ajaban an auḥainā ilā rajulim minhum an anżirin-nāsa wa basysyiril-lażīna āmanū anna lahum qadama ṣidqin ‘inda rabbihim, qālal-kāfirūna inna hāżā lasāḥirum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: A kaana linnaasi 'aaban an awhainaaa ilaa rajulim minhum an anzirin naasa wa bashshiril lazeena aamanoo anna lahum qadama sidqin 'inda Rabbihim; qaalal kaafiroona inna haaza lasaahirum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbakumullāhul -lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa fī sittati ayyāmin ṡummastawā ‘alal-‘arsyi yudabbirul-amr(a), mā min syafī‘in illā mim ba‘di iżnih(ī), żālikumullāhu rabbukum fa‘budūh(u), afalā tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna Rabbakumul laahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fee sittati aiyaamin summas tawaa 'alal 'Arshi yudabbirul amra maa min shafee'in illaa mim ba'di iznih; zalikumul laahu Rabbukum fa'budooh; afalaa tazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Ilaihi marji‘ukum jamī‘ā(n), wa‘dallāhi ḥaqqā(n), innahū yabda'ul-khalqa ṡumma yu‘īduhū liyajziyal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti bil-qisṭ(i), wal-lażīna kafarū lahum syarābum min ḥamīmiw wa ‘ażābun alīmum bimā kānū yakfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ilaihi marji'ukum jamee 'anw wa'dal laahi haqqaa; innahoo yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo liyajziyal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati bilqist; wallazeena kafaroo lahum sharaabum min hamee minw wa 'azaabun aleemum bimaa kaanoo yakfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī ja‘alasy-syamsa ḍiyā'aw wal-qamara nūraw wa qaddarahū manāzila lita‘lamū ‘adadas-sinīna wal-ḥisāb(a), mā khalaqallāhu zālika illā bil-ḥaqq(i), yufaṣṣilul-āyāti liqaumiy ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee ja'alash shamsa diyaaa'anw walqamara nooranw wa qaddarahoo manaaz zila lita'lamoo 'adadas sineena walhisaab; maa khalaqal laahu zaalika illa bilhaqq; yufassilul aayaati liqawminw ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna fikhtilāfil-laili wan-nahāri wa mā khalaqallāhu fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi la'āyātil liqaumiy yattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna fikh tilaafil laili wannahaari wa maa khalaqal laahu fis samaawaati wal ardi la Aayaatil liqawminy yattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna lā yarjūna liqā'anā wa raḍū bil-ḥayātid-dun-yā waṭma'annū bihā wal-lażīna hum ‘an āyātinā gāfilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa wa radoo bilhayaatid dunyaa watma annoo bihaa wallazeena hum 'an Aayaatinaa ghaafiloon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika ma'wāhumun nāru bimā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika maawaahumun Naaru bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti yahdīhim rabbuhum bi'īmānihim, tajrī min taḥtihimul-anhāru fī jannātin na‘īm(i).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati yahdeehim Rabbuhum bi eemaanihim tajree min tahtihimul anhaaru fee jannaatin Na'eem

ayah.transliteration: Da‘wāhum fīhā subḥānakallāhumma wa taḥiyyatuhum fīhā salām(un), wa ākhiru da‘wāhum anil-ḥamdu lillāhi rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Da'waahum feehaa Subbaanakal laahumma wa tahiyyatuhum feehaa salaam; wa aakhiru da'waahum anil hamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau yu‘ajjilullāhu lin-nāsisy-syarrasti‘jālahum bil-khairi laquḍiya ilaihim ajaluhum, fa nażarul-lażīna lā yarjūna liqā'anā fī ṭugyānihim ya‘mahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law yu'aijilul laahu linnaasish sharras ti'jaalahum bilkhairi laqudiya ilaihim ajaluhum fanazarul lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anna fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā massal-insānaḍ-ḍurru da‘ānā lijambihī au qā‘idan au qā'imā(n), falammā kasyafnā ‘anhu ḍurrahū marra ka'allam yad‘unā ilā ḍurrim massah(ū), każālika zuyyina lil-musrifīna mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa massal insaanad durru da'aanaa lijambiheee aw qaa'idan aw qaaa'iman falammaa kashafnaa 'anhu durrahoo marra ka al lam yad'unaaa ilaa durrim massah; kazaalika zuyyina lilmusrifeena maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ahlaknal-qurūna min qablikum lammā ẓalamū, wa jā'athum rusuluhum bil-bayyināti wa mā kānū liyu'minū, każālika najzil-qaumal-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad ahlaknal quroona min qablikum lammaa zalamoo wa jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bil baiyinaati wa maa kaanoo liyu'minoo; kazaalika najzil qawmal mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ja‘alnākum khalā'ifa fil-arḍi mim ba‘dihim linanẓura kaifa ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa ja'alnaakum khalaaa'ifa fil ardi mim ba'dihim linanzura kaifa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā tutlā ‘alaihim āyātunā bayyināt(in), qālal-lażīna lā yarjūna liqā'ana'ti biqur'ānin gairi hāżā au baddilh(u), qul mā yakūnu lī an ubaddilahū min tilqā'i nafsī, in attabi‘u illā mā yūḥā ilayy(a), innī akhāfu in ‘aṣaitu rabbī ‘ażāba yaumin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'ana'ti bi Quraanin ghairi haazaaa aw baddilh; qul maa yakoonu leee an ubaddilahoo min tilqaaa'i nafsee in attabi'u illaa maa yoohaaa ilaiya inneee akhaafu in 'asaytu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeeem

ayah.transliteration: Qul lau syā'allāhu mā talautuhū ‘alaikum wa lā adrākum bih(ī), faqad labiṡtu fīkum ‘umuram min qablih(ī), afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul law shaaa'al laahu maa talawtuhoo 'alaikum wa laaa adraakum bihee faqad labistu feekum 'umuram min qablih; afalaa ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Faman aẓlamu mimmaniftarā ‘alallāhi każiban au każżaba bi'āyātih(ī), innahū lā yufliḥul-mujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Faman azlamu mimmanif taraa 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bi Aayaatih; innahoo laa yuflihul mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ya‘budūna min dūnillāhi mā lā yaḍurruhum wa lā yanfa‘uhum wa yaqūlūna hā'ulā'i syufa‘ā'unā ‘indallāh(i), qul atunabbi'ūnallāha bimā lā ya‘lamu fis-samāwāti wa lā fil-arḍ(i), subḥānahū wa ta‘ālā ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yadurruhum wa laa yanfa'uhum wa yaqooloona haaa'ulaaa'i shufa'aaa 'unaa 'indal laah; qul atunabbi 'oonal laaha bima laa ya'lamu fis samaawaati wa laa fil ard; subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kānan-nāsu illā ummataw wāḥidatan fakhtalafū, wa lau lā kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika laquḍiya bainahum fīmā fīhi yakhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaanan naasu illaaa ummmatanw waahidatan fakh talafoo; wa law laa kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum fee maa feehi yakhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna lau lā unzila ‘alaihi āyatum mir rabbih(ī), faqul innamal-gaibu lillāhi fantaẓirū, innī ma‘akum minal-muntaẓirīn(a).
ayah.translation: W yaqooloona law laaa unzila 'alaihi aayatum mir Rabbihee faqul innamal ghaibu lillaahi fantaziroo innee ma'akum minal muntazireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ażaqnan-nāsa raḥmatam mim ba‘di ḍarrā'a massathum iżā lahum makrun fī āyātinā, qulillāhu asra‘u makrā(n), inna rusulanā yaktubūna mā tamkurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaaa azaqnan naasa rahmatam mim ba'di darraaa'a massat hum izaa lahum makrun feee aayaatinaa; qulil laahu asra'u makraa; inna rusulanaa yaktuboona maa tamkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī yusayyirukum fil-barri wal-baḥr(i), ḥattā iżā kuntum fil-fulk(i), wa jaraina bihim birīḥin ṭayyibatiw wa fariḥū bihā jā'athā rīḥun ‘āṣifuw wa jā'ahumul-mauju min kulli makāniw wa ẓannū annahum uḥīṭa bihim, da‘awullāha mukhliṣīna lahud-dīn(a), la'in anjaitanā min hāżihī lanakūnanna minasy-syākirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee yusaiyirukum fil barri walbahri hattaaa izaa kuntum fil fulki wa jaraina bihim bireeh in taiyibatinw wa farihoo bihaa jaaa'at haa reehun 'aasifunw wa jaaa'ahumul mawju min kulli makaaninw wa zannooo annahum uheeta bihim da'awul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena la'in anjaitanaa min haazihee lanakoonannna minash shaakireen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā anjāhum iżā hum yabgūna fil-arḍi bigairil-ḥaqq(i), yā ayyuhan-nāsu innamā bagyukum ‘alā anfusikum matā‘al-ḥayātid-dun-yā, ṡumma ilainā marji‘ukum fa nunabbi'ukum bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa anjaahum izaa hum yabghoona fil ardi bighairil haqq; yaaa aiyuhannaasu innamaa bagh yukum 'alaaa anfusikum mataa'al hayaatid dunyaa summa ilainaa marji'ukum fanunabbi 'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā maṡalul-ḥayātid-dun-yā kamā'in anzalnāhu minas-samā'i fakhtalaṭa bihī nabātul-arḍi mimmā ya'kulun-nāsu wal-an‘ām(u), ḥattā iżā akhażatil-arḍu zukhrufahā wazzayyanat wa ẓanna ahluhā annahum qādirūna ‘alaihā, atāhā amrunā lailan au nahāran fa ja‘alnāhā ḥaṣīdan ka'allam tagna bil-ams(i), każālika nufaṣṣilul-āyāti liqaumiy yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaa masalul hayaatid dunyaa kammaaa'in anzalnaahu minas sammaaa'i fakhtalata bihee nabaatul ardi mimmaa yaakulun naasu wal an'aam; hattaaa izaaa akhazatil ardu zukhrufahaa wazziyanat wa zanna ahluhaaa annahum qaadiroona 'alaihaaa ataahaaa amrunaa lailan aw nahaaran faja'alnaahaa haseedan ka allam taghna bil-ams; kazaalika nufassilul aayaati liqawminy yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu yad‘ū ilā dāris-salām(i), wa yahdī may yasyā'u ilā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu yad'ooo ilaa daaris salaami wa yahdee mai yashaaa'u ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Lil-lażīna aḥsanul-ḥusnā wa ziyādah(tun), wa lā yarhaqu wujūhahum qataruw wa lā żillah(tun), ulā'ika aṣḥābul-jannati hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lillazeena ahsanul husnaa wa ziyaadahtunw wa laa yarhaqu wujoohahum qatarunw wa laa zillah; ulaaa'ika ashaabul jannnati hum feehaa khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna każabus-sayyi'āti jazā'u sayyi'atim bimiṡlihā, wa tarhaquhum żillah(tun), mā lahum minallāhi min ‘āṣim(in), ka'annamā ugsyiyat wujūhuhum qiṭa‘am minal-laili muẓlimā(n), ulā'ika aṣḥābun-nār(i), hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kasabus saiyi aati jazaaa'u saiyi'atim bimislihaa wa tarhaquhum zillah; maa lahum minal laahi min 'aasimin ka annamaaa ughshiyat wujoohuhum qita 'am minal laili muzlimaa; ulaaa'ika Ashaabun Naari hum feeha khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma naḥsyuruhum jamī‘an ṡumma naqūlu lil-lażīna asyrakū makānakum antum wa syurakā'ukum, fa zayyalnā bainahum wa qāla syurakā'uhum mā kuntum iyyānā ta‘budūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yawma nahshuruhum jamee'an summa naqoolu lillazeena ashrakoo makaanakum antum wa shurakaaa'ukum; fazaiyalnaa bainahum wa qaala shurakaaa'uhum maa kuntum iyyaanaa ta'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa kafā billāhi syahīdam bainanā wa bainakum in kunnā ‘an ‘ibādatikum lagāfilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakafaa billaahi shaheedam bainanaa wa bainakum in kunnaa 'an 'ibaadatikum laghaafileen

ayah.transliteration: Hunālika tablū kullu nafsim mā aslafat wa ruddū ilallāhi maulāhumul-ḥaqqi wa ḍalla ‘anhum mā kānū yaftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hunaalika tabloo kullu nafsim maaa aslafat; wa ruddoo ilal laahi mawlaahu mul haqqi wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul may yarzuqukum minas-samā'i wal-arḍi ammay yamlikus-sam‘a wal-abṣāra wa may yukhrijul-ḥayya minal-mayyiti wa yukhrijul-mayyita minal-ḥayyi wa may yudabbirul-amr(a), fa sayaqūlūnallāh(u), faqul afalā tattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul mai yarzuqukum minas samaaa'i wal ardi ammany yamlikus sam'a wal absaara wa mai yukhrijul haiya minal maiyiti wa yikhrijul maiyita minal haiyi wa mai yudabbirul amr; fasa yaqooloonal laah; faqul afalaa tattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa żālikumullāhu rabbukumul-ḥaqq(u), fa māżā ba‘dal-ḥaqqi illaḍ-ḍalāl(u), fa annā tuṣrafūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fazaalikumul laahu Rabbukumul haqq; famaazaa ba'dal haqqi illad dalaalu fa annnaa tusrafoon

ayah.transliteration: Każālika ḥaqqat kalimatu rabbika ‘alal-lażīna fasaqū annahum lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika 'alal lazeena fasaqooo annahum laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul hal min syurakā'ikum may yabda'ul-khalqa ṡumma yu‘īduh(ū), qulillāhu yabda'ul-khalqa ṡumma yu‘īduhū fa annā tu'fakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul hal min shurakaaa 'ikum mai yabda'ul khalqa suma yu'eeduh; qulil laahu yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo fa annaa tu'fakoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul hal min syurakā'ikum may yahdī ilal-ḥaqq(i),qulillāhu yahdī lil-ḥaqq(i), afamay yahdī ilal-ḥaqqi aḥaqqu ay yuttaba‘a ammal lā  yahiddī illā ay yuhdā, famā lakum, kaifa taḥkumūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul hal min shurakaaa 'ikum mai yahdeee ilal haqq; qulil laahu yahdee lilhaqq; afamai yahdeee ilal haqqi ahaqqu ai yuttaba'a ammal laa yahiddeee illaaa ai yuhdaa famaa lakum kaifa tahkumoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yattabi‘u akṡaruhum illā ẓannā(n), innaẓ-ẓanna lā yugnī minal-ḥaqqi syai'ā(n), innallāha ‘alīmum bimā yaf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yattabi'u aksaruhum illaa zannaa; innaz zanna laa yughnee minal haqqi shai'aa; innal laaha 'Aleemum bimaa yaf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna hāżal-qur'ānu ay yuftarā min dūnillāhi wa lākin taṣdīqal-lażī baina yadaihi wa tafṣīlal-kitābi lā raiba fīhi mir rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana haazal Quraanu ai yuftaraa min doonil laahi wa laakin tasdeeqal lazee baina yadaihi wa tafseelal Kitaabi laa raiba fee mir Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūnaftarāh(u), qul fa'tū bisūratim miṡlihī wad‘ū manistaṭa‘tum min dūnillāhi in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul faatoo bisooratim mislihee wad'oo manis tata'tum min doonil laahi in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Bal każżabū bimā lam yuḥīṭū bi‘ilmihī wa lammā ya'tihim ta'wīluh(ū), każālika każżabal-lażīna min qablihim fanẓur kaifa kāna ‘āqibatuẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal kazzaboo bimaa lam yuheetoo bi'ilmihee wa lammaa yaatihim taaweeluh; kazaalika kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatuz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa minhum may yu'minu bihī wa minhum mal lā yu'minu bih(ī), wa rabbuka a‘lamu bil-mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa minhum mai yu 'minu bihee wa minhum mal laa yu'minu bih; wa Rabbuka a'lamu bilmufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa in każżabūka faqul lī ‘amalī wa lakum ‘amalukum, antum barī'ūna mimmā a‘malu wa ana barī'um mimmā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in kazzabooka faqul lee 'amalee wa lakum 'amalukum antum bareee'oona mimmaaa a'malu wa ana bareee'um mimmaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa minhum may yastami‘ūna ilaik(a), afa anta tusmi‘uṣ-ṣumma wa lau kānū lā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa minhum mai yastami'oona iliak; afa anta tusmi'us summa wa law kaanoo la ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa minhum may yanẓuru ilaik(a), afa anta tahdil-‘umya wa lau kānū lā yubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa minhum mai yanzuru ilaik; afa anta tahdil 'umya wa law kaanoo laa yubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha lā yaẓlimun-nāsa syai'aw wa lākinnan-nāsa anfusahum yaẓlimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha laa yazlimun naasa shai'anw wa laakin nannaasa anfusahum yazlimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yaḥsyuruhum ka'allam yalbaṡū illā sā‘atam minan-nahāri yata‘ārafūna bainahum, qad khasiral-lażīna każżabū biliqā'illāhi wa mā kānū muhtadīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yahshuruhum ka al lam yalbasooo illaa saa'atam minan nahaari yata'aarafoona bainahum; qad khasiral lazeena kazzaboo biliqaaa'il laahi wa maa kaanoo muhtadeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa immā nuriyannaka ba‘ḍal-lażī na‘iduhum au natawaffayannaka fa ilainā marji‘uhum ṡummallāhu syahīdun ‘alā mā yaf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa imma nuriyannaka ba'dal lazee na'iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa ilainaa marji'uhum summal laahu shaheedun 'alaa maa yaf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa likulli ummatir rasūl(un), fa iżā jā'a rasūluhum quḍiya bainahum bil-qisṭi wa hum lā yuẓlamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa likulli ummatir Rasoolun fa izaa jaaa'a Rasooluhum qudiya bainahum bilqisti wa hum laa yuzlamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-wa‘du in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul lā amliku linafsī ḍarraw wa lā naf‘an illā mā syā'allāh(u), likulli ummatin ajal(un), iżā jā'a ajaluhum falā yasta'khirūna sā‘ataw wa lā yastaqdimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul laaa amliku linafsee darranw wa laa naf'an illaa maa shaaa'al laah; likulli ummatin ajalun izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum falaaa yastaakhiroona saa'a tanw wa laa yastaqdimoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum in atākum ‘ażābuhū bayātan au nahāram māżā yasta‘jilu minhul-mujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aitum in ataakum 'azaabuhoo bayaatan aw nahaaram maazaa yasta'jilu minhul mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Aṡumma iżā mā waqa‘a āmantum bih(ī), āl'āna wa qad kuntum bihī tasta‘jilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Asumma izaa maa waqa'a aamantum bih; aaal'aana wa qad kuntum bihee tasta'jiloon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma qīla lil-lażīna ẓalamū żūqū ‘ażābal-khuld(i), hal tujzauna illā bimā kuntum taksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa qeela lillazeena zalamoo zooqoo 'azaabal khuld hal tujzawna illaa bimaa kuntum taksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yastambi'ūnaka aḥaqqun huw(a), qul ī wa rabbī innahū laḥaqq(un), wa mā antum bimu‘jizīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yastambi'oonaka ahaqqun huwa qul ee wa Rabbeee innahoo lahaqq; wa maaa antum bimu'jizeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau anna likulli nafsin ẓalamat mā fil-arḍi laftadat bih(ī), wa asarrun-nadāmata lammā ra'awul-‘ażāb(a), wa quḍiya bainahum bil-qisṭi wa hum lā yuẓlamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law anna likulli nafsin zalamat maa fil ardi laftadat bih; wa asarrun nadaamata lammaa ra awul 'azaab, wa qudiya bainahum bilqist; wa hum laa yuzlamoon

ayah.transliteration: Alā inna lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), alā inna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqquw wa lākinna akṡarahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alaaa inna lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal ard; alaaa inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Huwa yuḥyī wa yumītu wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwa yuhyee wa yumeetu wailaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nāsu qad jā'atkum mau‘iẓatum mir rabbikum wa syifā'ul limā fiṣ-ṣudūr(i), wa hudaw wa raḥmatul lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhan naasu qad jaaa'atkum maw 'izatum mir Rabbikum wa shifaaa'ul limaa fis sudoori wa hudanw wa rahmatul lilmu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Qul bifaḍlillāhi wa biraḥmatihī fa biżālika falyafraḥū, huwa khairum mimmā yajma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul bifadlil laahi wa birahmatihii fabizaalika falyaf rahoo huwa khairum mimmaa yajma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum mā anzalallāhu lakum mir rizqin fa ja‘altum minhu ḥarāmaw wa ḥalālā(n), qul āllāhu ażina lakum am ‘alallāhi taftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aitum maaa anzalal laahu lakum mir rizqin faja'altum minhu haraamanw wa halaalan qul aaallaahu azina lakum am 'alal laahi taftaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ẓannul-lażīna yaftarūna ‘alallāhil-każiba yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), innallāha lażū faḍlin ‘alan-nāsi wa lākinna akṡarahum lā yasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa zannul lazeena yaftaroona 'alal laahil kaziba Yawmal Qiyaamah; innal laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi wa laakinna aksarahum laa yashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā takūnu fī sya'niw wa mā tatlū minhu min qur'āniw wa lā ta‘malūna min ‘amalin illā kunnā ‘alaikum syuhūdan iż tufīḍūna fīh(i), wa mā ya‘zubu ‘ar rabbika mim miṡqāli żarratin fil-arḍi wa lā fis-samā'i wa lā aṣgara min żālika wa lā akbara illā fī kitābim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa takoonu fee shaaninw wa maa tatloo minhu min quraaninw wa laa ta'maloona min 'amalin illaa kunnaa 'alaikum shuhoodan iz tufeedoona feeh; wa maa ya'zubu 'ar Rabbika mim mis qaali zarratin fil ardi wa laa fis samaaa'i wa laaa asghara min zaalika wa laaa akbara illaa fee Kitaabim Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Alā inna auliyā'allāhi lā khaufun ‘alaihim wa lā hum yaḥzanūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alaa innaa awliyaaa'al laahi laa khawfun 'alaihim wa laa hum yahzanoon

ayah.transliteration: Al-lażīna āmanū wa kānū yattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Lahumul-busyrā fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa fil-ākhirah(ti), lā tabdīla likalimātillāh(i), żālika huwal-fauzul-‘aẓīm((u).
ayah.translation: Lahumul bushraa filha yaatid dunyaa wa fil Aakhirah; laa tabdeela likalimaatil laah; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yaḥzunka qauluhum, innal-‘izzata lillāhi jamī‘ā(n), huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yahzunka qawluhum; innal 'izzata lillaahi jamee'aa; Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Alā inna lillāhi man fis-samāwāti wa man fil-arḍ(i), wa mā yattabi‘ul-lażīna yad‘ūna min dūnillāhi syurakā'(a), iy yattabi‘ūna illaẓ-ẓanna wa in hum illā yakhruṣūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alaaa inna lillaahi man fis samaawaati wa man fil ard; wa maa yattabi'ul lazeena yad'oona min doonil laahi shurakaaa'; iny yattabi'oona illaz zannna wa in hum illaa yakhrusoon

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī ja‘ala lakumul-laila litaskunū fīhi wan-nahāra mubṣirā(n), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila litaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawmai yasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qāluttakhażallāhu waladan subḥānah(ū), huwal-ganiyy(u), lahū mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), in ‘indakum min sulṭānim bihāżā, ataqūlūna ‘alallāhi  mā lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalut takhazal laahu waladan Subhaanahoo Huwal Ghaniyyu lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ard; in 'indakum min sultaanim bihaazaaa; ataqooloona 'alal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul innal-lażīna yaftarūna ‘alallāhil-każiba lā yufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul innal lazeena yaftaroona 'alal laahil kaziba laa yuflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Matā‘un fid-dun-yā ṡumma ilainā marji‘uhum ṡumma nużīquhumul-‘ażābasy syadīda bimā kānū yakfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Mataa'un fiddunyaa summa ilainaa marji'uhum summa nuzeequhumul 'azaabash shadeeda bimaa kaanoo yakkfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Watlu ‘alaihim naba'a nūḥ(in), iż qāla liqaumihī yā qaumi in kāna kabura ‘alaikum maqāmī wa tażkīrī bi'āyātillāhi fa ‘alallāhi tawakkaltu fa ajmi‘ū amrakum wa syurakā'akum ṡumma lā yakun amrukum ‘alaikum gummatan ṡummaqḍū ilayya wa lā tunẓirūn(i).
ayah.translation: Watlu 'alaihim naba-a-Noohin iz qaala liqawmihee yaa qawmi in kaana kabura 'alaikum maqaamee wa tazkeeree bi Aayaatil laahi fa'alal laahi tawakkaltu fa ajmi'ooo amrakum wa shurakaaa'akum summa laa yakun amrukum 'alaikum ghummatan summmaq dooo ilaiya wa laa tunziroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa in tawallaitum famā sa'altukum min ajr(in), in ajriya illā ‘alallāh(i), wa umirtu an akūna minal-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa in tawallaitum famaa sa altukum min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alal laahi wa umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa każżabūhu fa najjaināhu wa mam ma‘ahū fil-fulki wa ja‘alnāhum khalā'ifa wa agraqnal-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātinā, fanẓur kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-munżarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakazzaboohu fanajjainaahu wa mamm'ahoo fil fulki wa ja'alnaahum khalaaa'ifa wa aghraqnal lazeena kazzaboo bi aayaatinaa fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul munzareen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ba‘aṡnā mim ba‘dihī rusulan ilā qaumihim fa jā'ūhum bil-bayyināti famā kānū liyu'minū bimā każżabū bihī min qabl(u), każālika naṭba‘u ‘alā qulūbil-mu‘tadīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summma ba'asnaa mim ba'dihee Rusulan ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bilbaiyinaati famaa kaanoo liyu'minoo bimaa kazzaboo bihee min qabl; kazaalika natba'u 'alaa quloobil mu'tadeen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ba‘aṡnā mim ba‘dihim mūsā wa hārūna ilā fir‘auna wa mala'ihī bi'āyātinā fastakbarū wa kānū qaumam mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa ba'asnaa mim ba'dihim Moosaa Wa Haaroona ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee bi aayaatinaa fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawmam mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'ahumul-ḥaqqu min ‘indinā qālū inna hāżā lasiḥrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaalooo inna haazaa lasihrum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla mūsā ataqūlūna lil-ḥaqqi lammā jā'akum, asiḥrun hāżā, wa lā yufliḥus-sāḥirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalaa Moosaaa ataqooloona lilhaqqi lammmaa jaaa'a kum asihrun haazaa wa laa yuflihus saabiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū aji'tanā litalfitanā ‘ammā wajadnā ‘alaihi ābā'anā wa takūna lakumal-kibriyā'u fil-arḍ(i), wa mā naḥnu lakumā bimu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo aji'tanaa litalfitanaa 'ammaa wajadnaa 'alaihi aabaaa'anaa wa takoona lakumal kibriyaaa'u fil ardi wa maa nahnu lakumaa bimu' mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla fir‘aunu'tūnī bikulli sāḥirin ‘alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Fir'awnu' toonee bikulli saahirin 'aleem

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'as-saḥaratu qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mulqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'assa haratu qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā alqau qāla mūsā mā ji'tum bihis-siḥr(u), innallāha sayubṭiluh(ū), innallāha lā yuṣliḥu ‘amalal-mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa alqaw qaala Moosaa maa ji'tum bihis sihru innal laaha sa yubtiluhoo innal laaha laa yuslihu 'amalal mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yuḥiqqullāhul-ḥaqqa bikalimātihī wa lau karihal-mujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yuhiqqul laahul haqqa bi Kalimaatihee wa law karihal mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Famā āmana limūsā illā żurriyyatum min qaumihī ‘alā khaufim min fir‘auna wa mala'ihim ay yaftinahum, wa inna fir‘auna la‘ālin fil-arḍ(i), wa innahū laminal-musrifīn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaaa aamana li-Moosaaa illaa zurriyyatum min qawmihee 'alaa khawfim min Fir'awna wa mala'ihim ai yaftinahum; wa inna Fir'awna la'aalin fil ardi wa innahoo laminal musrifeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla mūsā yā qaumi in kuntum āmantum billāhi fa ‘alaihi tawakkalū in kuntum muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Moosaa yaa qawmi in kuntum aamantum billaahi fa'alaihi tawakkalooo in kuntum muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa qālū ‘alallāhi tawakkalnā, rabbanā lā taj‘alnā fitnatal lil-qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faqaaloo 'alal laahi tawakkalnaa Rabbanaa laa taj'alnaa fitnatal lilqawmiz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa najjinā biraḥmatika minal-qaumil-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa najjinaa birahmatika minal qawmil kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa auḥainā ilā mūsā wa akhīhi an tabawwa'ā liqaumikumā bimiṣra buyūtaw waj‘alū buyūtakum qiblataw wa aqīmuṣ-ṣalāh(ta), wa basysyiril-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa awhainaaa ilaa Moosaa wa akheehi an tabaw wa aa liqawmikuma bi Misra bu yootanw waj'aloo bu yootakum qiblatanw wa aqeemus Salaah; wa bashshiril mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla mūsā rabbanā innaka ātaita fir‘auna wa mala'ahū zīnataw wa amwālan fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, rabbanā liyuḍillū ‘an sabīlik(a), rabbanaṭmis ‘alā amwālihim wasydud ‘alā qulūbihim falā yu'minū ḥattā yarawul-‘ażābal-alīm(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Mosaa Rabbanaaa innaka aataita Fir'awna wa mala ahoo zeenatanw wa amwaalan fil hayaatid dunyaa Rabbanaa liyudillo 'ansabeelika Rabbanat mis 'alaaa amwaalihim washdud 'alaa quloobihim falaa yu'minoo hatta yarawul 'azaabal aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla qad ujībad da‘watukumā fastaqīmā wa lā tattabi‘ānni sabīlal-lażīna lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala qad ujeebad da'watukumaa fastaqeemaa wa laa tattabi'aaanni sabeelal lazeena laaya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa jāwaznā bibanī isrā'īlal-baḥra fa atba‘ahum fir‘aunu wa junūduhū bagyaw wa ‘adwā(n), ḥattā iżā adrakahul-garaqu qāla āmantu annahū lā ilāha illal-lażī āmanat bihī banū isrā'īla wa ana minal-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jaawaznaa bi Baneee Israaa'eelal bahra fa atba'ahum Fir'awnu wa junooduhoo baghyanw wa 'adwan hattaaa izaaa adrakahul gharaqu qaala aamantu annnahoo laaa ilaaha illal lazeee aamanat bihee Banooo Israaa'eela wa ana minal muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Āl'āna wa qad ‘aṣaita qablu wa kunta minal-mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Aaal'aana wa qad 'asaita qablu wa kunta minal mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Fal yauma nunajjīka bibadanika litakūna liman khalfaka āyah(tan), wa inna kaṡīram minan-nāsi ‘an āyātinā lagāfilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falyawma nunajjeeka bibadanika litakoona liman khalfaka Aayah; wa inna kaseeram minan naasi 'an aayaatinaa laghaafiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad bawwa'nā banī isrā'īla mubawwa'a ṣidqiw wa razaqnāhum minaṭ-ṭayyibāt(i), famākhtalafū ḥattā jā'ahumul-‘ilm(u), inna rabbaka yaqḍī bainahum yaumal-qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad bawwaanaa Baneee Israaa'eela mubawwa-a sidqinw wa razaqnaahum minnat taiyibaati famakh talafoo hattaa jaaa'ahmul 'ilm; inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa in kunta fī syakkim mimmā anzalnā ilaika fas'alil-lażīna yaqra'ūnal-kitāba min qablik(a), laqad jā'akal-ḥaqqu mir rabbika falā takūnanna minal-mumtarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa in kunta fee shakkim mimmaaa anzalnaaa ilaika fas'alil lazeena yaqra'oonal Kitaaba min qablik; laqad jaaa'akal haqqu mir Rabbika falaa takoonanna minal mumtareen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā takūnanna minal-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātillāhi fa takūna minal-khāsirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa takoonanna minal lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatil laahi fatakoona minal khaasireen

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna ḥaqqat ‘alaihim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena haqqat 'alaihim Kalimatu Rabbika laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau jā'athum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawul-‘ażābal-alīm(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law jaaa'at hum kullu Aayatin hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem

ayah.transliteration: Falau lā kānat qaryatun āmanat fa nafa‘ahā īmānuhā illā qauma yūnus(a), lammā āmanū kasyafnā ‘anhum ‘ażābal-khizyi fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa matta‘nāhum ilā ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: Falaw laa kaanat qaryatun aamanat fanafa'ahaaa eemaanuhaaa illaa qawma Yoonusa lammaaa aamanoo kashafnaa 'anhum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa wa matta'naahum ilaa heen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau syā'a rabbuka la'āmana man fil-arḍi kulluhum jamī‘ā(n), afa anta tukrihun-nāsa ḥattā yakūnū mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law shaaa'a Rabbuka la aamana man fil ardi kulluhum jamee'aa; afa anta tukrihun naasa hattaa yakoonoo mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna linafsin an tu'mina illā bi'iżnillāh(i), wa yaj‘alur-rijsa ‘alal-lażīna lā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana linafsin an tu'mina illaa bi iznil laah; wa yaj'alur rijsa 'alal lazeena laa ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qulinẓurū māżā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa mā tugnil-āyātu wan-nużuru ‘an qaumil lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qulin zuroo maazaa fissamaawaati wal ard; wa maa tughnil Aayaatu wannuzuru 'an qawmil laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Fahal yantaẓirūna illā miṡla ayyāmil-lażīna khalau min qablihim, qul fantaẓirū innī ma‘akum minal-muntaẓirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fahal yantaziroona illaa misla ayyaamil lazeena khalaw min qablihim; qul fantazirooo innee ma'akum minal muntazireen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma nunajjī rusulanā wal-lażīna āmanū każālik(a), ḥaqqan ‘alainā nunjil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summma nunajjee Ruslanaa wallazeena aamanoo; kazaalika haqqan 'alainaa nunjil mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Qul yā ayyuhan nāsu in kuntum fī syakkim min dīnī falā a‘budul-lażīna ta‘budūna min dūnillāhi wa lākin a‘budullāhal-lażī yatawaffākum, wa umirtu an akūna minal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul yaaa ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee shakkkim min deenee falaa a'budul lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi wa laakin a'budul laahal lazee yatawaffaakum wa umirtu an akoona minal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa an aqim wajhaka lid-dīni ḥanīfā(n), wa lā takūnanna minal-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa an aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefanw wa laa takoonannna minal mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tad‘u min dūnillāhi mā lā yanfa‘uka  wa lā yaḍurruk(a), fa in fa‘alta fa innaka iżam minaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tad'u min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uka wa laa yadurruka fa in fa'alta fa innaka izam minaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yamsaskallāhu biḍurrin falā kāsyifa lahū illā huw(a), wa iy yuridka bikhairin falā rādda lifaḍlih(ī), yuṣību bihī may yasyā'u min ‘ibādih(ī), wa huwal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa iny yamsaskal laahu bidurrin falaa kaashifa lahoo illaa Huwa wa iny yuridka bikhairin falaa raaadda lifadlih; yuseebu bihee man yashaaa'u min 'ibaadih; wa huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Qul yā ayyuhan-nāsu qad jā'akumul-ḥaqqu mir rabbikum, fa manihtadā fa innamā yahtadī linafsih(ī), wa man ḍalla fa innamā yaḍillu ‘alaihā, wa mā ana ‘alaikum biwakīl(in).
ayah.translation: Qul yaaa aiyuhan naasu qad jaaa'akumul haqqu mir Rabbikum famanih tadaa fa innamaa yahtadee linafsihee wa man dalla fa innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa wa maaa ana 'alaikum biwakeel

ayah.transliteration: Wattabi‘ mā yūḥā ilaika waṣbir ḥattā yaḥkumallāh(u), wa huwa khairul-ḥākimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika wasbir hattaa yahkumal laah; wa Huwa khairul haakimeen

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām rā, kitābun uḥkimat āyātuhū ṡumma fuṣṣilat mil ladun ḥakīmin khabīr(in).
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun uhkimat Aayaatuhoo summa fussilat mil ladun Hakeemin Khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Allā ta‘budū illallāh(a), innanī lakum minhu nażīruw wa basyīr(un).
ayah.translation: Allaa ta'budooo illal laah; innanee lakum minhu nazeerunw wa basheer

ayah.transliteration: Wa anistagfirū rabbakum ṡumma tūbū ilaihi yumatti‘kum matā‘an ḥasanan ilā ajalim musammaw wa yu'ti kulla żī faḍlin faḍlah(ū), wa in tawallau fa innī akhāfu ‘alaikum ‘ażāba yaumin kabīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa anis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yumatti'kum mataa'an hasanan ilaaa ajalim musammanw wa yu'ti kulla zee fadlin fadlahoo wa in tawallaw fa inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin Kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Ilallāhi marji‘ukum, wa huwa ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Ilal laahi marji'ukum wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Alā innahum yaṡnūna ṣudūrahum liyastakhfū minh(u), alā ḥīna yastagsyūna ṡiyābahum, ya‘lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu‘linūn(a), innahū ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Alaa innahum yasnoona sudoorahum liyastakhfoo minh; alaa heena yastaghshoona siyaabahum ya'lamu maa yusiroona wa maa yu'linoon; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā min dābbatin fil-arḍi illā ‘alallāhi  rizquhā wa ya‘lamu mustaqarrahā wa mustauda‘ahā, kullun fī kitābim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa min daaabbatin fil ardi illaa 'alal laahi rizquhaa wa ya'lamu mustaqarrahaa wa mustawda'ahaa; kullun fee Kitaabim Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa fī sittati ayyāmiw wa kāna ‘arsyuhū ‘alal-mā'i liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu ‘amalā(n), wa la'in qulta innakum mab‘ūṡūna mim ba‘dil-mauti layaqūlannal-lażīna kafarū in hāżā illā siḥrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal alrda fee sittati aiyaaminw wa kaana 'Arshuhoo alal maaa'i liyablu wakum aiyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; wa la'in qulta innakum mab'oosoona mim ba'dil mawti la yaqoolanal lazeena kafaroo in haazaaa illaa sihrum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in akhkharnā ‘anhumul-‘ażāba ilā ummatim ma‘dūdatil layaqūlunna mā yaḥbisuh(ū), alā yauma ya'tīhim laisa maṣrūfan ‘anhum wa ḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wala'in akhkharnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba ilaaa ummatim ma'doodatil la yaqoolunna maa yahbisuh; alaa yawma yaateehim laisa masroofan 'anhum wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in ażaqnal-insāna minnā raḥmatan ṡumma naza‘nāhā ‘anh(u), innahū laya'ūsun kafūr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan summa naza'naahaa minhu, innahoo laya'oosun kafoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in ażaqnāhu na‘mā'a ba‘da ḍarrā'a massathu layaqūlanna żahabas-sayyi'ātu ‘annī, innahū lafariḥun fakhūr(un).
ayah.translation: Wala'in azaqnaahu na'maaa'a ba'da darraaa'a massat hu la yaqoolanna zahabas saiyiaatu 'anneee; innahoo lafarihun fakhoor

ayah.transliteration: Illal-lażīna ṣabarū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāt(i), ulā'ika lahum magfiratuw wa ajrun kabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Illal lazeena sabaroo wa 'amilus saalihaati ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Fa la‘allaka tārikum ba‘ḍa mā yūḥā ilaika wa ḍā'ikum bihī ṣadruka ay yaqūlū lau lā unzila ‘alaihi kanzun au jā'a ma‘ahū malak(un), innamā anta nażīr(un), wallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'in wakīl(un).
ayah.translation: Fala'allaka taarikum ba'da maa yoohaaa ilaika wa daaa'iqum bihee sadruka ai yaqooloo law laaa unzila 'alaihi kanzun aw jaaa'a ma'ahoo malak; innamaa anta nazeer; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'inw wakeel

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūnaftarāh(u), qul fa'tū bi‘asyri suwarim miṡlihī muftarayātiw wad‘ū manistaṭa‘tum min dūnillāhi in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul faatoo bi'ashri Suwarim mislihee muftarayaatinw wad'oo manis tata'tum min doonil laahi in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa illam yastajībū lakum fa‘lamū annamā unzila bi‘ilmillāhi wa allā ilāha illā huw(a), fahal antum muslimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa il lam yastajeeboo lakum fa'lamooo annamaaa unzilla bi'ilmil laahi wa al laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fahal antum muslimoon

ayah.transliteration: Man kāna yurīdul-ḥayātad-dun-yā wa zīnatahā nuwaffi ilaihim a‘mālahum fīhā wa hum fīhā lā yubkhasūn(a).
ayah.translation: Man kaana yureedul hayaatad dunyaa zeenatahaa nuwaffi ilaihim a'maa lahum feehaa wa hum feehaa laa yubkhasoon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna laisa lahum fil-ākhirati illan-nār(u), wa ḥabiṭa mā ṣana‘ū fīhā wa bāṭilum mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena laisa lahum fil Aakhirati illan Naaru wa habita maa sana'oo feehaa wa baatilum maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Afaman kāna ‘alā bayyinatim mir rabbihī wa yatlūhu syāhidum minhu wa min qablihī kitābu mūsā imāmaw wa raḥmah(tan), ulā'ika yu'minūna bih(ī), wa may yakfur bihī minal-aḥzābi fan-nāru mau‘iduhū falā taku fī miryatim minhu innahul-ḥaqqu mir rabbika wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afaman kaana 'alas baiyinatim mir Rabbihee wa yatloohu shaahidum minhu wa min qablihee Kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw wa rahmah; ulaaa 'ika yu'minoona bih; wa mai yakfur bihee minal Ahzaabi fan Naaru maw'iduh; falaa taku fee miryatim minh; innahul haqqu mir Rabbika wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa man aẓlamu mimmaniftarā ‘alallāhi każibā(n), ulā'ika yu‘raḍūna ‘alā rabbihim wa yaqūlul-asyhādu hā'ulā'il-lażīna każabū ‘alā rabbihim, alā la‘natullāhi ‘alaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man azlamu mimmanif taraa 'alal laahi kazibaa; ulaaa'ika yu'radoona 'alaa Rabbihim wa yaqoolul ashhaa duhaaa'ulaaa'il lazeena kazaboo 'alaa Rabbihim; alaa la'natul laahi alaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Al-lażīna yaṣuddūna ‘an sabīlillāhi wa yabgūnahā ‘iwajā(n), wa hum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi wa yabghoonahaa 'iwajanw wa hum bil Aakhiratihum kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika lam yakūnū mu‘jizīna fil-arḍi wa mā kāna lahum min dūnillāhi min auliyā'(a), yuḍā‘afu lahumul-‘ażāb(u), mā kānū yastaṭī‘ūnas-sam‘a wa mā kānū yubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika lam yakoonoo mu'jizeena fil ardi wa maa kaana lahum min doonil laahi min awliyaaa'; yudaa'afu lahumul 'azaab; maa kaanoo yastatee'oonas sam'a wa maa kaanoo yubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna khasirū anfusahum wa ḍalla ‘anhum mā kānū yaftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

ayah.transliteration: Lā jarama annahum fil-ākhirati humul-akhsarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa jarama annahum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa akhbatū ilā rabbihim, ulā'ika aṣḥābul-jannati hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa akhbatooo ilaa Rabbihim ulaaa'ika Ashaabul Jannati hum feehaa khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Maṡalul-farīqaini kal-a‘mā wal-aṣammi wal-baṣīri was-samī‘(i), hal yastawiyāni maṡalā(n), afalā tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Masalul fareeqini kal a'maa wal asammi walbaseeri wassamee'; hal yastawiyaani masalaa; afalaa tazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qaumihī innī lakum nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee innee lakum nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Allā ta‘budū illallāh(a), innī akhāfu ‘alaikum ‘ażāba yaumin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Al laa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Fa qālal-mala'ul-lażīna kafarū min qaumihī mā narāka illā basyaram miṡlanā wa mā narākattaba‘aka illal-lażīna hum arāżilunā bādiyar-ra'y(i), wa mā narā lakum ‘alainā min faḍlim bal naẓunnukum kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faqaalal mala ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee ma naraaka illaa basharam mislanaa wa maa naraakat taba'aka illal lazeena hum araazilunaa baadiyar raayi wa maa naraa lakum 'alainaa min fadlim bal nazunnukum kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā qaumi ara'aitum in kuntu ‘alā bayyinatim mir rabbī wa ātānī raḥmatam min ‘indihī fa ‘ummiyat ‘alaikum, anulzimukumūhā wa antum lahā kārihūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee wa aataanee rahmatam min 'indihee fa'um miyat 'alaikum anulzimuku moohaa wa antum lahaa kaarihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumi lā as'alukum ‘alaihi mālā(n), in ajriya illā ‘alallāhi wa mā ana biṭāridil-lażīna āmanū, innahum mulāqū rabbihim  wa lākinnī arākum qauman tajhalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi maalan in ajriya illaa 'alal laah; wa maaa ana bitaaridil lazeena aamanoo; innahum mulaaqoo Rabbihim wa laakinneee araakum qawman tajhaloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumi may yanṣurunī minallāhi in ṭarattuhum, afalā tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmi mai yansurunee minal laahi in tarattuhum; afalaa tazak karoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā aqūlu lakum ‘indī khazā'inullāhi wa lā a‘lamul-gaiba  wa lā aqūlu innī malakuw wa lā aqūlu lil-lażīna tazdarī a‘yunukum lay yu'tiyahumullāhu khairā(n), allāhu a‘lamu bimā fī anfusihim, innī iżal laminaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa aqoolu lakum 'indee khazaa'inul laahi wa laaa a'lamul ghaiba wa laa aqoolu inee malakunw wa laaa aqoolu lillazeena tazdareee a'yunukum lai yu'tiyahumul laahu khairan Allaahu a'lamu bimaa feee anfusihim innee izal laminaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā nūḥu qad jādaltanā fa akṡarta jidālanā fa'tinā bimā ta‘idunā in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa Noohu qad jaadaltanaa fa aksarta jidaalanaa faatinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innamā ya'tīkum bihillāhu in syā'a wa mā antum bimu‘jizīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala innamaa yaateekum bihil laahu in shaaa'a wa maaa antum bimu'jizeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yanfa‘ukum nuṣḥī in arattu an anṣaḥa lakum in kānallāhu yurīdu ay yugwiyakum, huwa rabbukum, wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yanfa'ukum nusheee in arattu an ansaha lakum in kaanal laahu yureedu ai yughwi yakum; Huwa Rabbukum wa ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūnaftarāh(u), qul iniftaraituhū fa ‘alayya ijrāmī wa ana barī'um mimmā tujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo fa'alaiya ijraamee wa ana bareee'um mimmaa tujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ūḥiya ilā nūḥin annahū lay yu'mina min qaumika illā man qad āmana falā tabta'is bimā kānū yaf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa oohiya ilaa Noohin annahoo lany-yu'mina min qawmika illaa man qad aamana falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo yaf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Waṣna‘il-fulka bi'a‘yuninā wa waḥyinā wa lā tukhāṭibnī fil-lażīna ẓalamū, innahum mugraqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wasna'il fulka bi-a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa wa laa tukhaa tibnee fil lazeena zalamoo; innahum mughraqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaṣna‘ul-fulk(a), wa kullamā marra ‘alaihi mala'um min qaumihī sakhirū minh(u), qāla in taskharū minnā fa innā naskharu minkum kamā taskharūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yasn'ul fulka wa kullamaa marra 'alaihi malaum min qawmihee sakhiroo minh; qaala in taskharoo minnaa fa innaa naskharu minkum kamaa taskharoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa saufa ta‘lamūn(a), may ya'tīhi ‘ażābuy yukhzīhi wa yaḥillu ‘alaihi ‘ażābum muqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fasawfa ta'lamoona mai yaateehi 'azaabuny yaukhzeehi wa yahillu 'alaihi 'azaabum muqeem

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā jā'a amrunā wafārat-tannūr(u), qulnaḥmil fīhā min kullin zaujainiṡnaini wa ahlaka illā man sabaqa ‘alaihil-qaulu wa man āman(a), wa mā āmana ma‘ahū illā qalīl(un).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a amrunaa wa faarat tannooru qulnah mil feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini wa ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu wa man aaman; wa maaa aamana ma'ahooo illaa qaleel

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālarkabū fīhā bismillāhi majrêhā wa mursāhā, inna rabbī lagafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalar kaboo feehaa bismil laahi majraihaa wa mursaahaa; inna Rabbee la Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa hiya tajrī bihim fī maujin kal-jibāl(i), wa nādā nūḥunibnahū wa kāna fī ma‘ziliy yā bunayyarkam ma‘anā wa lā takum ma‘al-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa hiya tajree bihim fee mawjin kaljibaali wa naadaa Noohunib nahoo wa kaana fee ma'ziliny yaa bunai yarkam ma'anaa wa laa takum ma'al kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla sa'āwī ilā jabaliy ya‘ṣimunī minal-mā'(i), qāla lā ‘āṣimal-yauma min amrillāhi illā ma raḥim(a), wa ḥāla bainahumal-mauju fa kāna minal-mugraqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala sa aaweee ilaa jabaliny ya'simunee minal maaa'; qaala laa 'aasimal yawma min amril laahi illaa mar rahim; wa haala bainahumal mawju fakaana minal mughraqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qīla yā arḍubla‘ī mā'aki wa yā samā'u aqli‘ī wa gīḍal-mā'u wa quḍiyal-amru wastawat ‘alal-jūdiyyi wa qīla bu‘dal lil-qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qeela yaaa ardubla'ee maaa'aki wa yaa samaaa'u aqi'ee wa gheedal maaa'u wa qudiyal amru wastawat 'alal joodiyyi wa qeela bu'dal lilqawmiz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa nādā nūḥur rabbahū fa qāla rabbi innabnī min ahlī, wa inna wa‘dakal-ḥaqqu wa anta aḥkamul-ḥākimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa naadaa noohur Rabbahoo faqaala Rabbi innabnee min ahlee wa inna wa'dakal haqqu wa Anta ahkamul haakimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā nūḥu innahū laisa min ahlik(a), innahū ‘amalun gairu ṣāliḥ(in), falā tas'alnī mā laisa laka bihī ‘ilm(un), innī a‘iẓuka an takūna minal-jāhilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaa Noohu innahoo laisa min ahlika innahoo 'amalun ghairu saalihin falaa tas'alni mmaa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun inneee a'izuka an takoona minal jaahileen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi innī a‘ūżu bika an as'alaka mā laisa lī bihī ‘ilm(un), wa illā tagfir lī wa tarḥamnī akum minal-khāsirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala rabbi inneee a'oozu bika an as'alaka maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw wa illaa taghfir lee wa tarhamneee akum minal khaasireen

ayah.transliteration: Qīla yā nūḥuhbiṭ bisalāmim minnā wa barakātin ‘alaika wa ‘alā umamim mimmam ma‘ak(a), wa umamun sanumatti‘uhum ṡumma yamassuhum minnā ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qeela yaa Noohuh bit bisalaamim minnaa wa barakaatin 'alaika wa 'alaaa umamim mimmam ma'ak; wa umamun sanumatti'uhum summa yamassuhum minaa 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Tilka min ambā'il-gaibi nūḥīhā ilaik(a), mā kunta ta‘lamuhā anta wa lā qaumuka min qabli hāżā, faṣbir, innal-‘āqibata lil-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Tilka min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehaaa ilaika maa kunta ta'lamuhaaaa anta wa laa qawmuka min qabli haazaa fasbir innal 'aaqibata lilmuttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ilā ‘ādin akhāhum hūdā(n), qāla yā qaumi‘budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin gairuh(ū), in antum illā muftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ilaa 'aadin akhaahum Hoodaa; qaala yaa qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhooo in antum illaa muftaroon

ayah.transliteration: Yā qaumi lā as'alukum ‘alaihi ajrā(n), in ajriya illā ‘alal-lażī faṭaranī, afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaa qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran in ajriya illaa 'alal lazee fataranee; afalaa ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumistagfirū rabbakum ṡumma tūbū ilaihi yursilis-samā'a ‘alaikum midrāraw wa yazidkum quwwatan ilā quwwatikum wa lā tatawallau mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yursilis samaaa'a 'alaikum midraaranw wa yazidkum quwwatan ilaa quwwatikum wa laa tatawallaw mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā hūdu mā ji'tanā bibayyinatiw wa mā naḥnu bitārikī ālihatinā ‘an qaulika wa mā naḥnu laka bimu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa Hoodu maa ji'tanaa bibaiyinatinw wa maa nahnu bitaarikeee aalihatinaa 'an qawlika wa maa nahnu laka bimu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: In naqūlu illa‘tarāka ba‘ḍu ālihatinā bisū'(in), qāla innī usyhidullāha wasyhadū annī barī'um mimmā tusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: In naqoolu illa' taraaka ba'du aalihatinaa bisooo'; qaala inneee ushhidul laaha wash hadooo annee bareee'um mimmaa tushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Min dūnihī fa kīdūnī jamī‘an ṡumma lā tunẓirūn(i).
ayah.translation: Min doonihee fakeedoonee jamee'an summa laa tunziroon

ayah.transliteration: Innī tawakkaltu ‘alallāhi rabbī wa rabbikum, mā min dābbatin illā huwa ākhiżum bināṣiyatihā, inna rabbī ‘alā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Innee tawakkaltu 'alallaahi Rabbee wa Rabbikum; maa min daaabbatin illaa Huwa aakhizum binaasiyatihaa; inna Rabbee 'alaa Siraatim mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Fa in tawallau faqad ablagtukum mā ursiltu bihī ilaikum, wa yastakhlifu rabbī qauman gairakum, wa lā taḍurrūnahū syai'ā(n), inna rabbī ‘alā kulli syai'in ḥafīẓ(un).
ayah.translation: Fa in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum maaa ursiltu biheee ilaikum; wa yastakhlifu Rabbee qawman ghairakum wa laa tadur roonahoo shai'aa; inna Rabbee 'alaa kulli shai'in Hafeez

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā jā'a amrunā najjainā hūdaw wal-lażīna āmanū ma‘ahū biraḥmatim minnā, wa najjaināhum min ‘ażābin galīẓ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najainaa Hoodanw wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa wa najainaahum min 'azaabin ghaleez

ayah.transliteration: Wa tilka ‘ādun jaḥadū bi'āyāti rabbihim wa ‘aṣau rusulahū wattaba‘ū amra kulli jabbārin ‘anīd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa tilka 'aad, jahadoo bi Aayaati Rabbihim wa 'asaw Rusulahoo wattaba'ooo amra kulli jabbaarin 'aneed

ayah.transliteration: Wa utbi‘ū fī hażihid-dun-yā la‘nataw wa yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), alā inna ‘ādan kafarū rabbahum, alā bu‘dal li‘ādin qaumi hūd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa utbi'oo fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw wa Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa inna 'Aadan kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa bu'dal li 'Aadin qawmin Hood

ayah.transliteration: Wa ilā ṡamūda akhāhum ṣālihā(n), qāla yā qaumi‘budullāḥa mā lakum min ilāhin gairuh(ū), huwa ansya'akum minal-arḍi wasta‘marakum fīhā fastagfirūhu ṡumma tūbū ilaih(i), inna rabbī qarībum mujīb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihaa; qaala yaa qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahim ghairuhoo Huwa ansha akum minal ardi wasta' marakum feehaa fastaghfiroohu summa toobooo ilaih; inna Rabbee Qareebum Mujeeb

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā ṣāliḥu qad kunta fīnā marjuwwan qabla hāżā atanhānā an na‘buda mā ya‘budu ābā'unā wa innanā lafī syakkim mimmā tad‘ūnā ilaihi murīb(in).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa Saalihu qad kunta feenaa marjuwwan qabla haazaaa atanhaanaaa an na'bu da maa ya'budu aabaaa'unaa wa innanaa lafee shakkim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi mureeb

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā qaumi ara'aitum in kuntu ‘alā bayyinatim mir rabbī, wa ātānī minhu raḥmatan famay yanṣurunī minallāhi in ‘aṣaituh(ū), famā tazīdūnanī gaira takhsīr(in).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aytum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee wa aataanee minhu rahmatan famai yansurunee minal laahi in 'asaituhoo famaa tazeedoonanee ghaira takhseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumi hāżihī nāqatullāhi lakum āyatan fa żarūhā ta'kul fī arḍillāhi wa lā tamassūhā bisū'in fa ya'khużakum ‘ażābun qarīb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmi haazihee naaqatul laahi lakum aayatan fazaroohaa taakul feee ardil laahi wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa yaakhuzakum azaabun qareeb

ayah.transliteration: Fa ‘aqarūhā fa qāla tamatta‘ū fī dārikum ṡalāṡata ayyām(in), żālika wa‘dun gairu makżūb(in).
ayah.translation: Fa 'aqaroohaa faqaala tamatta'oo fee daarikum salaasata aiyaamin zaalika wa'dun ghairu makzoob

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'a amrunā najjainā ṣāliḥaw wal-lażīna āmanū ma‘ahū biraḥmatim minnā wa min khizyi yaumi'iż(in), inna rabbaka huwal-qawiyyul-‘ażīz(u).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa Saalihanw wal lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa wa min khizyi Yawmi'iz inna Rabbaka Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez

ayah.transliteration: Wa akhażal-lażīna ẓalamuṣ-ṣaiḥatu fa aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāṡimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa akhazal lazeena zalamus saihatu fa asbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeena

ayah.transliteration: Ka allam yagnau fīhā, alā inna ṡamūda kafarū rabbahum, alā bu‘dal liṡamūd(a).
ayah.translation: Ka al lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaaa inna Samooda kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa bu'dal li Samood.

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad jā'at rusulunā ibrāhīma bil-busyrā qālū salāmā(n), qāla salāmun famā labiṡa an jā'a bi‘ijlin ḥanīż(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bilbushraa qaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun famaa labisa an jaaa'a bi'ijin haneez

ayah.transliteration: Falammā ra'ā aidiyahum lā taṣilu ilaihi nakirahum wa aujasa minhum khīfah(tan), qālū lā takhaf innā ursilnā ilā qaumi lūṭ(in).
ayah.translation: Falammaa ra aaa aidiyahum laa tasilu ilaihi nakirahum wa awjasa minhum kheefah; qaaloo la takhaf innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmi Loot

ayah.transliteration: Wamra'atuhū qā'imatun fa ḍaḥikat fa basysyarnāhā bi'isḥāq(a), wa miw warā'i isḥāqa ya‘qūb(a).
ayah.translation: Wamra atuhoo qaaa'imatun fadahikat fabashsharnaahaa bi Ishaaqa wa minw waraaa'i Ishaaqa Ya'qoob

ayah.transliteration: Qālat yā wailatā a'alidu wa ana ‘ajūzuw wa hāżā ba‘lī syaikhā(n), inna hāżā lasyai'un ‘ajīb(un).
ayah.translation: Qaalat yaa wailataaa 'aalidu wa ana 'ajoozunw wa haaza ba'lee shaikhan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ajeeb

ayah.transliteration: Qālū ata‘jabīna min amrillāhi raḥmatullāhi wa barakātuh(ū), ‘alaikum ahlal-bait(i), innahū ḥamīdum majīd(un).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo ata'jabeena min amril laahi rahmatul laahi wa barakaatuho 'alaikum Ahlal Bayt; innahoo Hameedum Majeed

ayah.transliteration: Falammā żahaba ‘an ibrāhīmar rau‘u wa jā'athul busyrā yujādilunā fī qaumi lūṭ(in).
ayah.translation: Falammaa zahaba an Ibraaheemar raw'u wa jaaa'at hul bushraaa yujaadilunaa fee qawmi Loot

ayah.transliteration: Inna ibrāhīma laḥalīmun awwāhum munīb(un).
ayah.translation: Inna Ibraaheema lahaleemun awwwaahum muneeb

ayah.transliteration: Yā ibrāhīmu a‘riḍ ‘an hāżā, innahū qad jā'a amru rabbik(a), wa innahum ātīhim ‘ażābun gairu mardūd(in).
ayah.translation: Yaaa Ibraaheemu a'rid 'an haazaaa innahoo qad jaaa'a amru Rabbika wa innahum aateehim 'azaabun ghairun mardood

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā jā'at rusulunā lūṭan sī'a bihim wa ḍāqa bihim żar‘aw wa qāla hāżā yaumun ‘aṣīb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim wa daaqa bihim zar'anw wa qaala haazaa yawmun 'aseeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'ahū qaumuhū yuhra‘ūna ilaih(i), wa min qablu kānū ya‘malūnas-sayyi'āt(i), qāla yā qaumi hā'ulā'i banātī hunna aṭharu lakum fattaqullāha wa lā tukhzūni fī ḍaifī, alaisa minkum rajulur rasyīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'ahoo qawmuhoo yuhra'oona ilaihi wa min qablu kaanoo ya'maloonas saiyiaat; qaala yaa qawmi haaa'ulaaa'i banaatee hunna atharu lakum fattaqul laaha wa laa tukhzooni fee daifee alaisa minkum rajulur rasheed

ayah.transliteration: Qālū laqad ‘alimta mā lanā fī banātika min ḥaqq(in), wa innaka lata‘lamu mā nurīd(u).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo laqad 'alimta maa lanaa fee banastika min haqq, wa innaka lata'lamu maa nureed

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lau anna lī bikum quwwatan au āwī ilā ruknin syadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Qaala law anna lee bikum quwwatan aw aaweee ilaa ruknin shadeed

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā lūṭu innā rusulu rabbika lay yaṣilū ilaika fa asri bi'ahlika biqiṭ‘im minal-laili wa lā yaltafit minkum aḥadun illamra'atak(a), innahū muṣībuhā mā aṣābahum, inna mau‘idahumuṣ-ṣubḥ(u), alaisaṣ-ṣubḥu biqarīb(in).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa Lootu innaa Rusulu Rabbika lai yasiloo ilaika fa asri bi ahlika biqit 'im minal laili wa laa yaltafit minkum ahadun illam ra ataka innahoo museebuhaa maaa asaabahum; inna maw'i dahumus subh; alaisas subhu biqareeb

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'a amrunā ja‘alnā ‘āliyahā sāfilahā wa amṭarnā ‘alaihā ḥijāratam min sijjīlim manḍūd(in).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa ja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa amtamaa 'alaihaa hijaaratam min sijjeelim mandood

ayah.transliteration: Musawwamatan ‘inda rabbik(a) wa mā hiya minaẓ-ẓālimīna biba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Musawwamatan 'inda Rabbik; wa maa hiya minaz zaalimena biba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wa ilā madyana akhāhum syu‘aibā(n), qāla yā qaumi‘budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin gairuh(ū), wa lā tanquṣul-mikyāla wal-mīzāna innī arākum bikhairiw wa innī akhāfu ‘alaikum ‘ażāba yaumim muḥīṭ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'aibaa; qaala yaa qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo wa laa tanqusul mikyaala walmeezaan; inneee araakum bikhairinw wa innee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmim muheet

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumi auful-mikyāla wal-mīzāna bil-qisṭi wa lā tabkhasun-nāsa asy-yā'ahum wa lā ta‘ṡau fil-arḍi mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmi awful mikyaala walmeezaana bilqisti wa laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa'ahum wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Baqiyyatullāhi khairul lakum in kuntum mu'minīn(a), wa mā ana ‘alaikum biḥafīẓ(in).
ayah.translation: Baqiyyatul laahi khairul lakum in kuntum mu'mineen; wa maa ana 'alaikum bihafeez

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā syu‘aibu aṣalātuka ta'muruka an natruka mā ya‘budu ābā'unā au an naf‘ala fī amwālinā mā nasyā'(u), innaka la'antal-ḥalīmur-rasyīd(u).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa Shu'aybu asalaatuka taamuruka an natruka maa ya'budu aabaaa'unaaa aw an naf'ala feee amwaalinaa maa nashaaa'oo innaka la antal haleemur rasheed

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā qaumi ara'aitum in kuntu ‘alā bayyinatim mir rabbī wa razaqanī minhu rizqan ḥasanaw wa mā urīdu an ukhālifakum ila mā anhākum ‘anh(u), in urīdu illal-iṣlāḥa mastaṭa‘t(u), wa mā taufīqī illā billāh(i), ‘alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi unīb(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee wa razaqanee minhu rizqan hasanaa; wa maaa ureedu an ukhaalifakum ilaa maaa anhaakum 'anh; in ureedu illal islaaha mastata't; wa maa tawfeeqeee illaa billaah; 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi uneeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumi lā yajrimannakum syiqāqī ay yuṣībakum miṡlu mā aṣāba qauma nūḥin au qauma hūdin au qauma ṣāliḥ(in), wa mā qaumu lūṭim minkum biba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmi laa yajri mannakum shiqaaqeee ai yuseebakum mislu maaa asaaba qawma Noohin aw qawma Hoodin aw qawma Saalih; wa maa qawmu Lootim minkum biba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wastagfirū rabbakum ṡumma tūbū ilaih(i), inna rabbī raḥīmuw wadūd(un).
ayah.translation: Wastaghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaih; inna Rabbee Raheemunw Wadood

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā syu‘aibu mā nafqahu kaṡīram mimmā taqūlu wa innā lanarāka fīnā ḍa‘īfā(n), wa lau lā rahṭuka larajamnāk(a), wa anta ‘alainā bi‘azīz(in).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa Shu'aibu maa nafqahu kaseeram mimmaa taqoolu wa innaa lanaraaka feenaa da'eefanw wa law laa rahtuka larajamnaaka wa maaa anta 'alainaa bi'azeez

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā qaumi arahṭī a‘azzu ‘alaikum minallāh(i), wattakhażtumūhu warā'akum ẓihriyyā(n), inna rabbī bimā ta‘malūna muḥīṭ(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaa qawmi arahteee a'azzu 'alaikum minal laahi wattakhaztumoohu waraaa'akum zihriyyan inna Rabbee bimaa ta'maloona muheet

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumi‘malū ‘alā makānatikum innī ‘āmil(un), saufa ta‘lamūn(a), may ya'tīhi ‘ażābuy yukhzīhi wa man huwa kāżib(un), wartaqibū innī ma‘akum raqīb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmi' maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun sawfa ta'lamoona mai yaateehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi wa man huwa kaazib; wartaqibooo innnee ma'akum raqeeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā jā'a amrunā najjainā syu‘aibaw wal-lażīna amanū ma‘ahū biraḥmatim minnā, wa akhażatil-lażīna ẓalamuṣ-ṣaiḥatu fa aṣbaḥū fī diyārihim jāṡimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa shu'aibanw wal lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim minnaa wa akhazatil lazeena zalamus saihatu fa asbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeen

ayah.transliteration: Ka allam yagnau fīhā, alā bu‘dal limadyana kamā ba‘idat ṡamūd(u).
ayah.translation: Ka-al-lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaa bu'dal li Madyana Kamaa ba'idat Samood

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā mūsā bi'āyātinā wa sulṭānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Ilā fir‘auna wa mala'ihī fattaba‘ū amra fir‘aun(a), wa mā amru fir‘auna birasyīd(in).
ayah.translation: Ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fattaba'ooo amra Fir'awna wa maaa amru Fir'awna birasheed

ayah.transliteration: Yaqdumu qaumahū yaumal-qiyāmati fa auradahumun-nār(a), wa bi'sal-wirdul-maurūd(u).
ayah.translation: Yaqdumu qawmahoo Yawmal Qiyaamati fa awrada humun Naara wa bi'sal wirdul mawrood

ayah.transliteration: Wa utbi‘ū fī hāżihī la‘nataw wa yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), bi'sar-rifdul-marfūd(u).
ayah.translation: Wa utbi'oo fee haazihee la'natanw wa Yawmal Qiyaamah; bi'sar rifdul marfood

ayah.transliteration: Żālika min ambā'il-qurā naquṣṣuhū ‘alaika minhā qā'imuw wa ḥaṣīd(un).
ayah.translation: Zaalika min ambaaa'il quraa naqussuhoo 'alaika minhaa qaaa'imunw wa haseed

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ẓalamnāhum wa lākin ẓalamū anfusahum famā agnat ‘anhum ālihatuhumul-latī yad‘ūna min dūnillāhi min syai'il lammā jā'a amru rabbik(a), wa mā zādūhum gaira tatbīb(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa zalamnaahum wa laakin zalamooo anfusahum famaaa aghnat 'anhum aalihatuhumul latee yad'oona min doonil laahi min shai'il lammaa jaaa'a amru Rabbika wa maa zaadoohum ghaira tatbeeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika akhżu rabbika iżā akhażal-qurā wa hiya ẓālimah(tun), inna akhżahū alīmun syadīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika akhzu Rabbika izaaa akhazal quraa wa hiya zaalimah; inna akhzahooo aleemun shadeed

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika la'āyatal liman khāfa ‘ażābal-ākhirah(ti), żālika yaumum majmū‘(un), lahun-nāsu wa żālika yaumum masyhūd(un).
ayah.translation: Inna fee zaalika la aayatal liman khaafa 'azaabal Aakhirah; zaalika Yawmum majmoo'ul lahun naasu wa zaalika Yawmum mashhood

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā nu'akhkhiruhū illā li'ajalim ma‘dūd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa nu'akhkhiruhooo illaa li ajalim ma'dood

ayah.transliteration: Yauma ya'ti lā takallamu nafsun illā bi'iżnih(ī), fa minhum syaqiyyuw wa sa‘īd(un).
ayah.translation: Yawma yaati laa takallamu nafsun illaa bi iznih; faminhum shaqiyyunw wa sa'eed

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammal-lażīna syaqū fa fin-nāri lahum fīhā zafīruw wa syahīq(un).
ayah.translation: Fa ammal lazeena shaqoo fafin Naari lahum feehaa zafeerunw wa shaheeq

ayah.transliteration: Khālidīna fīhā mā dāmatis-samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā syā'a rabbuk(a), inna rabbaka fa‘‘ālul limā yurīd(u).
ayah.translation: Khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis samaawaatu wal ardu illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; inna Rabbaka fa' 'aalul limaa yureed

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal-lażīna su‘idū fa fil-jannati khālidīna fīhā mā dāmatis-samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā syā'a rabbuk(a), ‘aṭā'an gaira majżūż(in).
ayah.translation: Wa ammal lazeena su'idoo fafil Jannati khaalideena feehaa maa daamatis samaawaatu wal ardu illaa maa shaaa'a Rabbuk; ataaa'an ghaira majzooz

ayah.transliteration: Falā taku fī miryatim mimmā ya‘budu hā'ulā'(i), mā ya‘budūna  illā kamā ya‘budu ābā'uhum min qabl(u),  wa innā lamuwaffūhum naṣībahum gaira manqūṣ(in).
ayah.translation: Falaa taku fee miryatim mimmmaa ya'budu haaa'ulaaa'; maa ya'budoona illaa kamaa ya'budu aabaaa'uhum min qabl; wa innaa lamuwaf foohum naseebahum ghaira manqoos

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba fakhtulifa fīh(i), wa lau lā kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika laquḍiya bainahum, wa innahum lafī syakkim minhu murīb(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa feeh; wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; wa innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna kullan lammā layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka a‘mālahum, innahū bimā ya‘malūna khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa inna kullal lammaa la yuwaffiyannahum Rabbuka a'maalahum; innahoo bimaa ya'maloona Khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Fastaqim kamā umirta wa man tāba ma‘aka wa lā taṭgau, innahū bimā ta‘malūna baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Fastaqim kamaaa umirta wa man taaba ma'aka wa laa tatghaw; innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tarkanū ilal-lażīna ẓalamū fa tamassakumun-nār(u), wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi min auliyā'a ṡumma lā tunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tarkanooo ilal lazeena zalamoo fatamassa kumun Naaru wa maa lakum min doonil laahi min awliyaaa'a summa laa tunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa aqimiṣ-ṣalāta ṭarafayin-nahāri wa zulafam minal-lail(i), innal-ḥasanāti yużhibnas-sayyi'āt(i), żālika żikrā liż-żākirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aqimis Salaata tarafayin nahaari wa zulafam minal layl; innal hasanaati yuzhibnas saiyi aat; zaalika zikraa liz zaakireen

ayah.transliteration: Waṣbir fa innallāha lā yaḍī‘u ajral-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wasbir fa innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Fa lau lā kāna minal-qurūni min qablikum ulū baqiyyatiy yanhauna ‘anil-fasādi fil-arḍi illā qalīlam mimman anjainā minhum, wattaba‘al-lażīna ẓalamū mā utrifū fīhi wa kānū mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falw laa kaana minal qurooni min qablikum ooloo baqiyyatiny yanhawna 'anil fasaadi fil ardi illaa qaleelam mimman anjainaa minhum; wattaba'al lazeena zalamoo maaa utrifoo feehi wa kaanoo mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna rabbuka liyuhlikal-qurā biẓulmiw wa ahluhā muṣliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana Rabbuka liyuhlikal quraa bizulminw wa ahluhaa muslihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau syā'a rabbuka laja‘alan-nāsa ummataw wāḥidataw wa lā yazālūna mukhtalifīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law shaaa'a Rabbuka laja'alannnaasa ummatanw waa hidatanw wa laa yazaaloona mukhtalifeen

ayah.transliteration: Illā mar raḥima rabbuk(a), wa liżālika khalaqahum, wa tammat kalimatu rabbika la'amla'anna jahannama minal-jinnati wan-nāsi ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaa mar rahima Rabbuk; wa lizaalika khalaqahum; wa tammat Kalimatu Rabbika la amla'ana Jahannama minal jinnati wannnaasi ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Wa kullan naquṣṣu ‘alaika min ambā'ir-rusuli mā nuṡabbitu bihī fu'ādaka wa jā'aka fī hāżihil-ḥaqqu wa mau‘iẓatuw wa żikrā lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kullan naqussu 'alaika min ambaaa'ir Rusuli maa nusabbitu bihee fu'aadak; wa jaaa'aka fee haazihil haqqu wa maw'izatunw wa zikraa lilmu' mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qul lil-lażīna lā yu'minūna‘malū ‘alā makānatikum, innā ‘āmilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qul lillazeena laa yu'minoona' maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innaa 'aamiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wantaẓirū innā muntaẓirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wantaziroo innaa mun taziroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi gaibus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa ilaihi yurja‘ul-amru kulluhū fa‘budhu wa tawakkal ‘alaih(i), wa mā rabbuka bigāfilin ‘ammā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahi ghaibus samaawaati wal ardi wa ilaihi yurja'ul amru kulluhoo fa'bu-dhu wa tawakkal 'alaih; wa maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām rā, tilka āyātul-kitābil-mubīn(i).
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Innā anzalnāhu qur'ānan ‘arabiyyal la‘allakum ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaaa anzalnaahu quraanan 'Arabiyyal la 'allakum ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Naḥnu naquṣṣu ‘alaika aḥsanal-qaṣaṣi bimā auḥainā ilaika hāżal-qur'ān(a), wa in kunta min qablihī laminal-gāfilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika ahsanal qasasi bimaaa awhainaaa ilaika haazal quraana wa in kunta min qablihee laminal ghaafileen

ayah.transliteration: Iż qāla yūsufu li'abīhi yā abati innī ra'aitu aḥada ‘asyara kaukabaw wasy-syamsa wal-qamara ra'aituhum lī sājidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz qaala Yoosufu li abeehi yaaa abati innee ra aytu ahada 'ashara kawkabanw wash shamsa walqamara ra aytuhum lee saajideen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā bunayya lā taqṣuṣ ru'yāka ‘alā ikhwatika fa yakīdū laka kaidā(n), innasy-syaiṭāna lil-insāni ‘aduwwum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaa bunaiya laa taqsus ru'yaaka 'alaaa ikhwatika fayakeedoo laka kaidaa; innash Shaitaana lil insaani 'aduwwum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika yajtabīka rabbuka wa yu‘allimuka min ta'wīlil-aḥādīṡi wa yutimmu ni‘matahū ‘alaika wa ‘alā āli ya‘qūba kamā atammahā ‘alā abawaika min qablu ibrāhīma wa isḥāq(a), inna rabbaka ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika yajtabeeka rabbuka wa yu'allimuka min taaweelil ahaadeesi wa yutimmu ni'matahoo 'alaika wa 'alaaa Aali Ya'qooba kamaaa atammahaa 'alaaa abawaika min qablu Ibraaheema wa Ishaaq; inna Rabbaka 'Aleemun hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa ikhwatihī āyātul lis-sā'ilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqad kaana fee Yoosufa wa ikhwatiheee Aayaatul lissaaa'ileen

ayah.transliteration: Iż qālū layūsufu wa akhūhu aḥabbu ilā abīnā minnā wa naḥnu ‘uṣbah(tun), inna abānā lafī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Iz qaaloo la Yoosufu wa akhoohu ahabbu ilaaa Abeenaa minnaa wa nahnu 'usbah; inna abaanaa lafee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Uqtulū yūsufa awiṭraḥūhu arḍay yakhlu lakum wajhu abīkum wa takūnū mim ba‘dihī qauman  ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Uqtuloo Yoosufa awitra hoohu ardany yakhlu lakum wajhu abeekum wa takoonoo mim ba'dihee qawman saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla qā'ilum minhum lā taqtulū yūsufa wa alqūhu fī gayābatil-jubbi yaltaqiṭhu ba‘ḍus-sayyārati in kuntum fā‘ilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalaa qaaa'ilum minhum laa taqtuloo Yoosufa wa alqoohu fee ghayaabatil jubbi yaltaqithu badus sai yaarati in kuntum faa 'ileen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā abānā mā laka lā ta'mannā ‘alā yūsufa wa innā lahū lanāṣiḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaaa abaanaa maa laka laa taamannaa 'alaa Yoosufa wa innaa lahoo lanaa sihoon

ayah.transliteration: Arsilhu ma‘anā gaday yarta‘ wa yal‘ab wa innā lahū laḥāfiẓūn(a).
ayah.translation: Arilhu ma'anaa ghadany yarta'wa yal'ab wa innaa lahoo lahaafizoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innī layaḥzununī an tażhabū bihī wa akhāfu ay ya'kulahuż-żi'bu wa antum ‘anhu gāfilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala innee la yahzununeee an tazhaboo bihee wa akhaafu anyyaakulahuz zi'bu wa antum 'anhu ghaafiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū la'in akalahuż-żi'bu wa naḥnu ‘uṣbatun innā iżal lakhāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo la in akalahuzzi'bu wa nahnu 'usbatun innaaa izal lakhaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā żahabū bihī wa ajma‘ū ay yaj‘alūhu fī gayābatil-jubb(i), wa auḥainā ilaihi latunabbi'annahum bi'amrihim hāżā wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa zahaboo bihee wa ajma'ooo anyyaj'aloohu fee ghayaabatil jubb; wa awyainaaa ilaihi latunabbi 'annahum bi amrihim haaza wa hum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'ū abāhum ‘isyā'ay yabkūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'ooo abaahum 'ishaaa 'any yabkoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā abānā innā żahabnā nastabiqu wa taraknā yūsufa ‘inda matā‘inā fa akalahuż-żi'b(u), wa mā anta bimu'minil lanā wa lau kunnā ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaaa abaanaaa innaa zahabnaa nastabiqu wa taraknaa Yoosufa 'inda mataa'inaa fa akhalahuz zi'b, wa maaa anta bimu'minil lanaa wa law kunnaa saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'ū ‘alā qamīṣihī bidamin każib(in), qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amrā(n), fa ṣabrun jamīl(un), wallāhul musta‘ānu ‘alā mā taṣifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'oo 'alaa qamee shihee bidamin kazi' qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amraa; fasabrun jameel; wallaahul musta'aanu 'alaa man tasifoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'at sayyāratun fa arsalū wāridahum fa adlā dalwah(ū), qāla yā busyrā hāżā gulām(un), wa asarrūhu biḍā‘ah(tan), wallāhu ‘alīmum bimā ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'at saiyaaratun fa-arsaloo waaridahum fa adlaa dalwah; qaala yaa bushraa haaza ghulaam; wa asarroohu bi-daa'ah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa syarauhu biṡamanim bakhsin darāhima ma‘dūdah(tin), wa kānū fīhi minaz-zāhidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa sharawhu bisamanim bakhsin daraahima ma'doo datinw wa kaanoo feehi minaz zaahideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażisytarāhu mim miṣra limra'atihī akrimī maṡwāhu ‘asā ay yanfa‘anā au nattakhiżahū waladā(n), wa każālika makkannā liyūsufa fil-arḍ(i), wa linu‘allimahū min ta'wīlil-aḥādīṡ(i), wallāhu gālibun ‘alā amrihī wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazish taraahu mim Misra limra atiheee akrimee maswaahu 'asaaa any-yanfa'anaaa aw nattakhizahoo waladaa; wa kazaalika mak-kannaa li-Yoosufa fil ardi wa linu'allimahoo min taaweelil ahaadees; wallaahu ghaalibun 'alaaa amrihee wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā balaga asyuddahū ātaināhu ḥukmaw wa ‘ilmā(n), wa każālika najzil-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa balagha ashuddahooo aatainaahu bukmanw wa 'ilmaa; wa kazaa lika najzil muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa rāwadathul-latī huwa fī baitihā ‘an nafsihī wa gallaqatil-abwāba wa qālat haita lak(a), qāla ma‘āżallāhi innahū rabbī aḥsana maṡwāy(a), innahū lā yuflihuẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa raawadat hul latee huwa fee baitihaa 'an nafsihee wa ghallaqatil abwaaba wa qaalat haita lak; qaala ma'aazal laahi innahoo rabbeee ahsana maswaay; innahoo laa yuflihuz-zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad hammat bihī wa hamma bihā lau lā ar ra'ā burhāna rabbih(ī), każālika linaṣrifa ‘anhus-sū'a wal-faḥsyā'(a), innahū min ‘ibādinal-mukhlaṣīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad hammat bihee wa hamma bihaa law laaa ar ra-aa burhaana rabbih;; kazaalika linasrifa 'anhu sooo'a walfa hshaaa'; innahoo min 'ibaadi nal mukhlaseen

ayah.transliteration: Wastabaqal-bāba wa qaddat qamīṣahū min duburiw wa alfayā sayyidahā ladal-bāb(i), qālat mā jazā'u man arāda bi'ahlika sū'an illā ay yusjana au ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wastabaqal baaba wa qaddat qameesahoo min dubu rinw wa alfayaa saiyidahaa ladal baab; qaalat maa jazaaa'u man araada bi ahlika sooo'an illaaa any-yusjana aw azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hiya rāwadatnī ‘an nafsī wa syahida syāhidum min ahlihā, in kāna qamīṣuhū qudda min qubulin fa ṣadaqat wa huwa minal-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala hiya raawadatnee 'an nafsee wa shahida shaahidum min ahlihaa in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min qubulin fasadaqat wa huwa minal kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa in kāna qamīṣuhū qudda min duburin fa każabat wa huwa minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in kaana qameesuhoo qudda min duburin fakazabat wa huwa minas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā ra'ā qamīṣahū qudda min duburin qāla innahū min kaidikunn(a), inna kaidakunna ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Falammaa ra-aa qamee sahoo qudda min duburin qaala innahoo min kaidikunna inna kaidakunna 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Yūsufu a‘riḍ ‘an hāżā wastagfirī liżambik(i), innaki kunti  minal-khāṭi'īn(a).
ayah.translation: Yoosofu a'rid 'an haaza wastaghfiree lizambiki innaki kunti minal khaati'een

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla niswatun fil-madīnatimra'atul-‘azīzi turāwidu fatāhā ‘an nafsih(ī), qad syagafahā ḥubbā(n), innā lanarāhā fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala niswatun filma deenatim ra atul'Azeezi turaawidu fataahaa 'an nafsihee qad shaghafahaa bubbaa; innaa lana raahaa fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā sami‘at bimakrihinna arsalat ilaihinna wa a‘tadat lahunna muttaka'aw wa ātat kulla wāḥidim minhunna sikkīnaw wa qālatikhruj ‘alaihinn(a), falammā ra'ainahū akbarnahū wa qaṭṭa‘na aidiyahunn(a), wa qulna ḥāsya lillāhi mā hāżā illā basyarā(n), in hāżā illā malakun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Falammaa sami'at bimak rihinna arsalat ilaihinna wa a'tadat lahunna muttaka anw wa aatat kulla waahidatim min hunna sikkeenanw wa qaala tikh ruj 'alaihinna falammaa ra aynahooo akbarnahoo wa qatta'na aydiyahunna wa qulna haasha lillaahi maa haaza basharaa; in haazaaa illaa malakun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Qālat fa żālikunnal-lażī lumtunnanī fīh(i), wa laqad rāwattuhū ‘an nafsihī fasta‘ṣam(a), wa la'il lam yaf‘al mā āmuruhū layusjananna wa layakūnam minaṣ-ṣāgirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalat fazaalikunnal lazee lumtunnanee feeh; wa laqad raawattuhoo 'an nafsihee fasta'sam; wa la'il lam yaf'al maaa aamuruhoo la yusjananna wa la yakoonam minas saaghireen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbis-sijnu aḥabbu ilayya mimmā yad‘ūnanī ilaih(i), wa illā taṣrif ‘annī kaidahunna aṣbu ilaihinna wa akum minal-jāhilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala rabbis sijnu ahabbu ilaiya mimma yad'oo naneee 'ilaihi wa illaa tasrif 'annee kaidahunna asbu ilaihinna wa akum minal jaahileen

ayah.transliteration: Fastajāba lahū rabbuhū fa ṣarafa ‘anhu kaidahunn(a), innahū huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Fastajaaba lahoo rabbuhoo fasarafa 'anhu kaidahunn; innahoo Huswas_Samee'ul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma badā lahum mim ba‘di mā ra'awul-āyāti layasjununnahū ḥattā ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: Summa badaa lahum mim ba'di maa ra-awul Aayaati layasjununnahoo hatta heen

ayah.transliteration: Wa dakhala ma‘ahus-sijna fatayān(i), qāla aḥaduhumā innī arānī a‘ṣiru khamrā(n), wa qālal-ākharu innī arānī aḥmilu fauqa ra'sī khubzan ta'kuluṭ-ṭairu minh(u), nabbi'nā bita'wīlih(ī), innā narāka minal-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa dakhala ma'ahussijna fata yaan; qaala ahaduhumaaa inneee araaneee a'siru khamranw wa qaalal aakharu inneee khubzan taakulut tairu minh; nabbi 'naa bitaaweelihee innaa naraaka minal muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lā ya'tīkumā ṭa‘āmun turzaqānihī illā nabba'tukumā bita'wīlihī qabla ay ya'tiyakumā, żālikumā mimmā ‘allamanī rabbī, innī taraktu millata qaumil lā yu'minūna billāhi wa hum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala laa yaateekumaa ta'aamun turzaqaaniheee illaa nabbaatukumaa bitaaweelihee qabla any yaatiyakumaa; zaali kumaa mimmaa 'allamanee rabbee; innee taraktu millata qawmil laa yu'minoona billaahi wahum bil aakhirati hum kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wattaba‘tu millata ābā'ī ibrāhīma wa isḥāqa wa ya‘qūb(a), mā kāna lanā an nusyrika  billāhi min syai'(in), żālika min faḍlillāhi ‘alainā wa ‘alan-nāsi wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā yasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wattab'tu millata aabaaa'eee Ibraaheema wa Ishaaqa wa Ya'qoob; maa kaana lanaaa an nushrika billaahi min shai' zaalikamin fadlil laahi 'alainaa wa 'alan naasi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ṣāḥibayis-sijni a'arbābum mutafarriqūna khairun amillāhul-wāḥidul-qahhār(u).
ayah.translation: Yaa saahibayis sijni 'a-arbaabum mutafarriqoona khayrun amil laahul waahidul qahhaar

ayah.transliteration: Mā ta‘budūna min dūnihī illā asmā'an sammaitumūhā antum wa ābā'ukum mā anzalallāhu bihā min sulṭān(in), inil-ḥukmu illā lillāh(i), amara allā ta‘budū illā iyyāh(u), żālikad-dīnul-qayyimu wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa ta'budoona min doonihee illaaa asmaaa'an sam maitumoohaaa antum wa aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultan; inilhukmu illaa lillaah; amara allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ṣāḥibayis-sijni ammā aḥadukumā fa yasqī rabbahū khamrā(n), wa ammal-ākharu fa yuṣlabu fa ta'kuluṭ-ṭairu mir ra'sih(ī), quḍiyal-amrul-lażī fīhi tastaftiyān(i).
