ayah.translation: Yaa saahibayis sijni ammaaa ahadukumaa fa yasqee rabbahoo khamranw wa ammal aakharu fa yuslabu fataakulut tairu mir raasih; qudiyal amrul lazee feehi tastaftiyaan

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla lil-lażī ẓanna annahū nājim minhumażkurnī ‘inda rabbik(a), fa ansāhusy-syaiṭānu żikra rabbihī fa labiṡa fis-sijni biḍ‘a sinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala lillazee zanna annahoo najim minhumaz kurnee 'inda rabbika fa-ansaahush Shaitaanu zikra Rabbihee falabisa fis sijni bad'a sineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-maliku innī arā sab‘a baqarātin simāniy ya'kuluhunna sab‘un ‘ijāfuw wa sab‘a sumbulātin khuḍriw wa ukhara yābisāt(in), yā ayyuhal-mala'u aftūnī fī ru'yāya in kuntum lir-ru'yā ta‘burūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal maliku inneee araa sab'a baqaraatin simaaniny yaakuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw wa sab'a sumbulaatinkhudrinw wa ukhara yaabisaat; yaaa ayuhal mala-u aftoonee fee nu'yaaya in kuntum lirru'yaa ta'buroon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū aḍgāṡu aḥlām(in), wa mā naḥnu bita'wīlil-aḥlāmi bi‘ālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo adghaasu ahlaa minw wa maa nahnu bitaaweelil ahlaami bi'aalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażī najā minhumā waddakara  ba‘da ummatin ana unabbi'ukum bita'wīlihī fa arsilūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazee najaa minhumaa waddakara ba'da ummatin ana unabbi'ukum bitalweelihee fa-arsiloon

ayah.transliteration: Yūsufu ayyuhaṣ-ṣiddīqu aftinā fī sab‘i baqarātin simāniy ya'kuluhunna sab‘un ‘ijāfuw wa sab‘i sumbulātin khuḍriw wa ukhara yābisāt(in), la‘allī arji‘u ilan-nāsi la‘allahum ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yoosufu ayyuhas siddee qu aftinaa fee sab'i baqaraatin simaaniny yaakuluhunna sab'un 'ijaafunw wa sabi'i sumbulaatin khudrinw wa ukhara yaabisaatil la'alleee arj'u ilan naasi la'allahum ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla tazra‘ūna sab‘a sinīna da'abā(n), famā ḥaṣattum fa żarūhu fī sumbulihī illā qalīlam mimmā ta'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala tazra'oona sab'a sineena da aban famaa basattum fazaroohu fee sumbu liheee illaa qaleelam mimmaa taakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ya'tī mim ba‘di żālika sab‘un syidāduy ya'kulna mā qaddamtum lahunna illā qalīlam mimmā tuḥṣinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa yaatee mim ba'di zaalika sab'un shidaaduny yaa kulna maa qaddamtum lahunna illaa qaleelam mimma tuhsinoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ya'tī mim ba‘di żālika ‘āmun fīhi yugāṡun-nāsu wa fīhi ya‘ṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa yadtee mim ba'di zaalika 'aamun feehi yughaa sun naasu wa feehi ya'siroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-maliku'tūnī bih(ī), falammā jā'ahur-rasūlu qālarji‘ ilā rabbika fas'alhu mā bālun-niswatil-lātī qaṭṭa‘na aidiyahunn(a), inna rabbī bikaidihinna ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal maliku'toonee bihee falammaa jaaa'ahur rasoolu qaalar-ji ilaa rabbika fas'alhu maa baalun niswatil laatee qatta'na aydiyahunn; inna Rabbee bikaidihinna 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla mā khaṭbukunna iż rāwattunna yūsufa ‘an nafsih(ī), qulna ḥāsya lillāhi mā ‘alimnā ‘alaihi min sū'(in), qālatimra'atul-‘azīzil-āna ḥaṣḥaṣal-ḥaqq(u), ana rāwattuhū ‘an nafsihī wa innahū laminaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala maa khatbukunna iz raawattunna Yoosufa 'annafsih; qulna haasha lillaahi maa 'alimnaa 'alaihi min sooo'; qaalatim ra atul 'Azeezil 'aana hashasal haqq, ana raawat tuhoo 'an nafsihee wa innahoo laminas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Żālika liya‘lama annī lam akhunhu bil-gaibi wa annallāha lā yahdī kaidal-khā'inīn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalika liya'lama annee lam akhunhu bilghaibi wa annal laaha laa yahdee kaidal khaaa'ineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ubarri'u nafsī, innan-nafsa la'ammāratum bis-sū'i illā mā raḥima rabbī, inna rabbī gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maa ubarri'u nafsee; innan nafsa la ammaaratum bissooo'i illaa maa rahima Rabbee; inna Rabbee Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-maliku'tūnī bihī astakhliṣhu linafsī, falammā kallamahū qāla innakal-yauma ladainā makīnun amīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal maliku' toonee biheee astakhlishu linafsee falammaa kallamahoo qaala innakal yawma ladainaa makeenun ameen

ayah.transliteration: Qālaj‘alnī ‘alā khazā'inil-arḍ(i), innī ḥafīẓun ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaalaj 'alnee 'alaa khazaaa'inil ardi innee hafeezun 'aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika makkannā liyūsufa  fil-arḍi yatabawwa'u minhā ḥaiṡu yasyā'(u), nuṣību biraḥmatinā man nasyā'u wa lā nuḍī‘u ajral-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika makkannaa li Yoosufa fil ardi yatabawwa'u minhaa haisu yashaaaa'; nuseebu birahmatinaa man nashaaa'u wa laa nudee'u ajral muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'ajrul-ākhirati khairul lil-lażīna āmanū wa kānū yattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la ajrul Aakhirati khairul lillazeena aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'a ikhwatu yūsufa fa dakhalū ‘alaihi fa ‘arafahum wa hum lahū munkirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'a ikhwatu Yoosufa fadakhaloo 'alaihi fa'arafahum wa hum lahoo munkiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim qāla'tūnī bi'akhil lakum min abīkum, alā tarauna annī ūfil-kaila wa ana khairul-munzilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim qaala' toonee bi akhil lakum min abeekum; alaa tarawna anneee oofil kaila wa ana khairul munzileen

ayah.transliteration: Fa illam ta'tūnī bihī falā kaila lakum ‘indī wa lā taqrabūn(i).
ayah.translation: Fa il lam taatoonee bihee falaa kaila lakum 'indee wa laa taqraboon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū sanurāwidu ‘anhu abāhu wa innā lafā‘ilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo sanuraawidu 'anhu abaahu wa innaa lafaa'iloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla lifityānihij‘alū biḍā‘atahum fī riḥālihim la‘allahum ya‘rifūnahā iżanqalabū ilā ahlihim la‘allahum yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala lifityaanihij 'aloo bidaa'atahum fee rihaalihim la'allahum ya'rifoonahaaa izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihim la'allahum yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā raja‘ū ilā abīhim qālū yā abānā muni‘a minnal-kailu fa arsil ma‘anā akhānā naktal wa innā lahū laḥāfiẓūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa raja'ooo ilaaa abeehim qaaloo yaaa abaanaa muni'a minnal kailu fa arsil ma'anaaa akhaanaa naktal wa innaa lahoo lahaafizoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hal āmanukum ‘alaihi illā kamā amintukum ‘alā akhīhi min qabl(u), fallāhu khairun ḥāfiẓaw wa huwa arḥamur-rāḥimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala hal aamanukum 'alihi illaa kamaa amintukum 'alaaa akheehimin qabl; fal laahu khairun haafizanw wa Huwa arhamur Raahimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā fataḥū matā‘ahum wajadū biḍā‘atahum ruddat ilaihim, qālū yā abānā mā nabgī, hāżihī biḍā‘atunā ruddat ilainā wa namīru ahlanā wa naḥfaẓu akhānā wa nazdādu kaila ba‘īr(in), żālika kailuy yasīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa fatahoo mataa 'ahum wajadoo bidaa'atahum ruddat ilaihim qaaloo yaaa abaanaa maa nabghee; haazihee bida 'atunaa ruddat ilainaa wa nameeru ahlanaa wa nahfazu akhaanaa wa nazdaadu kaila ba'eer; zaalika kailuny yaseer

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lan ursilahū ma‘akum ḥattā tu'tūni mauṡiqam minallāhi lata'tunnanī bihī illā ayyuḥāṭa bikum, falammā ātauhu mauṡiqahum qālallāhu ‘alā mā naqūlu wakīl(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala lan ursilahoo ma'akum hattaa tu'tooni mawsiqam minal laahis lataa tunnanee biheee illaaa nay yuhaata bikum falammaaa aatawhu mawsiqahum qaalal laahu 'alaa maa naqoolu Wakeel

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla yā baniyya lā tadkhulū mim bābiw wāḥidiw wadkhulū min abwābim mutafarriqah(tin), wa mā ugnī ‘ankum minallāhi min syai'(in), inil-ḥukmu illā lillāh(i), ‘alaihi tawakkaltu wa ‘alaihi  falyatawakkalil-mutawakkilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala yaa baniyya laa tadkhuloo mim baabinw waa hidinw wadkhuloo min abwaabim mutafarriqah; wa maaa ughnee 'ankum minal laahi min shai'in; inil hukmu illaa lillaahi 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa 'alaihi fal yatawakkalil Mutawakkiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā dakhalū min ḥaiṡu amarahum abūhum, mā kāna yugnī ‘anhum minallāhi min syai'in illā ḥājatan fī nafsi ya‘qūba qaḍāhā, wa innahū lażū ‘ilmil limā ‘allamnāhu wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa dakhaloo min haisu amarahum aboohum maa kaana yughnee 'anhum minal laahi min shai'in illaa haajatan fee nafsi Ya'qooba qadaahaa; wa innahoo lazoo 'ilmil limaa 'allamnaahu wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā dakhalū ‘alā yūsufa  āwā ilaihi akhāhu qāla innī akhūka falā tabta'is bimā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi akhaahu qaala inneee ana akhooka falaa tabta'is bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim ja‘las-siqāyata fī raḥli akhīhi ṡumma ażżana mu'ażżinun ayyatuhal-‘īru innakum lasāriqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jahhazahum bijahaazihim ja'alas siqaayata fee rahli akheehi summa azzana mu'azzinun ayyatuhal'eeru innakum lasaariqoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū wa aqbalū ‘alaihim māżā tafqidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo wa aqbaloo 'alaihim maazaa tafqidoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū nafqidu ṣuwā‘al-maliki wa liman jā'a bihī ḥimlu ba‘īriw wa ana bihī za‘īm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo nafqidu suwaa'al maliki wa liman jaaa'a bihee himlu ba'eerinw wa ana bihee za'eem

ayah.transliteration: Qālū tallāhi laqad ‘alimtum  mā ji'tanā linufsida fil-arḍi wa mā kunnā sāriqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad 'alimtum maa ji'na linufsida fil ardi wa maa kunnaa saariqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū famā jazā'uhū in kuntum kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo famaa jazaaa'u hooo in kuntum kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū jazā'uhū maw wujida fī raḥlihī fa huwa jazā'uh(ū), każālika najziẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo jazaaa'uhoo manw wujida fee rahlihee fahuwa jazaaa'uh; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa bada'a bi'au‘iyatihim qabla wi‘ā'i akhīhi ṡummastakhrajahā miw wi‘ā'i akhīh(i), każālika kidnā liyūsuf(a), mā kāna liya'khuża akhāhu fī dīnil-maliki illā ay yasyā'allāh(u), narfa‘u darajātim man nasyā'(u), wa fauqa kulli żī ‘ilmin ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fabada-a bi-aw'iyatihim qabla wi'aaa'i akheehi summas takhrajahaa minw wi 'aaa'i akheeh; kazaalika kidnaa li Yoosuf; maa kaana liyaakhuza akhaahu fee deenil maliki illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; narfa'u darajaatim man nashaaa'; wa fawqa kulli zee 'ilmin 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qālū iy yasriq faqad saraqa akhul lahū min qabl(u), fa asarrahā yūsufu fī nafsihī wa lam yubdihā lahum, qāla antum syarrum makānā(n), wallāhu a‘lamu bimā taṣifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo iny yasriq faqad saraqa akhul lahoo min qabl; fa asarrahaa Yoosufu fee nafsihee wa lam yubdihaa lahum; qaala antum sharrum makaananw wallaahu a'lamu bimaa tasifoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā ayyuhal-‘azīzu inna lahū aban syaikhan kabīran fa khuż aḥadanā makānah(ū), innā narāka minal-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaaa ayyuhal 'Azeezu inna lahooo aban shaikhan kabeeran fakhuz ahadanaa makaanahoo innaa naraaka minal muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ma‘āżallāhi an na'khuża illā maw wajadnā matā‘anā ‘indah(ū), innā iżal laẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala ma'aazal laahi an naakhuza illaa manw wajadnaa mataa'anaa 'indahoo innaaa izal lazaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Falammastai'asū minhu khalaṣū najiyyā(n), qāla kabīruhum alam ta‘lamū anna abākum qad akhaża ‘alaikum mauṡiqam minallāhi wa min qablu mā farrattum fī yūsufa falan abraḥal-arḍa ḥattā ya'żana lī abī au yaḥkumallāhu lī, wa huwa khairul-ḥākimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammas tay'asoo minhu khalasoo najiyyan qaala kabeeruhum alam ta'lamoon anna abaakum qad akhaza 'alaikum mawsiqam minal laahi wa min qablu maa farrattum fee Yoosufa falan abrahal arda hattaa yaazana leee abeee aw yahkumal laahu lee wa huwa khairul lhaakimeen

ayah.transliteration: Irji‘ū ilā abīkum fa qūlū yā abānā innabnaka saraq(a), wa mā syahidnā illā bimā ‘alimnā wa mā kunnā lil-gaibi ḥāfiẓīn(a).
ayah.translation: Irji'ooo ilaaa abeekum faqooloo yaaa abaanaaa innab naka saraq; wa maa shahidnaaa illaa bimaa 'alimnaa wa maa kunnaa lilghaibi haafizeen

ayah.transliteration: Was'alil-qaryatal-latī kunnā fīhā wal-‘īral-latī aqbalnā fīhā, wa innā laṣādiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Was'alil qaryatal latee kunnaa feehaa wal'eeral lateee aqbalnaa feehaa wa innaa lasaadiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amrā(n), fa ṣabrun jamīl(un), ‘asallāhu ay ya'tiyanī bihim jamī‘ā(n), innahū huwal-‘alīmul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jameelun 'asal laahu any yaa tiyanee bihim jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa tawallā ‘anhum wa qāla yā asafā ‘alā yūsufa wabyaḍḍat ‘aināhu minal-ḥuzni fa huwa kaẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa tawallaa 'anhum wa qaala yaaa asafaa 'alaa Yoosufa wabyaddat 'aynaahu minal huzni fahuwa kazeem

ayah.transliteration: Qālū tallāhi tafta'u tażkuru yūsufa ḥattā takūna ḥaraḍan au takūna minal-hālikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo tallaahi tafta'u tazkuru Yoosufa hattaa takoona haradan aw takoona minal haalikeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innamā asykū baṡṡī wa ḥuznī ilallāhi wa a‘lamu minallāhi mā lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala innamaaa ashkoo bassee wa huzneee ilal laahi wa a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā baniyyażhabū fa taḥassasū miy yūsufa wa akhīhi wa lā tai'asū mir rauḥillāh(i), innahū lā yai'asu mir rauḥillāhi illal-qaumul-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaa baniyyaz haboo fatahassasoo miny Yoosufa wa akheehi wa laa tai'asoo mir rawhil laahi innahoo laa yai'asu mir rawhil laahi illal qawmul kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā dakhalū ‘alaihi qālū yā ayyuhal-‘azīzu massanā wa ahlanaḍ-ḍurru wa ji'nā bibiḍā‘atim muzjātin fa aufi lanal-kaila wa taṣaddaq ‘alainā, innallāha yajzil-mutaṣaddiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaihi qaaloo yaaa ayyuhal 'Azeezu massanaa wa ahlanad durru wa ji'naa bibidaa 'timmuzjaatin fa awfi lanal kaila wa tasaddaq 'alainaa innal laaha yajzil mutasaddiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hal ‘alimtum mā fa‘altum biyūsufa wa akhīhi iż antum jāhilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala hal 'alimtum maa fa'altum bi Yoosufa wa akheehi iz antum jaahiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū a'innaka la'anta yūsuf(u), qāla ana yūsufu wa hāżā akhī qad mannallāhu ‘alainā, innahū may yataqqi wa yaṣbir fa innallāha lā yuḍī‘u ajral-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo 'a innaka la anta Yoosufu qaala ana Yoosufu wa haazaaa akhee qad mannal laahu 'alainaa innahoo mai yattaqi wa yasbir fa innal laaha laa yudee'u ajral muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū tallāhi laqad āṡarakallāhu ‘alainā wa in kunnā lakhāṭi'īn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo tallaahi laqad aasarakal laahu 'alainaa wa in kunnaa lakhaati'een

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lā taṡrība ‘alaikumul-yaum(a), wa yagfirullāhu lakum, wa huwa arḥamur-rāḥimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala laa tasreeba 'alaikumul yawma yaghfirul laahu lakum wa Huwa arhamur raahimeen

ayah.transliteration: Iżhabū biqamīṣī hāżā fa alqūhu ‘alā wajhi abī ya'ti baṣīrā(n), wa'tūnī bi'ahlikum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Izhaboo biqameesee haazaa fa alqoohu 'alaa wajhi abee yaati baseeranw waatoonee bi ahlikum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā faṣalatil-‘īru qāla abūhum innī la'ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lau lā an tufannidūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa fasalatil 'eeru qaala aboohum innee la ajidu reeha Yoosufa law laaa an tufannidoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū tallāhi innaka lafī ḍalālikal-qadīm(i).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo tallaahi innaka lafee dalaalikal qadeem

ayah.transliteration: Falammā an jā'al-basyīru alqāhu ‘alā wajihihī fartadda baṣīrā(n), qāla alam aqul lakum, innī a‘lamu minallāhi mā lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa an jaaa'albasheeru alqaahu 'alaa wajhihee fartadda baseeran qaala alam aqul lakum inneee a'lamu minal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā abānastagfir lanā żunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭi'īn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaaa abaanas taghfir lanaa zunoo =banaaa innaa kunnaa khaati'een

ayah.transliteration: Qāla saufa astagfiru lakum rabbī, innahū huwal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala sawfa astaghfiru lakum Rabbeee innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Falammā dakhalū ‘alā yūsufa āwā ilaihi abawaihi wa qāladkhulū miṣra in syā'allāhu āminīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa dakhaloo 'alaa Yoosufa aawaaa ilaihi abayaihi wa qaalad khuloo Misra inshaaa'al laahu aamineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa rafa‘a abawaihi ‘alal-‘arsyi wa kharrū lahū sujjadā(n), wa qāla yā abati hāżā ta'wīlu ru'yāya min qabl(u), qad ja‘alahā rabbī ḥaqqā(n), wa qad aḥsana bī iż akhrajanī minas-sijni wa jā'a bikum minal-badwi mim ba‘di an nazagasy-syaiṭānu bainī wa baina ikhwatī, inna rabbī laṭīful limā yasyā'(u), innahū huwal-‘alīmul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa raf'a abawaihi 'alal 'arshi wa kharroo lahoo sujjadaa; wa qaala yaaa abati haaza taaweelu ru'yaaya min qablu qad ja'alahaa Rabbee haqqaa; wa qad ahsana beee iz akhrajanee minas sijni wa jaaa'a bikum minal badwi mim ba'di an nazaghash Shaitaanu bainee wa baina ikhwatee; inna Rabbee lateeful limaa yashaaa'; innahoo Huwal 'Aleemul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Rabbi qad ātaitanī minal-mulki wa ‘allamtanī min ta'wīlil-aḥādīṡ(i), fāṭiras-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), anta waliyyī fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirah(ti), tawaffanī muslimaw wa alḥiqnī biṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Rabbi qad aataitanee minal mulki wa 'allamtanee min taaweelil ahaadees; faati ras samaawaati wal ardi Anta waliyyee fid dunyaa wal Aakhirati tawaffanee muslimanw wa alhiqnee bissaaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Żālika min ambā'il-gaibi nūḥīhi ilaik(a), wa mā kunta ladaihim iż ajma‘ū amrahum wa hum yamkurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalika min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehi ilaika wa maa kunta ladaihim iz ajma'ooo amrahum wa hum yamkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā akṡarun-nāsi wa lau ḥaraṣta bimu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa aksarun naasi wa law harasta bimu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā tas'aluhum ‘alaihi min ajr(in), in huwa illā żikrul lil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa tas'aluhum 'alaihi min ajr; in huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ka'ayyim min āyatin fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi yamurrūna ‘alaihā wa hum ‘anhā mu‘rḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ka ayyim min Aayatin fis samaawaati wal ardi yamurroona 'alaihaa wa hum 'anhaa mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yu'minu akṡaruhum billāhi illā wa hum musyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yu'minu aksaru hum billaahi illaa wa hum mushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Afa aminū an ta'tiyahum gāsyiyatum min ‘ażābillāhi au ta'tiyahumus-sā‘atu bagtataw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afa aminooo an taatiya hum ghaashiyatum min 'azaabil laahi aw taatiyahumus Saa'atu baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul hāżihī sabīlī ad‘ū ilallāh(i), ‘alā baṣīratin ana wa manittaba‘anī, wa subḥānallāhi wa mā ana minal-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul haazihee sabeeleee ad'ooo ilal laah; 'alaa baseera tin ana wa manit taba'anee wa Subhaanal laahi wa maaa ana minal mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnā min qablika illā rijālan nūḥī ilaihim min ahlil-qurā, afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fa yanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-lażīna min qablihim, wa ladārul-ākhirati khairul lil-lażīnattaqau, afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim min ahlil quraa; afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; wa la Daarul Aakhirati Khairul lillazeenat taqaw; afalaa ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżastai'asar-rusulu wa ẓannū annahum qad kużibū jā'ahum naṣrunā, fa nujjiya man nasyā'(u), wa lā yuraddu ba'sunā ‘anil-qaumil-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izas tai'asar Rusulu wa zannooo annahum qad kuziboo jaaa'ahum nas runaa fanujjiya man nashaaa'u wa laa yuraddu baasunna 'anil qawmil mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Laqad kāna fī qaṣaṣihim ‘ibratul li'ulil-albāb(i), mā kāna ḥadīṡay yuftarā wa lākin taṣdīqal-lażī baina yadaihi wa tafṣīla kulli syai'iw wa hudaw wa raḥmatal liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqad kaana fee qasasihim 'ibratul li ulil albaa; maa kaana hadeesany yuftaraa wa laakin tasdeeqal lazee baina yadihi wa tafseela kulli shai'inw wa hudanw wa rahmatal liqawminy yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām mīm rā, tilka āyātul-kitāb(i), wal-lażī unzila ilaika mir rabbikal-ḥaqqu wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Meeem-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaab; wallazee unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī rafa‘as-samāwāti bigairi ‘amadin taraunahā ṡummastawā ‘alal-‘arsyi wa sakhkharasy-syamsa  wal-qamar(a), kulluy yajrī li'ajalim musammā(n), yudabbirul-amra yufaṣṣilul-āyāti la‘allakum biliqā'i rabbikum tūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee raf'as samaawaati bighairi 'amadin tarawnahaa summas tawaa 'alal 'Arshi wa sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li ajalim musammaa; yudabbirul amra yufassilil Aayaati la'allakum biliqaaa'i Rabbikum tooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī maddal-arḍa wa ja‘ala fīhā rawāsiya wa anhārā(n), wa min kulliṡ-ṡamarāti ja‘ala fīhā zaujainiṡnaini yugsyil-lailan-nahār(a), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee maddal arda wa ja'ala feehaa rawaasiya wa anhaaraa; wa min kullis samaraati ja'ala feehaa zawjainis yaini Yughshil lailan nahaar; inna fee zaalika la aayaatil liqawminy yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa fil-arḍi qiṭa‘um mutajāwirātuw wa jannātum min a‘nābiw wa zar‘uw wa nakhīlun ṣinwānuw wa gairu ṣinwāniy yusqā bimā'iw wāḥid(in), wa nufaḍḍilu ba‘ḍahā ‘alā ba‘ḍin fil-ukul(i), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa fil ardi qita'um muta jaawiraatunw wa jannaatum min a'naabinw wa zar'unw wa nakheelun sinwaanunw wa ghairu sinwaaniny yusqaa bimaaa'inw waahid; wa nufaddilu ba'dahaa 'alaa ba'din fil-ukul; inna fee zaalika la aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in ta‘jab fa ‘ajabun qauluhum a'iżā kunnā turāban a'innā lafī khalqin jadīd(in), ulā'ikal-lażīna kafarū birabbihim, wa ulā'ikal-aglālu fī a‘nāqihim, wa ulā'ika aṣḥābun-nār(i), hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in ta'jab fa'ajabun qawluhm 'a-izaa kunna turaaban 'a-inna lafee khalqin jadeed; ulaaa 'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi Rabbihim wa ulaaa'ikal aghlaalu feee a'naaqihim wa ulaa'ika Ashaabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yasta‘jilūnaka bis-sayyi'ati qablal-ḥasanati wa qad khalat min qablihimul-maṡulāt(u), wa inna rabbaka lażū magfiratil lin-nāsi ‘alā ẓulmihim, wa inna rabbaka lasyadīdul-‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wa yasta'jiloonaka bis saiyi'ati qablal hasanati wa qad khalat min qablihimul masulaat; wa inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratil linnaasi 'alaa zulmihim wa inna Rabbaka lashadeedul 'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlul-lażīna kafarū lau lā unzila ‘alaihi āyatum mir rabbih(ī), innamā anta munżiruw wa likulli qaumin hād(in).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; innamaaa anta munzirunw wa likulli qawmin haad

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu ya‘lamu mā taḥmilu kullu unṡā wa mā tagīḍul-arḥāmu wa mā tazdād(u), wa kullu syai'in ‘indahū bimiqdār(in).
ayah.translation: Allaahu ya'lamu maa tahmilu kullu unsaa wa maa tagheedul arhaamu wa maa tazdaad, wa kullu shai'in 'indahoo bimiqdaar

ayah.transliteration: ‘Alimul-gaibi wasy-syahādatil-kabīrul-muta‘āl(i).
ayah.translation: 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash shahaadatil Kaabeerul Muta'aal

ayah.transliteration: Sawā'um minkum man asarral-qaula wa man jahara bihī wa man huwa mustakhfim bil-laili wa sāribum bin-nahār(i).
ayah.translation: Sawaaa'um minkum man asarral qawla wa man jahara bihee wa man huwa mustakhfim billaili wa saaribum binnahaar

ayah.transliteration: Lahū mu‘aqqibātum mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihī yaḥfaẓūnahū min amrillāh(i), innallāha lā yugayyiru mā biqaumin ḥattā yugayyirū mā bi'anfusihim, wa iżā arādallāhu biqaumin sū'an falā maradda lah(ū), wa mā lahum min dūnihī miw wāl(in).
ayah.translation: Lahoo mu'aqqibaatum mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihee yahfazoonahoo min amril laah; innal laaha laa yughaiyiru maa biqawmin hattaa yughaiyiroo maa bianfusihim; wa izaaa araadal laahu biqawmin sooo'an falaa maradda lah; wa maa lahum min dooniheeminw waal

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī  yurīkumul -barqa khaufaw  wa  ṭama‘aw  wa  yunsyi'us -saḥābaṡ-ṡiqāl(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee yureekumul barqa khawfanw wa tama'anw wa yunshi'us sahaabas siqaal

ayah.transliteration: Wa yusabbiḥur-ra‘du biḥamdihī wal-malā'ikatu min khīfatih(ī), wa yursiluṣ-ṣawā‘iqa fa yuṣību bihā may yasyā'u wa hum yujālidilūna fillāh(i), wa huwa syadīdul-miḥāl(i).
ayah.translation: Wa yusabbihur ra'du bihamdihee walmalaaa'ikatu min kheefatihee wa yursilus sawaa'iqa fa yuseebu bihaa mai yashaaa'u wa hum yujaadiloona fil laahi wa Huwa shadeedul mihaal

ayah.transliteration: Lahū da‘watul-ḥaqq(i), wal-lażīna yad‘ūna min dūnihī lā yastajībūna lahum bisyai'in illā kabāsiṭi kaffaihi ilal-mā'i liyabluga fāhu wa mā huwa bibāligih(ī), wa mā du‘ā'ul-kāfirīna illā fī ḍalāl(in).
ayah.translation: Lahoo da'watul haqq; wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yastajeeboona lahum bishai'in illaa kabaasiti kaffaihi ilal maaa'i liyablugha faahu wa maa huwa bibaalighih; wa maa du'aaa'ul aafireena illaa fee dalaal

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi yasjudu man fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi ṭau‘aw wa karhaw wa ẓilāluhum bil-guduwwi wal-āṣāl(i).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahi yasjudu man fis samaawaati wal ardi taw 'anw wa karhanw wa zilaaluhum bilghuduwwi wal aasaal

ayah.transliteration: Qul mar rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), qulillāh(u), qul afattakhażtum  min dūnihī auliyā'a lā yamlikūna li'anfusihim naf‘aw wa lā ḍarrā(n), qul hal yastawil-a‘mā wal-baṣīr(u),  am hal tastawiẓ-ẓulumātu wan-nūr(u), am ja‘alū lillāhi syurakā'a khalaqū kakhalqihī fa tasyābahal-khalqu  ‘alaihim, qulillāhu khāliqu kulli syai'iw wa huwal-wāḥidul-qahhār(u).
ayah.translation: Wul mar Rabbus samaawaati wal ard; qulillaah; qul afattakhaztum min dooniheee awliyaaa'a laa yamlikoona li anfusihim naf'anw wa laa darraa; qul hal yastawil a'maa wal baseeru am hal tastawiz zulumaatu wannoor; am ja'aloo lillaahi shurakaaa'a khalaqoo kakhalqihee fatashaa bahal khalqu 'alaihim; qulil laahu Khaaliqu kulli shai'inw wa Huwal Waahidul Qahhar

ayah.transliteration: Anzala minas-samā'i mā'an fa sālat audiyatum biqadarihā faḥtamalas-sailu zabadar rābiyā(n), wa mimmā yūqidūna ‘alaihi fin-nāribtigā'a ḥilyatin au matā‘in zabadum miṡluh(ū), każālika yaḍribullāhul-ḥaqqa wal-bāṭil(a), fa ammaz-zabadu fa yażhabu jufā'ā(n), wa ammā mā yanfa‘un-nāsa fa yamkuṡu fil-arḍ(i), każālika yaḍribullāhul-amṡāl(a).
ayah.translation: Anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasaalat awdiyatum biqadarihaa fahtamalas sailu zabadar raabiyaa; wa mimmmaa yooqidoona 'alaihi fin naarib tighaaa'a bilyatin aw mataa'in zabadum misluh; kazaalika yadribul laahul haqqa wal baatil; fa ammaz zabadu fa yazhabu jufaaa'aa; wa ammaa maa yanfa'un naasa fa yamkusu fil ard; kazaalika yadribul laahul amsaal

ayah.transliteration: Lil-lażīnastajābū lirabbihimul-ḥusnā, wal-lażīna lam yastajībū lahū lau anna lahum mā fil-arḍi jamī‘aw wa miṡlahū ma‘ahū laftadau bih(ī), ulā'ika lahum sū'ul-ḥisāb(i), wa ma'wāhum jahannam(u), wa bi'sal-mihād(u).
ayah.translation: Lillazeenas tajaaboo lirabbihimul husnaa; wallazeena lam yastajeeboo lahoo law anna lahum maa fil ardi jamee'anw wa mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bih; ulaaa'ika lahum sooo'ul hisaab; wa maawaahum Jahannamu wa bi'sal mihaad

ayah.transliteration: Afamay ya‘lamu annamā unzila ilaika mir rabbikal-ḥaqqu kaman huwa a‘mā, innamā yatażakkaru ulul-albāb(i).
ayah.translation: Afamai ya'lamu annamaaa unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu kaman huwa a'maa; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab

ayah.transliteration: Al-lażīna yūfūna bi‘ahdillāhi wa lā yanquḍūnal-mīṡāq(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yoofoona bi'ahdil laahi wa laa yanqu doonal meesaaq

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yaṣilūna mā amarallāhu bihī ay yūṣala wa yakhsyauna rabbahum wa yakhāfūna sū'al-ḥisāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yasiloona maaa amaral laahu bihee an yoosala wa yakhshawna Rabbahum wa yakhaafoona sooo'al hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna ṣabarubtigā'a wajhi rabbihim wa aqāmuṣ-ṣalāta wa anfaqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirraw wa ‘alāniyataw wa yadra'ūna bil-ḥasanatis-sayyi'ata  ulā'ika lahum ‘uqbad-dār(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena sabarub tighaaa'a Wajhi Rabbihim wa aqaamus Salaata wa anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw wa 'alaaniyatanw wa yadra'oona bilhasanatis saiyi'ata ulaaa'ika lahum 'uqbad daar

ayah.transliteration: Jannātu ‘adniy yadkhulūnahā wa man ṣalaḥa min ābā'ihim wa azwājihim  wa żurriyyātihim wal-malā'ikatu yadkhulūna ‘alaihim min kulli bāb(in).
ayah.translation: jannaatu 'adiny yadkhu loonahaa wa man salaha min aabaaa'ihim wa man salaha min aabaaa'ihim wa azwaajihim wa zurriyyaatihim walmalaaa'i katu yadkhuloona 'alaihim min kulli baab

ayah.transliteration: Salāmun ‘alaikum bimā ṣabartum fa ni‘ma ‘uqbad-dār(i).
ayah.translation: Salaamun 'alaikum bimaa sabartum; fani'ma 'uqbad daar

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yanquḍūna ‘ahdallāhi mim ba‘di mīṡāqihī wa yaqṭa‘ūna mā amarallāhu bihī ay yūṣala wa yufsidūna fil-arḍ(i), ulā'ika lahumul-la‘natu wa lahum sū'ud-dār(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yanqudoona 'Ahdal laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee wa yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu biheee ai yoosala wa yufsidoona fil ardi ulaaa'ika lahumul la'natu wa lahum sooo'ud daar

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u wa yaqdir(u), wa fariḥū bil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa mal-ḥayātud-dun-yā fil-ākhirati illā matā‘(un).
ayah.translation: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; wa farihoo bilhayaatid dunyaa wa mal hayaatud dunya fil Aakhirati illaa mataa'

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlul-lażīna kafarū lau lā unzila ‘alaihi āyatum mir rabbih(ī), qul innallāha yuḍillu may yasyā'u wa yahdī ilaihi man anāb(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; qul innal laaha yudillu mai yashaa'u wa yahdeee ilaihi man anaab

ayah.transliteration: Al-lażīna āmanū wa taṭma'innu qulūbuhum biżikrillāh(i), alā biżikrillāhi taṭma'innul-qulūb(u).
ayah.translation: Allazeena aamanoo wa tatma'innu quloobuhum bizikril laah; alaa bizikril laahi tatma'innul quloob

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti ṭūbā lahum wa ḥusnu ma'āb(in).
ayah.translation: Allazeena aamanoo w a'amilus saalihaati toobaa lahum wa husnu ma aab

ayah.transliteration: Każālika arsalnāka fī ummatin qad khalat min qablihā umamul litatluwa ‘alaihimul-lażī auḥainā ilaika wa hum yakfurūna bir-raḥmān(i), qul huwa rabbī lā ilāha illā huw(a), ‘alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi matāb(i).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika arsalnaaka feee ummatin qad khalat min qablihaaa umamul litatluwa 'alaihimul lazeee awhainaaa ilaika wa hum yakfuroona bir Rahmaaan; qul Huwa Rabbee laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbee laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi mataab

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau anna qur'ānan suyyirat bihil-jibālu au quṭṭi‘at bihil-arḍu au kullima bihil-mautā, bal lillāhil-amru jamī‘ā(n), afalam yai'asil-lażīna  āmanū allau yasyā'ullāhu lahadan-nāsa jamī‘ā(n), wa lā yazālul-lażīna kafarū tuṣībuhum bimā ṣana‘ū qāri‘atun au taḥullu qarībam min dārihim ḥattā ya'tiya wa‘dullāh(i), innallāha lā yukhliful-mī‘ād(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law anna Quraanan suyyirat bihil jibaalu aw qutti'at bihil ardu aw kullima bihil mawtaa; bal lillaahil amru jamee'aa; afalam yai'asil lazeena aamanooo al law yashaaa 'ullaahu lahadan naasa jamee'aa; wa laa yazaalul lazeena kafaroo tuseebuhum bimaa sana'oo qaari'atun aw tahullu qareebam min daarihim hatta yaatiya wa'dul laah; innal laaha laa yukhliful mee'aad

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqadistuhzi'a birusulim min qablika fa amlaitu lil-lażīna kafarū ṡumma akhażtuhum fa kaifa kāna ‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wa laqadis tuhzi'a bi Rusulim min qablika fa amlaitu lillazeena kafaroo summa akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana 'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Afaman huwa qā'imun ‘alā kulli nafsim bimā kasabat, wa ja‘alū lillāhi syurakā'(a), qul sammūhum, am tunabbi'ūnahū bimā lā ya‘lamu fil-arḍi am biẓāhirim minal-qaul(i), bal zuyyina lil-lażīna kafarū makruhum wa ṣuddū ‘anis-sabīl(i), wa may yuḍlilillāhu famā lahū min hād(in).
ayah.translation: Afaman Huwa qaaa'imun 'alaa kulli nafsim bimaa kasabat; wa ja'aloo illlaahi shurakaaa'a qul samoohum; am tunabbi'oona hoo bimaa laa ya'lamu fil ardi; am bizaahirim minal qawl; bal zuyyina lillazeena kafaroo makruhum wa suddoo 'anis sabeel; wa mai yudlilil laaahu famaa lahoo min haad;

ayah.transliteration: Lahum ‘ażābun fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa la‘ażābul-ākhirati asyaqq(u), wa mā lahum minallāhi miw wāq(in).
ayah.translation: Lahum 'azaabun fil hayaatid dunyaa wa la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaaq, wa maa lahum minal laahi min-waaq

ayah.transliteration: Maṡalul-jannatil-latī wu‘idal-muttaqūn(a), tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), ukuluhā dā'imuw wa ẓilluhā, tilka ‘uqbal-lażīnattaqau, wa ‘uqbal-kāfirīnan-nār(u).
ayah.translation: Masalul Jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona tajree min tahtihal anhaaru ukuluhaa daaa'imunw wa zilluhaa; tilka uqbal lazeenat taqaw wa 'uqbal kafireenan Naar

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna ātaināhumul-kitāba yafraḥūna bimā unzila ilaika wa minal-aḥzābi may yunkiru ba‘ḍah(ū), qul innamā umirtu an a‘budallāha wa lā usyrika bih(ī), ilaihi ad‘ū wa ilaihi ma'āb(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aatainaa humul Kitaaba yafrahoona bimaa unzila ilaika wa minal Ahzaabi mai yunkiru ba'dah; qul innamaa umirtu an a'budal laaha wa laaa ushrika bih; ilaihi ad'oo wa ilaihi maab

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika anzalnāhu ḥukman ‘arabiyyā(n), wa la'inittaba‘ta ahwā'ahum ba‘da mā jā'aka minal-‘ilm(i), mā laka minallāhi miw waliyyiw wa lā wāq(in).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika anzalnaahu hukman 'Arabiyyaa; wa la'init taba'ta ahwaaa 'ahum ba'da maa jaaa'aka minal 'ilmi maa laka minal laahi minw waliyinw wa laa waaq

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā rusulam min qablika wa ja‘alnā lahum azwājaw wa żurriyyah(tan), wa mā kāna lirasūlin ay ya'tiya bi'āyatin illā bi'iżnillāh(i), likulli ajalin kitāb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika wa ja'alnaa lahum azwaajanw wa zurriyyah; wa maa kaana lirasoolin ai yaatiya bi aayatin illaa bi iznil laah; likulli ajalin kitaab

ayah.transliteration: Yamḥullāhu mā yasyā'u wa yuṡbit(u), wa ‘indahū ummul-kitāb(i).
ayah.translation: Yamhul laahu maa yashaaa'u wa yusbitu wa 'indahooo ummul Kitaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa immā nuriyannaka ba‘ḍal-lażī na‘iduhum au natawaffayannaka fa innamā ‘alaikal-balāgu wa ‘alainal-ḥisāb(u).
ayah.translation: Wa im maa nurriyannaka ba'dal lazee na'iduhum aw nata waffayannaka fa innamaa 'alaikal balaaghu wa 'alainal hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Awa lam yarau annā na'til-arḍa nanquṣuhā min aṭrāfihā, wallāhu yaḥkumu lā mu‘aqqiba liḥukmih(ī), wa huwa sarī‘ul-ḥisāb(i).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaraw annaa naatil arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; wallaahu yahkumu laa mu'aqqiba lihukmih; wa Huwa saree'ul hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa qad makaral-lażīna min qablihim fa lillāhil-makru jamī‘ā(n), ya‘lamu mā taksibu kullu nafs(in), wa saya‘lamul-kuffāru liman ‘uqbad-dār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qad makaral lazeena min qablihim falillaahil makru jamee'aa; ya'lamu maa taksibu kullu nafs; wa sa ya'lamul kuffaaru liman 'uqbad daar

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlul-lażīna kafarū lasta mursalā(n), qul kafā billāhi syahīdam bainī wa bainakum, wa man ‘indahū ‘ilmul-kitāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo lasta mursalaa; qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee wa bainakum wa man 'indahoo 'ilmul Kitaab

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām rā, kitābun anzalnāhu ilaika litukhrijan-nāsa minaẓ-ẓulumāti ilan-nūr(i), bi'iżni rabbihim ilā ṣirāṭil-‘azīzil-ḥamīd(i).
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika litukhrijan-naasa minaz zulumaati ilan noori bi-izni Rabbihim ilaa siraatil 'Azeezil Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Allāhil-lażī lahū mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), wa wailul lil-kāfirīna min ‘ażābin syadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Allaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fill ard; wa wailul lilkaafireena min 'azaabin shadeed

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yastaḥibbūnal-ḥayātad-dun-yā ‘alal-ākhirati wa yaṣuddūna ‘an sabīlillāhi wa yabgūnahā ‘iwajā(n), ulā'ika fī ḍalālim ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yastahibboo nal hayaatad dunyaa 'alal aakhirati wa yasuddoona 'ansabeelil laahi wa yabghoonahaa 'iwajaa; ulaaa 'ika fee dalaalim ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnā mir rasūlin illā bilisāni qaumihī liyubayyina lahum, fa yuḍillullāhu may yasyā'u wa yahdī may yasyā'(u), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaa mir Rasoolin illaa bilisaani qawmihee liyubaiyina lahum faiudillul laahu mai yashaaa'u wa yahde mai yashaaa'; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā mūsā bi'āyātinā an akhrij qaumaka minaẓ-ẓulumāti ilan-nūr(i), wa żakkirhum bi'ayyāmillāh(i), inna fī żālika la'āyātil likulli ṣabbārin syakūr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa an akhrij qawmaka minaz zulumaati ilan noori wa zak kirhum bi ayyaamil laah; inna fee zaalika la aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qāla mūsā liqaumihiżkurū ni‘matallāhi ‘alaikum iż anjākum min āli fir‘auna yasūmūnakum sū'al-‘ażābi wa yużabbiḥūna abnā'akum wa yastaḥyūna nisā'akum, wa fī żālikum balā'um mir rabbikum ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihiz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz anjaakum min Aali Fir'awna yasoomoo nakum sooo'al 'azaabi wa yuzabbihoona abnaaa'akum wa yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; wa fee zaalikum balaaa'um mir Rabbikum 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż ta'ażżana rabbukum la'in syakartum la'azīdannakum wa la'in kafartum inna ‘ażābī lasyadīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wa iz ta azzana Rabbukum la'in shakartum la azeedannakum wa la'in kafartum inn'azaabee lashadeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla mūsā in takfurū antum wa man fil-arḍi jamī‘ā(n), fa innallāha laganiyyun ḥamīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Moosaaa in takfurooo antum wa man fil ardi jamee'an fa innal laaha la Ghaniyyun Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul-lażīna min qablikum qaumi nūḥiw wa ‘ādiw wa ṡamūd(a), wal-lażīna mim ba‘dihim,  lā ya‘lamuhum illallāh(u), jā'athum rusuluhum bil-bayyināti fa raddū aidiyahum fī afwāhihim wa qālū innā kafarnā bimā ursiltum bihī wa innā lafī syakkim mimmā tad‘ūnanā ilaihi murīb(in).
ayah.translation: Alam yaatikum naba'ul lazeena min qablikum qawmi Noohinw wa 'Aadinw wa Samood, wallazeena mim ba'dihim; laa ya'lamuhum illallaah; jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faraddooo aydiyahum feee afwaahihim wa qaalooo innaa kafarnaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee wa innaa lafee shakkim mimmaa tad'oonanaaa ilaihi mureeb

ayah.transliteration: Qālat rusuluhum afillāhi syakkun fāṭiris-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), yad‘ūkum liyagfira lakum min żunūbikum wa yu'akhkhirakum ilā ajalim musammā(n), qālū in antum illā basyarum miṡlunā, turīdūna an taṣuddūnā ‘ammā kāna ya‘budu ābā'unā fa'tūnā bisulṭānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Qaalat Rusuluhum afillaahi shakkun faatiris samaawaati wal ardi yad'ookum liyaghfira lakum min zunoobikum wa yu'akhkhirakum ilaaa ajalim musam maa; qaaloo in antum illaa basharum mislunaa tureedoona an tasuddoonaa 'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'unaa faatoonaa bisul taanim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālat lahum rusuluhum in naḥnu illā basyarum miṡlukum wa lākinnallāha yamunnu ‘alā may yasyā'u min ‘ibādih(ī), wa mā kāna lanā an na'tiyakum bisulṭānin illā bi'iżnillāh(i), wa ‘alallāhi falyatawakkalil-mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalat lahum Rusuluhum in nahnu illaa basharum mislukum wa laakinnal laaha yamunnu 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa maa kaana lanaaa an naatiyakum bisul taanin illaa bi iznil laah; wa 'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minonn

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā lanā allā natawakkala ‘alallāhi wa qad hadānā subulanā, wa lanaṣbiranna ‘alā mā āżaitumūnā, wa ‘alallāhi falyatawakkalil-mutawakkilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa lanaa allaa natawakkala 'alal laahi wa qad hadaanaa subulanaa; wa lanasbiranna 'alaa maaa aazaitumoonaa; wa 'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mutawakkiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū lirusulihim lanukhrijannakum min arḍinā au lata‘ūdunna fī millatinā, fa auḥā ilaihim rabbuhum lanuhlikannaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo li Rusulihim lanukhrijanna kum min aardinaaa aw lata'oo dunna fee millatinaa fa awhaaa ilaihim Rabbuhum lanuhlikannaz zalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lanuskinannakumul-arḍa mim ba‘dihim, żālika liman khāfa maqāmī wa khāfa wa‘īd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa lanuskinan nakumul arda mim ba'dihim; zaalika liman khaafa maqaamee wa khaafa wa'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wastaftaḥū wa khāba kullu jabbārin ‘anīd(in).
ayah.translation: Wastaftahoo wa khaaba kullu jabbaarin 'aneed

ayah.transliteration: Miw warā'ihī jahannamu wa yusqā mim mā'in ṣadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Minw waraaa'ihee jahannamu wa yusqaa mim maaa'in sadeed

ayah.transliteration: Yatajarra‘uhū wa lā yakādu yusīguhū wa ya'tīhil-mautu min kulli makāniw wa mā huwa bimayyit(in), wa miw warā'ihī ‘ażābun galīẓ(un).
ayah.translation: Yatajarra'uhoo wa laa yakaadu yuseeghuhoo wa yaateehil mawtu min kulli makaaninw wa maa huwa bimaiyitinw wa minw waraaa'ihee 'azaabun ghaleez

ayah.transliteration: Maṡalul-lażīna kafarū birabbihim a‘māluhum karamādinisytaddat bihir-rīḥu fī yaumin ‘āṣif(in), lā yaqdirūna mimmā kasabū ‘alā syai'(in), żālika huwaḍ-ḍalālul-ba‘īd(u).
ayah.translation: Masalul lazeena kafaroo bi Rabbihim a'maaluhum karamaadinish taddat bihir reehu fee yawmin 'aasif; laa yaqdiroona mimmaa kasaboo 'alaa shai'; zaalika huwad dalaalul ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqq(i), iy yasya' yużhibkum wa ya'ti bikhalqin jadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; iny yashaa yuzhibkum wa yaati bikhalqin jadeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā żālika  ‘alallāhi bi‘azīz(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa zaalika 'alal laahi bi 'azeez

ayah.transliteration: Wa barazū lillāhi jamī‘an fa qālaḍ-ḍu‘afā'u lil-lażīnastakbarū innā kunnā lakum taba‘an fahal antum mugnūna ‘annā min ‘ażābillāhi min syai'(in), qālū lau hadānallāhu lahadainākum, sawā'un ‘alainā ajazi‘nā am ṣabarnā mā lanā mim maḥīṣ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa barazoo lillaahi jamee'an faqaalad du'afaaa'u lillazeenas takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona 'annaa min 'azaabil laahi min shai'; qaaloo law hadaanal laahu lahadai naakum sawaaa'un 'alainaaa ajazi'naa am sabarnaa maa lanaa mim mahees

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālasy-syaiṭānu lammā quḍiyal-amru innallāha wa‘adakum wa‘dal-ḥaqqi wa wa‘attukum fa akhlaftukum, wa mā kāna liya ‘alaikum min sulṭānin illā an da‘autukum fastajabtum lī, falā talūmūnī wa lūmū anfusakum, wa mā ana bimuṣrikhikum wa mā antum bimuṣrikhiyy(a), innī kafartu bimā asyraktumūni min qabl(u), innaẓ-ẓālimīna lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalash Shaitaanu lammaa qudiyal amru innal laaha wa'adakum wa'dal haqqi wa wa'attukum faakhlaftukum wa maa kaana liya 'alaikum min sultaanin illaaa an da'awtukum fastajabtum lee falaa taloomoonee wa loomooo anfusakum maaa ana bimusrikhikum wa maaa antum bimusrikhiyya innee kafartu bimaaa ashraktumooni min qabl; innaz zaalimeena lahum azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa udkhilal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā bi'iżni rabbihim, taḥiyyatuhum fīhā salām(un).
ayah.translation: Wa udkhilal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa bi izni Rabbihim tahiyyatuhum feeha salaam

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara kaifa ḍaraballāhu maṡalan kalimatan ṭayyibatan kasyajaratin ṭayyibatin aṣluhā ṡābituw wa far‘uhā fis-samā'(i).
ayah.translation: Alam tara kaifa darabal laahu masalan kalimatan taiyibatan kashajaratin taiyibatin asluhaa saabitunw wa far'uhaa fis samaaa'

ayah.transliteration: Tu'tī ukulahā kulla ḥīnim bi'iżni rabbihā, wa yaḍribullāhul-amṡāla lin-nāsi la‘allahum yatażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Tu'teee ukulahaa kulla heenim bi izni Rabbihaa; wa yadribul laahul amsaala linnaasi la'allahum yatazak karoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa maṡalu kalimatin khabīṡatin kasyajaratin khabīṡatinijtuṡṡat  min fauqil-arḍi mā lahā min qarār(in).
ayah.translation: Wa masalu kalimatin khabeesatin kashajaratin khabee satinij tussat min fawqil ardi maa lahaa min qaraar

ayah.transliteration: Yuṡabbitullāhul-lażīna āmanū bil-qauliṣ-ṣābiti fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa fil-ākhirah(ti), wa yuḍillullāhuẓ-ẓālimīn(a), wa yaf‘alullāhu mā yasyā'(u).
ayah.translation: Yusabbitul laahul lazeena aamanoo bilqawlis saabiti fil hayaatid dunyaa wa fil Aakhirati wa yudillul laahuz zaalimeen; wa yaf'alul laahu maa yashaaa'

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara ilal-lażīna baddalū ni‘matallāhi kufraw wa aḥallū qaumahum dāral-bawār(i).
ayah.translation: Alam tara ilal lazeena baddaloo ni'matal laahi kufranw wa ahalloo qawmahum daaral bawaar

ayah.transliteration: Jahannama yaṣlaunahā, wa bi'sal-qarār(u).
ayah.translation: Jahannama yaslawnahaa wa bi'sal qaraar

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alū lillāhi andādal liyuḍillū ‘an sabīlih(ī), qul tamatta‘ū fa inna maṣīrakum ilan-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'aloo lillaahi andaadal liyudilloo 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta'oo fa innaa maseerakum ilan Naar

ayah.transliteration: Qul li‘ibādiyal-lażīna āmanū yuqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa yunfiqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirraw wa ‘alāniyatam min qabli ay ya'tiya yaumul lā bai‘un fīhi wa lā khilāl(un).
ayah.translation: Qul li'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanoo yuqeemus Salaata wa yunfiqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw wa 'alaaniyatam min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa bai'un feehi wa laa khilaal

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa anzala minas-samā'i mā'an fa akhraja bihī minaṡ-ṡamarāti rizqal lakum, wa sakhkhara lakumul-fulka litajriya fil-baḥri bi'amrih(ī), wa sakhkhara lakumul-anhār(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an faakhraja bihee minas samaraati rizqal lakum wa sakhkhara lakumul fulka litajriya fil bahri bi amrihee wa sakhkhara lakumul anhaar

ayah.transliteration: Wa sakhkhara lakumusy-syamsa wal-qamara dā'ibaīn(i), wa sakhkhara lakumul-laila wan-nahār(a).
ayah.translation: Wa sakhkhara lakumush shamsa walqamara daaa'ibaini wa sakhkhara lakumul laila wannahaar

ayah.transliteration: Wa ātākum min kulli mā sa'altumūh(u), wa in ta‘uddū ni‘matallāhi lā tuḥṣūhā, innal-insāna laẓalūmun kaffār(un).
ayah.translation: Wa aataakum min kulli maa sa altumooh; wa in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal insaana lazaloo mun kaffaar

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qāla ibrāhīmu rabbij‘al hāżal-balada āminaw wajnubnī wa baniyya an na‘budal-aṣnām(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbij 'al haazal balada aaminanw wajnubnee wa baniyya an na'budal asnaam

ayah.transliteration: Rabbi innahunna  aḍlalna kaṡīram minan-nās(i), faman tabi‘anī fa innahū minnī, wa man ‘aṣānī fa innaka gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Rabbi innahunna adlalna kaseeram minan naasi faman tabi'anee fa innahoo minnee wa man 'asaanee fa innaka Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Rabbanā innī askantu min żurriyyatī biwādin gairi żī zar‘in ‘inda baitikal-muḥarram(i), rabbanā liyuqīmuṣ-ṣalāta faj‘al af'idatam minan-nāsi tahwī ilaihim warzuqhum minaṡ-ṡamarāti la‘allahum yasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Rabbanaaa inneee askantu min zurriyyatee biwaadin ghairi zee zar'in 'inda Baitikal Muharrami Rabbanaa liyuqeemus Salaata faj'al af'idatam minan naasi tahweee ilaihim warzuqhum minas samaraati la'allahum yashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Rabbanā innaka ta‘lamu mā nukhfī wa mā nu‘lin(u), wa mā yakhfā ‘alallāhi min syai'in fil-arḍi wa lā fis-samā'(i).
ayah.translation: Rabbanaaa innaka ta'lamu maa nukhfee wa maa nu'lin; wa maa yakhfaa 'alal laahi min shai'in fil ardi wa laa fis samaaa'

ayah.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī wahaba lī ‘alal-kibari ismā‘īla wa isḥāq(a), inna rabbī lasamī‘ud-du‘ā'(i).
ayah.translation: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee wahaba lee 'alal kibari Ismaa'eela wa Ishaaq; inna Rabbee lasamee'ud du'aaa

ayah.transliteration: Rabbij‘alnī muqīmaṣ-ṣalāti wa min żurriyyatī, rabbanā wa taqabbal du‘ā'(i).
ayah.translation: Rabbij 'alnee muqeemas Salaati wa min zurriyyatee Rabbanaa wa taqabbal du'aaa'

ayah.transliteration: Rabbanagfir lī wa liwālidayya wa lil-mu'minīna yauma yaqūmul-ḥisāb(u).
ayah.translation: Rabbanagh fir lee wa liwaalidaiya wa lilmu'mineena Yawma yaqoomul hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taḥsabannallāha gāfilan ‘ammā ya‘maluẓ-ẓālimūn(a), innamā yu'akhkhiruhum liyaumin tasykhaṣu fīhil-abṣār(u).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tahsabannal laaha ghaafilan 'ammaa ya'maluz zaalimoon; innamaa yu'akh khiruhum li Yawmin tashkhasu feehil absaar

ayah.transliteration: Muhṭi‘īna muqni‘ī ru'ūsihim lā yartaddu ilaihim ṭarfuhum, wa af'idatuhum hawā'(un).
ayah.translation: Muhti'eena muqni'ee ru'oosihim laa yartaddu ilaihim tarfuhum wa af'idatuhum hawaaa'

ayah.transliteration: Wa anżirin-nāsa yauma ya'tīhimul-‘ażāb(u), fa yaqūlul-lażīna ẓalamū rabbanā akhkhirnā ilā ajalin qarīb(in), nujib da‘wataka wa nattabi‘ir-rusul(a), awalam takūnū aqsamtum min qablu mā lakum min zawāl(in).
ayah.translation: Wa anzirin naasa Yawma yaateehimul 'azaabu fa yaqoolul lazeena zalamoo Rabbanaaa akhkhirnaaa ilaaa ajalin qareebin nujib da'wataka wa nattabi 'ir Rusul; awalam takoonooo aqsamtum min qablu maa lakum min zawaal

ayah.transliteration: Wa sakantum fī masākinil-lażīna ẓalamū anfusahum wa tabayyana lakum kaifa fa‘alnā bihim wa ḍarabnā lakumul-amṡāl(a).
ayah.translation: Wa sakantum fee masaakinil lazeena zalamooo anfusahum wa tabaiyana lakum kaifa fa'alnaa bihim wa darabnaa lakumul amsaal

ayah.transliteration: Wa qad makarū makrahum wa ‘indallāhi makruhum, wa in kāna makruhum litazūla minhul-jibāl(u).
ayah.translation: Wa qad makaroo makrahum wa 'indal laahi makruhum wa in kaana makruhum litazoola minhul jibaal

ayah.transliteration: Falā taḥsabannallāha mukhlifa wa‘dihī rusulah(ū), innallāha ‘azīzun żun tiqām(in).
ayah.translation: Falaa tahsabannal laaha mukhlifa wa'dihee Rusulah; innal laaha 'azeezun zuntiqaam

ayah.transliteration: Yauma tubaddalul-arḍu gairal-arḍi was-samāwātu wa barazū lillāhil-wāḥidil-qahhār(i).
ayah.translation: Yawma tubaddalul ardu ghairal ardi wassamaawaatu wa barazoo lillaahil Waahidil Qahhaar

ayah.transliteration: Wa taral-mujrimīna yauma'iżim muqarranīna fil-aṣfād(i).
ayah.translation: Wa taral mujrimeena Yawma 'izim muqarraneena filasfaad

ayah.transliteration: Sarābīluhum min qaṭirāniw wa tagsyā wujūhahumun-nār(u).
ayah.translation: Saraabeeluhum min qatiraaninw wa taghshaa wujoohahumun Naar

ayah.transliteration: Liyajziyallāhu kulla nafsim mā kasabat, innallāha sarī‘ul-ḥisāb(i).
ayah.translation: Liyajziyal laahu kulla nafsim maa kasabat; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā balāgul lin-nāsi wa liyunżarū bihī wa liya‘lamū annamā huwa ilāhuw wāḥiduw wa liyażżakkara ulul-albāb(i).
ayah.translation: Haaza balaaghul linnaasi wa liyunzaroo bihee wa liya'lamooo annamaa Huwa Illaahunw Waahidunw wa liyaz zakkara ulul albaab

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām rā, tilka āyātul-kitābi wa qur'ānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabi wa Qur-aa-nim Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Rubamā yawaddul-lażīna kafarū lau kānū muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Rubamaa yawaddul lazeena kafaroo law kaanoo muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Żarhum ya'kulū wa yatamatta‘ū wa yulhihimul-amalu fa saufa ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zarhum yaakuloo wa tatamatta'oo wa yulhihimul amalu fasawfa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā wa lahā kitābum ma‘lūm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa wa lahaa kitaabum ma'loom

ayah.transliteration: Mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wa mā yasta'khirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa wa maa yastaakhiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū yā ayyuhal-lażī nuzzila ‘alaihiż-żikru innaka lamajnūn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo yaaa aiyuhal lazee nuzzila 'alaihiz Zikru innaka lamajnoon

ayah.transliteration: Lau mā ta'tīnā bil-malā'ikati in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Law maa taateenaa bil malaaa'ikati in kunta minas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Mā nunazzilul-malā'ikata illā bil-ḥaqqi wa mā kānū iżam munẓarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa nunazzilul malaaa'i kata illaa bilhaqqi wa maa kaanooo izam munzareen

ayah.transliteration: Innā naḥnu nazzalnaż-żikra wa innā lahū laḥāfiẓūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa Nahnu nazalnaz Zikra wa Innaa lahoo lahaa fizoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā min qablika fī syiya‘il-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa min qablika fee shiya'il awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ya'tīhim mir rasūlin illā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Każālika naslukuhū fī qulūbil-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: kazaalika naslukuhoo fee quloobil mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Lā yu'minūna bihī wa qad khalat sunnatul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yu'minoona bihee wa qad khalat sunnatul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau fataḥnā ‘alaihim bābam minas-samā'i fa ẓallū fīhi ya‘rujūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law fatahnaa 'alaihim baabam minas samaaa'i fazaloo feehi ya'rujoon

ayah.transliteration: Laqālū innamā sukkirat abṣārunā bal naḥnu qaumum masḥūrūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqaaloo innamaa sukkirat absaarunaa bal nahnu qawmum mashooroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ja‘alnā fis-samā'i burūjaw wa zayyannāhā lin-nāẓirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad ja'alnaa fissamaaa'i buroojanw wa zaiyannaahaa linnaazireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḥafiẓnāhā min kulli syaiṭānir rajīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa hafiznaahaa min kulli Shaitaanir rajeem

ayah.transliteration: Illā manistaraqas-sam‘a fa atba‘ahū syihābum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Illaa manis taraqas sam'a fa atba'ahoo shihaabum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-arḍa madadnāhā wa alqainā fīhā rawāsiya wa ambatnā fīhā min kulli syai'im mauzūn(in).
ayah.translation: Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa feehaa min kulli shai'im mawzoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnā lakum fīhā ma‘āyisya  wa mal lastum lahū birāziqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayisha wa mal lastum lahoo biraaziqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa im min syai'in illā ‘indanā khazā'inuhū wa mā nunazziluhū illā biqadarim ma‘lūm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa im min shai'in illaa 'indanaa khazaaa 'inuhoo wa maa nunazziluhooo illaa biqadarim ma'loom

ayah.transliteration: Wa arsalnar-riyāḥa lawāqiha fa anzalnā minas-samā'i mā'an fa asqainākumūh(u), wa mā antum lahū bikhāzinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa arsalnar riyaaha la waaqiha fa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa asqai naakumoohu wa maaa antum lahoo bikhaazineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innā lanaḥnu nuḥyī wa numītu wa naḥnul-wāriṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innnaa la nahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa nahnul waarisoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ‘alimnal-mustaqdimīna minkum wa laqad ‘alimnal-musta'khirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la qad 'alimnal mustaqdimeena minkum wa laqad 'alimnal mustaakhireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka huwa yaḥsyuruhum, innahū ḥakīmun ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa inna Rabbaka Huwa yahshuruhum; innahoo Hakeem 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnal-insāna min ṣalṣālim min ḥama'im masnūn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana min salsaalim min hama im masnoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-jānna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāris-samūm(i).
ayah.translation: Waljaaanna khalaqnaahu min qablu min naaris samoom

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qāla rabbuka lil-malā'ikati innī khāliqum basyaram min ṣalṣālim min ḥama'im masnūn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa' ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min salsaalim min hama im masnoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā sawwaituhū wa nafakhtu fīhi mir rūḥī fa qa‘ū lahū sājidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa sawwaituhoo wa nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen

ayah.transliteration: Fa sajadal-malā'ikatu kulluhum  ajma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Illā iblīs(a), abā ay yakūna ma‘as-sājidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaaa ibleesa abaaa ai yakoona ma'as saajideen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā iblīsu mā laka allā takūna ma‘as-sājidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaaa Ibleesu maa laka allaa takoona ma'as saajideen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lam akul li'asjuda libasyarin khalaqtahū min ṣalṣālim min ḥama'im masnūn(in).
ayah.translation: Qaala lam akul li asjuda libasharin khalaqtahoo min salsaalim min hama im masnoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fakhruj minhā fa innaka rajīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa innaka rajeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna ‘alaikal-la‘nata ilā yaumid-dīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa inna 'alikal la'nata ilaa Yawmid Deen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi fa anẓirnī ilā yaumi yub‘aṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi fa anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fa innaka minal-munẓarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala fa innaka minal munzareen

ayah.transliteration: Ilā yaumil-waqtil-ma‘lūm(i).
ayah.translation: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi bimā agwaitanī la'uzayyinanna lahum fil-arḍi wa la'ugwiyannahum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa aghwaitanee la uzayyinaana lahum fil ardi wa la ughwiyan nahum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Illā ‘ibādaka minhumul-mukhlaṣīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hāżā ṣirāṭun ‘alayya mustaqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala haaza Siraatun 'alaiya Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Inna ‘ibādī laisa laka ‘alaihim sulṭānun illā manittaba‘aka minal-gāwīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaanun illaa manittaba'aka minal ghaaween

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna jahannama lamau‘iduhum  ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa inna jahannama lamaw'iduhum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Lahā sab‘atu abwāb(in), likulli bābim minhum juz'um maqsūm(un).
ayah.translation: Lahaa sab'atu abwaab; likulli baabim minhum juz'um maqsoom

ayah.transliteration: Innal-muttaqīna fī jannātiw wa ‘uyūn(in).
ayah.translation: Innal muttaqeena fee Jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

ayah.transliteration: Udkhulūhā bisalāmin āminīn(a).
ayah.translation: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin aamineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa naza‘nā mā fī ṣudūrihim min gillin ikhwānan ‘alā sururim mutaqābilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa naza'naa ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwaanan 'alaa sururim mutaqaabileen

ayah.transliteration: Lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabuw wa mā hum minhā bimukhrajīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yamas suhum feehaa nasabunw wa maa hum minhaa bimukhrajeen

ayah.transliteration: Nabbi' ‘ibādī annī anal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Nabbi' 'ibaadeee annneee anal Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa anna ‘ażābī huwal-‘ażābul-alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa anna 'azaabee uwal 'azaabul aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa nabbi'hum ‘an ḍaifi ibrāhīm(a).
ayah.translation: Wa nabbi'hum 'an daifi Ibraaheem

ayah.transliteration: Iż dakhalū ‘alaihi fa qālū salāmā(n), qāla innā minkum wajilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala innaa minkum wajiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū lā taujal innā nubasysyiruka bigulāmin ‘alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo la tawjal innaa nubashshiruka bighulaamin 'aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla abasysyartumūnī ‘alā am massaniyal-kibaru fa bima tubasysyirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala abashshartumoonee 'alaaa am massaniyal kibaru fabima tubashshiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū basysyarnāka bil-ḥaqqi falā takum minal-qāniṭīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo bashsharnaaka bilhaqqi falaa takum minal qaaniteen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla wa may yaqnaṭu mir raḥmati rabbihī illaḍ-ḍāllūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala wa mai yaqnatu mir rahmati Rabbiheee illad daaaloon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla famā khaṭbukum ayyuhal-mursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala famaa khatbukum aiyuhal mursaloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū innā ursilnā ilā qaumim mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Illā āla lūṭ(in), innā lamunajjūhum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaaa Aala Loot; innaa lamunajjoohum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Illamra'atahū qaddarnā innahā laminal-gābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illam ra atahoo qaddarnaaa innahaa laminal ghaabireen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'a āla lūṭinil-mursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falamma jaaa'a Aala Lootinil mursaloon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innakum qaumum munkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala innakum qawmum munkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo bal ji'naaka bimaa kaanoo feehi yamtaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ataināka bil-ḥaqqi wa innā laṣādiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa atainaaka bilhaqqi wa innaa lasaadiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa asri bi'ahlika biqiṭ‘im minal-laili wattabi‘ adbārahum wa lā yaltafit minkum aḥaduw wamḍū ḥaiṡu tu'marūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa asri bi ahlika biqit'im minal laili wattabi' adbaarahum wa laa yaltafit minkum ahadunw wamdoo haisu tu'maroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qaḍainā ilaihi żālikal-amra anna dābira hā'ulā'i maqṭū‘um muṣbiḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qadainaaa ilaihi zaalikal amra anna daabira haaa'ulaaa'i maqtoo'um musbiheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'a ahlul-madīnati yastabsyirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'a ahlul madeenati yastabshiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla inna hā'ulā'i ḍaifī falā tafḍaḥūn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaala inna haaa'ulaaa'i daifee falaa tafdahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wattaqullāha wa lā tukhzūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wattaqul laaha wa laa tukhzoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū awalam nanhaka ‘anil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo awalam nanhaka 'anil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hā'ulā'i banātī in kuntum fā‘ilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala haaa'ulaaa'i banaateee in kuntum faa'ileen

ayah.transliteration: La‘amruka innahum lafī sakratihim ya‘mahūn(a).
ayah.translation: La'amruka innahum lafee sakratihim ya'mahoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa akhażathumuṣ-ṣaiḥatu musyriqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa akhazat humus saihatu mushriqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa ja‘alnā ‘āliyahā sāfilahā wa amṭarnā ‘alaihim ḥijāratam min sijjīl(in).
ayah.translation: Faja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa amtamaa 'alaihim hijaaratam min sjijjeel

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika la'āyātil lil-mutawassimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil lilmutawassimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahā labisabīlim muqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa innahaa labi sabeelim muqeem

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika la'āyatal lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna fee zaalika la Aayatal lilmu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa in kāna aṣḥābul-aikati laẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in kaana Ashaabul Aikati lazaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fantaqamnā minhum, wa innahumā labi'imāmim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Fantaqamnaa minhum wa innahumaa labi imaamim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad każżaba aṣḥābul-ḥijril-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad kazzaba ashaabul Hijril mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ātaināhum āyātinā fa kānū ‘anhā mu‘riḍīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aatainaahum Aayaatinaa fakaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa kānū yanḥitūna minal-jibāli buyūtan āminīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kaanoo yanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan aamineen

ayah.transliteration: Fa akhażathumuṣ-ṣaiḥatu muṣbiḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa akhazat humus saihatu musbiheen

ayah.transliteration: Famā agnā ‘anhum mā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā khalaqnas-samāwāti wal-arḍa  wa mā bainahumā illā bil-ḥaqq(i), wa innas-sā‘ata la'ātiyatun faṣfaḥiṣ-ṣafḥal-jamīl(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqq; wa innas Saa'ata la aatiyatun fasfahis safhal jameel

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbaka huwal-khallāqul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Inna Rabbaka Huwal khallaaqul 'aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātaināka sab‘am minal-maṡānī wal-qur'ānal-‘aẓīm(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaaka sab'am mnal masaanee wal Qur-aanal 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Lā tamuddanna ‘ainaika ilā mā matta‘nā bihī azwājam minhum wa lā taḥzan ‘alaihim wakhfiḍ janāḥaka lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa maa matta 'naa biheee azwaajam minhum wa laa tahzan 'alaihim wakhfid janaahaka lilmu 'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qul innī anan-nażīrul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa qul inneee anan nazeerul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Kamā anzalnā ‘alal-muqtasimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Kamaaa anzalnaa 'alal muqtasimeen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna ja‘alul-qur'āna ‘iḍīn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena ja'alul Quraana'ideen

ayah.transliteration: Fa wa rabbika lanas'alannahum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Fawa Rabbika lanas'a lannahum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: ‘Ammā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Ammaa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Faṣda‘ bimā tu'maru wa a‘riḍ ‘anil-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasda' bimaa tu'maru wa a'rid anil mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Innā kafainākal-mustahzi'īn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa kafainaakal mustahzi'een

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yaj‘alūna ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhar(a), fa saufa ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yaj'aloona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; fasawfa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad na‘lamu annaka yaḍīqu ṣadruka bimā yaqūlūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad na'lamu annak yadeequ sadruka bimaa yaqooloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa kum minas-sājidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasbbih bihamdi Rabbika wa kum minas saajideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘bud rabbaka ḥattā ya'tiyakal-yaqīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa'bud Rabbaka hattaa yaatiyakal yaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Atā amrullāhi falā tasta‘jilūh(u), subḥānahū wa ta‘ālā ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ataaa amrullaahi falaa tasta'jilooh; Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Yunazzilul-malā'ikata bir-rūḥi min amrihī ‘alā may yasyā'u min ‘ibādihī an anżirū annahū lā ilāha illā ana fattaqūn(i).
ayah.translation: Yunazzilul malaaa 'ikata birroohi min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee an anzirooo annahoo laaa ilaaha illaaa ana fattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqq(i), ta‘ālā ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Khalaqal-insāna min nuṭfatin fa iżā huwa khaṣīmum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Khalaqal insaana min nutfatin fa izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-an‘āma khalaqahā lakum fīhā dif'uw wa manāfi‘u wa minhā ta'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wal an 'amaa khalaqahaa; lakum feehaa dif'unw wa manaafi'u wa minhaa taakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna wa ḥīna tasraḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lakum feehaa jamaalun heena tureehoona wa heena tasrahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa taḥmilu aṡqālakum ilā baladil lam takūnū bāligīhi illā bisyiqqil-anfus(i), inna rabbakum lara'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa tahmilu asqaalakum ilaa baladil lam takoonoo baaligheehi illaa bishiqqil anfus; inna Rabbakum la Ra'oofur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-khaila wal-bigāla wal-ḥamīra litarkabūhā wa zīnah(tan), wa yakhluqu mā lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Walkhaila wal bighaala wal hameera litarkaboohaa wa zeenah; wa yakhluqu maa laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘alallāhi qaṣdus-sabīli wa minhā jā'ir(un), wa lau syā'a lahadākum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa 'alal laahi qasdus sabeeli wa minhaa jaaa'ir; wa law shaaa'a lahadaakum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī anzala minas-samā'i mā'al lakum minhu syarābuw wa minhu syajarun fīhi tusīmūn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazeee anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'al lakum minhu sharaabunw wa minhu shajarun feehi tuseemoon

ayah.transliteration: Yumbitu lakum bihiz-zar‘a waz-zaitūna wan-nakhīla wal-a‘nāba wa min kulliṡ-ṡamarāt(i), inna fī żālika la'āyatal liqaumiy yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yumbitu lakum bihiz zar'a wazzaitoona wanna kheela wal-a'naaba wa min kullis samaraat, inna fee zaalika la Aayatal liqawminy yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa sakhkhara lakumul-laila wan-nahār(a), wasy-syamsa wal-qamar(a), wan-nujūmu musakhkharātum bi'amrih(ī), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa sakkhkhara lakumul laila wannahaara wash shamsa walqamara wannujoomu musakhkharaatum bi amrih; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā żara'a lakum fil-arḍi mukhtalifan alwānuh(ū), inna fī żālika la'āyatal liqaumiy yażżakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa zara a lakum fil ardi mukhtalifan alwaanuh; inna fee zaalika la Aayatal liqawminy yazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī sakhkharal-baḥra lita'kulū minhu laḥman ṭariyyaw wa tastakhrijū minhu ḥilyatan talbasūnahā, wa taral-fulka mawākhira fīhi wa litabtagū min faḍlihī wa la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee sakhkharal bahra litaakuloo minhu lahman tariyyanw wa tastakhrijoo minhu hilyatan talbasoonahaa wa taral fulka mawaakhira feehi wa litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa alqā fil-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bikum wa anhāraw wa subulal la‘allakum tahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum wa anhaaranw wa sublulal la 'allakum tahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘alāmāt(in), wa bin-najmi hum yahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa 'alaamaat; wa bin najmi hum yahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Afamay yakhluqu kamal lā yakhluq(u), afalā tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afamany yakhluqu kamallaa yakhluq; afalaa tazak karoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in ta‘uddū ni‘matallāhi lā tuḥṣūhā, innallāha lagafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal laaha la Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu ya‘lamu mā tusirrūna wa mā tu‘linūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu ya'lamu maa tusirroona wa maa tu'linoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yad‘ūna min dūnillāhi  lā yakhluqūna syai'aw wa hum yukhlaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yad'oona min doonil laahi laa yakhluqoona shai'anw wa hum yukhlaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Amwātun gairu aḥyā'(in), wa mā yasy‘urūna ayyāna yub‘aṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Amwaatun ghairu ahyaaa'inw wa maa yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon

ayah.transliteration: Ilāhukum ilāhuw wāḥid(un), fal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati qulūbuhum munkiratuw wa hum mustakbirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Illahukum Ilaahunw Waahid; fallazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati quloobuhum munkiratunw wa hum mustakbiroon

ayah.transliteration: Lā jarama annallāha ya‘lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu‘linūn(a), innahū lā yuḥibbul-mustakbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa jarama annal laaha ya'lamu maa yusirrona wa ma yu'linoon; innahoo laa yuhibbul mustakbireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā qīla lahum māżā anzala rabbukum, qālū asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa qeela lahum maazaaa anzala Rabbukum qaaloo asaateerul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Liyaḥmilū auzārahum kāmilatay yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), wa min auzāril-lażīna yuḍillūnahum bigairi ‘ilm(in), alā sā'a mā yazirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Liyahmilooo awzaarahum kaamilatany Yawmal Qiyaamati wa min awzaaril lazeena yudilloonahum bighairi 'ilm; alaa saaa'a maa yaziroon

ayah.transliteration: Qad makaral-lażīna min qablihim fa atallāhu bun-yānahum minal-qawā‘idi fa kharra ‘alaihimus-saqfu min fauqihim wa atāhumul-‘ażābu min ḥaiṡu lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qad makaral lazeena min qablihim fa atal laahu bunyaa nahum minal qawaa'idi fakharra 'alaihimus saqfu min fawqihim wa ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma yaumal-qiyāmati yukhzīhim wa yaqūlu aina syurakā'iyal-lażīna kuntum tusyāqqūna fīhim, qālal-lażīna ūtul-‘ilma innal-khizyal-yauma was-sū'a ‘alal-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa Yawmal Qiyaamati yukhzeehim wa yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tushaaaqqoona feehim; qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma innal khizyal Yawma wassooo'a 'alal kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna tatawaffāhumul-malā'ikatu ẓālimī anfusihim, fa alqawus-salama mā kunnā na‘malu min sū'(in), balā innallāha ‘alīmum bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena tatawaf faahu mul malaaa'ikatu zaalimeee anfusihim fa alqawus salama maa kunnaa na'malu min sooo'; balaaa innal laaha 'aleemum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Fadkhulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā, fa labi'sa maṡwal-mutakabbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fadkhulooo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha falabi'sa maswal mutakab bireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qīla lil-lażīnattaqau māżā anzala rabbukum, qālū khairā(n), lil-lażīna aḥsanū fī hāżihid-dun-yā ḥasanah(tun), wa ladārul-ākhirati khair(un), wa lani‘ma dārul-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qeela lillazeenat taqaw maazaaa anzala Rabbukum; qaaloo khairaa; lillazeena absanoo fee haazihid dunyaa hasanah; wa la Daarul Aakhirati khair; wa lani'ma daarul muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Jannātu ‘adniy yadkhulūnahā tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru lahum fīhā mā yasyā'ūn(a), każālika yajzillāhul-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Jannaatu 'Adniny yadkhuloonahaa tajree min tahtihal anhaaru lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oon; kazaalika yajzil laahul muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna tatawafāhumul-malā'ikatu ṭayyibīn(a), yaqūlūna salāmun ‘alaikumudkhulul-jannata bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena tatawaf faahumul malaaa'ikatu taiyibeena yaqooloona salaamun 'alai kumud khulul Jannata bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Hal yanẓurūna illā an ta'tiyahumul-malā'ikatu au ya'tiya amru rabbik(a), każālika fa‘alal-lażīna min qablihim, wa mā ẓalamahumullāhu wa lākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hal yanzuroona illaaa an taatiyahumul malaaa'ikatu aw yaatiya amru Rabbik; kazaalika fa'alal lazeena min qablihim; wa maa zalamahumul laahu wa laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa aṣābahum sayyi'ātu mā ‘amilū wa ḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa asaabahum saiyi aatu maa 'amiloo wa haaqa bihim maa kaano bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna asyrakū lau syā'allāhu mā ‘abadnā min dūnihī min syai'in naḥnu wa lā ābā'unā wa lā ḥarramnā min dūnihī min syai'(in), każālika fa‘alal-lażīna min qablihim, fahal ‘alar-rusuli illal-balāgul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena ashrakoo law shaaa'al laahu ma 'abadnaa min doonihee min shai'in nahnu wa laaa aabaaa'unaa wa laa harramnaa min doonihee min shai'; kazaalika fa'alal lazeena min qablihim fahal 'alar Rusuli illal balaaghul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ba‘aṡnā fī kulli ummatir rasūlan ani‘budullāha wajtanibuṭ-ṭāgūt(a), fa minhum man hadallāhu wa minhum man ḥaqqat ‘alaihiḍ-ḍalālah(tu), fa sīrū fil-arḍi fanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-mukażżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad ba'asnaa fee kulli ummatir Rasoolan ani'budul laaha wajtanibut Taaghoota faminhum man hadal laahu wa minhum man haqqat 'alaihid dalaalah; faseeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen

ayah.transliteration: In taḥriṣ ‘alā hudāhum fa innallāha lā yahdī may yuḍillu wa mā lahum min nāṣirīn(a).
ayah.translation: In tahris 'alaa hudaahum fa innal laaha laa yahdee mai yudillu wa maa lahum min naasireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa aqsamū billāhi jahda aimānihim, lā yab‘aṡullāhu may yamūt(u), balā wa‘dan ‘alaihi ḥaqqaw wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim laa yab'asul laahu mai yamoot; balaa wa'dan 'alaihi haqqanw wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Liyubayyina lahumul-lażī yakhtalifūna fīhi wa liya‘lamal-lażīna kafarū annahum kānū-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Liyubaiyina lahumul lazee yakhtalifoona feehi wa liya'lamal lazeena kafarooo annahum kaanoo kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Innamā qaulunā lisyai'in iżā aradnāhu an naqūla lahū kun fa yakūn(u).
ayah.translation: Innamaa qawlunaa lisha y'in izaa aradnaahu an naqoola lahoo kun fa yakoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hājarū fillāhi mim ba‘di mā ẓulimū lanubawwi'annahum fid-dun-yā ḥasanah(tan), wa la'ajrul-ākhirati akbar(u), lau kānū ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena haajaroo fil laahi mim ba'di maa zulimoo lanubawwi' annahum fiddunyaa hasanatanw wa la ajrul Aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna ṣabarū wa ‘alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena sabaroo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawak kaloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnā min qablika illā rijālan nūḥī ilaihim fas'alū ahlaż-żikri in kuntum lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaa min qablika illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim; fas'alooo ahlaz zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Bil-bayyināti waz-zubur(i), wa anzalnā ilaikaż-żikra litubayyina lin-nāsi mā nuzzila ilaihim wa la‘allahum yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bilbaiyinaati waz Zubur; wa anzalnaaa ilaikaz Zikra litubaiyina linnaasi maa nuzzila ilaihim wa la'allahum yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Afa aminal-lażīna makarus-sayyi'āti ay yakhsifallāhu bihimul-arḍa au ya'tiyahumul-‘ażābu min ḥaiṡu lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afa aminal lazeena makarus saiyi aati ai yakhsifal laahu bihimul arda aw yaaa tiyahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Au ya'khużahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimu‘jizīn(a).
ayah.translation: Aw yaakhuzahum fee taqallubihim famaa hum bi mu'jizeen

ayah.transliteration: Au ya'khużahum ‘alā takhawwuf(in), fa inna rabbakum lara'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Aw yaakhuzahum 'alaa takhawwuf; fa inna Rabbakum la Ra'oofur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau ilā mā khalaqallāhu min syai'iy yatafayya'u ẓilāluhū ‘anil-yamīni wasy-syamā'ili sujjadal lillāhi wa hum dākhirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awa lam yaraw ilaa maa khalaqal laahu min shai'iny-yatafaiya'u zilaaluhoo 'anil yameeni washshamaaa' ili sujjadal lillaahi wa hum daakhiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi yasjudu mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi min dābbatiw wal-malā'ikatu wa hum yastakbirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahi yasjudu maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi min daaabbatinw walma laaa'ikatu wa hum laa yastakbiroon

ayah.transliteration: Yakhāfūna rabbahum min fauqihim wa yaf‘alūna mā yu'marūn(a).
ayah.translation: yakhaafoona Rabbahum min fawqihim wa yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālallāhu lā tattakhiżū ilāhainiṡnain(i), innamā huwa ilāhuw wāḥidun fa iyyāya farhabūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal laahu laa tatta khizooo ilaahainis naini innamaa Huwa Ilaahunw Waahid; fa iyyaaya farhaboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lahū mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa lahud-dīnu wāṣibā(n), afagairallāhi tattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa lahud deenu waasibaa; afaghairal laahi tattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā bikum min ni‘matin fa minallāhi ṡumma iżā massakumuḍ-ḍurru fa ilaihi taj'arūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa bikum minni'matin faminal laahi summa izaa massakumud durru fa ilaihi taj'aroon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma iżā kasyafaḍ-ḍurra ‘ankum iżā farīqum minkum birabbihim yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summaa izaa kashafad durra 'ankum izaa fareequm minkum bi Rabbihim yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Liyakfurū bimā ātaināhum, fa tamatta‘ū fa saufa ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Liyakfuroo bimaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo, faswfa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaj‘alūna limā lā ya‘lamūna naṣībam mimmā razaqnāhum, tallāhi latus'alunna ‘ammā kuntum taftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaj'aloona limaa laa ya'lamoona naseebam mimmaa razaqnnaahum; tallaahi latus'alunaa 'ammaa kuntum taftaroon
