ayah.transliteration: Wa yaj‘alūna lillāhil-banāti subḥānah(ū), wa lahum mā yasytahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaj'aloona lillaahil banaati Subhaanahoo wa lahum maa yashtahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā busysyira aḥaduhum bil-unṡā ẓalla wajhuhū muswaddaw wa huwa kaẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa bushshira ahaduhum bil unsaa zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw wa huwa kazeem

ayah.transliteration: Yatawārā minal-qaumi min sū'i mā busysyira bih(ī), ayumsikuhū ‘alā hūnin am yadussuhū fit-turāb(i), alā sā'a mā yaḥkumūn(a).
ayah.translation: yatawaaraa minal qawmimin sooo'i maa bushshira bih; a-yumsikuhoo 'alaa hoonin am yadussuhoo fit turaab; alaa saaa'a maa yahkumoon

ayah.transliteration: Lil-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati maṡalus-sau'(i), wa lillāhil-maṡalul-a‘lā, wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Lillazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati masalus saw'i wa lillaahil masalul a'laa; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau yu'ākhiżullāhun-nāsa biẓulmihim mā taraka ‘alaihā min dābbatiw wa lākiy yu'akhkhiruhum ilā ajalim musammā(n), fa iżā jā'a ajaluhum lā yasta'khirūna sā‘ataw wa lā yastaqdimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bizulminhim maa taraka 'alaihaa min daaabbatinw wa laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum laa yastaakhiroona saa'atanw wa laa yastaqdimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaj‘alūna lillāhi mā yakrahūna wa taṣifu alsinatuhumul-każiba anna lahumul-ḥusnā lā jarama anna lahumun nāra  wa annahum mufraṭūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaj'aloona lillaahi maa yakrahoona wa tasifu alsinatuhumul kaziba anna lahumul husnaa laa jarama anna lahumun Naara wa annahum mufratoon

ayah.transliteration: Tallāhi laqad arsalnā ilā umamim min qablika fa zayyana lahumusy-syaiṭānu a‘mālahum fa huwa waliyyuhumul-yauma wa lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Tallaahi laqad arsalnaaa ilaaa umamim min qablika fazayyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fahuwa waliyyuhumul yawma wa lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā anzalnā ‘alaikal-kitāba illā litubayyina lahumul-lażikhtalafū fīh(i), wa hudaw wa raḥmatal liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba illaa litubaiyina lahumul lazikh talafoo feehi wa hudanw wa rahmatal liqawminy yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu anzala minas-samā'i mā'an fa aḥyā bihil-arḍa ba‘da mautihā, inna fī żālika la'āyatal liqaumiy yasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa; inna fee zaalika la aayatal liqaw miny yasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna lakum fil-an‘āmi la‘ibrah(tan), nusqīkum mimmā fī buṭūnihī mim baini farṡiw wa damil labanan khāliṣan sā'igal lisy-syāribīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmmaa fee butoonihee mim baini farsinw wa damil labanann khaalisan saaa'ighallish shaaribeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa min ṡamarātin nakhīli wal-a‘nābi tattakhiżūna minhu sakaraw wa rizqan ḥasanā(n), inna fī żālika la'āyatal liqaumiy ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min samaraatin nakheeli wal a'nnaabi tattakhizoona minhu sakaranw wa rizqann hasanaa; inna fee zaalika la Aayatal liqawminy ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa auḥā rabbuka ilan-naḥli anittakhiżī minal-jibāli buyūtaw wa minasy-syajari wa mimmā ya‘risyūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa awhaa Rabbuka ilannnabli anit takhizee minal jabaali buyootanw wa minash shajari wa mimmaa ya'rishoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma kulī min kulliṡ-ṡamarāti faslukī subula rabbiki żululā(n), yakhruju mim buṭūnihā syarābum mukhtalifun alwānuhū fīhi syifā'ul lin-nās(i), inna fī żālika la'āyatal liqaumiy yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summma kulee min kullis samaraati faslukee subula Rabbiki zululaa; yakhruju mim butoonihaa sharaabum mukh talifun alwaanuhoo feehi shifaaa'ul linnaas, innna fee zaalika la Aayatal liqawminy yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu khalaqakum ṡumma yatawaffākum wa minkum may yuraddu ilā arżalil-‘umuri  likai lā ya‘lama ba‘da ‘ilmin syai'ā(n), innallāha ‘alīmun qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu khalaqakum suma tatawaffaakum; wa minkum many-yuradu ilaaa arzalil 'umuri likai laa ya'lama ba'da 'ilmin shai'aa; innal laaha 'Aleemun Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu faḍḍala ba‘ḍakum ‘alā ba‘ḍin fir-rizq(i), famal-lażīna fuḍḍilū birāddī rizqihim ‘alā mā malakat aimānuhum fahum fīhi sawā'un afa bini‘matillāhi yajḥadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu faddala ba'dakum 'alaa ba'din fir rizq; famal lazeena fuddiloo biraaaddee rizqihim 'alaa maa malakat aimaanuhum fahum feehi sawaaa'; afabini'matil laahi yajhadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu ja‘ala lakum min anfusikum azwājaw wa ja‘ala lakum min azwājikum banīna wa ḥafadataw wa razaqakum minaṭ-ṭayyibāt(i), afabil-bāṭili yu'minūna wa bini‘matillāhi yakfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw wa ja'ala lakum min azwaajikum baneena wa hafadatanw wa razaqakum minat yaiyibaat; afabil baatili yu'minoona wa bini'matil laahi hum yakkfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ya‘budūna min dūnillāhi mā lā yamliku lahum rizqam minas-samāwāti wal-arḍi syai'aw wa lā yastaṭī‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yamliku lahum rizqam minas samaawaati wal ardi shai'anw wa laa yastatee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Falā taḍribū lillāhil-amṡāl(a), innallāha ya‘lamu wa antum lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaa tadriboo lillaahil amsaal; innal laaha ya'lamu wa antum laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Ḍaraballāhu maṡalan ‘abdam mamlūkal lā yaqdiru ‘alā syai'iw wa mar razaqnāhu minnā rizqan ḥasanan fa huwa yunfiqu minhu sirraw wa jahrā(n), hal yastawūn(a), al-ḥamdu lillāh(i), bal akṡaruhum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Darabal laahu masalan 'abdam mammlookal laa yaqdiru 'alaa shai'inw wa marrazaqnaahu mminnaa rizqan hasanan fahuwa yunfiqu minhu sirranw wa jahra; hal yasta-woon; alhamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḍaraballāhu maṡalar rajulaini aḥaduhumā abkamu lā yaqdiru ‘alā syai'iw wa huwa kallun ‘alā maulāh(u), ainamā yuwajjihhu lā ya'ti bikhair(in), hal yastawī huw(a), wa may ya'muru bil-‘adli wa huwa ‘alā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa darabal laahu masalar rajulaini ahaduhumaaa abkamu laa yaqdiru 'alaa shai'inw wa huwa kallun 'alaa mawlaahu ainamaa yuwajjihhu laa yaati bikhairin hal yastawee huwa wa many-yaamuru bil'adli wa huwa 'alaa Siraatim MMustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi gaibus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa mā amrus-sā‘ati illā kalamḥil-baṣari au huwa aqrab(u), innallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahi ghaibus samaawaati wal ard; wa maaa amrus Saa'ati illaa kalamhil basari aw huwa aqrab; innal laaha 'alaaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu akhrajakum mim buṭūni ummahātikum lā ta‘lamūna syai'ā(n), wa ja‘ala lakumus-sam‘a wal-abṣāra wal-af'idah(ta), la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu akhrajakum mim butooni ummahaatikum laa ta'lamoona shai'anw wa ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idata la'allakum tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Alam yarau ilaṭ-ṭairi musakhkharātin fī jawwis-samā'(i), mā yumsikuhunna illallāh(u), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam yaraw ilat tairi musakhkharaatin fee jawwis samaaa'i maa yumsikuhunna illal laah; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu ja‘ala lakum mim buyūtikum sakanaw wa ja‘ala lakum min julūdil-an‘āmi buyūtan tastakhiffūnahā yauma ẓa‘nikum wa yauma iqāmatikum, wa min aṣwāfihā wa aubārihā wa asy‘ārihā aṡāṡaw wa matā‘an ilā ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum min juloodil an'aami buyootan tastakhif foonahaa yawma za'nikum wa yawma iqaamatikum wa min aswaafihaa wa awbaarihaa wa ash'aarihaaa asaasanw wa mataa'an ilaa been

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu ja‘ala lakum mimmā khalaqa ẓilālaw wa ja‘ala lakum minal-jibāli aknānaw wa ja‘ala lakum sarābīla taqīkumul-ḥarra wa sarābīla taqīkum ba'sakum, każālika yutimmu ni‘matahū ‘alaikum la‘allakum tuslimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu ja'ala lakum mimmaa khalaqa zilaalanw wa ja'ala lakum minal jibaali aknaananw wa ja'ala lakum saraabeela taqeekumul harra wa saraabeela taqeekum baasakum; kazaalika yutimmu ni'matahoo alaikum la'allakum tuslimoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa in tawallau fa innamā ‘alaikal-balāgul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Fa in tawallaw fa innamaa 'alaikal balaaghul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘rifūna ni‘matallāhi ṡumma yunkirūnahā wa akṡaruhumul-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ya'rifoona ni'matal laahi summa yunkiroonahaa wa aksaruhumul kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma nab‘aṡu min kulli ummatin syahīdan ṡumma lā yu'żanu lil-lażīna kafarū wa lā hum yusta‘tabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yawma nab'asu min kulli ummatin shaheedan summa laa yu'zanu lillazeena kafaroo wa laa hum yusta'taboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ra'al-lażīna ẓalamul-‘ażāba falā yukhaffafu ‘anhum wa lā hum yunẓarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa ra al lazeena zalamul 'azaaba falaa yukhaf fafu 'anhum wa laa hum yunzaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ra'al-lażīna asyrakū syurakā'ahum qālū rabbanā hā'ulā'i syurakā'unal-lażīna kunnā nad‘ū min dūnik(a), fa alqau ilaihimul-qaula innakum lakāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa ra al lazeena ashrakoo shurakaaa'ahum qaaloo Rabbana haaa'ulaaa'i shurakaaa'unal lazeena kunnaa nad'oo min doonika fa alqaw ilaihimul qawla innakum lakaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa alqau ilallāhi yauma'iżinis-salama wa ḍalla ‘anhum mā kānū yaftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa alqaw ilal laahi yawma'izinis salama wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna kafarū wa ṣaddū ‘an sabīlillāhi zidnāhum ‘ażāban fauqal-‘ażābi bimā kānū yufsidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena kafaroo wa saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi zidnaahum 'azaaban fawqal 'azaabi bimaa kaanoo yufsidoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma nab‘aṡu fī kulli ummatin syahīdan ‘alaihim min anfusihim wa ji'nā bika syahīdan ‘alā hā'ulā'(i), wa nazzalnā ‘alaikal-kitāba tibyānal likulli syai'iw wa hudaw wa raḥmataw wa busyrā lil-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yawma nab'asu fee kulli ummmatin shaheedan 'alaihim min anfusihim wa ji'naa bika shaheedan 'alaa haaa'ulaaa'; wa nazzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba tibyaanal likulli shai'inw wa hudanw wa rahmatanw wa bushraa lilmuslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha ya'muru bil-‘adli wal-iḥsāni wa ītā'i żil-qurbā wa yanhā ‘anil-faḥsyā'i wal-munkari wal-bagyi ya‘iẓukum la‘allakum tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha yaamaru bil 'adli wal ihsaani wa eetaaa'i zil qurbaa wa yanhaa 'anil fahshaaa'i wal munkari walbagh-i' ya'izukum la'allakum tazakkkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa aufū bi‘ahdillāhi iżā ‘āhattum wa lā tanquḍul-aimāna ba‘da taukīdihā wa qad ja‘altumullāha ‘alaikum kafīlā(n), innallāha ya‘lamu mā taf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa awfoo bi Ahdil laahi izaa 'aahattum wa laa tanqudul aimaana ba'da tawkeedihaa wa qad ja'altumul laaha 'alaikum kafeelaa; innal laaha ya'lamu maa taf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā takūnū kal-latī naqaḍat gazlahā mim ba‘di quwwatin ankāṡā(n), tattakhiżūna aimānakum dakhalam bainakum an takūna ummatun hiya arbā min ummah(tin), innamā yablūkumullāhu bih(ī), wa layubayyinanna lakum yaumal-qiyāmati mā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa takoonoo kallatee naqadat ghazlahaa mim ba'di quwwatin ankaasaa; tattakhizoona aimaanakum dakhlalam bainakum an takoona ummatun hiya arbaa min ummah; innnamaa yablookumul laahu bih; wa la yubaiyinanna lakum yawmal Qiyaamati maa kuntum fee takhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau syā'allāhu laja‘alakum ummataw wāḥidataw wa lākiy yuḍillu may yasyā'u wa yahdī may yasyā'(u), wa latus'alunna ‘ammā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law shaaa'al laahu laja'alakum ummmatanw waahidatanw wa laakiny yudillu many-yashaaa'u wa yahdee many-yashaaa'; wa latus'alunna 'ammaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tattakhiżū aimānakum dakhalam bainakum fa tazilla qadamum ba‘da ṡubūtihā wa tażūqus-sū'a bimā ṣadattum ‘an sabīlillāh(i), wa lakum ‘ażābun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tattakhizooo aimaanakum dakhalam bainakum ftazilla qadamum ba'da subootihaa wa tazooqus sooo'a bimmaa sadattum 'an sabeelil laahi wa lakum 'azaabun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tasytarū bi‘ahdillāhi ṡamanan qalīlā(n), innamā ‘indallāhi huwa khairul lakum  in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tashtaroo bi 'ahdil laahi samanan qaleelaa; innamaa 'indal laahi huwa khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Mā ‘indakum yanfadu wa mā ‘indallāhi bāq(in), wa lanajziyannal-lażīna ṣabarū ajrahum bi'aḥsani mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: maa 'indakum yanfadu wa maa 'indal laahi baaq; wa lanajziyannal lazeena sabarooo ajjrahum bi ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Man ‘amila ṣāliḥam min żakarin au unṡā wa huwa mu'minun fa lanuḥyiyannahū ḥayātan ṭayyibah(tan), wa lanajziyannahum ajrahum bi'aḥsani mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Man 'amila saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa wa huwa mu'minun falanuhyiyannahoo hayaatan taiiyibatanw wa lanajzi yannnahum ajrahum bi ahsani maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā qara'tal-qur'āna fasta‘iż billāhi minasy-syaiṭānir-rajīm(i).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa qara tal Quraana fasta'iz billaahi minashh Shai taanir rajeem

ayah.transliteration: Innahū laisa lahū sulṭānun ‘alal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innahoo laisa lahoo sultaanun 'alal lazeena aamanoo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā sulṭānuhū ‘alal-lażīna yatawallaunahū wal-lażīna hum bihī musyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innnamaa sultaanuhoo 'alal lazeena yatawallawnahoo wallazeena hum bihee mushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā baddalnā āyatam makāna āyah(tin), wallāhu a‘lamu bimā yunazzilu qālū innamā anta muftar(in), bal akṡaruhum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa baddalnaaa Aayatam makaana Aayatinw wal laahu a'lamu bimaa yunazzilu qaalooo innamaa anta muftar; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul nazzalahū rūḥul-qudusi mir rabbika bil-ḥaqqi liyuṡabbital-lażīna āmanū wa hudaw wa busyrā lil-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul nazzalahoo Roohul Qudusi mir Rabbika bilhaqqi liyusabbital lazeena aamanoo wa hudanw wa bushraa lilmuslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad na‘lamu annahum yaqūlūna innamā yu‘allimuhū basyar(un), lisānul-lażī yulḥidūna ilaihi a‘jamiyyuw wa hāżā lisānun ‘arabiyyum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad na'lamu annahum yaqooloona innamaa yu'allimuhoo bashar; lisaanul lazee yulhidoona ilaihi a'ja miyyunw wa haaza lisaanun 'Arabiyyum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bi'āyātillāh(i), lā yahdīhimullāhu wa lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bi Aayaatil laahi laa yahdehimul laahu wa lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Innamā yaftaril-każibal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bi'āyātillāh(i), ulā'ika humul-kāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaa yaftaril kazibal lazeena laa yu'minoona bi Aayaatil laahi wa ulaaa'ika humul kaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Man kafara billāhi mim ba‘di īmānihī illā man ukriha wa qalbuhū muṭma'innum bil-īmāni wa lākim man syaraḥa bil-kufri ṣadran fa ‘alaihim gaḍabum minallāh(i), wa lahum ‘ażābun aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: man kafara billaahi mim ba'di eemaanihee illaa man ukriha wa qalbuhoo mutmma'innum bil eemaani wa laakim man sharaha bilkufri sadran fa'alaihim ghadabum minal laahi wa lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahumustaḥabbul-ḥayātad-dun-yā ‘alal-ākhirah(ti), wa annallāha lā yahdil-qaumal-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahumus tahabbul hayaatad dunyaa 'alal Aakhirati wa annal laaha laa yahdil qawmal kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna ṭaba‘allāhu ‘alā qulūbihim wa sam‘ihim wa abṣārihim, wa ulā'ika humul-gāfilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim wa sam'ihim wa absaarihim wa ulaaa'ika humul ghaafiloon

ayah.transliteration: Lā jarama annahum fil-ākhirati humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa jarama annnahum fil Aakhirati humul khassiroon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma inna rabbaka lil-lażīna hājarū mim ba‘di mā futinū ṡumma jāhadū wa ṣabarū, inna rabbaka mim ba‘dihā lagafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Summa inna Rabbaka lillazeena haajaroo mim ba'dimaa futinoo summma jaahadoo wa sabaroo inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Yauma ta'tī kullu nafsin tujādilu ‘an nafsihā wa tuwaffā kullu nafsim mā ‘amilat wa hum lā yuẓlamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma taatee kullu nafsin tujaadilu 'an nafsihaa wa tuwaffaa kullu nafsim maa 'amilat wa hum laa yuzlamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḍaraballāhu maṡalan qaryatan kānat āminatam muṭma'innatay ya'tīhā rizquhā ragadam min kulli makānin fa kafarat bi'an‘umillāhi fa ażāqahallāhu libāsal-jū‘i wal-khaufi bimā kānū yaṣna‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa darabal laahu masalan qaryatan kaanat aaminatam mutma'innatany yaaateehaa rizquhaa rghadam min kulli makaanin fakafarat bi an'umil laahi fa azaaqahal laahu libaasal joo'i walkhawfi bimaa kaanoo yasna'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad jā'ahum rasūlum minhum fa każżabūhu fa akhażahumul-‘ażābu wa hum ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum minhum fakazzaboohu fa akhazahumul 'azaabu wa hum zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa kulū mimmā razaqakumullāhu ḥalālan ṭayyibā(n), wasykurū ni‘matallāhi in kuntum iyyāhu ta‘budūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakuloo mimmaa razaqa kumul laahu halaalan taiyibanw washkuroo ni'matal laahi in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā ḥarrama ‘alaikumul-maitata wad-dama wa laḥmal-khinzīri wa mā uhilla ligairillāhi bih(ī), famaniḍṭurra gaira bāgiw wa lā ‘ādin fa innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innamaa harrma 'alai kumul maitata waddama wa lahmal khinzeeri wa maaa uhilla lighairil laahi bihee famanid turra ghaira baaghinw wa laa 'aadin fa innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taqūlū limā taṣifu alsinatukumul-każiba hāżā ḥalāluw wa hāżā ḥarāmul litaftarū ‘alallāhil-każib(a), innal-lażīna yaftarūna ‘alallāhil-każiba lā yufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taqooloo limaa tasifu alsinatukumul kaziba haaza halaalunw wa haazaa haraamul litaftaroo 'alal laahil kazib; innal lazeena yaftaroona 'alal laahil kaziba laa yuflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Matā‘un qalīl(un), wa lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Mata'un qaleelunw wa lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘alal-lażīna hādū ḥarramnā mā qaṣaṣnā ‘alaika min qabl(u), wa mā ẓalamnāhum wa lākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa 'alal lazeena haadoo harramnaa ma qasasnaa 'alaika min qablu wa maa zalamanaahum wa laakin kaanoo anfusahum wa laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma inna rabbaka lil-lażīna ‘amilus-sū'a bijahālatin ṡumma tābū mim ba‘di żālika wa aṣlaḥū inna rabbaka mim ba‘dihā lagafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Summma inna Rabbaka lillazeena 'amilus sooo'a bijahaalatin summa taaboo mim ba'di zaaalika wa aslahoo inna Rabbaka mim ba'dihaa la Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Inna ibrāhīma kāna ummatan qānital lillāhi ḥanīfā(n), wa lam yaku minal-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna Ibraaheema kaana ummatan qaanital lillaahi Haneefanw wa lam yakuminal mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Syākiral li'an‘umih(ī), ijtabāhu wa hadāhu ilā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Shaakiral li an'umih; ijtabaahu wa hadaahu ilaa Siraatim Muustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa ātaināhu fid-dun-yā ḥasanah(tan), wa innahū fil-ākhirati laminaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aatainaahu fid dunyaa hasanah; wa innahoo fil Aakhirati laminas saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma auḥainā ilaika anittabi‘ millata ibrāhīma ḥanīfā(n), wa mā kāna minal-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summma awhainaa ilaika anit tabi' Millata Ibraaheema haneefaa; wa maa kaana minal mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Innamā ju‘ilas-sabtu ‘alal-lażīnakhtalafū fīh(i), wa inna rabbaka layaḥkumu bainahum yaumal-qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innnamaa ju'ilas Sabtu 'alal lazeenakhtalafoo feeh; wa inna Rabbaka la yahkumu bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Ud‘u ilā sabīli rabbika bil-ḥikmati wal-mau‘iẓatil-ḥasanati wa jādilhum bil-latī hiya aḥsan(u), inna rabbaka huwa a‘lamu biman ḍalla ‘an sabīlihī wa huwa a‘lamu bil-muhtadīn(a).
ayah.translation: Ud'u ilaa sabeeli Rabbika bilhikmati walmaw 'izatil hasanati wa jaadilhum billatee hiya ahsan; inna Rabbaka huwa a'almu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee wa Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa in ‘āqabtum fa ‘āqibū bimiṡli mā ‘ūqibtum bih(ī), wa la'in ṣabartum lahuwa khairul liṣ-ṣābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in 'aaqabtum fa'aaqiboo bimisli maa 'ooqibtum bihee wa la'in sabartum lahuwa khairul lissaabireen

ayah.transliteration: Waṣbir wa mā ṣabruka illā billāhi wa lā taḥzan ‘alaihim wa lā taku fī ḍaiqim mimmā yamkurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wasbir wa maa sabruka illaa billaah; wa laa tahzan 'alaihim wa laa taku fee daiqim mimmaa yamkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha ma‘al-lażīnattaqau wal-lażīna hum muḥsinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha ma'al lazeenat taqaw wal lazeena hum muhsinoon

ayah.transliteration: Subḥānal-lażī asrā bi‘abdihī lailam minal-masjidil ḥarāmi ilal-masjidil-aqṣal-lażī bāraknā ḥaulahū linuriyahū min āyātinā, innahū huwas-samī‘ul-baṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Subhaanal lazeee asraa bi'abdihee lailam minal Masjidil Haraami ilal Masjidil Aqsal-lazee baaraknaa haw lahoo linuriyahoo min aayaatinaa;innahoo Huwas Samee'ul-Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa ātainā mūsal-kitāba wa ja‘alnāhu hudal libanī isrā'īla allā tattakhiżū min dūnī wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa aatainaa Moosal-Kitaaba wa ja'alnaahu hudal-liBaneee Israaa'eel;

ayah.transliteration: Żurriyyata man ḥamalnā ma‘a nūḥ(in), innahū kāna ‘abdan syakūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Zurriyyata man hamalnaa ma'a Nooh innahoo kaana 'abdan shakooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qaḍainā ilā banī isrā'īla fil-kitābi latufsidunna fil-arḍi marrataini wa lata‘lunna ‘uluwwan kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qadainaaa ilaa Baneee Israaa'eela fil Kitaabi latufsidunna fil ardi marratain; wa lata'lunna'uluwwan kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā jā'a wa‘du ūlāhumā ba‘aṡnā ‘alaikum ‘ibādal lanā ulī ba'sin syadīdin fa jāsū khilālad-diyār(i), wa kāna wa‘dam maf‘ūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'duoolaahumaa ba'asnaaa 'alykurr 'ibaadai-lanaaa ulee baasin shadeedin fajaasoo khilaalad diyaar; wa kaana wa'dam maf'oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma radadnā lakumul-karrata ‘alaihim wa amdadnākum bi'amwāliw wa banīna wa ja‘alnākum akṡara nafīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa radadnaa lakumul karrata 'alaihim wa amdad-naakum-bi amwaalinuw wa baneen; wa ja'alnaakum aksara nafeeraa

ayah.transliteration: In aḥsantum aḥsantum li'anfusikum, wa in asa'tum fa lahā, fa iżā jā'a wa‘dul-ākhirati liyasū'ū wujūhakum wa liyadkhulal-masjida kamā dakhalūhu awwala marratiw wa liyutabbirū mā ‘alau tatbīrā(n).
ayah.translation: In ahsantum ahsantum li anfusikum wa in asaatum falahaa; fa izaa jaaa'a wa'dul aakhirati liyasooo'oo wujoo hakum wa liyadkhulul masjida kamaa dakhaloohu awwala marratinw wa liyutabbiroo mass'alaw tatbeera

ayah.transliteration: ‘Asā rabbukum ay yarḥamakum, wa in ‘uttum ‘udnā, wa ja‘alnā jahannama lil-kāfirīna ḥaṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: 'Asaa rabbukum anyyarhamakum; wa in 'uttum 'udnaa; wa ja'alnaa jahannama lilkaafireena haseera

ayah.transliteration: Inna hāżal-qur'āna yahdī lil-latī hiya aqwamu wa yubasysyirul-mu'minīnal-lażīna ya‘malūnaṣ-ṣāliḥāti anna lahum ajran kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Inna haazal Quraana yahdee lillatee hiya aqwamu wa yubashshirul mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati a‘tadnā lahum ‘ażāban alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil aakhirati a'tadnaa lahum 'azaaban aleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yad‘ul-insānu bisy-syarri du‘ā'ahū bil-khair(i), wa kānal-insānu ‘ajūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yad'ul insaanu bishsharri du'aaa 'ahoo bilkhayr; wa kaanal insaanu 'ajoola

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnal-laila wan-nahāra āyataini fa maḥaunā āyatal-laili wa ja‘alnā āyatan-nahāri mubṣiratal litabtagū faḍlam mir rabbikum wa lita‘lamū ‘adadas-sinīna wal-ḥisāb(a), wa kulla syai'in faṣṣalnāhu tafṣīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnal laila wannahaara Aayatayni famahawnaaa Aayatal laili wa ja'alnaaa Aayatan nahaari mubsiratal litabtaghoo fadlam mir Rabbikum wa lita'lamoo 'adadas sineena walhisaab; wa kulla shai'in fassalnaahu tafseelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kulla insānin alzamnāhu ṭā'irahū fī ‘unuqih(ī), wa nukhriju lahū yaumal-qiyāmati kitābay yalqāhu mansyūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kulla insaanin alzamnaahu taaa'irahoo fe 'unuqihee wa nukhriji lahoo Yawmal Qiyaamati kitaabany yalqaahu manshooraa

ayah.transliteration: Iqra' kitābak(a), kafā binafsikal-yauma ‘alaika ḥasībā(n).
ayah.translation: Iqra kitaabak kafaa binafsikal Yawma 'alaika haseebaa

ayah.transliteration: Manihtadā fa innamā yahtadī linafsih(ī), wa man ḍalla fa innamā yaḍillu ‘alaihā, wa lā taziru wāziratuw wizra ukhrā, wa mā kunnā mu‘ażżibīna ḥattā nab‘aṡa rasūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Manihtadaa fa innamaa yahtadee linafsihee wa man dalla fa innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa; wa laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; wa maa kunnaa mu'azzibeena hatta nab'asa Rasoola

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā aradnā an nuhlika qaryatan amarnā mutrafīhā fa fasaqū fīhā fa ḥaqqa ‘alaihal-qaulu fa dammarnāhā tadmīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaaa aradnaaa an nuhlika qaryatan amarnaa mutrafeehaa fafasaqoo feehaa fahaqqa 'alaihal qawlu fadammarnaahaa tadmeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kam ahlaknā minal-qurūni mim ba‘di nūḥ(in), wa kafā birabbika biżunūbi ‘ibādihī khabīram baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kam ahlaknaa minal qurooni mim ba'di Nooh; wa kafaa bi Rabbika bizunoobi 'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Man kāna yurīdul-‘ājilata ‘ajjalnā lahū fīhā mā nasyā'u liman nurīdu ṡumma ja‘alnā lahū jahannam(a), yaṣlāhā mażmūmam madḥūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Man kaana yureedul 'aajilata 'ajjalnaa lahoo feehaa maa nashaaa'u liman nureedu summa ja'alnaa lahoo Jahannama yaslaahaa mazmoomammad hooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa man arādal-ākhirata wa sa‘ā lahā sa‘yahā wa huwa mu'minun fa ulā'ika kāna sa‘yuhum masykūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa man araadal Aakhirata wa sa'aa lahaa sa'yahaa wa huwa mu'minun fa ulaaa'ika kaana sa'yuhum mashkooraa

ayah.transliteration: Kullan numiddu hā'ulā'i wa hā'ulā'i min ‘aṭā'i rabbik(a), wa mā kāna ‘aṭā'u rabbika maḥẓūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Kullan numiddu haaa 'ulaaa'i wa haaa'ulaaa'i min 'ataaa'i rabbik; wa maa kaana 'ataaa'u rabbika mahzooraa

ayah.transliteration: Unẓur kaifa faḍḍalnā ba‘ḍahum ‘alā ba‘ḍ(in), wa lal-ākhiratu akbaru darajātiw wa akbaru tafḍīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Unzur kaifa faddalnaa ba'dahum 'alaa ba'd; wa lal Aakhiratu akbaru darajaatinw wa akbaru tafdeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Lā taj‘al ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhara fa taq‘uda mażmūmam makhżūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Laa taj'al ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fataq'uda mazoomam makhzoolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qaḍā rabbuka allā ta‘budū illā iyyāhu wa bil-wālidaini iḥsānā(n), immā yabluganna ‘indakal-kibara aḥaduhumā au kilāhumā falā taqul lahumā uffiw wa lā tanhar humā wa qul lahumā qaulan karīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qadaa Rabbuka allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaahu wa bilwaalidaini ihsaanaa; immaa yablughanna 'indakal kibara ahaduhumaaa aw kilaahumaa falaa taqul lahumaaa uffinw wa laa tanharhumaa wa qullahumaa qawlan kareemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wakhfiḍ lahumā janāḥaż-żulli minar-raḥmati wa qur rabbirḥamhumā kamā rabbayānī ṣagīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wakhfid lahumaa janaahaz zulli minar rahmati wa qur Rabbir hamhumaa kamaa rabbayaanee sagheera

ayah.transliteration: Rabbukum a‘lamu bimā fī nufūsikum, in takūnū ṣāliḥīna fa innahū kāna lil-awwābīna gafūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Rabbukum a'lamu bimaa fee nufoosikum; in takoonoo saaliheena fa innahoo kaana lil awwaabeena Ghafoooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa āti żal-qurbā ḥaqqahū wal-miskīna wabnas-sabīli wa lā tubażżir tabżīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnas sabeeli wa laa tubazzir tabzeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-mubażżirīna kānū ikhwānasy-syayāṭīn(i), wa kānasy-syaiṭānu lirabbihī kafūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal mubazzireena kaanoo ikhwaanash shayaateeni wa kaanash shaytaanu li Rabbihee kafooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa immā tu‘riḍanna ‘anhumubtigā'a raḥmatim mir rabbika tarjūhā faqul lahum qaulam maisūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa immaa turidanna 'anhumub tighaaa'a rahmatim mir rabbika tarjoohaa faqul lahum qawlam maisooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taj‘al yadaka maglūlatan ilā ‘unuqika wa lā tabsuṭhā kullal-basṭi fa taq‘uda malūmam maḥsūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taj'al yadaka maghloolatan il 'unuqika wa laa tabsut haa kullal basti fataq'uda maloomam mahsooraa

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbaka yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u wa yaqdir(u), innahū kāna bi‘ibādihī khabīram baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Inna Rabbaka yabsuturrizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseera

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taqtulū aulādakum khasy-yata imlāq(in), naḥnu narzuquhum wa iyyākum, inna qatlahum kāna khiṭ'an kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taqtulooo awlaadakum khashyata imlaaq; nahnu narzuquhum wa iyyaakum; inna qatlahum kaana khitan kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taqrabuz-zinā innahū kāna fāḥisyah(tan), wa sā'a sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taqrabuz zinaaa innahoo kaana faahishatanw wa saaa'a sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taqtulun-nafsal-latī ḥarramallāhu illā bil-ḥaqq(i), wa man qutila maẓlūman faqad ja‘alnā liwaliyyihī sulṭānan falā yusrif fil-qatl(i), innahū kāna manṣūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taqtulun nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqq; wa man qutila mazlooman faqad ja'alnaa liwaliyyihee sultaanan falaa yusrif fil qatli innahoo kaana mansooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taqrabū mālal-yatīmi illā bil-latī hiya aḥsanu ḥattā yabluga asyuddah(ū), wa aufū bil-‘ahd(i), innal-‘ahda kāna mas'ūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taqraboo maalal yateemi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu hattaa yablugha ashuddah; wa awfoo bil'ahd, innal 'ahda kaana mas'oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa auful-kaila iżā kiltum wa zinū bil-qisṭāsil-mustaqīm(i), żālika khairuw wa aḥsanu ta'wīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa awful kaila izaa kiltum wa zinoo bilqistaasil mustaqeem; zaalika khairunw wa ahsanu taaweelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taqfu mā laisa laka bihī ‘ilm(un), innas-sam‘a wal-baṣara wal-fu'āda kullu ulā'ika kāna ‘anhu mas'ūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taqfu maa laisa laka bihee 'ilm; innas sam'a walbasara walfu'aada kullu ulaaa'ika kaana 'anhu mas'oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tamsyi fil-arḍi marahā(n), innaka lan takhriqal-arḍa wa lan tablugal-jibāla ṭūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tamshi fil ardi marahan innaka lan takhriqal arda wa lan tablughal jibaala toola

ayah.transliteration: Kullu żālika kāna sayyi'uhū ‘inda rabbika makrūhā(n).
ayah.translation: Kullu zaalika kaana sayyi'uhoo inda Rabbika makroohaa

ayah.transliteration: Żālika mimmā auḥā ilaika rabbuka minal-ḥikmah(ti), wa lā taj‘al ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhara fa tulqā fī jahannama malūmam madḥūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Zaalika mimmaaa awhaaa ilaika Rabbuka minal hikmah; wa laa taj'al ma'allaahi ilaahan aakhara fatulqaa fee Jahannama maloomam mad hooraa

ayah.transliteration: Afa aṣfākum rabbukum bil-banīna wattakhaża minal-malā'ikati ināṡā(n), innakum lataqūlūna qaulan ‘aẓīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Afa asfaakum rabbukum bilbaneena wattakhaza minal malaaa'ikati inaasaa; innakum lataqooloona qawlan 'azeema

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ṣarrafnā fī hāżal-qur'āni liyażżakkarū, wa mā yazīduhum illā nufūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal Quraani liyazzakkaroo wa maa yazeeduhum illaa nufooraa

ayah.transliteration: Qul lau kāna ma‘ahū ālihatun kamā yaqūlūna iżal labtagau ilā żil-‘arsyi sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul law kaana ma'ahooo aalihatun kamaa yaqooloona izal labtaghaw ilaa zil 'Arshi Sabeela

ayah.transliteration: Subḥānahū wa ta‘ālā ‘ammā yaqūlūna ‘uluwwan kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yaqooloona 'uluwwan kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Tusabbiḥu lahus-samāwātus-sab‘u wal-arḍu wa man fīhinn(a), wa im min syai'in illā yusabbiḥu biḥamdihī wa lākil lā tafqahūna tasbīḥahum, innahū kāna ḥalīman gafūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Tusabbihu lahus samaawaatus sab'u wal ardu wa man feehinn; wa im min shai'in illaa yusabbihu bihamdihee wa laakil laa tafqahoona tasbeehahum; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā qara'tal-qur'āna ja‘alnā bainaka wa bainal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ḥijābam mastūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa qaraatal Quraana ja'alnaa bainaka wa bainal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil aakhirati hijaabam mastooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnā ‘alā qulūbihim akinnatan ay yafqahūhu wa fī āżānihim waqrā(n), wa iżā żakarta rabbaka fil-qur'āni waḥdahū wallau ‘alā adbārihim nufūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloo bihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu wa feee aazaanihim waqraa; wa izaa zakarta Rabbaka fil Quraani wahdahoo wallaw 'alaaa adbaarihim nufooraa

ayah.transliteration: Naḥnu a‘lamu bimā yastami‘ūna bihī iż yastami‘ūna ilaika wa iż hum najwā iż yaqūluẓ-ẓālimūna in tattabi‘ūna illā rajulam masḥūrā(n).
ayah.translation: nahnu a'lamu bimaa yastami'oona biheee iz yastami'oona ilaika wa iz hum najwaaa iz yaqooluz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulam mas hooraa

ayah.transliteration: Unẓur kaifa ḍarabū lakal-amṡāla fa ḍallū falā yastaṭī‘ūna sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū a'iżā kunnā ‘iẓāmaw wa rufātan a'innā lamab‘ūṡūna khalqan jadīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalooo'a izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw wa rufaatan 'a innaa lamab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul kūnū ḥijāratan au ḥadīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul koonoo jijaaratan aw hadeedaa

ayah.transliteration: Au khalqam mimmā yakburu fī ṣudūrikum, fa sayaqūlūna may yu‘īdunā, qulil-lażī faṭarakum awwala marrah(tin), fa sayun-giḍūna ilaika ru'ūsahum wa yaqūlūna matā huw(a), qul ‘asā ay yakūna qarībā(n).
ayah.translation: aw khalqam mimmaa yakburu fee sudoorikum; fasa yaqooloona mai yu'eedunaa qulil lazee fatarakum awwala marrah; fasa yunghidoona ilaika ru'oosahum wa yaqooloona mataa huwa qul 'asaaa any yakoona qareeba

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yad‘ūkum fa tastajībūna biḥamdihī wa taẓunnūna il labiṡtum illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma yad'ookum fatastajeeboona bihamdihee wa tazunnoona il labistum illaa qaleela

ayah.transliteration: Wa qul li‘ibādī yaqūlul-latī hiya aḥsan(u), innasy-syaiṭāna yanzagu bainahum, innasy-syaiṭāna kāna lil-insāni ‘aduwwam mubīnā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qul li'ibaadee yaqoolul latee hiya ahsan; innash shaitaana yanzaghu bainahum; innash shaitaana kaana lil insaani 'aduwwam mubeenaa

ayah.transliteration: Rabbukum a‘lamu bikum, iy yasya' yarḥamkum au iy yasya' yu‘ażżibkum, wa mā arsalnāka ‘alaihim wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Rabbukum a'lamu bikum iny yashaaa yarhamkum aw iny yashaa yu'azzibkum; wa maaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim wakeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa rabbuka a‘lamu biman fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa laqad faḍḍalnā ba‘ḍan nabiyyīna ‘alā ba‘ḍiw wa ātainā dāwūda zabūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Rabbuka a'lamu biman fis samaawaati wal lard; wa laqad faddalnaa ba'dan Nabiyyeena 'alaa ba'dinw wa aatainaaa Daawooda Zabooraa

ayah.transliteration: Qulid‘ul-lażīna za‘amtum min dūnihī falā yamlikūna kasyfaḍ-ḍurri ‘ankum wa lā taḥwīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonihee falaa yamlikoona kashfad durri'ankum wa laa tahweelaa

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna yad‘ūna yabtagūna ilā rabbihimul-wasīlata ayyuhum aqrabu wa yarjūna raḥmatahū wa yakhāfūna ‘ażābah(ū), inna ‘ażāba rabbika kāna maḥżūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena yad'oona yabtaghoona ilaa Rabbihimul waseelata ayyuhum aqrabu wa yarjoona rahmatahoo wa yakhaafoona 'azaabah; inna 'azaaba rabbika kaana mahzooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa im min qaryatin illā naḥnu muhlikūhā qabla yaumil-qiyāmati au mu‘ażżibūhā ‘ażāban syadīdā(n), kāna żālika fil-kitābi masṭūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa im min qaryatin illaa Nahnu muhlikoohaa qabla Yawmil Qiyaamati aw mu'az ziboohaa 'azaaban shadeedaa; kaana zaalika fil Kitaabi mastooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā mana‘anā an nursila bil-āyāti  illā an każżaba bihal-awwalūn(a), wa ātainā ṡamūdan-nāqata mubṣiratan fa ẓalamū bihā, wa mā nursilu bil-āyāti illā takhwīfā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa mana'anaaa an nursila bil aayaati illaaa an kazzaba bihal awwaloon; wa aatainaa Samoodan naaqata mubsiratan fazalamoo bihaa; wa maa nursilu bil aayaati illaa takhweefaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qulnā laka inna rabbaka aḥāṭa bin-nās(i), wa mā ja‘alnar-ru'yal-latī araināka illā fitnatal lin-nāsi wasy-syajaratal mal‘ūnata fil-qur'ān(i), wa nukhawwifuhum, famā yazīduhum illā ṭugyānan kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qulnaa laka inna rabbaka ahaata binnaas; wa maa ja'alnar ru'yal lateee arainaaka illaa fitnatal linnaasi washshajaratal mal'oonata fil quraan; wa nukhaw wifuhum famaa yazeeduhum illa tughyaanan kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qulnā lil-malā'ikatisjudū li'ādama fa sajadū illā iblīs(a), qāla a'asjudu liman khalaqta ṭīnā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qulnaa lilma laaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa qaala 'a-asjudu liman khalaqta teena

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ara'aitaka  hāżal-lażī karramta ‘alayya la'in akhkhartani ilā yaumil-qiyāmati la'aḥtanikanna żurriyyatahū illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala ara'aytaka haazal lazee karramta 'alaiya la'in akhhartani ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati la-ah tanikanna zurriyyatahooo illaa qaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Qālażhab faman tabi‘aka minhum fa inna jahannama jazā'ukum jazā'am maufūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaalaz hab faman tabi'aka minhum fa inna Jahannama jazaaa'ukum jazaaa'am mawfooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wastafziz manistaṭa‘ta minhum biṣautika wa ajlib ‘alaihim bikhailika wa rajilika wa syārikūhum fil-amwāli wal-aulādi wa ‘idhum, wa mā ya‘iduhumusy-syaiṭānu illā gurūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wastafziz manis tat'ta minhum bisawtika wa ajlib 'alaihim bikhailika wa rajilika wa shaarik hum fil amwaali wal awlaadi wa 'idhum; wa maa ya'iduhumush Shaitaanu illaa ghurooraa

ayah.transliteration: Inna ‘ibādī laisa laka ‘alaihim sulṭān(un), wa kafā birabbika wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaan; wa kafaa bi Rabbika Wakeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Rabbukumul-lażī yuzjī lakumul-fulka fil-baḥri litabtagū min faḍlih(ī), innahū kāna bikum raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Rabbukumul lazee yuzjee lakumul fulka fil bahri litabtaghoo min fadlih; innahoo kaana bikum Raheemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā massakumuḍ-ḍurru fil-baḥri ḍalla man tad‘ūna illā iyyāh(u), falammā najjākum ilal-barri a‘raḍtum, wa kānal-insānu kafūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa massakumuddurru fil bahri dalla man tad'oona illaaa iyyaahu falammaa najjaakum ilal barri a'radtum; wa kaanal insaanu kafooraa

ayah.transliteration: Afa amintum ay yakhsifa bikum jānibal-barri au yursila ‘alaikum ḥaṣiban ṡumma lā tajidū lakum wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Afa amintum any yakhsifa bikum jaanibal barri aw yursil 'alaikum haasiban summa laa tajidoo lakum wakeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Am amintum ay yu‘īdakum fīhi tāratan ukhrā fa yursila ‘alaikum qāṣifam minar-rīḥi fa yugriqakum bimā kafartum, ṡumma lā tajidū lakum ‘alainā bihī tabī‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Am amintum any yu'eedakum feehi taaratan ukhraa fa yursila 'alaikum qaasifam minar reehi fa yugh riqakum bimaa kafartum summa laa tajidoo lakum 'alainaa bihee tabee'aa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad karramnā banī ādama wa ḥamalnāhum fil-barri wal-baḥri wa razaqnāhum minaṭ-ṭayyibāti wa faḍḍalnāhum ‘alā kaṡīrim mimman khalaqnā tafḍīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad karramnaa Baneee aadama wa hamalnaahum fil barri walbahri wa razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati wa faddalnaahum 'alaa kaseerim mimman khalaqnaa tafdeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Yauma nad‘ū kulla unāsim bi'imāmihim, faman ūtiya katābahū biyamīnihī fa ulā'ika yaqra'ūna kitābahum wa lā yuẓlamūna fatīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma nad'oo kulla unaasim bi imaamihim faman ootiya kitaabahoo bi yameenihee fa ulaaa'ika yaqra'oona kitaabahum wa laa yuzlamoona fateelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa man kāna fī hāżihī a‘mā fa huwa fil-ākhirati a‘mā wa aḍallu sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa man kaana fee haaziheee a'maa fahuwa fil aakhirati a'maa wa adallu sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa in kādū layaftinūnaka ‘anil-lażī auḥainā ilaika litaftariya ‘alainā gairah(ū), wa iżal lattakhażūka khalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa in kaadoo la yaftinoonaka 'anil lazeee awhainaaa ilaika litaftariya 'alainaaa ghairahoo wa izallat takhazooka khaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā an ṡabbatnāka laqad kitta tarkanu ilaihim syai'an qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa law laaa an sabbatnaaka laqad kitta tarkanu ilaihim sha'an qaleela

ayah.transliteration: Iżal-la'ażaqnāka ḍi‘fal-ḥayāti wa ḍi‘fal-mamāti ṡumma lā tajidu laka ‘alainā naṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Izal la azaqnaaka di'falhayaati wa di'fal mamaati summa laa tajidu laka 'alainaa naseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa in kādū layastafizzūnaka minal-arḍi liyukhrijūka minhā wa iżal lā yalbaṡūna khilāfaka illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa in kaadoo la yastafizzoonaka minal ardi liyukhri jooka minhaa wa izal laa yalbasoona khilaafaka illaa qaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Sunnata man qad arsalnā qablaka mir rusulinā wa lā tajidu lisunnatinā taḥwīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Sunnata man qad arsalnaa qablakamir Rusulinaa wa laa tajidu lisunnatinaa tahhweelaa

ayah.transliteration: Aqimiṣ-ṣalāta lidulūkisy-syamsi ilā gasaqil-laili wa qur'ānal-fajr(i), inna qur'ānal-fajri kāna masyhūdā(n).
ayah.translation: Aqimis Salaata liduloo kish shamsi ilaa ghasaqil laili wa quraanal Fajri inna quraa nal Fajri kaana mashhoodaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa minal-laili fa tahajjad bihī nāfilatal lak(a), ‘asā ay yab‘aṡaka rabbuka maqāmam maḥmūdā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa minal laili fatahajjad bihee naafilatal laka 'asaaa any yab'asaka Rabbuka Maqaamam Mahmoodaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qur rabbi adkhilnī mudkhala ṣidqiw wa akhrijnī mukhraja ṣidqiw waj‘al lī mil ladunka sulṭānan naṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qur Rabbi adkhilnee mudkhala sidqinw wa akhrijnee mukhraja sidqinw waj'al lee milladunka sultaanan naseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qul jā'al-ḥaqqu wa zahaqal-bāṭil(u), innal-bāṭila kāna zahūqā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qul jaaa'al haqqu wa zahaqal baatil; innal baatila kaana zahooqaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa nunazzilu minal-qur'āni mā huwa syifā'uw wa raḥmatul lil-mu'minīn(a), wa lā yazīduẓ-ẓālimīna illā khasārā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa nunazzilu minal quraani maa huwa shifaaa'unw wa rahmatul lilmu;mineena wa laa yazeeduz zaalimeena illaa khasaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā an‘amnā ‘alal-insāni a‘raḍa wa na'ā bijānibih(ī), wa iżā massahusy-syarru kāna ya'ūsā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada wa na-aa bijaani bihee wa izaa massahush sharru kaana ya'oosaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul kulluy ya‘malu ‘alā syākilatih(ī), fa rabbukum a‘lamu biman huwa ahdā sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul kulluny ya'malu 'alaa shaakilatihee fa rabbukum a'lamu biman huwa ahdaa sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yas'alūnaka ‘anir-rūḥ(i), qulir-rūḥu min amri rabbī wa mā ūtītum minal-‘ilmi illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yas'aloonaka 'anirrooh; qulir roohu min amri rabbee wa maaa ooteetum minal 'ilmi illaa qaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in syi'nā lanażhabanna bil-lażī auḥainā ilaika ṡumma lā tajidu laka bihī ‘alainā wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in shi'naa lanaz habanna billazeee awhainaaa ilaika summa laa tajidu laka bihee 'alainaa wakeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Illā raḥmatam mir rabbik(a), inna faḍalahū kāna ‘alaika kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Illaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; inna fadlahoo kaana 'alaika kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Qul la'inijtama‘atil-insu wal-jinnu ‘alā ay ya'tū bimiṡli hāżal-qur'āni lā ya'tūna bimiṡlihī wa lau kāna ba‘ḍuhum liba‘ḍin ẓahīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul la'inij tama'atil insu waljinnu 'alaaa any yaatoo bimisli haazal quraani laa yaatoona bimislihee wa law kaana ba'duhum liba 'din zaheeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ṣarrafnā lin-nāsi fī hāżal-qur'āni min kulli maṡal(in), fa abā akṡarun-nāsi illā kufūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qa laqad sarrafnaa linnaasi fee haazal quraani min kulli masalin fa abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū lan nu'mina laka ḥattā tafjura lanā minal-arḍi yambū‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo lan nu'mina laka hattaa tafjura lanaa minal ardi yamboo'aa

ayah.transliteration: Au takūna laka jannatum min nakhīliw wa ‘inabin fa tufajjiral-anhāra khilālahā tafjīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Aw takoona laka jannatum min nakheelinw wa 'inabin fatufajjiral anhaara khilaalahaa tafjeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Au tusqiṭas-samā'a kamā za‘amta ‘alainā kisafan au ta'tiya billāhi wal-malā'ikati qabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Aw tusqitas samaaa'a kamaa za'amta 'alainaa kisafan aw taatiya billaahi walma laaa'ikati qabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Au yakūna laka baitum min zukhrufin au tarqā fis-samā'(i), wa lan nu'mina liruqiyyika ḥattā tunazzila ‘alainā kitāban naqra'uh(ū), qul subḥāna rabbī hal kuntu illā basyarar rasūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Aw yakoona laka baitum min zukhrufin aw tarqaa fis samaaa'i wa lan nu'mina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila 'alainaa kitaaban naqra'uh; qul Subhaana Rabbee hal kuntu illaa basharar Rasoolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā mana‘an-nāsa ay yu'minū iż jā'ahumul-hudā illā an qālū aba‘aṡallāhu basyarar rasūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaaa illaaa an qaalooo aba'asal laahu basharar Rasoolaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul lau kāna fil-arḍi malā'ikatuy yamsyūna muṭma'innīna lanazzalnā ‘alaihim minas-samā'i malakar rasūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul law kaana fil ardi malaaa 'ikatuny yamshoona mutma'inneena lanazzalnaa 'alaihim minas samaaa'i malakar Rasoolaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul kafā billāhi syahīdam bainī wa bainakum, innahū kāna bi‘ibādihī khabīram baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee wa bainakum; innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yahdillāhu fa huwal-muhtad(i), wa may yuḍlil falan tajida lahum auliyā'a min dūnih(ī), wa naḥsyuruhum yaumal-qiyāmati ‘alā wujūhihim ‘umyaw wa bukmaw wa ṣummā(n), ma'wāhum jahannam(u), kullamā khabat zidnāhum sa‘īrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa mai yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad; wa mai yudlil falan tajida lahum awliyaaa'a min doonih; wa nahshuruhum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'alaa wujoohihim umyanw wa bukmanw wa summaa; maa waahum Jahannamu kullamaa khabat zidnaahum sa'eeraa

ayah.transliteration: Żālika jazā'uhum bi'annahum kafarū bi'āyātinā wa qālū a'iżā kunnā ‘iẓāmaw wa rufātan a'innā lamab‘ūṡūna khalqan jadīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Zaalika jazaa'uhum biannahum kafaroo bi aayaatinaa wa qaalooo 'a izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw wa rufaatan'a innaa lamaboosoona khalqan jadeedaa

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau annallāhal-lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa qādirun ‘alā ay yakhluqa miṡlahum wa ja‘ala lahum ajalal lā raiba fīh(i), fa abaẓ-ẓālimūna illā kufūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda qaadirun 'alaaa any yakhluqa mislahum wa ja'ala lahum ajalal laa raiba fee; fa abaz zaalimoona illaa kufooraa

ayah.transliteration: Qul lau antum tamlikūna khazā'ina raḥmati rabbī iżal la'amsaktum khasy-yatal-infāq(i), wa kānal-insānu qatūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul law antum tamlikoona khazaaa'ina rahmati Rabbeee izal la amsaktum khash yatal infaaq; wa kaanal insaanu qatooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsā tis‘a āyātim bayyinātin fas'al banī isrā'īla iż jā'ahum fa qāla lahū fir‘aunu innī la'aẓunnuka yā mūsā masḥūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosaa tis'a Aayaatim baiyinaatin fas'al Baneee Israaa'eela iz jaaa'ahum faqaala lahoo Fir'awnu inee la azunnuka yaa Moosaa mas hooraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla laqad ‘alimta mā anzala hā'ulā'i illā rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍi baṣā'ir(a), wa innī la'aẓunnuka yā fir‘aunu maṡbūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala laqad 'alimta maaa anzala haaa'ulaaa'i illaa Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi basaaa'ira wa innee la azun nuka yaa Fir'awnu masbooraa

ayah.transliteration: Fa arāda ay yastafizzahum minal arḍi fa agraqnāhu wa mam ma‘ahū jamī‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa araada any yastafizzahum minal ardi fa aghraqnaahu wa mam ma'ahoo jamee'aa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qulnā mim ba‘dihī libanī isrā'īlaskunul-arḍa fa iżā jā'a wa‘dul-ākhirati ji'nā bikum lafīfā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qulnaa mim ba'dihee li Baneee Israaa'eelas kunul arda faizaa jaaa'a wa'dulaakhirati ji'naa bikum lafeefaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa bil-ḥaqqi anzalnāhu wa bil-ḥaqqi nazal(a), wa mā arsalnāka illā mubasysyiraw wa nażīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa bilhaqqi anzalnaahu wa bilhaqqi nazal; wa maaa arsalnaaka illaa mubash shiranw wa nazeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qur'ānan faraqnāhu litaqra'ahū ‘alan-nāsi ‘alā mukṡiw wa nazzalnāhu tanzīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa quraanan faraqnaahu litaqra ahoo 'alan naasi 'alaa muksinw wa nazzalnaahu tanzeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul āminū bihī au lā tu'minū, innal-lażīna ūtul-‘ilma min qablihī iżā yutlā ‘alaihim yakhirrūna lil-ażqāni sujjadā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul aaaniminoo biheee aw laa tu'minoo; innal lazeena ootul 'ilma min qabliheee izaa yutlaa 'alaihim yakhirroona lil azqaani sujjadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna subḥāna rabbinā in kāna wa‘du rabbinā lamaf‘ūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona Subhaana Rabbinaaa in kaana wa'du Rabbinaa lamaf'oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yakhirrūna lil-ażqāni yabkūna wa yazīduhum khusyū‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yakhirroona lil azqaani yabkoona wa yazeeduhum khushoo'aa

ayah.transliteration: Qulid‘ullāha awid‘ur-raḥmān(a), ayyam mā tad‘ū fa lahul-asmā'ul-ḥusnā, wa lā tajhar biṣalātika wa lā tukhāfit bihā wabtagi baina żālika sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qulid'ul laaha awid'ur Rahmaana ayyam maa tad'oo falahul asmaaa'ul Husnaa; wa laa tajhar bi Salaatika wa laa tukhaafit bihaa wabtaghi baina zaalika sabeela

ayah.transliteration: Wa qulil-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī lam yattakhiż waladaw wa lam yakul lahū syarīkun fil-mulki wa lam yakul lahū waliyyum minaż-żulli wa kabbirhu takbīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qulil hamdu lillaahil lazee lam yattakhiz waladanw wa lam yakul lahoo shareekun fil mulki wa lam yakul lahoo waliyyum minaz zulli wa kabbirhu takbeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī anzala ‘alā ‘abdihil-kitāba wa lam yaj‘al lahū ‘iwajā(n).
ayah.translation: Alhamdu lillaahil lazeee anzala 'alaa 'abdihil kitaaba wa lam yaj'al lahoo 'iwajaa

ayah.transliteration: Qayyimal liyunżira ba'san syadīdam mil ladunhu wa yubasysyiral-mu'minīnal-lażīna ya‘malūnaṣ-ṣāliḥāti anna lahum ajran ḥasanā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaiyimal liyunzira baasan shadeedam mil ladunhu wa yubashshiral mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran hasanaa

ayah.transliteration: Mākiṡīna fīhi abadā(n).
ayah.translation: Maakiseena feehi abadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yunżiral-lażīna qāluttakhażallāhu waladā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yunziral lazeena qaalut takhazal laahu waladaa

ayah.transliteration: Mā lahum bihī min ‘ilmiw wa lā li'ābā'ihim, kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwāhihim, iy yaqūlūna illā każibā(n).
ayah.translation: Maa lahum bihee min 'ilminw wa laa li aabaaa'ihim; kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwaahihim; iny yaqooloona illaa kazibaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa la‘allaka bākhi‘un nafsaka ‘alā āṡārihim illam yu'minū bihāżal-ḥadīṡi asafā(n).
ayah.translation: Fala'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka 'alaaa aasaarihim illam yu;minoo bihaazal hadeesi asafaa

ayah.transliteration: Innā ja‘alnā mā ‘alal-arḍi zīnatal lahā linabluwahum ayyuhum aḥsanu ‘amalā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaa ja'alnaa ma 'alal ardi zeenatal lahaa linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu 'amalaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa innā lajā‘ilūna mā ‘alaihā ṣa‘īdan juruzā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa innaa lajaa 'iloona maa 'alaihaa sa'aeedan juruzaa

ayah.transliteration: Am ḥasibta anna aṣḥābal-kahfi war-raqīmi kānū min āyātinā ‘ajabā(n).
ayah.translation: Am hasibta anna Ashaabal Kahfi war Raqeemi kaanoo min Aayaatinaa 'ajabaa

ayah.transliteration: Iż awal-fityatu ilal-kahfi fa qālū rabbanā ātinā mil ladunka raḥmataw wa hayyi' lanā min amrinā rasyadā(n).
ayah.translation: Iz awal fityatu ilal Kahfi faqaaloo Rabbanaaa aatinaa mil ladunka rahmatanw wa haiyi' lanaa min amrinaa rashadaa

ayah.transliteration: Faḍarabnā ‘alā āżānihim fil-kahfi sinīna ‘adadā(n).
ayah.translation: Fadarabnaa 'alaaa aazaanihim fil Kahfi seneena 'adadaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ba‘aṡnāhum lina‘lama ayyul-ḥizbaini aḥṣā limā labiṡū amadā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa ba'asnaahum lina'lama ayyul hizbaini ahsaa limaa labisooo amadaa

ayah.transliteration: Naḥnu naquṣṣu ‘alaika naba'ahum bil-ḥaqq(i), innahum fityatun āmanū birabbihim wa zidnāhum hudā(n).
ayah.translation: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika naba ahum bilhaqq; innahum fityatun aamanoo bi Rabbihim wa zidnaahum hudaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa rabaṭnā ‘alā qulūbihim iż qāmū fa qālū rabbunā rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍi lan nad‘uwa min dūnihī ilāhal laqad qulnā iżan syaṭaṭā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa rabatnaa 'alaa quloo bihim iz qaamoo faqaaloo Rabbunaa Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi lan nad'uwa min dooniheee ilaahal laqad qulnaaa izan shatataa

ayah.transliteration: Hā'ulā'i qaumunattakhażū min dūnihī ālihah(tan), lau lā ya'tūna ‘alaihim bisulṭānim bayyin(in), faman aẓlamu mimmaniftarā ‘alallāhi każibā(n).
ayah.translation: Haaa'ulaaa'i qawmunat takhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal law laa yaatoona 'alaihim bisultaanim baiyin; faman azlamu mimmaniftaraa 'alal laahi kazibaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżi‘tazaltumūhum wa mā ya‘budūna illallāha fa'wū ilal-kahfi yansyur lakum rabbukum mir raḥmatihī wa yuhayyi' lakum min amrikum mirfaqā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izi'tazal tumoohum wa maa ya'budoona illal laaha faawooo ilal kahfi yanshur lakum Rabbukum mir rahmatihee wa yuhaiyi' lakum min amrikum mirfaqa

ayah.transliteration: Wa tarasy-syamsa iżā ṭala‘at tazāwaru ‘an kahfihim żātal-yamīni wa iżā garabat taqriḍuhum żātasy-syimāli wa hum fī fajwatim minh(u), żālika min āyātillāh(i), may yahdillāhu fa huwal-muhtadi wa may yuḍlil falan tajida lahū waliyyam mursyidā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa tarash shamsa izaa tala'at tazaawaru 'an kahfihim zaatal yameeni wa izaa gharabat taqriduhum zaatash shimaali wa hum fee fajwatim minh; zaalika min Aayaatillaah; mai yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad, wa mai yudlil falan tajida lahoo waliyyam murshidaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa taḥsabuhum aiqāẓaw wa hum ruqūd(un), wa nuqallibuhum żātal-yamīni wa żātasy-syimāl(i), wa kalbuhum bāsiṭun żirā‘aihi bil-waṣīd(i), lawiṭṭala‘ta ‘alaihim lawallaita minhum firāraw wa lamuli'ta minhum ru‘bā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa tahsabuhum ayqaazanw wa hum ruqood; wa nuqallibuhum zaatal yameeni wa zaatash shimaali wa kalbuhum baasitun ziraa'ayhi bilwaseed; lawit tala'ta 'alaihim la wallaita minhum firaaranw wa lamuli'ta minhum rubaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika ba‘aṡnāhum liyatasā'alū bainahum, qāla qā'ilum minhum kam labiṡtum, qālū labiṡnā yauman au ba‘ḍa yaum(in), qālū rabbukum a‘lamu bimā labiṡtum, fab‘aṡū aḥadakum biwariqikum hāżihī ilal-madīnati falyanẓur ayyuhā azkā ṭa‘āman falya'tikum  birizqim minhu walyatalaṭṭaf wa lā yusy‘iranna bikum aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika ba'asnaahum liyatasaaa'aloo bainahum; qaala qaaa'ilum minhum kam labistum qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawm; qaaloo Rabbukum a'almu bimaa labistum fab'asooo ahadakum biwariqikum haazihee ilal madeenati falyanzur ayyuhaaa azkaa ta'aaman falyaatikum birizqim minhu walyatalattaf wa laa yush'iranna bikum ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Innahum iy yaẓharū ‘alaikum yarjumūkum au yu‘īdūkum fī millatihim wa lan tufliḥū iżan abadā(n).
ayah.translation: Innahum iny yazharoo 'alaikum yarjumookum aw yu'eedookum fee millatihim wa lan tuflihooo izan abadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika a‘ṡarnā ‘alaihim liya‘lamū anna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqquw wa annas-sā‘ata lā raiba fīhā, iż yatanāza‘ūna bainahum amrahum fa qālubnū ‘alaihim bun-yānā(n), rabbuhum a‘lamu bihim, qālal-lażīna galabū ‘alā amrihim lanattakhiżanna ‘alaihim masjidā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika a'sarnaa 'alaihim liya'lamooo anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wa annas Saa'ata laa raiba feehaa iz yatanaaza'oona bainahum amrahum faqaalub noo 'alaihim bunyaanaa; Rabbuhum a'lamu bihim; qaalal lazeena ghalaboo 'alaaa amrihim lanat takhizanna 'alaihim masjidaa

ayah.transliteration: Sayaqūlūna ṡalāṡatur rābi‘uhum kalbuhum, wa yaqūlūna khamsatun sādisuhum kalbuhum rajmam bil-gaib(i), wa yaqūlūna sab‘atuw wa ṡāminuhum kalbuhum, qur rabbī a‘lamu bi‘iddatihim mā ya‘lamuhum illā qalīl(un), falā tumāri fīhim illā mirā'an ẓāhirā(n), wa lā tastafti fīhim minhum aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Sa yaqooloona salaasatur raabi'uhum kalbuhum wa yaqooloona khamsatun saadisuhum kalbuhum rajmam bilghaib; wa yaqooloona sab'atunw wa saaminuhum kalbuhum; qur Rabbeee a'lamu bi'iddatihim maa ya'lamuhum illaa qaleel; falaa tumaari feehim illaa miraaa'an zaahiranw wa laa tastafti feehim minhum ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taqūlanna lisyai'in innī fā‘ilun żālika gadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taqoolanna lishai'in innee faa'ilun zaalika ghadaa

ayah.transliteration: Illā ay yasyā'allāh(u), ważkur rabbaka iżā nasīta wa qul ‘asā ay yahdiyani rabbī li'aqraba  min hāżā rasyadā(n).
ayah.translation: Illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; wazkur Rabbaka izaa naseeta wa qul 'asaaa any yahdiyani Rabbee li aqraba min haazaa rashadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa labiṡū fī kahfihim ṡalāṡa mi'atin sinīna wazdādū tis‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa labisoo fee kahfihim salaasa mi'atin sineena wazdaadoo tis'aa

ayah.transliteration: Qulillāhu a‘lamu bimā labiṡū, lahū gaibus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), abṣir bihī wa asmi‘, mā lahum min dūnihī miw waliyy(in), wa lā yusyriku fī ḥukmihī aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Qulil laahu a'lamu bimaa labisoo lahoo ghaibus samaawaati wal ardi absir bihee wa asmi'; maa lahum min doonihee minw waliyyinw wa laa yushriku fee hukmihee ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Watlu mā ūḥiya ilaika min kitābi rabbik(a), lā mubaddila likalimātih(ī), wa lan tajida min dūnihī multaḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Watlu maaa oohiya ilaika min Kitaabi Rabbika laa mubaddila li Kalimaatihee wa lan tajida min doonihee multahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Waṣbir nafsaka ma‘al-lażīna yad‘ūna rabbahum bil-gadāti wal-‘asyiyyi yurīdūna wajhahū wa lā ta‘du ‘aināka ‘anhum, turīdu zīnatal-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa lā tuṭi‘ man agfalnā qalbahū ‘an żikrinā wattaba‘a hawāhu wa kāna amruhū furuṭā(n).
ayah.translation: Wasbir nafsaka ma'al lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal'ashiyyi yureedoona Wajhahoo wa laa ta'du 'aynaaka 'anhum tureedu zeenatal hayaatid dunyaa wa laa tuti' man aghfalnaa qalbahoo 'an zikrinaa wattaba'a hawaahu wa kaana amruhoo furutaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qulil-ḥaqqu mir rabbikum, faman syā'a falyu'miw wa man syā'a falyakfur, innā a‘tadnā liẓ-ẓālimīna nārā(n), aḥāṭa bihim surādiquhā, wa iy yastagīṡū yugāṡū bimā'in kal-muhli yasywil-wujūh(a), bi'sasy-syarāb(u), wa sā'at murtafaqā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qulil haqqu mir Rabbikum faman shaaa'a falyu minw wa man shaaa'a falyakfur; innaaa a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena Naaran ahaata bihim suraadiquhaa; wa iny yastagheesoo yaghaasoo bimaaa'in kalmuhli yashwil wujooh' bi'sash-sharaab; wa saaa'at murtafaqaa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti innā lā nuḍī‘u ajra man aḥsana ‘amalā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati innaa laa nudee'u ajra man ahsana 'amalaa

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika lahum jannātu ‘adnin tajrī min taḥtihimul-anhāru yuḥallauna fīhā min asāwira min żahabiw wa yalbasūna ṡiyāban khuḍram min sundusiw wa istabraqim muttaki'īna fīhā ‘alal-arā'ik(i), ni‘maṡ-ṡawāb(u), wa ḥasunat murtafaqā(n).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika lahum Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihimul anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw wa yalbasoona siyaaban khudram min sundusinw wa istabraqim muttaki'eena feehaa 'alal araaa'ik; ni'mas sawaab; wa hasunat murtafaqaa

ayah.transliteration: Waḍrib lahum maṡalar rajulaini ja‘alnā li'aḥadihimā jannataini min a‘nābiw wa ḥafafnāhumā binakhliw wa ja‘alnā bainahumā zar‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Wadrib lahum masalar rajulaini ja'alnaa li ahadihimaa jannataini min a'naabinw wa hafafnaahumaa binakhilinw wa ja'alnaa bainahumaa zar'aa

ayah.transliteration: Kiltal-jannataini ātat ukulahā wa lam taẓlim minhu syai'ā(n), wa fajjarnā khilālahumā naharā(n).
ayah.translation: Kiltal jannataini aatat ukulahaa wa lam tazlim minhu shai'anw wa fajjarnaa khi laalahumaa naharaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kāna lahū ṡamar(un), fa qāla liṣāḥibihī wa huwa yuḥāwiruhū ana akṡaru minka mālaw wa a‘azzu nafarā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kaana lahoo samarun faqaala lisaahibihee wa huwa yuhaawiruhoo ana aksaru minka maalanw wa a'azzu nafaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa dakhala jannatahū wa huwa ẓālimul linafsih(ī), qāla mā aẓunnu an tabīda hāżihī abadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa dakhala jannatahoo wa huwa zaalimul linafsihee qaala maaa azunnu an tabeeda haaziheee abadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā aẓunnus-sā‘ata qā'imataw wa la'ir rudittu ilā rabbī la'ajidanna khairam minhā munqalabā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw wa la'ir rudittu ilaa Rabbee la ajidanna khairam minhaa munqalabaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lahū ṣāḥibuhū  wa huwa yuḥāwiruhū akafarta bil-lażī khalaqaka min turābin ṡumma min nuṭfatin ṡumma sawwāka rajulā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala lahoo saahibuhoo wa huwa yuhaawiruhooo akafarta billazee khalaqaka min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa sawwaaka rajulaa

ayah.transliteration: Lākinna huwallāhu rabbī wa lā usyriku birabbī aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Laakinaa Huwal laahu Rabbee wa laa ushriku bi Rabbeee ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā iż dakhalta jannataka qulta mā syā'allāh(u), lā quwwata illā billāh(i), in tarani ana aqalla minka mālaw wa waladā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa law laaa iz dakhalta jannataka qulta maa shaaa'al laahu laa quwwata illaa billaah; in tarani ana aqalla minka maalanw wa waladaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa ‘asā rabbī ay yu'tiyani khairam min jannatika wa yursila ‘alaihā ḥusbānam minas-samā'i fa tuṣbiḥa ṣa‘īdan zalaqā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa'asaa Rabeee any yu'tiyani khairam min jannatika wa yursila 'alaihaa husbaanam minas samaaa'i fatusbiha sa'eedan zalaqaa

ayah.transliteration: Au yuṣbiḥa mā'uhā gauran falan tastaṭī‘a lahū ṭalabā(n).
ayah.translation: Aw yusbiha maaa'uhaaa ghawran falan tastatee'a lahoo talabaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa uḥīṭa biṡamarihī fa aṣbaḥa yuqallibu kaffaihi ‘alā mā anfaqa fīhā wa hiya khāwiyatun ‘alā ‘urūsyihā wa yaqūlu yā laitanī lam usyrik birabbī aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa uheeta bisamarihee faasbaha yuqallibu kaffaihi 'alaa maaa anfaqa feehaa wa hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa wa yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam ushrik bi Rabbeee ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lam takul lahū fi'atuy yanṣurūnahū min dūnillāhi wa mā kāna muntaṣirā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa lam takul lahoo fi'atuny yansuroonahoo min doonil laahi wa maa kaana muntasiraa

ayah.transliteration: Hunālikal-walāyatu lillāhil-ḥaqq(i), huwa khairun ṡawābaw wa khairun ‘uqbā(n).
ayah.translation: Hunaalikal walaayatu lillaahil haqq; huwa khairun sawaabanw wa khairun 'uqbaa

ayah.transliteration: Waḍrib lahum maṡalal-ḥayātid-dun-yā kamā'in anzalnāhu minas-samā'i fakhtalaṭa bihī nabātul-arḍi fa aṣbaḥa hasyīman tażrūhur-riyāḥ(u), wa kānallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'im muqtadirā(n).
ayah.translation: Wadrib lahum masalal hayaatid dunyaa kamaaa'in anzalnaahu minas samaaa'i fakhtalata bihee nabaatul ardi fa asbaha hasheeman tazroo hur riyaah; wa kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'im muqtadiraa

ayah.transliteration: Al-mālu wal-banūna zīnatul-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wal-bāqiyātuṣ-ṣāliḥātu khairun ‘inda rabbika ṡawābaw wa khairun amalā(n).
ayah.translation: Almaalu walbanoona zeenatul hayaatid dunya wal baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw wa khairun amalaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma nusayyirul-jibāla wa taral-arḍa  bārizah(tan), wa ḥasyarnāhum falam nugādir minhum aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yawma nusaiyirul jibaala wa taral arda baariza tanw wa hasharnaahum falam nughaadir minhum ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘uriḍū ‘alā rabbika ṣaffā(n), laqad ji'tumūnā kamā khalaqnākum awwala marratim bal za‘amtum allan naj‘ala lakum mau‘idā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa 'uridoo 'alaa Rabbika saffaa, laqad ji'tumoonaa kamaa khalaqnaakum awala marrah; bal za'amtum allannaj'ala lakum maw'idaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa wuḍi‘al-kitābu fa taral-mujrimīna musyfiqīna mimmā fīhi wa yaqūlūna yā wailatanā mā lihāżal-kitābi lā yugādiru ṣagīrataw wa lā kabīratan illā aḥṣāhā, wa wajadū mā ‘amilū ḥaḍirā(n), wa lā yaẓlimu rabbuka aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa wudi'al kitaabu fataral mujrimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa feehi wa yaqooloona yaa wailatanaa maa lihaazal kitaabi laa yughaadiru saghee ratanw wa laa kabeeratan illaaa ahsaahaa; wa wajadoo maa 'amiloo haadiraa; wa laa yazlimu Rabbuka ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qulnā lil-malā'ikatisjudū li'ādama fa sajadū illā iblīs(a), kāna minal-jinni fa fasaqa ‘an amri rabbih(ī), afa tattakhiżūnahū wa żurriyyatahū auliyā'a min dūnī wa hum lakum ‘aduww(un), bi'sa liẓ-ẓālimīna badalā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qulnaa lilma laaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa kaana minal jinni fafasaqa 'an amri Rabbih; afatattakhizoonahoo wa zurriyatahooo awliyaaa'a min doonee wa hum lakum 'aduww; bi'sa lizzaalimeena badalaa

ayah.transliteration: Mā asyhattuhum khalqas-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa lā khalqa anfusihim, wa mā kuntu muttakhiżal-muḍillīna ‘aḍudā(n).
ayah.translation: Maaa ash hattuhum khalqas samaawaati wal ardi wa laa khalqa anfusihim wa maa kuntu muttakizal mudilleena 'adudaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yaqūlu nādū syurakā'iyal-lażīna za‘amtum fa da‘auhum falam yastajībū lahum wa ja‘alnā bainahum maubiqā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yaqoolu naadoo shurakaaa'i yal lazeena za'amtum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum wa ja'alnaa bainahum maw biqaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ra'al-mujrimūnan nāra fa ẓannū annahum muwāqi‘ūhā wa lam yajidū ‘anhā maṣrifā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ra al mujrimoonan Naara fazannooo annahum muwaaqi'oohaa wa lam yajidoo 'anhaa masrifaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ṣarrafnā fī hāżal-qur'āni lin-nāsi min kulli maṡal(in), wa kānal-insānu akṡara syai'in jadalā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal quraani linnaasi mn kulli masal; wa kaanal insaanu aksara shai'in jadalaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā mana‘an-nāsa ay yu'minū iż jā'ahumul-hudā wa yastagfirū rabbahum illā an ta'tiyahum sunnatul-awwalīna au ya'tiyahumul-‘ażābu qubulā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaa wa yastaghfiroo Rabbahum illaaa an taatiyahum sunnatul awwaleena aw yaatiyahumul 'azaabu qubulaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā nursilul-mursalīna illā mubasysyirīna wa munżirīn(a), wa yujādilul-lażīna kafarū bil-bāṭili liyudḥiḍū bihil-ḥaqqa wattakhażū āyātī wa mā unżirū huzuwā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa nursilul mursaleena illaa mubashshireena wa munzireen; wa yujaadilul lazeena kafaroo bilbaatili liyudhidoo bihil haqqa wattakhazooo Aayaatee wa maaa unziroo huzuwaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa man aẓlamu mimman żukkira bi'āyāti rabbihī fa a‘raḍa ‘anhā wa nasiya mā qaddamat yadāh(u), innā ja‘alnā ‘alā qulūbihim akinnatan ay yafqahūhu  wa fī āżānihim waqrā(n), wa in tad‘uhum ilal-hudā falay yahtadū iżan abadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa man azlamu mimman zukkira bi ayaati Rabbihee fa-a'rada 'anhaa wa nasiya maa qaddamat yadaah; innaa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloobihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu wa feee aazaanihim waqraa; wa in tad'uhum ilal hudaa falany yahtadooo izan abadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa rabbukal-gafūru żur-raḥmah(ti), lau yu'ākhiżuhum bimā kasabū la‘ajjala lahumul-‘ażāb(a), bal lahum mau‘idul lay yajidū min dūnihī mau'ilā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Rabbukal Ghafooru zur rahmati law yu'aakhi zuhum bimaa kasaboo la'ajala lahumul 'azaab; bal lahum maw'idul lany yajidoo min doonihee maw'ilaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa tilkal-qurā ahlaknāhum lammā ẓalamū wa ja‘alnā limahlikihim mau‘idā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa tkal quraaa ahlak nahum lammaa zulamoo wa ja'alnaa limahlikihim maw'idaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qāla mūsā lifatāhu lā abraḥu ḥattā abluga majma‘al-baḥraini au amḍiya ḥuqubā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaalaa Moosaa lifataahu laaa abrahu hattaaa ablugha majma'al bahrayni aw amdiya huqubaa

ayah.transliteration: Falammā balagā majma‘a bainihimā nasiyā ḥūtahumā fattakhaża sabīlahū fil-baḥri sarabā(n).
ayah.translation: Falammaa balaghaa majma'a bainihimaa nasiyaa hootahumaa fattakhaza sabeelahoo fil bahri sarabaa

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jāwazā qāla lifatāhu ātinā gadā'anā laqad laqīnā min safarinā hāżā naṣabā(n).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaawazaa qaala lifataahu aatinaa ghadaaa'anaa laqad laqeena min safarinaa haazaa nasabaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ara'aita iż awainā ilaṣ-ṣakhrati fa innī nasītul-ḥūt(a), wa mā ansānīhu illasy-syaiṭanu an ażkurah(ū), wattakhaża sabīlahū fil-baḥri ‘ajabā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala ara'ayta iz awainaaa ilas sakhrati fa innee naseetul hoota wa maaa ansaaneehu illash Shaitaanu an azkurah; wattakhaza sabeelahoo fil bahri'ajabaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla żālika mā kunnā nabg(i), fartaddā ‘alā āṡārihimā qaṣaṣā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala zaalika maa kunnaa nabgh; fartaddaa 'alaa aasaari him maa qasasaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa wajadā ‘abdam min ‘ibādinā ātaināhu raḥmatam min ‘indinā wa ‘allamnāhu mil ladunnā ‘ilmā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa wajadaa 'abdam min 'ibaadinaaa aatainaahu Rahmatam min 'indinaa wa 'allamnaahu mil ladunnaa 'ilmaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lahū mūsā hal attabi‘uka ‘alā an tu‘allimani mimmā ‘ullimta rusydā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala lahoo Moosaa hal attabi'uka 'alaaa an tu'allimani mimmaa 'ullimta rushdaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innaka lan tastaṭī‘a ma‘iya ṣabrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaalaa innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kaifa taṣbiru ‘alā mā lam tuḥiṭ bihī khubrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kaifa tasbiru 'alaa maa lam tuhit bihee khubraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla satajidunī in syā'allāhu ṣābiraw wa lā a‘ṣī laka amrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala satajiduneee in shaa 'al laahu saabiranw wa laaa a'see laka amraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fa inittaba‘tanī falā tas'alnī ‘an syai'in ḥattā uḥdiṡa laka minhu żikrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala fa init taba'tanee falaa tas'alnee 'an shai'in hattaaa uhdisa laka minhu zikraa

ayah.transliteration: Fanṭalaqā, ḥattā iżā rakibā fis-safīnati khara ahā, qāla akharaqtahā litugriqa ahlahā, laqad ji'ta syai'an imrā(n).
ayah.translation: Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaa rakibaa fis safeenati kharaqahaa qaala akharaqtahaa litughriqa ahlahaa laqad ji'ta shai'an imraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭī‘a ma‘iya ṣabrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala alam aqul innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lā tu'ākhiżnī bimā nasītu wa lā turhiqnī min amrī ‘usrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala laa tu'aakhiznee bimaa naseetu wa laa turhiqnee min amree 'usraa

ayah.transliteration: Fanṭalaqā, ḥattā iżā laqiyā gulāman fa qatalah(ū), qāla aqatalta nafsan zakiyyatam bigairi nafs(in), laqad ji'ta syai'an nukrā(n).
ayah.translation: Fantalaqaa hattaa izaa laqiyaa ghulaaman faqatalahoo qaala aqatalta nafsan zakiy yatam bighairi nafs; laqad ji'ta shai'an nukraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭī‘a ma‘iya ṣabrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla in sa'altuka ‘an syai'im ba‘dahā falā tuṣāḥibnī, qad balagta mil ladunnī ‘użrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala in sa altuka 'an shai'im ba'dahaa falaa tusaahibnee qad balaghta mil ladunnee 'uzraa

ayah.transliteration: Fanṭalaqā, ḥattā iżā atayā ahla qaryatinistaṭ‘amā ahlahā fa abau ay yuḍayyifūhumā fa wajadā fīhā jidāray yurīdu ay yaqaḍḍa fa aqāmah(ū), qāla lau syi'ta lattakhażta ‘alaihi ajrā(n).
ayah.translation: Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaaa atayaaa ahla qaryatinis tat'amaaa ahlahaa fa abaw any yudaiyifoohumaa fawajadaa feehaa jidaarany yureedu any yanqadda fa aqaamah; qaala law shi'ta lattakhazta 'alaihi ajraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hāżā firāqu bainī wa bainik(a), sa'unabbi'uka bita'wīli mā lam tastaṭī‘ ‘alaihi ṣabrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala haazaa firaaqu bainee wa bainik; sa unabi 'uka bitaaweeli maa lam tastati' 'alaihi sabraa

ayah.transliteration: Ammas-safīnatu fa kānat limasākīna ya‘malūna fil-baḥri fa arattu an a‘ībahā, wa kāna warā'ahum malikuy ya'khużu kulla safīnatin gaṣbā(n).
ayah.translation: Ammas safeenatu fakaanat limasaakeena ya'maloona fil bahri fa arattu an a'eebahaa wa kaana waraaa' ahum malikuny yaakhuzu kulla safeenatin ghasbaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal-gulāmu fa kāna abawāhu mu'minaini fa khasyīnā ay yurhiqahumā ṭugyānaw wa kufrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa aammal ghulaamu fakaana abawaahu mu'minaini fakhasheenaaa any yurhiqa humaa tughyaananw wa kufraa

ayah.transliteration: Fa aradnā ay yubdilahumā rabbuhumā khairam minhu zakātaw wa aqraba ruḥmā(n).
ayah.translation: Faradnaa any yubdila humaa Rabbuhumaa khairam minhu zakaatanw wa aqraba ruhmaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal-jidāru fa kāna ligulāmaini yatīmaini fil-madīnati wa kāna taḥtahū kanzul lahumā wa kāna abūhumā ṣāliḥā(n), fa arāda rabbuka ay yablugā asyuddahumā wa yastakhrijā kanzahumā raḥmatam mir rabbik(a), wa mā fa‘altuhū ‘an amrī, żālika ta'wīlu mā lam tasṭī‘ ‘alaihi ṣabrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ammal jidaaru fakaana lighulaamaini yateemaini fil madeenati wa kaana tahtahoo kanzul lahumaa wa kaana aboohumaa saalihan fa araada Rabbuka any yablughaaa ashuddahumaa wa yastakhrijaa kanzahumaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; wa maa fa'altuhoo 'an amree; zaalika taaweelu maa lam tasti' 'alaihi sabra

ayah.transliteration: Wa yas'alūnaka ‘an żil qarnain(i), qul sa'atlū ‘alaikum minhu żikrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yas'aloonaka 'an Zil Qarnaini qul sa atloo 'alaikum minhu zikraa

ayah.transliteration: Innā makkannā lahū fil-arḍi wa ātaināhu min kulli syai'in sababā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaa makkannaa lahoo fil ardi wa aatainaahu min kulli shai'in sababaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa atba‘a sababā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa atba'a sababaa

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā balaga magribasy-syamsi wajadahā tagrubu fī ‘ainin ḥami'atiw wa wajada ‘indahā qaumā(n), qulnā yā żal-qarnaini immā an tu‘ażżiba wa immā an tattakhiża fīhim ḥusnā(n).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa balagha maghribash shamsi wajadahaaa taghrubu fee 'aynin hami'a tinw wa wajada 'indahaa qawmaa; qulnaa yaa Zal Qarnaini immaaa an tu'az ziba wa immaaa an tattakhiza feehim husnaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ammā man ẓalama fa saufa nu‘ażżibuhū ṡumma yuraddu ilā rabbihī fa yu‘ażżibuhū ‘ażāban nukrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala amaa man zalama fasawfa nu'azzibuhoo summa yuraddu ilaa Rabbihee fa yu 'azzibuhoo azaaban nukraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammā man āmana wa ‘amila ṣāliḥan fa lahū jazā'anil-ḥusnā, wa sanaqūlu lahū min amrinā yusrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ammaa man aamana wa 'amila saalihan falahoo jazaaa'anil husnaa wa sanaqoolu lahoo min amrinaa yusraa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma  atba‘a sababā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa atba'a sababaa

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā balaga maṭli‘asy-syamsi wajadahā taṭlu‘u ‘alā qaumil lam naj‘al lahum min dūnihā sitrā(n).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa balagha matli'ash shamsi wajdahaa tatlu'u alaa qawmil lam naj'al lahum min doonihaa sitraa

ayah.transliteration: Każālik(a), wa  qad aḥaṭnā bimā ladaihi khubrā(n).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika wa qad ahatnaa bimaa ladaihi khubraa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma atba‘a sababā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa atba'a sababaa

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā balaga bainas-saddaini wajada min dūnihimā qaumal lā yakādūna yafqahūna qaulā(n).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa balagha bainas saddaini wajada min doonihimaa qawmal laa yakaa doona yafqahoona qawlaa

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā żal-qarnaini inna ya'jūja wa ma'jūja mufsidūna fil-arḍi  fahal naj‘alu laka kharjan ‘alā an taj‘alā bainanā wa bainahum saddā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa Zal qarnaini inna Yaajooja wa Maajooja mufsidoona fil ardi fahal naj'alu laka kharjan 'alaaa an taj'ala bainanaa wa bainahum saddas

ayah.transliteration: Qāla mā makkannī fīhi rabbī fa a‘īnūnī biquwwatin aj‘al bainakum wa bainahum radmā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala maa makkannee feehi Rabbee khairun fa-a'eenoonee biquwwatin aj'al bainakum wa bainahum radmaa

ayah.transliteration: Ātūnī zubaral-ḥadīd(i), ḥattā iżā sāwā bainaṣ-ṣadafaini qālanfukhū, ḥattā iżā ja‘alahū nārā(n), qāla ātūnī ufrig ‘alaihi qiṭrā(n).
ayah.translation: Aatoonee zubaral hadeed, hattaaa izaa saawaa bainas sadafaini qaalan fukhoo hattaaa izaa ja'alahoo naaran qaala aatooneee ufrigh 'alaihi qitraa

ayah.transliteration: Famasṭā‘ū ay yaẓharūhu wa mastaṭā‘ū lahū naqbā(n).
ayah.translation: Famas taa'ooo any yazharoohu wa mastataa'oo lahoo naqbaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hāżā raḥmatum mir rabbī, fa iżā jā'a wa‘du rabbī ja‘alahū dakkā'(a), wa kāna wa‘du rabbī ḥaqqā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala haaza rahmatummir Rabbee fa izaa jaaa'a wa'du Rabbee ja'alahoo dakkaaa'a; wa kaana; wa du Rabbee haqqaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa taraknā ba‘ḍahum yauma'iżiy yamūju fī ba‘ḍiw wa nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri fa jama‘nāhum jam‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa taraknaa ba'dahum Yawma'iziny yamooju fee ba'dinw wa nufikha fis Soori fajama'naahum jam'aa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘araḍnā jahannama yauma'iżil lil-kāfirīna ‘arḍā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa 'aradnaa jahannama Yawma'izil lilkaafireena 'ardaa

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna kānat a‘yunuhum fī giṭā'in ‘an żikrī wa kānū lā yastaṭī‘ūna sam‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Allazeena kaanat a'yunuhum fee ghitaaa'in 'an zikree wa kaanoo la yastatee'oona sam'aa

ayah.transliteration: Afaḥasibal-lażīna kafarū ay yattakhiżū ‘ibādī min dūnī auliyā'(a), innā a‘tadnā jahannama lil-kāfirīna nuzulā(n).
ayah.translation: Afahasibal lazeena kafarooo any yattakhizoo 'ibaadee min dooneee awliyaaa'; innaaa a'tadnaa jahannama lilkaafi reena nuzulaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul hal nunabbi'ukum bil-akhsarīna a‘mālā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul hal nunabbi'ukum bilakhsareena a'maalaa

ayah.transliteration: Al-lażīna ḍalla sa‘yuhum fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa hum yaḥsabūna annahum yuḥsinūna ṣun‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Allazeena dalla sa'yuhum fil hayaatid dunyaa wa hum yahsaboona annahum yuhsinoona sun'aa

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna kafarū bi'āyāti rabbihim wa liqā'ihī fa ḥabiṭat a‘māluhum falā nuqīma lahum yaumal-qiyāmati waznā(n).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi aayaati Rabbihim wa liqaaa'ihee fahabitat a'maaluhum falaa nuqeemu lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati waznaa

ayah.transliteration: Żālika jazā'uhum jahannamu bimā kafarū wattakhażū āyātī wa rusulī huzuwā(n).
ayah.translation: Zaalika jazaaa'uhum jahannamu bimaa kafaroo wattakhazooo Aayaatee wa Rusulee huzuwaa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti kānat lahum jannātul-firdausi nuzulā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati kaanat lahum Jannaatul Firdawsi nuzulaa

ayah.transliteration: Khālidīna fīhā lā yabgūna ‘anhā ḥiwalā(n).
ayah.translation: Khaalideena feeha la yabghoona 'anhaa hiwalaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul lau kānal-baḥru midādal likalimāti rabbī lanafidal-baḥru qabla an tanfada kalimāṭu rabbī wa lau ji'nā bimiṡlihī madadā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul law kaanal bahru midaadal lik Kalimaati Rabbee lanafidal bahru qabla an tanfada Kalimaatu Rabbee wa law ji'naa bimislihee madadaa
