ayah.transliteration: Qul innamā ana basyarum miṡlukum yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhuw wāḥid(un), faman kāna yarjū liqā'a rabbihī falya‘mal ‘amalan ṣāliḥaw wa lā yusyrik bi‘ibādati rabbihī aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaa ilaahukum Ilaahunw Waahid; faman kaana yarjoo liqaaa'a Rabbihee falya'mal 'amalan saalihanw wa laa yushrik bi'ibaadati Rabbiheee ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Kāf hā yā ‘aīn ṣād.
ayah.translation: Kaaaf-Haa-Yaa-'Ayyyn-Saaad

ayah.transliteration: Żikru raḥmati rabbika ‘abdahū zakariyyā.
ayah.translation: Zikru rahmati Rabbika 'abdahoo Zakariyya

ayah.transliteration: Iż nādā rabbahū nidā'an khafiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Iz naadaa Rabbahoo nidaaa'an khafiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi innī wahanal-‘aẓmu minnī wasyta‘alar-ra'su syaibaw wa lam akum bidu‘ā'ika rabbi syaqiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi innee wahanal'azmu minnee washta'alar raasu shaibanw wa lam akum bidu'aaa'ika Rabbi shaqiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa innī khiftul-mawāliya miw warā'ī wa kānatimra'atī ‘āqiran fahab lī mil ladunka waliyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa innee khiftul mawaa liya minw waraaa'ee wa kaana tim ra atee 'aairan fahab lee mil ladunka waliyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Yariṡunī wa yariṡu min āli ya‘qūba waj‘alhu rabbi raḍiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Yarisunee wa yarisu min aali Ya'qoob, waj'alhu Rabbi radiyya

ayah.transliteration: Yā zakariyyā innā nubasysyiruka bigulāminismuhū yaḥyā, lam naj‘al lahū min qablu samiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaa Zakariyyaaa innaa nubashshiruka bighulaami nismuhoo Yahyaa lam naj'al lahoo min qablu samiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi annā yakūnu lī gulāmuw wa kānatimra'atī ‘āqiraw wa qad balagtu minal-kibari ‘itiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamunw wa kaanatim ra atee aaqiranw wa qad balaghtu minal kibari 'itiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla każālik(a), qāla rabbuka huwa ‘alayya hayyinuw wa qad khalaqtuka min qablu wa lam taku syai'ā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala kazaalika qaala Rabbuka huwa 'alaiya haiyinunw wa qad khalaqtuka min qablu wa lam taku shai'aa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbij‘al lī āyah(tan), qāla āyatuka allā tukalliman-nāsa  ṡalāṡa layālin sawiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbij 'al leee Aayah; qaala Aayatuka allaa tukalliman naasa salaasa layaalin sawiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa kharaja ‘alā qaumihī minal-miḥrābi fa auḥā ilaihim an sabbiḥū bukrataw wa ‘asyiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee minal mihraabi fa-awhaaa ilaihim an sabbihoo bukratanw wa 'ashiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā yaḥyā khużil-kitāba biquwwah(tin), wa ātaināhul-ḥukma ṣabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaa Yahyaa khuzil Kitaaba biquwwatinw wa aatainaahul hukma saiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḥanānam mil ladunnā wa zakāh(tan), wa kāna taqiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa hanaanam mil ladunnaa wa zakaatanw wa kaana taqiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa barram biwālidaihi wa lam yakun jabbāran ‘aṣiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa barram biwaalidayhi wa lam yakum jabbaaran 'asiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa salāmun ‘alaihi yauma wulida wa yauma yamūtu wa yauma yub‘aṡu ḥayyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa salaamun 'alaihi yawma wulida wa yawma yamootu wa yawma yub'asu haiyaa

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur fil-kitābi maryam(a), iżintabażat min ahlihā makānan syarqiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Marya; izin tabazat min ahlihaa makaanan shariqyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fattakhażat min dūnihim ḥijābā(n), fa arsalnā ilaihā rūḥanā fa tamaṡṡala lahā basyaran sawiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fattakhazat min doonihim hijaaban fa arsalnaaa ilaihaa roohanaa fatamassala lahaa basharan sawiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qālat innī a‘ūżu bir-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaalat inneee a'oozu bir Rahmaani minka in kunta taqiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innamā ana rasūlu rabbik(a), li'ahaba laki gulāman zakiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala innamaa ana rasoolu Rabbiki li ahaba laki ghulaaman zakiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qālat annā yakūnu lī gulāmuw wa lam yamsasnī basyaruw wa lam aku bagiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaalat anna yakoonu lee ghulaamunw wa lam yamsasnee bashrunw wa lam aku baghiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla każālik(a), qāla rabbuka huwa ‘alayya hayyin(un), wa linaj‘alahū āyatal lin-nāsi wa raḥmatam minnā, wa kāna amram maqḍiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki huwa 'alaiya yaiyimunw wa linaj 'alahooo Aayatal linnaasi wa rahmatam minnaa; wa kaana amram maqdiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa ḥamalathu fantabażat bihī makānan qaṣiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fahamalat hu fantabazat bihee makaanan qasiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa ajā'ahal-makhāḍu ilā jiz‘in nakhlah(ti), qālat yā laitanī mittu qabla hāżā wa kuntu nas-yam mansiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa ajaaa 'ahal makhaadu ilaa jiz'in nakhlati qaalat yaa laitanee mittu qabla haazaa wa kuntu nasyam mansiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa nādāhā min taḥtihā allā taḥzanī qad ja‘ala rabbuki taḥtaki sariyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fanaadaahaa min tahtihaan allaa tahzanee qad ja'ala Rabbuki tahtaki sariyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa huzzī ilaiki bijiz‘in-nakhlati tusāqiṭ ‘alaiki ruṭaban janiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa huzzeee ilaiki bijiz 'in nakhlati tusaaqit 'alaiki rutaban janiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa kulī wasyrabī wa qarrī ‘ainā(n), fa immā tarayinna minal-basyari aḥadā(n), fa qūlī innī nażartu lir-raḥmāni ṣauman falan ukallimal-yauma insiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fakulee washrabee wa qarree 'ainaa; fa immaa tarayinnna minal bashari ahadan faqooleee innee nazartu lir Rahmaani sawman falan ukallimal yawma insiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa atat bihī qaumahā taḥmiluh(ū), qālū yā maryamu laqad ji'ti syai'an fariyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa atat bihee qawmahaa tahmiluhoo qaaloo yaa Maryamoo laqad ji'ti shai'an fariyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ukhta hārūna kāna abūkimra'a sau'iw wa mā kānat ummuki bagiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ukkhta Haaroona maa kaana abokim ra-a saw'inw wa maa kaanat ummuki baghiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa asyārat ilaīh(i), qālū kaifa nukallimu man kāna fil-mahdi ṣabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa ashaarat ilaih; qaaloo kaifa nukallimu man kaana fil mahdi sabiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innī ‘abdullāh(i), ātāniyal-kitāba wa ja‘alanī nabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala innee 'abdullaahi aataaniyal Kitaaba wa ja'alanee Nabiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alanī mubārakan aina mā kunt(u), wa auṣānī biṣ-ṣalāti waz-zakāti mā dumtu ḥayyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alanee mubaarakan aina maa kuntu wa awsaanee bis Salaati waz Zakaati maa dumtu haiyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa barram biwālidatī wa lam yaj‘alnī jabbāran syaqiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa barram biwaalidatee wa lam yaj'alnee jabbaaran shaqiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Was-salāmu ‘alayya yauma wulittu wa yauma amūtu wa yauma ub‘aṡu ḥayyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wassalaamu 'alaiya yawma wulittu wa yawma amootu wa yawma ub'asu baiyaa

ayah.transliteration: Żālika ‘īsabnu maryam(a), qaulal-ḥaqqil-lażī fīhi yamtarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalika 'Eesab-nu Marya; qawlal haqqil lazee feehi yamtaroon

ayah.transliteration: Mā kāna lillāhi ay yattakhiża miw waladin subḥānah(ū), iżā qaḍā amran fa innamā yaqūlu lahū kun fa yakūn(u).
ayah.translation: Maa kaana lillaahi ai yattakhiza minw waladin Subhaanah; izaa qadaaa amran fa innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa yakoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa innallāha rabbī wa rabbukum fa‘budūh(u), hāżā ṣirāṭum mustaqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa innal laaha Rabbee wa Rabbukum fa'budooh; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Fakhtalafal-aḥzābu mim bainihim, fa wailul lil-lażīna kafarū mim masyhadi yaumin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu mim bainihim fawailul lillazeena kafaroo mim mashhadi Yawmin 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Asmi‘ bihim wa abṣir, yauma ya'tūnanā lākiniẓ-ẓālimūnal-yauma fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Asmi' bihim wa absir Yawma yaatoonanaa laakiniz zaalimoonal yawma fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa anżirhum yaumal-ḥasrati  iż quḍiyal-amr(u), wa hum fī gaflatiw wa hum lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa anzirhum Yawmal hasrati iz qudiyal amr; wa hum fee ghaflatinw wa hum laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Innā naḥnu nariṡul-arḍa wa man ‘alaihā wa ilainā yurja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa NNahnu narisul arda wa man 'alaihaa wa ilainaa yurja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur fil-kitābi ibrāhīm(a), innahū kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Ibraaheem; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Iż qāla li'abīhi yā abati lima ta‘budu mā lā yasma‘u wa lā yubṣiru wa lā yugnī ‘anka syai'ā(n).
ayah.translation: Iz qaala li abeehi yaaa abati lima ta'budu maa laa yasma'u wa laa yubsiru wa laa yughnee 'anka shai'aa

ayah.transliteration: Yā abati innī qad jā'anī minal-‘ilmi mā lam ya'tika fattabi‘nī ahdika ṣirāṭan sawiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa abati innee qad jaaa'anee minal 'ilmi maa lam yaatika fattabi'neee ahdika siraatan Sawiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā abati lā ta‘budisy-syaiṭān(a), innasy-syaiṭāna kāna lir-raḥmāni ‘aṣiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa abati laa ta'budish Shaitaana innash Shaitaana kaana lir Rahmaani 'asiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā abati innī akhāfu ay yamassaka ‘ażābum minar-raḥmāni fa takūna lisy-syaiṭāni waliyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa abati innee akhaafu ai yamssaka 'azaabum minar Rahmaani fatakoona lish Shaitaani waliyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla arāgibun anta ‘an ālihatī yā ibrāhīm(u), la'illam tantahi la'arjumannaka wahjurnī maliyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala araaghibun anta 'an aalihatee yaaa Ibraaheemu la 'il lam tantahi la arjumannaka wahjumee maliyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla salāmun ‘alaik(a), sa'astagfiru laka rabbī, innahū kāna bī ḥafiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala salaamun 'alaika sa astaghfiru laka Rabbeee innahoo kaana bee hafiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa a‘tazilukum wa mā tad‘ūna min dūnillāhi wa ad‘ū rabbī, ‘asā allā akūna bidu‘ā'i rabbī syaqiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa a'tazilukum wa maa tad'oona min doonil laahi wa ad'o Rabbee 'asaaa allaaa akoona bidu'aaa'i Rabbee shaqiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Falamma‘tazalahum wa mā ya‘budūna min dūnillāh(i), wahabnā lahū isḥāqa wa ya‘qūb(a),  wa kullan ja‘alnā nabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Falamma' tazalahum wa maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi wahabnaa lahoo is-haaqa wa ya'qoob, wa kullan ja'alnaa Nabiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa wahabnā lahum mir raḥmatinā wa ja‘alnā lahum lisāna ṣidqin ‘aliyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa wahabnaa lahum mirrahmatinaa wa ja'alnaa lahum lisaana sidqin 'aliyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur  fil-kitābi mūsā, innahū kāna mukhlaṣaw wa kāna rasūlan nabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Moosaaa; innahoo kaana mukhlasanw wa kaana Rasoolan Nabiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa nādaināhu min jānibiṭ-ṭūril-aimani wa qarrabnāhu najiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa naadainaahu min jaanibit Tooril aimani wa qarrabnaahu najiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa wahabnā lahū mir raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa wahabnaa lahoo mir rahmatinaaa akhaahu Haaroona Nabiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur  fil-kitābi ismā‘īl(a), innahū kāna ṣādiqal-wa‘di wa kāna rasūlan nabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wazkur fil Kitaabi ismaa'eel; innahoo kaana saadiqal wa'di wa kaana Rasoolan Nabiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kāna ya'muru ahlahū biṣ-ṣalāti waz-zakāh(ti), wa kāna ‘inda rabbihī marḍiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kaana yaamuru ahlahoo bis Salaati waz zakaati wa kaana 'inda Rabbihee mardiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur  fil-kitābi idrīs(a), innahū kāna ṣādiqan nabiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Idrees; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa rafa‘nāhu makānan ‘aliyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa rafa'naahu makaanan 'aliyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna an‘amallāhu ‘alaihim minan-nabiyyīna min żurriyyati ādama wa mimman ḥamalnā ma‘a nūḥ(in), wa min żurriyyati ibrāhīma wa isrā'īl(a), wa mimman hadainā wajtabainā, iżā tutlā ‘alaihim āyātur-raḥmāni kharrū sujjadaw wa bukiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena an'amal laahu 'alaihim minan Nabiyyeena min zurriyyati Aadama wa mimman hamalnaa ma'a Noohinw wa min zurriyyati Ibraaheema wa Israaa'eela wa mimman hadainaa wajta bainaaa; izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatur Rahmaani kharroo sujjadanw wa bukiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa khalafa mim ba‘dihim khalfun aḍā‘uṣ-ṣalāta wattaba‘usy-syahawāti fa saufa yalqauna gayyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fakhalafa mim ba'dihim khalfun adaa'us Salaata wattaba'ush shahawaati fasawfa yalqawna ghaiyaa

ayah.transliteration: Illā man tāba wa āmana wa ‘amila ṣāliḥan fa ulā'ika yadkhulūnal-jannata wa lā yuẓlamūna syai'ā(n).
ayah.translation: Illaa man taaba wa aamana wa 'amila saalihan fa ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal jannata wa laa yuzlamoona shai'aa

ayah.transliteration: Jannāti ‘adninil-latī wa‘adar-raḥmānu ‘ibādahū bil-gaib(i), innahū kāna wa‘duhū ma'tiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'adar Rahmaanu ibaadahoo bilghaib; innahoo kaana wa'duhoo maatiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Lā yasma‘ūna fīhā lagwan illā salāmā(n), wa lahum rizquhum fīhā bukrataw wa ‘asyiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Laa yasma'oona feehaa laghwan illaa salaamaa; wa lahum rizquhum feehaa bukratanw wa 'ashiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Tilkal-jannatul-latī nūriṡu min ‘ibādinā man kāna taqiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Tilkal jannatul latee oorisu min 'ibaadinaa man kaana taqiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā natanazzalu illā bi'amri rabbik(a), lahū mā baina aidīnā wa mā khalfanā wa mā baina żālika wa mā kāna rabbuka nasiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa natanazzalu illaa bi amri Rabbika lahoo maa baina aideenaa wa maa khalfanaa wa maa baina zaalik; wa maa kaana Rabbuka nasiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumā fa‘budhu waṣṭabir li‘ibādatih(ī), hal ta‘lamu lahū samiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa fa'bud hu wastabir li'ibaadatih; hal ta'lamu lahoo samiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlul-insānu a'iżā mā mittu lasaufa ukhraju ḥayyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqoolul insaanu 'aizaa maa mittu lasawfa ukhraju haiyaa

ayah.transliteration: Awalā yażkurul-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min qablu wa lam yaku syai'ā(n).
ayah.translation: awalaa yazkurul insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min qablu wa lam yaku shai'aa

ayah.transliteration: Fa wa rabbika lanaḥsyurannahum wasy-syayāṭīna ṡumma lanuḥḍirannahum ḥaula jahannama jiṡiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Fawa Rabbika lanahshu rannahum wash shayaateena summa lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jisiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma lananzi‘anna min kulli syī‘atin ayyuhum asyaddu ‘alar-raḥmāni ‘itiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa lananzi 'anna min kulli shee'atin aiyuhum ashaddu 'alar Rahmaani 'itiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma lanaḥnu a‘lamu bil-lażīna  hum aulā bihā ṣiliyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa lanahnu a'lamu billazeena hum awlaa bihaa siliyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa im minkum illā wāriduhā, kāna ‘alā rabbika ḥatmam maqḍiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa im minkum illaa waa riduhaa; kaana 'alaa Rabbika hatmam maqdiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma nunajjil-lażīnattaqau wa nażaruẓ-ẓālimīna fīhā jiṡiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa nunajjil lazeenat taqaw wa nazaruz zaalimeena feehaa jisiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā tutlā ‘alaihim āyātunā bayyinātin qālal-lażīna kafarū lil-lażīna āmanū, ayyul-farīqaini khairum maqāmaw wa aḥsanu nadiyyā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo aiyul fareeqaini khairum maqaamanw wa ahsanu nadiyyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum aḥsanu aṡāṡaw wa ri'yā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu asaasanw wa ri'yaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul man kāna fiḍ-ḍalālati falyamdud lahur-raḥmānu maddā(n), ḥattā iżā ra'au mā yū‘adūna immal-‘ażāba wa immas-sā‘ata fa saya‘lamūna man huwa syarrum makānaw wa aḍ‘afu jundā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul man kaana fidda laalati falyamdud lahur Rahmaanu maddaa; hattaaa izaa ra aw maa yoo'adoona immal 'azaaba wa immas Saa'ata fasa ya'lamoona man huwa sharrum makaananw wa ad'afu jundaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yazīdullāhul-lażīnahtadau hudā(n), wal-bāqiyātuṣ-ṣāliḥātu khairun ‘inda rabbika ṡawābaw wa khairum maraddā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yazeedul laahul lazeenah tadaw hudaa; wal baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw wa khairum maraddaa

ayah.transliteration: Afa ra'aital-lażī kafara bi'āyātinā wa qāla la'ūtayanna mālaw wa waladā(n).
ayah.translation: Afara'aytal lazee kafara bi Aayaatinaa wa qaala la oota yanna maalanw wa waladaa

ayah.transliteration: Aṭṭala‘al-gaiba amittakhaża ‘indar-raḥmāni ‘ahdā(n).
ayah.translation: Attala'al ghaiba amitta khaza'indar Rahmaani 'ahdaa

ayah.transliteration: Kallā, sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wa namuddu lahū minal-‘ażābi maddā(n).
ayah.translation: Kallaa; sanaktubu maa yaqoolu wa namuddu lahoo minal 'azaabi maddaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa nariṡuhū mā yaqūlu wa ya'tīnā fardā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa narisuhoo maa yaqoolu wa yaateenaa fardaa

ayah.transliteration: Wattakhażū min dūnillāhi ālihatal liyakūnū lahum ‘izzā(n).
ayah.translation: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal liyakoonoo lahum 'izzaa

ayah.transliteration: Kallā, sayakfurūna bi‘ibādatihim wa yakūnūna ‘alaihim ḍiddā(n).
ayah.translation: Kallaa; sa yakfuroona bi'ibaadatihim wa yakoonoona 'alaihim diddaa

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annā arsalnasy-syayāṭīna ‘alal-kāfirīna ta'uzzuhum azzā(n).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annaaa arsalnash Shayaateena 'alal kaafireena ta'uzzuhum azzaa

ayah.transliteration: Falā ta‘jal ‘alaihim, innamā na‘uddu lahum ‘addā(n).
ayah.translation: Falaa ta'jal alaihim innamaa na 'uddu lahum 'addaa

ayah.transliteration: Yauma naḥsyurul-muttaqīna ilar-raḥmāni wafdā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma nahshurul muttaqeena ilar Rahmaani wafdaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa nasūqul-mujrimīna ilā jahannama wirdā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa nasooqul mujrimeena ilaa Jahannama wirdaa

ayah.transliteration: Lā yamlikūnasy-syafā‘ata illā manittakhaża ‘indar-raḥmāni ‘ahdā(n).
ayah.translation: Laa yamlikoonash shafaa'ta illaa manittakhaza 'indar Rahmaani 'ahdaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāluttakhażar-raḥmānu waladā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalut takhazar Rahmaanu waladaa

ayah.transliteration: Laqad ji'tum syai'an iddā(n).
ayah.translation: Laqad ji'tum shai'an iddaa

ayah.transliteration: Takādus-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna  minhu wa tansyaqqul-arḍu wa takhirrul-jibālu haddā(n).
ayah.translation: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna minhu wa tanshaq qul ardu wa takhirrul jibaalu haddaa

ayah.transliteration: An da‘au lir-raḥmāni waladā(n).
ayah.translation: An da'aw lir Rahmaani waladaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yambagī lir-raḥmāni ay yattakhiża waladā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yambaghee lir Rahmaani ai yattakhiza waladaa

ayah.transliteration: In kullu man fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi illā ātir-raḥmāni ‘abdā(n).
ayah.translation: In kullu man fis samaawaati wal ardi illaaa aatir Rahmaani 'abdaa

ayah.transliteration: Laqad aḥṣāhum wa ‘addahum ‘addā(n).
ayah.translation: Laqad ahsaahum wa addahum 'addaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kulluhum ātīhi yaumal-qiyāmati fardā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kulluhum aateehi Yawmal Qiyaamati fardaa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti sayaj‘alu lahumur-raḥmānu wuddā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati sa yaj'alu lahumur Rahmaanu wuddaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa innamā yassarnāhu bilisānika litubasysyira bihil-muttaqīna wa tunżira bihī qaumal luddā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika litubashshira bihil muttaqeena wa tunzira bihee qawmal luddaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kam ahlaknā qablahum min qarn(in), hal tuḥissu minhum min aḥadin au tasma‘u lahum rikzā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kam ahlaknaa qabla hum min qarnin hal tuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasma'u lahum rikzaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṭāhā.
ayah.translation: Taa-Haa

ayah.transliteration: Mā anzalnā ‘alaikal-qur'āna litasyqā.
ayah.translation: Maaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Qur-aana litashqaaa

ayah.transliteration: Illā tażkiratal limay yakhsyā.
ayah.translation: Illaa tazkiratal limany yakshaa

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlam mimman khalaqal-arḍa was-samāwātil-‘ulā.
ayah.translation: Tanzeelam mimman khalaqal arda was samaawaatil 'ulaa

ayah.transliteration: Ar- raḥmānu ‘alal-‘arsyistawā.
ayah.translation: Ar-Rahmaanu 'alal 'Arshis tawaa

ayah.transliteration: Lahū mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi wa mā bainahumā wa mā taḥtaṡ-ṡarā.
ayah.translation: Lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa maa tahtassaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa in tajhar bil-qauli fa innahū ya‘lamus-sirra wa akhfā.
ayah.translation: Wa in tajhar bilqawli fainnahoo ya'lamus sirra wa akhfaa

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huw(a), lahul-asmā'ul-ḥusnā.
ayah.translation: Allaahu laaa ilasha illaa Huwa lahul Asmaaa'ul Husnaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa hal atāka ḥadīṡu mūsā.
ayah.translation: Wa hal ataaka hadeesu Moosa

ayah.transliteration: Iż ra'ā nāran fa qāla li'ahlihimkuṡū innī ānastu nāral la‘allī ātīkum minhā biqabasin au ajidu ‘alan-nāri hudā(n).
ayah.translation: Iz ra aa naaran faqaala li alhlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la'alleee aateekum minhaa biqabasin aw ajidu 'alan naari hudaa

ayah.transliteration: Falammā atāhā nūdiya yā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya yaa Moosaa

ayah.transliteration: Innī ana rabbuka fakhla‘ na‘laika innaka bil-wādil-muqaddasi ṭuwā(n).
ayah.translation: Inneee Ana Rabbuka fakhla' na'laika innaka bilwaadil muqaddasi Tuwaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa anakhtartuka fastami‘ limā yūḥā.
ayah.translation: Wa anakhtartuka fastami' limaa yoohaa

ayah.transliteration: Innanī anallāhu lā ilāha illā ana fa‘budnī, wa aqimiṣ-ṣalāta liżikrī.
ayah.translation: Innaneee Anal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Ana fa'budnee wa aqimis-salaata lizikree

ayah.transliteration: Innas-sā‘ata ātiyatun akādu ukhfīhā litujzā kullu nafsim bimā tas‘ā.
ayah.translation: Innas Saa'ata aatiyatun akaadu ukhfeehaa litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa tas'aa

ayah.transliteration: Falā yaṣuddannaka ‘anhā mal lā yu'minu bihā wattaba‘a hawāhu fa tardā.
ayah.translation: Falaa yasuddannnaka 'anhaa mal laa yu'minu bihaa wattaba'a hawaahu fatardaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā tilka biyamīnika yā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Wa maa tilka bi yamee nika yaa Moosaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hiya ‘aṣāy(a), atwakka'u ‘alaihā wa ahusysyu bihā ‘alā ganamī wa liya fīhā ma'āribu ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Qaala hiya 'asaaya atawakka'u alaihaa wa ahushshu bihaa 'alaa ghanamee wa liya feehaa ma aaribu ukhraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla alqihā yā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Qaala alqihaa yaa Moosaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa alqāhā fa iżā hiya ḥayyatun tas‘ā.
ayah.translation: Fa-alqaahaa fa -izaa hiya haiyatun tas'aa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla khużhā wa lā takhaf, sanu‘īduhā sīratahal-ūlā.
ayah.translation: Qaala khuzhaa wa laa ta khaf sanu'eeduhaa seeratahal oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Waḍmum yadaka ilā janāḥika takhruj baiḍā'a min gairi sū'in āyatan ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Wadmum yadaka ilaa janaahika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in Aayatan ukhraa

ayah.transliteration: Linuriyaka min āyātinal-kubrā.
ayah.translation: Linuriyaka min Aayaatinal Kubra

ayah.transliteration: Iżhab ilā fir‘auna innahū ṭagā.
ayah.translation: Izhab ilaa Fir'awna innahoo taghaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbisyraḥ lī ṣadrī.
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbish rah lee sadree

ayah.transliteration: Wa yassir lī amrī.
ayah.translation: Wa yassir leee amree

ayah.transliteration: Waḥlul ‘uqdatam mil lisānī.
ayah.translation: Wahlul 'uqdatam milli saanee

ayah.transliteration: Yafqahū qaulī.
ayah.translation: Yafqahoo qawlee

ayah.transliteration: Waj‘al lī wazīram min ahlī.
ayah.translation: Waj'al lee wazeeram min ahlee

ayah.transliteration: Hārūna akhī.
ayah.translation: Haaroona akhee

ayah.transliteration: Usydud bihī azrī.
ayah.translation: Ushdud biheee azree

ayah.transliteration: Wa asyrik-hu fī amrī.
ayah.translation: Wa ashrik hu feee amree

ayah.transliteration: Kai nusabbiḥaka kaṡīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Kai nusabbihaka kaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa nażkuraka kaṡīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa nazkuraka kaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Innaka kunta binā baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaka kunta binaa baseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla qad ūtīta su'laka yā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Qaala qad ooteeta su'laka yaa Moosaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad manannā ‘alaika marratan ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Wa laqad manannaa 'alaika marratan ukhraaa

ayah.transliteration: Iż auḥainā ilā ummika mā yūḥā.
ayah.translation: Iz awhainaaa ilaaa ummika maa yoohaaa

ayah.transliteration: Aniqżifīhi fit-tābūti faqżifīhi fil-yammi falyulqihil-yammu bis-sāḥili ya'khużhu ‘aduwwul lī wa ‘aduwwul lah(ū), wa alqaitu ‘alaika maḥabbatam minnī, wa lituṣna‘a ‘alā ‘ainī.
ayah.translation: Aniqzifeehi fit Taabooti faqzifeehi fil yammi fal yul qihil yammu bis saahili yaakhuzhu 'aduwwul lee wa 'aduwwul lah; wa alqaitu 'alaika mahabbatam minnee wa litusna'a 'alaa 'ainee

ayah.transliteration: Iż tamsyī ukhtuka fa taqūlu hal adullukum ‘alā may yakfuluh(ū), fa raja‘nāka ilā ummika kai taqarra ‘ainuhā wa lā taḥzan(a), wa qatalta nafsan fa najjaināka minal-gammi wa fatannāka futūnā(n), fa labiṡta sinīna fī ahli madyan(a), ṡumma ji'ta ‘alā qadariy yā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Iz tamsheee ukhtuka fataqoolu hal adullukum 'alaa mai yakfuluhoo faraja 'naaka ilaaa ummika kai taqarra 'ainuhaa wa laa tahzan; wa qatalta nafsan fanajjainaaka minal ghammi wa fatannaaka futoonaa; falabista sineena feee ahli Madyana summa ji'ta 'alaa qadariny yaa Moosa

ayah.transliteration: Wasṭana‘tuka linafsī.
ayah.translation: Wastana' tuka linafsee

ayah.transliteration: Iżhab anta wa akhūka bi'āyātī wa lā taniyā fī żikrī.
ayah.translation: Izhab anta wa akhooka bi Aayaatee wa laa taniyaa fee zikree

ayah.transliteration: Iżhabā ilā fir‘auna innahū ṭagā.
ayah.translation: Izhabaaa ilaa Fir'awna innahoo taghaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa qūlā lahū qaulal layyinal la‘allahū yatażakkaru au yakhsyā.
ayah.translation: Faqoolaa lahoo qawlal laiyinal la allahoo yatazakkkaru 'aw yakhshaa

ayah.transliteration: Qālā rabbanā innanā nakhāfu ay yafruṭa ‘alainā au ay yaṭgā.
ayah.translation: Qaalaa Rabbanaaa innanaa nakhaafu ai yafruta 'alainaaa aw ai yatghaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lā takhāfā innanī ma‘akumā asma‘u wa arā.
ayah.translation: Qaala laa takhaafaaa innanee ma'akumaa asma'u wa araa

ayah.transliteration: Fa'tiyāhu fa qūlā innā rasūlā rabbika fa arsil ma‘anā banī isrā'īl(a), wa lā tu‘ażżibhum, qad ji'nāka bi'āyatim mir rabbik(a), was-salāmu ‘alā manittaba‘al-hudā.
ayah.translation: Faatiyaahu faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolaa Rabbika fa arsil ma'anaa Banee Israaa'eela wa laa tu'azzibhum qad ji'naaka bi Aayatim mir Rabbika wassa laamu 'alaa manit taba'al hudaa

ayah.transliteration: Innā qad ūḥiya ilainā annal-‘ażāba ‘alā man każżaba wa tawallā.
ayah.translation: Innaa qad oohiya ilainaaa annnal 'azaaba 'alaa man kaz zaba wa tawalla

ayah.transliteration: Qāla famar rabbukumā yā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Qaala famar Rabbu kumaa yaa Moosa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbunal-lażī a‘ṭā kulla syai'in khalqahū ṡumma hadā.
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbunal lazeee a'taa kulla shai'in khalqahoo summa hadaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla famā bālul-qurūnil-ūlā.
ayah.translation: Qaala famaa baalul quroonil oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ‘ilmuhā ‘inda rabbī fī kitāb(in), lā yaḍillu rabbī wa lā yansā.
ayah.translation: Qaala 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabee fee kitaab, laa yadillu Rabbee wa laa yansaa

ayah.transliteration: Al-lażī ja‘ala lakumul-arḍa mahdaw wa salaka lakum fīhā subulaw wa anzala minas-samā'i mā'ā(n), fa akhrajnā bihī azwājam min nabātin syattā.
ayah.translation: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw wa salaka lakum feehaa subulanw wa anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa akhrajnaa biheee azwaajam min nabaatin shatta

ayah.transliteration: Kulū war‘au an‘āmakum, inna fī żālika la'āyātil li'ulin-nuhā.
ayah.translation: Kuloo war'aw an'aamakum; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil li ulin nuhaa

ayah.transliteration: Minhā khalaqnākum wa fīhā nu‘īdukum wa minhā nukhrijukum tāratan ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Minhaa khalaqnaakum wa feehaa nu'eedukum wa minhaa nukhrijukum taaratan ukhraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad araināhu āyātinā kullahā fa każżaba wa abā.
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arainaahu Aayaatinaa kullahaa fakaz zaba wa abaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla aji'tanā litukhrijanā min arḍinā bisiḥrika yā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Qaala aji'tanaa litukhri janaa min ardinaa bisihrika yaa Moosa

ayah.transliteration: Fa lana'tiyannaka bisiḥrim miṡlihī faj‘al bainanā wa bainaka mau‘idal lā nukhlifuhū naḥnu wa lā anta makānan suwā(n).
ayah.translation: Falanaatiyannaka bisihrim mislihee faj'al bainanaa wa bainaka maw'idal laa nukhlifuhoo nahnu wa laaa anta makaanan suwaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla mau‘idukum yaumuz-zīnati wa ay yuḥsyaran-nāsu ḍuḥā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala maw'idukum yawmuz zeenati wa ai yuhsharan naasu duhaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa tawallā fir‘aunu fa jama‘a kaidahū ṡumma atā.
ayah.translation: Fatawallaa Fir'awnu fajjama'a kaidahoo summa ataa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lahum mūsā wailakum lā taftarū ‘alallāhi każiban fa yusḥitakum bi‘ażab(in), wa qad khāba maniftarā.
ayah.translation: Qaala lahum Moosaa wailakum laa taftaroo 'alal laahi kaziban fa yus hitakum bi 'azaab, wa qad khaaba manif taraa

ayah.transliteration: Fa tanāza‘ū amrahum bainahum wa asarrun-najwā.
ayah.translation: Fatanaaza'ooo amrahum bainahum wa asarrun najwaa

ayah.transliteration: Qālū in hāżāni lasāḥirāni yurīdāni ay yukhrijākum min arḍikum bisiḥrihimā wa yażhabā biṭarīqatikumul-muṡlā.
ayah.translation: Qaalooo in haaazaani lasaahiraani yureedaani ai yukhrijaakum min ardikum bisihrihimaa wa yazhabaa bitareeqatikumul muslaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa ajmi‘ū kaidakum ṡumma'tū ṣaffā(n), wa qad aflaḥal-yauma manista‘lā.
ayah.translation: Fa ajmi'oo kaidakum summma'too saffaa; wa qad aflahal yawma manis ta'laa

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā mūsā immā an tulqiya  wa immā an nakūna awwala man alqā.
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa immaaa an tulqiya wa immaaa an nakoona awala man alqaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla bal alqū, fa iżā ḥibāluhum wa ‘iṣiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilaihi min siḥrihim annahā tas‘ā.
ayah.translation: Qaala bal alqoo fa izaa hibaaluhum wa 'isiyyuhum yuhaiyalu ilaihi min sihrihim annahaa tas'aa

ayah.transliteration: Fa aujasa fī nafsihī khīfatam mūsā.
ayah.translation: Fa awjasa fee nafsihee kheefatam Moosa

ayah.transliteration: Qulnā lā takhaf innaka antal-a‘lā.
ayah.translation: Qulnaa laa takhaf innaka antal a'laa

ayah.transliteration: Wa alqi mā fī yamīnika talqaf mā ṣana‘ū, innamā ṣana‘ū kaidu sāḥir(in), wa lā yufliḥus-sāḥiru ḥaiṡu atā.
ayah.translation: Wa alqi maa fee yamee nika talqaf maa sana'oo; innamaa sana'oo kaidu saahir; wa laa yuflihus saahiru haisu ataa

ayah.transliteration: Fa ulqiyas-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wa mūsā.
ayah.translation: Fa ulqiyas saharatu sujjadan qaalooo aamannaa bi Rabbi Haaroona wa Moosa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla āmantum lahū qabla an āżana lakum, innahū lakabīrukumul-lażī ‘allamakumus-siḥr(a), fa la'uqaṭṭi‘anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilāfiw wa la'uṣallibannakum fī jużū‘in-nakhl(i), wa lata‘lamunna ayyunā asyaddu ‘ażābaw wa abqā.
ayah.translation: Qaala aamantum lahoo qabla an aazana lakum; innahoo lakabeerukumul lazee 'allama kumus sihra fala uqatti'anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilaafinw wa la usallibannakum fee juzoo'in nakhli wa lata'lamunna aiyunaaa ashaddu 'azaabanw wa abqaa

ayah.transliteration: Qālū lan nu'ṡiraka ‘alā mā jā'anā minal-bayyināti wal-lażī faṭaranā faqḍi mā anta qāḍ(in), innamā taqḍī hāżihil-ḥayātad-dun-yā.
ayah.translation: Qaaloo lan nu'siraka 'alaa maa jaaa'anaa minal baiyinaati wallazee fataranaa faqdi maaa anta qaad; innamaa taqdee haazihil hayaatad dunyaa

ayah.transliteration: Innā āmannā birabbinā liyagfira lanā khaṭāyānā wa mā akrahtanā ‘alaihi minas-siḥr(i), wallāhu khairuw wa abqā.
ayah.translation: Innaaa aamannaa bi Rabbinaa liyaghfira lanaa khataayaanaa wa maaa akrahtanaa 'alaihi minas sihr; wallaahu khairunw waabqaa

ayah.transliteration: Innahū may ya'ti rabbahū mujriman fa inna lahū jahannam(a), lā yamūtu fīhā wa lā yaḥyā.
ayah.translation: Innahoo mai yaati Rabbahoo mujriman fa inna lahoo Jahannama laa yamotu feehaa wa laa yahyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa may ya'tihī mu'minan qad ‘amilaṣ-ṣāliḥāti fa ulā'ika lahumud-darajātul-‘ulā.
ayah.translation: Wa mai yaatihee mu'minan qad 'amilas saalihaati fa ulaaa'ika lahumud dara jaatul 'ulaa

ayah.transliteration: Jannātu ‘adnin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā, wa żālika jazā'u man tazakkā.
ayah.translation: Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; wa zaalika jazaaa'ua man tazakka

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad auḥainā ilā mūsā an asri bi‘ibādī faḍrib lahum ṭarīqan fil-baḥri yabasā(n), lā takhāfu darakaw wa lā takhsyā.
ayah.translation: Wa laqad awhainaaa ilaa Moosaaa an asri bi'ibaadee fadrib lahum tareeqan fil bahri yabasal laa takhaafu darakanw wa laa takhshaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa atba‘ahum fir‘aunu  bijunūdihī fa gasyiyahum minal-yammi mā gasyiyahum.
ayah.translation: Fa atba'ahum Fir'awnu bijunoodihee faghashiyahum minal yammmi maa ghashi yahum

ayah.transliteration: Wa aḍalla fir‘aunu qaumahū wa mā hadā.
ayah.translation: wa adalla fir'awnu qawmahoo wa maa hadaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā banī isrā'īla qad anjainākum min ‘aduwwikum wa wā‘adnākum jānibaṭ-ṭūril-aimana wa nazzalnā ‘alaikumul-mannā was-salwā.
ayah.translation: Yaa Baneee Israaa'eela qad anjainaakum min 'aduw wikum wa wa'adnaakum jaanibat Tooril aimana wa nazzalnaa 'alaikumul Manna was Salwaa

ayah.transliteration: Kulū min ṭayyibāti mā razaqnākum, wa lā taṭgau fīhi fa yaḥilla ‘alaikum gaḍabī, wa may yaḥlil ‘alaihi gaḍabī faqad hawā.
ayah.translation: Kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum wa laa tatghaw feehi fa yahilla 'alaikum ghadabee wa mai yahlil 'alaihi ghadabee faqad hawaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa innī lagaffārul liman tāba wa āmana wa ‘amila ṣāliḥan ṡummahtadā.
ayah.translation: Wa innee la Ghaffaarul liman taaba wa aamana wa 'amila saalihan summah tadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā a‘jalaka ‘an qaumika yā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Wa maaa a'jalaka 'an qawmika yaa Moosa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hum ulā'i ‘alā aṡarī wa ‘ajiltu ilaika rabbi litarḍā.
ayah.translation: Qaala hum ulaaa'i 'alaaa asaree wa 'ajiltu ilaika Rabbi litardaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fa innā qad fatannā qaumaka mim ba‘dika wa aḍallahumus-sāmiriyy(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala fa innaa qad fatannaa qawmaka mim ba'dika wa adallahumus Saamiriyy

ayah.transliteration: Fa raja‘a mūsā ilā qaumihī gaḍbāna asifā(n), qāla yā qaumi alam ya‘idkum rabbukum wa‘dan ḥasanā(n), afaṭāla ‘alaikumul-‘ahdu am arattum ay yaḥilla ‘alaikum gaḍabum mir rabbikum fa akhlaftum mau‘idī.
ayah.translation: Faraja's Moosaaa ilaa qawmihee ghadbaana asifaa; qaala yaa qawmi alam ya'idkum Rabbukum wa'dan hasanaa; afataala 'alaikumul 'ahdu am arattum ai yahilla 'alaikum ghadabum mir Rabbikum fa akhlaftum maw'idee

ayah.transliteration: Qālū mā akhlafnā mau‘idaka bimalkinā wa lākinnā ḥummilnā auzāram min zīnatil-qaumi fa qażafnāhā fa każālika alqas-sāmiriyy(u).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo maaa akhlafnaa maw'idaka bimalkinna wa laakinna hummilnaaa awzaaram min zeenatil qawmi faqazafnaahaa fakazaalika alqas Saamiriyy

ayah.transliteration: Fa akhraja lahum ‘ijlan jasadal lahū khuwārun fa qālū hāżā ilāhukum wa ilāhu mūsā, fa nasiy(a).
ayah.translation: Fa akhraja lahum 'ijlan jasadal lahoo khuwaarun faqaaloo haazaaa ilaahukum wa ilaahu Moosaa fanasee

ayah.transliteration: Afalā yarauna allā yarji‘u ilaihim qaulā(n), wa lā yamliku lahum ḍarraw wa lā naf‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Afalaa yarawna allaa yarji'u ilaihim qawlanw wa laa yamliku lahum darranw wa laa naf'aa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad qāla lahum hārūnu min qablu yā qaumi innamā futintum bih(ī), wa inna rabbakumur-raḥmānu fattabi‘ūnī wa aṭī‘ū amrī.
ayah.translation: Wa laqad qaala lahum Haaroonu min qablu yaa qawmi innamaa futintum bihee wa inna Rabbakumur Rahmaanu fattabi'oonee wa atee'ooo amree

ayah.transliteration: Qālū lan nabraḥa ‘alaihi ‘ākifīna ḥattā yarji‘a ilainā mūsā.
ayah.translation: Qaaloo lan nabraha 'alaihi 'aakifeena hattaa yarji'a ilainaa Moosaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā hārūnu mā mana‘aka iż ra'aitahum ḍallū.
ayah.translation: Qaala Yaa Haaroonu maa mana 'aka iz ra aitahum dallooo

ayah.transliteration: Allā tattabi‘an(i), afa ‘aṣaita amrī.
ayah.translation: Allaa tattabi'ani afa'asaita amree

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yabna'umma lā ta'khuż biliḥyatī wa lā bira'sī, innī khasyītu an taqūla farraqta baina banī isrā'īla wa lam tarqub qaulī.
ayah.translation: Qaala yabna'umma laa taakhuz bilihyatee wa laa biraasee innee khashetu an taqoola farraqta baina Baneee Israaa'eela wa lam tarqub qawlee

ayah.transliteration: Qāla famā khaṭbuka yā sāmiriyy(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala famaa khatbuka yaa Saamiriyy

ayah.transliteration: Qāla baṣurtu bimā lam yabṣurū bihī fa qabaḍtu qabḍatam min aṡarir-rasūli fa nabażtuhā wa każālika sawwalat lī nafsī.
ayah.translation: Qaala basurtu bimaa lam yabsuroo bihee faqabadtu qabdatam min asarir Rasooli fanabaztuhaa wa kazaalika sawwalat lee nafsee

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fażhab fa inna laka fil-ḥayāti an taqūla lā misās(a), wa inna laka mau‘idal lan tukhlafah(ū), wanẓur ilā ilāhikal-lażī ẓalta ‘alaihi ‘ākifā(n), lanuḥarriqannahū ṡumma lanansifannahū fil-yammi nasfā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala fazhab fa inna laka fil hayaati an taqoola laa misaasa wa inna laka maw'idal lan tukhlafahoo wanzur ilaaa ilaahikal lazee zalta 'alaihi 'aakifaa; lanuharriqannnahoo summa lanansifanahoo fil yammi nasfaa

ayah.transliteration: Innamā ilāhukumullāhul-lażī lā ilāha illā huw(a), wasi‘a kulla syai'in ‘ilmā(n).
ayah.translation: Innamaaa ilaahukkumul laahul lazee laa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wasi'a kulla shai'in ilmaa

ayah.transliteration: Każālika naquṣṣu ‘alaika min ambā'i mā sabaq(a), wa qad ātaināka mil ladunnā żikrā(n).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika naqussu 'alaika min ambaaa'i maa qad sabaq; wa qad aatainaaka mil ladunnaa Zikraa

ayah.transliteration: Man a‘raḍa ‘anhu fa innahū yaḥmilu yaumal-qiyāmati wizrā(n).
ayah.translation: Man a'rada 'anhu, fa innahoo yahmilu Yawmal Qiyaamati wizraa

ayah.transliteration: Khālidīna fīh(i), wa sā'a lahum yaumal-qiyāmati ḥimlā(n).
ayah.translation: Khaalideena feehi wa saaa'a lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati himlaa

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yunfakhu fiṣ-ṣūri wa naḥsyurul-mujrimīna yauma'iżin zurqā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma yunfakhu fissoori wa nahshurul mujrimeena Yawma 'izin zurqaa

ayah.transliteration: Yatakhāfatūna bainahum il labiṡtum illā ‘asyrā(n).
ayah.translation: Yatakhaafatoona bainahum il labistum illaa 'ashraa

ayah.transliteration: Naḥnu a‘lamu bimā yaqūlūna iż yaqūlu amṡaluhum ṭarīqatan il labiṡtum illā yaumā(n).
ayah.translation: nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona iz yaqoolu amsaluhum tareeqatan illabistum illaa yawmaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yas'alūnaka ‘anil-jibāli fa qul yansifuhā rabbī nasfā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yas'aloonaka 'anil jibaali faqul yansifuhaa Rabbee nasfaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa yażaruhā qā‘an ṣafṣafā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa yazaruhaa qaa'an safsafaa

ayah.transliteration: Lā tarā fīhā ‘iwajaw wa lā amtā(n).
ayah.translation: Laa taraa feehaa 'iwajanw wa laaa amtaa

ayah.transliteration: Yauma'iżiy yattabi‘ūnad-dā‘iya lā ‘iwaja lah(ū), wa khasya‘atil-aṣwātu lir-raḥmāni falā tasma‘u illā hamsā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma iziny yattabi'oonad daa'iya laa 'iwaja lahoo wa khasha'atil aswaatu lir Rahmaani falaa tasma'u illaa hamsaa

ayah.transliteration: Yauma'iżil lā tanfa‘usy-syafā‘atu illā man ażina lahur-raḥmānu wa raḍiya lahū qaulā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma 'izil laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu illaa man azina lahur Rahmaanu wa radiya lahoo qawlaa

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘lamu mā baina aidīhim wa mā khalfahum wa lā yuḥīṭūna bihī ‘ilmā(n).
ayah.translation: Ya'lamu maa bainaa aideehim wa maa khalfahum wa laa yauheetoona bihee 'ilmaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘anatil-wujūhu lil-ḥayyil-qayyūm(i), wa qad khāba man ḥamala ẓulmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa 'anatil wujoohu lil Haiiyil Qaiyoomi wa qad khaaba man hamala zulmaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa may ya‘mal minaṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa huwa mu'minun falā yakhāfu ẓulmaw wa lā haḍmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa mai ya'mal minas saalihaati wa huwa mu'minun falaa yakhaafu zulmanw wa laa hadmaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika anzalnāhu qur'ānan ‘arabiyyaw wa ṣarrafnā fīhi minal-wa‘īdi la‘allahum yattaqūna au yuḥdiṡu lahum żikrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika anzalnaahu Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyanw wa sarrafnaa fee hi minal wa'eedi la'allahum yattaqoona aw yuhdisu lahum zikraa

ayah.transliteration: Fa ta‘ālallāhul-malikul-ḥaqq(u), wa lā ta‘jal bil-qur'āni min qabli ay yuqḍā ilaika waḥyuh(ū), wa qur rabbi zidnī ‘ilmā(n).
ayah.translation: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; wa laa ta'jal bil Quraani min qabli ai yuqdaaa ilaika wahyuhoo wa qur Rabbi zidnee 'ilmaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ‘ahidnā ilā ādama min qablu fa nasiya wa lam najid lahū ‘azmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad 'ahidnaaa ilaaa Aadama min qablu fanasiya wa lam najid lahoo 'azmaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qulnā lil-malā'ikatisjudū li'ādama fa sajadū illā iblīsa abā.
ayah.translation: Wa iz qulnaa lilma laaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Iblees; abaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa qulnā yā ādamu inna hāżā ‘aduwwul laka wa lizaujika falā yukhrijannakumā minal-jannati fa tasyqā.
ayah.translation: Faqulnaa yaaa Aadamu inna haazaa 'aduwwul laka wa lizawjika falaa yukhrijan nakumaa minal Jannati fatashqaa

ayah.transliteration: Inna laka allā tajū‘a fīhā wa lā ta‘rā.
ayah.translation: Innaa laka allaa tajoo'a feeha wa laa ta'raa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annaka lā taẓma'u fīhā wa lā taḍḥā.
ayah.translation: Wa annaka laa tazma'u feehaa wa laa tadhaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa waswasa ilaihisy-syaiṭānu qāla yā ādamu hal adulluka ‘alā syajaratil-khuldi wa mulkil lā yablā.
ayah.translation: Fa waswasa ilaihish Shaitaanu qaala yaaa Aadamu hal adulluka 'alaa shajaratil khuldi wa mulkil laa yablaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa akalā minhā fa badat lahumā sau'ātuhumā wa ṭafiqā yakhṣifāni ‘alaihimā miw waraqil-jannah(ti), wa ‘aṣā ādamu rabbahū fa gawā.
ayah.translation: Fa akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw aatuhumaa wa tafiqaa yakhsifaani 'alaihimaa minw waraqil jannah; wa 'asaaa Aadamu Rabbahoo faghawaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡummajtabāhu rabbuhū fa tāba ‘alaihi wa hadā.
ayah.translation: Summaj tabbahu Rabbuhoo fataaba 'alaihi wa hadaa

ayah.transliteration: Qālahbiṭā minhā jamī‘am ba‘ḍukum liba‘ḍin ‘aduww(un), fa immā ya'tiyannakum minnī hudā(n), fa manittaba‘a hudāya falā yaḍillu wa lā yasyqā.
ayah.translation: Qaalah bita minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa immaa yaati yannakum minnee hudan famanit taba'a hudaaya falaa yadillu wa laa yashhqaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa man a‘raḍa ‘an żikrī fa inna lahū ma‘īsyatan ḍankaw wa naḥsyuruhū yaumal-qiyāmati a‘mā.
ayah.translation: Wa man a'rada 'an Zikree fa inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw wa nahshuruhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati a'maa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi lima ḥasyartanī a‘mā wa qad kuntu baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi lima hashar tanee a'maa wa qad kuntu baseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla każālika atatka āyātunā fa nasītahā, wa każālikal-yauma tunsā.
ayah.translation: Qaala kazaalika atatka Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa wa kazaalikal Yawma tunsaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika najzī man asrafa wa lam yu'mim bi'āyāti rabbih(ī), wa la‘ażābul-ākhirati asyaddu wa abqā.
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika najzee man asrafa wa lam yu'mim bi Aayaati Rabbih; wa la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaddu wa abqaa

ayah.transliteration: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknā qablahum minal-qurūni yamsyūna fī masākinihim, inna fī żālika la'āyātil li'ulin nuhā.
ayah.translation: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa qablahum minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil li ulinnuhaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika lakāna lizāmaw wa ajalum musammā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika lakaana lizaamanw wa ajalum musammaa

ayah.transliteration: Faṣbir ‘alā mā yaqūlūna wa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika qabla ṭulū‘isy-syamsi wa qabla gurūbihā, wa min ānā'il-laili fa sabbiḥ wa aṭrāfan-nahāri la‘allaka tarḍā.
ayah.translation: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi wa qabla ghuroobihaa wa min aanaaa'il laili fasbbih wa atraafan nahaari la 'allaka tardaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tamuddanna ‘ainaika ilā mā matta‘nā bihī azwājam minhum zahratal-ḥayātid-dun-yā, linaftinahum fīh(i), wa rizqu rabbika khairuw wa abqā.
ayah.translation: Wa laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa ma matta'na biheee azwajam minhum zahratal hayaatid dunya linaftinahum feeh; wa rizqu Rabbika khairunw wa abqaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa'mur ahlaka biṣ-ṣalāti waṣṭabir ‘alaihā, lā nas'aluka rizqā(n), naḥnu narzuquk(a), wal-‘āqibatu lit-taqwā.
ayah.translation: Waamur ahlaka bis Salaati wastabir 'alaihaa la nas'aluka rizqaa; nahnu narzuquk; wal 'aaqibatu littaqwaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū lau lā ya'tīnā bi'āyatim mir rabbih(ī), awalam ta'tihim bayyinatu mā fiṣ-ṣuḥufil-ūlā.
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo law laa yaateenaa bi Aayatim mmir Rabbih; awalam taatihim baiyinatu maa fis suhufil oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau annā ahlaknāhum bi‘ażābim min qablihī laqālū rabbanā lau lā arsalta ilainā rasūlan fa nattabi‘a āyātika min qabli an nażilla wa nakhzā.
ayah.translation: Wa law annaaa ahlaknaahum bi'azaabim min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi's Aayaatika min qabli an nazilla wa nakhzaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul kullum mutarabbiṣun fa tarabbaṣū, fa sata‘lamūna man aṣḥābuṣ-ṣirāṭis-sawiyyi wa manihtadā.
ayah.translation: Qul kullum mutarabbisun fatarabbasoo fasta'lamoona man Ashaabus Siraatis Sawiyyi wa manih tadaa

ayah.transliteration: Iqtaraba lin-nāsi ḥisābuhum wa hum fī gaflatim mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iqtaraba linnaasi hisaa buhum wa hum fee ghaflatim mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Mā ya'tīhim min żikrim mir rabbihim muḥdaṡin illastama‘ūhu wa hum yal‘abūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa yaateehim min zikrim mir Rabbihim muhdasin illas tama'oohu wa hum yal'aboon

ayah.transliteration: Lāhiyatan qulūbuhum, wa asarrun-najwal-lażīna ẓalamū, hal hāżā illā basyarum miṡlukum, afa ta'tūnas-siḥra wa antum tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laahiyatan quloobuhum; wa asarrun najwal lazeena zalamoo hal haazaa illaa basharum mislukum afataa toonas sihra wa antum tubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbī ya‘lamul-qaula fis-samā'i wal-arḍ(i), wa huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbee ya'lamul qawla fis samaaa'i wal ardi wa Huwas Samee'ul Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Bal qālū aḍgāṡu aḥlāmim baliftarāhu bal huwa syā‘ir(un), falya'tinā bi'āyatin kamā ursilal-awwalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal qaalooo adghaasu ahlaamim balif taraahu bal huwa shaa'irun falyaatinaa bi Aayatin kamaa ursilal awwaloon

ayah.transliteration: Mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā, afahum yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maaa aaamanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa a-fahum yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnā qablaka illā rijālan nūḥī ilaihim fas'alū ahlaż-żikri in kuntum lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaa qablaka illaa rijaalan nooheee ilaihim fas'aloo ahlaz zikri in kuntum laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ja‘alnāhum jasadal lā ya'kulūnaṭ-ṭa‘āma wa mā kānū khālidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa ja'alnaahum jasadal laa yaakuloonat ta'aama wa maa kaanoo khaalideen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ṣadaqnāhumul-wa‘da fa anjaināhum wa man nasyā'u wa ahlaknal-musrifīn(a).
ayah.translation: summa sadaqnaa humul wa'da fa-anjainaahum wa man nashaaa'u wa ahlaknal musrifeen

ayah.transliteration: Laqad anzalnā ilaikum kitāban fīhi żikrukum, afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Kitaaban feehi zikrukum afalaa ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa kam qaṣamnā min qaryatin kānat ẓālimataw wa ansya'nā ba‘dahā qauman ākharīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kam qasamnaa min qaryatin kannat zaalimatanw wa anshadnaa ba'dahaa qawman aakhareen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā aḥassū ba'sanā iżā hum minhā yarkuḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa ahassoo baasanaaa izaaa hum minhaa yarkudoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā tarkuḍū warji‘ū ilā mā utriftum fīhi wa masākinikum la‘allakum tus'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa tarkudoo warji'ooo ilaa maaa utriftum feehe wa masaakinikum la'allakum tus'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā wailanā innā kunnā ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa wailanaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Famā zālat tilka da‘wāhum ḥattā ja‘alnāhum ḥaṣīdan khāmidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa zaalat tilka da'waahum hattaa ja'alnaahum haseedan khaamideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā khalaqnas-samā'a wal-arḍa wa mā bainahumā lā‘ibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal arda wa maa bainahumaa laa'ibeen

ayah.transliteration: Lau aradnā an nattakhiża lahwal lattakhażnāhum mil ladunnā, in kunnā fā‘ilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Law aradnaaa an nattakhiza lahwal lat takhaznaahu mil ladunnaaa in kunnaa faa'ileen

ayah.transliteration: Bal naqżifu bil-ḥaqqi ‘alal-bāṭili fa yadmaguhū fa iżā huwa zāhiq(un), wa lakumul-wailu mimmā taṣifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal naqzifu bilhaqqi 'alal baatili fa yadmaghuhoo fa izaa huwa zaahiq; wa lakumul wailu mimmaa tasifoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lahū man fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa man ‘indahū lā yastakbirūna ‘an ‘ibādatihī wa lā yastaḥsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lahoo man fis samaawaati wal ard; wa man 'indahoo laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaada tihee wa laa yastahsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Yusabbiḥūnal-laila wan-nahāra wa lā yafturūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yusabbihoona laila wannahaara laa yafturoon

ayah.transliteration: Amittakhażū ālihatam minal-arḍi  hum yunsyirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Amit takhazooo aalihatam minal ardi hum yunshiroon

ayah.transliteration: Lau kāna fīhimā ālihatun illallāhu lafasadatā, fa subḥānallāhi rabbil-‘arsyi ‘ammā yaṣifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Law kaana feehimaaa aalihatun illal laahu lafasadataa; fa-Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yus'alu ‘ammā yaf‘alu wa hum yus'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yus'alu 'ammaa yaf'alu wa hum yus'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Amittakhażū min dūnihī ālihah(tan), qul hātū burhānakum, hāżā żikru mam ma‘iya wa żikru man qablī, bal akṡaruhum lā ya‘lamūnal-ḥaqqa fahum mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Amit takhazoo min doonihee aalihatan qul haatoo burhaanakum haaza zikru mam ma'iya wa zikru man qablee; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoonal haqqa fahum mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnā min qablika mir rasūlin illā nūḥī ilaihi annahū lā ilāha illā ana fa‘budūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolin illaa nooheee ilaihi annahoo laaa ilaaha illaaa Ana fa'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāluttakhażar-raḥmānu waladan subḥānah(ū), bal ‘ibādum mukramūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalut takhazar Rahmaanu waladan Subhaanah; bal 'ibaadum mkkramoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yasbiqūnahū bil-qauli wa hum bi'amrihī ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yasbiqoonahoo bil qawli wa hum bi amrihee ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘lamū mā baina aidīhim wa mā khalfahum wa lā yasyfa‘ūna illā limanirtaḍā wa hum min khasy-yatihī musyfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ya'lamu maa baina aideehim wa maa khalfahum wa laa yashfa'oona illaa limanir tadaa wa hum min khash yatihee mushfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yaqul minhum innī ilāhun min dūnihī fa żālika najzīhi jahannam(a), każālika najziẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa mai yaqul minhum inneee ilaahum min doonihee fazaalika najzeehi Jahannam; kazaalika najziz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yaral-lażīna kafarū annas-samāwāti wal-arḍa kānatā ratqan fa fataqnāhumā, wa ja‘alnā minal-mā'i kulla syai'in ḥayy(in),  afalā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaral lazeena kafarooo annas samaawaati wal arda kaanataa ratqan faftaqnaahumaa wa ja'alnaa minal maaa'i kulla shai'in haiyin afalaa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnā fil-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bihim, wa ja‘anā fīhā fijājan subulal la‘allahum yahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bihim wa ja'alnaa feehaa fijaajan subulal la'allahum yahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnas-samā'a saqfam maḥfūẓā(n), wa hum ‘an āyātihā mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnas samaaa'a saqfam mahfoozanw wa hum 'an Aayaatihaa mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī khalaqal-laila wan-nahāra wasy-syamsa wal-qamar(a), kullun fī falakiy yasbaḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee khalaqal laila wannahaara washshamsa wal qamara kullun fee falakiny yashbahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ja‘alnā libasyarim min qablikal-khuld(a), afa'im mitta fahumul-khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa ja'alnaa libasharim min qablikal khuld; afaimmitta fahumul khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Kullu nafsin żā'iqatul-maut(i), wa nablūkum bisy-syarri wal-khairi fitnah(tan), wa ilainā turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawt; wa nablookum bishsharri walkhairi fitnatanw wa ilainaa turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ra'ākal-lażīna kafarū iy yattakhiżūnaka illā huzuwā(n), ahāżal-lażī yażkuru ālihatakum, wa hum biżikrir-raḥmāni hum kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa ra aakal lazeena kafarooo iny-yattakhizoonaka illa huzuwaa; ahaazal lazee yazkuru aalihatakum wa hum bi zikrir Rahmaani hum kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Khuliqal-insānu min ‘ajal(in), sa'urīkum āyātī falā tasta‘jilūn(i).
ayah.translation: Khuliqal insaanu min 'ajal; sa ureekum Aayaatee falaa tasta'jiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-wa‘du in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Lau ya‘lamul-lażīna kafarū ḥīna lā yakuffūna ‘aw wujūhihimun nāra wa lā ‘an ẓuhūrihim wa lā hum yunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Law ya'lamul lazeena kafaroo heena laa yakuffoona 'anw wujoohihimun Naara wa laa 'an zuhoorihim wa laa hum yunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Bal ta'tīhim bagtatan fa tabhatuhum falā yastaṭī‘ūna raddahā wa lā hum yunẓarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal taateehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falaa yastatee'oona raddahaa wa laa hum yunzaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqadistuhzi'a birusulim min qablika fa ḥāqa bil-lażīna sakhirū minhum mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fahaaqa billazeena sakhiroo minhum maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qul may yakla'ukum bil-laili wan-nahāri minar-raḥmān(i), bal hum ‘an żikrihim mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul mai yakla 'ukum billaili wannahaari minar Rahmaan; bal hum 'an zikri Rabbihim mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Am lahum ālihatun tamna‘uhum min dūninā, lā yastaṭī‘ūna naṣra anfusihim wa lā hum minnā yuṣḥabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am lahum aalihatun tamna'ulum min dooninaa; laa yastatee'oona nasra anfusihim wa laa hum minnna yus-haboon

ayah.transliteration: Bal matta‘nā hā'ulā'i wa ābā'ahum ḥattā ṭāla ‘alaihimul-‘umur(u), afalā yarauna annā na'til-arḍa nanquṣuhā min aṭrāfihā, afahumul-gālibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal matta'naa haaa'ulaaa'i wa aabaaa'ahum hattaa taala 'alaihimul 'umur; afalaa yarawna anna naatil arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; afahumul ghaaliboon

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamā unżirukum bil-waḥy(i), wa lā yasma‘uṣ-ṣummud-du‘ā'a iżā mā yunżarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul innamaaa unzirukum bilwahyi; wa laa yasma'us summud du'aaa'a izaa maa yunzaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'im massathum nafḥatum min ‘ażābi rabbika layaqūlunna yā wailanā innā kunnā ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la'im massat hum nafhatum min 'azaabi Rabbika la yaqoolunna yaawailanaaa innnaa kunnaa zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa naḍa‘ul-mawāzīnal-qisṭa liyaumil-qiyāmati falā tuẓlamu nafsun syai'ā(n), wa in kāna miṡqāla ḥabbatim min khardalin atainā bihā, wa kafā binā ḥāsibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa nada'ul mawaazeenal qista li Yawmil Qiyaamati falaa tuzlamu nafsun shai'aa; wa in kaana misqaala habbatim min khardalin atainaa bihaa; wa kafaa binaa haasibeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsā wa hārūnal-furqāna wa ḍiyā'aw wa żikral lil-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosa wa haaroonal Furqaana wa diyaa'anw wa zikral lilmuttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yakhsyauna rabbahum bil-gaibi wa hum minas-sā‘ati musyfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi wa hum minas Saa'ati mushfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa hāżā żikrum mubārakun anzalnāh(u), afa antum lahū munkirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa haazaa Zikrum Mubaarakun anzalnaah; afa antum lahoo munkiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā ibrāhīma rusydahū min qablu wa kunnā bihī ‘ālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaaa Ibraaheema rushdahoo min qablu wa kunnaa bihee 'aalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Iż qāla li'abīhi wa qaumihī mā hāżihit-tamāṡīlul-latī antum lahā ‘ākifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz qaala li abeehi wa qawmihee maa haazihit tamaaseelul lateee antum lahee 'aakifoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū wajadnā ābā'anā lahā ‘ābidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa lahaa 'aabideen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla laqad kuntum antum wa ābā'ukum fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Qaala laqad kuntum antum wa aabaaa'ukum fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqqi am anta minal-lā‘ibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo aji'tanaa bil haqqi am anta minal laa'ibeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla bar rabbukum rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍil-lażī faṭarahunn(a), wa ana ‘alā żālikum minasy-syāhidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala bar Rabbukum Rabbus samaawaati wal ardil lazee fatarahunna wa ana 'alaa zaalikum minash shaahideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa tallāhi la'akīdanna aṣnāmakum ba‘da an tuwallū mudbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa tallaahi la akeedanna asnaamakum ba'da an tuwalloo mudbireen

ayah.transliteration: Fa ja‘alahum jużāżan illā kabīral lahum la‘allahum ilaihi yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Faja'alahum juzaazan illaa kabeeral lahum la'allahum ilaihi yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū man fa‘ala hāżā bi'ālihatinā innahū laminaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo man fa'ala haazaa bi aalihatinaaa innahoo laminaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū sami‘nā fatay yażkuruhum yuqālu lahū ibrāhīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo sami'naa fatany yazkuruhum yuqaalu lahooo Ibraaheem

ayah.transliteration: Qālū fa'tū bihī ‘alā a‘yunin-nāsi la‘allahum yasyhadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo faatoo bihee 'alaaa a'yunin naasi la'allahum yash hadoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū a'anta fa‘alta hāżā bi'ālihatinā yā ibrāhīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo 'a-anta fa'alta haazaa bi aalihatinaa yaaa Ibraaheem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla bal fa‘alahū kabīruhum hāżā fas'alūhum in kānū yanṭiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala bal fa'alahoo kabeeruhum haazaa fas'aloohum in kaanoo yantiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa raja‘ū ilā anfusihim fa qālū innakum antumuẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Faraja'ooo ilaaa anfusihim faqaalooo innakum antumuz zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma nukisū ‘alā ru'ūsihim, laqad ‘alimta mā hā'ulā'i yanṭiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa nukisoo 'alaa ru'oosihim laqad 'alimta maa haaa'ulaaa'i yantiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla afata‘budūna min dūnillāhi mā lā yanfa‘ukum syai'aw wa lā yaḍurrukum.
ayah.translation: Qaala afata'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'ukum shai'anw wa laa yadurrukum

ayah.transliteration: Uffil lakum wa limā ta‘budūna min dūnillāh(i), afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Uffil lakum wa limaa ta'budoona min doonil laah; afalaa ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū ḥarriqūhu wanṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fā‘ilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo harriqooho wansurooo aalihatakum in kuntum faa'ileen

ayah.transliteration: Qulnā yā nāru kūnī bardaw wa salāman ‘alā ibrāhīm(a).
ayah.translation: Qulnaa yaa naaru koonee bardanw wa salaaman 'alaaa Ibraaheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa arādū bihī kaidan fa ja‘alnāhumul-akhsarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa araadoo bihee kaidan faja'alnaahumul akhsareen

ayah.transliteration: Wa najjaināhu wa lūṭan ilal-arḍil-latī bāraknā fīhā lil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa najjainaahu wa Lootan ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa lil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa wahabnā lahū isḥāqa wa ya‘qūba nāfilah(tan), wa kullan ja‘alnā  ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa wahabnaa lahooo Ishaaq; wa Ya'qooba naafilah; wa kullan ja'alnaa saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnāhum a'immatay yahdūna bi'amrinā wa auḥainā ilaihim fi‘lal-khairāti wa iqāmaṣ-ṣalāti wa ītā'az-zakāh(ti), wa kānū lanā ‘ābidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaahum a'immatany yahdoona bi amrinaa wa awhainaaa ilaihim fi'lal khairaati wa iqaamas Salaati wa eetaaa'az Zakaati wa kaanoo lanaa 'aabideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lūṭan ātaināhu ḥumkaw wa ‘ilmaw wa najjaināhu minal-qaryatil-latī kānat ta‘malul-khabā'iṡ(a), innahum kānū qauma sau'in fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Lootan aatainaahu hukmanw wa 'ilmanw wa najjainaahu minal qaryatil latee kaanat ta'malul khabaaa'is; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa adkhalnāhu fī raḥmatinā,  innahū minaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa adkhalnaahu fee rahmatinaa innahoo minas saalihee

ayah.transliteration: Wa nūḥan iż nādā min qablu fastajabnā lahū fa najjaināhu wa ahlahū minal-karbil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Wa noohan iz naadaa min qablu fastajabnaa lahoo fanajjainaahu wa ahlahoo minal karbil 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa naṣarnāhu minal-qaumil-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātinā, innahum kānū qauma sau'in fa agraqnāhum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa nasarnaahu minal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa; innahum kkaanoo qawma saw'in fa-aghraq naahum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Wa dāwūda wa sulaimāna iż yaḥkumāni fil-ḥarṡi iż nafasyat fīhi ganamul-qaum(i), wa kunnā liḥukmihim syāhidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Daawooda wa Sulaimaana iz yahkumaani fil harsi iz nafashat feehi ghanamul qawmi wa kunnaa lihukmihim shaahideen

ayah.transliteration: Fa fahhamnāhā sulaimān(a), wa kullan ātainā ḥukmaw wa ‘ilmā(n), wa sakhkharnā ma‘a dāwūdal-jibāla yusabbiḥna waṭ-ṭair(a), wa kunnā fā‘ilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fafahhamnaahaa sulaimaan; wa kullan aatainaa hukmanw wa'ilmanw wa sakh kharnaa ma'a Daawoodal jibaala yusabbihna wattayr; wa kunnaa faa'ileen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘allamnāhu ṣan‘ata labūsil lakum lituḥṣinakum mim ba'sikum, fahal antum syākirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa 'allamanaahu san'ata laboosil lakum lituhsinakum mim baasikum fahal antum shaakiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lisulaimānar-rīḥa ‘āṣifatan tajrī bi'amrihī ilal-arḍil-latī bāraknā fīhā, wa kunnā bikulli syai'in ‘ālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa li Sulaimaanar reeha 'aasifatan tajree bi amriheee ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa; wa kunnaa bikulli shai'in 'aalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa minasy-syayāṭīna may yagūṣūna lahū wa ya‘malūna ‘amalan dūna żālik(a), wa kunnā lahum ḥāfiẓīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa minash Shayaateeni mai yaghoosoona lahoo wa ya'maloona 'amalan doona zaalika wa kunna lahum baafizeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ayyūba iż nādā rabbahū annī massaniyaḍ-ḍurru wa anta arḥamur-rāḥimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Ayyooba iz naadaa Rabbahooo annee massaniyad durru wa Anta arhamur raahimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fastajabnā lahū fa kasyafnā mā bihī min ḍurriw wa ātaināhu ahlahū wa miṡlahum ma‘ahum raḥmatam min ‘indinā wa żikrā lil-‘ābidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fastajabnaa lahoo fakashaf naa maa bihee min durrinw wa aatainaahu ahlahoo wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatam min 'indinaa wa zikraa lil'aabideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ismā‘īla wa idrīsa wa żal-kifl(i), kullum minaṣ-ṣābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Ismaa'eela wa Idreesa wa Zal Kifli kullum minas saabireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa adkhalnāhum fī raḥmatinā, innahum minaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa adkhalnaahum fee rahmatinaa innahum minas saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa żan-nūni iż żahaba mugāḍiban fa ẓanna allan naqdira ‘alaihi fa nādā fiẓ-ẓulumāti allā ilāha illā anta subḥānaka innī kuntu minaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Zan Nooni iz zahaba mughaadiban fazaanna al lan naqdira 'alaihi fanaanna al lan naqdira 'alaihi fanaadaa fiz zulumaati al laaa ilaaha illaaa Anta Subhaanaka innee kuntu minaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fastajabnā lahū wa najjaināhu minal-gamm(i), wa każālika nunjil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fastajabnaa lahoo wa najjainaahu minal ghamm; wa kazaalika nunjil mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa zakariyyā iż nādā rabbahū rabbi lā tażarnī fardaw wa anta khairul-wāriṡīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Zakariyyaaa iz naadaa Rabbahoo Rabbi laa tazarnee fardanw wa Anta khairul waariseen

ayah.transliteration: Fastajabnā lah(ū), wa wahabnā lahū yaḥyā wa aṣlaḥnā lahū zaujah(ū), innahum kānū yusāri‘ūna fil-khairāti wa yad‘ūnanā ragabaw wa rahabā(n), wa kānū lanā khāsyi‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Fastajabnaa lahoo wa wahabnaa lahoo Yahyaa Wa aslahnaa lahoo zawjah; innahum kaanoo yusaari'oona fil khairaati wa yad'oonanaa raghabanw wa rahabaa; wa kaanoo lanaa khaashi'een

ayah.transliteration: Wal-latī aḥṣanat farjahā fa nafakhnā fīhā mir rūḥinā wa ja‘alnāhā wabnahā āyatal lil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehaa mir roohinaa wa ja'alnaahaa wabnahaaa Aayatal lil'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Inna hāżihī ummatukum ummataw wāḥidah(tan), wa ana rabbukum fa‘budūn(i).
ayah.translation: Inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw wa Ana Rabbukum fa'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa taqaṭṭa‘ū amrahum bainahum, kullun ilainā rāji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa taqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum kullun ilainaaa raaji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Famay ya‘mal minaṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa huwa mu'minun falā kufrāna lisa‘yih(ī), wa innā lahū kātibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Famai ya'mal minas saalihaati wa huwa mu'minun falaa kufraana lisa'yihee wa innaa lahoo kaatiboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḥarāmun ‘alā qaryatin ahlaknāhā, innahum lā yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa haraamun 'alaa qaryatin ahlaknaahaaa annahum laa yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā futiḥat ya'jūju wa ma'jūju wa hum min kulli ḥadabiy yansilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa futihat Yaajooju wa Maajooju wa hum min kulli hadabiny yansiloon

ayah.transliteration: Waqtarabal-wa‘dul-ḥaqqu fa iżā hiya syākhiṣatun abṣārul-lażīna kafarū, yā wailanā qad kunnā fī gaflatim min hāżā bal kunnā ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Waqtarabal wa'dul haqqu fa-izaa hiya shaakhisatun absaarul lazeena kafaroo yaawailanaa qad kunna fee ghaflatim min haaza bal kunnaa zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Innakum wa mā ta‘budūna min dūnillāhi ḥaṣabu jahannam(a), antum lahā wāridūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innakum wa maa ta'budoona min doonil laahi hasabu Jahannama antum lahaa waaridoon

ayah.transliteration: Lau kāna hā'ulā'i ālihatam mā waradūhā, wa kullun fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Law kaana haaa'ulaaa'i aalihatam maa waradoohaa wa kullun feehaa khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Lahum fīhā zafīruw wa hum fīhā lā yasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lahum feehaa zafeerunw wa hum feehaa laa yasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna sabaqat lahum minnal-ḥusnā, ulā'ika ‘anhā mub‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena sabaqat lahum minnal husnaaa ulaaa'ika 'anhaa mub'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yasma‘ūna ḥasīsahā, wa hum fīmasytahat anfusuhum khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yasma'oona hasee sahaa wa hum fee mash tahat anfusuhum khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yaḥzunuhumul-faza‘ul-akbaru wa tatalaqqāhumul-malā'ikah(tu), hāżā yaumukumul-lażī kuntum tū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yahzunuhumul faza'ul akbaru wa tatalaq qaahumul malaaa'ikatu haazaa Yawmukumul lazee kuntum too'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Yauma naṭwis-samā'a kaṭayyis-sijilli lil-kutib(i), kamā bada'nā awwala khalqin nu‘īduh(ū), wa‘dan ‘alainā, innā kunnā fā‘ilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma natwis samaaa'a kataiyis sijilli lilkutub; kamaa badaanaa awwala khalqin nu'eeduh; wa'dan 'alainaa; innaa kunna faa'ileen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad katabnā fiz-zabūri mim ba‘diż-żikri annal-arḍa yariṡuhā ‘ibādiyaṣ-ṣāliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad katabnaa fiz Zaboori mim ba'diz zikri annal arda yarisuhaa 'ibaadi yas saalihoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī hāżā labalāgal liqaumin ‘ābidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna fee haaza labalaa ghal liqawmin 'aabideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnāka illā raḥmatal lil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaaka illaa rahmatal lil'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamā yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhuw wāḥid(un), fahal antum muslimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul innamaa yoohaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum illaahunw Waahid, fahal antum muslimoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa in tawallau fa qul āżantukum ‘alā sawā'(in), wa in adrī aqarībun am ba‘īdum mā tū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa in tawallaw faqul aazantukum 'alaa sawaaa'; wa in adreee aqareebun am ba'eedum maa too'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Innahū ya‘lamul-jahra minal-qauli wa ya‘lamu mā taktumūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innahoo ya'lamul jahra minal qawli wa ya'lamu maa taktumoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in adrī la‘allahū fitnatul lakum wa matā‘un ilā ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa in adree la'allahoo fitnatul lakum wa mataa'un ilaaheen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbiḥkum bil-ḥaqq(i), wa rabbunar-raḥmānul-musta‘ānu ‘alā mā taṣifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbih kum bil haqq; wa Rabbunar Rahmaa nul musta'aanu 'alaa maa tasifoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nāsuttaqū rabbakum, inna zalzalatas-sā‘ati syai'un ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan naasuttaqoo Rabbakum; inna zalzalatas Saa'ati shai'un 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Yauma taraunahā tażhalu kullu murḍi‘atin ‘ammā arḍa‘at wa taḍa‘u kullu żāti ḥamlin ḥamlahā wa taran-nāsa sukārā wa mā hum bisukārā wa lākinna ‘ażāballāhi syadīd(un).
ayah.translation: Yawma tarawnahaa tazhalu kullu murdi'atin 'ammaaa arda'at wa tada'u kullu zaati hamlin hamlahaa wa tarannaasa sukaaraa wa maa hum bisukaaraa wa lakinaa 'azaabal laahi shadeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa minan-nāsi may yujādilu fillāhi bigairi ‘ilmiw wa yattabi‘u kulla syaiṭānim marīd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa minan naasi mai yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi 'ilminw wa yattabi'u kullaa shaitaanim mareed

ayah.transliteration: Kutiba ‘alaihi annahū man tawallāhu fa annahū yuḍilluhū wa yahdīhi ilā ‘ażābis-sa‘īr(i).
ayah.translation: Kutiba 'alaihi annahoo man tawallaahu fa annahoo yudil lauhoo wa yahdeehi ilaa 'azaabis sa'eer

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nāsu in kuntum fī raibim minal-ba‘ṡi fa innā khalaqnākum min turābin ṡumma min nuṭfatin ṡumma min ‘alaqatin ṡumma mim muḍgatim mukhallaqatiw wa gairi mukhallaqatil linubayyina lakum, wa nuqirru fil-arḥāmi mā nasyā'u ilā ajalim musamman ṡumma nukhrijukum ṭiflan ṡumma litablugū asyuddakum, wa minkum may yutawaffā wa minkum may yuraddu ilā arżalil-‘umuri likailā ya‘lama ba‘da  ‘ilmin syai'ā(n), wa taral-arḍa hāmidatan fa iżā anzalnā ‘alaihal-mā'ahtazzat wa rabat wa ambatat min kulli zaujim bahīj(in).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu in kuntum fee raibim minal ba'si fa innaa khalaqnaakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summaa min 'alaqatin summa mim mud ghatim mukhal laqatinw wa ghairi mukhalla qatil linubaiyina lakum; wa nuqirru fil arhaami maa nashaaa'u ilaaa ajalim musam man summa nukhrijukum tiflan summa litablughooo ashud dakum wa minkum mai yutawaffa wa minkum mai yuraddu ilaaa arzalil 'umuri likailaa ya'lama mim ba'di 'ilmin shai'aa; wa taral arda haamidatan fa izaaa anzalnaa 'alaihal maaa'ah tazzat wa rabat wa ambatat min kulli zawjim baheej

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annallāha huwal-ḥaqqu wa annahū yuḥyil-mautā wa annahū ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annal laaha Huwal haqqu wa annahoo yuhyil mawtaa wa annahoo 'alaakulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa annas-sā‘ata ātiyatul lā raiba fīhā, wa annallāha yab‘aṡu man fil-qubūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa annas Saa'ata aatiya tul laa raiba feeha wa annal laaha yab'asuman fil quboor

ayah.transliteration: Wa minan-nāsi may yujādilu fillāhi bigairi ‘ilmiw wa lā hudaw wa lā kitābim munīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa minan naasi mai yujaadilu fil laahi bighairi 'ilminw wa laa hudanw wa laa Kitaabim Muneer

ayah.transliteration: Ṡāniya ‘iṭfihī liyuḍilla ‘an sabīlillāh(i), lahū fid-dun-yā khizyuw wa nużīquhū yaumal-qiyāmati ‘ażābal-ḥarīq(i).
ayah.translation: Saaniya 'itfihee liyudilla 'an sabeelil laahi lahoo fiddun yaa khizyunw wa nuzeequhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati 'azaabal lhareeq

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa annallāha laisa biẓallāmil lil-‘abīd(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat yadaaka wa annal laaha laisa bizallaamil lil'abeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa minan-nāsi may ya‘budullāha ‘alā ḥarf(in), fa in aṣābahū khairuniṭma'anna  bih(ī), wa in aṣābathu fitnatuninqalaba ‘alā wajhih(ī), khasirad-dun-yā wal-ākhirah(ta), żālika huwal-khusrānul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa minan naasi mai ya'budul laaha 'alaa harfin fa in asaabahoo khairunit maanna bihee wa in asaabat hu fitnatunin qalaba 'alaa wajhihee khasirad dunyaa wal aakhirah; zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Yad‘ū min dūnillāhi mā lā yaḍurruhū wa mā lā yanfa‘uh(ū), żālika huwaḍ-ḍalālul-ba‘īd(u).
ayah.translation: Yad'oo min doonil laahi maa laa yadurruhoo wa maa laa yanfa'uh' zaalika huwad dalaalul ba'ed

ayah.transliteration: Yad‘ū laman ḍarruhū aqrabu min naf‘ih(ī), labi'sal-maulā wa labi'sal-‘asyīr(u).
ayah.translation: Yad'oo laman darruhooo aqrabu min naf'ih; labi'salmawlaa wa labi'sal 'asheer

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha yudkhilul-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), innallāha yaf‘alu mā yurīd(u).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha yudkhilul laeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaar; innal laaha yaf'alu maa yureed

ayah.transliteration: Man kāna yaẓunnu allay yanṣurahullāhu fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirati falyamdud bisababin ilas-samā'i ṡummalyaqṭa‘ falyanẓur hal yużhibanna kaiduhū mā yagīẓ(u).
ayah.translation: Man kaana yazunnu allai yansurahul laahu fid dunyaa wal aakhirati fal yamdud bisababin ilas samaaa'i summal yaqta' falyanzur hal yuzhibanna kaiduhoo maa yagheez

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika anzalnāhu āyātim bayyināt(in), wa annallāha yahdī may yurīd(u).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika anzalnaahu aayaatim baiyinaatinw wa annal laaha yahdee mai yureed

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wal-lażīna hādū waṣ-ṣābi'īna wan-naṣārā wal-majūsa wal-lażīna asyrakū, innallāha yafṣilu bainahum yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), innallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in syahīd(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wallazeena haadoo was saabi'eena wan nasaaraa wal Majoosa wallazeena ashrakooo innal laaha yafsilu bainahum yawmal qiyaamah; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in shaheed

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha yasjudu lahū man fis-samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi wasy-syamsu wal-qamaru wan-nujūmu wal-jibālu wasy-syajaru wad-dawābbu wa kaṡīrum minan-nās(i), wa kaṡīrun ḥaqqa ‘alaihil-‘ażāb(u), wa may yuhinillāhu famā lahū mim mukrim(in), innallāha yaf‘alu mā yasyā'(u).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha yasjudu lahoo man fis samaawaati wa man fil ardi wash shamsu walqamaru wan nu joomu wal jibaalu wash shajaru wad dawaaabbu wa kaseerum minan naasi wa kaseerun haqqa 'alaihil 'azaab; wa mai yuhinil laahu famaa lahoo mim mukrim; innallaaha yaf'alu maa yashaaa

ayah.transliteration: Hāżāni khaṣmānikhtaṣamū fī rabbihim fal-lażīna kafarū quṭṭi‘at lahum ṡiyābum min nār(in), yuṣabbu min fauqi ru'ūsihimul-ḥamīm(u).
ayah.translation: Haazaani khasmaanikh tasamoo fee Rabbihim fal lazeena kafaroo qutti'at lahum siyaabum min naar; yusabbu min fawqi ru'oosihimul hameem

ayah.transliteration: Yuṣharu bihī mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūd(u).
ayah.translation: Yusharu bihee maa fee butoonihim waljulood

ayah.transliteration: Wa lahum maqāmi‘u min ḥadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa lahum maqaami'u min hadeed

ayah.transliteration: Kullamā arādū ay yakhrujū minhā min gammin u‘īdū fīhā, wa żūqū ‘ażābal-ḥarīq(i).
ayah.translation: Kullamaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaa min ghammin u'eedoo feeha wa zooqoo 'azaabal hareeq

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha yudkhilul-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru yuḥallauna fīhā min asāwira min żahabiw wa lu'lu'ā(n), wa libāsuhum fīhā ḥarīr(un).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw wa lu'lu'aa; wa libaasuhum feehaa hareer

ayah.transliteration: Wa hudū ilaṭ-ṭayyibi minal-qaul(i), wa hudū ilā ṣirāṭil-ḥamīd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa hudooo ilat taiyibi minal qawli wa hudooo ilaaa siraatil hameed

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna kafarū wa yaṣuddūna ‘an sabīlillāhi wal-masjidil-ḥarāmil-lażī ja‘alnāhu lin-nāsi sawā'anil-‘ākifu fīhi wal-bād(i), wa may yurid fīhi bi'ilḥādim biẓulmin nużiqhu min ‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena kafaroo wa yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi wal Masjidil Haraamil lazee ja'alnaahu linnaasi sawaaa'anil 'aakifu feehi walbaad; wa mai yurid feehi bi ilhaadim bizulmin nuziqhu min 'azaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż bawwa'nā li'ibrāhīma makānal-baiti allā tusyrik bī syai'aw wa ṭahhir baitiya liṭ-ṭā'ifīna wal-qā'imīna war-rukka‘is-sujūd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa iz bawwaanaa li Ibraaheema makaanal Baiti allaa tushrik bee shai'anw wa tahhir Baitiya litaaa'ifeena walqaaa' imeena warrukka 'is sujood

ayah.transliteration: Wa ażżin fin-nāsi bil-ḥajji ya'tūka rijālaw wa ‘alā kulli ḍāmiriy ya'tīna min kulli fajjin ‘amīq(in).
ayah.translation: Wa azzin fin naasi bil Hajji yaatooka rijaalanw wa 'alaa kulli daamiriny yaateena min kulli fajjin 'ameeq

ayah.transliteration: Liyasyhadū manāfi‘a lahum wa yażkurusmallāhi fī ayyāmim ma‘lūmātin ‘alā mā razaqahum mim bahīmatil-an‘ām(i), fa kulū minhā wa aṭ‘imul-bā'isal-faqīr(a).
ayah.translation: Li yashhadoo manaafi'a lahum wa yazkurus mal laahi feee ayyaamimma'loomaatin 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aami fakuloo minhaa wa at'imul baaa'isal faqeer

ayah.transliteration: Ṡummal yaqḍū tafaṡafahum wal yūfū nużūrahum wal yaṭṭawwafū bil-baitil-‘atīq(i).
ayah.translation: Summal yaqdoo tafasahum wal yoofoo nuzoorahum wal yattawwafoo bil Baitil 'Ateeq

ayah.transliteration: Żālika wa may yu‘aẓẓim ḥurumātillāhi fa huwa khairul lahū ‘inda rabbih(ī), wa uḥillat lakumul-an‘āmu illā mā yutlā ‘alaikum fajtanibur-rijsa minal-auṡāni wajtanibū qaulaz-zūr(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalika wa mai yu'azzim hurumaatil laahi fahuwa khairul lahoo 'inda Rabbih; wa uhillat lakumul an'aamu illaa maa yutlaa 'alaikum fajtanibur rijsa minal awsaani wajtaniboo qawlaz zoor

ayah.transliteration: Ḥunafā'a lillāhi gaira musyrikīna bih(ī), wa may yusyrik billāhi fa ka'annamā kharra minas-samā'i fa takhṭafuhuṭ-ṭairu au tahwī bihir-rīḥu fī makānin saḥīq(in).
ayah.translation: Hunafaaa'a lillaahi ghaira mushrikeena bih; wa mai yushrik billaahi faka annamaa kharra minas samaaa'i fatakh tafuhut tairu aw tahwee bihir reehu bee makaanin saheeq

ayah.transliteration: Żālika wa may yu‘aẓẓim sya‘ā'irallāhi fa innahā min taqwal-qulūb(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalika wa mai yu'azzim sha'aaa'iral laahi fa innahaa min taqwal quloob

ayah.transliteration: Lakum fīhā manāfi‘u ilā ajalim musamman ṡumma maḥilluhā ilal-baitil-‘atīq(i).
ayah.translation: Lakum feehaa manaafi'u ilaaa ajalim musamman summa mahilluhaaa ilal Baitil 'Ateeq

ayah.transliteration: Wa likulli ummatin ja‘alnā mansakal liyażkurusmallāhi ‘alā mā razaqahum mim bahīmatil-an‘ām(i), fa ilāhukum ilāhuw wāḥidun fa lahū aslimū, wa basysyiril-mukhbitīn(a).
