ayah.translation: Wa likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakal liyazkurus mal laahi 'alaa maa razaqahum mim baheematil an'aam; failaahukum ilaahunw Waahidun falahooo aslimoo; wa bashshiril mukhbiteen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna iżā żukirallāhu wajilat qulūbuhum waṣ-ṣābirīna ‘alā mā aṣābahum wal-muqīmiṣ-ṣalāh(ti), wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena izaa zukiral laahu wajilat quloobuhum wassaabireena 'alaa maaa asaabahum walmuqeemis Salaati wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-budna ja‘alnāhā lakum min sya‘ā'irillāhi lakum fīhā khair(un), fażkurusmallāhi ‘alaihā ṣawāff(a), fa iżā wajabat junūbuhā fa kulū minhā wa aṭ‘imul-qāni‘a wal-mu‘tarr(a), każālika sakhkharnāhā lakum la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Walbudna ja'alnaahaa lakum min sha'aaa'iril laahi lakum feehaa khairun fazkurusmal laahi 'alaihaa sawaaff; fa izaa wajabat junoobuhaa fakuloo minhaa wa at'imul qaani'a walmu'tarr; kazaalika sakhkharnaahaa lakum la'allakum tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Lay yanālallāha luḥūmuhā wa lā dimā'uhā wa lākiy yanāluhut-taqwā minkum, każālika sakhkharahā lakum litukabbirullāha ‘alā mā hadākum, wa basysyiril-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Lany yanaalal laaha luhoo muhaa wa laa dimaaa'uhaa wa laakiny yanaaluhut taqwaa minkum; kazaalika sakhkharhaa lakum litukabbirul laaha 'alaa ma hadaakum; wa bashshirul muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha yudāfi‘u ‘anil-lażīna āmanū, innallāha lā yuḥibbu kulla khawwānin kafūr(in).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha yudaafi' 'anil lazeena aamanoo; innal laaha laa yuhibbu kulla khawwaanin kafoor

ayah.transliteration: Użina lil-lażīna yuqātalūna bi'annahum ẓulimū, wa innallāha ‘alā naṣrihim laqadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Uzina lillazeena yuqaataloona bi annahum zulimoo; wa innal laaha 'alaa nasrihim la Qaderr

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna ukhrijū min diyārihim bigairi ḥaqqin illā ay yaqūlū rabbunallāh(u), wa lau lā daf‘ullāhin-nāsa ba‘ḍahum biba‘ḍil lahuddimat ṣawāmi‘u wa biya‘uw wa ṣalawātuw wa masājidu yużkaru fīhasmullāhi kaṡīrā(n), wa layanṣurannallāhu may yanṣuruh(ū), innallāha laqawiyyun ‘azīz(un).
ayah.translation: Allazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim bighairi haqqin illaaa any yaqooloo rabbunallaah; wa law laa daf'ul laahin naasa ba'dahum biba'dil lahuddimat sawaami'u wa biya'unw wa salawaatunw wa masaajidu yuzkaru feehasmul laahi kaseeraa; wa layansurannal laahu mai yansuruh; innal laaha la qawiyyun 'Azeez

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna im makkannāhum fil-arḍi aqāmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātawuz-zakāta wa amarū bil-ma‘rūfi wa nahau ‘anil-munkar(i), wa lillāhi ‘āqibatul-umūr(i).
ayah.translation: Allazeena im makkan naahum fil ardi aqaamus Salaata wa aatawuz Zakaata wa amaroo bilma'roofi wa nahaw 'anil munkar; wa lillaahi 'aaqibatul umoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yukażżibūka faqad każżabat qablahum qaumu nūḥiw wa ‘āduw wa ṡamūd(u).
ayah.translation: Wa iny yukazzibooka faqad kazzabat qablahum qawmu Nooinw wa Aadunw wa Samood

ayah.transliteration: Wa qaumu ibrāhīma wa qaumu lūṭ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa qawmu Ibraaheema wa qawmu Loot

ayah.transliteration: Wa aṣḥābu madyan(a), wa kużżiba mūsā fa amlaitu lil-kāfirīna ṡumma akhażtuhum, fa kaifa kāna nakīr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa as haabu Madyana wa kuzziba Moosaa fa amlaitu lilkaafireena summa akhaztuhum fakaifa kaana nakeer

ayah.transliteration: Fa ka'ayyim min qaryatin ahlaknāhā wa hiya ẓālimatun fa hiya khāwiyatun ‘alā ‘urūsyihā, wa bi'rim mu‘aṭṭalatiw wa qaṣrim masyīd(in).
ayah.translation: Faka ayyim min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa wa hiya zaalimatun fahiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa wa bi'rim mu'at talatinw wa qasrim masheed

ayah.transliteration: Afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fa takūna lahum qulūbuy ya‘qilūna bihā au āżānuy yasma‘ūna bihā, fa innahā lā ta‘mal-abṣāru wa lākin ta‘mal-qulūbul-latī fiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fatakoona lahum quloobuny ya'qiloona bihaaa aw aazaanuny yasm'oona bihaa fa innahaa laa ta'mal absaaru wa laakin ta'mal quloobul latee fissudoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa yasta‘jilūnaka bil-‘ażābi wa lay yukhlifallāhu wa‘dah(ū), wa inna yauman ‘inda rabbika ka'alfi sanatim mimmā ta‘uddūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yasta'juloonaka bil'azaabi wa lany yukhlifal laahu wa'dah; wa inna yawman 'inda Rabbika ka'alfi sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ka'ayyim min qaryatin amlaitu lahā wa hiya ẓālimatun ṡumma akhażtuhā, wa ilayyal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin amlaitu lahaa wa hiya zaalimatun summa akhaztuhaa wa ilaiyal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Qul yā ayyuhan-nāsu innamā ana lakum nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Qul yaaa ayyuhan naasu innamaaa ana lakum nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Fal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum magfiratuw wa rizqun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilu saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw wa rizqun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna sa‘au fī āyātinā mu‘ājizīna ulā'ika aṣḥābul-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena sa'aw feee Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa ika As-haabul jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnā min qablika mir rasūliw wa lā nabiyyin illā iżā tamannā alqasy-syaiṭānu fī umniyyatih(ī), fa yansakhullāhu mā yulqisy-syaiṭānu ṡumma yuḥkimullāhu āyātih(ī), wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaa min qablika mir Rasoolinnw wa laa Nabiyyin illaaa izaaa tamannaaa alqash Shaitaanu feee umniy yatihee fa yansakhul laahu maa yulqish Shaitaanu summa yuhkimul laahu aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Liyaj‘ala mā yulqisy-syaiṭānu fitnatal lil-lażīna fī qulūbihim maraḍuw wal-qāsiyati qulūbuhum, wa innaẓ-ẓālimīna lafī syiqāqim ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Liyaj'ala maa yulqish Shaitaanu fitnatal lillazeena fee quloobihim maradunw walqaasiyati quloobuhum; wa innaz zaalimeena lafee shiqaaqim ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wa liya‘lamal-lażīna ūtul-‘ilma annahul-ḥaqqu mir rabbika fa yu'minū bihī fa tukhbita lahū qulūbuhum, wa innallāha lahādil-lażīna āmanū ilā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa liya'lamal lazeena ootul 'ilma annahul haqqu mir Rabbika fa yu'minoo bihee fatukhbita ahoo quloobuhum; wa innal laaha lahaadil lazeena aamanoo ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yazālul-lażīna kafarū fī miryatim minhu ḥattā ta'tiyahumus-sā‘atu  bagtatan au ya'tiyahum ‘ażābu yaumin ‘aqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yazaalul lazeena kafaroo fee miryatim minhu hattaa taatiyahumus Saa'atu baghtatan aw yaatiyahum 'azaabu Yawmin 'aqeem

ayah.transliteration: Al-mulku yauma'iżil lillāh(i), yaḥkumu bainahum, fal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti fī jannātin na‘īm(i).
ayah.translation: Almulku Yawma'izil lillaahi yahkumu bainahum; fallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati fee jannaatin Na'eem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna kafarū wa każżabū bi'āyātinā fa ulā'ika lahum ‘ażābum muhīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa fa ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hājarū fī sabīlillāhi ṡumma qutilū au mātū layarzuqannahumullāhu rizqan ḥasanā(n), wa innallāha lahuwa khairur-rāziqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena haajaroo fee sabeelil laahi summa qutilooo law maatoo la yarzuqan nahumul laahu rizqan hasanaa; wa innal laaha la Huwa khairur raaziqeen

ayah.transliteration: Layudkhilannahum mudkhalay yarḍaunah(ū), wa innallāha la‘alīmun ḥalīm(un).
ayah.translation: La yudkhilan nahum mud khalany yardawnah; wa innal laaha la 'Aleemun Haleem

ayah.transliteration: Żālika wa man ‘āqaba bimiṡli mā ‘ūqiba bihī ṡumma bugiya  ‘alaihi layanṣurannahullāh(u), innallāha la‘afuwwun gafūr(un).
ayah.translation: Zaalika wa man 'aaqaba bimisli maa 'ooqiba bihee summa bughiya 'alaihi la yansurannahul laah; innal laaha la 'Afuwwun Ghafoor

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annallāha yūlijul-laila fin-nahāri wa yūlijun-nahāra fil-laili wa annallāha samī‘um baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil laili wa annal laaha Samee'um Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annallāha huwal-ḥaqqu wa anna mā yad‘ūna min dūnihī huwal-bāṭilu wa annallāha huwal-‘aliyyul-kabīr(u).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annal laaha Huwal haqqu wa anna maa yad'oona min doonihee huwal baatilu wa annal laaha Huwal 'Aliyyul kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha anzala minas-samā'i mā'ā(n), fa tuṣbiḥul-arḍu mukhḍarrah(tan), innallāha laṭīfun khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fatusbihul ardu mukhdarrah; innal laaha Lateefun Khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Lahū mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), wa innallāha lahuwal-ganiyyul-ḥamīd(u).
ayah.translation: Lahoo ma fis samaawaati wa ma fil ard; wa innal laaha la Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha sakhkhara lakum mā fil-arḍi wal-fulka tajrī fil-baḥri bi'amrih(ī), wa yumsikus-samā'a an taqa‘a ‘alal-arḍi illā bi'iżnih(ī), innallāha bin-nāsi lara'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fil ardi wal fulka tajree fil bahri bi amrihee wa yumsikus samaaa'a an taqa'a 'alal ardi illaa biiznih; innal laaha binnaasi la Ra'oofur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī aḥyākum, ṡumma yumītukum ṡumma yuḥyīkum, innal-insāna lakafūr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee ahyaakum summa yumeetukum summma yuheekum; innal insaana lakafoor

ayah.transliteration: Likulli ummatin ja‘alnā mansakan hum nāsikūhu falā yunāzi‘unnaka fil-amri wad‘u ilā rabbik(a), innaka la‘alā hudam mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Likulli ummatin ja'alnaa mansakan hum naasikoohu falaa yunaazi 'unnaka fil amr; wad'u ilaa Rabbika innaka la 'alaa hudam mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa in jādalūka fa qulillāhu a‘lamu bimā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in jaadalooka faqulil laahu a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu yaḥkumu bainakum yaumal-qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahu yahkumu bainakum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kuntum feehi takhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Alam ta‘lam annallāha ya‘lamu mā fis-samā'i wal-arḍ(i), inna żālika fī kitāb(in), inna żālika ‘alallāhi yasīr(un).
ayah.translation: Alam ta'lam annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaaa'i wal ard; inna zaalika fee kitaab; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa ya‘budūna min dūnillāhi mā lam yunazzil bihī sulṭānaw wa mā laisa lahum bihī ‘ilm(un), wa mā liẓ-ẓālimīna min naṣīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa lam yunazzil bihee sultaananw wa maa laisa lahum bihee 'ilm; wa maa lizzaalimeena min naseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā tutlā ‘alaihim āyātunā bayyinātin ta‘rifu fī wujūhil-lażīna kafarul-munkar(a), yakādūna yasṭūna bil-lażīna yatlūna ‘alaihim āyātinā, qul afa unabbi'ukum bisyarrim min żālikum, an-nār(u), wa‘adahallāhul-lażīna kafarū, wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa tutlaa 'laihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin ta'rifu fee wujoohil lazeena kafarul munkara yakaadoona yastoona bil lazeena yatloona 'alaihim Aayaatinaa; qul afa unab bi'ukum bisharrim min zaalikum; an Naaru wa 'adahal laahul lazeena kafaroo wa bi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nāsu ḍuriba maṡalum fastami‘ū  lah(ū), innal-lażīna tad‘ūna min dūnillāhi lay yakhluqū żubābaw wa lawijtama‘ū lah(ū), wa iy yaslubhumuż-żubābu syai'al lā yastanqiżūhu minh(u), ḍa‘ufaṭ-ṭālibu wal-maṭlūb(u).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu duriba masalun fastami'oo lah; innal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi lai yakhluqoo zubaabanw wa lawijtama'oo lahoo wa iny yaslub humuz zubbabu shai'al laa yastan qizoohu minh; da'ufat taalibu walmatloob

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā qadarullāha ḥaqqa qadrih(ī), innallāha laqawiyyun ‘azīz(un).
ayah.translation: Maa qadrul laaha haqqa qadrih; innal laaha la Qawiyyun 'Azeez

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu yaṣṭafī minal-malā'ikati rusulaw wa minan-nās(i), innallāha samī‘um baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Allahu yastafee minal malaaa'ikati Rusulanw wa minan naas; innal laaha Samee'um Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘lamu mā baina aidīhim wa mā khalfahum, wa ilallāhi turja‘ul-umūr(u).
ayah.translation: Ya'lamu maa baina aydeehim wa maa khalfahum; wa ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanurka‘ū wasjudū wa‘budū rabbakum waf‘alul-khaira la‘allakum  tufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanur ka'oo wasjudoo wa'budoo Rabbakum waf'alul khaira la'allakum tuflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa jāhidū fillāhi ḥaqqa jihādih(ī), huwajtabākum wa mā ja‘ala ‘alaikum fid-dīni min ḥaraj(in), millata abīkum ibrāhīm(a), huwa sammākumul-muslimīn(a), min qablu wa fī hāżā liyakūnar-rasūlu syahīdan ‘alaikum wa takūnū syuhadā'a ‘alan-nās(i), fa aqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātuz-zakāta wa‘taṣimū billāh(i), huwa maulākum, fa ni‘mal-maulā wa ni‘man-naṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa jaahidoo fil laahi haqqa jihaadih; Huwaj tabaakum wa maa ja'ala 'alaikum fid deeni min haraj; Millata abeekum Ibraaheem; Huwa sammaakumul muslimeena min qablu wa fee haaza li yakoonar Rasoolu shaheedan 'alaikum wa takoonoo shuhadaaa'a 'alan naas; fa aqeemus salaata wa aatuz zakaata wa'tasimoo billaahi Huwa mawlaakum fani'mal mawlaa wa ni'man naseer

ayah.transliteration: Qad aflaḥal-mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qad aflahal mu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna hum fī ṣalātihim khāsyi‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena hum fee Salaatihim khaashi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum anil-lagwi muriḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum 'anillaghwimu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum liz-zakāti fā‘ilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum liz Zakaati faa'iloon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum lifurūjihim ḥāfiẓūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum lifuroo jihim haafizoon

ayah.transliteration: Illā ‘alā azwājihim au mā malakat aimānuhum fa innahum gairu malūmīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aimaanuhum fa innahum ghairu maloomeen

ayah.transliteration: Famanibtagā warā'a żālika fa ulā'ika humul-‘ādūn(a).
ayah.translation: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum li'amānātihim wa ‘ahdihim rā‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum li amaanaatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum ‘alā ṣalawātihim yuḥāfiẓūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum 'alaa Salawaatihim yuhaafizoon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika humul-wāriṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika humul waarisoon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yariṡūnal-firdaus(a), hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yarisoonal Firdawsa hum feehaa khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnal-insāna min sulālatim min ṭīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana min sulaalatim minteen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ja‘alnāhu nuṭfatan fī qarārim makīn(in).
ayah.translation: Summa ja'alnaahu nutfatan fee qaraarim makeen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma khalaqnan-nuṭfata ‘alaqatan fa khalaqnal-‘alaqata muḍgatan fa khalaqnal-muḍgata ‘iẓāman fa kasaunal-‘iẓāma laḥmā(n), ṡumma ansya'nāhu khalqan ākhar(a), fa tabārakallāhu aḥsanul-khāliqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa khalaqnan nutfata 'alaqatan fakhalaqnal 'alaqata mudghatan fakhalaq nal mudghata 'izaaman fakasawnal 'izaama lahman summa anshaanaahu khalqan aakhar; fatabaarakal laahu ahsanul khaaliqeen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma innakum ba‘da żālika lamayyitūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa innakum ba'da zaalika la maaiyitoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma innakum yaumal-qiyāmati tub‘aṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati tub'asoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnā fauqakum sab‘a ṭarā'iq(a), wa mā kunnā ‘anil-khalqi gāfilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad khalaqnaa fawqakum sab'a taraaa'iqa wa maa kunnaa 'anil khalqi ghaafileen

ayah.transliteration: Wa anzalnā minas-samā'i mā'am biqadarin fa askannāhu fil-arḍ(i), wa innā ‘alā żahābim bihī laqādirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa-askannaahu fil ardi wa innaa 'alaa zahaabim bihee laqaa diroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ansya'nā lakum bihī jannātim min nakhīliw wa a‘nāb(in), lakum fīhā fawākihu kaṡīratuw wa minhā ta'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa anshaanaa lakum bihee Jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naab; lakum feehaa fawaakihu kaseeratunw wa minhaa taakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa syajaratan takhruju min ṭūri sainā'a tambutu bid-duhni wa ṣibgil lil-ākilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa shajaratan takhruju min Toori Sainaaa'a tambutu bidduhni wa sibghil lil aakileen

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna lakum fil-an‘āmi la‘ibrah(tan), nusqīkum mimmā fī buṭūnihā wa lakum fīhā manāfi‘u kaṡīratuw wa minhā ta'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmaa fee butoonihaa wa lakum feehaa manaafi'u kaseeratunw wa minhaa taakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘alaihā wa ‘alal-fulki tuḥmalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa 'alaihaa wa'alal fulki tuhmaloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qaumihī fa qāla yā qaumi‘budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin gairuh(ū), afalā tattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa qawmi'budul laaha maa lakum min ilahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa qālal-mala'ul-lażīna kafarū min qaumihī mā hāżā illā basyarum miṡlukum, yurīdu ay yatafaḍḍala ‘alaikum, wa lau syā'allāhu la'anzala malā'ikah(tan), mā sami‘nā bihāżā fī ābā'inal-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faqaalal mala'ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum yureedu ai yatafaddala 'alaikum wa law shaaa'al laahu la anzala malaaa'ikatam maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: In huwa illā rajulum bihī jinnatun fa tarabbaṣū bihī ḥattā ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: In huwa illaa rajulum bihee jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihee hattan heen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbinṣurnī bimā każżabūn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbin surnee bimaa kazzaboon

ayah.transliteration: Fa auḥainā ilaihi aniṣna‘il-fulka bi'a‘yuninā wa waḥyinā fa iżā jā'a amrunā wafārat-tannūr(u), fasluk fīhā min kullin zaujainiṡnaini wa ahlaka illā man sabaqa ‘alaihil-qaulu minhum, wa lā tukhāṭibnī fil-lażīna ẓalamū, innahum mugraqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa awhainaaa ilaihi anis na'il fulka bi a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa fa izaa jaaa'a amrunaa wa faarat tannooru fasluk feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini wa ahlaka illaa man sabaqa 'alaihil qawlu minhum wa laa tukhaat ibnee fil lazeena zalamooo innaahum mughraqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżastawaita anta wa mam ma‘aka ‘alal-fulki fa qulil-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī najjānā minal-qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa izas tawaita ata wa mam ma'aka 'alal fulki faqulil hamdu lillaahil lazee najjaanaa minal qawmiz zalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qur rabbi anzilnī munzalam mubārakaw wa anta khairul-munzilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qur Rabbi anzilnee munzalam mubaarakanw wa Anta khairul munzileen

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika la'āyātiw wa in kunnā lamubtalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaatinw wa in kunnaa lamubtaleen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ansya'nā mim ba‘dihim qarnan ākharīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summaa anshaana mim ba'dihim qarnan aakhareen

ayah.transliteration: Fa arsalnā fīhim rasūlam minhum ani‘budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin gairuh(ū), afalā tattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa arsalnaa feehim Rasoolam minhum ani'budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo afalaa tattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-mala'u min qaumihil-lażīna kafarū wa każżabū biliqā'il-ākhirati wa atrafnāhum fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, mā hāżā illā basyarum miṡlukum, ya'kulu mimmā ta'kulūna minhu wa yasyrabu mimmā tasyrabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal mala-u min qawmihil lazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi liqaaa'il Aakhirati wa atrafnaahum fil hayaatid dunyaa maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum yaakulu mimmaa taakuloona minhu wa yashrabu mimmaa tashraboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in aṭa‘tum basyaram miṡlakum innakum iżal lakhāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in at'atum basharam mislakum innakum izal lakhaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Aya‘idukum annakum iżā mittum wa kuntum turābaw wa ‘iẓāman annakum mukhrajūn(a).
ayah.translation: A-Ya'idukum annakum izaa mittum wa kuntum turaabanw wa izaaman annakum mukhrajoon

ayah.transliteration: Haihāta haihāta limā tū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Haihaata haihaata limaa too'adoon

ayah.transliteration: In hiya illā ḥayātunad-dun-yā namūtu wa naḥyā wa mā naḥnu bimab‘ūṡīn(a).
ayah.translation: In hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu wa nahyaa wa maa nahnu bimab'ooseen

ayah.transliteration: In huwa illā rajuluniftarā ‘alallāhi każibaw wa mā naḥnu lahū bimu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: In huwa illaa rajulunif taraa 'alal laahi kazibanw wa maa nahnuu lahoo bimu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbinṣurnī bimā każżabūn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbin surnee bimaa kazzaboon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ‘ammā qalīlil layuṣbiḥunna nādimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala 'ammaa qaleelil la yusbihunna naadimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa akhażathumuṣ-ṣaiḥatu bil-ḥaqqi fa ja'alahum guṡā'ā(n), fa bu‘dal lil-qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa akhazat humus saihatu bilhaqqi faja'alnaahum ghusaaa'aa; fabu;dal lilqaw miz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ansya'nā mim ba‘dihim qurūnan ākharīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa anshaanaa mim ba'dihim quroonan aakhareen

ayah.transliteration: Mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wa mā yasta'khirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa wa maa yastaakhiroon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma arsalnā rusulanā tatrā, kullamā jā'a ummatar rasūluhā każżabūhu fa atba‘nā ba‘ḍahum ba‘ḍaw wa ja‘alnāhum aḥādīṡ(a), fa bu‘dal liqaumil lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa arsalnaa Rusulanaa tatraa kulla maa jaaa'a ummatar Rasooluhaa kazzabooh; fa atba'naa ba'dahum ba'danw wa ja'alnaahum ahaadees; fabu'dal liqawmil laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma arsalnā mūsā wa akhāhu hārūn(a), bi'āyātinā wa sulṭānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Summa arsalnaa Moosaa wa akhaahu Haaroona bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Ilā fir‘auna wa mala'ihī fastakbarū wa kānū qauman ‘ālīn(a).
ayah.translation: Ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawman 'aaleem

ayah.transliteration: Fa qālū anu'minu libasyaraini miṡlinā wa qaumuhumā lanā ‘ābidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Faqaaloo annu'minu libasharaini mislinaa wa qawmuhumaa lanaa 'aabidoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa każżabūhumā fa kānū minal-muhlakīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakazzaboohumaa fakaanoo minal mmuhlakeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba la‘allahum yahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba la'allahum yahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnabna maryama wa ummahū āyataw wa āwaināhumā ilā rabwatin żāti qarāriw wa ma‘īn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnab na Maryama wa ummahooo aayatannw wa aawainaahumaaa ilaa rabwatin zaati qaraarinw wa ma'een

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhar-rusulu kulū minaṭ-ṭayyibāti wa‘malū ṣāliḥā(n), innī bimā ta‘malūna ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhar Rusulu kuloo minat taiyibaati wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna hāżihī ummatukum ummataw wāḥidataw wa ana rabbukum fattaqūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw wa Ana Rabbukum fattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa taqaṭṭa‘ū amrahum bainahum zuburā(n), kullu ḥizbim bimā ladaihim fariḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fataqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum zuburaa; kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa żarhum fī gamratihim ḥattā ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: Fazarhum fee ghamratihim hattaa heen

ayah.transliteration: Ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihī mim māliw wabanīn(a).
ayah.translation: A-yahsaboona annnamaa numiduhum bihee mimmaalinw wa baneen

ayah.transliteration: Nusāri‘u lahum fil-khairāt(i), bal lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Nusaari'u lahum fil khairaat; bal laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna hum min khasy-yati rabbihim musyfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena hum min khashyati Rabbihim mushfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum bi'āyāti rabbihim yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum bi Aayaati Rabbihim yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum birabbihim lā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum bi Rabbihim laa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yu'tūna mā ātaw wa qulūbuhum wajilatun annahum ilā rabbihim rāji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yu'toona maaa aataw wa quloobuhum wajilatun annahum ilaa Rabbihim raaji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika yusāri‘ūna fil-khairāti wa hum lahā sābiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika yusaari'oona fil khairaati wa hum lahaa saabiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā nukallifu nafsan illā wus‘ahā, wa ladainā kitābuy yanṭiqu bil-ḥaqqi wa hum lā yuẓlamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa nukallifu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa wa ladainaa kitaabuny yantiqu bilhaqqi w ahum la yuzlamoon

ayah.transliteration: Bal qulūbuhum fī gamratim min hāżā wa lahum a‘mālum min dūni żālika hum lahā ‘āmilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratim min haazaa wa lahum a'maalum min dooni zaalika hum lahaa 'aamiloon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā akhażnā mutrafīhim bil-‘ażābi iżā hum yaj'arūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaaa akhznaa mutrafeehim bil'azaabi izaa hum yaj'aroon

ayah.transliteration: Lā taj'arul-yaum(a), innakum minnā lā tunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa taj'arul yawma innakum minnaa laa tunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Qad kānat āyātī tutlā ‘alaikum fa kuntum ‘alā a‘qābikum tankiṣūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qad kaanat Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum 'alaaa a'qaabikum tankisoon

ayah.transliteration: Mustakbirīn(a), bihī sāmiran tahjurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Mustakbireena bihee saamiran tahjuroon

ayah.transliteration: Afalam yaddabbarul-qaula am jā'ahum mā lam ya'ti ābā'ahumul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Afalam yaddabbarrul qawla am jaaa'ahum maa lam yaati aabaaa'ahumul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Am lam ya‘rifū rasūlahum fahum lahū munkirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am lam ya'rifoo Rasoolahum fahum lahoo munkiroon

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūna bihī jinnah(tun), bal jā'ahum bil-ḥaqqi wa akṡaruhum lil-ḥaqqi kārihūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloona bihee jinnnah; bal jaaa'ahum bilhaqqi wa aksaruhum lil haqqi kaarihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lawittaba‘al-ḥaqqu ahwā'ahum lafasadatis-samāwātu wal-arḍu wa man fīhinn(a), bal ataināhum biżikrihim fahum ‘an żikrihim mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lawit taba'al haqqu ahwaaa'ahum lafasadatis samaawaatu wal ardu wa man feehinnn; bal atainaahum bizikrihim fahum 'an zikrihim mu'ridon

ayah.transliteration: Am tas'aluhum kharjan fa kharāju rabbika khair(un), wa huwa khairur-rāziqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Am tas'aluhum kharjan fakharaaju Rabbika khairunw wa Huwa khairur raaziqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innaka latad‘ūhum ilā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa innaka latad'oohum ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa innal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ‘aniṣ-ṣirāṭi lanākibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innnal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati 'anis siraati lanaakiboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau raḥimnāhum wa kasyafnā mā bihim min ḍurril lalajjū fī ṭugyānihim ya‘mahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law rahimnaahum wa kashafnaa maa bihim min durril lalajjoo fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad akhażnāhum bil-‘ażābi famastakānū lirabbihim wa mā yataḍarra‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad akhaznaahum bil'azaabi famastakaanoo li Rabbihim wa maa yatadarra'oon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā fataḥnā ‘alaihim bāban żā ‘ażābin syadīdin iżā hum fīhi mublisūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa fatahnaa 'alaihim baaban zaa 'azaabin shadeedin izaa hum feehi mublisoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī yuḥyī wa yumītu wa lahukhtilāful-laili wan-nahār(i), afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazeee ansha a-lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Bal qālū miṡla mā qālal-awwalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū a'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turābaw wa ‘iẓāman a'innā lamab‘ūṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu wa lahukh tilaaful laili wannahaar; afalaa ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Laqad wu‘idnā naḥnu wa ābā'unā hāżā min qablu in hāżā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal qaaloo misla maa qaalal awwaloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū a'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turābaw wa ‘iẓāman a'innā lamab‘ūṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo 'a-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'a-innaa lamab 'oosoon

ayah.transliteration: Laqad wu‘idnā naḥnu wa ābā'unā hāżā min qablu in hāżā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqad wu'idnaa nahnu wa aabaaa'unaa haazaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Qul limanil-arḍu wa man fīhā in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul limanil ardu wa man feehaaa in kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Sayaqūlūna lillāh(i), qul afalā tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Sa-yaqooloona lillaah; qul afalaa tazakkkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul mar rabbus-samāwātis-sab‘i wa rabbul-‘arsyil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaatis sab'i wa Rabbul 'Arshil 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Sayaqūlūna lillāh(i), qul afalā tattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Sa yaqooloona lillaah; qul afalaa tattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul mam biyadihī malakūtu kulli syai'iw wa huwa yujīru wa lā yujāru ‘alaihi in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul mam bi yadihee malakootu kulli shai'inw wa Huwa yujeeru wa laa yujaaru 'alaihi in kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Sayaqūlūna lillāh(i), qul fa annā tusḥarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Sa yaqooloona lillaah; qul fa annaa tus haroon

ayah.transliteration: Bal ataināhum bil-ḥaqqi wa innahum lakāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal atainaahum bil haqqi wa innahum lakaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Mattakhażallāhu miw waladiw wa mā kāna ma‘ahū min ilāhin iżal lażahaba kullu ilāhim bimā khalaqa wa la‘alā ba‘ḍuhum ‘alā ba‘ḍ(in), subḥānallāhi ‘ammā yaṣifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Mat takhazal laahu minw waladinw wa maa kaana ma'ahoo min ilaah; izal lazahaba kullu ilaahim bimaa khalaqa wa la'alaa ba'duhum 'alaa ba'd; Subhaannal laahi 'ammaa yasifoon

ayah.transliteration: ‘Ālimil-gaibi wasy-syahādati fa ta‘ālā ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Aalimil Ghaibi wash shahhaadati fata'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Qur rabbi immā turiyannī mā yū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qur Rabbi immmaa turiyannee maa yoo'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Rabbi falā taj‘alnī fil-qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Rabbi falaa taj'alnee fil qawmiz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innā ‘alā an nuriyaka mā na‘iduhum laqādirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innaa 'alaaa an nuriyaka maa na'iduhum laqaadiroon

ayah.transliteration: Idfa‘ bil-latī hiya aḥsanus-sayyi'ah(ta), naḥnu a‘lamu bimā yaṣifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Idfa' billate hiya ahsanus saiyi'ah; nahnu a'lamu bimaa yasifoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qur rabbi a‘ūżu bika min hamazātisy-syayāṭīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qur Rabbi a'oozu bika min hamazaatish Shayaateen

ayah.transliteration: Wa a‘ūżu bika rabbi ay yaḥḍurūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa a'oozu bika Rabbi ai-yahduroon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā jā'a aḥadahumul-mautu qāla rabbirji‘ūn(i).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a ahada humul mawtu qaala Rabbir ji'oon

ayah.transliteration: La‘allī a‘malu ṣāliḥan fīmā taraktu kallā, innahā kalimatun huwa qā'iluhā, wa miw warā'ihim barzakhun ilā yaumi yub‘aṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: La'alleee a'malu saalihan feemaa taraktu kallaa; innahaa kalimatun huwa qaaa'iluhaa wa minw waraaa'him barzakhun ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri falā ansāba bainahum yauma'iżiw wa lā yatasā'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa nufikha fis Soori falaaa ansaaba bainahum yawma'izinw wa laa yatasaaa'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Faman ṡaqulat mawāzīnuhū fa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Faman saqulat mawaazee nuhoo fa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa man khaffat mawāzīnuhū fa ulā'ikal-lażīna khasirū anfusahum fī jahannama khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man khaffat mawaa zeenuhoo fa ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasiroon anfusahum fee Jahannnama khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Talfaḥu wujūhahumun-nāru wa hum fīhā kāliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Talfahu wujoohahumun Naaru wa hum feehaa kaalihood

ayah.transliteration: Alam takun āyātī tutlā ‘alaikum fa kuntum bihā tukażżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum bihaa tukazziboon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū rabbanā galabat ‘alainā syiqwatunā wa kunnā qauman ḍāllīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo Rabbanaa ghalabat 'alainaa shiqwatunaa wa kunnaa qawman daaalleen

ayah.transliteration: Rabbanā akhrijnā minhā fa in ‘udnā fa innā ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Rabbanaa akhrijnaa minhaa fa in 'udnaa fa innaa zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālakhsa'ū fīhā wa lā tukallimūn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaalakh sa'oo feehaa wa laa tukallimoon

ayah.transliteration: Innahū kāna farīqum min ‘ibādī yaqūlūna rabbanā āmannā fagfir lanā warḥamnā wa anta khairur-rāḥimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innahoo kaana fareequm min 'ibaadee yaqooloona Rabbanaaa aamannaa faghfir lanaa warhamnaa wa Anta khairur raahimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fattakhażtumūhum sikhriyyan ḥattā ansaukum żikrī wa kuntum minhum taḍḥakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fattakhaztumoohum sikhriyyan hattaaa ansawkum zikree wa kuntum minhum tadhakoon

ayah.transliteration: Innī jazaituhumul-yauma bimā ṣabarū, annahum humul-fā'izūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inee jazaituhumul Yawma bimaa sabarooo annahum humul faaa'izoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla kam labiṡtum fil-arḍi ‘adada sinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala kam labistum fil ardi 'adada sineen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū labiṡnā yauman au baḍa yaumin fas'alil-‘āddīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawmin fas'alil 'aaaddeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla il labiṡtum illā qalīlal lau annakum kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala il labistum illaa qaleelal law annakum kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Afa ḥasibtum annamā khalaqnākum ‘abaṡaw wa annakum ilainā lā turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afahsibtum annamaa khalaqnaakum 'abasanw wa annakum ilainaa laa turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ta‘ālallāhul-malikul-ḥaqq(u), lā ilāha illā huw(a), rabbul-‘arsyil-karīm(i).
ayah.translation: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Kareem

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yad‘u ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhara lā burhāna lahū bih(ī), fa innamā ḥisābuhū ‘inda rabbih(ī), innahū lā yufliḥul-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa mai yad'u ma'allaahi ilaahan aakhara laa burhaana lahoo bihee fa innnamaa hisaabuhoo 'inda Rabbih; innahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qur rabbigfir warḥam wa anta khairur-rāḥimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qur Rabbigh fir warham wa Anta khairur raahimeen

ayah.transliteration: Sūratun anzalnāhā wa faraḍnāhā wa anzalnā fīhā āyātim bayyinātil la‘allakum tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Sooratun anzalnaahaa wa faradnaahaa wa anzalnaa feehaaa Aayaatim baiyinaatil la'allakum tazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Az-zāniyatu waz-zānī fajlidū kulla wāḥidim minhumā mi'ata jaldah(tan), wa lā ta'khużkum bihimā ra'fatun fī dīnillāhi in kuntum tu'minūna billāhi wal-yaumil-ākhir(i), walyasyhad ‘ażābahumā ṭā'ifatum minal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Azzaaniyatu wazzaanee fajlidoo kulla waahidim minhumaa mi'ata jaldatinw wa laa taakhuzkum bihimaa raafatun fee deenil laahi in kuntum tu'minoona billaahi wal Yawmil Aakhiri wal yashhad 'azaabahumaa taaa'ifatum minal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Az-zānī lā yankiḥu illā zāniyatan au musyrikah(tan), waz-zāniyatu lā yankiḥuhā illā zānin au musyrik(un), wa ḥurrima żālika ‘alal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Azzaanee laa yankihu illaa zaaniyatan aw mushrikatanw wazzaaniyatu laa yankihuhaaa illaa zaanin aw mushrik; wa hurrima zaalika 'alal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yarmūnal-muḥṣanāti ṡumma lam ya'tū bi'arba‘ati syuhadā'a fajlidūhum ṡamānīna jaldataw wa lā taqbalū lahum syahādatan abadā(n), wa ulā'ika humul-fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yarmoonal muhsanaati summa lam yaatoo bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'a fajlidoohum samaaneena jaldatanw wa laa taqbaloo lahum shahaadatan abadaa; wa ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Illal-lażīna tābū mim ba‘di żālika wa aṣlaḥū, fa innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Illal lazeena taaboo mim ba'di zaalika wa aslahoo fa innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yarmūna azwājahum wa lam yakul lahum syuhadā'u illā anfusuhum fa syahādatu aḥadihim arba‘u syahādātim billāh(i), innahū laminaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yarmoona azwaajahum wa lam yakul lahum shuhadaaa'u illaaa anfusuhum fashahaadatu ahadihim arb'u shahaadaatim billaahi innahoo laminas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-khāmisatu anna la‘natallāhi ‘alaihi in kāna minal-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wal khaamisatu anna la'natal laahi 'alaihi in kaana minal kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yadra'u ‘anhal-‘ażāba an tasyhada arba‘a syahādātim billāhi innahū laminal-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yadra'u anhal 'azaaba an tashhada arba'a shahaa daatim billaahi innahoo laminal kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-khāmisata anna gaḍaballāhi ‘alaihā in kāna minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wal khaamisata anna ghadabal laahi 'alaihaaa in kaana minas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā faḍlullāhi ‘alaikum wa raḥmatuhū wa annallāha tawwābun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo wa annal laaha Tawwaabun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna jā'ū bil-ifki ‘uṣbatum minkum, lā taḥsabūhu syarral lakum, bal huwa khairul lakum, likullimri'im minhum maktasaba minal-iṡm(i), wal-lażī tawallā kibrahū minhum lahū ‘ażābun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena jaaa'oo bilifki 'usbatum minkum; laa tahsaboohu sharral lakum bal huwa khairul lakum; likul limri'im minhum mak tasaba minal-ism; wallazee tawallaa kibrahoo minhum lahoo 'azaabun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Lau lā iż sami‘tumūhu ẓannal-mu'minūna wal-mu'minātu bi'anfusihim khairā(n), wa qālū hāżā ifkum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Law laaa iz sami'tumoohu zannal mu'minoona walmu'minaatu bi anfusihim khairanw wa qaaloo haazaaa ifkum mmubeen

ayah.transliteration: Lau lā jā'ū ‘alaihi bi'arba‘ati syuhadā'(a), fa iż lam ya'tū bisy-syuhadā'i fa ulā'ika ‘indallāhi humul-kāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Law laa jaaa'oo 'alaihi bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'; fa iz lam yaatoo bishshuhadaaa'i fa ulaaa 'ika 'indal laahi humul kaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā faḍlullāhi ‘alaikum wa raḥmatuhū fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirati lamassakum fīmā afaḍtum fīhi ‘ażābun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo fiddunyaa wal aakhirati lamassakum fee maaa afadtum feehi 'azaabun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Iż talaqqaunahū bi'alsinatikum wa taqūlūna bi'afwāhikum mā laisa lakum bihī ‘ilmuw wa taḥsabūnahū hayyinā(n), wa huwa ‘indallāhi ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: iz talaqqawnahoo bi alsinatikum wa taqooloona bi afwaahikum maa laisa lakum bihee 'ilmunw wa tahsaboo nahoo haiyinanw wa huwa 'indl laahi 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā iż sami‘tumūhu qultum mā yakūnu lanā an natakallama bihāżā, subḥānaka hāżā buhtānun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa law laaa iz sami'tu moohu qultum maa yakoonu lanaaa an natakallama bihaazaa Subhaanaka haaza buhtaanun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘iẓukumullāhu an ta‘ūdū limiṡlihī abadan in kuntum mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Ya'izukumul laahu an ta'oodoo limisliheee abadan in kuntum mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yubayyinullāhu lakumul-āyāt(i), wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa yubaiyinul laahu lakumul Aayaat; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yuḥibbūna an tasyī‘al-fāḥisyatu fil-lażīna āmanū lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un), fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirah(ti), wallāhu ya‘lamu wa antum lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yuhibboona an tashee'al faahishatu fil lazeena aamanoo lahum 'azaabun aleemun fid dunyaa wal Aakhirah; wallaahu ya'lamu wa antum laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā faḍlullāhi ‘alaikum wa raḥmatuhū wa annallāha ra'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo wa annal laaha Ra'oofur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tattabi‘ū khuṭuwātisy-syaiṭān(i), wa may yattabi‘ khuṭuwātisy-syaiṭāni fa innahū ya'muru bil-faḥsyā'i wal-munkar(i), wa lau lā faḍlullāhi ‘alaikum wa raḥmatuhū mā zakā minkum min aḥadin abadā(n), wa lākinnallāha yuzakkī may yasyā'(u), wallāhu samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish Shaitaan; wa many-yattabi' khutuwaatish Shaitaani fa innahoo yaamuru bilfahshaaa'i walmunkar; wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo maa zakaa minkum min ahadin abadanw wa laakinnal laaha yuzakkee many-yashaaa'; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā ya'tali ulul-faḍli minkum was-sa‘ati ay yu'tū ulil-qurbā wal-masākīna wal-muhājirīna fī sabīlillāh(i), wal ya‘fū wal yaṣfaḥū, alā tuḥibbūna ay yagfirallāhu lakum, wallāhu gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yaatali ulul fadli minkum wassa'ati ai yu'tooo ulil qurbaa walmasaakeena walmuhaajireena fee sabeelillaahi walya'foo walyasfahoo; alaa tuhibboona ai yaghfiral laahu lakum; wal laahu Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yarmūnal-muḥṣanātil-gāfilātil-mu'mināti lu‘inū fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirah(ti), wa lahum ‘ażābun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yarmoonal muhsanaatil ghaafilaatil mu'minaati lu'inoo fid dunyaa wal Aakhirati wa lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Yauma tasyhadu ‘alaihim alsinatuhum wa aidīhim wa arjuluhum bimā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma tashhhadu 'alaihim alsinatuhum wa aideehim wa arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Yauma'iżiy yuwaffīhimullāhu dīnahumul-ḥaqqa wa ya‘lamūna annallāha huwal-ḥaqqul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Yawma'iziny yuwaf feehimul laahu deenahumul haqqa wa ya'lamoona annal laaha Huwal Haqqul Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Al-khabīṡātu lil-khabīṡīna wal-khabīṡūna lil-khabīṡāt(i), waṭ-ṭayyibātu liṭ-ṭayyibīna waṭ-ṭayyibūna liṭ-ṭayyibāt(i), ulā'ika mubarra'ūna mimmā yaqūlūn(a), lahum magfiratuw wa rizqun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Alkhabeesaatu lilkha beeseena walkhabeesoona lilkhabeesaati wattaiyibaatu littaiyibeena wattaiyiboona littaiyibaat; ulaaa'ika mubar ra'oona maimma yaqooloona lahum maghfiratunw wa rizqun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tadkhulū buyūtan gaira buyūtikum ḥattā tasta'nisū wa tusallimū ‘alā ahlihā, żālikum khairul lakum la‘allakum tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira buyootikum hatta tastaanisoo wa tusallimoo 'allaa ahlihaa; zaalikum khairul lakum la'allakum tazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa illam tajidū fīhā aḥadan falā tadkhulūhā ḥattā yu'żana lakum wa in qīla lakumurji‘ū farji‘ū huwa azkā lakum, wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fa il lam tajidoo feehaaa ahadan falaa tadkhuloohaa hattaa yu'zana lakum wa in qeela lakumurji'oo farji'oo huwa azkaa lakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Laisa ‘alaikum junāḥun an tadkhulū buyūtan gaira maskūnatin fīhā matā‘ul lakum, wallāhu ya‘lamu mā tubdūna wa mā taktumūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laisa 'alaikum junaahun ann tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira maskoonatin feeha mataa'ul lakum; wallaahu ya'lamu maa tubdoona wa maa taktumoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul lil-mu'minīna yaguḍḍū min abṡārihim wa yaḥfaẓū furūjahum, żālika azkā lahum, innallāha khabīrum bimā yaṣna‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul lilmu' mineena yaghuuddoo min absaarihim wa yahfazoo furoojahum; zaalika azkaa lahum; innallaaha khabeerum bimaa yasna'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qul lil-mu'mināti yagḍuḍna  min abṡārihinna wa yaḥfaẓna furūjahunna wa lā yubdīna zīnatahunna illā mā ẓahara minhā walyaḍribna bikhumurihinna ‘alā juyūbihinn(a), wa lā yubdīna zīnatahunna illā libu‘ūlatihinna au ābā'ihinna au abnā'ihinna au abnā'i bu‘ūlatihinna au ikhwānihinna au banī ikhwānihinna au nisā'ihinna au mā malakat aimānuhunna awit-tābi‘īna gairi ulil-irbati minar-rijāli awiṭ-ṭiflil-lażīna lam yaẓharū ‘alā ‘aurātin-nisā'(i), wa lā yaḍribna bi'arjulihinna liyu‘lama mā yukhfīna min zīnatihinn(a), wa tūbū ilallāhi jamī‘an ayyuhal-mu'minūna  la‘allakum tufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qul lilmu'minaati yaghdudna min absaarihinna wa yahfazna furoojahunna wa laa yubdeena zeenatahunna illaa maa zahara minhaa walyadribna bikhumurihinna 'alaa juyoobihinna wa laa yubdeena zeenatahunna illaa libu'oolatihinna aw aabaaa'i hinna aw aabaaa'i bu'oolati hinna aw abnaaa'ihinaa aw abnaaa'i bu'oolatihinnna aw ikhwaanihinnna aw baneee ikhwaanihinna aw banee akhawaatihinna aw nisaaa'i hinna aw maa malakat aimaanuhunna awit taabi'eena ghairi ilil irbati minar rijaali awit tiflillazeena lam yazharoo 'alaa 'awraatin nisaaa'i wala yadribnna bi arjulihinna min zeenatihinn; wa toobooo ilallaahi jammee'an aiyuhal mu'minoona la'allakum tuflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ankiḥul-ayāmā minkum waṣ-ṣāliḥīna min ‘ibādikum wa imā'ikum, iy yakūnū fuqarā'a yugnihimullāhu min faḍlih(ī), wallāhu wāsi‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa ankihul ayaamaa minkum was saaliheena min 'ibaadikum wa imaa'kum; iny-yakoonoo fuqaraaa'a yughni himul laahu min fadlih; wal laahu Waasi'un 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Walyasta‘fifil-lażīna lā yajidūna nikāḥan ḥattā yugniyahumullāhu min faḍlih(ī), wal-lażīna yabtagūnal-kitāba mimmā malakat aimānukum fa kātibūhum in ‘alimtum fīhim khairaw wa ātūhum mim mālillāhil-lażī ātākum, wa lā tukrihū fatayātikum ‘alal-bigā'i in aradna taḥaṣṣunal litabtagū ‘araḍal-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa may yukrihhunna  fa innallāha mim ba‘di ikrāhihinna gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wal yasta'fifil lazeena laa yajidoona nikaahan hata yughniyahumul laahu mi fadlih; wallazeena yabtaghoonal kitaaba mimmaa malakat aimaanukum fakaatiboohum in 'alimtum feehim khairanw wa aatoohum mimmaalil laahil lazeee aataakum; wa laa tukrihoo fatayaatikum 'alal bighaaa'i in aradna tahassunal litabtaghoo 'aradal hayaatid dunyaa; wa mai yukrihhunna fa innal laaha mim ba'di ikraahihinna Ghafoor Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad anzalnā ilaikum āyātim mubayyinātiw wa maṡalam minal-lażīna khalau min qablikum wa mau‘iẓatal lil-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Aayaatim mubaiyinaatinw wa masalam minnal lazeena khalaw min qablikum wa maw'izatal lilmuttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu nūrus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), maṡalu nūrihī kamisykātin fīhā miṣbāḥ(un), al-miṣbāḥu fī zujājah(tin), az-zujājatu ka'annahā kaukabun durriyyuy yūqadu min syajaratim mubārakatin zaitūnatil lā syarqiyyatiw wa lā garbiyyah(tin), yakādu zaituhā yuḍī'u wa lau lam tamsashu nār(un), nūrun ‘alā nūr(in), yahdillāhu linūrihī may yasyā'(u), wa yaḍribullāhul-amṡāla lin-nās(i), wallāhu bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Allaahu noorus samaawaati wal ard; masalu noorihee kamishkaatin feehaa misbaah; almisbaahu fee zujaajatin azzujaajatu ka annahaa kawkabun durriyyuny yooqadu min shajaratim mubaarakatin zaitoonatil laa shariqiyyatinw wa laa gharbiyyatiny yakaadu zaituhaa yudeee'u wa law alm tamsashu naar; noorun 'alaa noor; yahdil laahu linoorihee mai yashaaa'; wa yadribul laahul amsaala linnaas; wallaahu bikulli shai'in Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Fī buyūtin ażinallāhu an turfa‘a wa yużkara fīhasmuh(ū), yusabbiḥu lahū fīhā bil-guduwwi wal-āṣāl(i).
ayah.translation: Fee buyootin azinal laahu an turfa'a wa yuzkara feehasmuhoo yusabbihu lahoo feehaa bilghuduwwi wal aasaal

ayah.transliteration: Rijālul lā tulhīhim tijāratuw wa lā bai‘un ‘an żikrillāhi wa iqāmiṣ-ṣalāti wa ītā'iz-zakāh(ti), yakhāfūna yauman tataqallabu fīhil-qulūbu wal-abṣār(u).
ayah.translation: Rinjaalul laa tulheehim tijaaratunw wa laa bai'un 'an zikril laahi wa iqaamis Salaati wa eetaaa'iz Zakaati yakkhaafoona Yawman tataqallabu feehil quloobu wal absaar

ayah.transliteration: Liyajziyahumullāhu aḥsana mā ‘amilū wa yazīduhum min faḍlih(ī), wallāhu yarzuqu may yasyā'u bigairi ḥisāb(in).
ayah.translation: Liyajziyahumul laahu ahsana maa 'amiloo wa yazeedahum min fadlih; wal laahu yarzuqu mai yashaaa'u bighairi hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna kafarū a‘māluhum kasarābim biqī‘atiy yaḥsabuhuẓ-ẓam'ānu mā'ā(n), ḥattā iżā jā'ahū lam yajidhu syai'aw wa wajadallāha ‘indahū fa waffāhu ḥisābah(ū), wallāhu sarī‘ul-ḥisāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kafarooo a'maaluhum kasaraabim biqee'atiny yahsabuhuz zamaanu maaa'an hattaaa izaa jaaa'ahoo lam yajid hu shai'anw wa wajadal laaha 'indahoo fa waffaahu hisaabah; wallaahu saree'ul hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Au kaẓulumātin fī baḥril lujjiyyiy yagsyāhu maujum min fauqihī maujum min fauqihī saḥāb(un), ẓulumātum ba‘ḍuhā fauqa ba‘ḍ(in), iżā akhraja yadahū lam yakad yarāhā, wa mal lam yaj‘alillāhu lahū nūran famā lahū min nūr(in).
ayah.translation: Aw kazulumaatin fee bahril lujjiyyiny yaghshaahu mawjum min fawqihee mawjum min fawqihee mawjum min fawqihee sahaab; zulumatum ba'duhaa fawqa ba'din izaaa akhraja yadahoo lam yakad yaraahaa wa mal lam yaj'alil laahu lahoo noora famaa lahoo min noor

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha yusabbiḥu lahū man fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi waṭ-ṭairu ṣāffāt(in), kullun qad ‘alima ṣalātahū wa tasbīḥah(ū), wallāhu ‘alīmum bimā yaf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha yusabbihu lahoo man fissamaawaati wal ardi wat tairu saaaffaatim kullun qad 'alima Salaatahoo wa tasbeehah; wallaahu 'aleemum bimaa yaf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa ilallāhil-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa ilal laahil maseer

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha yuzjī saḥāban ṡumma yu'allifu bainahū ṡumma yaj‘aluhū rukāman fa taral-wadqa yakhruju min khilālih(ī), wa yunazzilu minas-samā'i min jibālin fīhā mim baradin fa yuṣību bihī may yasyā'u wa yaṣrifuhū ‘am may yasyā'(u), yakādu sanā barqihī yażhabu bil-abṣār(i).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha yuzjee sahaaban summa yu'allifu bainahoo summa yaj'aluhoo rukaaman fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee wa yunazzilu minas samaaa'i min jibaalin feehaa mim barain fa yuseebu bihee mai yashaaa'u wa yasrifuhoo 'am mai yashaaa'u yakkaadu sanaa barqihee yazhabu bil absaar

ayah.transliteration: Yuqallibullāhul-laila wan-nahār(a), inna fī żālika la‘ibratal li'ulil-abṣār(i).
ayah.translation: Yuqallibul laahul laila wannahaar; inna fee zaalika la'ibratal li ulil absaar

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu khalaqa kulla dābbatim mim mā'(in), fa minhum may yamsyī ‘alā baṭinih(ī), wa minhum may yamsyī ‘alā rijlain(i), wa minhum may yamsyī ‘alā arba‘(in), yakhluqullāhu mā yasyā'(u), innallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu khalaqa kulla daaabbatim mim maaa'in faminhum mai yamshee 'alaa batnihee wa minhum mai yamshee 'alaa rijlaine wa minhum mai yamshee 'alaaa arba'; yakhluqul laahu maa yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Laqad anzalnā āyātim mubayyināt(in), wallāhu yahdī may yasyā'u ilā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Laqad anzalnaaa Aayaatim mubaiyinaat; wallaahu yahdee mai yashaaa'u ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna āmannā billāhi wa bir-rasūli wa aṭa‘nā ṡumma yatawallā farīqum minhum mim ba‘di żālik(a), wa mā ulā'ika bil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona aamannaa billaahi wa bir Rasooli wa ata'naa summa yatawallaa fareequm minhum mim ba'di zaalik; wa maaa ulaaa'ika bilmu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā du‘ū ilallāhi wa rasūlihī liyaḥkuma bainahum iżā farīqum minhum mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa du'ooo ilal laahi wa Rasoolihee li yahkuma bainahum izaa fareequm minhum mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yakul lahumul-ḥaqqu ya'tū ilaihi muż‘inīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iny-yakul lahumul haqqu yaatooo ilaihi muz'ineen

ayah.transliteration: Afī qulūbihim maraḍun amirtābū am yakhāfūna ay yaḥīfallāhu ‘alaihim wa rasūluh(ū), bal ulā'ika humuẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afee quloobihim ma radun amirtaabooo am yakhaafoona ani yaheefallaahu 'alaihim wa Rasooluh; bal ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā kāna qaulal-mu'minīna iżā du‘ū ilallāhi wa rasūlihī liyaḥkuma bainahum ay yaqūlū sami‘nā wa aṭa‘nā, wa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaa kaana qawlal mu'mineena izaa du'ooo ilal laahi wa Rasoolihee li yahkuma bainahum ai yaqooloo sami'naa wa ata'naa; wa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yuṭi‘illāha wa rasūlahū wa yakhsyallāha wa yattaqhi fa ulā'ika humul-fā'izūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa mai yuti'il laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa yakhshal laaha wa yattaqhi fa ulaaa'ika humul faaa'izoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa aqsamū billāhi jahda aimānihim la'in amartahum layakhrujunn(a), qul lā tuqsimū, ṭā‘atum ma‘rūfah(tun), innallāha khabīrum bimā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim la'in amartahum la yakhrujunna qul laa tuqsimoo taa'atum ma'roofah innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Qul aṭī‘ullāha wa aṭī‘ur-rasūl(a), fa in tawallau fa innamā ‘alaihi mā ḥummila wa ‘alaikum mā ḥummiltum, wa in tuṭī‘ūhu tahtadū, wa mā ‘alar rasūli illal-balāgul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Qul atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasoola fa in tawallaw fa innamaa 'alaihi maa hummila wa 'alaikum maa hummiltum wa in tutee'oohu tahtadoo; wa maa'alar Rasooli illal balaaghul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘adallāhul-lażīna āmanū minkum wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti layastakhlifannahum fil-arḍi kamastakhlafal-lażīna min qablihim, wa layumakkinanna lahum dīnahumul-lażirtaḍā lahum wa layubaddilannahum mim ba‘di khaufihim amnā(n), ya‘budūnanī lā yusyrikūna bī syai'ā(n), wa man kafara ba‘da żālika fa ulā'ika humul-fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum wa 'amilus saalihaati la yastakhlifan nahum fil ardi kamastakh lafal lazeena min qablihim wa la yumakkinanna lahum deenahumul lazir tadaa lahum wa la yubaddilannahum mim ba'di khawfihim amnaa; ya'budoonanee laayushrikoona bee shai'aa; wa man kafara ba'da zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa aqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātuz-zakāta wa aṭī‘ur-rasūla la‘allakum turḥamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aqeemus Salaata wa aatuz Zakaata wa atee'ur Rasoola la'allakum turhamoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā taḥsabannal-lażīna kafarū mu‘jizīna fil-arḍ(i), wa ma'wāhumun-nār(u), wa labi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Laa tahsabannal lazeena kafaroo mu'jizeena fil ard; wa maawaahumun Naaru wa labi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū liyasta'żinkumul-lażīna malakat aimānukum wal-lażīna lam yablugul-ḥuluma minkum ṡalāṡa marrāt(in), min qabli ṣalātil-fajri wa ḥīna taḍa‘ūna ṡiyābakum minaẓ-ẓahīrati wa mim ba‘di ṣalātil-‘isyā'(i), ṡalāṡu ‘aurātil lakum, laisa ‘alaikum wa lā ‘alaihim junāḥum ba‘dahunn(a),  ṭawwāfūna ‘alaikum ba‘ḍukum ‘alā ba‘ḍ(in), każālika yubayyinullāhu lakumul-āyāt(i), wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo li yastaazinkumul lazeena malakat aimaanukum wallazeena lam yablughul huluma minkum salaasa marraat; min qabli Salaatil Fajri wa heena tada'oona siyaa bakum minaz zaheerati wa mim ba'di Salaatil Ishaaa'; salaasu 'awraatil lakum; laisa 'alaikum wa laa 'alaihim junaahum ba'dahunn; tawwaafoona 'alaikum ba'dukum 'alaa ba'd; kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakumul aayaat wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā balagal-aṭfālu minkumul-ḥuluma falyasta'żinū kamasta'żanal-lażīna min qablihim, każālika yubayyinullāhu lakum āyātih(ī),wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa balaghal atfaalu minkumul huluma fal yastaazinoo kamas taazanal lazeena min qablihim; kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakum Aayaatih; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-qawā‘idu minan-nisā'il-lātī lā yarjūna nikāḥan fa laisa ‘alaihinna junāḥun ay yaḍa‘na ṡiyābahunna gaira mutabarrijātim bizīnah(tin), wa ay yasta‘fifna khairul lahunn(a), wallāhu samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Walqawaa'idu minan nisaaa'il laatee laa yarjoona nikaahan falisa 'alaihinna junaahun ai yada'na siyaabahunna ghaira mutabar rijaatim bizeenah; wa ai yasta'fifna khairul lahunn; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Laisa ‘alal-a‘mā ḥarajuw wa lā ‘alal-a‘raji ḥarajuw wa lā ‘alal-marīḍi ḥarajuw wa lā ‘alā anfusikum an ta'kulū mim buyūtikum au buyūti ābā'ikum au buyūti ummahātikum au buyūti ikhwānikum au buyūti akhawātikum au buyūti a‘māmikum au buyūti ‘ammātikum au buyūti akhwālikum au buyūti khālātikum au mā malaktum mafātiḥahū au ṣadīqikum, laisa ‘alaikum junāḥun an ta'kulū jamī‘an au asytātā(n), fa iżā dakhaltum buyūtan fa sallimū ‘alā  anfusikum taḥiyyatam min ‘indillāhi mubārakatan ṭayyibah(tan), każālika yubayyinullāhu lakumul-āyāti la‘allakum ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laisa 'alal a'maa barajunw wa laa 'alal a'raji barajunw wa laa 'alal mareedi barajun wa laa 'alaa anfusikum an taakuloo mim buyootikum aw buyooti aabaaa'ikum aw buyooti ummahaatikum aw buyooti ikhwaanikum aw buyooti akhawaatikum aw buyooti a'maamikum aw buyooti 'ammaatikum aw buyooti akhwaalikum aw buyooti khaalaatikum aw maa malaktum mafaatihahooo aw sadeeqikum; laisa 'alaikum junaahun an taakuloo jamee'an aw ashtaata; fa izaa dakhaltum buyootan fasallimoo 'alaaa anfusikum tahiyyatam min 'indil laahi mubaarakatan taiyibah; kazaalika yubai yinul laahu lakumul Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Innamal-mu'minūnal-lażīna āmanū billāhi wa rasūlihī wa iżā kānū ma‘ahū ‘alā amrin jāmi‘il lam yażhabū ḥattā yasta'żinūh(u), innal-lażīna yasta'żinūnaka  ulā'ikal-lażīna yu'minūna billāhi wa rasūlih(ī),  fa iżasta'żanūka liba‘ḍi sya'nihim fa'żal liman syi'ta minhum wastagfir lahumullāh(a), innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innamal mu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa izaa kaanoo ma'ahoo 'alaaa amrin jaami'il lam yazhaboo hataa yastaazinooh; innal lazeena yastaa zinookana ulaaa'ikal lazeena yu'minoona billaahi wa Rasoolih; fa izas taazanooka liba'di shaanihim faazal liman shi'ta minhum wastaghfir lahumul laah; innal laaha Gahfoor Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Lā taj‘alū du‘ā'ar-rasūli bainakum kadu‘ā'i ba‘ḍikum ba‘ḍā(n), qad ya'lamullāhul-lażīna yatasallalūna minkum liwāżā(n), falyaḥżaril-lażīna yukhālifūna ‘an amrihī an tuṣībahum fitnatun au yuṣībahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: La taj'aloo du'aaa'ar Rasooli bainakum kadu'aaa'i badikum ba'daa; qad ya'lamul laahul lazeena yatasallaloona minkum liwaazaa; fal yahzaril lazeena yukhaalifoona 'an amriheee an tuseebahum fitnatun aw yuseebahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Alā inna lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), qad ya‘lamu mā antum ‘alaih(i), wa yauma yurja‘ūna ilaihi fa yunabbi'uhum bimā ‘amilū, wallāhu bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Alaaa inna lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal ardi qad ya'lamu maaa antum 'alaihi wa Yawma yurja'oona ilaihi fa yunaabi 'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Tabārakal-lażī nazzalal-furqāna ‘alā ‘abdihī liyakūna lil-‘ālamīna nażīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Tabaarakal lazee nazzalal Furqaana 'alaa 'abdihee li yakoona lil'aalameena nazeera

ayah.transliteration: Allażī lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa lam yattakhiż waladaw wa lam yakul lahū syarīkun fil-mulki wa khalaqa  kulla syai'in fa qaddarahū taqdīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa lam yattakhiz waladanw wa lam yakul lahoo shareekun filmulki wa khalaqa kulla shai'in faqaddarahoo taqdeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wattakhażū min dūnihī ālihatal lā yakhluqūna syai'aw wa hum yukhlaqūna wa lā yamlikūna li'anfusihim ḍarraw wa lā naf‘aw wa lā yamlikūna mautaw wa lā ḥayātaw wa lā nusyūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wattakhazoo min dooniheee aahihatal laa yakhluqoona shai'anw wa hum yukhlaqoona wa laa yamlikoona li anfusihim darranw wa laa naf'anw wa laa yamlikoona mawtanw wa laa hayaatanw wa laa nushooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū in hāżā illā ifkuniftarāhu wa a‘ānahū ‘alaihi qaumun ākharūn(a), fa qad jā'ū ẓulmaw wa zūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafarooo in haazaaa illaaa ifkunif taraahu wa a'aanahoo 'alaihi qawmun aakharoona faqad jaaa'oo zulmanw wa zooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū asāṭīrul-awwalīnaktatabahā fa hiya tumlā ‘alaihi bukrataw wa aṣīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalooo asaateerul awwaleenak tatabahaa fahiya tumlaa 'alaihi bukratanw wa aseelaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul anzalahul-lażī ya‘lamus-sirra fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), innahū kāna gafūrar raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul anzalhul lazee ya'lamus sirra fis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū mā lihāżar-rasūli ya'kuluṭ-ṭa‘āma wa yamsyī fil-aswāq(i), lau lā unzila ‘alaihi malakun fa yakūna ma‘ahū nażīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo maa li haazar Rasooli yaakulut ta'aama wa yamshee fil aswaaq; law laaa unzila ilaihi malakun fa yakoona ma'ahoo nazeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Au yulqā ilaihi kanzun au takūnu lahū jannatuy ya'kulu minhā, wa qālaẓ-ẓālimūna in tattabi‘ūna illā rajulam masḥūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Aw yulqaaa ilaihi kanzun aw takoonu lahoo jannatuny yaakulu minhaa; wa qaalaz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulam mas hooraa

ayah.transliteration: Unẓur kaifa ḍarabū lakal-amṡāla fa ḍallū falā yastaṭī‘ūna sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Tabārakal-lażī in syā'a ja‘ala laka khairam min żālika jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), wa yaj‘al laka quṣūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Tabaarakal lazeee in shaaa'a ja'ala laka khairam min zaalika jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wa yaj'al laka qusooraa

ayah.transliteration: Bal każżabū bis-sā‘ah(ti), wa a‘tadnā liman każżaba bis-sā‘ati sa‘īrā(n).
ayah.translation: Bal kazzaboo bis Saa'ati wa a'tadnaa liman kazzaba bis Saa'ati sa'eeraa

ayah.transliteration: Iżā ra'athum mim makānim ba‘īdin sami‘ū lahā tagayyuẓaw wa zafīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Izaa ra'at hum mim ma kaanim ba'eedin sami'oo lahaa taghaiyuzanw wa zafeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ulqū minhā makānan ḍayyiqam muqarranīna da‘au hunālika ṡubūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaaa ulqoo minhaa makaanan daiyiqam muqar raneena da'aw hunaalika subooraa

ayah.transliteration: Lā tad‘ul-yauma ṡubūraw wāḥidaw wad‘ū ṡubūran kaṡīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Laa tad'ul yawma subooranw waahidanw wad'oo subooran kaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Qul ażālika khairun am jannatul-khuldil-latī wu‘idal-muttaqūn(a), kānat lahum jazā'aw wa maṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul azaalika khairun am Jannatul khuldil latee wu'idal muttaqoon; kaanat lahum jazaaa'anw wa maseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Lahum fīhā mā yasyā'ūna khālidīn(a), kāna ‘alā rabbika wa‘dam mas'ūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oona khaalideen; kaana 'alaa Rabbika wa'dam mas'oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yaḥsyuruhum wa mā ya‘budūna min dūnillāhi fa yaqūlu a'antum aḍlaltum ‘ibādī hā'ulā'i am hum ḍallus-sabīl(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yahshuruhum wa maa ya'budoona min doonil lahi fa yaqoolu 'a-antum adlaltum 'ibaadee haaa'ulaaa'i am hum dallus sabeel

ayah.transliteration: Qālū subḥānaka mā kāna yambagī lanā an nattakhiża min dūnika min auliyā'a wa lākim matta‘tahum wa ābā'ahum ḥattā nasuż-żikr(a), wa kānū qaumam būrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo Subhaanaka maa kaana yambaghee lanaaa an nattakhiza min doonika min awliyaaa'a wa laakim matta'tahum wa aabaaa'ahum hattaa nasuz zikra wa kaanoo qawmam booraa

ayah.transliteration: Faqad każżabūkum bimā taqūlūn(a), famā tastaṭī‘ūna ṣarfaw wa lā naṣrā(n), wa may yaẓlim minkum nużiqhu ‘ażāban kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Faqad kazzabookum bimaa taqooloona famaa tastatee'oona sarfanw wa laa nasraa; wa mai yazlim minkum nuziqhu 'azaaban kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnā qablaka minal-mursalīna illā innahum laya'kulūnaṭ-ṭa‘āma wa yamsyūna fil aswāq(i), wa ja‘alnā ba‘ḍakum liba‘ḍin fitnah(tan), ataṣbirūn(a), wa kāna rabbuka baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaa qablaka minal mursaleena illaaa innahum la yaakuloonat ta'aama wa yamshoona fil aswaaq; wa ja'alnaa ba'dakum liba'din fitnatan atasbiroon; wa kaana Rabbuka Baseera

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna lā yarjūna liqā'anā lau lā unzila ‘alainal-malā'ikata au narā rabbanā, laqadistakbarū fī anfusihim wa ‘atau ‘utuwwan kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa law laaa unzila 'alainal malaaa'ikatu awnaraa Rabbanaa; laqadistakbaroo feee anfusihim wa 'ataw 'utuwwan kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yaraunal-malā'ikata  lā busyrā yauma'iżil lil-mujrimīna wa yaqūlūna ḥijram maḥjūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma yarawnal malaaa 'ikata laa bushraa Yawma'izil lilmujrimeena wa yaqooloona hijram mahjooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qadimnā ilā mā ‘amilū min ‘amalin fa ja‘alnāhu habā'am manṡūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qadimnaaa ilaa maa 'amiloo min 'amalin faja'alnaahu habaaa'am mansooraa

ayah.transliteration: Aṣḥābul-jannati yauma'iżin khairum mustaqarraw wa aḥsanu maqīlā(n).
ayah.translation: As haabul jannati yawma'izin khairum mustaqar ranw wa ahsanu maqeela

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma tasyaqqaqus-samā'u bil-gamāmi wa nuzzilal-malā'ikatu tanzīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma tashaqqaqus samaaa'u bilghamaami wa nuzzilal malaaa'ikatu tanzeela

ayah.transliteration: Al-mulku yauma'iżinil-ḥaqqu lir-raḥmān(i), wa kāna yauman ‘alal-kāfirīna ‘asīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Almulku Yawma'izinil haqqu lir Rahmaan; wa kaana Yawman'alal kaafireena 'aseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma ya‘aḍḍuẓ-ẓālimu ‘alā yadaihi yaqūlu yā laitanittakhażtu ma‘ar-rasūli sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma ya'adduz zaalimu 'alaa yadaihi yaqoolu yaa laitanit takhaztu ma'ar Rasooli sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā wailatā laitanī lam attakhiż fulānan khalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaa wailataa laitanee lam attakhiz fulaanan khaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Laqad aḍallanī ‘aniż-żikri ba‘da iż jā'anī, wa kānasy-syaiṭānu lil-insāni khażūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Laqad adallanee 'aniz zikri ba'da iz jaaa'anee; wa kaanash Shaitaanu lil insaani khazoolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālar-rasūlu yā rabbi inna qaumittakhażū hāżal-qur'āna mahjūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalar Rasoolu yaa Rabbi inna qawmit takhazoo haazal Qur-aana mahjooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika ja‘alnā likulli nabiyyin ‘aduwwam minal-mujrimīn(a), wa kafā birabbika hādiyaw wa naṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika ja'alnaa likulli Nabiyyin 'aduwwam minal mujrimeen; wa kafaa bi Rabbika haadiyanw wa naseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū lau lā nuzzila ‘alaihil-qur'ānu jumlataw wāḥidatan - każālika - linuṡabbita bihī fu'ādaka wa rattalnāhu tartīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo law laa nuzzila 'alaihil Quraanu jumlatanw waahidah; kazaalika linusabbita bihee fu'aadaka wa rattalnaahu tarteelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā ya'tūnaka bimaṡalin illā ji'nāka bil-ḥaqqi wa aḥsana tafsīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yaatoonaka bimasainn illaa ji'naaka bilhaqqi wa ahsana tafseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yuḥsyarūna ‘alā wujūhihim ilā jahannam(a), ulā'ika syarrum makānaw wa aḍallu sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yuhsharoona 'alaa wujoohim ilaa jahannama ulaaa'ika sharrum makaananw wa adallu sabeelaa )section 3)

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba wa ja‘alnā ma‘ahū akhāhu hārūna wazīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba wa ja'alnaa ma'ahooo akhaahu Haaroona wazeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Fa qulnażhabā ilal-qaumil-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātinā, fa dammarnāhum tadmīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Faqulnaz habaaa ilal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa fadammarnaahum tadmeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qauma nūḥil lammā każżabur-rusula agraqnāhum wa ja‘alnāhum lin-nāsi āyah(tan), wa a‘tadnā liẓ-ẓālimīna ‘ażāban alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qawma Noohil lammaa kazzabur Rusula aghraqnaahum wa ja'alnaahum linnaasi Aayatanw wa a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena 'azaaban aleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘ādaw wa ṡamūda wa aṣḥābar-rassi wa qurūnam baina żālika kaṡīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa 'Aadanw Samooda wa As haabar Rassi wa quroonam baina zaalika kaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kullan ḍarabnā lahul-amṡāl(a), wa kullan tabbarnā tatbīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa kullandarabnaa lahul amsaala wa kullan tabbarnaa tatbeera

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad atau ‘alal-qaryatil-latī umṭirat maṭaras-sau'(i), afalam yakūnū yaraunahā, bal kānū lā yarjūna nusyūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad ataw 'alal qaryatil lateee umtirat mataras saw'; afalam yakoonoo yarawnahaa; bal kaanoo laa yarjoona nushooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ra'auka iy yattakhiżūnaka illā huzuwā(n), ahāżal-lażī ba‘aṡallāhu rasūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa ra awka iny yattakhizoonaka illaa huzuwan ahaazal lazee ba'asal laahu Rasoolaa

ayah.transliteration: In kāda layuḍillunā ‘an ālihatinā lau lā an ṣabarnā ‘alaihā, wa saufa ya‘lamūna ḥīna yaraunal-‘ażāba man aḍallu sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: In kaada la yudillunaa 'an aalihatinaa law laaa an sabarnaa 'alaihaa; wa sawfa ya'lamoona heena yarawnal 'azaaba man adallu sabeela

ayah.transliteration: Ara'aita manittakhaża ilāhahū hawāh(u), afa anta takūnu ‘alaihi wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Ara'aita manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu afa anta takoonu 'alaihi wakeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Am taḥsabu anna akṡarahum yasma‘ūna au ya‘qilūn(a), in hum illā kal-an‘āmi bal hum aḍallu sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Am tahsabu annna aksarahum yasma'oona aw ya''qiloon; in hum illaa kal an'aami bal hum adallu sabeelan

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara ilā rabbika kaifa maddaẓ-ẓill(a), wa lau syā'a laja‘alahū sākinā(n), ṡumma ja‘alnasy-syamsa ‘alaihi dalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Alam tara ilaa Rabbika kaifa maddaz zilla wa law shaaa'a laja'alahoo saakinan summa ja'alnash shamsa 'alaihe daleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma qabaḍnā ilainā qabḍay yasīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa qabadnaahu ilainaa qabdany yaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī ja‘ala lakumul-laila libāsaw wan-nauma subātaw wa ja‘alan-nahāra nusyūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila libaasanw wannawma subaatanw wa ja'alan nahaara nushooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī arsalar-riyāḥa busyram baina yadai raḥmatih(ī), wa anzalnā minas-samā'i mā'an ṭahūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazeee arsalar riyaaha bushram baina yadai rahmatih; wa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an tahooraa

ayah.transliteration: Linuḥyiya bihī baldatam maitaw wa nusqiyahū mimmā khalaqnā an‘āmaw wa anāsiyya kaṡīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Linuhyiya bihee balda tam maitanw wa nusqiyahoo mimmaa khalaqnaaa an'aa manw wa anaasiyya kaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ṣarrafnāhu bainahum liyażżakkarū, fa abā akṡarun-nāsi illā kufūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad sarrafnaahu bainahum li yazzakkaroo fa abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau syi'nā laba‘aṡnā fī kulli qaryatin nażīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa law shi'naa laba'asnaa fee kulli qar yatin nazeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Falā tuṭi‘il-kāfirīna wa jāhidhum bihī jihādan kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Falaa tuti'il kaafireena wa jaahidhum bihee jihaadan kabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī marajal-baḥraini hāżā ‘ażbun furātuw wa hāżā milḥun ujāj(un), wa ja‘ala bainahumā barzakhaw wa ḥijram maḥjūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee marajal bahraini haazaa 'azbun furaatunw wa haazaa milhun ujaaj; wa ja'ala bainahumaa barzakhanw wa hijram mahjooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī khalaqa minal-mā'i basyaran fa ja‘alahū nasabaw wa ṣihrā(n), wa kāna rabbuka qadīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee khalaqa minal maaa'i basharran fa ja'alahoo nasaban wa sihraa; wa kaana Rabbuka Qadeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ya‘budūna min dūnillāhi mā lā yanfa‘uhum wa lā yaḍurruhum, wa kānal-kāfiru ‘alā rabbihī ẓahīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uhum wa laa yadurruhum; wa kaanal kaafiru 'alaa Rabbihee zaheeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnāka illā mubasysyiraw wa nażīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa arsalnaaka illaa mubashshiranw wa nazeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Qul mā as'alukum ‘alaihi min ajrin illā man syā'a ay yattakhiża ilā rabbihī sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin illaa man shaaa'a ai yattakhiza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa tawakkal ‘alal-ḥayyil-lażī lā yamūtu wa sabbiḥ biḥamdih(ī), wa kafā bihī biżunūbi ‘ibādihī khabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa tawakkal 'alal Haiyil lazee laa yamootu wa sabbih bihamdih; wa kafaa bihee bizunoobi 'ibaadihee khabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Allażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā bainahumā fī sittati ayyāmin ṡummastawā ‘alal-‘arsy(i), ar-raḥmānu fas'al bihī khabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Allazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fee sittati aiyaamin summmmastawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ar Rahmaanu fas'al bihee khabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā qīla lahumusjudū lir-raḥmāni qālū wa mar-raḥmānu anasjudu limā ta'murunā wa zādahum nufūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa qeela lahumus judoo lir Rahmaani qaaloo wa mar Rahmaanu anasjudu limaa taamurunaa wa zaadahum nufooraa

ayah.transliteration: Tabārakal-lażī ja‘ala fis-samā'i burūjaw wa ja‘ala fīhā sirājaw wa qamaram munīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Tabaarakal lazee ja'ala fis samaaa'i buroojanw wa ja'ala feehaa siraajanw wa qamaram muneeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī ja‘alal-laila wan-nahāra khilfatal liman arāda ay yażżakkara au arāda syukūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa huwal lazee ja'alal laila wannahaara khilfatal liman araada ai yazzakkara aw araadaa shookooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘ibādur-raḥmānil-lażīna yamsyūna ‘alal-arḍi haunaw wa iżā khāṭabahumul-jāhilūna qālū salāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa 'ibaadur Rahmaanil lazeena yamshoona 'alal ardi hawnanw wa izaa khaata bahumul jaahiloona qaaloo salaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yabītūna lirabbihim sujjadaw wa qiyāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yabeetoona li Rabbihim sujjadanw wa qiyaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yaqūlūna rabbanaṣrif ‘annā ‘ażāba jahannam(a), inna ‘ażābahā kāna garāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanas rif 'annnaa 'azaaba Jahannama inn 'azaabahaa kaana gharaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Innahā sā'at mustaqarraw wa muqāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Innahaa saaa'at mustaqarranw wa muqaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna iżā anfaqū lam yusrifū wa lam yaqturū wa kāna baina żālika qawāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena izaaa anfaqoo lam yusrifoo wa lam yaqturoo wa kaana baina zaalika qawaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna lā yad‘ūna ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhara wa lā yaqtulūnan nafsal-latī ḥarramallāhu illā bil-ḥaqqi wa lā yaznūn(a), wa may yaf‘al żālika yalqa aṡāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena laa yad'oona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara wa laa yaqtuloonan nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqqi wa laa yaznoon; wa mai yaf'al zaalika yalqa asaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Yuḍā‘af lahul-‘ażābu yaumal-qiyāmati wa yakhlud fīhī muhānā(n).
ayah.translation: Yudaa'af lahul 'azaabu Yawmal Qiyaamati wa yakhlud feehee muhaanaa

ayah.transliteration: Illā man tāba wa āmana wa ‘amila ‘amalan ṣāliḥan fa ulā'ika yubaddilullāhu sayyi'ātihim ḥasanāt(in), wa kānallāhu gafūrar raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Illaa man taaba wa 'aamana wa 'amila 'amalan saalihan fa ulaaa'ika yubad dilul laahu saiyi aatihim hasanaat; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa man tāba wa ‘amila ṣāliḥan fa innahū yatūbu ilallāhi matābā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa man taaba wa 'amila saalihan fa innnahoo yatoobu ilal laahi mataabaa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yasyhadūnaz-zūr(a), wa iżā marrū bil-lagwi marrū kirāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena laa yash hadoonaz zoora wa izaa marroo billaghwi marroo kiraamaa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna iżā żukkirū bi'āyāti rabbihim lam yakhirrū ‘alaihā ṣummaw wa ‘umyānā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena izaa zukkiroo bi Aayaati Rabbihim lam yakhirroo 'alaihaa summanw wa'umyaanaa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yaqūlūna rabbanā hab lanā min azwājinā wa żurriyyātinā qurrata a‘yuniw waj‘alnā lil-muttaqīna imāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaa hab lanaa min azwaajinaa wa zurriyaatinaa qurrata a'yuninw waj 'alnaa lilmuttaqeena Imaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika yujzaunal-gurfata bimā ṣabarū wa yulaqqauna fīhā taḥiyyataw wa salāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika yujzawnal ghurfata bimaa sabaroo wa yulaqqawna feehaa tahiyyatanw wa salaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Khālidīna fīhā, ḥasunat mustaqarraw wa muqāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Khaalideena feehaa; hasunat mustaqarranw wa muqaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul mā ya‘ba'u bikum rabbī lau lā du‘ā'ukum, faqad każżabtum fa saufa yakūnu lizāmā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul maa ya'ba'u bikum Rabbee law laa du'aaa'ukum faqad kazzabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizaamaa

ayah.transliteration: Ṭā Sīm Mīm.
ayah.translation: Taa-Seeen-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Tilka āyātul-kitābil-mubīn(i).
ayah.translation: Tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: La‘allaka bākhi‘un nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: La'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka allaa yakoonoo mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: In nasya' nunazzil ‘alaihim minas-samā'i āyatan fa ẓallat a‘nāquhum lahā khāḍi‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: In nashaa nunazzil 'alaihim minas samaaa'i Aayatan fazallat a'naaquhum lahaa khaadi'een

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ya'tīhim min żikrim minar-raḥmāni muḥdaṡin illā kānū ‘anhu mu‘riḍīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yaateehim min zikrim minar Rahmaani muhdasin illaa kaanoo 'anhu mu'rideen

ayah.transliteration: Faqad każżabū fa saya'tīhim ambā'u mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Faqad kazzaboo fasa yaateehim ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau ilal-arḍi kam ambatnā fīhā min kulli zaujin karīm(in).
ayah.translation: Awa lam yaraw ilal ardi kam ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjin kareem

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan), wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inn fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbaka lahuwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż nādā rabbuka mūsā ani'til-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz naadaa Rabbuka Moosaaa ani'-til qawmaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qauma fir‘aun(a), alā yattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qawma Fir'awn; alaa yattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi innī akhāfu ay yukażżibūn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi inneee akhaafu ai yukazziboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaḍīqu ṣadrī wa lā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa arsil ilā hārūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yadeequ sadree wa laa yantaliqu lisaanee fa arsil ilaa Haaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lahum ‘alayya żambun fa akhāfu ay yaqtulūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa lahum 'alaiya zambun fa akhaafu ai yaqtuloon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla kallā, fażhabā bi'āyātinā innā ma‘akum mustami‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala kallaa fazhabaa bi Aayaatinaaa innaa ma'akum mustami'oon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'tiyā fir‘auna faqūlā innā rasūlu rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faatiyaa Fir'awna faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: An arsil ma‘anā banī isrā'īl(a).
ayah.translation: An arsil ma'anaa Baneee Israaa'eel

ayah.transliteration: Qāla alam nurabbika fīnā walīdaw wa labiṡta fīnā min ‘umurika sinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala alam nurabbika feenaa waleedanw wa labista feenaa min 'umurika sineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa fa‘alta fa‘latakal-latī fa‘alta wa anta minal-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa fa'alta fa'latakal latee fa'alta wa anta minal kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fa‘altuhā iżaw wa ana minaḍ-ḍāllīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala fa'altuhaaa izanw wa ana minad daaaleen
