ayah.transliteration: Fa farartu minkum lammā khiftukum fa wahaba lī rabbī ḥukmaw wa ja‘alanī minal-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fafarartu minkum lam maa khiftukum fawahaba lee Rabbee hukmanw wa ja'alanee minal mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa tilka ni‘matun tamunnuhā ‘alayya an ‘abbatta banī isrā'īl(a).
ayah.translation: Wa tilka ni'matun tamun nuhaa 'alaiya an 'abbatta Baneee Israaa'eel

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fir‘aunu wa mā rabbul-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Fir'awnu wa maa Rabbul 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumā, in kuntum mūqinīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla liman ḥaulahū alā tastami‘ūn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbukum wa rabbu ābā'ikumul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbukum wa Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla inna rasūlakumul-lażī ursila ilaikum lamajnūn(un).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbul-masyriqi wal-magribi wa mā bainahumā, in kuntum ta‘qilūn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla la'inittakhażta ilāhan gairī la'aj‘alannaka minal-masjūnīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla awalau ji'tuka bisyai'im mubīn(in).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fa'ti bihī in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala faati biheee in kunta minas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa alqā ‘aṣāhu fa iżā hiya ṡu‘bānum mubīn(un).

ayah.transliteration: Wa naza‘a yadahū fa iżā hiya baiḍā'u lin-nāẓirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa naza'a yadahoo faizaa hiya baidaaa'u linnaa zireen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū arjih wa akhāhu wab‘aṡ fil-madā'ini ḥāsyirīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Ya'tūka bikulli saḥḥārin ‘alīm(in).

ayah.transliteration: Fa jumi‘as-saḥaratu limīqāti yaumim ma‘lūm(in).

ayah.transliteration: Wa qīla lin-nāsi hal antum mujtami‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qeela linnaasi hal antum mujtami'oon

ayah.transliteration: La‘allanā nattabi‘us-saḥarata in kānū humul-gālibīn(a).
ayah.translation: La'allanaa nattabi'us saharata in kaanoo humul ghaalibeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla na‘am wa innakum iżal laminal-muqarrabīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mulqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala lahum Moosaaa alqoo maaa antum mulqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa alqau ḥibālahum wa ‘iṣiyyahum wa qālū bi‘izzati fir‘auna innā lanaḥnul-gālibūn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Fa ulqiyas-saḥaratu sājidīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Qālū āmannā birabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo aamannaa bi Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Rabbi mūsā wa hārūn(a).
ayah.translation: Rabbi Moosaa wa Haaroon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla āmantum lahū qabla an āżana lakum, innahū lakabīrukumul-lażī ‘allamakumus-siḥr(a), fa lasaufa ta‘lamūn(a), la'uqaṭṭi‘anna aidiyakum wa arjulakum min khilāfiw wa la'uṣallibannakum  ajma'īn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Fa arsala fir‘aunu fil-madā'ini ḥāsyirīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Inna hā'ulā'i lasyirzimatun qalīlūn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Wa innā lajamī‘un ḥāżirūn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla kallā, inna ma‘iya rabbī sayahdīn(i).

ayah.transliteration: Wa anjainā mūsā wa mam ma‘ahū ajma‘īn(a).

ayah.translation: Summa aghraqnal aakhareen

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan), wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Allażī khalaqanī fa huwa yahdīn(i).

ayah.translation: Wa maaa adallanaaa illal mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Famā lanā min syāfi‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa lanaa min shaa fi'een

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka lahuwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka lahuwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).

ayah.transliteration: Innī lakum rasūlun amīn(un).
ayah.translation: Innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

ayah.transliteration: Fattaqullāha wa aṭī‘ūn(i).
ayah.translation: Fattaqullaaha wa atee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā as'alukum ‘alaihi min ajr(in), in ajriya illā ‘alā rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: In hāżā illā khuluqul-awwalīn(a).

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka lahuwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).

ayah.transliteration: Innī lakum rasūlun amīn(un).
ayah.translation: Innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

ayah.transliteration: Fattaqullāha wa aṭī‘ūn(i).
ayah.translation: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā as'alukum ‘alaihi min ajr(in), in ajriya illā ‘alā rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).

ayah.translation: Wa laa tutee'ooo amral musrifeen

ayah.translation: Qaala haazihee naaqatul lahaa shirbunw w alakum shirbu yawmim ma'loom

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tamassūhā bisū'in fa ya'khużakum ‘ażābu yaumin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa yaakhuzakum 'azaabu Yawmin 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Fa ‘aqarūhā fa aṣbaḥū nādimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa'aqaroohaa fa asbahoo naadimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa akhażahumul-‘ażāb(u), inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan), wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa akhazahumul 'azaab; inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum m'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka lahuwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Każżabat qaumu lūṭinil-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: kazzabat qawmu Lootinil mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: Iż qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Lootun alaa tattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Innī lakum rasūlun amīn(un).
ayah.translation: Innee lakum rasoolun ameen

ayah.transliteration: Fattaqullāha wa aṭī‘ūn(i).
ayah.translation: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā as'alukum ‘alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illā ‘alā rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Ata'tūnaż-żukrāna minal-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Ataatoonaz zukraana minal 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa tażarūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum, bal antum qamun ‘ādūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min azwaajikum; bal antum qawmun 'aadoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū la'illam tantahi yā lūṭu latakūnanna minal-mukhrajīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa Lootu latakoonanna minal mukhrajeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innī li‘amalikum minal-qālīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala innee li'amalikum minal qaaleen

ayah.transliteration: Rabbi najjinī wa ahlī mimmā ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Rabbi najjjinee wa ahlee mimmmaa ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa najjaināhu wa ahlahū ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Fanajjainaahu wa ahlahooo ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Illā ‘ajūzan fil-gābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaa 'ajoozan filghaabireen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma dammarnal-ākharīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa dammarnal aa khareen

ayah.transliteration: Wa amṭarnā ‘alaihim maṭarā(n), fa sā'a maṭarul-munżarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa amtarnaa 'alaihim mataran fasaaa'a matarul munzareen

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan),  wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka lahuwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Każżaba aṣḥābul-aikatil-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Kazzaba As haabul Aykatil mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: Iż qāla lahum syu‘aibun alā tattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Innī lakum rasūlun amīn(un).
ayah.translation: Innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

ayah.transliteration: Fattaqullāha wa aṭī‘ūn(i).
ayah.translation: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā as'alukum ‘alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illā ‘alā rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Auful-kaila wa lā takūnū minal-mukhsirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Awful kaila wa laa takoonoo minal mukhsireen

ayah.transliteration: Wazinū bil-qisṭāsil-mustaqīm(i).
ayah.translation: Wa zinoo bilqistaasil mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tabkhasun-nāsa asy-yā'ahum wa lā ta‘ṡau fil-arḍi mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa 'ahum wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Wattaqul-lażī khalaqakum wal-jibillatal-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wattaqul lazee khalaqakum waljibillatal awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū innamā anta minal-musaḥḥarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo innamaa anta minal musahhareen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā anta illā basyarum miṡlunā wa in naẓunnuka laminal-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa wa innazunnuka laminal kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa asqiṭ ‘alainā kisafam minas-samā'i in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa asqit 'alainaa kisafam minas samaaa'i in kunta minas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbī a‘lamu bimā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbeee a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa każżabūhu fa akhażahum ‘ażābu yaumiẓ-ẓullah(ti), innahū kāna ‘ażāba yaumin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Fakazzaboohu fa akhazahum 'azaabu Yawmiz zullah; innahoo kaana 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan),  wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka lahuwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū latanzīlu rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innahoo latanzeelu Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Nazala bihir rūḥul-amīn(u).
ayah.translation: Nazala bihir Roohul Ameen

ayah.transliteration: ‘Alā qalbika litakūna minal-munżirīn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Alaa qalbika litakoona minal munzireen

ayah.transliteration: Bilisānin ‘arabiyyim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Bilisaanin 'Arabiyyim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū lafī zuburil-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innahoo lafee Zuburil awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yakul lahum āyatan ay ya‘lamahū ‘ulamā'u banī isrā'īl(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yakul lahum Aayatan ai ya'lamahoo 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israaa'eel

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau nazzalnāhū ‘alā ba‘ḍil-a‘jamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law nazzalnaahu 'alaa ba'dil a'jameen

ayah.transliteration: Fa qara'ahū ‘alaihim mā kānū bihī mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faqara ahoo 'alaihim maa kaanoo bihee mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Każālika salaknāhu fī qulūbil-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika salaknaahu fee quloobil mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Lā yu'minūna bihī ḥattā yarawul-‘ażābal-alīm(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem

ayah.transliteration: Fa ya'tiyahum bagtataw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fayaatiyahum baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa yaqūlū hal naḥnu munẓarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa yaqooloo hal nahnu munzaroon

ayah.transliteration: Afa bi‘ażābinā yasta‘jilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Aafabi 'azaabinaa yasta'jiloon

ayah.transliteration: Afa ra'aita im matta‘nāhum sinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Aara'aita im matta'naahum sineen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma jā'ahum mā kānū yū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa jaaa'ahum maa kaanoo yoo'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Mā agnā ‘anhum mā kānū yumatta‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maaa aghnaaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yumaatoo'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā munżirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa lahaa munziroon

ayah.transliteration: Żikrā, wa mā kunnā ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Zikraa wa maa kunnaa zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā tanazzalat bihisy-syayāṭīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa maa tanazzalat bihish Shayaateen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yambagī lahum wa mā yastaṭī‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yambaghee lahum wa maa yastatee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Innahum ‘anis-sam‘i lama‘zūlūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innahum 'anis sam'i lama'zooloon

ayah.transliteration: Falā tad‘u ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhara fa takūna minal-mu‘ażżabīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatakoona minal mu'azzabeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa anżir ‘asyīratakal-aqrabīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa anzir 'asheeratakal aqrabeen

ayah.transliteration: Wakhfiḍ janāḥaka limanittaba‘aka minal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wakhfid janaahaka limanit taba 'aka minal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Fa in ‘aṣauka faqul innī barī'um mimmā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa in asawka faqul innee bareee'um mimmmaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa tawakkal ‘alal-‘azīzir-raḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Wa tawakkal alal 'Azeezir Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Allażī yarāka ḥīna taqūm(u).
ayah.translation: Allazee yaraaka heena taqoom

ayah.transliteration: Wa taqallubaka fis-sājidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa taqallubaka fis saajideen

ayah.transliteration: Innahū huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Hal unabbi'ukum ‘alā man tanazzalusy-syayāṭīn(u).
ayah.translation: Hal unabbi'ukum 'alaa man tanazzalush Shayaateen

ayah.transliteration: Tanazzalu ‘alā kulli affākin aṡīm(in).
ayah.translation: Tanazzalu 'alaa kulli affaakin aseem

ayah.transliteration: Yulqūnas-sam‘a wa akṡaruhum kāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yulqoonas sam'a wa aksaruhum aaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Wasy-syu‘arā'u yattabi‘uhumul-gāwūn(a).
ayah.translation: Washshu 'araaa'u yattabi 'uhumul ghaawoon

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annahum fī kulli wādiy yahīmūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annahum fee kulli waadiny yaheemoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahum yaqūlūna mā lā yaf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa annahum yaqooloona ma laa yaf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Illal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa żakarullāha kaṡīraw wantaṣarū mim ba‘di mā ẓulimū, wa saya‘lamul-lażīna ẓalamū ayya munqalabiy yanqalibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Illal lazeena aamanoo w a'amilus saalihaati wa zakarul laaha kaseeranw wantasaroo mim ba'di maa zulimoo; wa saya'lamul lazeena zalamooo aiya munqalbiny yanqaliboon

ayah.transliteration: Ṭā Sīn, tilka āyātul-qur'āni wa kitābim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Taa-Seeen; tilka Aayaatul Qur-aani wa Kitaabim Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Hudaw wa busyrā lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Hudanw wa bushraa lil mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yuqīmūnaṣ-ṣalāta wa yu'tūnaz-zakāta wa hum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata wa yu'toonaz Zakaata wa hum bil Aakhirati hum yooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati zayyannā lahum a‘mālahum fahum ya‘mahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena laa yu'mimoona bil Aakhirati zaiyannaa lahum a'maalahum fahum ya'mahoon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna lahum sū'ul-‘ażābi wa hum fil-ākhirati humul-akhsarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena lahum sooo'ul 'azaabi wa hum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa innaka latulaqqal-qur'āna mil ladun ḥakīmin ‘alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa innaka latulaqqal Qur-aana mil ladun Hakeemin 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Iż qāla mūsā li'ahlihī innī ānastu nārā(n), sa'ātīkum minhā bikhabarin au ātīkum bisyihābin qabasil la‘allakum taṣṭalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz qaala Moosaa li ahliheee inneee aanastu naaran saaateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw aateekum bishihaabin qabasil la'allakum tastaloon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'ahā nūdiya am būrika man fin-nāri wa man ḥaulahā, wa subḥānallāhi rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'ahaa noodiya am boorika man finnnnaari wa man hawlahaa wa Subhaanal laahi Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Yā mūsā innahū anallāhul-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Yaa Moosaaa innahooo Anal laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa alqi ‘aṣāk(a), falammā ra'āhā tahtazzu ka'annahā jānnuw wallā mudbiraw wa lam yu‘aqqib, yā mūsā lā takhaf, innī lā yakhāfu ladayyal-mursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa alqi 'asaak; falammmaa ra aahaa tahtazzu ka annahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw wa lam yu'aqqib; yaa Moosaa laa takhaf innee laa yakhaafu ladaiyal mursaloon

ayah.transliteration: Illā man ẓalama ṡumma baddala ḥusnam ba‘da sū'in fa innī gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Illaa man zalama summa baddala husnam ba'da sooo'in fa innee Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa adkhil yadaka fī jaibika takhruj baiḍā'a min gairi sū'(in), fī tis‘i āyātin ilā fir‘auna wa qaumih(ī), innahum kānū qauman fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa adkhil yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairisooo'in feetis'i Aayaatin ilaa Fir'awna wa qawmih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'athum āyātunā mubṣiratan qālū hāżā siḥrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'at hum Aayaatunaa mubsiratan qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa jaḥadū bihā wastaiqanathā anfusuhum ẓulmaw wa ‘uluwwā(n), fanẓur kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jahadoo bihaa wastaiqanat haaa anfusuhum zulmanw-wa 'uluwwaa; fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā dāwūda wa sulaimāna ‘ilmā(n), wa qālal-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī faḍḍalanā ‘alā kaṡīrim min ‘ibādihil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Daawooda wa sulaimaana 'ilmaa; wa qaalal hamdu lil laahil lazee faddalanaa 'alaa kaseerim min 'ibaadihil mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa wariṡa sulaimānu dāwūda wa qāla yā ayyuhan-nāsu ‘ullimnā manṭiqaṭ-ṭairi wa ūtīnā min kulli syai'(in), inna hāżā lahuwal-faḍlul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa warisa Sulaimaanu Daawooda wa qaala yaaa aiyuhan naasu 'ullimnaa mantiqat tairi wa ooteenaa min kulli shai'in inna haazaa lahuwal fadlul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḥusyira lisulaimāna junūduhū minal-jinni wal-insi waṭ-ṭairi fahum yūza‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa hushira Sulaimaana junooduhoo minal jinni wal insi wattairi fahum yooza'oon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā atau ‘alā wādin-naml(i), qālat namlatuy yā ayyuhan-namludkhulū masākinakum, lā yaḥṭimannakum sulaimānu wa junūduhū wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: hattaaa izaaa ataw 'alaa waadin namli qaalat namlatuny yaaa aiyuhan namlud khuloo masaakinakum laa yahtimannakum Sulaimaanu wa junooduhoo wa hum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Fatabassama ḍāḥikam min qaulihā wa qāla rabbi auzi‘nī an asykura ni‘matakal-latī an‘amta ‘alayya wa ‘alā wālidayya wa an a‘mala ṣāliḥan tarḍāhu wa adkhilnī biraḥmatika fī ‘ibādikaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fatabassama daahikam min qawlihaa wa qaala Rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura ni'mata kal lateee an'amta 'alaiya wa 'alaa waalidaiya wa an a'mala saalihan tardaahu wa adkhilnee birahmatika fee 'ibaadikas saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa tafaqqadaṭ-ṭaira fa qāla mā liya lā aral-hudhud(a), am kāna minal-gā'ibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa tafaqqadat taira faqaala maa liya laaa aral hud hud, am kaana minal ghaaa'ibeen

ayah.transliteration: La'u‘ażżibannahū ‘ażāban syadīdan au la'ażbaḥannahū au laya'tiyannī bisulṭānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: La-u'azzibanahoo 'azaaban shadeedan aw la azbahannahoo aw layaatiyannee bisultaanim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Famakaṡa gaira ba‘īdin faqāla aḥaṭtu bimā lam tuḥiṭ bihī wa ji'tuka min saba'im binaba'iy yaqīn(in).
ayah.translation: Famakasa ghaira ba'eedin faqaala ahattu bimaa lam tuhit bihee wa ji'tuka min Sabaim binaba iny-yaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Innī wajattumra'atan tamlikuhum wa ūtiyat min kulli syai'iw wa lahā ‘arsyun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innee wajattum ra atan tamlikuhum wa ootiyat min kulli shai'inw wa lahaa 'arshun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wajattuhā wa qaumahā yasjudūna lisy-syamsi min dūnillāhi wa zayyana lahumusy-syaiṭānu a‘mālahum fa ṣaddahum ‘anis-sabīli fahum lā yahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wajattuhaa wa qawmahaa yasjudoona lishshamsi min doonil laahi wa zaiyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli fahum laa yahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Allā yasjudū lillāhil-lażī yukhrijul-khab'a fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa ya‘lamu mā tukhfūna wa mā tu‘linūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaa yasjudoo lillaahil lazee yukhrijul khab'a fis samaawaati wal ardi wa ya'lamu maa tukhfoona wa maa tu'linoon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbul-‘arsyil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta minal-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala sananzuru asadaqta am kunta minal kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Iżhab bikitābī hāżā fa alqih ilaihim ṡumma tawalla ‘anhum fanẓur māżā yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Izhab bikitaabee haaza fa alqih ilaihim summma tawalla 'anhum fanzur maazaa yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qālat yā ayyuhal-mala'u innī ulqiya ilayya kitābun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaalat yaaa aiyuhal mala'u innee ulqiya ilaiya kitaabun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Innahū min sulaimāna wa innahū bismillāhir-raḥmānir-raḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Innahoo min Sulaimaana wa innahoo bismil laahir Rahmaanir Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Allā ta‘lū ‘alayya wa'tūnī muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaa ta'loo 'alaiya waa toonee muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālat yā ayyuhal-mala'u aftūnī fī amrī, mā kuntu qāṭi‘atan amran ḥattā tasyhadūn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaalat yaaa aiyuhal mala'u aftoonee fee amree maa kuntu qaati'atan amran hattaa tashhhaddon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū naḥnu ulū quwwatiw wa ulū ba'sin syadīd(in), wal-amru ilaiki fanẓurī māżā ta'murīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo nahnu uloo quwwatinw wa uloo baasin shadeed; wal amru ilaiki fanzuree maazaa taamureen

ayah.transliteration: Qālat innal-mulūka iżā dakhalū qaryatan afsadūhā wa ja‘alū a‘izzata ahlihā ażillah(tan), wa każālika yaf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalat innal mulooka izaa dakhaloo qaryatan afsadoohaa wa ja'alooo a'izzata ahlihaaa azillah; wa kazaalika yaf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa innī mursilatun ilaihim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarji‘ul-mursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innee mursilatun ilaihim bihadiyyatin fanaaziratum bima yarji'ul mursaloon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'a sulaimāna qāla atumiddūnani  bimālin famā ātāniyallāhu khairum mimmā ātākum, bal antum bihadiyyatikum tafraḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'a Sulaimaana qaala atumiddoonani bimaalin famaaa aataakum bal antum bihadiy yatikum tafrahoon

ayah.transliteration: Irji‘ ilaihim falana'tiyannahum bijunūdil lā qibala lahum bihā wa lanukhrijannahum minhā ażillataw wa hum ṣāgirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Irji' ilaihim falanaatiyan nahum bijunoodil laa qibala lahum bihaa wa lanukhri jannahum minhaaa azillatanw wa hum saaghiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā ayyuhal-mala'u ayyukum ya'tīnī bi‘arsyihā qabla ay ya'tūnī muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaaa aiyuhal mala'u aiyukum yaateenee bi'arshihaa qabla ai yaatoonee muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ‘ifrītum minal-jinni ana atīka bihī qabla an taqūma mim maqāmik(a), wa innī ‘alaihi laqawiyyun amīn(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala 'ifreetum minal jinni ana aateeka bihee qabla an taqooma mim maqaamika wa innee 'alaihi laqawiyyun ameen

ayah.transliteration: Qālal-lażī ‘indahū ‘ilmum minal-kitābi ana ātīka bihī qabla ay yartadda ilaika ṭarfuk(a), falammā ra'āhu mustaqirran ‘indahū qāla hāżā min faḍli rabbī, liyabluwanī a'asykuru am akfur(u), wa man syakara fa'innamā yasykuru linafsih(ī), wa man kafara fa'inna rabbī ganiyyun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaalal lazee indahoo 'ilmum minal Kitaabi ana aateeka bihee qabla ai yartadda ilaika tarfuk; falammaa ra aahu mustaqirran 'indahoo qaala haazaa min fadli Rabbee li yabluwaneee 'a-ashkuru am akfuru wa man shakara fa innamaa yashkuru linafsihee wa man kafara fa inna Rabbee Ghaniyyun Kareem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla nakkirū lahā ‘arsyahā nanẓur atahtadī am takūnu minal-lażīna lā yahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala nakkiroo lahaa 'arshahaa nanzur atahtadeee am takoonu minal lazeena laa yahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'at qīla ahakażā ‘arsyuk(i), qālat ka'annahū huw(a), wa ūtīnal-‘ilma min qablihā wa kunnā muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'at qeela ahaakaza 'arshuki qaalat kaanna hoo; wa ooteenal 'ilma min qablihaa wa kunnaa muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ṣaddahā mā kānat ta‘budu min dūnillāh(i), innahā kānat min qaumin kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa saddahaa maa kaanat ta'budu min doonil laahi innahaa kaanat min qawmin kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Qīla lahadkhuliṣ-ṣarḥ(a), falammā ra'athu ḥasibathu lujjataw wa kasyafat ‘an sāqaihā, qāla innahū ṣarḥum mumarradum min qawārīr(a), qālat rabbi innī ẓalamtu nafsī wa aslamtu ma‘a sulaimāna lillāhi rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qeela lahad khulis sarha falammaa ra at hu hasibat hu lujjatanw wa khashafat 'an saaqaihaa; qaala innahoo sarhum mumarradum min qawaareer; qaalat Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee wa aslamtu ma'a Sulaimaana lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā ilā ṡamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥan ani‘budullāha fa'iżā hum farīqāni yakhtaṣimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaaa ilaa Samoda akhaahum Saalihan ani'budul lahha fa izaa hum fareeqaani yakhtasimoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā qaumi lima tasta‘jilūna bis-sayyi'ati qablal-ḥasanah(ti), lau lā tastagfirūnallāha la‘allakum turḥamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaa qawmi lima tasta'jiloona bissaiyi'ati qablal hasanati law laa tas taghfiroonal laaha la'allakum turhamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāluṭ ṭayyarnā bika wa bimam ma‘ak(a), qāla ṭā'irukum ‘indallāhi bal antum qaumun tuftanūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalut taiyarnaa bika wa bimam ma'ak; qaala taaa'irukum 'indal laahi bal antum qawmun tuftanoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa kāna fil-madīnati tis‘atu rahṭiy yufsidūna fil-arḍi wa lā yuṣliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kaana fil madeenati tis'atu rahtiny yufsidoona fil ardi wa laa yuslihoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū taqāsamū billāhi lanubayyitannahū wa ahlahū ṡumma lanaqūlanna liwaliyyihī mā syahidnā mahlika ahlihī wa innā laṣādiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo taqaasamoo billaahi lanubaiyitannahoo wa ahlahoo summaa lanaqoolana liwaliy yihee maa shahidnaa mahlika ahliee wa innaa lasaadiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa makarū makraw wa makarnā makraw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa makaroo makranw wa makarnaa makranw wa hum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Fanẓur kaifa kāna ‘āqibatu makrihim annā dammarnāhum wa qaumahum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatu makrihim annaa dammar naahum wa qawmahum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Fatilka buyūtuhum khāwiyatam bimā ẓalamū, inna fī żālika la'āyatal liqaumiy ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fatilka buyootuhum khaa wiyatam bimaa zalamoo; inna fee zaalika la Aayatal liqaw miny-ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa anjainal-lażīna āmanū wa kānū yattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa anjainal lazeena aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lūṭan iż qāla liqaumihī ata'tūnal-fāḥisyata wa antum tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee ataatoonal faa hishata wa antum qawmun tajjhaloon

ayah.transliteration: A'innakum lata'tūnar-rijāla syahwatam min dūnin-nisā'(i), bal antum qaumun tajhalūn(a).
ayah.translation: A'innakum lataatoonar rijaala shahwatam min doonin nisaaa'; bal antum qawmun tajhaloon

ayah.transliteration: Famā kāna jawāba qaumihī illā an qālū akhrijū āla lūṭim min qaryatikum, innahum unāsuy yataṭahharūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fammaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalooo akrijoon aalaa Lootim min qaryatikum innahum unaasuny yatatahharoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'anjaināhu wa ahlahū illamra'atahū qaddarnāhā minal-gābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa anjainaahu wa ahlahooo illam ra atahoo qaddarnaahaa minal ghaabireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa amṭarnā ‘alaihim maṭarā(n), fasā'a maṭarul-munżarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa amtarnaa 'alaihimm mataran fasaaa'a matarul munzareen

ayah.transliteration: Qulil-ḥamdu lillāhi wa salāmun ‘alā ‘ibādihil-lażīnaṣṭafā, āllāhu khairun ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qulil hamdu lillaahi wa salaamun 'alaa 'ibaadihil lazeenas tafaa; aaallaahu khairun ammmaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Am man khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa anzala minas-samā'i mā'an fa ambatnā bihī ḥadā'iqa żāta bahjah(tin), mā kāna lakum an tumbitū syajarahā, a'ilāhum ma‘allāh(i), bal hum qaumuy ya‘dilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Amman khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa anzala lakum minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa ambatnaa bihee hadaaa'iqa zaata bahjjah; maa kanna lakum an tumbitoo shajarahaa; 'a-ilaahum ma'al laah; bal hum qawmuny ya'diloon

ayah.transliteration: Am man ja‘alal-arḍa qarāraw wa ja‘ala khilālahā anhāraw wa ja‘ala lahā rawāsiya wa ja‘ala bainal-baḥraini ḥājizā(n), a'ilāhum ma‘allāh(i), bal akṡaruhum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ammann ja'alal arda qaraaranw wa ja'ala khilaalahaaa anhaaranw wa ja'ala lahaa rawaasiya wa ja'ala bainal bahraini haajizaa; 'a-ilaahumma'allah; bal aksaruhum la ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Am may yujībul-muḍṭarra iżā da‘āhu wa yaksyifus-sū'a wa yaj‘alukum khulafā'a fil-arḍ(i), a'ilāhum ma‘allāh(i), qalīlam mā tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ammany-yujeebul mud tarra izaa da'aahu wa yakshifussooo'a wa yaj'alukum khula faaa'al ardi 'a-ilaahum ma'al laahi qaleelam maa tazak karoon

ayah.transliteration: Am may yahdīkum fī ẓulumātil-barri wal-baḥri wa may yursilur-riyāḥa busyram baina yadai raḥmatih(ī), a'ilāhum ma‘allāh(i), ta‘ālallāhu ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ammany-yahdeekum fee zulumaatil barri wal bahri wa many yursilu riyaaha bushram baina yadai rahmatih; 'a-ilaahum ma'al laah; Ta'aalal laahu 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Am may yabda'ul-khalqa ṡumma yu‘īduhū wa may yarzuqukum minas-samā'i wal-arḍ(i), a'ilāhum ma‘allāh(i), qul hātū burhānakum in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Ammmany-yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo wa many-yarzuqukum minas sammaaa'i wal ard; 'a-ilaahum ma'allah; qul haatoo burhaanakum in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul lā ya‘lamu man fis-samāwāti wal-arḍil gaiba illallāh(u), wa mā yasy‘urūna ayyāna yub‘aṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul laa ya'lamu mman fis sammaawaati wal ardil ghaiba illal laah; wa maa yash'uroona aiyaana yub'asoon

ayah.transliteration: Balid dāraka ‘ilmuhum fil-ākhirah(ti), bal hum fī syakkim minhā, bal hum minhā ‘amūn(a).
ayah.translation: Balid daaraka 'ilmuhum fil Aakhirah; bal hum fee shakkim minhaa bal hum minhaa 'amoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū a'iżā kunnā turābaw wa ābā'unā a'innā lamukhrajūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafarooo 'a-izaa kunnaa turaabanw wa aabaaa'unaaa a'innaa lamukhrajoon

ayah.transliteration: Laqad wu‘idnā hāżā naḥnu wa ābā'unā min qabl(u), in hāżā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqad wu'idnaa haazaa nahnu wa aabaaa'unaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Qul sīrū fil-arḍi fanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mujremeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taḥzan ‘alaihim wa lā takun fī ḍaiqim mimmā yamkurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tahzan 'alaihim wa laa takun fee daiqim mimmaa yamkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-wa‘du in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul ‘asā ay yakūna radifa lakum ba‘ḍul-lażī tasta‘jilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul 'asaaa any-yakoona radifa lakum ba'dul lazee tasta'jiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka lażū faḍlin ‘alan-nāsi wa lākinna akṡarahum lā yasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innna Rabbaka lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi wa laakina aksarahum laa yashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna rabbaka laya‘lamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wa mā yu‘linūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa inna Rabbaka la ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum wa maa yu'linoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā min gā'ibatin fis-samā'i wal-arḍi illā fī kitābim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa min ghaaa'ibatin fis samaaa'i wal ardi illaa fee kitaabimm mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Inna hāżal-qur'āna yaquṣṣu ‘alā banī isrā'īla akṡaral-lażī hum fīhi yakhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna haazal Qur-aana yaqussu 'alaa Baneee israaa'eela aksaral lazee hum feehi yakhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū lahudaw wa raḥmatul lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innahoo lahudanw wa rahmatul lilmu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbaka yaqḍī bainahum biḥukmih(ī), wa huwal-‘azīzul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum bihukmih; wa Huwal 'Azeezul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Fatawakkal ‘alallāh(i), innaka ‘alal-ḥaqqil mubīn(i).
ayah.translation: Fatawakkal 'alal laahi innaka 'alal haqqil mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Innaka lā tusmi‘ul-mautā wa lā tusmi‘uṣ-ṣummad-du‘ā'a iżā wallau mudbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa wa laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa izaa wallaw mudbireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā anta bihādil-‘umyi ‘an ḍalālatihim, in tusmi‘u illā may yu'minu bi'āyātinā fahum muslimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa anta bihaadil 'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa mai yu'minu bi aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā waqa‘al-qaulu ‘alaihim akhrajnā lahum dābbatam minal-arḍi tukallimuhum annan-nāsa kānū bi'āyātinā lā yūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa waqa'al qawhu 'alaihim akhrajnaa lahum daabbatam minal ardi tukal limuhum annan naasa kaanoo bi aayaatinaa laa yooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma naḥsyuru min kulli ummatin faujam mimmay yukażżibu bi'āyātinā fahum yūza‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma nahshuru min kulli ummmatin fawjam mim many-yukazzibu bi Aayaatinaa fahum yooza'oon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā jā'ū qāla akażżabtum bi'āyātī wa lam tuḥīṭū bihā ‘ilman ammāżā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'oo qaala akazzabtum bi Aayaatee wa lam tuheetoo bihaa 'ilman ammaazaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa waqa‘al-qaulu ‘alaihim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa waqa'al qawlu 'alaihim bimaa zalamoo fahum laa yantiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Alam yarau annā ja‘alnal-laila liyaskunū fīhi wan-nahāra mubṣirā(n), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam yaraw annaa ja'alnal laila li yaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqaw miny-yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yunfakhu fiṣ-ṣūri fa fazi‘a man fis-samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi illā man syā'allāh(u), wa kullun atauhu dākhirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yunfakhu fis Soori fafazi'a man fis samaawaati wa man fil ardi illaa man shaaa'al laah; wa kullun atawhu daakhireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa taral-jibāla taḥsabuhā jāmidataw wa hiya tamurru marras saḥāb(i), ṣun‘allāhil-lażī atqana kulla syai'(in), innahū khabīrum bimā taf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa taral jibaala tahsabuhaa jaamidatanw wa hiya tamurru marras sahaab; sun'al laahil lazeee atqana kulla shai'; innahoo khabeerum bimaa taf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Man jā'a bil-ḥasanati falahū khairum minhā, wa hum min faza‘iy yauma'iżin āminūn(a).
ayah.translation: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo khairum minhaa wa hum min faza'iny Yawma'izin aaminoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa man jā'a bis-sayyi'ati fakubbat wujūhuhum fin-nār(i), hal tujzauna illā mā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man jaaa'a bissai yi'ati fakubbat wujoohuhum fin Naari hal tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā umirtu an a‘buda rabba hāżihil-baldatil-lażī ḥarramahā wa lahū kullu syai'iw wa umirtu an akūna minal-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaaa umirtu an a'buda Rabba haazihil baldatil lazee harramahaa wa lahoo kullu shai'inw wa umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa an atluwal-qur'ān(a), famanihtadā fa'innamā yahtadī linafsih(ī), wa man ḍalla faqul innamā ana minal-munżirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa an atluwal Qur-aana famanih tadaa fa innnamaa yahtadee linafsihee wa man dalla faqul innamaaa ana minal munzireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qulil-ḥamdu lillāhi sayurīkum āyātihī fata‘rifūnahā, wa mā rabbuka bigāfilin ‘ammā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qulil hamdu lillaahi sa yureekum Aayaatihee fata'ri foonahaa; wa maa Rabbuka bighaaflin 'ammaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Ṭā Sīm Mīm.
ayah.translation: Taa-Seeen-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Tilka āyātul-kitābil-mubīn(i).
ayah.translation: Tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Natlū ‘alaika min naba'i mūsā wa fir‘auna bil-ḥaqqi liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Natloo 'alaika min naba-i Moosaa wa Fi'awna bilhaqqi liqawminy yu'miinoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna fir‘auna ‘alā fil-arḍi wa ja‘ala ahlahā syiya‘ay yastaḍ‘ifu ṭā'ifatam minhum yużabbiḥu abnā'ahum wa yastaḥyī nisā'ahum, innahū kāna minal-mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna Fir'awna 'alaa fil ardi wa ja'ala ahlahaa shiya'ai yastad'ifu taaa'ifatam minhum yuzabbihu abnaaa'ahum wa yastahyee nisaaa'ahum; innahoo kaana minal mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa nurīdu an namunna ‘alal-lażīnastuḍ‘ifū fil-arḍi wa naj‘alahum a'immataw wa naj‘alahumul-wāriṡīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa nureedu an namunna 'alal lazeenas tud'ifoo fil ardi wa naj'alahum a'immatanw wa naj'alahumul waariseen

ayah.transliteration: Wa numakkina lahum fil-arḍi wa nuriya fir‘auna wa hāmāna wa junūdahumā minhum mā kānū yaḥżarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa numakkina lahum fil ardi wa nuriya Fir'awna wa Haamaana wa junoodahumaa minhum maa kaanoo yahzaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa auḥainā ilā mūsā an arḍi‘īh(i), fa'iżā khifti ‘alaihi fa'alqīhi fil yammi wa lā takhāfī wa lā taḥzanī, innā rāddūhu ilaiki wa jā‘ilūhu minal-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa awhainaaa ilaaa ummi Moosaaa an ardi'eehi faizaa khifti 'alaihi fa alqeehi filyammi wa laa takhaafee wa laa tahzaneee innaa raaaddoohu ilaiki wa jaa'iloohu minal mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: Faltaqaṭahū ālu fir‘auna liyakūna lahum ‘aduwwaw wa ḥazanā(n), inna fir‘auna wa hāmāna wa junūdahumā kānū khāṭi'īn(a).
ayah.translation: Faltaqatahooo Aalu Fir'awna li yakoona lahum 'aduwwanw wa hazanaa; inna Fir'awna wa Haamaana wa junooda humaa kaanoo khaati'een

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālatimra'atu fir‘auna qurratu ‘ainil lī wa lak(a), lā taqtulūh(u), ‘asā ay yanfa‘anā au nattakhiżahū waladaw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalatim ra atu Fir'awna qurratu 'aynil lee wa lak; laa taqtuloohu 'asaaa aiyanfa'anaa aw nattakhizahoo waladanw wa hum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa aṣbaḥa fu'ādu ummi mūsā fārigā(n), in kādat latubdī bihī lau lā ar rabaṭnā ‘alā qalbihā litakūna minal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa asbaha fu'aadu ummi Moosaa faarighan in kaadat latubdee bihee law laaa arrabatnaa 'alaa qalbihaa litakoona minal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālat li'ukhtihī quṣṣīh(i), fabaṣurat bihī ‘an junubiw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalat li ukhtihee qusseehi fabasurat bihee 'an junubinw wahum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḥarramnā ‘alaihil-marāḍi‘a min qablu faqālat hal adullukum ‘alā ahli baitiy yakfulūnahū lakum wa hum lahū nāṣiḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa harramnaa 'alaihil maraadi'a min qablu faqaalat hal adullukum 'alaaa ahli baitiny yakfuloonahoo lakum wa hum lahoo naasihoon

ayah.transliteration: Faradadnāhu ilā ummihī kai taqarra ‘ainuhā wa lā taḥzana wa lita‘lama anna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqquw wa lākinna akṡarahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Faradadnaahu ilaa ummihee kai taqarra 'ainuhaa wa laa tahzana wa lita'lama anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā balaga asyuddahū wastawā ātaināhu ḥukmaw wa ‘ilmā(n), wa każālika najzil-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa balagha ashuddahoo wastawaaa aatai naahu hukmanw wa 'ilmaa; wa kazaalika najzil muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa dakhalal-madīnata ‘alā ḥīni gaflatim min ahlihā fawajada fīhā rajulaini yaqtatilān(i), hāżā min syī‘atihī wa hāżā min ‘aduwwih(ī), fastagāṡahul-lażī min syī‘atihī ‘alal-lażī min ‘aduwwih(ī), fawakazahū mūsā faqaḍā ‘alaih(i), qāla hāżā min ‘amalisy-syaiṭān(i), innahū ‘aduwwum muḍillum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa dakhalal madeenata 'alaa heene ghaflatim min ahlihaa fawajada feeha raju laini yaqtatilaani haazaa min shee'atihee wa haaza min 'aduwwihee fastaghaasahul lazee min shee'atihee 'alal lazee min 'aduwwihee fawakazahoo Moosaa faqadaa 'alaihi qaala haaza min 'amalish Shaitaani innahoo 'aduwwum mmudillum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi innī ẓalamtu nafsī fagfir lī fagafara lah(ū), innahū huwal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafaralah; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi bimā an‘amta ‘alayya falan akūna ẓahīral lil-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa an'amta 'alaiya falan akoona zaheeral lilmujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa'aṣbaḥa fil-madīnati khā'ifay yataraqqabu fa'iżal-lażistanṣarahū bil-amsi yastaṣrikhuh(ū), qāla lahū mūsā innaka lagawiyyum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Fa asbaha fil madeenati khaaa'ifany yataraqqabu fa izal lazis tansarahoo bil amsi yastasrikhuh; qaala lahoo moosaaa innaka laghawiyyum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā an arāda ay yabṭisya bil-lażī huwa ‘aduwwul lahumā, qāla yā mūsā aturīdu an taqtulanī kamā qatalta nafsam bil-ams(i), in turīdu illā an takūna jabbāran fil-arḍi wa mā turīdu an takūna minal-muṣliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa an araada ai yabtisha billazee huwa 'aduwwul lahumaa qaala yaa Moosaaa atureedu an taqtulanee kamaa qatalta nafsam bil amsi in tureedu illaaa an takoona jabbaaram fil ardi wa maa tureedu an takoona minal musliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'a rajulum min aqṣal-madīnati yas‘ā, qāla yā mūsā innal-mala'a ya'tamirūna bika liyaqtulūka fakhruj innī laka minan-nāṣiḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'a rajulum min aqsal madeenati yas'aa qaala yaa Moosaaa innal mala a yaa tamiroona bika liyaqtulooka fakhruj innee laka minan naasiheen

ayah.transliteration: Fakharaja minhā khā'ifay yataraqqab(u), qāla rabbi najjinī minal-qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakharaja minhaa khaaa 'ifany-yataraqqab; qaala Rabbi najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā tawajjaha tilqā'a madyana qāla ‘asā rabbī ay yahdiyanī sawā'as-sabīl(i).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa tawajjaha tilqaaa'a Madyana qaala 'asaa Rabbeee ai yahdiyanee Sawaaa'as Sabeel

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā warada mā'a madyana wajada ‘alaihi ummatam minan-nāsi yasqūn(a), wa wajada min dūnihimumra'ataini tażūdān(i), qāla mā khaṭbukumā, qālatā lā nasqī ḥattā yuṣdirar-ri‘ā'u wa abūnā syaikhun kabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa warada maaa'a Madyana wajada 'alaihi ummatam minannaasi yasqoona wa wajada min doonihimum ra ataini tazoodaani qaala maa khatubkumaa qaalataa laa nasqee hataa yusdirar ri'aaa'u wa aboonaa shaikhun kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Fasaqā lahumā ṡumma tawallā ilaẓ-ẓilli faqāla rabbi innī limā anzalta ilayya min khairin faqīr(un).
ayah.translation: Fasaqaa lahumaa summa tawallaaa ilaz zilli faqaala Rabbi innee limaaa anzalta ilaiya min khairin faqeer

ayah.transliteration: Fajā'athu iḥdāhumā tamsyī ‘alastiḥyā'(in), qālat inna abī yad‘ūka liyajziyaka ajra mā saqaita lanā, falammā jā'ahū wa qaṣṣa ‘alaihil-qaṣaṣ(a), qāla lā takhaf, najauta minal-qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fajaaa'at hu ihdaahumaa tamshee 'alas tihyaaa'in qaalat inna abee yad'ooka li yajziyaka ajra maa saqaita lanaa; falammaa jaaa'ahoo wa qassa 'alaihil qasasa qaala laa takhaf najawta minal qawmiz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālat iḥdāhumā yā abatista'jirh(u), inna khaira manista'jartal-qawiyyul-amīn(u).
ayah.translation: Qaalat ihdaahumaa yaaa abatis taajirhu inna khaira manistaajartal qawiyyul ameen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innī urīdu an unkiḥaka iḥdabnatayya hātaini ‘alā an ta'juranī ṡamāniya ḥijaj(in), fa'in atmamta ‘asyran famin ‘indik(a), wa mā urīdu an asyuqqa ‘alaik(a), satajidunī in syā'allāhu minaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala innee ureedu an unkihaka ihdab nataiya haataini 'alaaa an taajuranee samaaniya hijaj; fa in atmamta 'ashran famin 'indika wa maaa ureedu an ashuqqa 'alaik; satajiduneee in shaaa'al laahu minas saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla żālika bainī wa bainak(a), ayyamal-ajalaini qaḍaitu falā ‘udwāna ‘alayy(a), wallāhu ‘alā mā naqūlu wakīl(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala zaalika bainee wa bainaka aiyamal ajalaini qadaitu falaa 'udwaana 'alaiya wallaahu 'alaa ma naqoolu Wakeel

ayah.transliteration: Falammā qaḍā mūsal-ajala wa sāra bi'ahlihī ānasa min jānibiṭ-ṭūri nārā(n), qāla li'ahlihimkuṡū innī ānastu nāral la‘allī ātīkum minhā bikhabarin au jażwatim minan-nāri la‘allakum taṣṭalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammmaa qadaa Moosal ajala wa saara bi ahliheee aanasa min jaanibit Toori naaran qaala li ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la 'alleee aateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw jazwatim minan naari la 'allakum tastaloon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā atāhā nūdiya min syāṭi'il wādil aimani fil buq‘atil mubārakati minasy syajarati ay yā mūsā innī anallāhu rabbul-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya min shaati'il waadil aimani fil buq'atil muubaarakati minash shajarati ai yaa Moosaaa inneee Anal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa alqi ‘aṣāk(a), falammā ra'āhā tahtazzu ka'annahā jānnuw wallā mudbiraw wa lam yu‘aqqib, yā mūsā aqbil wa lā takhaf, innaka minal-āminīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa an alqi 'asaaka falam maa ra aahaa tahtazzu ka annnahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw wa lam yu'aqqib; yaa Moosaa aqbil wa laa takhaf innaka minal aamineen

ayah.transliteration: Usluk yadaka fī jaibika takhruj baiḍā'a min gairi sū'(in), waḍmum ilaika janāḥaka minar-rahbi fażānika burhānāni mir rabbika ilā fir‘auna wa mala'ih(ī), innahum kānū qauman fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Usluk yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'inw wadmum ilaika janaahaka minar rahbi fazaanika burhaanaani mir Rabbika ilaa Fiw'awna wa mala'ih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi innī qataltu minhum nafsan fa'akhāfu ay yaqtulūn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan fa akhaafu ai yaqtuloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa akhī hārūnu huwa afṣaḥu minnī lisānan fa'arsilhu ma‘iya rid'ay yuṣaddiqunī, innī akhāfu ay yukażżibūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa akhee Haaroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisaanan fa arsilhu ma'iya rid ai yusaddiquneee innee akhaafu ai yukazziboon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla sanasyuddu ‘aḍudaka bi'akhīka wa naj‘alu lakumā sulṭānan falā yaṣilūna ilaikumā - bi'āyātinā - antumā wa manittaba‘akumal-gālibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala sanashuddu 'adudaka bi akheeka wa naj'alu lakumaa sultaanan falaa yasiloona ilaikumaa; bi Aayaatinaa antumaa wa manit taba'akumal ghaaliboon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'ahum mūsā bi'āyātinā bayyinātin qālū mā hāżā illā siḥrum muftarā(n), wa mā sami‘nā bihāżā fī ābā'inal-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'ahum Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaaa illaa sihrum muftaranw wa maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla mūsā rabbī a‘lamu biman jā'a bil-hudā min ‘indihī wa man takūnu lahū ‘āqibatud-dār(i), innahū lā yufliḥuẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Moosaa Rabbeee a'alamu biman jaaa'a bilhudaa min 'indihee wa man takoonu lahoo 'aaqibatud daari innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla fir‘aunu yā ayyuhal-mala'u mā ‘alimtu lakum min ilāhin gairī, fa'auqid lī yā hāmānu ‘alaṭ-ṭīni faj‘al lī ṣarḥal la‘allī aṭṭali‘u ilā ilāhi mūsā, wa innī la'aẓunnuhū minal-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Fir'awnu yaaa aiyuhal mala-u maa 'alimtu lakum min ilaahin ghairee fa awqid lee yaa Haamaanu 'alatteeni faj'al lee sarhal la'alleee attali'u ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa wa innee la azunnuhoo minal kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Wastakbara huwa wa judūduhū fil-arḍi bigairil-ḥaqqi wa ẓannū annahum ilainā lā yurja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wastakbara huwa wa junooduhoo fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa zannooo annahum ilainaa laa yurja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'akhażnāhu wa junūdahū fanabażnāhum fil-yamm(i), fanẓur kaifa kāna ‘āqibatuẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa akhaznaahu wa junoo dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatuz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnāhum a'immatay yad‘ūna ilan-nār(i), wa yaumal-qiyāmati lā yunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaahum a'immatany yad'oona ilan Naari wa Yawmal Qiyaamati laa yunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa atba‘nāhum fī hāżihid-dun-yā la‘nah(tan), wa yaumal-qiyāmati hum minal-maqbūḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa atba'naahum fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw wa Yawmal Qiyaamati hum minal maqbooheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba mim ba‘di mā ahlaknal-qurūnal ūlā baṣā'ira lin-nāsi wa hudaw wa raḥmatal la‘allahum yatażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba mim ba'di maaa ahlaknal quroonal oolaa basaaa'ira linnaasi wa hudanw wa rahmatal la'allahum yata zakkkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kunta bijānibil-garbiyyi iż qaḍainā ilā mūsal-amra wa mā kunta minasy-syāhidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kunta bijaanibil gharbiyyi iz qadainaaa ilaa Moosal amra wa maa kunta minash shaahideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lākinnā ansya'nā qurūnan fataṭāwala ‘alaihimul-‘umur(u), wa mā kunta ṡāwiyan fī ahli madyana tatlū ‘alaihim āyātinā, wa lākinnā kunnā mursilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laakinnaa anshaanaa quroonan fatataawala 'alaihimul 'umur; wa maa kunta saawiyan feee ahli Madyana tatloo 'alaihim Aayaatinaa wa laakinnaa kunnaa mursileen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kunta bijānibiṭ-ṭūri iż nādainā wa lākir raḥmatam mir rabbika litunżira qaumam mā atāhum min nażīrim min qablika la‘allahum yatażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kunta bijaanibit Toori iz naadainaa wa laakir rahmatam mir Rabbika litunzira qawmam maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yatazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā an tuṣībahum muṣībatum bimā qaddamat aidīhim fayaqūlū rabbanā lau lā arsalta ilainā rasūlan fanattabi‘a āyātika wa nakūna minal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law laaa an tuseebahum museebatum bimaa qaddamat aideehim fa yaqooloo Rabbanaa law laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika wa nakoona minal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'ahumul-ḥaqqu min ‘indinā qālū lau lā ūtiya miṡla mā ūtiya mūsā, awalam yakfurū bimā ūtiya mūsā min qabl(u), qālū siḥrāni taẓāharā, wa qālū innā bikullin kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaaloo law laa ootiya misla maaa ootiyaa Moosaa; awalam yakfuroo bimaaa ootiya Moosaa min qablu qaaloo sihraani tazaaharaa wa qaalooo innaa bikullin kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul fa'tū bikitābim min ‘indillāhi huwa ahdā minhumā attabi‘hu in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul faatoo bi Kitaabim min 'indil laahi huwa ahdaa minhu maaa attabi'hu in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa illam yastajībū laka fa‘lam annamā yattabi‘ūna ahwā'ahum, wa man aḍallu mimmanittaba‘a hawāhu bigairi hudam minallāh(i), innallāha lā yahdil-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa il lam yastajeeboo laka fa'lam annamaa yattabi'oona ahwaaa'ahum; w aman adallu mimmanit taba'a hawaahu bighari hudam minal laah; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad waṣṣalnā lahumul-qaula la‘allahum yatażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad wassalnaa lahumul qawla la'allahum yatazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna ātaināhumul-kitāba min qablihī hum bihī yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena aatainaahu mul Kitaaba min qablihee hum bihee yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā yutlā ‘alaihim qālū āmannā bihī innahul-ḥaqqu mir rabbinā innā kunnā min qablihī muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa yutlaa 'alaihim qaaloo aamannaa biheee innahul haqqu mir rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa min qablihee muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika yu'tauna ajrahum marrataini bimā ṣabarū wa yadra'ūna bil-ḥasanatis-sayyi'ata wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimaa sabaroo wa yadra'oona bil hasanatis saiyi'ata wa mimmmaa razaq naahum yunfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā sami‘ul-lagwa a‘raḍū ‘anhu wa qālū lanā a‘mālunā wa lakum a‘mālukum, salāmun ‘alaikum, lā nabtagil-jāhilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa sami'ul laghwa a'radoo 'anhu wa qaaloo lanaaa a'maalunaa wa lakum a'maalukum salaamun 'alaikum laa nabtaghil jaahileen

ayah.transliteration: Innaka lā tahdī man aḥbabta wa lākinnallāha yahdī may yasyā'(u), wa huwa a‘lamu bil-muhtadīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaka laa tahdee man ahbata wa laakinna laaha yahdee mai yashaaa'; wa Huwaa'lamu bilmuhtadeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū in natabi‘il-hudā ma‘aka nutakhaṭṭaf min arḍinā, awalam numakkil lahum ḥaraman āminay yujbā ilaihi ṡamarātu kulli syai'ir rizqam mil ladunnā wa lākinna akṡarahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalooo in nattabi'il hudaa ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardinaa; awalam numakkkil lahum haraman aaminany yujbaaa ilaihi samaraatu kulli shai'ir rizqam mil ladunnaa wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa kam ahlaknā min qaryatim baṭirat ma‘īsyatahā, fatilka masākinuhum lam tuskam mim ba‘dihim illā qalīlā(n), wa kunnā naḥnul-wāriṡīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kam ahlaknaa min qaryatim batirat ma'eeshatahaa fatilka masaainuhum lam tuskam mim ba'dihim illaa qaleelaa; wa kunnaa Nahnul waariseen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna rabbuka muhlikal-qurā ḥattā yab‘aṡa fī ummihā rasūlay yatlū ‘alaihim āyātinā, wa mā kunnā muhlikil-qurā illā wa ahluhā ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana Rabbuka muhlikal quraa hattaa yab'asa feee ummihaa Rasoolany yatloo 'alaihim aayaatina; wa maa kunnaa muhlikil quraaa illaa wa ahluhaa zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ūtītum min syai'in famatā‘ul-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa zīnatuhā, wa mā ‘indallāhi khairuw wa abqā, afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa wa zeenatuhaa; wa maa 'indal laahi khairunw wa abqaa; afalaa ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Afamaw wa‘adnāhu wa‘dan ḥasanan fahuwa lāqīhi kamam matta‘nāhu matā‘al-ḥayātid-dun-yā ṡumma huwa yaumal-qiyāmati minal-muḥḍarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Afamanw wa'adnaahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laaqeehi kamam matta'naahu mataa'al hayaatid dunyaa summa huwa Yawmal Qiyaamati minal muhdareen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yunādīhim fayaqūlu aina syurakā'iyal-lażīna kuntum taz‘umūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa 'iyal lazeena kuntum taz'umoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna ḥaqqa ‘alaihimul-qaulu rabbanā hā'ulā'il-lażīna agwainā, agwaināhum kamā gawainā, tabarra'nā ilaika mā kānū iyyānā ya‘budūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa'il lazeena aghwainaa aghwainaahu kamaa ghawainaa tabarraanaaa ilaika maa kaanoo iyyaanaa ya'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qīlad‘ū syurakā'akum fada‘auhum falam yastajībū lahum wa ra'awul-‘ażāb(a), lau annahum kānū yahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qeelad 'oo shurakaaa'akum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum wa ra awul 'azaab; law annahum kaanoo yahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yunādīhim fayaqūlu māżā ajabtumul-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa yaqoolu maazaaa ajabtumul mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: Fa ‘amiyat ‘alaihimul-ambā'u yauma'iżin fahum lā yatasā'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa'amiyat 'alaihimul ambaaa'u Yawma'izin fahum laa yatasaaa'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammā man tāba wa āmana wa ‘amila ṣāliḥan fa‘asā ay yakūna minal-mufliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa ammaa man taaba wa aamana wa 'amila saalihan fa'asaaa ai yakoona minal mufliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa rabbuka yakhluqu mā yasyā'u wa yakhtār(u), mā kāna lahumul-khiyarah(tu), subḥānallāhi wa ta‘ālā ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Rabbuka yakhuluqu maa yashaaa'u wa yakhtaar; maa kaana lahumul khiyarah; Subhannal laahi wa Ta'aalaa 'ammmaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa rabbuka ya‘lamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wa mā yu‘linūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Rabbuka ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum wa maa yu'linoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwallāhu lā ilāha illā huw(a), lahul-ḥamdu fil-ūlā wal-ākhirah(ti), wa lahul-ḥukmu wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa lahul hamdu fil oolaa wal Aakhirati wa lahul hukmu wa ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum in ja‘alallāhu ‘alaikumul-laila sarmadan ilā yaumil-qiyāmati man ilāhun gairullāhi ya'tīkum biḍiyā'(in), afalā tasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumul laila sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaa teekum bidiyaaa'in afalaa tasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum in ja‘alallāhu ‘alaikumun-nahāra  sarmadan ilā yaumil-qiyāmati man ilāhun gairullāhi ya'tīkum bilailin taskunūna fīh(i),  afalā tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumun nahaara sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaateekum bilailin taskunoona feehi afalaa tubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mir raḥmatihī ja‘ala lakumul-laila wan-nahāra litaskunū fīhi wa litabtagū min faḍlihī wa la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa mir rahmatihee ja'ala lakumul laila wannahaara litaskunoo feehi wa litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yunādīhim fayaqūlu aina syurakā'iyal-lażīna kuntum taz‘umūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tazz'umoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa naza‘nā min kulli ummatin syahīdan faqulnā hātū burhānakum fa‘alimū annal-ḥaqqa lillāhi wa ḍalla ‘anhum mā kānū yaftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa naza'naa min kulli ummatin shaheedan faqulnaa haatoo burhaanakum fa'alimooo annal haqqa lillaahi wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

ayah.transliteration: Inna qārūna kāna min qaumi mūsā fabagā ‘alaihim, wa ātaināhu minal-kunūzi  mā inna mafātiḥahū latanū'u bil-‘uṣbati ulil-quwwah(ti), iż qāla lahū qaumuhū lā tafraḥ, innallāha lā yuḥibbul-fariḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna Qaaroona kaana min qawmi Moosaa fabaghaaa 'alaihim wa aatainaahu minal kunoozi maaa inna mafaati hahoo latanooo'u bil'usbati ulil quwwati iz qaala lahoo qawmuhoo laa tafrah innal laahaa laa yuhibbul fariheen

ayah.transliteration: Wabtagi fīmā ātākallāhud-dāral-ākhirata wa lā tansa naṣībaka minad-dun-yā wa aḥsin kama aḥsanallāhu ilaika wa lā tabgil-fasāda fil-arḍ(i), innallāha lā yuḥibbul-mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wabtaghi feemaaa aataakal laahud Daaral Aakhirata wa laa tansa naseebaka minad dunyaa wa ahsin kamaaa ahsanal laahu ilaika wa laa tabghil fasaada fil ardi innal laaha laa yuhibbul mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla innamā ūtītuhū ‘alā ‘ilmin ‘indī, awalam ya‘lam annallāha qad ahlaka min qablihī minal-qurūni man huwa asyaddu minhu quwwataw wa akṡaru jam‘ā(n), wa lā yus'alu ‘an żunūbihimul-mujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala innamaaa ootee tuhoo 'alaa 'ilmin 'indeee; awalam ya'lam annal laaha qad ahlaka min qablihee minal qurooni man huwa ashaddu minhu quwwatanw wa aksaru jam'aa; wa laa yus'alu 'an zunoobihimul mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa kharaja ‘alā qaumihī fī zīnatih(ī), qālal-lażīna yurīdūnal-ḥayātad-dun-yā yā laita lanā miṡla mā ūtiya qārūn(u), innahū lażū ḥaẓẓin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee fee zeenatih; qaalal lazeena yureedoonal hayaatad dunyaa yaalaita lanaa misla maaa ootiya Qaaroonu innahoo lazoo hazzin 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna ūtul-‘ilma wailakum ṡawābullāhi khairul liman āmana wa ‘amila ṣāliḥā(n), wa lā yulaqqāhā illaṣ-ṣābirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wailakum sawaabul laahi khairul liman aamana wa 'amila saalihaa; wa laa yulaq qaahaaa illas saabiroon

ayah.transliteration: Fakhasafnā bihī wa bidārihil-arḍ(a), famā kāna lahū min fi'atiy yanṣurūnahū min dūnillāh(i), wa mā kāna minal-muntaṣirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakhasafnaa bihee wa bidaarihil arda famaa kaana laho min fi'atiny yansuroo nahoo min doonil laahi wa maa kaana minal muntasireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa aṣbaḥal-lażīna tamannau makānahū bil-amsi yaqūlūna waika'annallāha yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u min ‘ibādihī wa yaqdir(u), lau lā am mannallāhu ‘alainā lakhasafa binā, waika'annahū lā yufliḥul-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa asbahal lazeena tamannaw makaanahoo bil amsi yaqooloona waika annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limany ya shaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa yaqdiru law laaa am mannal laahu 'alainaa lakhasafa binaa waika annahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Tilkad-dārul-ākhiratu naj‘aluhā lil-lażīna lā yurīdūna ‘uluwwan fil-arḍi wa lā fasādā(n), wal-‘āqibatu lil-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Tilkad Daarul Aakhiratu naj'aluhaa lillazeena laa yureedoona 'uluwwan fil ardi wa laa fasaadaa; wal 'aaqibatu lilmuttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Man jā'a bil-ḥasanati falahū khairum minhā, wa man jā'a bis-sayyi'ati falā yujzal-lażīna ‘amilus-sayyi'āti illā mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo khairum minhaa wa man jaaa'a bissaiyi'ati falaa yujzal lazeena 'amilus saiyiaati illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażī faraḍa ‘alaikal-qur'āna larādduka ilā ma‘ād(in), qur rabbī a‘lamu man jā'a bil-hudā wa man huwa fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Innal azee farada 'alaikal Qur-aana laraaadduka ilaa ma'aad; qur Rabbeee a'lamu man jjaaa'a bil hudaa wa man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kunta tarjū ay yulqā ilaikal-kitābu illā raḥmatam mir rabbika falā takūnanna ẓahīral lil-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kunta tarjooo ai yulqaaa ilaikal Kitaabu illaa rahmatam mir Rabbika falaa takoonanna zaheeral lilkaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yaṣuddunnaka ‘an āyātillāhi ba‘da iż unzilat ilaika wad‘u ilā rabbika wa lā takūnanna minal-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yasuddunnaka 'an Aayaatil laahi ba'da iz unzilat ilaika wad'u ilaa Rabbika wa laa takonanna minal mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tad‘u ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhar(a), lā ilāha illā huw(a), kullu syai'in hālikun illā wajhah(ū), lahul-ḥukmu wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; kullu shai'in haalikun illaa Wajhah; lahul hukkmu wa ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām mīm.
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Aḥasiban-nāsu ay yutrakū ay yaqūlū āmannā wa hum lā yuftanūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ahasiban naasu anyu yutrakooo any yaqoolooo aamannaa wa hum la yuftanoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad fatannal-lażīna min qablihim falaya‘lamannallāhul-lażīna ṣadaqū wa laya‘lamannal-kāżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad fatannal lazeena min qablihim fala ya'lamannal laahul lazeena sadaqoo wa la ya'lamannal kaazibeen

ayah.transliteration: Am ḥasibal-lażīna ya‘malūnas-sayyi'āti ay yasbiqūnā, sā'a mā yaḥkumūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am hasibal lazeena ya'maloonas sayyiaati any yasbiqoonaa; saaa'a maa yahkumoon

ayah.transliteration: Man kāna yarjū liqā'allāhi fa'inna ajalallāhi la'āt(in), wa huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Man kaana yarjoo liqaaa 'allaahi fa inna ajalal laahi laaat; wa Huwass Sameeul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa man jāhada fa'innamā yujāhidu linafsih(ī), innallāha laganiyyun ‘anil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man jaahada fainnamaa yujaahidu linafsih; innal laaha laghaniyyun 'anil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lanukaffiranna ‘anhum sayyi'ātihim wa lanajziyannahum aḥsanal-lażī kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lanukaf firanna 'anhum saiyiaatihim wa lanajziyannahum ahsanal lazee kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa waṣṣainal-insāna biwālidaihi ḥusnā(n), wa in jāhadāka litusyrika bī mā laisa laka bihī ‘ilmun falā tuṭi‘humā, ilayya marji‘ukum fa'unabbi'ukum bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi husnanw wa in jaahadaaka litushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun falaa tuti'humaa; ilaiya marji'ukum fa unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lanudkhilannahum fiṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aamanoo w a'amilus saalihaati lanudkhilan nahum fis saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa minan-nāsi may yaqūlu āmannā billāhi fa'iżā ūżiya  fillāhi ja‘ala fitnatan-nāsi ka‘ażābillāh(i), wa la'in jā'a naṣrum mir rabbika layaqūlunna innā kunnā ma‘akum, awa laisallāhu bi'a‘lama bimā fī ṣudūril-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa minan naasi many yaqoolu aamannaa billaahi faizaaa ooziya fil laahi ja'ala fitnatan naasi ka'azaabil laahi wa la'in jaaa'a nasrum mir Rabbika la yaqoolunna innaa kunnaa ma'akum; awa laisal laahu bi a'lama bimaa fee surdooril 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laya‘lamannallāhul-lażīna āmanū wa laya‘lamannal-munāfiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la ya'lamannal laahul lazeena aamanoo wa la ya'lamannal munaafiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū lil-lażīna āmanuttabi‘ū sabīlanā walnaḥmil khaṭāyākum, wa mā hum biḥāmilīna min khaṭāyāhum min syai'(in), innahum lakāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazaeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanut tabi'oo sabeelanaa walnahmil khataayaakum wa maa hum bihaamileena min khataa yaahum min shai'in innahum lakaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa layaḥmilunna aṡqālahum wa aṡqālam ma‘a aṡqālihim wa layus'alunna yaumal-qiyāmati ‘ammā kānū yaftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la yahmilunna asqaa lahum wa asqaalam ma'a asqaalihim wa la yus'alunna Yawmal Qiyaamati 'ammaa kaanoo yaftaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qaumihī falabiṡa fīhim alfa sanatin illā khamsīna ‘āmā(n), fa'akhażahumuṭ-ṭūfānu wa hum ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee falabisa feehim alfa sanatin illaa khamseena 'aaman fa akhazahumut toofaanu wa hum zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'anjaināhu wa aṣḥābas-safīnati wa ja‘alnāhā āyatal lil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa anjainaahu wa as haabas safeenati wa ja'alnaahaaa Aayatal lil'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ibrāhīma iż qāla liqaumihi‘budullāha wattaqūh(u), żālikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Ibraheema iz qaala liqawmihi' budul laaha wattaqoohu zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā ta‘budūna min dūnillāhi auṡānaw wa takhluqūna ifkā(n), innal-lażīna ta‘budūna min dūnillāhi lā yamlikūna lakum rizqan fabtagū ‘indallāhir-rizqa wa‘budūhu wasykurū lah(ū), ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaa ta'ubdoona min doonil laahi awsaananw-wa takhluqoona ifkaa; innal lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona lakum rizqan fabtaghoo 'indal laahir rizqa fabtaghoo 'indal laahir rizqa wa'budoohu washkuroo lahooo ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in tukażżibū faqad każżaba umamum min qablikum, wa mā ‘alar-rasūli illal-balāgul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa in tukazziboo faqad kazzaba umamum min qablikum wa maa'alar Rasooli illal balaaghul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau kaifa yubdi'ullāhul-khalqa ṡumma yu‘īduh(ū), inna żālika ‘alallāhi yasīr(un).
ayah.translation: Awa lam yaraw kaifa yubdi'ul laahul khalqa summa yu'eeduh; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

ayah.transliteration: Qul sīrū fil-arḍi fanẓurū kaifa bada'al-khalqa ṡummallāhu yunsyi'un-nasy'atal-ākhirah(ta), innallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa baa al khalqa summal laahu yunshi''un nash atal Aakhirah; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Yu‘ażżibu may yasyā'u wa yarḥamu may yasyā'(u), wa ilaihi tuqlabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yu'azzibu many yashaaa'u wa yarhamu many yashaaa'; wa ilaihi tuqlaboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā antum bimu‘jizīna fil-arḍi wa lā fis-samā'(i), wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi miw waliyyiw wa lā naṣīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi wa laa fissamaaa'i wa maa lakum min doonil laahi minw waliyyinw wa laa naseer

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna kafarū bi'āyātillāhi wa liqā'ihī ulā'ika ya'isū mir raḥmatī wa ulā'ika lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kafaroo bi Aayaatil laahi wa liqaaa'iheee ulaaa'ika ya'isoo mir rahmatee wa ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Famā kāna jawāba qaumihī illā an qaluqtulūhu au ḥarriqūhu fa anjāhullāhu minan-nār(i), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaaluqtuloohu aw harriqoohu faanjaahul laahu minan naar; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil laqawminy yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla innamattakhażtum min dūnillāhi auṡānam mawaddata bainikum fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, ṡumma yaumal-qiyāmati yakfuru ba‘ḍukum biba‘ḍiw wa yal‘anu ba‘ḍukum ba‘ḍā(n), wa ma'wākumun nāru wa mā lakum min nāṣirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala innamat takhaz tum min doonil laahi awsaanam mawaddata bainikum fil hayaatid dunyaa summa yawmal qiyaamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba 'dinw wa yal'anu ba'dukum ba'danw-wa yal'anu ba'dukum ba'danw wa maa waakumun Naaru wa maa lakum min naasireen

ayah.transliteration: Fa āmana lahū lūṭ(un), wa qāla innī muhājirun ilā rabbī, innahū huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Fa aamana lahoo Loot; wa qaala innee mauhajirun ilaa Rabbee innahoo Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa wahabnā lahū isḥāqa wa ya‘qūba wa ja‘alnā fī żurriyyatihin nubuwwata wal-kitāba wa ātaināhu ajrahū fid-dun-yā, wa innahū fil-ākhirati laminaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa wahabnaa lahoo Ishaaqa wa Ya'Qooba wa ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihin Nubuwwata wal Kitaaba wa aatainaahu ajrahoo fid dunyaa wa innahoo fil aakhirati laminas saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lūṭan iż qāla liqaumihī innakum lata'tūnal-fāḥisyata mā sabaqakum bihā min aḥadim minal-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee innakum laatoonal faahishata maa sabaqakum bihaa min ahadim minal 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: A'innakum lata'tūnar-rijāla wa taqṭa‘ūnas-sabīl(a), wa ta'tūna fī nādīkumul-munkar(a), famā kāna jawāba qaumihī illā an qālu'tinā bi‘ażābillāhi in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: A'innakum lataatoonar rijaala wa taqta'oonas sabeela wa taatoona fee naadekumul munkara famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalu' tinaaa bi'azaabil laahi in kunta minas saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbinṣurnī ‘alal-qaumil-mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbin surnee 'alal qawmil mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā jā'at rusulunā ibrāhīma bil-busyrā, qālū innā muhlikū ahli hāżihil-qaryah(ti), inna ahlahā kānū ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bil bushraa qaalooo innaa muhlikoo ahli haazihil qaryati inna ahlahaa kaanoo zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla inna fīhā lūṭā(n), qālū naḥnu a‘lamu biman fīhā, lanunajjiyannahū wa ahlahū illamra'atahū kānat minal-gābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala inna feeha Lootaa; qaaloo nahnu a'lamu biman feehaa lanunajjjiyannahoo wa ahlahooo illam ra atahoo kaanat minal ghaabireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā an jā'at rusulunā lūṭan sī'a bihim wa ḍāqa bihim żar‘aw wa qālū lā takhaf wa lā taḥzan, innā munajjūka wa ahlaka illamra'ataka kānat minal-gābirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaaa an jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim wa daaqa bihim zar'anw wa qaaloo laa takhaf wa laa tahzan innaa munajjooka wa ahlaka illam ra ataka kaanat minal ghaabireen

ayah.transliteration: Innā munzilūna ‘alā ahli hāżihil-qaryati rijzam minas-samā'i bimā kānū yafsuqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa munziloona 'alaaa ahli haazihil qaryati rijzam minas samaaa'i bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad taraknā minhā āyatam bayyinatal liqaumiy ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqat taraknaa min haaa aayatam baiyinatal liqawminy ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ilā madyana akhāhum syu‘aibā(n), faqāla yā qaumi‘budullāha warjul-yaumal-ākhira wa lā ta‘ṡau fil-arḍi mufsidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'ayban faqaala yaa qawmi'-budul laaha warjul yawmal aakhira wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

ayah.transliteration: Fa każżabūhu fa'akhażathumur-rajfatu fa'aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāṡimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakazzaboohu fa akhazat humur rajfatu fa asbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘ādaw wa ṡamūda wa qat tabayyana lakum mim masākinihim, wa zayyana lahumusy-syaiṭānu a‘mālahum faṣaddahum ‘anis-sabīli wa kānū mustabṣirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa 'Aadanw wa Samooda wa qat tabaiyana lakum mim masaakinihim wa zaiyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum 'anis sabeeli wa kaanoo mustabsireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qārūna wa fir‘auna wa hāmān(a), wa laqad jā'ahum mūsā bil-bayyināti fastakbarū fil-arḍi wa mā kānū sābiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Qaaroona wa Fir'awna wa haamaana wa laqad jaaa'ahum Moosa bilbaiyinaati fastakbaroo fil ardi wa maa kaanoo saabiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fakullan akhażnā biżambih(ī), faminhum man arsalnā ‘alaihi ḥāṣibā(n), wa minhum man akhażathuṣ-ṣaiḥah(tu), wa minhum man khasafnā bihil-arḍ(a), wa minhum man agraqnā, wa mā kānallāhu liyaẓlimahum wa lākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakullan akhaznaa bizam bihee faminhum man arsalnaa 'alaihi haasibaa; wa minhum man akhazat hus saihatu wa minhum man khasafnaa bihil arda wa minhum man aghraqnaa; wa maa kaanal laahu li yazlimahum wa laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon

ayah.transliteration: Maṡalul-lażīnattakhażū min dūnillāhi auliyā'a kamaṡalil-‘ankabūt(i), ittakhażat baitā(n), wa inna auhanal-buyūti labaitul-‘ankabūt(i), lau kānū ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Masalul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa'a kamasalil 'ankaboot, ittakhazat baitaa; wa inna awhanal buyooti la baitul 'ankaboot; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha ya‘lamu mā yad‘ūna min dūnihī min syai'(in), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha ya'lamu maa yad'oona min doonihee min shai'; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa tilkal-amṡālu naḍribuhā lin-nās(i), wa mā ya‘qiluhā illal-‘ālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi wa maa ya'qiluhaaa illal 'aalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Khalaqallāhus-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqq(i), inna fī żālika la'āyatal lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; inna fee zaalika la aayatal lilmu mineen

ayah.transliteration: Utlu mā ūḥiya ilaika minal-kitābi wa aqimiṣ-ṣalāh(ta), innaṣ-ṣalāta tanhā ‘anil-faḥsyā'i wal-munkar(i), wa lażikrullāhi akbar(u), wallāhu ya‘lamu mā taṣna‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Utlu maaa oohiya ilaika mional Kitaabi wa aqimis Salaata innas Salaata tanhaa 'anil fahshaaa'i wal munkar; wa lazikrul laahi akbar; wal laahu ya'lamu maa tasna'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tujādilū ahlal-kitābi illā bil-latī hiya aḥsan(u), illal-lażīna ẓalamū minhum wa qūlū āmannā bil-lażī unzila ilainā wa unzila ilaikum wa ilāhunā wa ilāhukum wāḥiduw wa naḥnu lahū muslimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tujaadilooo Ahlal Kitaabi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu illal lazeena zalamoo minhum wa qoolooo aamannaa billazeee unzila ilainaa wa unzila ilaikum wa illaahunna wa illahukum waahidunw-wa nahnu lahoo muslimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika anzalnā ilaikal-kitāb(a), fal-lażīna ātaināhumul-kitāba yu'minūna bih(ī), wa min hā'ulā'i may yu'minu bih(ī), wa mā yajḥadu bi'āyātinā illal-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaab; fallazeena aatainaahumul kitaaba yu'minoona bihee wa min haaa'ulaaa'i many yu'minu bih; wa maa yajhadu bi'Aayaatinaa illal kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kunta tatlū min qablihī min kitābiw wa lā takhuṭṭuhū biyamīnika iżal lartābal-mubṭilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kunta tatloo min qablihee min kitaabinw wa laa takhuttubhoo bi yameenika izal lartaabal mubtiloon

ayah.transliteration: Bal huwa āyātum bayyinātun fī ṣudūril-lażīna ūtul-‘ilm(a), wa mā yajḥadu bi'āyātinā illaẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal huwa aayaatum baiyinaatun fee sudooril lazeena ootul 'ilm; wa maa yajhadu bi aayaatinaa illaz zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū lau lā unzila ‘alaihi āyātum mir rabbih(ī), qul innamal-āyātu ‘indallāh(i), wa innamā ana nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo law laaa unzila 'alaihi aayaatum mir Rabbihee qul innamal aayaatu 'indal laahi wa innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yakfihim annā anzalnā ‘alaikal-kitāba yutlā ‘alaihim, inna fī żālika laraḥmataw wa żikrā liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awa lam yakfihim annaaa anzalnaa 'alaikal kitaaba yutlaa 'alaikhim; inna fee zaalika larahmatanw wa zikraa liqawminy yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul kafā billāhi bainī wa bainakum syahīdā(n), ya‘lamu mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wal-lażīna āmanū bil-bāṭili wa kafarū billāhi ulā'ika humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul kafaa billaahi bainee wa bainakum shaheedaa; ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal ard; wallazeena aamanoo bil baatili wa kafaroo billaahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yasta‘jilūnaka bil-‘ażāb(i), wa lau lā ajalum musammal lajā'ahumul-‘ażāb(u), wa laya'tiyannahum bagtataw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; wa law laaa ajalum musammal lajaaa'ahumul 'zaab; wa la yaatiyannahum baghta tanw wa hum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Yasta‘jilūnaka bil-‘ażāb(i), wa inna jahannama lamuḥīṭatum bil-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yasta'jiloonak bil'azaab; wa inna Jahannama lamuhee tatum bilkaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yagsyāhumul-‘ażābu min fauqihim wa min taḥti arjulihim wa yaqūlu żūqū mā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma yaghshaahumul 'azaabu min fawqihim wa min tahti arjulim wa yaqoolu zooqoo maa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ‘ibādiyal-lażīna āmanū inna arḍī wāsi‘atun fa iyyāya fa‘budūn(i).
ayah.translation: Yaa 'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanooo inna ardee waasi 'atun fa iyyaaya fa'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Kullu nafsin żā'iqatul-maut(i), ṡumma ilainā turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawti summa ilainaa turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lanubawwi'annahum minal-jannati gurafan tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā, ni‘ma ajrul-‘āmilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati la nubawwi 'annahum minal Jannati ghurafan tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; ni'ma ajrul 'aamileen

ayah.transliteration: Al-lażīna ṣabarū wa ‘alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena sabaroo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ka'ayyim min dābbatil lā taḥmilu rizqahā, allāhu yarzuquhā wa iyyākum, wa huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa ka ayyim min daaabbatil laa tahmilu riqqahaa; al laahu yarzuquhaa wa iyyaakum; wa Huwas Samee'ul Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa sakhkharasy-syamsa wal-qamara layaqūlunnallāh(u), fa'annā yu'fakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa sakhkharash shamsa wal qamara la yaqoolunnal laahu fa ann yu'fakoon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u min ‘ibādihī wa yaqdiru lah(ū), innallāha bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limany yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa yaqdiru lah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in sa'altahum man nazzala minas-samā'i mā'an fa'aḥyā bihil-arḍa mim ba‘di mautihā layaqūlunnallāh(u), qulil-ḥamdu lillāh(i), bal akṡaruhum lā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in sa altahum man nazzala minas samaaa'e maaa'an fa ahyaa bihil arda mim ba'di mawtihaa la yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā hāżihil-ḥayātud-dun-yā illā lahwuw wa la‘ib(un), wa innad-dāral-ākhirata  lahiyal-ḥayawān(u), lau kānū ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa haazihil hayaa tud dunyaaa illaa lahwunw-wa la'ib; wa innad Daaral Aakhirata la hiyal ha yawaan; law kaano ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'iżā rakibū fil-fulki da‘awullāha mukhliṣīna lahud-dīn(a), falammā najjāhum ilal-barri iżā hum yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa-izaa rakiboo fil fulki da'awul laaha mukhilseena lahud deena falammaa najjaa hum ilal baari izaa hum yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Liyakfurū bimā ātaināhum wa liyatamatta‘ū, fasaufa ya‘lamūn(a).
