ayah.translation: Li yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum wa li yatamatta'oo fasaw fa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau annā ja‘alnā ḥaraman āminaw wa yutakhaṭṭafun-nāsu min ḥaulihim, afabil-bāṭili yu'minūna wa bini‘matillāhi yakfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaraw annaa ja'alnaa haraman aaminanw wa yutakhattafun naasu min haw lihim; afabil baatili yu'minoona wa bini'matil laahi yakfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa man aẓlamu mimmaniftarā ‘alallāhi każiban au każżaba bil-ḥaqqi lammā jā'ah(ū), alaisa fī jahannama maṡwal lil-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man azlamu mimma nif taraa 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ah; alaisa fee jahannama maswal lil kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna jāhadū fīnā lanahdiyannahum subulanā, wa innallāha lama‘al-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena jaahadoo feenaa lanahdiyannahum subulana; wa innal laaha lama'al muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām mīm.
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Gulibatir-rūm(u).
ayah.translation: Ghulibatir Room

ayah.transliteration: Fī adnal-arḍi wa hum mim ba‘di galabihim sayaglibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Feee adnal ardi wa hummim ba'di ghalabihim sa ya ghliboon

ayah.transliteration: Fī biḍ‘i sinīn(a), lillāhil-amru min qablu wa mim ba‘d(u), wa yauma'iżiy yafraḥul-mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fee bid'i sineen; lillaahil amru min qablu wa mim ba'd; wa yawma'iziny yafrahul mu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Binaṣrillāh(i), yanṣuru may yasyā'(u), wa huwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Binasril laa; yansuru mai yashaaa'u wa Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘dallāh(i), lā yukhlifullāhu wa‘dahū wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa'dal laahi laa yukhliful laahu wa'dahoo wa laakin na aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘lamūna ẓāhiram minal-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa hum ‘anil-ākhirati hum gāfilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ya'lamoona zaahiram minal hayaatid dunya wa hum 'anil Aakhirati hum ghaafiloon

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yatafakkarū fī anfusihim, mā khalaqallāhus-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā bainahumā illā bil-ḥaqqi wa ajalim musammā(n), wa inna kaṡīram minan-nāsi biliqā'i rabbihim lakāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yatafakkaroo feee anfusihim; maa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bil haqqi wa ajalim musammaa; wa inna kaseeram minan naasi biliqaaa'i Rabbihim lakaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fayanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-lażīna min qablihim, kānū asyadda minhum quwwataw wa aṡārul-arḍa wa ‘amarūhā akṡara mimmā ‘amarūhā wa jā'athum rusuluhum bil-bayyināt(i), famā kānallāhu liyaẓlimahum wa lākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalm yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanooo ashadda minhhum quwwatanw wa asaarul arda wa 'amaroohaaa aksara mimmaa 'amaroohaa wa jaaa'athum Rusuluhum bil baiyinaati famaa kaanal laahu liyazli mahum wa laakin kaanooo anfusahum yazlimoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma kāna ‘āqibatal-lażīna asā'us-sū'ā an każżabū bi'āyātillāhi wa kānū bihā yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa kaana'aaqibatal lazeena asaaa'us sooo aaa an kazzaboo bi aayaatil laahi wa kaanoo bihaa yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu yabda'ul-khalqa ṡumma yu‘īduhū ṡumma ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahu yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo summa ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma taqūmus-sā‘atu yublisul-mujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yublisul mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lam yakul lahum min syurakā'ihim syufa‘ā'u wa kānū bisyurakā'ihim kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lam yakul lahum min shurakaaa'ihim shufa'aaa'u wa kaanoo bishurakaaa'ihim kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma taqūmus-sā‘atu yauma'iżiy yatafarraqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma'iziny yatafarraqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti fahum fī rauḍatiy yuḥbarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa ammal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati fahum fee rawdatiny yuhbaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal-lażīna kafarū wa każżabū bi'āyātinā wa liqā'il-ākhirati fa'ulā'ika fil-‘ażābi muḥḍarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ammal lazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa wa liqaaa'il Aakhirati faulaaa'ika fil'azaabi muhdaroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa subḥānallāhi ḥīna tumsūna wa ḥīna tuṣbiḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa Subhaanal laahi heena tumsoona wa heena tusbihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lahul-ḥamdu fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa ‘asyiyyaw wa ḥīna tuẓhirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lahul hamdu fis samaawaati wal ardi wa 'ashiyyanw wa heena tuzhiroon

ayah.transliteration: Yukhrijul-ḥayya minal-mayyiti wa yukhrijul-mayyita minal-ḥayyi wa yuḥyil-arḍa ba‘da mautihā, wa każālika tukhrajūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yukhrijul haiya minal maiyiti wa yukhrijul maiyita minal haiyi wa yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; wa kazaalika tukhrajoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī an khalaqakum min turābin ṡumma iżā antum basyarun tantasyirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatiheee an khalaqakum min turaabin summa izaaa antum basharun tantashiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwājal litaskunū ilaihā wa ja‘ala bainakum mawaddataw wa raḥmah(tan), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatiheee an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwaajal litaskunooo ilaihaa wa ja'ala bainakum mawad datanw wa rahmah; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī khalqus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakhtilāfu alsinatikum wa alwānikum, inna fī żālika la'āyātil lil-‘ālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal aardi wakhtilaafu alsinatikum wa alwaanikum; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil lil'aalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī manāmukum bil-laili wan-nahāri wabtigā'ukum min faḍlih(ī), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatihee manaamukum bil laili wannahaari wabtighaaa'ukum min fadlih; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī yurīkumul-barqa khaufaw wa ṭama‘aw wa yunazzilu minas-samā'i mā'an fa yuḥyī bihil-arḍa ba‘da mautihā, inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatihee yureekumul barqa khawfanw wa tama'anw wa yunazzilu minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa yuhyee bihil arda ba'da mawtihaaa inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī an taqūmas-samā'u wal-arḍu bi'amrih(ī), ṡumma iżā da‘ākum da‘watam minal-arḍi iżā antum takhrujūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatihee an taqoomas samaaa'u wal ardu bi-amrih; summa izaa da'aakum da'watam minal ardi izaaa antum takhrujoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lahū man fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), kullul lahū qānitūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lahoo man fissamaawaati wal ardi kullul lahoo qaanitoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī yabda'ul-khalqa ṡumma yu‘īduhū wa huwa ahwanu ‘alaih(i), wa lahul-maṡalul-a‘lā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee yabda'ul khalqa summa yu'eeduhoo wa huwa ahwanu 'alaih; wa lahul masalul la'laa fissamaawaati wal-ard; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Ḍaraba lakum maṡalam min anfusikum, hal lakum mim mā malakat aimānukum min syurakā'a fī mā razaqnākum fa'antum fīhi sawā'un takhāfūnahum kakhīfatikum anfusakum, każālika nufaṣṣilul-āyāti liqaumiy ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Daraba lakum masalam min anfusikum hal lakum mimmaa malakat aymaanukum min shurakaaa'a fee maa razaqnaakum fa antum feehi sawaaa'un takhaafoonahum kakheefa tikum anfusakum; kazaalika nufassilul Aayaati liqawminy ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Balittaba‘al-lażīna ẓalamū ahwā'ahum bigairi ‘ilm(in), famay yahdī man aḍallallāh(u), wa mā lahum min nāṣirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Balit taba'al lazeena zalamooo ahwaaa'ahum bighairi 'ilmin famai yahdee man adallal laahu wa maa lahum min naasireen

ayah.transliteration: Fa aqim wajhaka lid-dīni ḥanīfā(n), fiṭratallāhil-latī faṭaran-nāsa ‘alaihā, lā tabdīla likhalqillāh(i), żālikad-dīnul-qayyim(u), wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa aqim wajhaka liddeeni Haneefaa; fitratal laahil latee fataran naasa 'alaihaa; laa taabdeela likhalqil laah; zaalikad deenul qaiyimu wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Munībīna ilaihi wattaqūhu wa aqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa lā takūnū minal-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Muneebeena ilaihi wattaqoohu wa aqeemus Salaata wa laa takoonoo minal mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Minal-lażīna farraqū dīnahum wa kānū syiya‘ā(n), kullu ḥizbim bimā ladaihim fariḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Minal lazeena farraqoo deenahum wa kaanoo shiya'an kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā massan-nāsa ḍurrun da‘au rabbahum munībīna ilaihi ṡumma iżā ażāqahum minhu raḥmatan iżā farīqum minhum birabbihim yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa massan naasa durrun da'aw Rabbahum muneebeena ilaihi summa izaaa azaqahum minhu rahmatan izaa fareequm minhum be Rabbihim yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Liyakfurū bimā ātaināhum, fatamatta‘ū, fasaufa ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Li yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum; fatamatta'oo fasawfa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Am anzalnā ‘alaihim sulṭānan fahuwa yatakallamu bimā kānū bihī yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am anzalnaa 'alaihim sultaanan fahuwa yatakallamu bimaa kaanoo bihee yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ażaqnan-nāsa raḥmatan fariḥū bihā, wa in tuṣibhum sayyi'atum bimā qaddamat aidīhim iżā hum yaqnaṭūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaaa azaqnan naasa rahmatan farihoo bihaa wa in tusibhum sayyi'atum bimaa qaddamat aydeehim izaa hum yaqnatoon

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau annallāha yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u wa yaqdir(u), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaraw annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa āti żal-qurbā ḥaqqahū wal-miskīna wabnas-sabīl(i), żālika khairul lil-lażīna yurīdūna wajhallāh(i), wa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnassabeel; zaalika khairul lil lazeena yureedoona Wajhal laahi wa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ātaitum mir ribal liyarbuwa fī amwālin-nāsi falā yarbū ‘indallāh(i), wa mā ātaitum min zakātin turīdūna wajhallāhi fa'ulā'ika humul-muḍ‘ifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa aataitum mir ribal li yarbuwa feee amwaalin naasi falaa yarboo 'indal laahi wa maaa aataitum min zaakaatin tureedoona wajhal laahi fa ulaaa'ika humul mud'ifoon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī khalaqakum ṡumma razaqakum ṡumma yumītukum ṡumma yuḥyīkum, hal min syurakā'ikum may yaf‘alu min żālikum min syai'(in), subḥānahū wa ta‘ālā ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee khalaqa kum summa razaqakm summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum hal min shurakaaa'ikum mai yaf'alu min zaalikum min shai'; Sub haanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Żaharal-fasādu fil-barri wal-baḥri bimā kasabat aidin-nāsi liyużīqahum ba‘ḍal-lażī ‘amilū la‘allahum yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaharal fasaadu fil barri wal bahri bimaa kasabat aydinnaasi li yuzeeqahum ba'dal lazee 'amiloo la'allahum yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qul sīrū fil-arḍi fanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-lażīna min qabl(u), kāna akṡaruhum musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qabl; kaana aksaruhum mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa aqim wajhaka lid-dīnil-qayyimi min qabli ay ya'tiya yaumul lā maradda lahū minallāhi yauma'iżiy yaṣṣadda‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa aqim wajhaka lid deenil qaiyimi min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo minal laahi Yawma'iziny yassadda'oon

ayah.transliteration: Man kafara fa ‘alaihi kufruh(ū), wa man ‘amila ṣāliḥan fali'anfusihim yamhadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Man kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo wa man 'amila saalihan fali anfusihim yamhadoon

ayah.transliteration: Liyajziyal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti min faḍlih(ī), innahū lā yuḥibbul-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Li yajziyal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati min fadlih; innahoo laa yuhibbul kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī ay yursilar-riyāḥa mubasysyirātiw wa liyużīqakum mir raḥmatihī wa litajriyal-fulka bi'amrihī wa litabtagū min faḍlihī wa la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatiheee anyyursilar riyaaha mubashshi raatinw wa li yuzeeqakum mir rahmatihee wa litajriyal fulku bi amrihee wa litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā min qablika rusulan ilā qaumihim fajā'ūhum bil-bayyināti fantaqamnā minal-lażīna ajramū, wa kāna ḥaqqan ‘alainā naṣrul-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa min qablika Rusulan ilaa qawmihim fajaaa'oohum bil baiyinaati fantaqamnaa minal lazeena ajramoo wa kaana haqqan 'alainaa nasrul mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī yursilur-riyāḥa fatuṡīru saḥāban fayabsuṭuhū fis-samā'i kaifa yasyā'u wa yaj‘aluhū kisafan fataral-wadqa yakhruju min khilālih(ī), fa'iżā aṣāba bihī may yasyā'u min ‘ibādihī iżā hum yastabsyirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee yursilur riyaaha fatuseeru sahaaban fa yabsutuhoo fis samaaa'i kaifa yashaaa'u wa yaj'aluhoo kisafan fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilaalihee fa izaaa asaaba bihee mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee izaa hum yastabshiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in kānū min qabli ay yunazzala ‘alaihim min qablihī lamublisīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in kaanoo min qabli any yunazzala 'alaihim min qablihee lamubliseen

ayah.transliteration: Fanẓur ilā āṡāri raḥmatillāhi kaifa yuḥyil-arḍa ba‘da mautihā, inna żālika lamuḥyil-mautā, wa huwa ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Fanzur ilaaa aasaari rahmatil laahi kaifa yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; inna zaalika lamuhyil mawtaa wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in arsalnā rīḥan fara'auhu muṣfarral laẓallū mim ba‘dihī yakfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in arsalnaa reehan fara awhu musfarral lazalloo mim ba'dihee yakfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa innaka lā tusmi‘ul-mautā wa lā tusmi‘uṣ-ṣummad-du‘ā'a iżā wallau mudbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa innaka laa tusmi'ul mawtaa wa laa tusmi'us summad du'aaa'a izaa wallaw mudbireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā anta bihādil-‘umyi ‘an ḍalālatihim, in tusmi‘u illā may yu'minu bi'āyātinā fahum muslimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa anta bihaadil 'umyi 'an dalaalatihim in tusmi'u illaa mai yuminu bi aayaatinaa fahum muslimoon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī khalaqakum min ḍa‘fin ṡumma ja‘ala mim ba‘di ḍa‘fin quwwatan ṡumma ja‘ala mim ba‘di quwwatin ḍa‘faw wa syaibah(tan), yakhluqu mā yasyā'(u), wa huwal-‘alīmul-qadīr(u).
ayah.translation: Allahul lazee khalaqa kum min du'fin summa ja'ala mim ba'di du'fin quwwatan summa ja'ala mim ba'di quwwatin du'fanw wa shaibah; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'u wa Huwal 'Aleemul Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma taqūmus-sā‘atu yuqsimul-mujrimūn(a), mā labiṡū gaira sā‘ah(tin), każālika kānū yu'fakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu yuqsimul mujrimoona maa labisoo ghaira saa'ah; kazaalika kaanoo yu'fakoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna ūtul-‘ilma wal-īmāna laqad labiṡtum fī kitābillāhi ilā yaumil-ba‘ṡ(i), fa hāżā yaumul-baṡi wa lākinnakum kuntum lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wal eemaana laqad labistum fee kitaabil laahi ilaa yawmil ba'si fahaazaa yawmul ba'si wa laakinnakum kuntum laa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa yauma'iżil lā yanfa‘ul-lażīna ẓalamū ma‘żiratuhum wa lā hum yusta‘tabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa Yawma'izil laa yanfa'ul lazeena zalamoo ma'ziratu hum wa laa hum yusta'taboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ḍarabnā lin-nāsi fī hāżal-qur'āni min kulli maṡal(in), wa la'in ji'tahum bi'āyatil layaqūlannal-lażīna kafarū in antum illā mubṭilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Quraani min kulli masal; wa la'in ji'tahum bi aayatil la yaqoolannal lazeena kafaroo in antum illaa mubtiloon

ayah.transliteration: Każālika yaṭba‘ullāhu ‘alā qulūbil-lażīna lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika yatba'ul laahu 'alaa quloobil lazeena laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Faṣbir inna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqquw wa lā yastakhiffannakal-lażīna lā yūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wa laa yastakhif fannakal lazeena laa yooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām mīm.
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Tilka āyātul-kitābil-ḥakīm(i).
ayah.translation: Tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Hudaw wa raḥmatal lil-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Hudanw wa rahmatal lilmuhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yuqīmūnaṣ-ṣalāta wa yu'tūnaz-zakāta wa hum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yuqeemoonas Salaata wa yu'toonaz Zakaata wa hum bil Aakhirati hum yooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika ‘alā hudam mir rabbihim wa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika 'alaa hudam mir Rabbihim wa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa minan-nāsi may yasytarī lahwal-ḥadīṡi liyuḍilla ‘an sabīlillāhi bigairi ‘ilmiw wa yattakhiżahā huzuwā(n), ulā'ika lahum ‘ażābum muhīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa minan naasi mai-yashtaree lahuwal hadeesi li yudilla 'an sabeelil laahi bighairi 'ilminw wa yattakhizahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā tutlā ‘alaihi āyātunā wallā mustakbiran ka'allam yasma‘hā ka'anna fī użunaihi waqrā(n), fabasyyirhu bi‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alayhi Aayaatunaa wallaa mustakbiran ka al lam yasma'haa ka anna feee uzunwihi waqran fabash shiru bi'azaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun na‘īm(i).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum Janaatun Na'eem

ayah.transliteration: Khālidīna fīhā, wa‘dallāhi ḥaqqā(n), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Khaalideena feeha wa'dal laahi haqqaa; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Khalaqas-samāwāti bigairi ‘amadin taraunahā wa alqā fil-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bikum wa baṡṡa fīhā min kulli dābbah(tin), wa anzalnā minas-samā'i mā'an fa ambatnā fīhā min kulli zaujin karīm(in).
ayah.translation: Khalaqas samaawaati bi ghairi 'amadin tarawnahaa wa alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum wa bassa feehaa min kulli daaabbah; wa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa ambatnaa feeha min kulli zawjin kareem

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā khalqullāhi fa arūnī māżā khalaqal-lażīna min dūnih(ī), baliẓ-ẓālimūna fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Haazaa khalqul laahi fa aroonee maazaa khalaqal lazeena min doonih; baliz zaalimoona fee dalalim Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā luqmānal-ḥikmata anisykur lillāh(i), wa may yasykur fa'innamā yasykuru linafsih(ī), wa man kafara fa'innallāha ganiyyun ḥamīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Luqmaanal hikmata anishkur lillaah; wa many yashkur fa innamaa yashkuru linafsihee wa man kafara fa innal laaha Ghaniyyun Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qāla luqmānu libnihī wa huwa ya‘iẓuhū yā bunayya lā tusyrik billāh(i), innasy-syirka laẓulmun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaala luqmaanu libnihee wa huwa ya'izuhoo ya bunaiya laa tushrik billaah; innash shirka lazulmun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa waṣṣainal-insāna biwālidaih(i), ḥamalathu ummuhū wahnan ‘alā wahniw wa fiṣāluhū fī ‘āmaini anisykur lī wa liwālidaik(a), ilayyal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa wassainal bi waalidaihi hamalat hu ummuhoo wahnan 'alaa wahninw wa fisaaluhoo fee 'aamaini anishkur lee wa liwaalidaika ilaiyal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa in jāhadāka ‘alā an tusyrika bī mā laisa laka bihī ‘ilmun falā tuṭi‘humā wa ṣāḥibhumā fid-dun-yā ma‘rūfā(n), wattabi‘ sabīla man anāba ilayya(a), ṡumma ilayya marji‘ukum fa unabbi'ukum bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in jaahadaaka 'alaaa an tushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee 'ilmun falaa tuti'humaa wa saahib humaa fid dunyaa ma'roofanw wattabi' sabeela man anaaba ilayy; summa ilaiya marji'ukum fa unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Yā bunayya innahā in taku miṡqāla ḥabbatim min khardalin fatakun fī ṣakhratin au fis-samāwāti au fil-arḍi ya'ti bihallāh(u), innallāha laṭīfun khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Ya bunaiya innahaaa in taku misqaala habbatim min khardalin fatakun fee sakhratin aw fis samaawaati aw fil ardi yaati bihal laa; innal laaha lateefun Khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Yā bunayya aqimiṣ-ṣalāta wa'mur bil-ma‘rūfi wanha ‘anil-munkari waṣbir ‘alā mā aṣābak(a), inna żālika min ‘azmil-umūr(i).
ayah.translation: Yaa bunaiya aqimis-Salaata waamur bilma'roofi wanha 'anil munkari wasbir 'alaa maaa asaabaka inna zaalika min 'azmil umoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tuṣa‘‘ir khaddaka lin-nāsi wa lā tamsyi fil-arḍi maraḥā(n), innallāha lā yuḥibbu kulla mukhtālin fakhūr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tusa'-'ir khaddaka linnaasi wa laa tamshi fil ardi maarahan innal laaha laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor

ayah.transliteration: Waqṣid fī masy-yika wagḍuḍ min ṣautik(a), inna ankaral-aṣwāti laṣautul-ḥamīr(i).
ayah.translation: Waqsid fee mashyika waghdud min sawtik; inna ankaral aswaati lasawtul hameer

ayah.transliteration: Alam tarau annallāha sakhkhara lakum mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi wa asbaga ‘alaikum ni‘amahū ẓāhirataw wa bāṭinah(tan), wa minan-nāsi may yujādilu fillāhi bigairi ‘ilmiw wa lā hudaw wa lā kitābim munīr(in).
ayah.translation: Alam taraw annal laaha sakhkhara lakum maa fis sa maawaati wa maa fil ardi wa asbaha 'alaikum ni'amahoo zaahiratanw wa baatinah; wa minan naasi many yujaadilu fil laahi bighayri 'ilminw wa laa hudanw wa laa Kitaabim muneer

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā qīla lahumuttabi‘ū mā anzalallāhu qālū bal nattabi‘u mā wajadnā ‘alaihi ābā'anā, awalau kānasy-syaiṭānu yad‘ūhum ilā ‘ażābis-sa‘īr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa qeela lahumut-tabi'oo maaa anzalal laahu qaaloo bal nattabi'u maa wajadnaa 'alaihi aabaaa'anaa; awalaw kaanash Shaitaanu yad'oohum ilaa 'azaabis sa'eer

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yuslim wajhahū ilallāhi wa huwa muḥsinun faqadistamsaka bil-‘urwatil-wuṡqā, wa ilallāhi ‘āqibatul-umūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa many yuslim wajha hooo ilal laahi wa huwa muhsinun faqadistamsaka bil'ur watil wusqaa; wa ilal laahi 'aaqibatul umoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa man kafara falā yaḥzunka kufruh(ū), ilainā marji‘uhum fanunabbi'uhum bimā ‘amilū, innallāha ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa man kafara falaa yahzunka kufruh; ilainaa marji'uhum fanunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; innal laaha 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Numatti‘uhum qalīlan ṡumma naḍṭarruhum ilā ‘ażābin galīẓ(in).
ayah.translation: Numatti'uhum qaleelan summa nadtarruhum ilaa 'azaabin ghaleez

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa  layaqūlunnallāh(u), qulil-ḥamdu lillāh(i), bal akṡaruhum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda la yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), innallāha huwal-ganiyyul-ḥamīd(u).
ayah.translation: Lilaahi ma fis samaa waati wal ard; innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau anna mā fil-arḍi min syajaratin aqlāmuw wal-baḥru yamudduhū mim ba‘dihī sab‘atu abḥurim mā nafidat kalimātullāh(i), innallāha ‘azīzun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa law annamaa fil ardi min shajaratin aqlaamunw wal bahru yamudduhoo mim ba'dihee sab'atu abhurim maa nafidat Kalimaatul laah; innal laaha 'azeezun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Mā khalqukum wa lā ba‘ṡukum illā kanafsiw wāḥidah(tin), innallāha samī‘um baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Maa khalqukum wa laa ba'sukum illaa kanafsinw-waa hidah; innal laaha Samee'um Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha yūlijul-laila fin-nahāri wa yūlijun-nahāra fil-laili wa sakhkharasy-syamsa wal-qamar(a), kulluy yajrī ilā ajalim musammaw wa annallāha bimā ta‘malūna khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil laili wa sakhkharash shamsa wal qamara kulluny yajreee ilaaa ajalim musammanw wa annal laaha bimaa ta'malona Khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annallāha huwal-ḥaqqu wa anna mā yad‘ūna min dūnihil-bāṭil(u), wa annallāha huwal-‘aliyyul-kabīr(u).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annal laaha Huwal Haqqu wa anna maa yad'oona min doonihil baatilu wa annal laaha Huwal 'Aliyyul Kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annal-fulka tajrī fil-baḥri bini‘matillāhi liyuriyakum min āyātih(ī), inna fī żālika  la'āyātil likulli ṣabbārin syakūr(in).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal fulka tajree fil bahri bini'matil laahi li yuriyakum min Aayaatih; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā gasyiyahum maujun kaẓ-ẓulali da‘awullāha mukhliṣīna lahud-dīn(a), falammā najjāhum ilal-barri faminhum muqtaṣid(un), wa mā yajḥadu bi'āyātinā illā kullu khattārin kafūr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa ghashiyahum mawjun kazzulali da'a-wul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena fa lammaa najjaahum ilal barri faminhum muqtasid; wa maa yajhadu bi Aayaatinaa illaa kullu khattaarin kafoor

ayah.transliteration: Ya ayyuhan-nāsuttaqū rabbakum wakhsyau yaumal lā yajzī wālidun ‘aw waladih(ī), wa lā maulūdun huwa jāzin ‘aw wālidihī syai'ā(n), inna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqqun falā tagurrannakumul-ḥayātud-dun-yā, wa lā yagurrannakum billāhil-garūr(u).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan naasuttaqoo Rabbakum wakhshaw Yawmal laa yajzee waalidun 'anw waladihee wa laa mawloodun huwa jaazin 'anw waalidihee shai'aa; innaa wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurran nakumul hayaatud dunyaa wa laa yaghur rannakum billaahil gharoon

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha ‘indahū ‘ilmus-sā‘ah(ti), wa yunazzilul-gaiṡ(a), wa ya‘lamu mā fil-arḥām(i), wa mā tadrī nafsum māżā taksibu gadā(n), wa mā tadrī nafsum bi'ayyi arḍin tamūt(u), innallāha ‘alīmun khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha 'indahoo 'ilmus saa'ati wa yunazzilul ghaisa wa ya'lamu maa fil arhaami wa maa tadree nafsum maazaa takisbu ghadaa; wa maa tadree nafsum bi ayyi ardin tamoot; innal laaha 'Aleemun Khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Alif lām mīm.
ayah.translation: Alif-Laaam-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlul-kitābi lā raiba fīhi mir rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Tanzeelul Kitaabi 'laaraiba feehi mir rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūnaftarāhu balhuwal-ḥaqqu mir rabbika litunżira qaumam mā atāhum min nażīrim min qablika la‘allahum yahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu bal huwal haqqu mir rabbika litunzira qawma maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā bainahumā fī sittati ayyāmin ṡummastawā ‘alal-‘arsy(i), mā lakum min dūnihī miw waliyyiw wa lā syafī‘(in), afalā tatażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaam;Thummas tawaa 'alal 'arsh; maa lakum min doonihee minw-wwaliyyinw-wala shafee'; afala tatazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Yudabbirul-amra minas-samā'i ilal-arḍi ṡumma ya‘ruju ilaihi fī yaumin kāna miqdāruhū alfa sanatim mimmā ta‘uddūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yudabbirul amra minas samaaa'i ilal ardi Thumma ya'ruju ilai Thumma ya'ruju ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhoooo alfa sanatim mimmaa ta'uddoon

ayah.transliteration: Żālika ‘ālimul-gaibi wasy-syahādatil-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Zaalika 'aalimul ghaybi wa shahaadatil 'azeezur raheem

ayah.transliteration: Allażī aḥsana kulla syai'in khalaqahū wa bada'a khalqal-insāni min ṭīn(in).
ayah.translation: Allazee ahsana kulla shai in khalaqa; wa bada a khalqal insaani min teen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ja‘ala naslahū min sulālatim mim mā'im mahīn(in).
ayah.translation: Thumma ja'ala naslahoo min sulaalatim mim maaa'immaheen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma sawwāhu wa nafakha fīhi mir rūḥihī wa ja‘ala lakumus-sam‘a wal-abṣāra wal-af'idah(ta), qalīlam mā tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Thumma sawwaahu wa nafakha feehi mir roohihih; wa ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal-absaara wal-af'idah; taqaleelam maa tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū a'iżā ḍalalnā fil-arḍi a'innā lafī khalqin jadīd(in), bal hum biliqā'i rabbihim kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalooo 'a-izaa dalalnaa fil ardi 'a-innaa lafee khalqin jadeed; bal hum biliqaaa'i rabbihim kaafirroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul yatawaffākum malakul-mautil-lażī wukkila bikum ṡumma ilā rabbikum turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul yatawaffaakum malakul mawtil lazee wukkila bikum Thumma ilaa rabbikum turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau tarā iżil-mujrimūna nākisū ru'ūsihim ‘inda rabbihim, rabbanā abṣarnā wa sami‘nā farji‘nā na‘mal ṣāliḥan innā mūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law taraaa izil mujrimoona naakisoo ru'oosihim 'inda rabbihim rabbanaaa absarnaa wa sami'naa farji'naa na'mal saalihan innaa mooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau syi'nā la'ātainā kulla nafsin hudāhā wa lākin ḥaqqal-qaulu minnī la'amla'anna  jahannama minal-jinnati wan-nāsi ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law shi'naa la-aatainaa kulla nafsin hudaahaa wa laakin haqqal qawlu minnee la amla'anna jahannama minal jinnati wannaasi ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Fa żūqū bimā nasītum liqā'a yaumikum hāżā, innā nasīnākum wa żūqū ‘ażābal-khuldi bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fazooqoo bimaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawminkum haaza innaa naseenaakum wa zooqoo 'azaabal khuldi bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā yu'minu bi'āyātinal-lażīna iżā żukkirū bihā kharrū sujjadaw wa sabbaḥū biḥamdi rabbihim wa hum lā yastakbirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaa yu'minu bi aayaatinal lazeena izaa zukkiroo bihaa kharroo sujjadanw wa sabbahoo bihamdi rabbihim wa hum laa yastakbiroon

ayah.transliteration: Tatajāfā junūbuhum ‘anil-maḍāji‘i yad‘ūna rabbahum khaufaw wa ṭama‘ā(n), wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Tatajaafaa junoobuhum 'anil madaaji'i yad'oona rabbahum khawfanw wa tama'anw wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Falā ta‘lamu nafsum mā ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a‘yun(in), jazā'am bimā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaa ta'lamu nafsum maaa ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Afaman kāna mu'minan kaman kāna fāsiqā(n), lā yastawūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afaman kaana mu'minan kaman kaana faasiqaa; laa yasta woon

ayah.transliteration: Ammal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti falahum jannātul-ma'wā, nuzulam bimā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ammal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati falahum jannaatul maawa nuzulam bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal-lażīna fasaqū fa ma'wākumun nāru kullamā arādū ay yakhrujū minhā u‘īdū fīhā wa qīla lahum żūqū ‘ażāban nāril-lażī kuntum bihī tukażżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ammal lazeena fasaqoo famaawaahumn Naaru kullamaaa araadooo any yakhrujoo minhaaa u'eedoo feehaa wa qeela lahum zooqoo 'zaaaban Naaril lazee kuntum bihee tukazziboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lanużīqannahum minal-‘ażābil-adnā dūnal-‘ażābil-akbari la‘allahum yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lanuzeeqan nahum minal 'azaabil ladnaa doonal 'azaabil akbari la'allahum yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa man aẓlamu mimman żukkira bi'āyāti rabbihī ṡumma a‘raḍa ‘anhā, innā minal-mujrimīna muntaqimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man azlamu mimman zukkira bi aayaati rabbihee summa a'rada 'anhaa; innaa minal mujrimeena muntaqimmon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba falā takun fī miryatim mil liqā'ihī wa ja‘alnāhu hudal libanī isrā'īl(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aayainaa Moosal Kitaaba falaa takun fee miryatim mil liqaaa'ihee wa ja'alnaahu hudal li Baneee Israaa'eel

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnā minhum a'immatay yahdūna bi'amrinā lammā ṣabarū, wa kānū bi'āyātinā yūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaa minhum a'immatany yahdoona bi amrinaa lammaa sabaroo wa kaanoo bi aayaatinaa yooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbaka huwa yafṣilu bainahum yaumal-qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu bainahum yawmal qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknā min qablihim minal-qurūni yamsyūna fī masākinihim, inna fī żālika la'āyāt(in), afalā yasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa min qablihim minal qurooni yamshoona fee zaalika la aayaatin afalaa yasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau annā nasūqul-mā'a ilal-arḍil juruzi fanukhriju bihī zar‘an ta'kulu minhu an‘āmuhum wa anfushum, afalā yubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaraw annaa nasooqul maaa'a ilal lardil juruzi fanukhriju bihee zar'an taakulu minhu an'aamuhum wa anfusuhum afalaa yubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal fat hu in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul yaumal-fatḥi lā yanfa‘ul-lażīna kafarū īmānuhum wa lā hum yunẓarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul yawmal fat hi laa yanfa'ul lazeena kafarooo eemaanuhum wa laa hum yunzaroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa a‘riḍ ‘anhum wantaẓir innahum muntaẓirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa a'rid 'anhum wantazir innahum muntazirron

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyuttaqillāha wa lā tuṭi‘il-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīn(a), innallāha kāna ‘alīman ḥakīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaa aiyuhan Nabiyyut taqil laaha wa laa tuti'il kaafireena wal munaafiqeen; innal laaha kaana 'aleeman Hakeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wattabi‘ mā yūḥā ilaika mir rabbik(a), innallāha kāna bimā ta‘malūna khabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika mir Rabbik; innal laaha kaana bimaa ta'maloona Khabeera

ayah.transliteration: Wa tawakkal ‘alallāh(i), wa kafā billāhi wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa tawakkal 'alal laah; wa kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Mā ja‘alallāhu lirajulim min qalbaini fī jaufih(ī), wa mā ja‘ala azwājakumul-lā'ī tuẓāhirūna minhunna  ummahātikum, wa mā ja‘ala ad‘iyā'akum abnā'akum, żālikum qaulukum bi'afwāhikum, wallāhu yaqūlul-ḥaqqa wa huwa yahdis-sabīl(a).
ayah.translation: Maa ja'alal laahu lirajulim min qalbaini fee jawfih; wa maa ja'ala azwaajakumul laaa'ee tuzaahiroona minhunna ummahaatikum; wa maa ja'ala ad'iyaaa'akum abnaaa'akum; zaalikum qawlukum bi afwaa hikum wallaahu yaqoolul haqqa wa Huwa yahdis sabeel

ayah.transliteration: Ud‘ūhum li'ābā'ihim huwa aqsaṭu ‘indallāh(i), fa illam ta‘lamū ābā'ahum fa ikhwānukum fid-dīni wa mawālīkum, wa laisa ‘alaikum junāḥun fīmā akhṭa'tum bihī wa lākim mā ta‘ammadat qulūbukum, wa kānallāhu gafūrar raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Ud'oohum li aabaaa'ihim huwa aqsatu 'indal laah; fa illam ta'lamooo aabaaa'ahum fa ikhwaanukum fid deeni wa mawaaleekum; wa laisa 'alaikum junaahun feemaaa akhtaatum bihee wa laakim maa ta'ammadat quloobukum; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

ayah.transliteration: An-nabiyyu aulā bil-mu'minīna min anfusihim wa azwājuhū ummahātuhum, wa ulul-arḥāmi ba‘ḍuhum aulā biba‘ḍin fī kitābillāhi minal-mu'minīna wal-muhājirīna illā an taf‘alū ilā auliyā'ikum ma‘rūfā(n), kāna żālika fil-kitābi masṭūrā(n).
ayah.translation: An-Nabiyyu awlaa bil mu'mineena min anfusihim wa azwaajuhoo ummahatuhum wa ulul arbaami ba'duhum awlaa biba'din fee Kitaabil laahi minal mu'meneena wal Muhaajireena illaaa an taf'alooo ilaaa awliyaaa'ikum ma'roofaa; kaana zaalika fil kitaabi mastooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż akhażnā minan-nabiyyīna mīṡāqahum wa minka wa min nūḥiw wa ibrāhīma wa mūsā wa ‘īsabni maryam(a), wa akhażnā minhum mīṡāqan galīẓā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa iz akhaznaa minan Nabiyyeena meesaaqahum wa minka wa min Noohinw wa Ibraaheema wa Moosaa wa Eesab-ni-Maryama wa akhaznaa minhum meesaaqan ghaleezaa

ayah.transliteration: Liyas'alaṣ-ṣādiqīna ‘an ṣidqihim, wa a‘adda lil-kāfirīna ‘ażāban alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Liyas'alas saadiqeena 'an sidqihim; wa a'adda lilkaa fireena 'azaaban aleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanużkurū ni‘matallāhi ‘alaikum iż jā'atkum junūdun fa'arsalnā ‘alaihim rīḥaw wa junūdal lam tarauhā, wa kānallāhu bimā ta‘malūna baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanuz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz jaaa'atkm junoodun fa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehanw wa junoodal lam tarawhaa; wa kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera

ayah.transliteration: Iż jā'ūkum min fauqikum wa min asfala minkum wa iż zāgatil-abṣāru wa balagatil-qulūbul-ḥanājira wa taẓunnūna billāhiẓ-ẓunūnā.
ayah.translation: Iz jaaa'ookum min fawqikum wa min asfala minkum wa iz zaaghatil absaaru wa balaghatil quloobul hanaajira wa tazunnoona billaahiz zunoonaa

ayah.transliteration: Hunālikabtuliyal-mu'minūna wa zulzilū zilzālan syadīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Hunaalikab tuliyal mu'minoona wa zulziloo zilzaalan shadeedaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż yaqūlul-munāfiqūna wal-lażīna fī qulūbihim maraḍum mā wa‘adanallāhu wa rasūluhū illā gurūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa iz yaqoolul munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradum maa wa'adanal laahu wa Rasooluhooo illaa ghurooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qālat ṭā'ifatum minhum yā ahla yaṡriba lā muqāma lakum farji‘ū, wa yasta'żinu farīqum minhumun-nabiyya yaqūlūna inna buyūtanā ‘aurah(tun), wa mā hiya bi‘aurah(tin), iy yurīdūna illā firārā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaalat taaa'ifatum minhum yaaa ahla Yasriba laa muqaamaa lakum farji'oo; wa yastaazina fareequm minhumun Nabiyya yaqooloona inna buyootanaa 'awrah; wa maa hiya bi'awratin iny yureedoona illaa firaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau dukhilat ‘alaihim min aqṭārihā ṡumma su'ilul-fitnata la'ātauhā wa mā talabbaṡū bihā illā yasīrā(n).
ayah.translation: wa law dukhilat 'alaihim min aqtaarihaa summa su'ilul fitnata la aatawhaa wa maa talabbasoo bihaaa illaa yaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad kānū ‘āhadullāha min qablu lā yuwallūnal-adbār(a), wa kāna ‘ahdullāhi mas'ūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad kaanoo 'aahadul laaha min qablu laa yuwal loonal adbaar; wa kaana 'ahdul laahi mas'oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul lay yanfa‘akumul-firāru in farartum minal-mauti awil-qatli wa iżal lā tumatta‘ūna illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul lany y anfa'akumul firaaru in farartum minal mawti awil qatli wa izal laa tumatta'oona illaa qaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul man żal-lażī ya‘ṣimukum minallāhi in arāda bikum sū'an au arāda bikum raḥmah(tan), wa lā yajidūna lahum min dūnillāhi waliyyaw wa lā naṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul m an zal lazee ya'simukum minal laahi in araada bikum sooo'an aw araada bikum rahmah; wa laa yajidoona lahum min doonil laahi waliyyanw wa laa naseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Qad ya‘lamullāhul-mu‘awwiqīna minkum wal-qā'ilīna li'ikhwānihim halumma ilainā, wa lā ya'tūnal-ba'sa illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qad ya'lamul laahul mu'awwiqeena minkum walqaaa'ileena li ikhwaanihim hahumma ilainaa, wa laa yaatoonal baasa illaa qaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Asyiḥḥatan ‘alaikum, fa iżā jā'al-khaufu ra'aitahum yanẓurūna ilaika tadūru a‘yunuhum kal-lażī yugsyā ‘alaihi minal-maut(i), fa iżā żahabal-khaufu salaqūkum bi'alsinatin ḥidādin asyiḥḥatan ‘alal-khair(i), ulā'ika lam yu'minū fa aḥbaṭallāhu a‘mālahum, wa kāna żālika ‘alallāhi yasīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Ashihhatan 'alaikum faizaa jaaa'al khawfu ra aytahum yanzuroona ilaika tadooru a'yunuhum kallazee yughshaa 'alaihi minal mawti fa izaa zahabal khawfu salqookum bi alsinatin hidaadin ashibbatan 'alal khayr; ulaaa'ika lam yu'minoo fa ahbatal laahu a'maalahum; wa kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Yaḥsabūnal-aḥzāba lam yażhabū, wa iy ya'til aḥzābu yawaddū lau annahum bādūna fil a‘rābi yas'alūna ‘an ambā'ikum, wa lau kānū fīkum mā qātalū illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Yahsaboonal Ahzaaba lam yazhaboo wa iny yaatil Ahzaabu yawaddoo law annahum baadoona fil A'raabi yasaloona 'an ambaaa'ikum wa law kaanoo feekum maa qaatalooo illaa qaleela

ayah.transliteration: Laqad kāna lakum fī rasūlillāhi uswatun ḥasanatul liman kāna yarjullāha wal yaumal ākhira wa żakarallāha kaṡīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Laqad kaana lakum fee Rasoolil laahi uswatun hasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal yawmal Aakhira wa azkaral laaha kaseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā ra'al-mu'minūnal-aḥzāb(a), qālū hāżā mā wa‘adanallāhu wa rasūluhū wa ṣadaqallāhu wa rasūluh(ū), wa mā zādahum illā īmānaw wa taslīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa ra al mu'minoonal Ahzaaba qaaloo haaza maa wa'adanal laahu wa Rasooluh; wa maa zaadahum illaaa eemaananw wa tasleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Minal-mu'minīna rijālun ṣadaqū mā ‘āhadullāha ‘alaih(i), faminhum man qaḍā naḥbah(ū), wa minhum may yantaẓir(u), wa mā baddalū tabdīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Minal mu'mineena rijaalun sadaqoo maa 'aahadul laaha 'alaihi faminhum man qadaa nahbahoo wa minhum mai yantaziru wa maa baddaloo tabdeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Liyajziyallāhuṣ-ṣādiqīna biṣidqihim wa yu‘ażżibal-munāfiqīna in syā'a au yatūba ‘alaihim, innallāha kāna gafūrar raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Li yajziyal aahus saadiqeena bisidqihim wa yu'azzibal munaafiqeena in shaaa'a aw yatooba 'alaihim; innal laaha kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa raddallāhul-lażīna kafarū bigaiẓihim lam yanālū khairā(n), wa kafallāhul-mu'minīnal-qitāl(a), wa kānallāhu qawiyyan ‘azīzā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa raddal laahul lazeena kafaroo bighaizihim lam yanaaloo khairaa; wa kafal laahul mu'mineenal qitaal; wa kaanal laahu Qawiyyan 'Azeezaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa anzalal-lażīna ẓāharūhum min ahlil-kitābi min ṣayāṣīhim wa qażafa fī qulūbihimur-ru‘ba farīqan taqtulūna wa ta'sirūna farīqā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa anzalal lazeena zaaha roohum min Ahlil Kitaabi min sa yaaseehim wa qazafa fee quloobihimm mur ru'ba freeqan taqtuloona wa taasiroona fareeqaaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa auraṡakum arḍahum wa diyārahum wa amwālahum wa arḍal lam taṭa'ūhā, wa kānallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa awrasakum ardahum wa diyaarahum wa amwaalahum wa ardal lam tata'oohaa; wa kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu qul li'azwājika in kuntunna turidnal-ḥayātad-dun-yā wa zīnatahā fa ta‘ālaina umatti‘kunna wa usarriḥkunna sarāḥan jamīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu qul li azwaajika i kuntunna turidnal hayaatad dunyaa wa zeenatahaa fata'aalaina umatti'kunna wa usarrihkunna saraahan jameela

ayah.transliteration: Wa in kuntunna turidnallāha wa rasūlahū wad-dāral-ākhirata fa innallāha a‘adda lil-muḥsināti minkunna ajran ‘aẓīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa in kuntunna turidnal laaha wa Rasoolahoo wad Daaral Aakhirata fa innal laaha a'adda lil muhsinaati min kunna ajjran 'azeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā nisā'an-nabiyyi may ya'ti minkunna bifāḥisyatim mubayyinatiy yuḍā‘af lahal-‘ażābu ḍi‘fain(i), wa kāna żālika ‘alallāhi yasīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaa nisaaa'an Nabiyyi mai yaati minkunna bifaa hishatim mubaiyinatiny yudaa'af lahal 'azaabu di'fain wa kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseera

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yaqnut minkunna lillāhi wa rasūlihī wa ta‘mal ṣāliḥan nu'tihā ajrahā marratain(i), wa a‘tadnā lahā rizqan karīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa mai yaqnut minkunna lillaahi wa Rasoolihee wa ta'mal saalihan nu'tihaaa ajrahaa marratayni wa a'tadnaa lahaa rizqan kareema

ayah.transliteration: Yā nisā'an-nabiyyi lastunna ka'aḥadim minan-nisā'i inittaqaitunna falā takhḍa‘na bil-qauli fa yaṭma‘al-lażī fī qalbihī maraḍuw wa qulna qaulam ma‘rūfā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaa nisaaa'an Nabiyyi lastunna ka ahadim minan nisaaa'i init taqaitunna falaa takhda'na bilqawli fa yatma'al lazee fee qalbihee maradunw wa qulna qawlam ma'roofaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qarna fī buyūtikunna wa lā tabarrajna tabarrujal-jāhiliyyatil-ūlā wa aqimnaṣ-ṣalāta wa ātīnaz-zakāta wa aṭi‘nallāha wa rasūlah(ū), innamā yurīdullāhu liyużhiba ‘ankumur-rijsa ahlal-baiti wa yuṭahhirakum taṭhīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qarna fee bu yoo tikunna wa laa tabarrajna tabarrujal Jaahiliyyatil oolaa wa aqimnas Salaata w aaateenaz Zakaata wa ati'nal laaha wa Rasoolah; innamaa yureedul laahu liyuzhiba 'ankumur rijsa Ahlal Bayti wa yutahhirakum tatheeraa

ayah.transliteration: Ważkurna mā yutlā fī buyūtikunna min āyātillāhi wal-ḥikmah(ti), innallāha kāna laṭīfan khabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wazkurna maa yutlaa fee bu yootikunna min aayaatil laahi wal Hikmah; innal laaha kaana lateefan Khabeera

ayah.transliteration: Innal-muslimīna wal-muslimāti wal-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti wal-qānitīna wal-qānitāti waṣ-ṣādiqīna waṣ-ṣādiqāti waṣ-ṣābirīna waṣ-ṣābirāti wal-khāsyi‘īna wal-khāsyi‘āti wal-mutaṣaddiqīna wal-mutaṣaddiqāti waṣ-ṣā'imīna waṣ-ṣā'imāti wal-ḥāfiẓīna furūjahum wal-ḥāfiẓāti waż-żākirīnallāha kaṡīraw waż-żākirāti a‘addallāhu lahum magfirataw wa ajran ‘aẓīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal muslimeena wal muslimaati wal mu'mineena wal mu'minaati walqaaniteena walqaanitaati wassaadiqeena wassaadiqaati wassaabireena wassaabiraati walkhaashi'eena walkhaashi'aati walmutasaddiqeena walmutasaddiqaati wassaaa'imeena wassaaa'imaati walhaafizeena furoojahum walhaafizaati waz zaakireenal laaha kaseeranw waz zaakiraati a'addal laahu lahum maghfiratanw wa ajran 'azeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna limu'miniw wa lā mu'minatin iżā qaḍallāhu wa rasūluhū amran ay yakūna lahumul-khiyaratu min amrihim, wa may ya‘ṣillāha wa rasūlahū faqad ḍalla ḍalālam mubīnā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana limu'mininw wa laa mu'minatin izaa qadal laahu wa Rasooluhooo amran ai yakoona lahumul khiyaratu min amrihim; wa mai ya'sil laaha wa Rasoolahoo faqad dalla dalaalam mubeenaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż taqūlu lil-lażī an‘amallāhu ‘alaihi wa an‘amta  ‘alaihi amsik ‘alaika zaujaka wattaqillāha wa tukhfī fī nafsika  mallāhu mubdīhi wa takhsyan-nās(a), wallāhu aḥaqqu an takhsyāh(u), falammā qaḍā zaidum minhā waṭaran zawwajnākahā likai lā yakūna ‘alal-mu'minīna ḥarajun fī azwāji ad‘iyā'ihim iżā qaḍau minhunna waṭarā(n), wa kāna amrullāhi maf‘ūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa iz taqoolu lillazeee an'amal laahu 'alaihi wa an'amta 'alaihi amsik 'alaika zawjaka wattaqil laaha wa tukhfee fee nafsika mal laahu mubdeehi wa takhshan naasa wallaahu ahaqqu an takhshaah; falammaa qadaa Zaidum minhaa wataran zawwajnaa kahaa likay laa yakoona 'alal mu'mineena harajun feee azwaaji ad'iyaaa'ihim izaa qadaw minhunna wataraa; wa kaana amrul laahi af'oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Mā kāna ‘alan-nabiyyi min ḥarajin fīmā faraḍallāhu lah(ū), sunnatallāhi fil-lażīna khalau min qabl(u), wa kāna amrullāhi qadaram maqdūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Maa kaana 'alan nabiyyyi min harajin feemaa faradal laahu lahoo sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qabl; wa kaana amrul laahi qadaram maqdooraa

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yuballigūna risālātillāhi wa yakhsyaunahū wa lā yakhsyauna aḥadan illallāh(a), wa kafā billāhi ḥasībā(n).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yuballighoona Risaalaatil laahi wa yakhshaw nahoo wa laa yakkhshawna ahadan illal laah; wa kafaa billaahi Haseebaa

ayah.transliteration: Mā kāna muḥammadun abā aḥadim mir rijālikum wa lākir rasūlallāhi wa khātaman-nabiyyīn(a), wa kānallāhu bikulli syai'in ‘alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Maa kaana Muhammmadun abaaa ahadim mir rijaalikum wa laakir Rasoolal laahi wa Khaataman Nabiyyeen; wa kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleema

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanużkurullāha żikran kaṡīrā(n),
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanuz kurul laaha zikran kaseera

ayah.transliteration: Wa sabbiḥūhu bukrataw wa aṣīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa sabbihoohu bukratanw wa aseela

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī yuṣallī ‘alaikum wa malā'ikatahū liyukhrijakum minaẓ-ẓulumāti ilan-nūr(i), wa kāna bil-mu'minīna raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee yusallee 'alaikum wa malaaa'ikatuhoo liyukhrijakum minazzulumaati ilan-noor wa kaana bilmu'mineena Raheemaa

ayah.transliteration: Taḥiyyatuhum yauma yalqaunahū salām(un), wa a‘adda lahum ajran karīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Tahiyyatuhum Yawma yalqawnahoo salaamunw wa a'adda lahum ajran kareemaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu innā arsalnāka syāhidaw wa mubasysyiraw wa nażīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa arsalnaaka shaahidanw wa mubashshiranw wa nazeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa dā‘iyan ilallāhi bi'iżnihī wa sirājam munīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa daa'iyan ilal laahi bi iznihee wa siraajam muneeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa basysyiril-mu'minīna bi'anna lahum minallāhi faḍlan kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa bashshiril mu'mineena bi annna lahum minal laahi fadlan kabeera

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tuṭi‘il-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna wa da‘ ażāhum wa tawakkal ‘alallāh(i), wa kafā billāhi wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tuti'il kaafireena walmunaafiqeena wa da'azaahum wa tawakkal 'alallaah; wa kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā nakaḥtumul-mu'mināti ṡumma ṭallaqtumūhunna min qabli an tamassūhunna famā lakum ‘alaihinna min ‘iddatin ta‘taddūnahā, fa matti‘ūhunna wa sarriḥūhunna sarāḥan jamīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa nakahtumul mu'minaati summa tallaqtu moohunna min qabli an tamas soohunna famaa lakum 'alaihinna min 'iddatin ta'taddoonahaa famatti'oohunna wa sarri hoohunna saraahan jameelaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu innā aḥlalnā laka azwājakal-lātī ātaita ujūrahunna wa mā malakat yamīnuka  mimmā afā'allāhu ‘alaika wa banāti ‘ammika wa banāti ‘ammātika wa banāti khālika wa banāti khālātikal-lātī hājarna ma‘ak(a), wamra'atam mu'minatan iw wahabat nafsahā lin-nabiyyi in arādan-nabiyyu ay yastankiḥahā, khāliṣatal laka min dūnil-mu'minīn(a), qad ‘alimnā mā faraḍnā ‘alaihim fī azwājihim wa mā malakat aimānuhum likailā yakūna ‘alaika ḥaraj(un), wa kānallāhu gafūrar raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa ahlalnaa laka azwaa jakal laatee aayaita ujoora hunna wa maa malakat yameenuka mimmaaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaika wa banaati 'ammika wa banaati 'ammaatika wa banaati khaalika wa banaati khaalaa tikal laatee haajarna ma'aka wamra atam mu'minatan inw wahabat nafsahaa lin Nabiyyi in araadan Nabiyyu ai yastan kihahaa khaalisatal laka min doonil mu'mineen; qad 'alim naa maa faradnaa 'alaihim feee azwaajihim wa maa malakat aimaanuhum likailaa yakoona 'alaika haraj; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheema

ayah.transliteration: Turjī man tasyā'u wa tu'wī ilaika man tasyā'(u), wa manibtagaita mimman ‘azalta falā junāḥa ‘alaik(a), żālika adnā an taqarra a‘yunuhunna wa lā yaḥzanna wa yarḍaina bimā ātaitahunna kulluhunn(a), wallāhu ya‘lamu mā fī qulūbikum, wa kānallāhu ‘alīman ḥalīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Turjee man tashaaa'u minhunna wa tu'weee ilaika man tashaaa'u wa manibta ghaita mimman 'azalta falaa junaaha 'alaik; zaalika adnaaa an taqarra a'yunuhunna wa laa yahzanna wa yardaina bimaa aataitahunna kulluhunn; wal laahu ya'lamu maa fee quloo bikum; wa kaanal laahu 'Aleeman haleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Lā yaḥillu lakan-nisā'u mim ba‘du wa lā an tabaddala bihinna min azwājiw wa lau a‘jabaka ḥusnuhunna illā mā malakat yamīnuk(a), wa kānallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'ir raqībā(n).
ayah.translation: Laa yahillu lakan nisaaa'u mim ba'du wa laaa an tabaddala bihinna min azwaajinw wa law ajabaka husnuhunna illaa maa malakat yameenukk; wa kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'ir Raqeeba

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tadkhulū buyūtan-nabiyyi illā ay yu'żana lakum ilā ṭa‘āmin gaira nāẓirīna ināhu wa lākin iżā du‘ītum fadkhulū fa iżā ṭa‘imtum fantasyirū wa lā musta'nisīna liḥadīṡ(in), inna żālikum kāna yu'żin-nabiyya fayastaḥyī minkum, wallāhu lā yastaḥyī minal-ḥaqq(i), wa iżā sa'altumūhunna  matā‘an fas'alūhunna miw warā'i ḥijāb(in), żālikum aṭharu liqulūbikum wa qulūbihinn(a), wa mā kāna lakum an tu'żū rasūlallāhi wa lā an tankiḥū azwājahū mim ba‘dihī abadā(n), inna żālikum kāna ‘indallāhi ‘aẓīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo bu yootan Nabiyyi ilaaa ai yu'zana lakum ilaa ta'aamin ghaira naazireena inaahu wa laakin izaa du'eetum fadkhuloo fa izaa ta'imtum fantashiroo wa laa mustaaniseena lihadees; inna zaalikum kaana yu'zin Nabiyya fa yastahyee minkum wallaahu laa yastahyee minal haqq; wa izaa sa altumoohunna mataa'an fas'aloohunna minw waraaa'i hijaab; zaalikum atharu liquloobikum wa quloobihinn; wa maa kaana lakum an tu'zoo Rasoolal laahi wa laaa an tankihooo azwaajahoo mim ba'diheee abadaa; inna zaalikum kaana 'indal laahi 'azeema

ayah.transliteration: In tubdū syai'an au tukhfūhu fa'innallāha kāna bikulli syai'in ‘alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: In tubdoo shai'an aw tukhfoohu fa innal laaha kaana bikulli shai'in 'Aleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Lā junāḥa ‘alaihinna fī ābā'ihinna wa lā abnā'ihinna wa lā ikhwānihinna wa lā abnā'i ikhwānihinna wa lā abnā'i akhawātihinna wa lā nisā'ihinna wa lā mā malakat aimānuhunn(a), wattaqīnallāh(a), innallāha kāna ‘alā kulli syai'in syahīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Laa junaaha 'alaihinna feee aabaaa'ihinna wa laaa abnaaa'ihinna wa laaa ikhwaanihinnna wa laaa abnaaa'i ikhwaanihinna wa laaa abnaaa'i akhawaatihinna wa laa nisaaa'i hinna wa laa Maa malakat aimaanuhunn; wattaqeenal laah; innal laaha kaana 'alaa kulli shai'in Shaheedaa

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha wa malā'ikatahū yuṣallūna ‘alan-nabiyy(i), yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū ṣallū ‘alaihi wa sallimū taslīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha wa malaaa'i katahoo yusalloona 'alan Nabiyy; yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo salloo 'alaihi wa sallimoo tasleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yu'żūnallāha wa rasūlahū la‘anahumullāhu fid-dun-yā wal-ākhirati wa a‘adda lahum ‘ażābam muhīnā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yu'zoonal laaha wa Rasoolahoo la'anahumul laahu fid dunyaa wal Aakhirati wa a'adda lahum 'azaabam muheenaa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yu'żūnal-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti bigairi maktasabū faqadiḥtamalū buhtānaw wa iṡmam mubīnā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yu'zoonal mu'mineena almu'manaati bighairi mak tasaboo faqadih tamaloo buhtaananw wa ismam mubeenaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu qul li'azwājika wa banātika wa nisā'il-mu'minīna yudnīna ‘alaihinna min jalābībihinn(a), żālika adnā ay yu‘rafna falā yu'żain(a), wa kānallāhu gafūrar raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhan Nabiyyu qul li azwaajika wa banaatika wa nisaaa'il mu'mineena yudneena 'alaihinna min jalaabee bihinn; zaalika adnaaa ai yu'rafna falaa yu'zain; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

ayah.transliteration: La'il lam yantahil-munāfiqūna wal-lażīna fī qulūbihim maraḍuw wal-murjifūna fil-madīnati lanugriyannaka bihim ṡumma lā yujāwirūnaka fīhā illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: La'il lam yantahil munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradunw walmur jifoona fil madeenati lanughri yannaka bihim summa laa yujaawiroonaka feehaaa illaa qaleela

ayah.transliteration: Mal‘ūnīn(a), ainamā ṡuqifū ukhiżū wa quttilū taqtīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Mal'ooneena ainamaa suqifoo ukhizoo wa quttiloo taqteelaa

ayah.transliteration: Sunnatallāhi fil-lażīna khalau min qabl(u), wa lan tajida lisunnatillāhi tabdīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qablu wa lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Yas'alukan-nāsu ‘anis-sā‘ah(ti), qul innamā ‘ilmuhā ‘indallāh(i), wa mā yudrīka la‘allas-sā‘ata takūnu qarībā(n).
ayah.translation: Yas'alukan naasu 'anis Saa'ati qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'indal laah; wa maa yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata takoonu qareebaa

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha la‘anal-kāfirīna wa a‘adda lahum sa‘īrā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha la'anal kaafireena wa a'adda lahum sa'eeraa

ayah.transliteration: Khālidīna fīhā abadā(n), lā yajidūna waliyyaw wa lā naṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Khaalideena feehaaa abadaa, laa yajidoona waliyyanw wa laa naseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Yauma tuqallabu wujūhuhum fin-nāri yaqūlūna yā laitanā aṭa‘nallāha wa aṭa‘nar-rasūlā.
ayah.translation: Yawma tuqallabu wujoohuhum fin Naari yaqooloona yaa laitanaaa ata'nal laaha wa ata'nar Rasoolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū rabbanā innā aṭa‘nā sādatanā wa kubarā'anā fa aḍallūnas-sabīlā.
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo Rabbanaaa innaaa ata'naa saadatanaa wa kubaraaa'anaa fa adalloonas sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Rabbanā ātihim ḍi‘faini minal-‘ażābi wal‘anhum la‘nan kabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Rabbanaaa aatihim di'fai ni minal 'azaabi wal'anhum la nan kabeera

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā takūnū kal-lażīna āżau mūsā fa barra'ahullāhu mimmā qālū, wa kāna ‘indallāhi wajīhā(n).
ayah.translation: yaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo las takoonoo kalla zeena aazaw Moosaa fa barra ahul laahu mimmmaa qaaloo; wa kaana 'indal laahi wajeehaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanuttaqullāha wa qūlū qaulan sadīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha wa qooloo qawlan sadeedaa

ayah.transliteration: Yuṣliḥ lakum a‘mālakum wa yagfir lakum żunūbakum, wa may yuṭi‘illāha wa rasūlahū faqad fāza fauzan ‘aẓīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Yuslih lakum a'maalakum wa yaghfir lakum zunoobakum; wa mai yuti'il laaha wa Rasoolahoo faqad faaza fawzan 'azeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Innā ‘araḍnal-amānata ‘alas-samāwāti wal-arḍi fa abaina ay yaḥmilnahā wa asyfaqna minhā wa ḥamalahal-insān(u), innahū kāna ẓalūman jahūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaa 'aradnal amaanata 'alas samaawaati walardi wal jibaali fa abaina ai yahmil nahaa wa ashfaqna minhaa wa hamalahal insaanu innahoo kaana zalooman jahoolaa

ayah.transliteration: Liyu‘ażżiballāhul-munāfiqīna wal-munāfiqāti wal-musyrikīna wal-musyrikāti wa yatūballāhu ‘alal-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināt(i), wa kānallāhu gafūrar raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Liyu 'azzibal laahul munaafiqeena wal munaafiqaati walmushrikeena wal mushrikaati wa yatoobal laahu 'alal mu'mineena walmu'minaat; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheema

ayah.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī lahū mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi wa lahul-ḥamdu fil-ākhirah(ti), wa huwal-ḥakīmul-khabīr(u).
ayah.translation: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa lahul hamdu fil aakhirah; wa Huwal Hakeemul Khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘lamu mā yaliju fil-arḍi wa mā yakhruju minhā wa mā yanzilu minas-samā'i wa mā ya‘ruju fīhā, wa huwar-raḥīmul-gafūr(u).
ayah.translation: Ya'lamu maa yaliju fil ardi wa maa yakhruju minhaa wa maa yanzilu minas samaaa'i wa maa ya'ruju feehaa; wa Huwar Raheemul Ghafoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū lā ta'tīnas-sā‘ah(tu), qul balā wa rabbī lata'tiyannakum, ‘ālimul-gaib(i), lā ya‘zubu ‘anhu miṡqālu żarratin fis-samāwāti wa lā fil-arḍi wa lā aṣgaru min żālika wa lā akbaru illā fī kitābim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa taateenas Saa'ah; qul balaa wa Rabbee lataatiyannakum 'Aalimul Ghaib; laa ya'zubu 'anhu misqaalu zarratin fis samaawaati wa laa fil ardi wa laaa asgharu min zaalika wa laaa akbaru illaa fee kitaabim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Liyajziyal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāt(i), ulā'ika lahum magfiratuw wa rizqun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Liyajziyal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaat; ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw wa rizqun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna sa‘au fī āyātinā mu‘ājizīna ulā'ika lahum ‘ażābum mir rijzin alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena sa'aw feee aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa 'ika lahum 'azaabum mir irjzin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaral-lażīna ūtul-‘ilmal-lażī unzila ilaika mir rabbika huwal-ḥaqq(a), wa yahdī ilā ṣirāṭil-‘azīzil-ḥamīd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa yaral lazeena utul 'Ilmal lazeee unzila ilaika mir Rabbika huwal haqqa wa yahdeee ilaaa siraatil 'Azeezil Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū hal nadullukum ‘alā rajuliy yunabbi'ukum iżā muzziqtum kulla mumazzaq(in), innakum lafī khalqin jadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo hal nadullukum 'alaa rajuliny yanabbi 'ukum izaa muzziqtum kulla mumazzaqin innakum lafee khalqin jadeed

ayah.transliteration: Aftarā ‘alallāhi każiban am bihī jinnah(tun), balil-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati fil-‘ażābi waḍ-ḍalālil-ba‘īd(i).
ayah.translation: Aftaraa 'alal laahi kaziban am bihee jinnah; balil lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati fil'azaabi waddad laalil ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Afalam yarau ilā mā baina aidīhim wa mā khalfahum minas-samā'i wal-arḍ(i), in nasya' nakhsif bihimul-arḍa au nusqiṭ ‘alaihim kisafam minas-samā'(i), inna fī żālika la'āyatal likulli ‘abdim munīb(in).
ayah.translation: Afalam yaraw ilaa maa baina aydeehim wa maa khalfahum minas samaaa'i wal ard; in nashad nakhsif bihimul arda aw nusqit 'alaihim kisafam minas samaaa'; inna fee zaalika la Aayatal likulli 'abdim muneeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā dāwūda minnā faḍlā(n), yā jibālu awwibī ma‘ahū waṭ-ṭair(a), wa alannā lahul-ḥadīd(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Daawooda minnaa fadlany yaa jibaalu awwibee ma'ahoo wattaira wa alannaa lahul hadeed

ayah.transliteration: Ani‘mal sābigātiw wa qaddir fis-sardi wa‘malū ṣāliḥā(n), innī bimā ta‘malūna baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Ani'mal saabighaatinw wa qaddir fis sardi wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa lisulaimānar-rīḥa guduwwuhā syahruw wa rawāḥuhā syahr(un), wa asalnā lahū ‘ainal-qiṭr(i), wa minal-jinni may ya‘malu baina yadaihi bi'iżni rabbih(ī), wa may yazig minhum ‘an amrinā nużiqhu min ‘ażābis-sa‘īr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa li-Sulaimaanar reeha ghuduwwuhaa shahrunw wa ra-waahuhaa shahrunw wa asalnaa lahoo 'ainal qitr; wa minal jinni mai ya'malu baina yadaihi bi izni Rabbih; wa mai yazigh minhum 'an amrinaa nuziqhu min 'azaabis sa'eer

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘malūna lahū mā yasyā'u mim maḥārība wa tamāṡīla wa jifānin kal-jawābi wa qudūrir-rāsiyāt(in), i‘malū āla dāwūda syukrā(n), wa qalīlum min ‘ibādiyasy-syakūr(u).
ayah.translation: Ya'maloona lahoo ma yashaaa'u mim mahaareeba wa tamaaseela wa jifaanin kaljawaabi wa qudoorir raasiyaat; i'maloo aala Daawooda shukraa; wa qaleelum min 'ibaadiyash shakoor

ayah.transliteration: Falammā qaḍainā ‘alaihil-mauta mā dallahum ‘alā mautihī illā dābbatul-arḍi ta'kulu minsa'atah(ū), falammā kharra tabayyanatil-jinnu allau kānū ya‘lamūnal-gaiba mā labiṡū fil-‘ażābil-muhīn(i).
ayah.translation: Falammaa qadainaa 'alaihil mawta ma dallahum 'alaa mawtiheee illaa daaabbatul ardi taakulu minsa atahoo falammaa kharra tabaiyanatil jinnu al law kaanoo ya'lamoonal ghaiba maa labisoo fil 'azaabil muheen

ayah.transliteration: Laqad kāna lisaba'in fī maskanihim āyah(tun), jannatāni ‘ay yamīniw wa syimāl(in), kulū mir rizqi rabbikum wasykurū lah(ū), baldatun ṭayyibatuw wa rabbun gafūr(un).
ayah.translation: Laqad kaana li Saba-in fee maskanihim Aayatun jannataani 'ai yameeninw wa shimaalin kuloo mir rizq Rabbikum washkuroolah; baldatun taiyibatunw wa Rabbun Ghafoor

ayah.transliteration: Fa a‘raḍū fa arsalnā ‘alaihim sailal-‘arimi wa baddalnāhum bijannataihim jannataini żawātai ukulin khamṭiw wa aṡliw wa syai'im min sidrin qalīl(in).
ayah.translation: Fa-a''radoo fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim Sailal 'Arimi wa baddalnaahum bijannataihim jannataini azwaatai ukulin khamtinw wa aslinw wa shai'im min sidrin qaleel

ayah.transliteration: Żālika jazaināhum bimā kafarū, wa hal nujāzī illal-kafūr(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalika jazainaahum bimaa kafaroo wa hal nujaazeee illal kafoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnā bainahum wa bainal-qural-latī bāraknā fīhā quran ẓāhirataw wa qaddarnā fihas-sair(a), sīrū fīhā layāliya wa ayyāman āminīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaa bainahum wa bainal qural latee baaraknaa feehaa quran zaahiratanw wa qaddamaa feehas sayr; seeroo feehaa la yaalirya wa aiyaaman aamineen

ayah.transliteration: Fa qālū rabbanā bā‘id baina asfārinā wa ẓalamū anfusahum fa ja‘alnāhum aḥādīṡa wa mazzaqnāhum kulla mumazzaq(in), inna fī żālika la'āyātil likulli ṣabbārin syakūr(in).
ayah.translation: Faqaaloo Rabbanaa baa'id baina asfaarinaa wa zalamooo anfusahum faja'alnaahum ahaadeesa wa mazzaq naahum kulla mumazzaq; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ṣaddaqa ‘alaihim iblīsu ẓannahū fattaba‘ūhu illā farīqam minal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad saddaq 'alaihim Ibleesu zannnabhoo fattaba'oohu illaa fareeqam minal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna lahū ‘alaihim min sulṭānin illā lina‘lama may yu'minu bil-ākhirati mimman huwa minhā fī syakk(in), wa rabbuka ‘alā kulli syai'in ḥafīẓ(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana lahoo 'alaihim min sultaanin illaa lina'lama mai yu minu bil Aakhirati mimman huwa minhaa fee shakk; wa Rabbuka 'alaa kulli shai'in Hafeez

ayah.transliteration: Qulid‘ul-lażīna za‘amtum min dūnillāh(i), lā yamlikūna miṡqāla żarratin fis-samāwāti wa lā fil-arḍi wa mā lahum fīhimā min syirkiw wa mā lahū minhum min ẓahīr(in).
ayah.translation: Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona misqaala zarratin fissamaawaati wa laa fil ardi wa maa lahum feehimaa min shirkinw wa maa lahoo minhum min zaheer

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tanfa‘usy-syafā‘atu ‘indahū illā liman ażina lah(ū), ḥattā iżā fuzzi‘a ‘an qulūbihim qālū māżā, qāla rabbukum, qālul-ḥaqq(a), wa huwal-‘aliyyul-kabīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu 'indahooo illaa liman azina lah; hattaaa izaa fuzzi'a 'an quloobihim qaaloo maazaa qaala Rabbukum; qaalul haqq, wa Huwal 'Aliyul Kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Qul may yarzuqukum minas-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), qulillāh(u), wa innā au iyyākum la‘alā hudan au fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Qul mai yarzuqukum minas samaawaati wal ardi qulil laahu wa innaaa aw iyyaakum la'alaa hudan aw fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul lā tus'alūna ‘ammā ajramnā wa lā nus'alu ‘ammā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul laa tus'aloona 'ammaaa ajramnaa wa laa nus'alu 'ammaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Qul yajma‘u bainanā rabbunā ṡumma yaftaḥu bainanā bil-ḥaqq(i), wa huwal-fattāḥul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qul yajma'u bainanaa Rabbunaa summa yaftahu bainanaa bilhaqq; wa Huwal Fattaahul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qul arūniyal-lażīna alḥaqtum bihī syurakā'a kallā, bal huwallāhul-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qul arooniyal lazeena alhaqtum bihee shurakaaa'a kallaa; bal Huwal Laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnāka illā kāffatal lin-nāsi basyīraw wa nażīraw wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaaka illaa kaaffatal linnaasi basheeranw wa nazeeranw wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-wa‘du in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul lakum mī‘ādu yaumil lā tasta'khirūna ‘anhu sā‘ataw wa lā tastaqdimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul lakum mee'aadu Yawmil laa tastaakhiroona 'anhu saa'atanw wa la tastaqdimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū lan nu'mina bihāżal-qur'āni wa lā bil-lażī baina yadaih(i), wa lau tarā iżiẓ-ẓālimūna mauqūfūna ‘inda rabbihim, yarji‘u ba‘ḍuhum ilā ba‘ḍinil-qaul(a), yaqūlul-lażīnastuḍ‘ifū lil-lażīnastakbarū lau lā antum lakunnā mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lan nu'mina bihaazal Quraani wa laa billazee baina yadayh; wa law taraaa iziz zaalimoona mawqoofoona 'inda Rabbihim yarji'u ba'duhum ilaa ba'dinil qawla yaqoolul lazeenas tud'ifoo lillazeenas takbaroo law laaa antum lakunnaa mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Qālal-lażīnastakbarū lil-lażīnastuḍ‘ifū anaḥnu ṣadadnākum ‘anil-hudā ba‘da iż jā'akum bal kuntum mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalal lazeenas takbaroo lillazeenas tud'ifooo anahnu sadadnaakum 'anil hudaa ba'da iz jaaa'akum bal kuntum mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīnastuḍ‘ifū lil-lażīnastakbarū bal makrul-laili wan-nahāri iż ta'murūnanā an nakfura billāhi wa naj‘ala lahū andādā(n), wa asarrun-nadāmata lammā ra'awul-‘ażāb(a), wa ja‘alnal-aglāla fī a‘nāqil-lażīna kafarū, hal yujzauna illā mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeenastud'ifoo lillazeenas takbaroo bal makrul laili wannahaari iz taamuroonanaaa an nakfura billaahi wa naj'ala lahooo andaadaa; wa asarrun nadaamata lammaa ra awul 'azaab; wa ja'alnal aghlaala feee a'naaqil lazeena kafaroo; hal yujzawna illaa maa kanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā arsalnā min qaryatim min nażīrin illā qāla mutrafūhā, innā bimā ursiltum bihī kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa arsalnaa' fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafooaa innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū naḥnu akṡaru amwālaw wa aulādā(n), wa mā naḥnu bimu‘ażżabīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo nahnu aksaru amwaalanw wa awlaadanw wa maa nahnu bimu 'azzabeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul inna rabbī yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u wa yaqdiru wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul inna Rabbee yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdiru wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā amwālukum wa lā aulādukum bil-latī tuqarribukum ‘indanā zulfā illā man āmana wa ‘amila ṣāliḥā(n), fa'ulā'ika lahum jazā'uḍ-ḍi‘fi bimā ‘amilū wa hum fil-gurufāti āminūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa amwaalukum wa laaa awlaadukum billatee tuqarribukum 'indanaa zulfaaa illaa man aamana wa 'amila saalihan fa ulaaa'ika lahum jazaaa'ud di'fi bimaa 'amiloo wa hum fil ghurufaati aaminoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yas‘auna fī āyātinā mu‘ājizīna ulā'ika fil-‘ażābi muḥḍarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yas'awna feee Aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa'ika fil'azaabi muhdaroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul inna rabbī yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u min ‘ibādihī wa yaqdiru lah(ū), wa mā anfaqtum min syai'in fahuwa yukhlifuh(ū), wa huwa khairur-rāziqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul inna Rabbee yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee wa yaqdiru lah; wa maaa anfaqtum min shai'in fahuwa yukhlifuhoo wa Huwa khairur raaziqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yaḥsyuruhum jamī‘an ṡumma yaqūlu lil-malā'ikati ahā'ulā'i iyyākum kānū ya‘budūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yawma yahshuruhum jamee'an summa yaqoolu lilmalaaa'ikati a-haaa'ulaaa'i iyyaakum kaanoo ya'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū subḥānaka anta waliyyunā min dūnihim, bal kānū ya‘budūnal-jinna akṡaruhum bihim mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo Subhaanaka Anta waliyyunaa min doonihim bal kaanoo ya'budoonal jinna aksaruhum bihim mu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Fal-yauma lā yamliku ba‘ḍukum liba‘ḍin naf‘aw wa ḍarrā(n), wa naqūlu lil-lażīna ẓalamū żūqū ‘ażāban-nāril-latī kuntum bihā tukażżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fal Yawma laa yamliku ba'dukum liba'din naf'anw wa laa darraa; wa naqoolu lilzeena zalamoo zooqoo 'azaaban Naaril latee kuntum bihaa tukazziboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā tutlā ‘alaihim āyātunā bayyinātin qālū mā hāżā illā rajuluy yurīdu ay yaṣuddakum ‘ammā kāna ya‘budu ābā'ukum, wa qālū mā hāżā illā ifkum muftarā(n), wa qālal-lażīna kafarū lil-ḥaqqi lammā jā'ahum, in hāżā illā siḥrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaa illaa rajuluny yureedu ai-yasuddakum 'ammaa kaana ya'budu aabaaa'ukum wa qaaloo maa haazaaa illaaa ifkum muftaraa; wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum in haazaaa illaa sihrum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ātaināhum min kutubiy yadrusūnahā wa mā arsalnā ilaihim qablaka min nażīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa aatainaahum min Kutubiny yadrusoonahaa wa maaa arsalnaaa ilaihim qablaka min nazeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa każżabal-lażīna min qablihim, wa mā balagū mi‘syāra mā ātaināhum fakażżabū rusulī, fakaifa kāna nakīr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa kazzabal lazeena min qablihim wa maa balaghoo mi'shaara maaa aatainaahum fakazzaboo Rusulee; fakaifa kaana nakeer

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamā a‘iẓukum biwāḥidah(tin), an taqūmū lillāhi maṡnā wa furādā ṡumma tatafakkarū, mā biṣāḥibikum min jinnah(tin), in huwa illā nażīrul lakum baina yadai ‘ażābin syadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Qul innamaaa a'izukum biwaahidatin an taqoomoo lillaahi masnaa wa furaadaa summa tatafakkaroo; maa bisaahibikum min jinnah; in huwa illaa nazeerul lakum baina yadai 'azaabin shadeed

ayah.transliteration: Qul mā sa'altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum, in ajriya illā ‘alallāh(i), wa huwa ‘alā kulli syai'in syahīd(un).
ayah.translation: Qul maa sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illaa 'alal laahi wa Huwa 'alaa kullin shai-in Shaheed

ayah.transliteration: Qul inna rabbī yaqżifu bil-ḥaqq(i), ‘allāmul-guyūb(i).
ayah.translation: Qul inna Rabbee yaqzifu bilhaqq 'Allaamul Ghuyoob

ayah.transliteration: Qul jā'al-ḥaqqu wa mā yubdi'ul-bāṭilu wa mā yu‘īd(u).
ayah.translation: Qul jaaa'al haqqu wa maa yubdi'ul baatilu wa maa yu'eed

ayah.transliteration: Qul in ḍalaltu fa'innamā aḍillu ‘alā nafsī, wa inihtadaitu  fabimā yūḥī ilayya rabbī, innahū samī‘un qarīb(un).
ayah.translation: Qul in dalaltu fainnamaaa adillu 'alaa nafsee wa inih-tadaitu fabimaa yoohee ilaiya Rabbee; innahoo Samee'un Qareeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau tarā iż fazi‘ū falā fauta wa ukhiżū mim makānin qarīb(in).
ayah.translation: Wa law taraaa iz fazi'oo falaa fawta wa ukhizoo mim makaanin qareeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū āmannā bih(ī), wa annā lahumut-tanāwusyu mim makānim ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa qaloo aamannaa bihee wa annaa lahumut tanaawushu mim makaanim ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wa qad kafarū bihī min qabl(u), wa yaqżifūna bil-gaibi mim makānim ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa qad kafaroo bihee min qablu wa yaqzifoona bilghaibi mim makaanim ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḥīla bainahum wa baina mā yasytahūn(a), kamā fu‘ila bi'asy-yā‘ihim min qabl(u), innahum fī syakkim murīb(in).
ayah.translation: Wa heela bainahum wa baina maa yashtahoona kamaa fu'ila bi-ashyaa'ihim min qabl; innahum kaanoo fee shakkim mureeb

ayah.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi fāṭiris-samāwāti wal-arḍi jā‘ilil-malāikati rusulā(n), ulī ajniḥatim maṡnā wa ṡulāṡa wa rubā‘(a), yazīdu fil-khalqi mā yasyā'(u), innallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Alhamdu lillaahi faatiris samaawaati wal ardi jaa'ilil malaaa'ikati rusulan uleee ajnihatim masnaa wa sulaasa wa rubaa'; yazeedu fil khalqi maa yashaaa'; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Mā yaftaḥillāhu lin-nāsi mir raḥmatin falā mumsika lahā, wa mā yumsik falā mursila lahū mim ba‘dih(ī), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Maa yaftahil laahu linnaaasi mir rahmatin falaa mumsika lahaa wa maa yumsik falaa mursila lahoo mimb'dih; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nāsużkurū ni‘matallāhi ‘alaikum, hal min khāliqin gairullāhi yarzuqukum minas-samā'i wal-arḍ(i), lā ilāha illā huw(a), fa'annā tu'fakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan naasuzkuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum; hal min khaaliqin ghairul laahi yarzuqukum minas samaaa'i wal ard; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa annaa tu'fakoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yukażżibūka faqad kużżibat rusulum min qablik(a), wa ilallāhi turja‘ul-umūr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa iny yukazzibooka faqad kuzzibat Rusulum min qablik; wa ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nāsu inna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqqun falā tagurrannakumul-ḥayātud-dun-yā, wa lā yagurrannakum billāhil-garūr(u).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu inna wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurrannakumul hayaatud dunyaa; wa laa yaghurran nakum billaahil gharoor

ayah.transliteration: Innasy-syaiṭāna lakum ‘aduwwun fattakhiżūhu ‘aduwwā(n), innamā yad‘ū  ḥizbahū liyakūnū min aṣḥābis-sa‘īr(i).
ayah.translation: Innash shaitaana lakum 'aduwwun fattakhizoohu 'aduwwaa; innamaa yad'oo hizbahoo liyakoonoo min ashaabis sa'eer

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna kafarū lahum ‘ażābun syadīd(un), wal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum magfiratuw wa ajrun kabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Allazeena kafaroo lahum 'azaabun shadeed; wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Afaman zuyyina lahū sū'u ‘amalihī fara'āhu ḥasanā(n), fa'innallāha yuḍillu may yasyā'u wa yahdī may yasyā'(u), falā tażhab nafsuka ‘alaihim ḥasarāt(in), innallāha ‘alīmum bimā yaṣna‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee fara aahu hasanaa; fa innal laaha yudillu mai yashaaa'u wa yahdee mai yahaaa'u falaa tazhab nafsuka 'alaihim hasaraat; innal laaha 'aleemun bimaa yasna'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhul-lażī arsalar-riyāḥa fatuṡīru saḥāban fasuqnāhu ilā baladim mayyitin fa'aḥyainā bihil-arḍa ba‘da mautihā, każālikan-nusyūr(u).
ayah.translation: Wallaahul lazeee arsalar riyaaha fatuseeru shaaban fasuqnaahu ilaa baladim maiyitin fa ahyaynaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa; kazaalikan nushoor

ayah.transliteration: Man kāna yurīdul-‘izzata falillāhil-‘izzatu jamī‘ā(n), ilaihi yaṣ‘adul-kalimuṭ-ṭayyibu wal-‘amaluṣ-ṣāliḥu yarfa‘uh(ū), wal-lażīna yamkurūnas-sayyi'āti lahum ‘ażābun syadīd(un), wa makru ulā'ika huwa yabūr(u).
ayah.translation: Man kaana yureedul 'izzata falillaahil 'izzatu jamee'aa; ilaihi yas'adul kalimut taiyibu wal'amalus saalihu yarfa'uh; wallazeena yamkuroonas sayyiaati lahum 'azaabun shadeed; wa makru ulaaa'ika huwa yaboor

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu khalaqakum min turābin ṡumma min nuṭfatin ṡumma ja‘alakum azwājā(n), wa mā taḥmilu min unṡā wa lā taḍa‘u illā bi‘ilmih(ī), wa mā yu‘ammaru mim mu‘ammariw wa lā yunqaṣu min ‘umurihī illā fī kitāb(in), inna żālika ‘alallāhi yasīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa ja'alakum azwaajaa; wa maa tahmilu min unsaa wa laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; wa maa yu'ammaru mim mu'ammarinw wa laa yunqasu min 'umuriheee illaa fee kitaab; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yastawil-baḥrān(i), hāżā ‘ażbun furātun sā'igun syarābuhū wa hāżā milḥun ujāj(un), wa min kullin ta'kulūna laḥman ṭariyyaw wa tastakhrijūna ḥilyatan talbasūnahā, wa taral-fulka fīhi mawākhira litabtagū min faḍlihī wa la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yastawil bahraani haaza 'azbun furaatun saaa'ighun sharaabuhoo wa haazaa milhun ujaaj; wa min kullin taakuloona lahman tariyyanw wa tastakhrijoona hilyatan talbasoonahaa wa taral fulka feehi mawaakhira litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakm tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Yūlijul-laila fin-nahāri wa yūlijun-nahāra fil-lail(i), wa sakhkharasy-syamsa wal-qamara kulluy yajrī li'ajalim musammā(n), żālikumullāhu rabbukum lahul-mulk(u), wal-lażīna tad‘ūna min dūnihī mā yamlikūna min qiṭmīr(in).
ayah.translation: Yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil laili wa sakhkharash shamsa wal qamara kulluny yajree li ajalim musammaa; zaalikumul lahuu Rabbukum lahul mulk; wallazeena tad'oona min doonihee maa yamlikoona min qitmeer

ayah.transliteration: In tad‘ūhum lā yasma‘ū du‘ā'akum, wa lau sami‘ū mastajābū lakum, wa yaumal-qiyāmati yakfurūna bisyirkikum, wa lā yunabbi'uka miṡlu khabīr(in).
ayah.translation: in tad'oohum laa yasma'oo du'aaa'akum wa law sami'oo mas tajaaboo lakum; wa Yawmal Qiyaamati Yakfuroona bishirkikum; wa laa yunabbi'uka mislu khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nāsu antumul-fuqarā'u ilallāh(i), wallāhu huwal-ganiyyul-ḥamīd(u).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyunhan naasu antumul fuqaraaa'u ilallaahi wallaahu Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Iy yasya' yużhibkum wa ya'ti bikhalqin jadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Iny yashaa yuzhibkum wa yaati bikhalqin jadeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā żālika ‘alallāhi bi‘azīz(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa zaalika 'alal laahi bi'azeez

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taziru wāziratuw wizra ukhrā, wa in tad‘u muṡqalatun ilā ḥimlihā lā yuḥmal minhu syai'uw wa lau kāna żā qurbā, innamā tunżirul-lażīna yakhsyauna rabbahum bil-gaibi wa aqāmuṣ-ṣalāh(ta), wa man tazakkā fa innamā yatazakkā linafsih(ī), wa ilallāhil-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taziru waaziratun wizra ukhraa; wa in tad'u musqalatun ilaa himlihaa laa yuhmal minhu shai'unw wa law kaana zaa qurbaa; innamaa tunzirul lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi wa aqaamus Sallah; wa man tazakkaa fa innamaa yatazakkaa linafsih; wa ilal laahil maseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yastawil-a‘mā wal-baṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa maa tastawil a'maa wal baseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa laẓ-ẓulumātu wa lan-nūr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa laz zulumaatu wa lannoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laẓ-ẓillu wa lal-ḥarūr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa laz zillu wa lal haroor
