ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yastawil-aḥyā'u wa lal-amwāt(u), innallāha yusmi‘u may yasyā'(u), wa mā anta bimusmi‘im man fil-qubūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yastawil ahyaaa'u wa lal amwaat; innal laaha yusmi'u mai yashaaa'u wa maaa anta bimusi'im man fil quboor

ayah.transliteration: In anta illā nażīr(un).
ayah.translation: In anta illaa nazeer

ayah.transliteration: Innā arsalnāka bil-ḥaqqi basyīraw wa nażīrā(n), wa im min ummatin illā khalā fīhā nażīr(un).
ayah.translation: Innaa arsalnaak bil haqqi basheeranw wa nazeeraa; wa im min ummatin illaa khalaa feehaa nazeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yukażżibūka faqad każżabal-lażīna min qablihim, jā'athum rusuluhum bil-bayyināti wa biz-zuburi wa bil-kitābil-munīr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa inyukazzibooka faqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati wa biz Zuburi wa bil Kitaabil Muneer

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma akhażtul-lażīna kafarū fakaifa kāna nakīr(i).
ayah.translation: Summa akhaztul lazeena kafaroo fakaifa kaana nakeer

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha anzala minas-samā'i mā'ā(n), fa'akhrajnā bihī ṡamarātim mukhtalifan alwānuhā, wa minal-jibāli judadum bīḍuw wa khumrum mukhtalifun alwānuhā wa garābību sūd(un).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa akhrajnaa bihee samaraatim mukhtalifan alwaanuhaa; wa minal jibaali judadum beedunw wa humrum mukhtalifun alwaanuhaa wa gharaabeebu sood

ayah.transliteration: Wa minan-nāsi wad-dawābbi wal-an‘āmi mukhtalifun alwānuhū każālik(a), innamā yakhsyallāha min ‘ibādihil-ulamā'(u), innallāha ‘azīzun gafūr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa minan naasi wadda waaabbi wal an'aami mukhtalifun alwaanuhoo kazalik; innamaa yakhshal laaha min 'ibaadihil 'ulamaaa'; innal laaha 'Azeezun Ghafoor

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yatlūna kitāballāhi wa aqāmuṣ-ṣalāta wa anfaqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirraw wa ‘alāniyatay yarjūna tijāratal lan tabūr(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yatloona Kitabbal laahi wa aqaamus Salaata wa anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum sirranw wa 'alaa niyatany yarjoona tijaaratal lan taboor

ayah.transliteration: Liyuwaffiyahum ujūrahum wa yazīdahum min faḍlih(ī), innahū gafūrun syakūr(un).
ayah.translation: Liyuwaffiyahum ujoorahum wa yazeedahum min fadlih; innahoo Ghafoorun Shakoor

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażī auḥainā ilaika minal-kitābi huwal-ḥaqqu muṣaddiqal limā baina yadaih(i), innallāha bi‘ibādihī lakhabīrum baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wallaeee awhainaaa ilaika minal Kitaabi huwal haqqu musaddiqal limaa baina yadayh; innal laaha bi'ibaadihee la khabeerum Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma auraṡnal-kitābal-lażīnaṣṭafainā min ‘ibādinā, fa minhum ẓālimul linafsih(ī), wa minhum muqtaṣid(un), wa minhum sābiqum bil-khairāti bi'iżnillāh(i), żālika huwal-faḍlul-kabīr(u).
ayah.translation: Summa awrasnal Kitaaballazeenas tafainaa min 'ibaadinaa faminhum zaalimul linafsihee wa minhum muqtasid, wa minhum saabiqum bilkhairaati bi iznil laah; zaalika huwal fadlul kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Jannātu ‘adniy yadkhulūnahā yuḥallauna fīhā min asāwira min żahabiw wa lu'lu'ā(n), wa libāsuhum fīhā ḥarīr(un).
ayah.translation: jannaatu 'adniny yad khuloonahaa yuhallawna feeha min asaawira min zahabinw wa lu'lu'anw wa libaa suhum feehaa hareer

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālul-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī ażhaba ‘annal-ḥazan(a), inna rabbanā lagafūrun syakūr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalul hamdu lillaahil lazeee azhaba 'annal hazan; inna Rabbanaa la Ghafoorun Shakoor

ayah.transliteration: Allażī aḥallanā dāral-muqāmati min faḍlih(ī), lā yamassunā fīhā naṣabuw wa lā yamassunā fīhā lugūb(un).
ayah.translation: Allazeee ahallanaa daaral muqaamati min fadlihee laa yamassunaa feehaa nasabunw wa laa yamassunaa feehaa lughoob

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna kafarū lahum nāru jahannam(a), lā yuqḍā ‘alaihim fayamūtū wa lā yukhaffafu ‘anhum min ‘ażābihā, każālika najzī kulla kafūr(in).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kafaroo lahum naaru Jahannama laa yuqdaa 'alaihim fa yamootoo wa laa yukhaffafu 'anhum min 'azaabihaa; kazaalika najzee kulla kafoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa hum yaṣṭarikhūna fīhā, rabbanā akhirjnā na‘mal ṣāliḥan gairal-lażī kunnā na‘mal(u), awalam nu‘ammirkum mā yatażakkaru fīhi man tażakkara wa jā'akumun nażīr(u), fa żūqū famā liẓ-ẓālimīna min naṣīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa hum yastarikhoona feehaa Rabbanaa akhrijnaa na'mal saalihan ghairal lazee kunnaa na'mal; awa lamnu 'ammirkum maa yatazak karu feehi man tazakkara wa jaaa'akumun nazeeru fazooqoo famaa lizzaalimeena min naseer

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha ‘ālimu gaibis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), innahū ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha 'aalimu ghaibis samaawaati wal ard; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī ja‘alakum khalā'ifa fil-arḍ(i), faman kafara fa‘alaihi kufruh(ū), wa lā yazīdul-kāfirīna kufruhum ‘inda rabbihim illā maqtā(n), wa lā yazīdul-kāfirīna kufruhum illā khasārā(n).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifa fil ard; faman kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo; wa laa yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum 'inda Rabbihim illaa maqtanw wa la yazeedul kaafireena kufruhum illaa khasaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum syurakā'akumul-lażīna tad‘ūna min dūnillāh(i), arūnī māżā khalaqū minal-arḍi am lahum syirkun fis-samāwāt(i), am ātaināhum kitāban fahum ‘alā bayyinatim minh(u), bal iy ya‘iduẓ-ẓālimūna ba‘ḍuhum ba‘ḍan illā gurūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aytum shurakaaa'a kumul lazeena tad'oona min doonil laah; aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati am aatainaahum Kitaaban fahum 'alaa baiyinatim minh; bal iny ya'iiduz zaalimoona ba 'duhum ba'dan illaa ghurooraa

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha yumsikus-samāwāti wal-arḍa an tazūlā, wa la'in zālatā in amsakahumā min aḥadim mim ba‘dih(ī), innahū kāna ḥalīman gafūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha yumsikus samaawaati wal arda an tazoolaaa; wa la'in zaalataaa in amsa kahumaa min ahadim mim ba'dih; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa aqsamū billāhi jahda aimānihim la'in jā'ahum nażīrul layakūnunna ahdā min iḥdal-umam(i), falammā jā'ahum nażīrum mā zādahum illā nufūrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aymaanihim la'in jaaa'ahum nazeerul layakoonunna ahdaa min ihdal umami falam maa jaaa'ahum nazeerum maa zaadahum illaa nufooraa

ayah.transliteration: Istikbāran fil-arḍi wa makras-sayyi'(i), wa lā yaḥīqul-makrus-sayyi'u illā bi'ahlih(ī), fahal yanẓurūna illā sunnatal-awwalīn(a), falan tajida lisunnatillāhi tabdīlā(n), wa lan tajida lisunnatillāhi taḥwīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Istakbaaran fil ardi wa makras sayyi'; wa laa yaheequl makrus sayyi'u illaa bi ahlih; fahal yanzuroona illaa sunnatal awwaleen; falan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelanw wa lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tahweela

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fa yanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-lażīna min qablihim wa kānū asyadda minhum quwwah(tan), wa mā kānallāhu liyu‘jizahū min syai'in fis-samāwāti wa lā fil-arḍ(i), innahū kāna ‘alīman qadīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qblihim wa kaanoo ashadda minhum quwwah; wa maa kaanal laahu liyu'jizahoo min shai'in fis samaawaati wa laa fil ard; innahoo kaana 'Aleeman Qadeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau yu'ākhiżullāhun-nāsa bimā kasabū mā taraka ‘alā ẓahrihā min dābbatiw wa lākiy yu'akhkhiruhum ilā ajalim musammā(n), fa iżā jā'a ajaluhum fa innallāha kāna bi‘ibādihī baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bima kasaboo maa taraka 'alaa zahrihaa min daaabbatinw wa laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum fa innal laaha kaana bi'ibaadihee Baseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Yā sīn.
ayah.translation: Yaa-Seeen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-qur'ānil-ḥakīm(i).
ayah.translation: Wal-Qur-aanil-Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Innaka laminal-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaka laminal mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: ‘Alā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: 'Alaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlal-‘azīzir-raḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Tanzeelal 'Azeezir Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Litunżira qaumam mā unżira ābā'uhum fahum gāfilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Litunzira qawmam maaa unzira aabaaa'uhum fahum ghaafiloon

ayah.transliteration: Laqad ḥaqqal-qaulu ‘alā akṡarihim fahum lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqad haqqal qawlu 'alaaa aksarihim fahum laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Innā ja‘alnā fī a‘nāqihim aglālan fa hiya ilal-ażqāni fahum muqmaḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa ja'alnaa feee a'naaqihim aghlaalan fahiya ilal azqaani fahum muqmahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnā mim baini aidīhim saddaw wa min khalfihim saddan fa agsyaināhum fahum lā yubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaa mim baini aydeehim saddanw-wa min khalfihim saddan fa aghshai naahum fahum laa yubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa sawā'un ‘alaihim a'anżartahum am lam tunżirhum lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzartahum am lam tunzirhum laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Innamā tunżiru manittaba‘aż-żikra  wa khasyiyar-raḥmāna bil-gaib(i), fa basysyirhu bimagfiratiw wa ajrin karīm(in).
ayah.translation: Innamaa tunziru manit taba 'az-Zikra wa khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaib, fabashshirhu bimaghfiratinw-wa ajrin kareem

ayah.transliteration: Innā naḥnu nuḥyil-mautā wa naktubu mā qaddamū wa āṡārahum, wa kulla syai'in aḥṣaināhu fī imāmim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Innaa Nahnu nuhyil mawtaa wa naktubu maa qaddamoo wa aasaarahum; wa kulla shai'in ahsainaahu feee Imaamim Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Waḍrib lahum maṡalan aṣḥābal-qaryah(ti), iż jā'ahal-mursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wadrib lahum masalan Ashaabal Qaryatih; iz jaaa'ahal mursaloon

ayah.transliteration: Iż arsalnā ilaihimuṡnaini fa każżabūhumā fa ‘azzaznā biṡāliṡin faqālū innā ilaikum mursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz arsalnaaa ilaihimusnaini fakazzaboohumaa fa'azzaznaa bisaalisin faqaalooo innaaa ilaikum mursaloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū mā antum illā basyarum miṡlunā, wa mā anzalar-raḥmānu min syai'(in), in antum illā takżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo maaa antum illaa basharum mislunaa wa maaa anzalar Rahmaanu min shai'in in antum illaa takziboon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū rabbunā ya‘lamu innā ilaikum lamursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo Rabbunaa ya'lamu innaaa ilaikum lamursaloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ‘alainā illal-balāgul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa maa 'alainaaa illal balaaghul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū innā taṭayyarnā bikum, la'il lam tantahū lanarjumannakum wa layamassannakum minnā ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo innaa tataiyarnaa bikum la'il-lam tantahoo lanar jumannakum wa la-yamassan nakum minnaa 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qālū ṭā'irukum ma‘akum, a'in żukkirtum, bal antum qaumum musrifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo taaa'irukum ma'akum; a'in zukkirtum; bal antum qawmum musrifoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'a min aqṣal-madīnati rajuluy yas‘ā qāla yā qaumittabi‘ul-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'a min aqsal madeenati rajuluny yas'aa qaala yaa qawmit tabi'ul mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: Ittabi‘ū mal lā yas'alukum ajraw wa hum muhtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ittabi'oo mal-laa yas'alukum ajranw-wa hum muhtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā liya lā a‘budul-lażī faṭaranī wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa liya laaa a'budul lazee fataranee wa ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: A'attakhiżu min dūnihī ālihatan iy yuridnir-raḥmānu biḍurril lā tugni ‘annī syafā‘atuhum syai'aw wa lā yunqiżūn(i).
ayah.translation: 'A-attakhizu min dooniheee aalihatan iny-yuridnir Rahmaanu bidurril-laa tughni 'annee shafaa 'atuhum shai 'anw-wa laa yunqizoon

ayah.transliteration: Innī iżal lafī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Inneee izal-lafee dalaa-lim-mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Innī  āmantu birabbikum fasma‘ūn(i).
ayah.translation: Inneee aamantu bi Rabbikum fasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qīladkhulil-jannah(ta), qāla yā laita qaumī ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qeelad khulil Jannnah; qaala yaa laita qawmee ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Bimā gafaralī rabbī wa ja‘alanī minal-mukramīn(a).
ayah.translation: Bimaa ghafara lee Rabbee wa ja'alanee minal mukrameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā anzalnā ‘alā qaumihī mim ba‘dihī min jundim minas-samā'i wa mā kunnā munzilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa anzalnaa 'alaa qawmihee mim ba'dihee min jundim minas-samaaa'i wa maa kunnaa munzileen

ayah.transliteration: In kānat illā ṣaiḥataw wāḥidatan fa'iżā hum khāmidūn(a).
ayah.translation: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum khaamidoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ḥasratan ‘alal-‘ibād(i), mā ya'tīhim mir rasūlin illā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaa hasratan 'alal 'ibaad; maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi 'oon

ayah.transliteration: Alam yarau kam ahlaknā qablahum minal-qurūni annahum ilaihim lā yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam yaraw kam ahlak naa qablahum minal qurooni annahum ilaihim laa yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in kullul lammā jamī‘ul ladainā muḥḍarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in kullul lammaa jamee'ul-ladainaa muhdaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa āyatul lahumul-arḍul-maitah(tu), aḥyaināhā wa akhrajnā minhā ḥabban faminhu ya'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Aayatul lahumul ardul maitatu ahyainaahaa wa akhrajnaa minhaa habban faminhu yaakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alnā fīhā jannātim min nakhīliw wa a‘nābiw wa fajjarnā fīhā minal-‘uyūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alnaa feehaa jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naabinw wa fajjarnaa feeha minal 'uyoon

ayah.transliteration: Liya'kulū min ṡamarihī wa mā ‘amilathu aidīhim, afalā yasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Liyaakuloo min samarihee wa maa 'amilat-hu aideehim; afalaa yashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Subḥānal-lażī khalaqal-azwāja kullahā mimmā tumbitul-arḍu wa min anfusihim wa mimmā lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Subhaanal lazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa mimmaa tumbitul ardu wa min anfusihim wa mimmaa laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa āyatul lahumul-lailu naslakhu minhun-nahāra fa'iżā hum muẓlimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Aayatul lahumul lailu naslakhu minhun nahaara fa-izaa hum muzlimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wasy-syamsu tajrī limustaqarril lahā, żālika taqdīrul-‘azīzil-‘alīm(i).
ayah.translation: Wash-shamsu tajree limustaqarril lahaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā ‘āda kal-‘urjūnil-qadīm(i).
ayah.translation: Walqamara qaddarnaahu manaazila hattaa 'aada kal'ur joonil qadeem

ayah.transliteration: Lasy-syamsu yambagī lahā an tudrikal-qamara wa lal-lailu sābiqun-nahār(i), wa kullun fī falakiy yasbaḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lash shamsu yambaghee lahaaa an tudrikal qamara wa lal lailu saabiqun nahaar; wa kullun fee falaki yasbahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa āyatul lahum annā ḥamalnā żurriyyatahum fil-fulkil-masyḥūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa Aayatul lahum annaa hamalnaa zurriyatahum fil fulkil mashhoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa khalaqnā lahum mim miṡlihī mā yarkabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa khalaqnaa lahum mim-mislihee maa yarkaboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa in nasya' nugriqhum falā ṣarīkha lahum wa lā hum yunqażūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in nashaa nughriqhum falaa sareekha lahum wa laa hum yunqazoon

ayah.transliteration: Illā raḥmatam minnā wa matā‘an ilā ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: Illaa rahmatam minnaa wa mataa'an ilaa heen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā qīla lahumuttaqū mā baina aidīkum wa mā khalfakum la‘allakum turḥamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa qeela lahumuttaqoo maa baina aideekum wa maa khalfakum la'allakum turhamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ta'tīhim min āyatim min āyāti rabbihim illā kānū ‘anhā mu‘riḍīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa taateehim min aayatim min ayataati Rabbihim illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā qīla lahum anfiqū mimmā razaqakumullāh(u), qālal-lażīna kafarū lil-lażīna āmanū anuṭ‘imu mal lau yasyā'ullāhu aṭ‘amah(ū), in antum illā fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa qeela lahum anfiqoo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo anut'imu mal-law yashaaa'ul laahu at'amahooo in antum illaa fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-wa‘du in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Mā yanẓurūna illā ṣaiḥataw wāḥidatan ta'khużuhum wa hum yakhiṣṣimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa yanzuroona illaa saihatanw waahidatan taa khuzuhum wa hum yakhissimoon

ayah.transliteration: Falā yastaṭī‘ūna tauṣiyataw wa lā ilā ahlihim yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaa yastatee'oona taw siyatanw-wa laaa ilaaa ahlihim yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri fa'iżā hum minal-ajdāṡi ilā rabbihim yansilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa nufikha fis-soori faizaa hum minal ajdaasi ilaa Rabbihim yansiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā wailanā mam ba‘aṡanā mim marqadinā…hāżā mā wa‘adar-raḥmānu wa ṣadaqal-mursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa wailanaa mam ba'asanaa mim marqadinaa; haaza maa wa'adar Rahmanu wa sadaqal mursaloon

ayah.transliteration: In kānat illā ṣaiḥataw wāḥidatan fa'iżā hum jamī‘ul ladainā muḥḍarūn(a).
ayah.translation: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon

ayah.transliteration: Fal-yauma lā tuẓlamu nafsun syai'aw wa lā tujzauna illā mā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fal-Yawma laa tuzlamu nafsun shai'anw-wa laa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Inna aṣḥābal-jannatil-yauma fī syugulin fākihūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna Ashaabal jannatil Yawma fee shughulin faakihoon

ayah.transliteration: Hum wa azwājuhum fī ẓilālin ‘alal-arā'iki muttaki'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hum wa azwaajuhum fee zilaalin 'alal araaa'iki muttaki'oon

ayah.transliteration: Lahum fīhā fākihatuw wa lahum mā yadda‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lahum feehaa faakiha tunw-wa lahum maa yadda'oon

ayah.transliteration: Salāmun qaulam mir rabbir raḥīm(in).
ayah.translation: Salaamun qawlam mir Rabbir Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wamtāzul-yauma  ayyuhal-mujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wamtaazul Yawma ayyuhal mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Alam a‘had ilaikum yā banī ādama allā ta‘budusy-syaiṭān(a), innahū lakum ‘aduwwum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Alam a'had ilaikum yaa Baneee Aadama al-laa ta'budush Shaitaana innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ani‘budūnī, hāżā ṣirāṭum mustaqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa ani'budoonee; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kaṡīrā(n), afalam takūnū ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad adalla minkum jibillan kaseeraa; afalam takoonoo ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Hāżihī jahannamul-latī kuntum tū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Haazihee Jahannamul latee kuntum too'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Iṣlauhal-yauma bimā kuntum takfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Islawhal Yawma bimaa kuntum takfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Al-yauma nakhtimu ‘alā afwāhihim wa tukallimunā aidīhim wa tasyhadu arjuluhum bimā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Al-Yawma nakhtimu 'alaaa afwaahihim wa tukallimunaaa aideehim wa tashhadu arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau nasyā'u laṭamasnā ‘alā a‘yunihim fastabaquṣ-ṣirāṭa fa annā yubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law nashaaa'u lata masna 'alaaa aiyunihim fasta baqus-siraata fa-annaa yubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau nasyā'u lamasakhnāhum ‘alā makānatihim famastaṭā‘ū muḍiyyaw wa lā yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law nashaaa'u lamasakhnaahum 'alaa makaanatihim famas-tataa'oo mudiyyanw-wa laa yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa man nu‘ammirhu nunakkishu fil-khalq(i), afalā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man nu 'ammirhu nunakkishu fil-khalq; afalaa ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ‘allamnāhusy-syi‘ra wa mā yambagī lah(ū), in huwa illā żikruw wa qur'ānum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maa 'allamnaahush shi'ra wa maa yambaghee lah; in huwa illaa zikrunw-wa Qur-aanum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Liyunżira man kāna ḥayyaw wa yaḥiqqal-qaulu ‘alal-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Liyunzira man kaana haiyanw-wa yahiqqal qawlu 'alal-kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau annā khalaqnā lahum mimmā ‘amilat aidīnā an‘āman fahum lahā mālikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaraw annaa khalaqnaa lahum mimmaa 'amilat aideenaaa an'aaman fahum lahaa maalikoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa żallalnāhā lahum fa minhā rakūbuhum wa minhā ya'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa zallalnaahaa lahum faminhaa rakoobuhum wa minhaa yaakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lahum fīhā manāfi‘u wa masyārib(u), afalā yasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lahum feehaa manaa fi'u wa mashaarib; afalaa yashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wattakhażū min dūnillāhi ālihatal la‘allahum yunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal la'allahum yunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yastaṭī‘ūna naṣrahum, wa hum lahum jundum muḥḍarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yastatee'oona nasrahum wa hum lahum jundum muhdaroon

ayah.transliteration: Falā yaḥzunka qauluhum, innā na‘lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu‘linūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaa yahzunka qawluhum; innaa na'lamu maa yusirroona wa maa yu'linoon

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yaral-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min nuṭfatin fa'iżā huwa khaṣīmum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaral insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min nutfatin fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḍaraba lanā maṡalaw wa nasiya khalqah(ū), qāla may yuḥyil-‘iẓāma wa hiya ramīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa daraba lanaa maslanw-wa nasiya khalqahoo qaala mai-yuhyil'izaama wa hiya rameem

ayah.transliteration: Qul yuḥyīhal-lażī ansya'ahā awwala marrah(tin), wa huwa bikulli khalqin ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qul yuh yeehal lazeee ansha ahaaa awwala marrah; wa Huwa bikulli khalqin 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Allażī ja‘ala lakum minasy-syajaril-akhḍari nārā(n), fa'iżā antum minhu tūqidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazee ja'ala lakum minash shajaril akhdari naaran fa-izaaa antum minhu tooqidoon

ayah.transliteration: Awa laisal-lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin ‘alā ay yakhluqa miṡlahum, balā wa huwal-khallāqul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Awa laisal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda biqaadirin 'alaaa ai-yakhluqa mislahum; balaa wa Huwal Khallaaqul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Innamā amruhū iżā arāda syai'an ay yaqūla lahū kun fa yakūn(u).
ayah.translation: Innamaa amruhooo izaaa araada shai'an ai-yaqoola lahoo kun fa-yakoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa subḥānal-lażī biyadihī malakūtu kulli syai'iw wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa Subhaanal lazee biyadihee malakootu kulli shai-inw-wa ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Waṣ-ṣāffāti ṣaffā(n).
ayah.translation: Wassaaaffaati saffaa

ayah.transliteration: Faz-zājirāti zajrā(n).
ayah.translation: Fazzaajiraati zajraa

ayah.transliteration: Fat-tāliyāti żikrā(n).
ayah.translation: Fattaaliyaati Zikra

ayah.transliteration: Inna ilāhakum lawāḥid(un).
ayah.translation: Inna Illaahakum la Waahid

ayah.transliteration: Rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumā wa rabbul-masyāriq(i).
ayah.translation: Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa Rabbul mashaariq

ayah.transliteration: Innā zayyannas-samā'ad-dun-yā bizīnatinil-kawākib(i).
ayah.translation: Innaa zaiyannas samaaa 'ad dunyaa bizeenatinil kawaakib

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḥifẓam min kulli syaiṭānim mārid(in).
ayah.translation: Wa hifzam min kulli Shaitaanim maarid

ayah.transliteration: Lā yassammā‘ūna ilal-mala'il-a‘lā wa yuqżafūna min kulli jānib(in).
ayah.translation: Laa yassamma 'oona ilal mala il a'alaa wa yuqzafoona min kulli jaanib

ayah.transliteration: Duḥūraw wa lahum ‘ażābuw wāṣib(un).
ayah.translation: Duhooranw wa lahum 'azaabunw waasib

ayah.transliteration: Illā man khaṭifal-khaṭfata fa'atba‘ahū syihābun ṡāqib(un).
ayah.translation: Illaa man khatifal khatfata fa atba'ahoo shihaabun saaqib

ayah.transliteration: Fastaftihim ahum asyaddu khalqan am man khalaqnā, innā khalaqnāhum min ṭīnil lāzib(in).
ayah.translation: Fastaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnaa; innaa khalaqnaahum min teenil laazib

ayah.transliteration: Bal ‘ajibta wa yaskharūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal'ajibta wa yaskharoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā żukkirū lā yażkurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa zukkiroo laa yazkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ra'au āyatay yastaskhirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa ra aw Aayatinw yastaskhiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū in hāżā illā siḥrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalooo in haazaa illaa sihrum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: A'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turābaw wa ‘iẓāman a'innā lamab‘ūṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'ainnaa lamab'oosoon

ayah.transliteration: Awa ābā'unal-awwalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awa aabaa'unal awwaloon

ayah.transliteration: Qul na‘am wa antum dākhirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul na'am wa antum daakhiroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'innamā hiya zajratuw wāḥidatun fa'iżā hum yanẓurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa innamaa hiya zajra tunw waahidatun fa izaa hum yanzuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū yā wailanā hāżā yaumud-dīn(i).
ayah.translation: Qa qaaloo yaa wailanaa haazaa Yawmud-Deen

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā yaumul-faṣlil-lażī kuntum bihī tukażżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Haazaa Yawmul Faslil lazee kuntum bihee tukaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Uḥsyurul-lażīna ẓalamū wa azwājahum wa mā kānū ya‘budūn(a).
ayah.translation: Uhshurul lazeena zalamoo wa azwaajahum wa maa kaanoo ya'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Min dūnillāhi fahdūhum ilā ṣirāṭil-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Min doonil laahi fahdoohum ilaa siraatil Jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Waqifūhum innahum mas'ūlūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qifoohum innahum mas'ooloon

ayah.transliteration: Mā lakum lā tanāṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa lakum laa tanaasaroon

ayah.transliteration: Bal humul-yauma mustaslimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal humul Yawma mustaslimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa aqbala ba‘ḍuhum ‘alā ba‘ḍiy yatasā'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aqbala ba'duhum 'alaa ba'diny yatasaaa'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū innakum kuntum ta'tūnanā ‘anil-yamīn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo innakum kuntum taatoonanaa 'anil yameen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū bal lam takūnū mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo bal lam takoonoo mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna lanā ‘alaikum min sulṭān(in), bal kuntum qauman ṭāgīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana lanaa 'alaikum min sultaanim bal kuntum qawman taagheen

ayah.transliteration: Fa ḥaqqa ‘alainā qaulu rabbinā, innā lażā'iqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fahaqqa 'alainaa qawlu Rabbinaaa innaa lazaaa'iqoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa agwainākum innā kunnā gāwīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa aghwainaakum innaa kunnaa ghaaween

ayah.transliteration: Fa innahum yauma'iżin fil-‘ażābi musytarikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa innahum Yawma'izin fil'azaabi mushtarikoon

ayah.transliteration: Innā każālika naf‘alu bil-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa kazaalika naf'alu bil mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Innahum kānū iżā qīla lahum lā ilāha illallāhu yastakbirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innahum kaanooo izaa qeela lahum laaa ilaaha illal laahu yastakbiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna a'innā latārikū ālihatinā lisyā‘irim majnūn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona a'innaa lataarikooo aalihatinaa lishaa'irim majnoon

ayah.transliteration: Bal jā'a bil-ḥaqqi wa ṣaddaqal-mursalīn(a).
ayah.translation: bal jaaa'a bilhaqqi wa saddaqal mursaleen

ayah.transliteration: Innakum lażā'iqul-‘ażābil-alīm(i).
ayah.translation: Innakum lazaaa'iqul 'azaabil aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā tujzauna illā mā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Illā ‘ibādallāhil-mukhlaṣīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaa 'ibaadal laahil mukhlaseen

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika lahum rizqum ma‘lūm(un).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika lahum rizqum ma'loom

ayah.transliteration: Fawākihu wa hum mukramūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa waakihu wa hum mukramoon

ayah.transliteration: Fī jannātin na‘īm(i).
ayah.translation: Fee jannaatin Na'eem

ayah.transliteration: ‘Alā sururim mutaqābilīn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Alaa sururim mutaqaa bileen

ayah.transliteration: Yuṭāfu ‘alaihim bika'sim mim ma‘īn(in).
ayah.translation: Yutaafu 'alaihim bikaasim mim ma'een

ayah.transliteration: Baiḍā'a lażżatil lisy-syāribīn(a).
ayah.translation: Baidaaa'a laz zatil lish shaaribeen

ayah.transliteration: Lā fīhā gauluw wa lā hum ‘anhā yunzafūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa feehaa ghawlunw wa laa hum 'anhaa yunzafoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘indahum qāṣirātuṭ-ṭarfi ‘īn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa 'indahum qaasiraatut tarfi 'een

ayah.transliteration: Ka'annahum baiḍum maknūn(un).
ayah.translation: Ka annahunna baidum maknoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'aqbala ba‘ḍuhum ‘alā ba‘ḍiy yatasā'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa aqbala ba'duhum 'alaa badiny yatasaaa 'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla qā'ilum minhum innī kāna lī qarīn(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala qaaa'ilum minhum innee kaana lee qareen

ayah.transliteration: Yaqūlu a'innaka laminal-muṣaddiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaqoolu a'innnaka laminal musaddiqeen

ayah.transliteration: A'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turāban a'innā lamadīnūn(a).
ayah.translation: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'ainnaa lamadeenoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla hal antum muṭṭali‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala hal antum muttali'oon

ayah.transliteration: Faṭṭala‘a fa ra'āhu fī sawā'il-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Fattala'a fara aahu fee sawaaa'il Jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla tallāhi in kitta laturdīn(i).
ayah.translation: Qaala tallaahi in kitta laturdeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā ni‘matu rabbī lakuntu minal-muḥḍarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law laa ni'matu Rabbee lakuntu minal muhdareen

ayah.transliteration: Afamā naḥnu bimayyitīn(a).
ayah.translation: Afamaa nahnu bimaiyiteen

ayah.transliteration: Illā mautatunal-ūlā wa mā naḥnu bimu‘ażżabīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illa mawtatanal oola wa maa nahnu bimu'azzabeen

ayah.transliteration: Inna hāżā lahuwal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Inna haazaa falya'ma lil'aamiloon

ayah.transliteration: Limiṡli hāżā falya‘malil-‘āmilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Limisli haaza falya'ma lil 'aamiloon

ayah.transliteration: Ażālika khairun nuzulan am syajaratuz-zaqqūm(i).
ayah.translation: Azaalika khairun nuzulan am shajaratuz Zaqqom

ayah.transliteration: Innā ja‘alnāhā fitnatal liẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa ja'alnaahaa fitnatal lizzaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Innahā syajaratun takhruju fī aṣlil-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Innahaa shajaratun takhruju feee aslil Jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Ṭal‘uhā ka'annahū ru'ūsusy-syayāṭīn(i).
ayah.translation: Tal'uhaa ka annahoo ru'oosush Shayaateen

ayah.transliteration: Fa innahum la'ākilūna minhā fa māli'ūna minhal-buṭūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa innahum la aakiloona minhaa famaali'oona minhal butoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma inna lahum ‘alaihā lasyaubam min ḥamīm(in).
ayah.translation: Summa inna lahum 'alaihaa lashawbam min hameem

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma inna marji‘ahum la'ilal-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Summa inna marji'ahum la ilal Jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Innahum alfau ābā'ahum ḍāllīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innahum alfaw aabaaa'ahum daaalleen

ayah.transliteration: Fahum ‘alā āṡārihim yuhra‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fahum 'alaa aasaarihim yuhra'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ḍalla qablahum akṡarul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad dalla qablahum aksarul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā fīhim munżirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa feehim munzireen

ayah.transliteration: Fanẓur kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-munżarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul munzareen

ayah.transliteration: Illā ‘ibādallāhil-mukhlaṣīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaa 'ibaadal laahil mukhlaseen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad nādānā nūḥun falani‘mal-mujībūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad naadaanaa Noohun falani'mal mujeeboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa hal atāka naba'ul-khaṣm(i), iż tasawwarul-miḥrāb(a).

ayah.transliteration: Iż dakhalū ‘alā dāwūda fafazi‘a minhum qālū lā takhaf, khaṣmāni bagā ba‘ḍunā ‘alā ba‘ḍin faḥkum bainanā bil-ḥaqqi wa lā tusyṭiṭ wahdinā ilā sawā'iṣ-ṣirāṭ(i).

ayah.transliteration: Inna hāżā akhī, lahū tis‘uw wa tis‘ūna na‘jataw wa liya na‘jatuw wāḥidah(tun), faqāla aqfilnīhā wa ‘azzanī fil-khiṭāb(i).

ayah.transliteration: Qāla laqad ẓalamaka bisu'āli na‘jatika ilā ni‘ājih(ī), wa inna kaṡīram minal-khulaṭā'i layabgī ba‘ḍuhum ‘alā ba‘ḍin illal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa qalīlum mā hum, wa ẓanna dāwūdu annamā fatannāhu fastagfara rabbahū wa kharra rāki‘aw wa anāb(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala laqad zalamaka bisu 'aali na'jatika ilaa ni'aajihee wa inna kaseeram minal khulataaa'i la-yabghee ba'duhum 'alaa ba'din illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa qaleehum maa hum; wa zanna Daawoodu annamaa fatannaahu fastaghrara Rabbahoo wa kharra raaki'anw wa anaab

ayah.transliteration: Fa gafarnā lahū żālik(a), wa inna lahū ‘indanā lazulfā wa ḥusna ma'āb(in).
ayah.translation: Faghafarnaa lahoo zaalik; wa inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa wa husna ma aab

ayah.transliteration: Yā dāwūdu innā ja‘alnāka khalīfatan fil-arḍi faḥkum bainan nāsi bil-ḥaqqi wa lā tattabi‘il-hawā fa yuḍillaka ‘an sabīlillāh(i), innal-lażīna yaḍillūna ‘an sabīlillāhi lahum ‘ażābun syadīdum bimā nasū yaumal-ḥisāb(i).
ayah.translation: Yaa Daawoodu innaa ja'alnaaka khaleefatan fil ardi fahkum bainan naasi bilhaqqi wa laa tattabi'il hawaa fayudillaka 'an sabeelil laah; innal lazeena yadilloona 'an sabeelil laah; lahum 'azaabun shadeedum bimaa nasoo Yawmal Hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā khalaqnas-samā'a wal-arḍa wa mā bainahumā bāṭilā(n), żālika ẓannul-lażīna kafarū, fawailul lil-lażīna kafarū minan-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa ma khalaqnas samaaa'a wal arda wa maa bainahumaa baatilaa; zaalika zannul lazeena kafaroo; fawi lul lillazeena kafaroo minan Naar

ayah.transliteration: Am naj‘alul-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti kal-mufsidīna fil-arḍ(i), am naj‘alul-muttaqīna kal-fujjār(i).
ayah.translation: Am naj'alul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati kalmufisdeena fil ardi am naj'alul muttaqeena kalfujjaar

ayah.transliteration: Kitābun anzalnāhu ilaika mubārakul liyaddabbarū āyātihī wa liyatażakkara ulul-albāb(i).
ayah.translation: Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika mubaarakul liyaddabbarooo Aayaatihee wa liyatazakkara ulul albaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa wahabnā lidāwūda wa sulaimān(a), ni‘mal-‘abd(u), innahū awwāb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa wahabnaa li Daawooda Sulaimaan; ni'mal 'abd; innahoo awwaab

ayah.transliteration: Iż ‘uriḍa ‘alaihi bil-‘asyiyyiṣ-ṣāfinātul-jiyād(u).
ayah.translation: Iz 'urida 'alaihi bil'ashiy yis saafinaatul jiyaad

ayah.transliteration: Fa qāla innī aḥbabtu ḥubbal-khairi ‘an żikri rabbī, ḥattā tawārat bil-ḥijāb(i).
ayah.translation: Faqaala inneee ahbabtu hubbal khairi 'an zikri Rabbee hattaa tawaarat bilhijaab

ayah.transliteration: Ruddūhā ‘alayy(a), faṭafiqa masḥam bis-sūqi wal-a‘nāq(i).
ayah.translation: Ruddoohaa 'alaiya fatafiqa masham bissooqi wal a'naaq

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad fatannā sulaimāna wa alqainā ‘alā kursiyyihī jasadan ṡumma anāb(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad fatannaa Sulaimaana wa alqainaa 'alaa kursiyyihee jasadan summa anaab

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbigfir lī wa hab lī mulkal lā yambagī li'aḥadim mim ba‘dī, innaka antal-wahhāb(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbigh fir lee wa hab lee mulkal laa yambaghee li ahadim mim ba'de inaka Antal Wahhab

ayah.transliteration: Fasakhkharnā lahur-rīḥa tajrī bi'amrihī rukhā'an ḥaiṡu aṣāb(a).
ayah.translation: Fasakhkharnaa lahur reeha tajree bi amrihee rukhaaa'an haisu asaab

ayah.transliteration: Wasy-syayāṭīna kulla bannā'iw wa gawwāṣ(in).
ayah.translation: Wash Shayaateena kulla bannaaa'inw wa ghawwaas

ayah.transliteration: Wa ākharīna muqarranīna fil-aṣfād(i).
ayah.translation: Wa aakhareena muqarraneena fil asfaad

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā ‘aṭā'unā famnun au amsik bigairi ḥisāb(in).
ayah.translation: Haazaa 'ataaa'unaa famnun aw amsik bighairi hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna lahū ‘indanā lazulfā wa ḥusna ma'āb(in).
ayah.translation: Wa inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa wa husna ma-aab

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur ‘abdanā ayyūb(a), iż nādā rabbahū annī massaniyasy-syaiṭānu binuṣbiw wa ‘ażāb(in).
ayah.translation: Wazkur 'abdanaaa Ayyoob; iz naada Rabbahooo annee massaniyash Shaitaanu binus binw wa 'azaab

ayah.transliteration: Urkuḍ birijlik(a), hāżā mugtasalum bāriduw wa syarāb(un).
ayah.translation: Urkud birijlika haaza mughtasalum baaridunw wa sharaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa wahabnā lahū ahlahū wa miṡlahum ma‘ahum raḥmatam minnā wa żikrā li'ulil-albāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wa wahabnaa lahoo ahlahoo wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatam minna wa zikraa li ulil albaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa khuż biyadika ḍigṡan faḍrib bihī wa lā taḥnaṡ, innā wajadnāhu ṣābirā(n), ni‘mal-‘abd(u), innahū awwāb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa khuz biyadika dighsan fadrib bihee wa laa tahnas, innaa wajadnaahu saabiraa; ni'mal 'abd; innahooo awwaab

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur ‘ibādanā ibrāhīma wa isḥāqa wa ya‘qūba ulil-aidī wal-abṣār(i).
ayah.translation: Wazkur 'ibaadanaaa Ibraaheema wa Is-haaqa wa Ya'qooba ulil-aydee walabsaar

ayah.transliteration: Innā akhlaṣnāhum bikhāliṣatin żikrad-dār(i).
ayah.translation: Innaaa akhlasnaahum bi khaalisatin zikrad daar

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahum ‘indanā laminal-muṣṭafainal-akhyār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa innahum 'indanaa laminal mustafainal akhyaar

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur ismā‘īla wal-yasa‘a wa żal-kifl(i), wa kullum minal-akhyār(i).
ayah.translation: Wazkur Ismaa'eela wal Yasa'a wa Zal-Kifli wa kullum minal akhyaar

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā żikr(un), wa inna lil-muttaqīna laḥusna ma'āb(in).
ayah.translation: Haazaa zikr; wa inna lilmuttaqeena lahusna ma aab

ayah.transliteration: Jannāti ‘adnim mufattaḥatal lahumul-abwāb(u).
ayah.translation: Jannaati 'adnim mufat tahatal lahumul abwaab

ayah.transliteration: Muttaki'īna fīhā yad‘ūna fīhā bifākihatin kaṡīratiw wa syarāb(in).
ayah.translation: Muttaki'eena feehaa yad'oona feehaa bifaakihatin kaseeratinw wa sharaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘indahum qāṣirātuṭ-ṭarfi atrāb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa 'indahum qaasiraatut tarfi atraab

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā mā tū‘adūna liyaumil-ḥisāb(i).
ayah.translation: Haaza maa too'odoona li Yawmil Hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Ina hāżā larizqunā mā lahū min nafād(in).
ayah.translation: Inna haazaa larizqunaa maa lahoo min nafaad

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā, wa inna liṭ-ṭāgīna lasyarra ma'āb(in).
ayah.translation: Haazaa; wa inna littaagheena lasharra ma-aab

ayah.transliteration: Jahannam(a), yaṣlaunahā, fabi'sal-mihād(u).
ayah.translation: Jahannama yaslawnahaa fai'sal mihaad

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā, falyażūqūhu ḥamīmuw wa gassāq(un).
ayah.translation: Haazaa falyazooqoohu hameemunw wa ghassaaq

ayah.transliteration: Wa ākharu min syaklihī azwāj(un).
ayah.translation: Wa aakharu min shak liheee azwaaj

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā faujum muqtaḥimum ma‘akum, lā marḥabam bihim, innahum ṣālun-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Haazaa fawjum muqtahimum ma'akum laa marhabam bihim; innahum saalun Naar

ayah.transliteration: Qālū bal antum lā marḥabam bikum, antum qaddamtumūhu lanā, fabi'sal-qarār(u).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo bal antum laa marhabam bikum; antum qaddamtumoohu lanaa fabi'sal qaraar

ayah.transliteration: Qālū rabbanā man qaddama lanā hāżā fazidhu ‘ażāban ḍi‘fan fin-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo Rabbanaa man qaddama lanaa haaza fazidhu 'azaaban di'fan fin Naar

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū mā lanā lā narā rijālan kunnā na‘udduhum minal-asyrār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo ma lanaa laa naraa rijaalan kunnaa na'udduhum minal ashraar

ayah.transliteration: Attakhażnāhum sikhriyyan am zāgat ‘anhumul-abṣār(u).
ayah.translation: Attakhaznaahum sikh riyyan am zaaghat 'anhumul absaar

ayah.transliteration: Inna żālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahlin-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Inna zaalika lahaqqun takhaasumu Ahlin Naar

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamā ana munżir(un), wa mā min ilāhin illallāhul-wāḥidul-qahhār(u).
ayah.translation: Qul innamaaa ana munzirunw wa maa min ilaahim illal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar

ayah.transliteration: Rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumal-‘azīzul-gaffār(u).
ayah.translation: Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwa naba'un ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qul huwa naba'un 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Antum ‘anhu mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Antum 'anhu mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Mā kāna liya min ‘ilmim bil-mala'il-a‘lā iż yakhtaṣimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa kaana liya min 'ilmim bilmala il a'laaa iz yakhtasimoon

ayah.transliteration: Iy yūḥā ilayya illā annamā ana nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Iny-yoohaaa ilaiya illaaa annnamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Iż qāla rabbuka lil-malā'ikati innī khāliqum basyaram min ṭīn(in).
ayah.translation: Iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min teen

ayah.transliteration: Fa'iżā sawwaituhū wa nafakhtu fīhi mir rūḥī faqa‘ū lahū sājidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa-iza sawwaituhoo wa nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen

ayah.transliteration: Fasajadal-malā'ikatu kulluhum ajma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Illā iblīs(a), istakbara wa kāna minal-kafirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaaa Iblees; istakbara wa kaana minal kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā iblīsu mā mana‘aka an tasjuda  limā khalaqtu biyadayy(a), astakbarta am kunta minal-‘ālīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaaa Ibleesu maa man'aka an tasjuda limaa khalaqtu biyadai; astakbarta am kunta min 'aaleen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ana khairum minhu khalaqtanī min nāriw wa khalaqtahū min ṭīn(in).
ayah.translation: Qaala ana khairum minah; khalaqtanee min naarinw wa khalaqtahoo min teen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fakhruj minhā fa'innaka rajīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fainnaka rajeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna ‘alaika la‘natī ilā yaumid-dīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa inna 'alaika la'nateee ilaa Yawmid Deen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi fa'anẓirnī ilā yaumi yub‘aṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala Rabbi fa anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fa'innaka minal-munẓarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala fa innaka minal munzareen

ayah.transliteration: Ilā yaumil-waqtil-ma‘lūm(i).
ayah.translation: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fabi‘izzatika la'ugwiyannahum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala fabi'izzatika la ughwiyannahum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Illā ‘ibādaka minhumul-mukhlaṣīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen

ayah.transliteration: Qāla fal-ḥaqq(u), wal-ḥaqqa aqūl(u).
ayah.translation: Qaala falhaqq, walhaqqa aqool

ayah.transliteration: La'amla'anna jahannama minka wa mimman tabi‘aka minhum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: La amla'annna Jahannama minka wa mimman tabi'aka minhum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Qul mā as'alukum ‘alaihi min ajriw wa mā ana minal-mutakallifīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrinw wa maaa ana minal mutakallifeen

ayah.transliteration: In huwa illā żikrul lil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: In huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lata‘lamunna naba'ahū ba‘da ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa lata'lamunna naba ahoo ba'da heen

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlul-kitābi minallāhil-‘azīzil-ḥakīm(i).
ayah.translation: Tanzeelul Kitaabi minal laahil 'Azeezil Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Innā anzalnā ilaikal-kitāba bil-ḥaqqi fa‘budillāha mukhliṣal lahud-dīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaaa anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi fa'budil laaha mukhlisal lahud deen

ayah.transliteration: Alā lillāhid-dīnul-khāliṣ(u), wal-lażīnattakhażū min dūnihī auliyā'(a), mā na‘buduhum illā liyuqarribūnā ilallāhi zulfā, innallāha yaḥkumu bainahum fī mā hum fīhi yakhtalifūn(a), innallāha lā yahdī man huwa kāżibun kaffār(un).
ayah.translation: Alaa lillaahid deenul khaalis; wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a maa na'buduhum illaa liyuqar riboonaaa ilal laahi zulfaa; innal laaha yahkumu baina hum fee maa hum feehi yakhtalifoon; innal laaha laa yahdee man huwa kaazibun kaffaar

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau arādallāhu ay yattakhiża waladal laṣṭafā mimmā yakhluqu mā yasyā'(u), subḥānah(ū), huwallāhul-wāḥidul-qahhār(u).
ayah.translation: Law araadal laahu aiyattakhiza waladal lastafaa mimmaa yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; Subhaanahoo Huwal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar

ayah.transliteration: Khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqq(i), yukawwirul-laila ‘alan-nahāri wa yukawwirun nahāra ‘alal-laili wa sakhkharasy-syamsa wal-qamar(a), kulluy yajrī li'ajalim musammā(n), alā huwal-‘azīzul-gaffār(u).
ayah.translation: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; yukawwirul laila 'alan nahaari wa yukawwirun nahaara 'alaal laili wa sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li ajalim musammaa; alaa Huwal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar

ayah.transliteration: Khalaqakum min nafsiw wāḥidatin ṡumma ja‘ala minhā zaujahā wa anzala lakum minal-an‘āmi ṡamāniyata azwāj(in), yakhluqukum fī buṭūni ummahātikum khalqam mim ba‘di khalqin fī ẓulumātin ṡalāṡ(in), żālikumullāhu rabbukum lahul-mulk(u), lā ilāha illā huw(a), fa'annā tuṣrafūn(a).
ayah.translation: Khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatin summa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa wa anzala lakum minal-an'aami samaani yata azwaaj; yakhuluqukum fee butooni ummahaatikum khalqam mim ba'di khalqin fee zulumaatin salaas; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum lahul mulk; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa annaa tusrafoon

ayah.transliteration: In takfurū fa'innallāha ganiyyun ‘ankum, wa lā yarḍā li‘ibādihil-kufr(a), wa in tasykurū yarḍahu lakum, wa lā taziru wāziratuw wizra ukhrā, ṡumma ilā rabbikum marji‘ukum fa yunabbi'ukum bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a), innahū ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: In takfuroo fa innal laaha ghaniyyun 'ankum; wa laa yardaa li'ibaadihil kufra wa in tashkuroo yardahu lakum; wa laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; summa ilaa Rabikum marji'ukum fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatissudoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā massal-insāna ḍurrun da‘ā rabbahū munīban ilaihi ṡumma iżā khawwalahū ni‘matan minhu nasiya mā kāna yad‘ū ilaihi min qablu wa ja‘ala lilllāhi andādal liyuḍilla ‘an sabīlih(ī), qul tamatta‘ bikufrika qalīlā(n), innaka min aṣḥābin-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa massal insaana durrun da'aa Rabbahoo muneeban ilaihi summa izaa khawwalahoo ni'matam minhu nasiya maa kaana yad'ooo ilaihi min qablu wa ja'ala lillaahi andaadal liyudilla 'ansabeelih; qul tamatta' bikufrika qaleelan innaka min Ashaabin Naar;

ayah.transliteration: Amman huwa qānitun ānā'al-laili sājidaw wa qā'imay yaḥżarul-ākhirata wa yarjū raḥmata rabbih(ī), qul hal yastawil-lażīna ya‘lamūna wal-lażīna lā ya‘lamūn(a), innamā yatażakkaru ulul-albāb(i).
ayah.translation: Amman huwa qaanitun aanaaa'al laili saajidanw wa qaaa'imai yahzarul Aakhirata wa yarjoo rahmata Rabbih; qul hal yastawil lazeena ya'lamoona wallazeena laa ya'lamoon; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab

ayah.transliteration: Qul yā ‘ibādil-lażīna āmanuttaqū rabbakum, lil-lażīna aḥsanū fī hāżihid-dun-yā ḥasanah(tun), wa arḍullāhi wāsi‘ah(tun), innamā yuwaffaṣ-ṣābirūna ajrahum bigairi ḥisāb(in).
ayah.translation: Qul yaa 'ibaadil lazeena aamanut taqoo Rabbakum; lillazeena ahsanoo fee haazihid dunyaa hasanah; wa ardul laahi waasi'ah; innamaa yuwaffas saabiroona ajrahum bighayri hisab

ayah.transliteration: Qul innī umirtu an a‘budallāha mukhliṣal lahud-dīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul inneee umirtu an a'budal laaha mukhlisal lahud deen

ayah.transliteration: Wa umirtu li'an akūna awwalal-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa umirtu li an akoona awwalal muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul innī akhāfu in ‘aṣaitu rabbī ‘ażāba yaumin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Qul inneee akhaafu in 'asaitu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Qulillāha a‘budu mukhliṣal lahū dīnī.
ayah.translation: Qulil laaha a'budu mukhlisal lahoo deenee

ayah.transliteration: Fa‘budū mā syi'tum min dūnih(ī), qul innal-khāsirīnal-lażīna khasirū anfusahum wa ahlīhim yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), alā żālika huwal-khusrānul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Fa'budoo maa shi'tum min doonih; qul innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum wa ahleehim yawmal qiyaamah; alaa zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Lahum min fauqihim ẓulalum minan-nāri wa min taḥtihim ẓulal(un), żālika yukhawwifullāhu bihī ‘ibādah(ū), yā ‘ibādi fattaqūn(i).
ayah.translation: Lahum min fawqihim zulalum minan Naari wa min tahtihim zulal; zaalika yukhaw wiful laahu bihee 'ibaadah; yaa 'ibaadi fattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīnajtanabuṭ-ṭāgūta ay ya‘budūhā wa anābū ilallāhi lahumul-busyrā, fabasysyir ‘ibād(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeenaj tanabut Taaghoota ai ya'budoohaa wa anaabooo ilal laahi lahumul bushraa; fabashshir 'ibaad

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yastami‘ūnal-qaula fa yattabi‘ūna aḥsanah(ū), ulā'ikal-lażīna hadāhumullāhu wa ulā'ika hum ulul-albāb(i).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yastami'oonal qawla fayattabi'oona ahsanah; ulaaa'ikal lazeena hadaahumul laahu wa ulaaa'ika hum ulul albaab

ayah.transliteration: Afaman ḥaqqa ‘alaihi kalimatul-‘ażāb(i), afa'anta tunqiżu man fin-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Afaman haqqa 'alaihi kalimatul 'azaab; afa anta tunqizu man fin Naar

ayah.transliteration: Lākinil-lażīnattaqau rabbahum lahum gurafum min fauqihā gurafum mabniyyah(tun), tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), wa‘dallāh(i), lā yukhlifullāhul-mī‘ād(a).
ayah.translation: Laakinil lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum lahum ghurafum min fawqihaa ghurafum mabniyyatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; wa'dal laah; laa yukhliful laahul mee'aad

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha anzala minas-samā'i mā'an fasalakahū yanābī‘a fil-arḍi ṡumma yaj‘aluhū ḥuṭāmā(n), ina fī żālika lażikrā li'ulil-albāb(i).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasalakahoo yanaabee'a fil ardi summa yukhriju bihee zar'am mukhtalifan alwaanuhoo summa yaheeju fatarahu musfarran summa yaj'aluhoo hutaamaa; inna fee zaalika lazikraa li ulil albaab

ayah.transliteration: Afaman syaraḥallāhu ṣadrahū lil-islāmi fahuwa ‘alā nūrim mir rabbih(ī), fawailul lil-qāsiyati qulūbuhum min żikrillāh(i), ulā'ika fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Afaman sharahal laahu sadrahoo lil Islaami fahuwa 'alaa noorim mir Rabbih; fa wailul lilqaasiyati quloobuhum min zikril laah; ulaaa'ika fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu nazzala aḥsanal-ḥadīṡi kitābam mutasyābiham maṡāniy(a), taqsya‘irru minhu julūdul-lażīna yakhsyauna rabbahum, ṡumma talīnu julūduhum wa qulūbuhum ilā żikrillāh(i), żālika hudallāhi yahdī bihī may yasyā'(u), wa may yuḍlilillāhu famā lahū min hād(in).
ayah.translation: Allahu nazzala ahsanal hadeesi Kitaabam mutashaa biham masaaniy taqsha'irru minhu juloodul lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum summa taleenu julooduhum wa quloo buhum ilaa zikril laah; zaalika hudal laahi yahdee bihee mai yashaaa'; wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad

ayah.transliteration: Afamay yattaqī biwajhihī sū'al-‘ażābi yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), wa qīla liẓ-ẓālimīna żūqū mā kuntum taksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afamai yattaqee biwaj hihee sooo'al 'azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; wa qeela lizzaali meena zooqoo maa kuntum taksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Każżabal-lażīna min qablihim fa'atāhumul-‘ażābu mi ḥaiṡu lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fa ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ażāqahumullāhul-khizya fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa la‘ażābul-ākhirati akbar(u), lau kānū ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa azaaqahumul laahul khizya fil hayaatid dunyaa wa la'azaabul Aakirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ḍarabnā lin-nāsi fī hāżal-qur'āni min kulli maṡalil la‘allahum yatażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Qur-aani min kulli masalil la'allahum yatazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Qur'ānan ‘arabiyyan gaira żī ‘iwajil la‘allahum yattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyan ghaira zee 'iwajil la'allahum yattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Ḍaraballāhu maṡalar rajulan fīhi syurakā'u mutasyākisūna wa rajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawiyāni maṡalā(n), al-ḥamdu lillāh(i), bal akṡaruhum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Darabal laahu masalar rajulan feehi shurakaaa'u mutashaakisoona wa rajulan salamal lirajulin hal tastawi yaani masalaa; alhamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Innaka mayyituw wa innahum mayyitūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaka maiyitunw wa inna hum maiyitunw wa inna hum maiyitoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma innakum yaumal-qiyāmati ‘inda rabbikum takhtaṣimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'inda Rabbikum takhtasimoon

ayah.transliteration: Faman aẓlamu mimman każaba ‘alallāhi wa każżaba biṣ-ṣidqi iż jā'ah(ū), alaisa fī jahannama maṡwal lil-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faman azlamu mimman kazaba 'alal laahi wa kazzaba bissidqi iz jaaa'ah; alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilkaafir

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażī jā'a biṣ-ṣidqi wa ṣaddaqa bihī ulā'ika humul-muttaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazee jaaa'a bissidqi wa saddaqa biheee ulaaa'ika humul muttaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Lahum mā yasyā'ūna ‘inda rabbihim, żālika jazā'ul-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika jazaaa'ul muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Liyukaffirallāhu ‘anhum aswa'al-lażī ‘amilū wa yajziyahum ajrahum bi'aḥsanil-lażī kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Liyukaffiral laahu 'anhum aswa allazee 'amiloo wa yajziyahum ajrahum bi ahsanil lazee kaano ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Alaisallāhu bikāfin ‘abdah(ū), wa yukhawwifūnaka bil-lażīna min dūnih(ī), wa may yuḍlilillāhu famā lahū min hād(in).
ayah.translation: Alaisal laahu bikaafin 'abdahoo wa yukhawwi foonaka billazeena min doonih; wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yahdillāhu famā lahū min muḍill(in), alaisallāhu bi‘azīzin żintiqām(in).
ayah.translation: Wa mai yahdil laahu famalahoo mim mudlil; alai sal laahu bi'azeezin zin tiqaam

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunnallāh(u), qul afara'aitum mā tad‘ūna min dūnillāhi in arādaniyallāhu biḍurrin hal hunna kāsyifātu ḍurrihī au arādanī biraḥmatin hal hunna mumsikātu raḥmatih(ī), qul ḥasbiyallāh(u), ‘alaihi yatawakkalul-mutawakkilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda la yaqoolunal laah; qul afara'aitum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi in araadaniyal laahu bidurrin hal hunna kaashi faatu durriheee aw araadanee birahmatin hal hunna mumsikaatu rahmatih; qul hasbiyal laahu 'alaihi tatawakkalul mutawakkiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qul yā qaumi‘malū ‘alā makānatikum innī ‘āmil(un), fa saufa ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul yaa qawmi'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: May ya'tīhi ‘ażābuy yukhzīhi wa yaḥillu ‘alaihi ‘ażābum muqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Mai yaateehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi wa yahillu 'alaihi 'azaabum muqeem

ayah.transliteration: Innā anzalnā ‘alaikal-kitāba lin-nāsi bil-ḥaqq(i), fa manihtadā fa linafsih(ī), wa man ḍalla fa innamā yaḍillu ‘alaihā, wa mā anta ‘alaihim biwakīl(in).
ayah.translation: Innaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba linnaasi bilhaqq; famanih tadaa falinafsihee wa man dalla fa innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa wa maaa anta 'alaihim biwakeel

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu yatawaffal-anfusa ḥīna mautihā wal-latī lam tamut fī manāmihā, fayumsikul-latī qaḍā ‘alaihal-mauta wa yursilul-ukhrā ilā ajalim musammā(n), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahu yatawaffal anfusa heena mawtihaa wallatee lam tamut fee manaamihaa fa yumsikul latee qadaa 'alaihal mawta wa yursilul ukhraaa ilaaa ajalim musammaa; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqawmai yatafakkarron

ayah.transliteration: Amittakhażū min dūnillāhi syufa‘ā'(a), qul awalau kānū lā yamlikūna syai'aw wa lā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Amit takhazoo min doonillaahi shufa'aaa'; qul awalaw kaanoo laa yamlikoona shai'aw wa laa ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qul lillāhisy-syafā‘atu jamī‘ā(n), lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), ṡumma ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul lillaahish shafaa'atu jamee'aa; lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi summa ilaihi turj'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā żukirallāhu waḥdahusyma'azzat qulūbul-lażīna  lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirah(ti), wa iżā żukiral-lażīna min dūnihī iżā hum yastabsyirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa zukiral laahu wahdahush ma azzat quloobul lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati wa izaa zukiral lazeena min dooniheee izaa hum yastabshiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qulillāhumma fāṭiras-samāwāti wal-arḍi ‘ālimal-gaibi wasy-syahādati anta taḥkumu baina  ‘ibādika fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qulil laahumma faatiras samaawaati wal ardi 'Aalimal Ghaibi washshahaadati Anta tahkumu baina 'ibaadika fee maa kaanoo fee yakhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau anna lil-lażīna ẓalamū mā fil-arḍi jamī‘aw wa miṡlahū ma‘ahū laftadau bihī min sū'il-‘ażābi yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), wa badā lahum minallāhi mā lam yakūnū yaḥtasibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law anna lillazeena zalamoo maa fil ardi jamee'anw wa mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bihee min sooo'il azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; wa badaa lahum minal laahi maa lam yakkoonoo yahtasiboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa badā lahum sayyi'ātu mā kasabū wa ḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa kasaboo wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'iżā massal-insāna ḍurrun da‘ānā ṡumma iżā khawwalnāhu ni‘matam minnā, qāla innamā ūtītuhū ‘alā ‘ilm(in), bal hiya fitnatuw wa lākinna akṡarahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa massal insaana durrun da'aanaa summa izaa khawwalnaahu ni'matam minna qaala innamaaa ootee tuhoo 'alaa 'ilm; bal hiya fitna tunw wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qad qālahal-lażīna min qablihim famā agnā ‘anhum mā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qad qaalahul lazeena min qablihim famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'aṣābahum sayyi'ātu mā kasabū, wal-lażīna ẓalamū min hā'ulā'i sayuṣībuhum  sayyi'ātu mā kasabū, wa mā hum bimu‘jizīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa asaabahum saiyi aatu maa kasaboo; wallazeena zalamoo min haaa'ulaaa'i sa yuzeebuhum saiyi aatu maa kasaboo wa maa hum bimu'jizeen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam ya‘lamū annallāha yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u wa yaqdir(u), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Awalam ya'lamooo annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil liqamai yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul yā ‘ibādiyal-lażīna asrafū ‘alā anfusihim lā taqnaṭū mir raḥmatillāh(i), innallāha yagfiruż-żunūba jamī‘ā(n), innahū huwal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qul yaa'ibaadiyal lazeena asrafoo 'alaaa anfusihim laa taqnatoo mirrahmatil laah; innal laaha yaghfiruz zunooba jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa anībū ilā rabbikum wa aslimū lahū min qabli ay ya'tiyakumul-‘ażābu ṡumma lā tunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aneebooo ilaa Rabbikum wa aslimoo lahoo min qabli ai yaatiyakumul 'azaabu summ laa tunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wattabi‘ū aḥsana mā unzila ilaikum mir rabbikum min qabli ay ya'tiyakumul ‘ażābu bagtataw wa antum lā tasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wattabi'ooo ahsana maaa unzila ilaikum mir Rabbikum min qabli aiyaatiyakumal 'azaabu baghtatanw wa antum laa tash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: An taqūla yā ḥasratā ‘alā mā farraṭṭu fī jambillāhi wa in kuntu laminas-sākhirīn(a).
ayah.translation: An taqoola nafsuny yaahasrataa 'alaa maa farrattu fee jambil laahi wa in kuntu laminas saakhireen

ayah.transliteration: Au taqūla lau annallāha hadānī lakuntu minal-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Aw taqoola law annal laaha hadaanee lakuntu minal muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Au taqūla ḥīna taral-‘ażāba lau anna lī karratan fa akūna minal-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Aw taqoola heena taral 'azaaba law anna lee karratan fa akoona minal muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Balā qad jā'atka āyātī fa każżabta bihā wastakbarta wa kunta minal-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Balaa qad jaaa'atka Asyaatee fakazzabta bihaa wastak barta wa kunta minal kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaumal-qiyāmati taral-lażīna każabū ‘alallāhi wujūhuhum muswaddah(tun), alaisa fī jahannama maṡwal lil-mutakabbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawmal Qiyaamati taral lazeena kazaboo 'alallaahi wujoohuhum muswaddah; alaisa fee Hahannama maswal lilmutakabbireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa yunajjillāhul-lażīnattaqau bimafāzatihim, lā yamassuhumus-sū'u wa lā hum yaḥzanūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yunajjil laahul lazee nat taqaw bimafaazatihim laa yamassuhumus sooo'u wa laa hum uahzanoon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu khāliqu kulli syai'(in), wa huwa ‘alā kulli syai'iw wakīl(un).
ayah.translation: Allaahu khaaliqu kulli shai'inw wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'inw Wakeel

ayah.transliteration: Lahū maqālīdus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wal-lażīna kafarū bi'āyātillāhi ulā'ika humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lahoo maqaaleedus sa maawaati wal ard; wallazeena kafaroo bi ayaatil laahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul afagairallāhi ta'murūnnī a‘budu ayyuhal-jāhilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul afaghairal laahi taamurooonneee a'budu ayyuhal jaahiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ūḥiya ilaika wa ilal-lażīna min qablik(a), la'in asyrakta layaḥbaṭanna ‘amaluka wa latakūnanna minal-khāsirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad oohiya ilaika wa ilal lazeena min qablika la in ashrakta la yahbatanna 'amalu ka wa latakoonanna minal khaasireen

ayah.transliteration: Balillāha fa‘bud wa kum minasy-syākirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Balil laahha fa'bud wa kum minash shaakireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā qadarullāha ḥaqqa qadrih(ī), wal-arḍu jamī‘an qabḍatuhū yaumal-qiyāmati was-samāwātu maṭwiyyātum biyamīnih(ī), subḥānahū wa ta‘ālā ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa qadarul laaha haqqa qadrihee wal ardu jamee 'an qabdatuhoo Yawmal Qiyaamit wassamaawaatu matwiyyaatum biyameenih; Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'amma yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri faṣa‘iqa man fis-samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi illā man syā'allāh(u), ṡumma nufikha fīhi ukhrā fa'iżā hum qiyāmuy yanẓurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa nufikha fis Soori fas'iqa man fis samaawaati wa man fil ardi illaa man shaa'al lahu summa nufikha feehi ukhraa fa izaa hum qiyaamuny yanzuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa asyraqatil-arḍu binūri rabbihā wa wuḍi‘al-kitābu wa jī'a bin-nabiyyīna wasy-syuhadā'i wa quḍiya bainahum bil-ḥaqqi wa hum lā yuẓlamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ashraqatil ardu binoori Rabbihaa wa wudi'al Kitaabu wa jeee'a bin nabiyyeena wash shuhadaaa'i wa qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi wa hum laa yuzlamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa wuffiyat kullu nafsim mā ‘amilat wa huwa a‘lamu bimā yaf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa wuffiyat kullu nafsim maa 'amilat wa Huwa a'lamubimaa yaf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Wasīqal-lażīna kafarū ilā jahannama zumarā(n), ḥattā iżā jā'ūhā futiḥat abwābuhā wa qāla lahum khazanatuhā alam ya'tikum rusulum minkum yatlūna ‘alaikum āyāti rabbikum wa yunżirūnakum liqā'a yaumikum hāżā, qālū balā wa lākin ḥaqqat kalimatul-‘ażābi ‘alal-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa seeqal lazeena kafaroon ilaa jahannama zumaran battaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa futihat abwaabuhaa wa qaala lahum khazanatuhaaa alam yaatikum Rusulum minkum yatloona 'alaikum Aayaati Rabbikum wa yunziroonakum liqaaa'a Yawmikum haazaa; qaaloo balaa wa laakin haqqat kalimatul 'azaabi 'alal kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Qīladkhulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā, fa bi'sa maṡwal-mutakabūbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qeelad khuloo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen

ayah.transliteration: Wasīqal-lażīnattaqau rabbahum ilal-jannati zumarā(n), ḥattā iżā jā'ūhā wa futiḥat abwābuhā wa qāla lahum khazanatuhā salāmun ‘alaikum ṭibtum fadkhulūhā khālidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa seeqal lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum ilal Jannati zumaran hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa wa futihat abwaabuhaa wa qaala lahum khazanatuhaa salaamun 'alaikum tibtum fadkhuloohaa khaalideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālul-ḥamdu lillāhil-lażī ṣadaqanā wa‘dahū wa auraṡanal-arḍa natabawwa'u minal-jannati ḥaiṡu nasyā'(u), fani‘ma ajrul-‘āmilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa waalull hamdulillaahil lazee sadaqanaa wa'dahoo wa awrasanal arda natabaw wa-u minal jannati haisu nashaaa'u fani'ma ajrul 'aamileen

ayah.transliteration: Wa taral-malā'ikata ḥāffīna min ḥaulil-‘arsyi yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim, wa quḍiya bainahum bil-ḥaqqi wa qīlal-ḥamdu lillāhi rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa taral malaaa'ikata haaaffeena min hawlil 'Arshi yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim wa qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi wa qeelal hamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Ḥā mīm.
ayah.translation: Haa-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlul-kitābi minallāhil-‘azīzil-‘alīm(i).
ayah.translation: Tanzeelul Kitaabi minal laahil Azeezil 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Gāfiriż-żambi wa qābilit-taubi syadīdil-‘iqābi żiṭ-ṭaul(i), lā ilāha illā huw(a), ilaihil-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Ghaafiriz zambi wa qaabilit tawbi shadeedil 'iqaabi zit tawli laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa ilaihil maseer

ayah.transliteration: Mā yujādilu fī āyātillāhi illal-lażīna kafarū falā yagrurka taqallubuhum fil-bilād(i).
ayah.translation: Maa yujaadilu feee Aayaatil laahi illal lazeena kafaroo falaa yaghrurka taqallubuhum fil bilaad

ayah.transliteration: Każżabat qablahum qaumu nūḥiw wal-aḥzābu mim ba‘dihim, wa hammat kullu ummatim birasūlihim liya'khużūhu wa jādalū bil-bāṭili liyudḥiḍū bihil-ḥaqqa fa'akhażtuhum, fa kaifa kāna ‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wal Ahzaabu mim ba'dihim wa hammat kullu ummatim bi Rasoolihim liyaa khuzoobhu wa jaadaloo bilbaatili liyudhidoo bihil haqqa fa akhaztuhum fakifa kaana 'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika ḥaqqat kalimatu rabbika ‘alal-lażīna kafarū annahum aṣḥābun-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika 'alal lazeena kafarooo annahum Ashaabun Naar

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yaḥmilūnal-‘arsya wa man ḥaulahū yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim wa yu'minūna bihī wa yastagfirūna lil-lażīna āmanū, rabbanā wasi‘ta kulla syai'ir raḥmataw wa ‘ilman fagfir lil-lażīna tābū wattaba‘ū sabīlaka wa qihim ‘ażābal-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yahmiloonal 'Arsha wa man hawlahoo yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim wa yu'minoona bihee wa yastaghfiroona lillazeena aamanoo Rabbanaa wasi'ta kulla shai'ir rahmantanw wa 'ilman faghfir lillazeena taaboo wattaba'oo sabeelaka wa qihim 'azaabal Jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Rabbanā wa adkhilhum jannāti ‘adninil-latī wa‘attahum wa man ṣalaḥa min ābā'ihim wa azwājihim wa żurriyyātihim, innaka antal ‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Rabbannaa wa adkhilhum Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'attahum wa man salaha min aabaaa'ihim wa azwaajihim wa zurriyyaatihim; innaka Antal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa qihimus-sayyi'āt(i), wa man taqis-sayyi'āti yauma'iżin faqad raḥimtah(ū), wa żālika huwal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa qihimus saiyi-aat; wa man taqis saiyi-aati Yawma'izin faqad rahimtah; wa zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna kafarū yunādauna lamaqtullāhi akbaru mim maqtikum anfusakum iż tad‘ūna ilal-īmāni fatakfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena kafaroo yunaadawna lamaqtul laahi akbaru mim maqtikum anfusakum iz tud'awna ilal eemaani fatakfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū rabbanā amattanaṡnataini wa aḥyaitanaṡnataini fa‘tarafnā biżunūbinā fa hal ilā khurūjim min sabīl(in).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo Rabbanaaa amat tanasnataini wa ahyaitanas nataini fa'tarafnaa bizunoo binaa fahal ilaa khuroojim min sabeel

ayah.transliteration: Żālikum bi'annahū iżā du‘iyallāhu waḥdahū kafartum, wa iy yusyrak bihī tu'minū, fal-ḥukmu lillāhil-‘aliyyil-kabīr(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalikum bi annahooo izaa du'iyal laahu wahdahoo kafartum wa iny yushrak bihee tu'minoo; falhukmu lillaahil 'Aliyyil Kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī yurīkum āyātihī wa yunazzilu lakum minas-samā'i rizqā(n), wa mā yatażakkaru illā may yunīb(u).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee yureekum Aayaatihee wa yunazzilu lakum minas samaaa'i rizqaa; wa maa tatazakkaru illaa mai yuneeb

ayah.transliteration: Fad‘ullāha mukhliṣīna lahud-dīna wa lau karihal-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fad'ul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena wa law karihal kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Rafī‘ud-darajāti żul-‘arsy(i), yulqir-rūḥa min amrihī ‘alā may yasyā'u min ‘ibādihī liyunżira yaumat-talāq(i).
ayah.translation: Rafee'ud darajaati zul 'Arshi yulqir rooha min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee liyunzira yawmat talaaq

ayah.transliteration: Yauma hum bārizūn(a), lā yakhfā ‘alallāhi minhum syai'(un), limanil-mulkul-yaum(a), lillāhil-wāḥidil-qahhār(i).
ayah.translation: Yawma hum baarizoona laa yakhfaa 'alal laahi minhum shai; limanil mulkul Yawma lillaahil Waahidil Qahaar

ayah.transliteration: Al-yauma tujzā kullu nafsim bimā kasabat, lā ẓulmal-yaum(a), innallāha sarī‘ul-ḥisāb(i).
ayah.translation: Al-Yawma tujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat; laa zulmal Yawm; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa anżirhum yaumal-āzifati iżil-qulūbu ladal-ḥanājiri kāẓimīn(a), mā liẓ-ẓālimīna min ḥamīmiw wa lā syafī‘iy yuṭā‘(u).
ayah.translation: Wa anzirhum yawmal aazifati izil quloobu ladal hanaajiri kaazimeen; maa lizzaalimeena min hameeminw wa laa shafee'iny-yutaa'

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘lamu khā'inatal-a‘yuni wa mā tukhfiṣ-ṣudūr(u).
ayah.translation: Ya'lamu khaaa'inatal a'yuni wa maa tukhfis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu yaqḍī bil-ḥaqq(i), wal-lażīna yad‘ūna min dūnihī lā yaqḍūna bisyai'(in), innallāha huwas-samī‘ul-baṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu yaqdee bilhaqq, wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yaqdoona bishai'; innal laaha Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fayanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-lażīna kānū min qablihim, kānū hum asyaddu minhum quwwataw wa āṡāran fil-arḍi fa'akhażahumullāhu biżunūbihim, wa mā kāna lahum minallāhi miw wāq(in).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena kaanoo min qablihim; kaanoo hum ashadda minhum quwwatanw wa aasaaran fil ardi fa akhazahumul laahu bizunoobihim wa maa kaana lahum minal laahi minw waaq

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahum kānat ta'tīhim rusuluhum bil-bayyināti fakafarū fa'akhażahumullāh(u), innahū qawiyyun syadīdul-‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahum kaanat taateehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati fakafaroo fa akhazahumul laah; innahoo qawiyyun shadeedul 'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā mūsā bi'āyātinā wa sulṭānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Ilā fir‘auna wa hāmāna wa qārūna faqālū sāḥirun każżāb(un).
ayah.translation: Ilaa Fir'awna wa Haamaana qa Qaaroona faqaaloo saahirun kazzaab

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'ahum bil-ḥaqqi min ‘indinā qāluqtulū abnā'al-lażīna āmanū ma‘ahū wastaḥyū nisā'ahum, wa mā kaidul-kāfirīna illā fī ḍalāl(in).
ayah.translation: Falamuna jaaa'ahum bil haqqi min 'indinaa qaaluq tulooo abnaaa'al lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo wastahyoo nisaaa'ahum; wa maa kaidul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla fir‘aunu żarūnī aqtul mūsā walyad‘u rabbah(ū), innī akhāfu ay yubaddila dīnakum au ay yuẓhira fil-arḍil-fasād(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Fir'awnu zarooneee aqtul Moosaa walyad'u Rabbahoo inneee akhaafu ai yubaddila deenakum aw ai yuzhira fil ardil fasaad

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla mūsā innī ‘użtu birabbī wa rabbikum min kulli mutakabbiril lā yu'minu biyaumil-ḥisāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Moosaaaa innee 'uztu bi Rabbee wa Rabbikum min kulli mutakabbiril laayu'minu bi Yawmil Hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla rajulum mu'min(um), min āli fir‘auna yaktumu īmānahū ataqtulūna rajulan ay yaqūla rabbiyallāhu wa qad jā'akum bil-bayyināti mir rabbikum, wa iy yaku kāżiban fa ‘alaihi każibuh(ū), wa iy yaku ṣādiqay yuṣibkum ba‘ḍul-lażī ya‘idukum, innallāha lā yahdī man huwa musrifun każżāb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala rajulum mu'minummin Aali Fir'awna yaktumu eemaanahooo ataqtuloona rajulan ai yaqoola Rabbi yal laahu wa qad jaaa'akum bil haiyinaati mir Rabbikum wa iny yaku kaaziban fa'alaihi kazi buhoo wa iny yaku saadiqany yasibkum ba'dul lazee ya'idukum innal laaha laa yahdee man huwa musrifun kaazaab

ayah.transliteration: Yā qaumi lakumul-mulkul-yauma ẓāhirīna fil-arḍ(i), famay yanṣurunā mim ba'sillāhi in jā'anā, qāla fir‘aunu mā urīkum illā mā arā wa mā ahdīkum illā sabīlar-rasyād(i).
ayah.translation: Yaa qawmi lakumul mulkul yawma zaahireena fil ardi famai yansurunaa mim baasil laahi in jaaa'anaa; qaala Fir'awnu maaa ureekum illaa maaa araa wa maaa ahdeekum illaa sabeelar Rashaad

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażī āmana yā qaumi innī akhāfu ‘alaikum miṡla yaumil-aḥzāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazee aamana yaa qawmi inneee akhaafu 'alaikum misla yawmil Ahzaab

ayah.transliteration: Miṡla da'bi qaumi nūḥiw wa ‘ādiw wa ṡamūda wal-lażīna mim ba‘dihim, wa mallāhu yurīdu ẓulmal lil-‘ibād(i).
ayah.translation: Misla daabi qawmi Noohinw wa 'aadinw wa Samooda wallazeena mim ba'dihim; wa mal laahu yureedu zulmal lil'ibaad

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumi innī akhāfu ‘alaikum yaumat-tanād(i).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmi inneee akhaafu 'alaikum yawmat tanaad

ayah.transliteration: Yauma tuwallūna mudbirīn(a), mā lakum minallāhi min ‘āṣim(in), wa may yuḍlilillāhu famā lahū min hād(in).
ayah.translation: Yawma tuwalloona mud bireena maa lakum minal laahi min 'aasim; wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad jā'akum yūsufu min qablu bil-bayyināti famā ziltum fī syakkim mimmā jā'akum bih(ī), ḥattā iżā halaka qultum lay yab‘aṡallāhu mim ba‘dihī rasūlā(n), każālika yuḍillullāhu  man huwa musrifum murtāb(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad jaaa'akum Yoosufu min qablu bil baiyinaati famaa ziltum fee shakkim mimaa jaaa'akum bihee hattaaa izaa halaka qultum lai yab asal laahu mim ba'dihee Rasoolaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu man huwa Musrifum murtaab

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yujādilūna fī āyātillāhi bigairi sulṭānin atāhum, kabura maqtan ‘indallāhi wa ‘indal-lażīna āmanū, każālika yaṭba‘ullāhu ‘alā kulli qalbi mutakabbirin jabbār(in).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yujaadiloona feee Aaayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum kabura maqtan 'indal laahi wa 'indal lazeena aamanoo; kazaalika yatha'ul laahu 'alaa kulli qalbi mutakabbirin jabbaar

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla fir‘aunu yā hāmānubni lī ṣarḥal la‘allī ablugul-asbāb(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Fir'awnu yaa Haamaanub-ni lee sarhal la'alleee ablughul asbaab

ayah.transliteration: Asbābas-samāwāti fa aṭṭali‘a ilā ilāhi mūsā wa innī la'aẓunnuhū kāżibā(n), wa każālika zuyyina lifir‘auna sū'u ‘amalihī wa ṣudda  ‘anis-sabīl(i), wa mā kaidu fir‘auna illā fī tabāb(in).
ayah.translation: Asbaabas samaawaati faattali'a ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa wa innee la azunnuhoo kaazibaa; wa kazaalika zuyyina li-Fir'awna sooo'u 'amalihee wa sudda 'anis sabeel; wa maa kaidu Fir'awna illaa fee tabaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażī āmana yā qaumittabi‘ūni ahdikum sabīlar-rasyād(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeee aamana yaa qawmit tabi'ooni ahdikum sabeelar rashaad

ayah.transliteration: Yā qaumi innamā hāżihil-ḥayātud-dun-yā matā‘(un), wa innal-ākhirata hiya dārul-qarār(i).
ayah.translation: Yaa qawmi innamaa haazihil hayaatud dunyaa mataa'unw wa innal Aakhirata hiya daarul qaraar

ayah.transliteration: Man ‘amila sayyi'atan falā yujzā illā miṡlahā, wa man ‘amila ṣāliḥam min żakarin au unṡā wa huwa mu'minun fa'ulā'ika yadkhulūnal-jannata yurzaqūna fīhā bigairi ḥisāb(in).
ayah.translation: Man 'amila saiyi'atan falaa yujzaaa illaa mislahaa wa man 'amila saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa wa huwa mu'minun fa ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal Jannata yurzaqoona feehaa bighairi hisaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa yā qaumi mā lī ad‘ūkum ilan-najāti wa tad‘ūnanī ilan-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa yaa qawmi maa leee ad'ookum ilan najaati wa tad'oonaneee ilan Naar

ayah.transliteration: Tad‘ūnanī li'akfura billāhi wa usyrika bihī mā laisa lī bihī ‘ilmuw wa ana ad‘ūkum ilal-‘azīzil-gaffār(i).
ayah.translation: Tad'oonanee li-akfura billaahi wa ushrika bihee maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw wa ana ad'ookum ilal'Azeezil Ghaffaar

ayah.transliteration: Lā jarama annamā tad‘ūnanī ilaihi laisa lahū da‘watun fid-dun-yā wa lā fil-ākhirati wa anna maraddanā ilallāhi wa annal-musrifīna hum aṣḥābun-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Laa jarama annamaa tad'oonanee ilaihi laisa lahoo da'watun fid dunyaa wa laa fil Aakhirati wa anna maraddanaaa ilal laahi wa annal musrifeenahum Ashaabun Naar

ayah.transliteration: Fa satażkurūna mā aqūlu lakum, wa ufawwiḍu amrī ilallāh(i), innallāha baṣīrum bil-‘ibād(i).
ayah.translation: Fasatazkuroona maaa aqoolu lakum; wa ufawwidu amreee ilal laah; innallaaha baseerum bil'ibaad

ayah.transliteration: Fa waqāhullāhu sayyi'āti mā makarū wa ḥāqa bi'āli fir‘auna sū'al-‘ażāb(i).
ayah.translation: Fa waqaahul laahu saiyiaati maa makaroo wa haaqa bi Aali-Fir'awna sooo'ul 'azaab

ayah.transliteration: An-nāru yu‘raḍūna ‘alaihā guduwwaw wa ‘asyiyyā(n), wa yauma taqūmus-sā‘ah(tu), adkhilū āla fir‘auna asyaddal-‘ażāb(i).
ayah.translation: An Naaru yu'radoona 'alaihaa ghuduwwanw wa 'ashiyyanw wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'aatu adkhilooo Aala Fir'awna ashaddal 'azaab

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż yataḥājjūna fin-nāri fayaqūluḍ-ḍu‘afā'u lil-lażīnastakbarū innā kunnā lakum taba‘an fahal antum mugnūna ‘annā naṣībam minan-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa iz yatahaaajjoona fin Naari fa-yaqoolud du'afaaa'u lillazeenas takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum taba'an fahal antum mughnoona annaa naseebam minan Naar

ayah.transliteration: Qālal-lażīnastakbarū innā kullun fīhā innallāha qad ḥakama bainal-‘ibād(i).
ayah.translation: Qaalal lazeenas takbarooo innaa kullun feehaaa innal laaha qad hakama baynal'ibaad

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna fin-nāri likhazanati jahannamad‘ū rabbakum yukhaffif ‘annā yaumam minal-‘ażāb(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazena fin Naari likhazanati Jahannamad-'oo Rabbakum yukhaffif 'annaa yawmam minal 'azaab

ayah.transliteration: Qālū awalam taku ta'tīkum rusulukum bil-bayyināt(i), qālū balā, qālū fad‘ū, wa mā du‘ā'ul-kāfirīna illā fī ḍalāl(in).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo awalam taku taateekum Rusulukum bilbaiyinaati qaaloo balaa' qaaloo fad'oo; wa maa du'aaa'ul kaafireena illaa fee dalaal

ayah.transliteration: Innā lananṣuru rusulanā wal-lażīna āmanū fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa yauma yaqūmul-asyhād(u).
ayah.translation: Innaa lanansuru Rusulanaa wallazeena aamanoo fil hayaatid dunyaa wa Yawma yaqoomul ashhaad

ayah.transliteration: Yauma lā yanfa‘uẓ-ẓālimīna ma‘żiratuhum wa lahumul-la‘natu wa lahum sū'ud-dār(i).
ayah.translation: Yawma laa yanfa'uz zaalimeena ma'ziratuhum wa lahumul la'natu wa lahum soooud daar

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-hudā wa auraṡnā banī isrā'īlal-kitāb(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal hudaa wa awrasnaa Baneee Israaa 'eelal Kitaab

ayah.transliteration: Hudaw wa żikrā li'ulil-albāb(i).
ayah.translation: Hudanw wa zikraa li ulil albaab

ayah.transliteration: Faṣbir inna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqquw wastagfir liżambika wa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika bil-‘asyiyyi wal-ibkār(i).
ayah.translation: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wastaghfir lizambika wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika bil'ashiyyi wal ibkaar

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yujādilūna fī āyātillāhi bigairi sulṭānin atāhum, in fī ṣudūrihim illā kibrum mā hum bibāligīh(i), fasta‘iż billāh(i), innahū huwas-samī‘ul-baṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yujaadi loona feee Aayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum in fee sudoorihim illaa kibrum maa hum bibaaligheeh; fasta'iz billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul Baseer
