ayah.transliteration: Lakhalqus-samāwāti wal-arḍi akbaru min khalqin-nāsi wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lakhalqus samaawaati wal ardi akbaru min khalqin naasi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yastawil-a‘mā wal-baṣīr(u), wal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa lal-musī'(u), qalīlam mā tatażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yastawil a'maa walbaseeru wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa lal museee'; qaleelam maa tatazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Innas-sā‘ata la'ātiyatul lā raiba fīhā, wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innas Saa'ata la aatiyatul laa raiba feehaa wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla rabbukumud‘ūnī astajib lakum, innal-lażīna yastakbirūna ‘an ‘ibādatī sayadkhulūna jahannama dākhirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Rabbukumud 'ooneee astajib lakum; innal lazeena yastakbiroona an 'ibaadatee sa yadkhuloona jahannama daakhireen

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī ja‘ala lakumul-laila litaskunū fīhi wan-nahāra mubṣirā(n), innallāha lażū faḍlin ‘alan-nāsi wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā yasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul laila litqaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; innal laaha lazoo fadlin 'alan naasi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa yashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Żālikumullāhu rabbukum khāliqu kulli syai'(in),  lā ilāha illā huw(a), fa'annā tu'fakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum khaaliqu kulli shai'; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa annaa tu'fakoon

ayah.transliteration: Każālika yu'fakul-lażīna kānū bi'āyātillāhi yajḥadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika yu'fakul loazeena kaanoo bi Aayaatil laahi yajhadoon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī ja‘ala lakumul-arḍa qarāraw was-samā'a binā'aw wa ṣawwarakum fa'aḥsana ṣuwarakum wa razaqakum minaṭ-ṭayyibāt(i), żālikumullāhu rabbukum, fatabārakallāhu rabbul-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul arda qaraaranw wassa maaa'a binaaa'anw wa sawwarakum fa ahsana suwarakum wa razaqakum minat taiyibaat; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum fatabaarakal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-ḥayyu lā ilāha illā huwa fad‘ūhu mukhliṣīna lahud-dīn(a), al-ḥamdu lillāhi rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal Hayyu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fad'oohu mukh liseena lahudeen; alhamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Qul innī nuhītu an a‘budal-lażīna tad‘ūna min dūnillāhi lammā jā'aniyal-bayyinātu mir rabbī wa umirtu an uslima lirabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul innee nuheetu an a'budal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi lammaa jaaa'a niyal biyinaatu mir Rabbee wa umirtu an uslima li Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī khalaqakum min turābin ṡumma min nuṭfatin ṡumma min ‘alaqatin ṡumma yukhrijukum ṭiflan ṡumma litablugū asyuddakum ṡumma litakūnū syuyūkhā(n), wa minkum may yutawaffā min qablu wa litablugū ajalam musammaw wa la‘allakum ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa min 'alaqatin summa yukhrijukum tiflan summa litablughooo ashuddakum summa litakoonoo shuyookhaa; wa minkum mai yutawaffaa min qablu wa litablughooo ajalam musam manw-wa la'allakum ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī yuḥyī wa yumīt(u), fa'iżā qaḍā amran fa'innamā yaqūlu lahū kun fa yakūn(u).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu fa izaa qadaaa amran fa innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa yakon

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara ilal-lażīna yujādilūna fī āyātillāh(i), annā yuṣrafūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam tara ilal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatil laahi annaa yusrafoon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna każżabū bil kitābi wa bimā arsalnā bihī rusulanā, fasaufa ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena kazzaboo bil Kitaabi wa bimaa arsalnaa bihee Rusulanaa fasawfa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Iżil-aglālu fī a‘nāqihim was-salāsil(u), yusḥabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Izil aghlaalu feee a'naaqi-him wassalaasilu yashaboon

ayah.transliteration: Fil-ḥamīm(i), ṡumma fin-nāri yusjarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fil hameemi summa fin Naari Yasjaroon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma qīla lahum aina mā kuntum tusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summaa qeela lahum ayna maa kuntum tushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Min dūnillāh(i), qālū ḍallū ‘annā bal lam nakun nad‘ū min qablu syai'ā(n), każālika yuḍillullāhul-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Min doonil laahi qaaloo dalloo 'annaa bal lam nakun nad'oo min qablu shai'aa; kazaalika yudillul laahul kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Żālikum bimā kuntum tafraḥūna fil-arḍi bigairil-ḥaqqi wa bimā kuntum tamraḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalikum bimaa kuntum tafrahoona fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa bimaa kuntum tamrahoon

ayah.transliteration: Udkhlulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā, fabi'sa maṡwal-mutakabūbirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Udkhulooo abwaaba Jahannama khaalideena feehaa fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen

ayah.transliteration: Faṣbir inna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqq(un), fa'immā nuriyannaka ba‘ḍal-lażī  na‘iduhum au natawaffayannaka fa'ilainā yurja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqq; fa immaa nuriyannak ba'dal lazee na'i duhum aw natawaffayannaka fa ilainaa yurja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā rusulam min qablika minhum man qaṣaṣnā ‘alaika wa minhum mal lam naqṣuṣ ‘alaik(a), wa mā kāna lirasūlin ay ya'tiya bi'āyatin illā bi'iżnillāh(i), fa'iżā jā'a amrullāhi quḍiya bil-ḥaqqi wa khasira hunālikal-mubṭilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika minhum man qasasnaa 'alaika wa minhum mal lam naqsus 'alaik; wa maa kaana li Rasoolin any yaatiya bi Aayatin illaa bi iznil laah; fa izaa jaaa'a amrul laahi qudiya bilhaqqi wa khasira hunaalikal mubtiloon

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī ja‘ala lakumul-an‘āma litarkabū minhā wa minhā ta'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul an'aama litarkaboo minhaa wa minhaa taakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lakum fīhā manāfi‘u wa litablugū ‘alaihā ḥājatan fī ṣudūrikum wa ‘alaihā wa ‘alal-fulki tuḥmalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lakum feehaa manaafi'u wa litablughoo 'alaihaa haajatan fee sudoorikum wa 'alaihaa wa 'alal fulki tuhmaloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yurīkum āyātih(ī), fa ayya āyātillāhi tunkirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yureekum Aayaatihee fa ayya Aayaatil laahi tunkiroon

ayah.transliteration: Afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fa yanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-lażīna min qablihim, kānū akṡara minhum wa asyadda quwwataw wa āṡāran fil-arḍi famā agnā ‘anhum mā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanoo aksara minhum wa ashadda quwwatanw wa aasaaran fil ardi famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'athum rusuluhum bil-bayyināti fariḥū bimā ‘indahum minal-‘ilmi wa ḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati farihoo bimaa 'indahum minal 'ilmi wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā ra'au ba'sanā qālū āmannā billāhi waḥdahū wa kafarnā bimā kunnā bihī musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa ra aw baasanaa qaalooo aamannaa billaahi wahdahoo wa kafarnaa bimaa kunnaa bihee mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Falam yaku yanfa‘uhum īmānuhum lammā ra'au ba'sanā, sunnatallāhil latī qad khalat fī ‘ibādih(ī), wa khasira hunālikal-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falam yaku tanfa 'uhum eemaanuhum lammaa ra-aw baasana sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat fee 'ibaadihee wa khasira hunaalikal kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥā mīm.
ayah.translation: Haa Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlum minar-raḥmānir-raḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Tanzeelum Minar-Rahmaanir-Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Kitābun fuṣṣilat āyātuhū qur'ānan ‘arabiyyal liqaumiy ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kitaabun fussilat Aayaatuhoo Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal liqawminy ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Basyīraw wa nażīrā(n), fa'a‘raḍa akṡaruhum fahum lā yasma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Basheeranw wa nazeeran fa-a'rada aksaruhum fahum laa yasma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū qulūbunā fī akinnatim mimmā tad‘ūnā ilaihi wa fī āżāninā waqruw wa mim baininā wa bainika ḥijābun fa‘mal  innanā ‘āmilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo quloobunaa feee akinnatim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi wa feee aazaaninaa waqrunw wa mim baininaa wa bainika bijaabun fa'mal innanaa 'aamiloon

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamā ana basyarum miṡlukum yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhuw wāḥidun fastaqīmū ilaihi wastagfirūh(u), wa wailul lil-musyrikīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum Ilaahunw Waahidun fastaqeemooo ilaihi wastagfirooh; wa wailul lil mushrikeen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna lā yu'tūnaz-zakāta wa hum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena laa yu'toonaz Zakaata wa hum bil-Aakhiratihum kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun gairu mamnūn(in).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul a'innakum latakfurūna bil-lażī khalaqal-arḍa fī yaumaini wa taj‘alūna lahū andādā(n), żālika rabbul-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul a'innakum latakfuroona billazee khalaqal arda fee yawmaini wa taj'aloona lahooo andaadaa; zaalika Rabbul 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘ala fīhā rawāsiya min fauqihā wa bāraka fīhā wa qaddara fīhā aqwātahā fī arba‘ati ayyām(in), sawā'al lis-sā'ilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'ala feehaa rawaa siya min fawqihaa wa baaraka feehaa wa qaddara feehaaaa aqwaatahaa feee arba'ati ayyaamin sawaaa'al lissaaa'ileen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡummastawā ilas-samā'i wa hiya dukhānun faqāla lahā wa lil-arḍi'tiyā ṭau‘an au karhā(n), qālatā atainā ṭā'i‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Summas tawaaa ilas-samaaa'i wa hiya dukhaanun faqaala lahaa wa lil ardi'tiyaaa taw'an aw karhan qaalataaa atainaa taaa'i'een

ayah.transliteration: Fa qaḍāhunna sab‘a samāwātin fī yaumaini wa auḥā fī kulli samā'in amrahā, wa zayyannas-samā'ad-dun-yā bimaṣābīḥa wa ḥifẓā(n), żālika taqdīrul-‘azīzil-‘alīm(i).
ayah.translation: Faqadaahunna sab'a samaawaatin fee yawmaini wa awhaa fee kulli samaaa'in amarahaa; wa zaiyannassa maaa'ad dunyaa bimasaabeeha wa hifzaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Fa in a‘raḍū faqul anżartukum ṣā‘iqatam miṡla ṣā‘iqati ‘ādiw wa ṡamūd(a).
ayah.translation: Fa-in a'radoo faqul anzartukum saa'iqatam misla saa'iqati 'Aadinw wa Samood

ayah.transliteration: Iż jā'athumur-rusulu mim baini aidīhim wa min khalfihim allā ta‘budū illallāh(a), qālū lau syā'a rabbunā la'anzala malā'ikatan fa'innā bimā ursiltum bihī kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz jaaa'at humur Rusulu mim baini aydeehim wa min khalfihim allaa ta'budooo illal laaha qaaloo law shaaa'a Rabunaa la anzala malaaa 'ikatan fa innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammā ‘ādun fastakbarū fil-arḍi bigairil-ḥaqqi wa qālū man asyaddu minnā quwwah(tan), awalam yarau annallāhal-lażī khalaqahum huwa asyaddu minhum quwwah(tan), wa kānū bi'āyātinā yajḥadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa ammaa 'Aadun fastak baroo fil ardi bighairul haqqi wa qaaloo man ashaddu minnaa quwwatan awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqahum Huwa ashaddu minhum quwwatanw wa kaanoo bi Aayaatinaa yajhadoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa arsalnā ‘alaihim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī ayyāmin naḥisātil linużīqahum-‘ażābal khizyi fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa la‘ażābul-ākhirati akhzā wa hum lā yunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran feee ayyaamin nahisaatil linuzeeqahum 'azaabal khizyi fil hayaatid dunyaa wa la'azaabul Aakhirati akhzaa wa hum laa yunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammā ṡamūdu fa hadaināhum fastaḥabbul-‘amā ‘alal-hudā fa akhażathum ṣā‘iqatul-‘ażābil-hūni bimā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ammaa Samoodu fahadinaahum fastahabbul 'ama 'alal huda fa akhazathum saa'iqatul 'azaabil hooni bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa najjainal-lażīna āmanū wa kānū yattaqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa najjainal lazeena aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yuḥsyaru a‘dā'ullāhi ilan-nāri fahum yūza‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yawma yuhsharu a'daaa'ul laahi ilan Naari fahum yooza'oon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā mā jā'ūhā syahida ‘alaihim sam‘uhum wa abṣāruhum wa julūduhum bimā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa maa jaaa'oohaa shahida 'alaihim samu'uhum wa absaaruhum wa julooduhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū lijulūdihim lima syahittum ‘alainā, qālū anṭaqanallāhul-lażī anṭaqa kulla syai'iw wa huwa khalaqakum awwala marrah(tin), wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo lijuloodihim lima shahittum 'alainaa qaaloo antaqanal laahul lazeee antaqa kulla shai'inw wa Huwa khalaqakum awwala marratinw wa ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kuntum tastatirūna ay yasyhada ‘alaikum sam‘ukum wa lā abṣārukum wa lā julūdukum wa lākin ẓanantum  annallāha lā ya‘lamu kaṡīram mimmā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kuntum tastatiroona ai-yashhada 'alaikum sam'ukum wa laaa absaarukum wa laa juloodukum wa laakin zanantum annal laaha laa ya'lamu kaseeram mimmaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa żālikum ẓannukumul-lażī ẓanantum birabbikum ardākum fa aṣbaḥtum minal-khāsirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa zaalikum zannukumul lazee zanantum bi-Rabbikum ardaakum fa asbahtum minal khaasireen

ayah.transliteration: Fa iy yaṣbirū fan-nāru maṡwal lahum, wa iy yasta‘tibū famā hum minal-mu‘tabīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa-iny yasbiroo fan Naaru maswal lahum wa iny-yasta'tiboo famaa hum minal mu'tabeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qayyaḍnā lahum quranā'a fa zayyanū lahum mā baina aidīhim wa mā khalfahum wa ḥaqqa ‘alaihimul-qaulu fī umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal-jinni wal-ins(i), innahum kānū khāsirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaiyadnaa lahum quranaaa'a fazaiyanoo lahum maa baina aideehim wa maa khalfahum wa haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū lā tasma‘ū lihāżal-qur'āni walgau fīhi la‘allakum taglibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa tasma'oo lihaazal Quraani walghaw feehi la'allakum taghlihoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa lanużīqannal-lażīna kafarū ‘ażāban syadīdā(n), wa lanajziyannahum aswa'al-lażī  kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falanuzeeqannal lazeena kafaroo 'azaaban shadeedanw wa lanajziyannahum aswallazee kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Żālika jazā'u a‘dā'illāhin-nāru lahum fīhā dārul-khuld(i), jazā'am bimā kānū bi'āyātinā yajḥadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalika jazaaa'u a'daaa'il laahin Naaru lahum feehaa daarul khuld, jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo bi aayaatinaa yajhdoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū rabbanā arinal-lażaini aḍallānā minal-jinni wal-insi naj‘alhumā taḥta aqdāminā liyakūnā minal-asfalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo Rabbanaaa arinal lazaini adal laanaa minal jinni wal insi naj'alhumaa tahta aqdaaminaa liyakoonaa minal asfaleen

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna qālū rabbunallāhu ṡummastaqāmū tatanazzalu ‘alaihimul-malā'ikatu allā takhāfū wa lā taḥzanū wa absyirū bil-jannatil-latī kuntum tū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo tatanazzalu 'alaihimul malaaa 'ikatu allaa takhaafoo wa laa tahzanoo wa abshiroo bil Jannnatil latee kuntum too'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Naḥnu auliyā'ukum fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā wa fil-ākhirah(ti), wa lakum fīhā mā tasytahī anfusukum wa lakum fīhā mā tadda‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Nahnu awliyaaa'ukum fil hayaatid dunyaa wa fil Aakhirati wa lakum feehaa maa tashtaheee anfusukum wa lakum feehaa ma tadda'oon

ayah.transliteration: Nuzulam min gafūrir raḥīm(in).
ayah.translation: Nuzulam min Ghafoorir Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa man aḥsanu qaulam mimman da‘ā ilallāhi wa ‘amila ṣāliḥaw wa qāla innanī minal-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man ahsanu qawlam mimman da'aaa ilal laahi wa 'amila saalihanw wa qaala innanee minal muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tastawil-ḥasanatu wa las-sayyi'ah(tu), idfa‘ bil-latī hiya aḥsanu fa'iżal-lażī bainaka wa bainahū ‘adāwatun ka'annahū waliyyun ḥamīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tastawil hasanatu wa las saiyi'ah; idfa' billatee hiya ahsanu fa'izal lazee bainaka wa bainahoo 'adaawatun ka'annahoo waliyun hameem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yulaqqāhā illal-lażīna ṣabarū, wa mā yulaqqāhā illā żū ḥaẓẓin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yulaqqaahaaa illal lazeena sabaroo wa maa yulaqqaahaaa illaa zoo hazzin 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa immā yanzagannaka minasy-syaiṭāni nazgun fasta‘iż billāh(i), innahū huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihil-lailu wan-nahāru wasy-syamsu wal-qamar(u), lā tasjudū lisy-syamsi wa lā lil-qamari wasjudū lillāhil-lażī khalaqahunna in kuntum iyyāhu ta‘budūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatihil lailu wannahaaru washshamsu walqamar; laa tasjudoo lishshamsi wa laa lilqamari wasjudoo lillaahil lazee khala qahunna in kuntum iyyaahu ta'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa inistakbarū fal-lażīna ‘inda rabbika yusabbiḥūna lahū bil-laili wan-nahāri wa hum lā yas'amūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa inis-takbaroo fallazee na 'inda Rabbika yusabbihoona lahoo billaili wannnahaari wa hum laa yas'amoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī annaka taral-arḍa khāsyi‘atan fa iżā anzalnā ‘alaihal-mā'ahtazzat wa rabat, innal-lażī aḥyāhā lamuḥyil-mautā, innahū ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatiheee annaka taral arda khaashi'atan fa izaaa anzalna 'alaihal maaa'ah tazzat wa rabat; innal lazeee ahyaahaa lamuhiyil mawtaa; innahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yulḥidūna fī āyātinā lā yakhfauna ‘alainā, afamay yulqā fin-nāri khairun am may ya'tī āminay yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), i‘malū mā syi'tum, innahū bimā ta‘malūna  baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yulhidoona feee Aayaatina laa yakhfawna 'alainaa' afamai yulqaa fin Naari khayrun am mai yaateee aaminai Yawmal Qiyaamah; i'maloo ma shi'tum innahoo bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna kafarū biż-żikri lammā jā'ahum, wa innahū lakitābun ‘azīz(un).
ayah.translation: Inna Lazeena kafaroo biz Zikri lammaa jaa'ahum wa innahoo la Kitaabun 'Azeez

ayah.transliteration: Lā ya'tīhil-bāṭilu mim baini yadaihi wa lā min khalfih(ī), tanzīlum min ḥakīmin ḥamīd(in).
ayah.translation: Laa yaateehil baatilu mim baini yadaihi wa laa min khalfihee tanzeelum min Hakeemin Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Mā yuqālu laka illā mā qad qīla lir-rusuli min qablik(a), inna rabbaka lażū magfiratiw wa żū ‘iqābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Maa yuqaalu laka illaa maa qad qeela lir Rusuli min qablik; inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratinw wa zoo 'iqaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau ja‘alnāhu qur'ānan a‘jamiyyal laqālū lau lā fuṣṣilat āyātuh(ū), a'a‘jamiyyuw wa ‘arabiyy(un), qul huwa lil-lażīna āmanū hudaw wa syifā'(un), wal-lażīna lā yu'minūna fī āżānihim waqruw wa huwa ‘alaihim ‘amā(n), ulā'ika yunādauna mim makānim ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa law ja'alnaahu Qur-aanan A'jamiyyal laqaaloo law laa fussilat Aayaatuhoo 'a A'jamiyyunw wa 'Arabiyy; qul huwa lillazeena aamanoo hudanw wa shifaaa'unw wallazeena la yu'minoona feee aazaanihim waqrunw wa huwa 'alaihim 'amaa; ulaaa'ika yunaadawna mim maakaanim ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba fakhtulifa fīh(i), wa lau lā kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika laquḍiya bainahum, wa innahum lafī syakkim minhu murīb(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa fee; wa lawlaa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika laqudiya bainahum; wa innahum lafee shakkim minhu mureeb

ayah.transliteration: Man ‘amila ṣāliḥan fa linafsih(ī), wa man asā'a fa ‘alaihā, wa mā rabbuka biẓallāmil lil-‘abīd(i).
ayah.translation: Man 'amila salihan falinafshihee wa man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa; wamaa rabbuka bizallaamil lil 'abeed

ayah.transliteration: Ilaihi yuraddu ‘ilmus-sā‘ah(ti), wa mā takhruju min ṡamarātim min akmāmihā wa mā taḥmilu min unṡā wa lā taḍa‘u illā bi‘ilmih(ī), wa yauma yunādīhim aina syurakā'ī, qālū āżannāka mā minnā min syahīd(in).
ayah.translation: Ilaihi yuraddu 'ilmus Saaa'ah; wa maa takhruju min samaraatim min akmaamihaa wa maa tahmilu min unsaa wa laa tada'u illaa bi'ilmih; wa Yawma yunaadeehim aina shurakaaa'ee qaalooo aazannaaka maa minnaa min shaheed

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḍalla ‘anhum mā kānū yad‘ūna min qablu wa ẓannū mā lahum mim maḥīṣ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yad'oona min qablu wa zannoo maa lahum mim mahees

ayah.transliteration: Lā yas'amul-insānu min du‘ā'il-khair(i), wa im massahusy-syarru fa ya'ūsun qanūṭ(un).
ayah.translation: Laa yas'amul insaanu min du'aaa'il khairi wa im massa hush sharru fa ya'oosun qanoot

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in ażaqnāhu raḥmatam minnā mim ba‘di ḍarrā'a massathu layaqūlunna hāżā lī, wa mā aẓunnus-sā‘ata qā'imah(tan), wa la'ir ruji‘tu ilā rabbī inna lī ‘indahū lal-ḥusnā, fa lanunabbi'annal-lażīna kafarū bimā ‘amilū, wa lanużīqannahum min ‘ażābin galīẓ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa la in azaqnaahu rahmatam minnaa mim ba'di dar raaa'a massat hu la yaqoolanna haazaa lee wa maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw wa la'in ruji'tu ilaa Rabbeee inna lee 'indahoo lalhusnaa; falanu nabbi'annal lazeena kafaroo bimaa 'amiloo wa lanuzeeqan nahum min 'azaabin ghaleez

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā an‘amnā ‘alal-insāni a‘raḍa wa na'ā bijānibih(ī), wa iżā massahusy-syarru fażū du‘ā'in ‘arīḍ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada wa na-aa bijaani bihee wa izaa massahush sharru fazoo du'aaa'in 'areed

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum in kāna min ‘indillāhi ṡumma kafartum bihī man aḍallu mimman huwa fī syiqāqim ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Qul araiaitum in kaana min 'indil laahi summa kafar tum bihee man adallu mimman huwa fee shiqaqim ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Sanurīhim āyātinā fil-āfāqi wa fī anfusihim ḥattā yatabayyana lahum annahul-ḥaqq(u), awalam yakfi birabbika  annahū ‘alā kulli syai'in syahīd(un).
ayah.translation: Sanureehim Aayaatinaa fil aafaaqi wa feee anfusihim hattaa yatabaiyana lahum annahul haqq; awa lam yakfi bi Rabbika annahoo 'alaa kulli shai-in Shaheed

ayah.transliteration: Alā innahum fī miryatim mil liqā'i rabbihim, alā innahū bikulli syai'im muḥīṭ(un).
ayah.translation: Alaaa innahum fee miryatim mil liqaaa'i Rabbihim; alaaa innahoo bikulli shai'im muheet

ayah.transliteration: Ḥā mīm.
ayah.translation: Haa Meeem

ayah.transliteration: ‘Ain sīn qāf.
ayah.translation: 'Ayyyn Seeen Qaaaf

ayah.transliteration: Każālika yūḥī ilaika wa ilal-lażīna min qablik(a), allāhul-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika yooheee ilaika wa ilal lazeena min qablikal laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Lahū mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), wa huwal-‘aliyyul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Lahoo maa fis samaa waati wa maa fil ardi wa Huwal 'Aliyul 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Takādus-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min fauqihinna wal-malā'ikatu yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim wa yastagfirūna liman fil-arḍ(i), alā innallāha huwal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna min fawqihinn; walmalaaa'ikatu yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim wa yastaghfiroona liman fil ard; alaaa innal laaha huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīnattakhażū min dūnihī auliyā'allāhu ḥafīẓun ‘alaihim, wa mā anta ‘alaihim biwakīl(in).
ayah.translation: Wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'al laahu hafeezun 'alaihim wa maaa anta 'alaihim biwakeel

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika auḥainā ilaika qur'ānan ‘arabiyyal litunżira ummal-qurā wa man ḥaulahā wa tunżira yaumal-jam‘i lā raiba fīh(i), farīqun fil-jannati wa farīqun fis-sa‘īr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika awhainaaa llaika Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal litunzir aUmmal Quraa wa man hawlahaa wa tunzira Yawmal Jam'ilaa raiba feeh; fareequn fil jannati wa fareequn fissa'eer

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau syā'allāhu laja‘alahum ummataw wāḥidataw wa lākiy yudkhilu may yasyā'u fī raḥmatih(ī), waẓ-ẓālimūna mā lahum miw waliyyiw wa lā naṣīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa law shaaa'al laahu laja'alahum ummatanw waahi datanw walaakiny yudkhilumany yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; waz zaalimoona maa lahum minw waliyyinw wa laa naseer

ayah.transliteration: Amittakhażū min dūnihī auliyā'(a), fallāhu huwal-waliyyu wa huwa yuḥyil-mautā, wa huwa ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Amit takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a fallaahu Huwal Waliyyu wa Huwa yuhyil mawtaa wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa makhtalaftum fīhi min syai'in faḥukmuhū ilallāh(i), żālikumullāhu rabbī ‘alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi unīb(u).
ayah.translation: Wa makh-talaftum feehi min shai'in fahukmuhooo ilallaah; zaalikumul laahu Rabbee 'alaihi tawakkaltu wa ilaihi uneeb

ayah.transliteration: Fāṭirus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), ja‘ala lakum min anfusikum azwājaw wa minal-an‘āmi azwājā(n), yażra'ukum fīh(i), laisa kamiṡlihī syai'(un), wa huwas-samī‘ul-baṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Faatirus samaawaati wal ard; ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw wa minal an'aami azwaajany yazra'ukum feeh; laisa kamislihee shai'unw wa Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Lahū maqālīdus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), yabsuṭur-rizqa limay yasyā'u wa yaqdir(u), innahū bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Lahoo maqaaleedus samaawaati wal ardi yabsutur rizqa limany yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; innahoo bikulli shai'unw wa Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Syara‘a lakum minad-dīni mā waṣṣā bihī nūḥaw wal-lażī auḥainā ilaika wa mā waṣṣā bihī ibrāhīma wa mūsā wa ‘īsā an aqīmud-dīna wa lā tatafarraqū fīh(i), kabura ‘alal-musyrikīna mā tad‘ūhum ilaih(i), allāhu yajtabī ilaihi may yasyā'u wa yahdī ilaihi may yunīb(u).
ayah.translation: Shara'a lakum minad deeni maa wassaa bihee Noohanw wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika wa maa wassainaa biheee Ibraaheema wa Moosa wa 'Eesaaa an aqeemud adeena wa laa tatafarraqoo feeh; kabura 'alal mushrikeena maa tad'oohum ilaih; Allaahu yajtabee ilaihi many yashaaa'u wa yahdeee ilaihi mai yuneeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā tafarraqū illā mim ba‘di mā jā'ahumul-‘ilmu bagyam bainahum, wa lau lā kalimatun sabaqat mir rabbika ilā ajalim musammal laquḍiya bainahum, wa innal-lażīna ūriṡul-kitāba mim ba‘dihim lafī syakkim minhu  murīb(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa tafarraqooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika ilaaa ajalim musammal laqudiya bainahum; wa innal lazeena oorisul Kitaaba mim ba'dihim lafee shakkim minhu mureeb

ayah.transliteration: Fa liżālika fad‘(u), wastaqim kamā umirt(a), wa lā tattabi‘ ahwā'ahum, wa qul āmantu bimā anzalallāhu min kitāb(in), wa umirtu li'a‘dila bainakum, allāhu rabbunā wa rabbukum, lanā a‘mālunā wa lakum a‘mālukum, lā ḥujjata bainanā wa bainakum, allāhu yajma‘u bainanā,wa ilaihil-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Falizaalika fad'u wastaqim kamaaa umirta wa laa tattabi' ahwaaa'ahum wa qul aamantu bimaaa anzalal laahu min Kitaab, wa umirtu li a'dila bainakum Allaahu Rabbunaa wa Rabbukum lanaaa a'maa lunaa wa lakum a'maalukim laa hujjata bainanaa wa baina kumul laahu yajma'u bainanaa wa ilaihil maseer

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yuḥājjūna fillāhi mim ba‘di mastujība lahū ḥujjatuhum dāḥiḍatun ‘inda rabbihim wa ‘alaihim gaḍabuw wa lahum ‘ażābun syadīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yuhaaajjoona fil laahi mim ba'di mastujeeba lahoo hujjatuhum daahidatun 'inda Rabbihim wa 'alaihim ghadabunw wa lahum 'azaabun shadeed

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī anzalal-kitāba bil-ḥaqqi wal-mīzān(a), wa mā yudrīka la‘allas-sā‘ata qarīb(un).
ayah.translation: Allahul lazeee anzalal Kitaaba bilhaqqi wal Meezaan; wa ma yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata qareeb

ayah.transliteration: Yasta‘jilu bihal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bihā, wal-lażīna āmanū musyfiqūna minhā, wa ya‘lamūna annahal-ḥaqq(u), alā innal-lażīna yumārūna fis-sā‘ati lafī ḍalālim ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Yasta'jilu bihal lazeena laa yu'minoona bihaa wallazeena aamanoo mushfiqoona minhaa wa ya'lamoona annahal haqq; alaaa innal lazeena yumaaroona fis Saa'ati lafee dalaalim ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu laṭīfum bi‘ibādihī yarzuqu may yasyā'(u), wa huwal-qawiyyul-‘azīz(u).
ayah.translation: Allahu lateefum bi'ibaadihee yarzuqu mai yashaaa'u wa Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez

ayah.transliteration: Man kāna yurīdu ḥarṡal-ākhirati nazid lahū fī ḥarṡih(ī), wa man kāna yurīdu ḥarṡad-dun-yā nu'tihī minhā, wa mā lahū fil-ākhirati min naṣīb(in).
ayah.translation: Man kaana yureedu harsal Aakhirati nazid lahoo fee harsihee wa man kaana yureedu harsad dunyaa nu'tihee mnhaa wa maa lahoo fil Aakhirati min naseeb

ayah.transliteration: Am lahum syurakā'u syara‘ū lahum minad-dīni mā lam ya'żam bihillāh(u), wa lau lā kalimatul-faṣli laquḍiya bainahum, wa innaẓ-ẓālimīna lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Am lahum shurakaaa'u shara'oo lahum minad deeni maa lam yaazam bihil laah; wa law laa kalimatul fasli laqudiya bainahum; wa innaz zaalimeena lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Taraẓ-ẓālimīna musyfiqīna mimmā kasabū wa huwa wāqi‘um bihim, wal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti fī rauḍātil-jannāt(i), lahum mā yasyā'ūna ‘inda rabbihim, żālika huwal-faḍlul-kabīr(u).
ayah.translation: Taraz zaalimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa kasaboo wa huwa waaqi'um bihim; wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati fee rawdaatil jannaati lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika huwal fadlul kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Żālikal-lażī yubasysyirullāhu ‘ibādahul-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāt(i), qul lā as'alukum ‘alaihi ajran illal-mawaddata fil-qurbā, wa may yaqtarif ḥasanatan nazid lahū fīhā ḥusnā(n), innallāha gafūrun syakūr(un).
ayah.translation: Zaalikal lazee yubash shirul laahu 'ibaadahul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaat; qul laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran illal mawaddata fil qurbaa; wa mai yaqtarif hasanatan nazid lahoo feehaa husnaa; innal laaha Ghafoorun Shakoor

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūnaftarā ‘alallāhi każibā(n), fa'iy yasya'illāhu yakhtim ‘alā qalbik(a), wa yamḥullāhul-bāṭila wa yuḥiqqul-ḥaqqa bikalimātih(ī), innahū ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloonaf tara 'alal laahi kaziban fa-iny yasha il laahu yakhtim 'alaa qalbik; wa yamhul laahul baatila wa yuhiqqul haqqa bi Kalimaatih; innahoo 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī yaqbalut-taubata ‘an ‘ibādihī wa ya‘fū ‘anis-sayyi'āti wa ya‘lamu mā taf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee yaqbalut tawbata 'an 'ibaadihee wa ya'foo 'anis saiyiaati wa ya'lamu maa taf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yastajībul-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa yazīduhum min faḍlih(ī), wal-kāfirūna lahum ‘ażābun syadīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wa yastajeebul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilu saalihaati wa yazeeduhum min fadlih; wal kaafiroona lahum 'azaabun shadeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau basaṭallāhur rizqa li‘ibādihī labagau fil-arḍi wa lākiy yunazzilu biqadarim mā yasyā'(u), innahū bi‘ibādihī khabīrum baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa law basatal laahur rizqa li'ibaadihee labaghaw fil ardi wa laakiny yunazzilu biqadarim maa yashaaa'; innahoo bi'ibaadihee Khabeerum Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī yunazzilul-gaiṡa mim ba‘di mā qanaṭū wa yansyuru raḥmatah(ū), wa huwal-waliyyul-ḥamīd(u).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee yunazzilul ghaisa mim ba'di maa qanatoo wa yanshuru rahmatah; wa Huwal Waliyyul Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihī khalqus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baṡṡa fīhimā min dābbah(tin), wa huwa ‘alā jam‘ihim iżā yasyā'u qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bassa feehimaa min daaabbah; wa Huwa 'alaa jam'ihim izaa yashaaa'u Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā aṣābakum mim muṣībatin fabimā kasabat aidīkum wa ya‘fū ‘an kaṡīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa asaabakum mim museebatin fabimaa kasabat aydeekum wa ya'foo 'an kaseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā antum bimu‘jizīna fil-arḍ(i), wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi miw waliyyiw wa lā naṣīr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi wa maa lakum min doonil laahi minw wa liyyinw wa laa naseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa min āyātihil-jawāri fil-baḥri kal-a‘lām(i).
ayah.translation: Wa min Aayaatihil ja waarifil bahri kal a'lam

ayah.transliteration: Iy yasya' yuskinir-rīḥa fa yaẓlalna rawākida ‘alā ẓahrih(ī), inna fī żālika la'āyātil likulli ṣabbārin syakūr(in).
ayah.translation: Iny yashaaa yuskinir reeha fa yazlalna rawaakida 'alaa zahirh; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil likulli sabbaarin shakoor

ayah.transliteration: Au yūbiqhunna bimā kasabū wa ya‘fu ‘an kaṡīr(in).
ayah.translation: Aw yoobiqhunna bimaa kasaboo wa ya'fu 'an kaseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa ya‘lamal-lażīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā, mā lahum mim maḥīṣ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa ya'lamal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatinaa maa lahum mim mahees

ayah.transliteration: Famā ūtītum min syai'in fa matā‘ul-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa mā ‘indallāhi khairuw wa abqā lil-lażīna āmanū wa ‘alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa wa maa 'indal laahi khairunw wa abqaa lillazeena aamanoo wa 'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yajtanibūna kabā'iral-iṡmi wal-fawāḥisya wa iżā mā gaḍibū hum yagfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi wal fawaa hisha wa izaa maa ghadiboo hum yaghfiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīnastajābū lirabbihim wa aqāmuṣ-ṣalāta wa amruhum syūrā bainahum, wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeenas tajaaboo li Rabbhim wa aqaamus Salaata wa amruhum shooraa bainahum wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna iżā aṣābahumul-bagyu hum yantaṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena izaa asaabahumul baghyu hum yantasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa jazā'u sayyi'atin sayyi'atum miṡluhā, faman ‘afā wa aṣlaḥa fa ajruhū ‘alallāh(i), innahū lā yuḥibbuẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa jazaaa'u saiyi'atin saiyi'tum misluha faman 'afaa wa aslaha fa ajruhoo 'alal laah; innahoo laa yuhibbuz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lamanintaṣara ba‘da ẓulmihī fa ulā'ika mā ‘alaihim min sabīl(in).
ayah.translation: Wa lamanin tasara ba'da zulmihee fa ulaaa'ika maa 'alaihim min sabeel

ayah.transliteration: Innamas-sabīlu ‘alal-lażīna yaẓlimūnan-nāsa wa yabgūna fil-arḍi bigairil-ḥaqq(i), ulā'ika lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innamas sabeelu 'alal lazeena yazlimoonan naasa wa yabghoona fil ardi bighairil haqq; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa laman ṣabara wa gafara inna żālika lamin ‘azmil-umūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa laman sabara wa ghafara inna zaalika lamin 'azmil umoor

ayah.transliteration: Wa may yuḍlilillāhu famā lahū miw waliyyim mim ba‘dih(ī), wa taraẓ-ẓālimīna lammā ra'awul-‘ażāba yaqūlūna hal ilā maraddim min sabīl(in).
ayah.translation: Wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo minw waliyyim mim ba'dih; wa taraz zaalimeena lammaa ra awul 'azaaba yaqooloona hal ilaa maraddim min sabeel

ayah.transliteration: Wa tarāhum yu‘raḍūna ‘alaihā khāsyi‘īna minaż żulli yanẓurūna min ṭarfin khafiyy(in), wa qālal-lażīna āmanū innal-khāsirīnal-lażīna khasirū anfusahum wa ahlīhim yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), alā innaẓ-ẓālimīna fī ‘ażābim muqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa taraahum yu'radoona 'alaihaa khaashi'eena minazzulli yanzuroona min tarfin khaifiyy; wa qaalal lazeena aamanooo innal khaasireenal lazeena khasiroon anfusahum wa ahleehim Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa innaz zaalimeena fee'azaabim muqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna lahum min auliyā'a yanṣurūnahum min dūnillāh(i), wa may yuḍlilillāhu famā lahū min sabīl(in).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana lahum min awliyaaa'a yansuroonahum min doonil laah; wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min sabeel

ayah.transliteration: Istajībū lirabbikum min qabli ay ya'tiya yaumul lā maradda lahū minallāh(i), mā lakum mim malja'iy yauma'iżiw wa mā lakum min nakīr(in).
ayah.translation: Istajeeboo li Rabbikum min qabli any yaatiya Yawmul laa maradda lahoo minal laah; maa lakum mim malja iny yawma'izinw wa maa lakum min nakeer

ayah.transliteration: Fa in a‘raḍū famā arsalnāka ‘alaihim ḥafīẓā(n), in ‘alaika illal-balāg(u), wa innā iżā ażaqnal-insāna minnā raḥmatan fariḥa bihā, wa in tuṣibhum sayyi'atum bimā qaddamat aidīhim fa'innal-insāna kafūr(un).
ayah.translation: Fa-in a'radoo famaaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim hafeezan in 'alaika illal balaagh; wa innaaa izaaa azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan fariha bihaa wa in tusibhum saiyi'atum bimaa qaddamat aydeehim fa innal insaana kafoor

ayah.transliteration: Lillāhi mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), yakhluqu mā yasyā'(u), yahabu limay yasyā'u ināṡaw wa yahabu limay yasyā'uż-żukūr(a).
ayah.translation: Lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ard; yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; yahabu limai yashaaa'u inaasanw wa yahabu limai yashaaa'uz zukoor

ayah.transliteration: Au yuzawwijuhum żukrānaw wa ināṡā(n), wa yaj‘alu may yasyā'u ‘aqīmā(n), innahū ‘alīmun qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Aw yuzawwijuhum zukraananw wa inaasanw wa yaj'alu mai yashaaa'u 'aqeemaa; innahoo 'Aleemun Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā kāna libasyarin ay yukallimahullāhu illā waḥyan au miw warā'i ḥijābin au yursila rasūlan fa yūḥiya bi'iżnihī mā yasyā'(u), innahū ‘aliyyun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maa kaana libasharin any yukallimahul laahu illaa wahyan aw minw waraaa'i hijaabin aw yursila Rasoolan fa yoohiya bi iznuhee maa yashaaa'; innahoo 'Aliyyun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika auḥainā ilaika rūḥam min amrinā, mā kunta tadrī mal-kitābu wa lal-īmānu wa lākin ja‘alnāhu nūran nahdī bihī man nasyā'u min ‘ibādinā, wa innaka latahdī ilā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika awhainaaa ilaika rooham min amrinaa; maa kunta tadree mal Kitaabu wa lal eemaanu wa laakin ja'alnaahu nooran nahdee bihee man nashaaa'u min 'ibaadinaa; wa innaka latahdeee ilaaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Ṣirāṭillāhil-lażī lahū mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), alā ilallāhi taṣīrul-umūr(u).
ayah.translation: Siraatil laahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ard; alaaa ilal laahi taseerul umoor

ayah.transliteration: Ḥā mīm.
ayah.translation: Haa-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-kitābil-mubīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wal Kitaabil Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Innā ja‘alnāhu qur'ānan ‘arabiyyal la‘allakum ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa ja'alnaahu Quraanan 'Arabiyyal la'allakum ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū fī ummil-kitābi ladainā la‘aliyyun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa innahoo feee Ummil Kitaabi Ladainaa la'aliyyun hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Afa naḍribu ‘ankumuż-żikra ṣafḥan an kuntum qaumam musrifīn(a).
ayah.translation: Afanadribu 'ankumuz Zikra safhan an kuntum qawmam musrifeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa kam arsalnā min nabiyyin fil-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kam arsalnaa min Nabiyyin fil awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ya'tīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yaateehim min Nabiyyin illaa kaanoo bihee yasahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ahlaknā asyadda minhum baṭsyaw wa maḍā maṡalul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa ahlaknaaa ashadda minhum batshanw wa madaa masalul lawwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna khalaqahunnal-‘azīzul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda la yaqoolunna khalaqa hunnal 'Azeezul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Allażī ja‘ala lakumul-arḍa mahdaw wa ja‘ala lakum fīhā subulal la‘allakum tahtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw wa ja'ala lakum feehaa subulal la'allakum tahtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażī nazzala minas-samā'i mā'am biqadar(in), fa'ansyarnā bihī baldatam maitā(n), każālika tukhrajūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazee nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa anshamaa bihee baldatam maitaa' kazaalika tukhrajoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażī khalaqal-azwāja kullahā wa ja‘ala lakum minal-fulki wal-an‘āmi mā tarkabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa wa ja'ala lakum minal fulki wal-an'aami maa tarkaboon

ayah.transliteration: Litastawū ‘alā ẓuhūrihī ṡumma tażkurū ni‘mata rabbikum iżastawaitum ‘alaihi wa taqūlū subḥānal-lażī sakhkhara lanā hāżā wa mā kunnā lahū muqrinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Litastawoo 'alaa zuhoorihee summa tazkuroo ni'mata Rabbikum izastawaitum 'alaihi wa taqooloo Subhaanal lazee sakhkhara lana haaza wa maa kunnaa lahoo muqrineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innā ilā rabbinā lamunqalibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa lamunqaliboon

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alū lahū min ‘ibādihī juz'ā(n), innal-insāna lakafūrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'aloo lahoo min 'ibaadihee juz'aa; innal insaana lakafoorum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Amittakhażū mimmā yakhluqu banātiw wa aṣfākum bil-banīn(a).
ayah.translation: Amit takhaza mimmaa yakhluqu banaatinw wa asfaakum bilbaneen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā busysyira aḥaduhum bimā ḍaraba lir-raḥmāni maṡalan ẓalla wajhuhū muswaddaw wa huwa kaẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa bushshira ahaduhum bimaa daraba lir Rahmaani masalan zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw wa hua kazeem

ayah.transliteration: Awamay yunasysya'u fil-ḥilyati wa huwa fil-khiṣāmi gairu mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Awa mai yunashsha'u fil hilyati wa huwa fil khisaami ghairu mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alul-malā'ikatal-lażīna hum ‘ibādur raḥmāni ināṡā(n), asyahidū khalqahum, satuktabu syahādatuhum wa yus'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alul malaaa'ikatal lazeena hum 'ibaadur Rahmaani inaasaa; a shahidoo khalaqhum; satuktabu shahaa datuhum wa yus'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū lau syā'ar-raḥmānu mā ‘abadnāhum, mā lahum biżālika min ‘ilm(in), in hum illā yakhruṣūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo law shaaa'ar Rahmaanu maa 'abadnaahum; maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum illaa yakhrusoon

ayah.transliteration: Am ātaināhum kitābam min qablihī fahum bihī mustamsikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am aatainaahum Kitaabam min qablihee fahum bihee mustamsikoon

ayah.transliteration: Bal qālū innā wajadnā ābā'anā ‘alā ummatiw wa innā ‘alā āṡārihim muhtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal qaalooo innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw wa innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muhtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa każālika mā arsalnā min qablika fī qaryatim min nażīr(in), illā qāla mutrafūhā, innā wajadnā ābā'anā ‘alā ummatiw wa innā ‘alā āṡārihim muqtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kazaalika maaa arsalnaa min qablika fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafoohaaa innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw wa innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muqtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla awalau ji'tukum bi'ahdā mimmā wajattum ‘alaihi ābā'akum, qālū innā bimā ursiltum bihī kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala awa law ji'tukum bi ahdaa mimmaa wajattum 'alaihi aabaaa'akum qaalooo innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Fantaqamnā minhum fanẓur kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-mukażżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fantaqamnaa minhum fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qāla ibrāhīmu li'abīhi wa qaumihī innanī barā'um mimmā ta‘budūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaala Ibraaheemu liabeehi wa qawmiheee innane baraaa'um mimmaa ta'budo

ayah.transliteration: Illāl-lażī faṭaranī fa'innahū sayahdīn(i).
ayah.translation: Illal lazee fataranee innahoo sa yahdeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alahā kalimatam bāqiyatan fī ‘aqibihī la‘allahum yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alahaa Kalimatam baaqiyatan fee 'aqibihee la'al lahum yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Bal matta‘tu hā'ulā'i wa ābā'ahum ḥattā jā'ahumul-ḥaqqu wa rasūlum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Bal matta'tu haaa'ulaaa'i wa aabaaa'ahum hattaa jaaa'a humul haqqu wa Rasoolum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā jā'ahumul-ḥaqqu qālū hāżā siḥruw wa innā bihī kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu qaaloo haazaa sihrunw wa innaa bihee kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū lau lā nuzzila hāżal-qur'ānu ‘alā rajulim minal-qaryataini ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo law laa nuzzila haazal Quraanu 'alaa rajulim minal qaryataini 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Ahum yaqsimūna raḥmata rabbik(a), naḥnu qasamnā bainahum ma‘īsyatahum fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa rafa‘nā ba‘ḍahum fauqa ba‘ḍin darajātil liyattakhiża ba‘ḍuhum ba‘ḍan sukhriyyā(n), wa raḥmatu rabbika khairum mimmā yajma‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ahum yaqsimoona rahmata Rabbik; Nahnu qasamnaa bainahum ma'eeshatahum fil hayaatid dunyaa wa rafa'naa ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajaatil liyattakhiza ba'duhum ba'dan sukhriyyaa; wa rahmatu Rabbika khairum mimmaa yajma'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā ay yakūnan-nāsu ummataw wāḥidatal laja‘alnā limay yakfuru bir-raḥmāni libuyūtihim suqufam min fiḍḍatiw wa ma‘ārija ‘alaihā yaẓharūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law laaa any yakoonan naasu ummatanw waahidatal laja'alnaa limany yakfuru bir Rahmaani libu yootihim suqufam min fiddatinw wa ma'aarija 'alaihaa yazharoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa libuyūtihim abwābaw wa sururan ‘alaihā yattaki'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa libu yootihim abwaabanw wa sururan 'alaihaa yattaki'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa zukhrufā(n), wa in kullu żālika lammā matā‘ul-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wal-ākhiratu ‘inda rabbika lil-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa zukhrufaa; wa in kullu zaalika lammaa mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa; wal aakhiratu 'inda Rabbika lilmuttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa may ya‘syu ‘an żikrir-raḥmāni nuqayyiḍ lahū syaiṭānan fahuwa lahū qarīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa mai ya'shu 'an zikrir Rahmaani nuqaiyid lahoo Shaitaanan fahuwa lahoo qareen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahum layaṣuddūnahum ‘anis-sabīli wa yaḥsabūna annahum muhtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innahum la yasuddoo nahum 'anis sabeeli wa yahsaboona annahum muhtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā jā'anā qāla yā laita bainī wa bainaka bu‘dal-masyriqaini fa bi'sal-qarīn(u).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'anaa qaala yaa laita bainee wa bainaka bu'dal mashriqaini fabi'sal qareen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lay yanfa‘akumul-yauma iẓ ẓalamtum annakum fil-‘ażābi musytarikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lai yanfa'akumul Yawma iz zalamtum annakum fil 'azaabi mushtarikoon

ayah.transliteration: Afa anta tusmi‘uṣ-ṣumma au tahdil-‘umya  wa man kāna fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Afa anta tusmi'us summa aw tahdil 'umya wa man kaana fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa immā nażhabanna bika fa innā minhum muntaqimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa immaa nazhabanna bika fa innaa minhum muntaqimoon

ayah.transliteration: Au nuriyannakal-lażī wa‘adnāhum fa'innā ‘alaihim muqtadirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Aw nuriyannakal lazee wa'adnaahum fa innaa 'alaihim muqtadiroon

ayah.transliteration: Fastamsik bil-lażī ūḥiya ilaik(a), innaka ‘alā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Fastamsik billazeee oohi ya ilaika innaka 'alaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū lażikrul laka wa liqaumik(a), wa saufa tus'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innahoo lazikrul laka wa liqawmika wa sawfa tus'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Was'al man arsalnā min qablika mir rusulinā, aja‘alnā min dūnir-raḥmāni ālihatay yu‘badūn(a).
ayah.translation: Was'al man arsalnaa min qablika mir Rusulinaaa aja'alnaa min doonir Rahmaani aalihatany yu badoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā mūsā bi'āyātinā ilā fir‘auna wa mala'ihī fa qāla innī rasūlu rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi aayaatinaaa ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee faqaala innee Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā jā'ahum bi'āyātinā iżā hum minhā yaḍḥakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammma jaaa'ahum bi aayaatinaaa izaa hum minhaa yadhakoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā nurīhim min āyatin illā hiya akbaru min ukhtihā, wa akhażnāhum bil-‘ażābi la‘allahum yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa nureehim min aayatin illaa hiya akbaru min ukhtihaa wa akhaznaahum bil'azaabi la'allahum yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū yā ayyuhas-sāḥirud‘u lanā rabbaka bimā ‘ahida ‘indak(a), innanā lamuhtadūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo yaaa ayyuhas saahirud'u lanaa Rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka innanaa lamuhtadoon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā kasyafnā ‘anhumul-‘ażāba iżā hum yankuṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa kashafnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba izaa hum yankusoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa nādā fir‘aunu fī qaumihī qāla yā qaumi alaisa lī mulku miṣra wa hāżihil-anhāru tajrī min taḥtī, afalā tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa naadaa Fir'awnu fee qawmihee qaala yaa qawmi alaisa lee mulku Misra wa haazihil anhaaru tajree min tahtee afalaa tubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Am ana khairum min hāżal-lażī huwa mahīn(un), wa lā yakādu yubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Am ana khairum min haazal lazee huwa maheenunw wa laa yuakaadu yubeen

ayah.transliteration: Falau lā ulqiya ‘alaihi aswiratum min żahabin au jā'a ma‘ahul-malā'ikatu muqtarinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaw laa ulqiya 'alaihi aswiratum min zahabin awjaaa'a ma'ahul malaaa'ikatu muqtarineen

ayah.transliteration: Fastakhaffa qaumahū fa aṭā‘ūh(u), innahum kānū qauman fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fastakhaffa qawmahoo fa ataa'ooh; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā āsafūnantaqamnā minhum fa agraqnāhum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaaa aasafoonan taqamnaa minhum fa aghraqnaahum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Fa ja‘alnāhum salafaw wa maṡalal lil-ākhirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faja'alnaahum salafanw wa masalal lil aakhireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā ḍuribabnu maryama maṡalan iżā qaumuka minhu yaṣiddūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa duribab nu Maryama masalan izaa qawmu ka minhu yasidoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū a'ālihatunā khairun am huw(a), mā ḍarabūhu laka illā jadalā(n), bal hum qaumun khaṣimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalooo 'a-aalihatunaa khairun am hoo; maa daraboohu laka illaa jadalaa; balhum qawmun khasimoon

ayah.transliteration: In huwa illā ‘abdun an‘amnā ‘alaihi wa ja‘alnāhu maṡalal libanī isrā'īl(a).
ayah.translation: In huwa illaa 'abdun an'amnaa 'alaihi wa ja'alnaahu masalal li Baneee Israaa'eel

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau nasyā'u laja‘alnā minkum malā'ikatan fil-arḍi yakhlufūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa law nashaaa'u laja'alnaa minkum malaaa'ikatan fil ardi yakhlufoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū la‘ilmul lis-sā‘ati falā tamtarunna bihā wattabi‘ūn(i), hāżā ṣirāṭum mustaqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa innahoo la'ilmul lis Saa'ati fala tamtarunna bihaa wattabi'oon; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yaṣuddannakumusy-syaiṭān(u), innahū lakum ‘aduwwum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yasuddan nakumush Shaitaanu innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lammā jā'a ‘īsā bil-bayyināti qāla qad ji'tukum bil-ḥikmati wa li'ubayyina lakum ba‘ḍal-lażī takhtalifūna fīh(i), fattaqullāha wa aṭī‘ūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa lammaa jaaa'a 'Eesaa bilbaiyinaati qaala qad ji'tukum bil Hikmati wa li-ubaiyina lakum ba'dal lazee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha huwa rabbī wa rabbukum fa‘budūh(u), hāżā ṣirāṭum mustaqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha Huwa Rabbee wa Rabbukum fa'budooh; haaza Siraatum Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Fakhtalafal-aḥzābu mim bainihim, fawailul lil-lażīna ẓalamūmin ‘ażābi yaumin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu mim bainihim fawailul lillazeena zalamoo min 'azaabi Yawmin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Hal yanẓurūna illas-sā‘ata an ta'tiyahum bagtataw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Hal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an taatiyahum baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Al-akhillā'u yauma'iżim ba‘ḍuhum liba‘ḍin ‘aduwwun illal-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Al akhillaaa'u Yawma'izim ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illal muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Yā ‘ibādi lā khaufun ‘alaikumul-yauma wa lā antum taḥzanūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaa 'ibaadi laa khawfun 'alaikumul Yawma wa laaa antum tahzanoon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna āmanū bi'āyātinā wa kānū muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena aamanoo bi Aayaatinaa wa kaanoo muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Udkhulul-jannata antum wa azwājukum tuḥbarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Udkhulul Jannata antum wa azwaajukum tuhbaroon

ayah.transliteration: Yuṭāfu ‘alaihim biṣiḥāfim min żahabiw wa akwāb(in), wa fīhā mā tasytahīhil-anfusu wa talażżul-a‘yun(u), wa antum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yutaafu 'alaihim bishaa fim min zahabinw wa akwaab, wa feehaa maatashtaheehil anfusu wa talazzul a'yunu wa antum feehaa khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa tilkal-jannatul-latī ūriṡtumūhā bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa tilkal jannatul lateee ooristumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Lakum fīhā fākihatun kaṡīratum minhā ta'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lakum feehaa faakihatun kaseeratum minhaa taakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-mujrimīna fī ‘ażābi jahannama khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal mujrimeena fee 'azaabi jahannama khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yufattaru ‘anhum wa hum fīhi mublisūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yufattaru 'anhum wa hum feehi mublisoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ẓalamnāhum wa lākin kānū humuẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa zalamnaahum wa laakin kaanoo humuz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa nādau yā māliku liyaqḍi ‘alainā rabbuk(a), qāla innakum mākiṡūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa naadaw yaa Maaliku liyaqdi 'alainaa Rabbuka qaala innakum maakisson

ayah.transliteration: Laqad ji'nākum bil-ḥaqqi wa lākinna akṡarakum lil-ḥaqqi kārihūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laqad ji'naakum bilhaqqi wa laakinna aksarakum lilhaqqi kaarihoon

ayah.transliteration: Am abramū amran fa innā mubrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am abramooo amran fainnaa mubrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Am yaḥsabūna annā lā nasma‘u sirrahum wa najwāhum, balā wa rusulunā ladaihim yaktubūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am yahsaboona annaa laa nasma'u sirrahum wa najwaahum; balaa wa Rusulunaa ladaihim yaktuboon

ayah.transliteration: Qul in kāna lir-raḥmāni walad(un), fa ana awwalul-‘ābidīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul in kaana lir Rahmaani walad; fa-ana awwalul 'aabideen

ayah.transliteration: Subḥāna rabbis-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbil-‘arsyi ‘ammā yaṣifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Subhaana Rabbis samaawaati wal ardi Rabbil Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa żarhum yakhūḍū wa yal‘abū ḥattā yulāqū yaumahumul-lażī yū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fazarhum yakhoodoo wa yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo Yawmahumul lazee yoo'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī fis-samā'i ilāhuw wa fil-arḍi ilāh(un), wa huwal-ḥakīmul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee fissamaaa'i Ilaahunw wa fil ardi Ilaah; wa Huwal Hakeemul'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa tabārakal-lażī lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumā, wa ‘indahū ‘ilmus-sā‘ah(ti), wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa tabaarakal lazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa 'indahoo 'ilmus Saa'ati wa ilaihi turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yamlikul-lażīna yad‘ūna min dūnihisy-syafā‘ata illā man syahida bil-ḥaqqi wa hum ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yamlikul lazeena yad'oona min doonihish shafaa'ata illaa man shahida bilhaqqi wa hum ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunnallāhu fa annā yu'fakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqahum la yaqoolun nallaahu fa annaa yu'fakoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qīlihī yā rabbi inna hā'ulā'i qaumul lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qeelihee yaa Rabbi inna haa'ulaaa'i qawmul laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Faṣfaḥ ‘anhum wa qul salām(un), fa saufa ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasfah 'anhum wa qul salaam; fasawfa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥā mīm.
ayah.translation: Haa Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-kitābil-mubīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wal Kitaabil Mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Innā anzalnāhu fī lailatim mubārakatin innā kunnā munżirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaaa anzalnaahu fee lailatim mubaarakah; innaa kunnaa munzireen

ayah.transliteration: Fīhā yufraqu kullu amrin ḥakīm(in).
ayah.translation: Feehaa yufraqu kullu amrin hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Amram min ‘indinā, innā kunnā mursilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Amram min 'indinaaa; innaa kunnaa mursileen

ayah.transliteration: Raḥmatam mir rabbik(a), innahū huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Rahmatam mir rabbik; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Rabbis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumā, in kuntum mūqinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Rabbis samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa; in kuntum mooqineen

ayah.transliteration: Lā ilāha illā huwa yuḥyī wa yumīt(u), rabbukum wa rabbu ābā'ikumul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa yuhyee wa yumeetu Rabbukum wa Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Bal hum fī syakkiy yal‘abūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal hum fee shakkiny yal'aboon

ayah.transliteration: Fartaqib yauma ta'tis-samā'u bidukhānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Fartaqib Yawma taatis samaaa'u bidukhaanim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Yagsyan-nās(a), hāżā ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaghshan naasa haazaa 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Rabbanaksyif ‘annal-‘ażāba innā mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Rabbanak shif 'annal 'azaaba innaa mu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Annā lahumuż-żikrā wa qad jā'ahum rasūlum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Annaa lahumuz zikraa wa qad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma tawallau ‘anhu wa qālū mu‘allamum majnūn(un).
ayah.translation: Summaa tawallaw 'anhu wa qaaloo mu'allamum majnoon

ayah.transliteration: Innā kāsyiful-‘ażābi qalīlan innakum ‘ā'idūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa kaashiful 'azaabi qaleelaa; innakum 'aaa'indoon

ayah.transliteration: Yauma nabṭisyul baṭsyatal kubrā, innā muntaqimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma nabtishul batsha tal kubraa innaa muntaqimoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad fatannā qablahum qauma fir‘auna wa jā'ahum rasūlun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad fatannaa qablahum qawma Fir'awna wa jaaa'ahum Rasoolun kareem

ayah.transliteration: An addū ilayya ‘ibādallāh(i), innī lakum rasūlun amīn(un).
ayah.translation: An addooo ilaiya 'ibaadal laahi innee lakum Rasoolun ameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa al lā ta‘lū ‘alallāh(i), innī ātīkum bisulṭānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa al laa ta'loo 'alal laahi innee aateekum bisultaanim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innī ‘użtu birabbī wa rabbikum an tarjumūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa innee 'uztu bi Rabbee wa rabbikum an tarjumoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa il lam tu'minū lī fa‘tazilūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa il lam tu'minoo lee fa'taziloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa da‘ā rabbahū anna hā'ulā'i qaumum mujrimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fada'aa rabbahooo anna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmum mujrimoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa asri bi‘ibādī lailan innakum muttaba‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa asri bi'ibaadee lailan innakum muttaba'oon

ayah.transliteration: Watrukil-baḥra rahwā(n), innahum jundum mugraqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Watrukil bahra rahwan innahum jundum mughraqoon

ayah.transliteration: Kam tarakū min jannātiw wa ‘uyūn(in).
ayah.translation: Kam tarakoo min jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa zurū‘iw wa maqāmin karīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa zuroo'inw wa maqaa min kareem

ayah.transliteration: Wa na‘matin kānū fīhā fākihīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa na'matin kaanoo feehaa faakiheen

ayah.transliteration: Każālik(a), wa auraṡnāhā qauman ākharīn(a).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika wa awrasnaahaa qawman aakhareen

ayah.transliteration: Famā bakat ‘alaihimus-samā'u wal-arḍ(u), wa mā kānū munẓarīn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa bakat 'alaihimus samaaa'u wal ardu wa maa kaanoo munzareen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad najjainā banī isrā'īla minal-‘ażābil-muhīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad najjainaa Baneee Israaa'eela minal'azaabil muheen

ayah.transliteration: Min fir‘aun(a), innahū kāna ‘āliyam minal-musrifīn(a).
ayah.translation: Min Fir'awn; innahoo kaana 'aaliyam minal musrifeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqadikhtarnāhum ‘alā ‘ilmin ‘alal-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqadikh tarnaahum 'alaa 'ilmin 'alal 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ātaināhum minal-āyāti mā fīhi balā'um mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa aatainaahum minal aayaati maa feehi balaaa'um mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Inna hā'ulā'i layaqūlūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna haaa'ulaaa'i la yaqooloon

ayah.transliteration: In hiya illā mautatunal-ūlā wa mā naḥnu bimunsyarīn(a).
ayah.translation: In hiya illaa mawtatunal oolaa wa maa nahnu bimun shareen

ayah.transliteration: Fa'tū bi'ābā'inā in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Faatoo bi aabaaa'inaaa inkuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Ahum khairun am qaumu tubba‘(in), wal-lażīna min qablihim, ahlaknāhum innahum kānū mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Ahum khayrun am qawmu Tubba'inw wallazeena min qablihim; ahlaknaahum innahum kaanoo mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā khalaqnas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā bainahumā lā‘ibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa baina humaa laa'ibeen

ayah.transliteration: Mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil-ḥaqqi wa lākinna akṡarahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa khalaqnaahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna yaumal-faṣli mīqātuhum ajma‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna yawmal fasli meeqaatuhum ajma'een

ayah.transliteration: Yauma lā yugnī maulan ‘am maulan syai'aw wa lā hum yunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma laa yughnee mawlan 'am mawlan shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Illā mar raḥimallāh(u), innahū huwal-‘azīzur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Illaa mar rahimal laah' innahoo huwal 'azeezur raheem

ayah.transliteration: Inna syajarataz-zaqqūm(i).
ayah.translation: Inna shajarataz zaqqoom

ayah.transliteration: Ṭa‘āmul-aṡīm(i).
ayah.translation: Ta'aamul aseem

ayah.transliteration: Kal-muhl(i), yaglī fil-buṭūn(i).
ayah.translation: Kalmuhli yaghlee filbutoon

ayah.transliteration: Kagalyil-ḥamīm(i).
ayah.translation: Kaghalyil hameem

ayah.transliteration: Khużūhu fa‘tilūhu ilā sawā'il-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Khuzoohu fa'tiloohu ilaa sawaaa'il Jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ṣubbū fauqa ra'sihī min ‘azābil-ḥamīm(i).
ayah.translation: Summa subboo fawqa raasihee min 'azaabil hameem

ayah.transliteration: Żuq, innaka antal-‘azīzul-karīm(u).
ayah.translation: Zuq innaka antal 'azeezul kareem

ayah.transliteration: Inna hāżā mā kuntum bihī tamtarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna haazaa maa kuntum bihee tamtaroon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-muttaqīna fī maqāmin amīn(in).
ayah.translation: Innal muttaqeena fee maqaamin ameen

ayah.transliteration: Fī jannātiw wa ‘uyūn(in).
ayah.translation: Fee jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

ayah.transliteration: Yalbasūna min sundusiw wa istabraqim mutaqābilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yalbasoona min sundusinw wa istbraqim mutaqaabileen

ayah.transliteration: Każālik(a), wa zawwajnāhum biḥūrin ‘īn(in).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika wa zawwajnaahum bihoorin 'een

ayah.transliteration: Yad‘ūna fīhā bikulli fākihatin āminīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yad'oona feehaa bikulli faakihatin aamineen

ayah.transliteration: Lā yażūqūna fīhal-mauta illal-mautatal-ūlā, wa waqāhum ‘ażābal-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Laa yazooqoona feehal mawtaa illal mawtatal oolaa wa qaqaahum 'azaabal jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Faḍlam mir rabbika żālika huwal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Fadlam mir rabbik; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Fa innamā yassarnāhu bilisānika la‘allahum yatażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika la'allahum yatazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Fartaqib innahum murtaqibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fartaqib innahum murta qiboon

ayah.transliteration: Ḥā mīm.
ayah.translation: Haa-Meeem

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlul-kitābi minallāhil-‘azīzil-ḥakīm(i).
ayah.translation: Tanzeelul Kitaabi minal laahil 'Azeezil Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Inna fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi la'āyātil lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa fis samaawaati wal ardi la Aayaatil lilmu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa fī khalqikum wa mā yabuṡṡu min dābbatin āyātul liqaumiy yūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa fee khalaqikum wa maa yabussu min daaabbatin Aayaatul liqawminy-yooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Wakhtilāfil-laili wan-nahāri wa mā anzalallāhu minas-samā'i mir rizqin fa aḥyā bihil-arḍa ba‘da mautihā wa taṣrīfir-riyāḥi āyātul liqaumiy ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari wa maaa anzalal laahu minas samaaa'i mir rizqin fa ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa wa tasreefir riyaahi Aayaatul liqawminy ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Tilka āyātullāhi natlūhā ‘alaika bil-ḥaqq(i), fa bi'ayyi ḥadīṡim ba‘dallāhi wa āyātihī yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Tilka Aayatul laahi natloohaa 'alika bilhaqq, fabiayyi hadeesim ba'dal laahi wa Aayaatihee yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wailul likulli affākin aṡīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wailul likulli affaakin aseem

ayah.transliteration: Yasma‘u āyātillāhi tutlā ‘alaihi ṡumma yuṣirru mustakbiran ka'allam yasma‘hā, fa basysyirhu bi‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Yasma'u Aayaatil laahi tutlaa 'alaihi summa yusirru mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa fabashshirhu bi'azaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ‘alima min āyātinā syai'anittakhażahā huzuwā(n), ulā'ika lahum ‘ażābum muhīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa 'alima min Aayaatinaa shai'anit takhazahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muheen

ayah.transliteration: Miw warā'ihim jahannam(u), wa lā yugnī ‘anhum mā kasabū syai'aw wa lā mattakhażū min dūnillāhi auliyā'(a), wa lahum ‘ażābun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Minw waraaa'ihim Jahannamu wa laa yughnee 'anhum maa kasaboo shai'anw wa laa mat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa'a wa lahum 'azaabun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā hudā(n), wal-lażīna kafarū bi'āyāti rabbihim lahum ‘ażābum mir rijzin alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Haazaa hudanw wal lazeena kafaroo bi aayaati Rabbihim lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī sakhkhara  lakumul-baḥra litajriyal-fulku fīhi bi'amrihī wa litabtagū min faḍlihī wa la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee sahkhara lakumul bahra litajriyal fulku feehi bi amrihee wa litabtaghoo min fadlihee wa la'allakum tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa sakhkhara lakum mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi jamī‘am minh(u), inna fī żālika la'āyātil liqaumiy yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa sakhkhara lakum maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi jamee'am minh; inna feezaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul lil-lażīna āmanū yagfirū lil-lażīna lā yarjūna ayyāmallāhi liyajziya qaumam bimā kānū yaksibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul lillazeena aamanoo yaghfiroo lillazeena laa yarjoona ayyaamal laahi liyajziya qawmam bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayah.transliteration: Man ‘amila ṣāliḥan fa linafsih(ī), wa man asā'a fa ‘alaihā, ṡumma ilā rabbikum turja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa 'amila saalihan falinafsihee wa man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa summa ilaa Rabbikum turja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ātainā banī isrā'īlal-kitāba wal-ḥukma wan-nubuwwata wa razaqnāhum minaṭ-ṭayyibāti wa faḍḍalnāhum ‘alal-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad aatainaa Baneee Israaa'eelal Kitaaba walhukma wan Nubuwwata wa razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati wa faddalnaahum;alal 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ātaināhum bayyinātim minal-amr(i), fa makhtalafū illā mim ba‘di mā jā'ahumul-‘ilmu bagyam bainahum, inna rabbaka yaqḍī bainahum yaumal-qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aatainaahum baiyinaatim minal amri famakh talafooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; inna Rabbaka yaqdee bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati feemaa kaanoo feehi yakhtalifoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ja‘alnāka ‘alā syarī‘atim minal-amri fattabi‘hā wa lā tattabi‘ ahwā'al-lażīna lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa ja'alnaaka 'alaa sharee'atim minal amri fattabi'haa wa laa tattabi'ahwaaa'al-lazeena laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Innahum lay yugnū ‘anka minallāhi syai'ā(n), wa innaẓ-ẓālimīna ba‘ḍuhum auliyā'u ba‘ḍ(in), wallāhu waliyyul-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innahum lany yughnoo 'anka minal laahi shai'aa; wa innaz zaalimeena ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'dinw wallaahu waliyyul muttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā baṣā'iru lin-nāsi wa hudaw wa raḥmatul liqaumiy yūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Haazaa basaaa'iru linnaasi wa hudanw wa rahmatul liqawminy yooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Am ḥasibal-lażīnajtaraḥus -sayyi'āti an naj‘alahum kal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti sawā'am maḥyāhum wa mamātuhum, sā'a mā yaḥkumūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am hasibal lazeenaj tarahus saiyiaati an naj'alahum kallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilu saalihaati sawaaa'am mahyaahum wa mamaatuhum; saaa'a maa yahkumoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa khalaqallāhus-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqqi wa litujzā kullu nafsim bimā kasabat wa hum lā yuẓlamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal arda bilhaqqi wa litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat wa hum laa yuzlamoon

ayah.transliteration: Afa ra'aita manittakhaża ilāhahū hawāhu wa aḍallahullāhu ‘alā ‘ilmiw wa khatama ‘alā sam‘ihī wa qalbihī wa ja‘ala ‘alā baṣarihī gisyāwah(tan), famay yahdīhi mim ba‘dillāh(i), afalā tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afara'ayta manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu wa adal lahul laahu 'alaa 'ilminw wa khatama 'alaa sam'ihee wa qalbihee wa ja'ala 'alaa basarihee ghishaawatan famany yahdeehi mim ba'dil laah; afalaa tazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū mā hiya illā ḥayātunad-dun-yā namūtu wa naḥyā wa mā yuhlikunā illad-dahr(u), wa mā lahum biżālika min ‘ilmin in hum illā yaẓunnūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo maa hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu wa nahyaa wa maa yuhlikunaaa illad dahr; wa maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum illaayazunnoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā tutlā ‘alaihim āyātunā bayyinātim mā kāna ḥujjatahum illā an qālu'tū bi'ābā'inā in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim aayaatuna baiyinaatim maa kaana hujjatahum illaaa an qaalu'too bi aabaaa'inaaa in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qulillāhu yuḥyīkum ṡumma yumītukum ṡumma yajma‘ukum ilā yaumil-qiyāmati lā raiba fīhi wa lākinna akṡaran-nāsi lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qulil laahu yuhyeekum summa yumeetukum summa yajma'ukum ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati laa raiba feehi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa yauma taqūmus-sā‘atu yauma'iżiy yakhsarul-mubṭilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma 'iziny yakhsarul mubtiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa tarā kulla ummatin jāṡiyah(tan), kullu ummatin tud‘ā ilā kitābihā, al-yauma tujzauna mā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa taraa kulla ummatin jaasiyah; kullu ummatin tud'aaa ilaa kitaabihaa al Yawma tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā kitābunā yanṭiqu ‘alaikum bil-ḥaqq(i), innā kunnā nastansikhu mā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Haazaa kitaabunaa yantiqu 'alaikum bilhaqq; innaa kunnaa nastansikhu maa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa'ammal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti fayudkhiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatih(ī), żālika huwal-fauzul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Fa ammal lazeena aamaanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati fayudkhiluhum Rabbuhum fee rahmatih; zaalika huwal fawzul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal-lażīna kafarū, falam takun āyātī tutlā ‘alaikum fastakbartum wa kuntum qaumam mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ammal lazeena kafarooo afalam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fastakbartum wa kuntum qawmam mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā qīla inna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqquw was-sā‘atu lā raiba fīhā qultum mā nadrī mas-sā‘ah(tu), in naẓunnu illā ẓannaw wa mā naḥnu bimustaiqinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa qeela inna wa'dallaahi haqqunw was Saa'atu laa raiba feehaa qultum maa nadree mas Saa'atu in nazunnu illaa zannanw wa maa nahnu bimustaiqineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa badā lahum sayyi'ātu mā ‘amilū wa ḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa 'amiloo wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa qīlal-yauma nansākum kamā nasītum liqā'a yaumikum hāżā, wa ma'wākumun nāru wa mā lakum min nāṣirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qeelal yawma nansaakum kamaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawmikum haazaa wa maawaakumun Naaru wa maa lakum min naasireen

ayah.transliteration: Żālikum bi'annakumuttakhażtum āyātillāhi huzuwaw wa garratkumul-ḥayātud-dun-yā, fal-yauma lā yukhrajūna minhā wa lā hum yusta‘tabūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalikum bi annakumut takhaztum aayaatil laahi huzuwanw wa gharratkumul hayaatud dunyaa; fal yawma laa yukhrajoona minhaa wa laahum yusta'taboon

ayah.transliteration: Fa lillāhil-ḥamdu rabbis-samāwāti wa rabbil-arḍi rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falillaahil hamdu Rabbis samaawaati wa Rabbil ardi Rabbil-'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lahul-kibriyā'u fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa lahul kibriyaaa'u fissamaawaati wal ardi wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Ḥā mīm.
ayah.translation: Haa-Meeeem

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlul-kitābi minallāhil ‘azīzil-ḥakīm(i).
ayah.translation: Tanzeelul Kitaabi minal laahil-'Azeezil Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Mā khalaqnas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā bainahumā illā bil-ḥaqqi wa ajalim musammā(n), wal-lażīna kafarū ‘ammā unżirū mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa ajalim musammaa; wallazeena kafaroo 'ammaaa unziroo mu'ridoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum mā tad‘ūna min dūnillāhi arūnī māżā khalaqū minal-arḍi am lahum syirkun fis-samāwāt(i), i'tūnī bikitābim min qabli hāżā au aṡāratim min ‘ilmin in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aytum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati eetoonee bi kitaabim min qabli haazaaa aw asaaratim min 'ilmin in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa man aḍallu mimmay yad‘ū min dūnillāhi mal lā yastajību lahū ilā yaumil-qiyāmati wa hum ‘an du‘ā'ihim gāfilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man adallu mimmany yad'oo min doonil laahi mallaa yastajeebu lahooo ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati wa hum'an du'aaa'ihim ghaafiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ḥusyiran-nāsu kānū lahum a‘dā'aw wa kānū bi‘ibādatihim kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa hushiran naasu kaanoo lahum a'daaa'anw wa kaanoo bi'ibaadatihim kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā tutlā ‘alaihim āyātunā bayyinātin qālal-lażīna kafarū lil-ḥaqqi lammā jā'ahum, hāżā siḥrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum haazaa sihrum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūnaftarāh(u), qul iniftaraituh(ū), falā tamlikūna lī minallāhi syai'ā(n), huwa a‘lamu bimā tufīḍūna fīh(i), kafā bihī syahīdam bainī wa bainakum, wa huwal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo falaa tamlikoona lee minal laahi shai'an Huwa a'lamu bimaa tufeedoona feehi kafaa bihee shaheedam bainee wa bainakum wa Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Qul mā kuntu bid‘am minar-rusuli wa mā adrī mā yuf‘alu bī wa lā bikum, in attabi‘u illā mā yūḥā ilayya wa mā ana illā nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Qul maa kuntu bid'am minal Rusuli wa maaa adreee ma yuf'alu bee wa laa bikum in attabi'u illaa maa yoohaaa ilaiya ya maaa ana illaa nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum in kāna min ‘indillāhi wa kafartum bihī wa syahida syāhidum mim banī isrā'īla ‘alā miṡlihī fa āmana wastakbartum, innallāha lā yahdil-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aytum in kaana min 'indil laahi wa kafartum bihee wa shahida shaahidum mim Banee Israaa'eela 'alaa mislihee fa aamana wastak bartum innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālal-lażīna kafarū lil-lażīna āmanū lau kāna khairam mā sabaqūnā ilaih(i), wa iż lam yahtadū bihī fasayaqūlūna hāżā ifkun qadīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanoo law kaana khairam maa sabaqoonaaa ilyh; wa iz lam yahtadoo bihee fasa yaqooloona haazaaa ifkun qadeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa min qablihī kitābu mūsā imāmaw wa raḥmah(tan), wa hāżā kitābum muṣaddiqul lisānan ‘arabiyyal liyunżiral-lażīna ẓalamū, wa busyrā lil-muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min qablihee kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw-wa rahmah; wa haazaa Kitaabum musad diqul lisaanan 'Arabiyyal liyunziral lazeena zalamoo wa bushraa lilmuhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna qālū rabbunallāhu ṡummastaqāmū falā khaufun ‘alaihim wa lā hum yaḥzanūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo falaa khawfun 'alaihim wa laahum yahzanoon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika aṣḥābul-jannati khālidīna fīhā, jazā'am bimā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika Ashabul Jannati khaalideena feehaa jazaaa'am bimaa kaano ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa waṣṣainal-insāna biwālidaihi iḥsānā(n), ḥamalathu ummuhū kurhaw wa waḍa‘athu kurhā(n), wa ḥamluhū wa fiṣāluhū ṡalāṡūna syahrā(n), ḥattā iżā balaga asyuddahū wa balaga arba‘īna sanah(tan), qāla rabbi auzi‘nī an asykura ni‘matakal-latī an‘amta ‘alayya wa ‘alā wālidayya wa an a‘mala ṣāliḥan tarḍāhu wa aṣliḥ lī fī żurriyyatī, innī tubtu ilaika wa innī minal-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi ihsaanan hamalathu ummuhoo kurhanw-wa wada'athu kurhanw wa hamluhoo wa fisaaluhoo salaasoona shahraa; hattaaa izaa balagha ashuddahoo wa balagho arba'eena sanatan qaala Rabbi aqzi'neee an ashkura ni'matakal lateee an'amta 'alaiya wa 'alaa waalidaiya wa an a'mala saalihan tardaahu wa aslih lee fee zurriyyatee innee tubtu ilaika wa innee minal muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna nataqabbalu ‘anhum aḥsana mā ‘amilū wa natajāwazu ‘an sayyi'atihim fī aṣḥābil-jannah(ti), wa‘daṣ-ṣidqil-lażī kānū yū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena nata qabbalu 'anhum ahsana maa 'amiloo wa natajaawazu 'an saiyiaatihim feee Ashaabil jannati Wa'das sidqil lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażī qāla liwālidaihi uffil lakumā ata‘idāninī an ukhraja wa qad khalatil qurūnu min qablī, wa humā yastagīṡānillāha wailaka āmin, inna wa‘dallāhi ḥaqq(un), fayaqūlu mā hāżā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazee qaala liwaali daihi uffil lakumaaa ata'idanineee an ukhraja wa qad khalatil quroonu min qablee wa humaa yastagheesaanil laaha wailaka aamin inna wa'dal laahi haqq, fa yaqoolu maa haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna ḥaqqa ‘alaihimul-qaulu fī umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal-jinni wal-ins(i), innahum kānū khāsirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal insi innahum kaanoo khaasireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa likullin darajātum mimmā ‘amilū, wa liyuwaffiyahum a‘mālahum wa hum lā yuẓlamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa likullin darajaatum mimmaa 'amiloo wa liyuwaf fiyahum a'maalahum wa hum laa yuzlamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yu‘raḍul-lażīna kafarū ‘alan-nār(i), ażhabtum ṭayyibātikum fī ḥayātikumud-dun-yā wastamta‘tum bihā, fal-yauma tujzauna ‘ażābal-hūni bimā kuntum tastakbirūna fil-arḍi bigairil-ḥaqqi wa bimā kuntum tafsuqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan Naai azhabtum taiyibaatikum fee hayaatikumud dunyaa wastam ta'tum bihaa fal Yawma tujzawna 'azaabal hooni bimaa kuntum tastakbiroona fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa bimaa kuntum tafsuqoon

ayah.transliteration: Ważkur akhā ‘ād(in), iż anżara qaumahū bil-aḥqāfi wa qad khalatin-nużuru mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihī allā ta‘budū illallāh(a), innī akhāfu ‘alaikum ‘ażāba yaumin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wazkur akhaa 'Aad, iz anzara qawmahoo bil Ahqaafi wa qad khalatin nuzuru mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfiheee allaa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Qālū aji'tanā lita'fikanā ‘an ālihatinā fa'tinā bimā ta‘idunā in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo aji'tanaa litaa fikanaa 'an aalihatinaa faatinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen
