ayah.transliteration: Qāla innamal ‘ilmu ‘indallāh(i), wa uballigukum mā ursiltu bihī wa lākinnī arākum qauman tajhalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala innamal 'ilmu indal laahi wa uballighukum maaa uriltu bihee wa laakinneee araakum qawman tajhaloon

ayah.transliteration: Falammā ra'auhu ‘āriḍam mustaqbila audiyatihim, qālū hāżā ‘āriḍum mumṭirunā, bal huwa masta‘jaltum bih(ī), rīḥun fīhā ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Falammaa ra awhu 'aaridam mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaaloo haazaa 'aaridum mumtirunaa; bal huwa masta'jaltum bihee reehun feehaa 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Tudammiru kulla syai'im bi'amri rabbihā fa'aṣbaḥū lā yurā illā masākinuhum, każālika najzil-qaumal-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Tudammiru kulla shai'im bi-amri Rabbihaa fa asbahoo laa yuraaa illaa masaakinuhum; kazaalika najzil qawmal mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad makkannāhum fīmā im makkannākum fīhi wa ja‘alnā lahum sam‘aw wa abṣāraw wa af'idah(tan), famā agnā ‘anhum sam‘uhum wa lā abṣāruhum wa lā af'idatuhum min syai'in iż kānū yajḥadūna bi'āyātillāhi wa ḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad makkannaahum feemaaa im makkannaakum feehi waj'alnaa lahum sam'anw wa absaaranw wa af'idatan famaaa aghnaa 'anhum samu'uhum wa laaa absaaruhum wa laaa af'idatuhum min shai'in iz kaanoo yajhadoona bi Aayaatil laahi wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ahlaknā mā ḥaulakum minal-qurā wa ṣarrafnal-āyāti la‘allahum yarji‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad ahlaknaa ma hawlakum minal quraa wa sarrafnal Aayaati la'allahum yarji'oon

ayah.transliteration: Falau lā naṣarahumul-lażīnattakhażū min dūnillāhi qurbānan ālihah(tan), bal ḍallū ‘anhum, wa żālika ifkuhum wa mā kānū yaftarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaw laa nasarahumul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi qurbaanan aalihatam bal dalloo 'anhum' wa zaalika ifkuhum wa maa kaanoo yaftaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż ṣarafnā ilaika nafaram minal-jinni yastami‘ūnal-qur'ān(a), falammā ḥaḍarūhu qālū anṣitū, falammā quḍiya wallau ilā qaumihim munżirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz sarafinaaa ilaika nafaram minal jinni yastami'oonal Quraana falammaa hadaroohu qaalooo ansitoo falammaa qudiya wallaw ilaa qawmihim munzireen

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā qaumanā innā sami‘nā kitāban unzila mim ba‘di mūsā muṣaddiqal limā baina yadaihi yahdī ilal-ḥaqqi wa ilā ṭarīqim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa qawmanaaa innaa sami'naa Kitaaban unzila mim ba'di Moosa musaddiqal limaa baina yadihi yahdeee ilal haqqi wa ilaa Tareeqim Mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā qaumanā ajībū dā‘iyallāhi wa āminū bihī yagfir lakum min żunūbikum wa yujirkum min ‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Yaa qawmanaaa ajeeboo daa'iyal laahi wa aaminoo bihee yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum wa yujirkum min 'azaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mal lā yujib dā‘iyallāhi falaisa bimu‘jizin fil-arḍi wa laisa lahū min dūnihī auliyā'(u), ulā'ika fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa mal laa yujib daa'iyal laahi falaisa bimu'jizin fil ardi wa laisa lahoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'; ulaaa ika fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau annallāhal-lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa lam ya‘ya bikhalqihinna biqādirin ‘alā ay yuḥyiyal-mautā, balā innahū ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal larda wa lam ya'ya bikhal qihinna biqaadirin 'alaaa anyyuhiyal mawtaa; balaaa innahoo 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa yauma yu‘raḍul-lażīna kafarū ‘alan-nār(i), alaisa hāżā bil-ḥaqq(i), qālū balā wa rabbinā, qāla fażūqul-‘ażāba bimā kuntum takfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan naari alaisa haaza bil haqq; qaaloo balaa wa Rabbinaa; qaala fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Faṣbir kamā ṣabara ulul-‘azmi minar-rusuli wa lā tasta‘jil lahum, ka'annahum yauma yarauna mā yū‘adūn(a), lam yalbaṡū illā sā‘atam min nahār(in), balāg(un), fahal yuhlaku illal-qaumul-fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasbir kamaa sabara ulul 'azmi minar Rusuli wa laa tasta'jil lahum; ka annahum Yawma yarawna maa yoo'adoona lam yalbasooo illaa saa'atam min nahaar; balaagh; fahal yuhlaku illal qawmul faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna kafarū wa ṣaddū ‘an sabīlillāhi aḍalla a‘mālahum.
ayah.translation: Allazeena kafaroo wa saddoo'an sabeelil laahi adalla a'maalahum

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa āmanū bimā nuzzila ‘alā muḥammadiw wa huwal-ḥaqqu mir rabbihim, kaffara ‘anhum sayyi'ātihim wa aṣlaḥa bālahum.
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa aamanoo bimaa nuzzila 'alaa Muhammadinw-wa huwal haqqu mir Rabbihim kaffara 'anhum saiyiaatihim wa aslaha baalahum

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annal-lażīna kafaruttaba‘ul-bāṭila wa annal-lażīna āmanuttaba‘ul-ḥaqqa mir rabbihim, każālika yaḍribullāhu lin-nāsi amṡālahum.
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annal lazeena kafarut taba'ul baatila wa annal lazeena aamanut taba'ul haqqa mir Rabbihim; kazaalika yadribul laahu linnaasi amsaalahum

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā laqītumul-lażīna kafarū faḍarbar-riqāb(i), ḥattā iżā aṡkhantumūhum fa syuddul-waṡāq(a), fa'immā mannam ba‘du wa immā fidā'an ḥattā taḍa‘al-ḥarbu auzārahā - żālika - wa lau yasyā'ullāhu lantaṣara minhum wa lākil liyabluwa ba‘ḍakum biba‘ḍ(in), wal-lażīna qutilū fī sabīlillāhi falay yuḍilla a‘mālahum.
ayah.translation: Fa-izaa laqeetumul lazeena kafaroo fadarbar riqaab, hattaaa izaa askhan tumoohum fashuddul wasaaq, fa immaa mannnam ba'du wa immaa fidaaa'an hattaa tada'al harbu awzaarahaa; zaalika wa law yashaaa'ul laahu lantasara minhum wa laakil laiyabluwa ba'dakum biba'd; wallazeena qutiloo fee sabeelil laahi falany yudilla a'maalahum

ayah.transliteration: Sayahdīhim wa yuṣliḥu bālahum.
ayah.translation: Sa-yahdeehim wa yusihu baalahum

ayah.transliteration: Wa yudkhiluhumul-jannata ‘arrafahā lahum.
ayah.translation: Wa yudkhiluhumul jannata 'arrafahaa lahum

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū in tanṣurullāha yanṣurkum wa yuṡabbit aqdāmakum.
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo in tansurul laaha yansurkum wa yusabbit aqdaamakum

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna kafarū fata‘sal lahum wa aḍalla a‘mālahum.
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kafaroo fata's al lahum wa adalla a'maalahum

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahum karihū mā anzalallāhu fa aḥbaṭa a‘mālahum.
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahum karihoo maaa anzalal laahu faahbata a'maalahum

ayah.transliteration: Afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fayanẓurū kaifa kāna ‘āqibatul-lażīna min qablihim, dammarallāhu ‘alaihim, wa lil-kāfirīna amṡāluhā.
ayah.translation: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fayanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; dammaral laahu 'alaihim wa lilkaafireena amsaaluhaa

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annallāha maulal-lażīna āmanū wa annal-kāfirīna lā maulā lahum.
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annal laaha mawlal lazeena aamanoo wa annal kaafireena laa mawlaa lahum

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha yudkhilul-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), wal-lażīna kafarū yatamatta‘ūna wa ya'kulūna kamā ta'kulul-an‘āmu wan-nāru maṡwal lahum.
ayah.translation: Innal-laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wallazeena kafaroo yatamatta'oona wa yaakuloona kamaa taakuluian'aamu wan Naaru maswallahum

ayah.transliteration: Wa ka'ayyim min qaryatin hiya asyaddu quwwatam min qaryatikal-latī akhrajatk(a), ahlaknāhum falā nāṣira lahum.
ayah.translation: Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatam min qaryatikal lateee akhrajatka ahlaknaahum falaa naasira lahum

ayah.transliteration: Afaman kāna ‘alā bayyinatim mir rabbihī kaman zuyyina lahū sū'u ‘amalihī wattaba‘ū ahwā'ahum.
ayah.translation: Afaman kaana 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbihee kaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum

ayah.transliteration: Maṡalul-jannatil-latī wu‘idal-muttaqūn(a), fīhā anhārum mim mā'in gairi āsin(in), wa anhārum mil labanil lam yatagayyar ṭa‘muh(ū), wa anhārum min khamril lażżatil lisy-syāribīn(a), wa anhārum min ‘asalim muṣaffā(n), wa lahum fīhā min kulliṡ-ṡamarāti wa magfiratum mir rabbihim, kaman huwa khālidun fin-nāri wa suqū mā'an ḥamīman faqaṭṭa‘a am‘ā'ahum.
ayah.translation: Masalul jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona feehaaa anhaarum mim maaa'in ghayri aasininw wa anhaarum mil labanil lam yataghaiyar ta'muhoo wa anhaarum min khamril lazzatil lishshaaribeena wa anhaarum min 'asalim musaffanw wa lahum feeha min kullis samaraati wa maghfiratum mir Rabbihim kaman huwa khaalidun fin naari wa suqoo maaa'an hameeman faqatta'a am'aaa'ahum

ayah.transliteration: Wa minhum may yastami‘u ilaiīk(a), ḥattā iżā kharajū min ‘indika qālū lil-ażīna ūtul-ilma māżā qāla ānifā(n), ulā'ikal-ażīna ṭaba‘allāhu ‘alā qulūbihim wattaba‘ū ahwā'ahum.
ayah.translation: Wa minhum mai yastami' ilaika hattaaa izaa kharajoo min 'indika qaaloo lillazeena ootul 'ilma maazaa qaala aanifaa; ulaaa'ikal lazeena taba'al laahu 'alaa quloobihim wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum

ayah.transliteration: Wal-ażīnahtadau zādahum hudaw wa ātāhum taqwāhum.
ayah.translation: Wallazeenah tadaw zaadahum hudanw wa aataahum taqwaahum

ayah.transliteration: Fahal yanẓurūna illas-ā‘ata an ta'tiyahum bagtah(tan), faqad jā'a asyrāṭuhā, fa'annā lahum iżā jā'athum żikrāhum.
ayah.translation: Fahal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an taatiyahum baghtatan faqad jaaa'a ashraatuhaa; fa-annnaa lahum izaa jaaa'at hum zikraahum

ayah.transliteration: Fa‘lam annahū lā ilāha illallāhu wastagfir liżambika wa lil-u'minīna wal-u'mināt(i), wallāhu ya‘lamu mutaqallabakum wa maṡwākum.
ayah.translation: Fa'lam annahoo laaa ilaaha illal laahu wastaghfir lizambika wa lilmu'mineena walmu'minaat; wallaahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum wa maswaakum

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlul-ażīna āmanū lau lā nuzzilat sūrah(tun), fa iżā unzilat sūratum muḥkamatuw wa żukira fīhal-itāl(u), ra'aital-ażīna fī qulūbihim maraḍuy yanẓurūna ilaika naẓaral-magsyiyyi ‘alaihi minal-maut(i), fa'aulā lahum.
ayah.translation: Wa yaqoolul lazeena aamanoo law laa nuzzilat Sooratun fa izaaa unzilat Sooratum Muhkamatunw wa zukira feehal qitaalu ra aytal lazeena fee quloobihim maraduny yanzuroona ilaika nazaral maghshiyyi 'alaihi minal mawti fa'awlaa lahum

ayah.transliteration: Ṭā‘atuw wa qaulum ma‘rūf(un), fa'iżā ‘azamal-amr(u), falau ṣadaqullāha lakāna khairal lahum.
ayah.translation: Taa'atunw wa qawlum ma'roof; fa izaa 'azamal amru falaw sadaqul laaha lakaana khairal lahum

ayah.transliteration: Fahal ‘asaitum in tawallaitum an tufsidū fil-arḍi wa tuqaṭṭi‘ū arḥāmakum.
ayah.translation: Fahal 'asaitum in tawallaitum an tufsidoo fil ardi wa tuqatti'ooo arhaamakum

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ikal-lażīna la‘anahumullāhu fa aṣammahum wa a‘mā abṣārahum.
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena la'anahumul laahu fa asammahum wa a'maaa absaarahum

ayah.transliteration: Afalā yatadabbarūnal-qur'āna am ‘alā qulūbin aqfāluhā.
ayah.translation: Afalaa yatadabbaroonal Qur-aana am 'alaa quloobin aqfaaluhaa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīnartaddū ‘alā adbārihim mim ba‘di mā tabayyana lahumul-hudasy-syaiṭānu sawwala lahum, wa amlā lahum.
ayah.translation: Innal lazeenar taddoo 'alaaa adbaarihim mim ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudash Shaitaanu sawwala lahum wa amlaa lahum

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahum qālū lil-lażīna karihū mā nazzalallāhu sanuṭī‘ukum fī ba‘ḍil-amr(i), wallāhu ya‘lamu isrārahum.
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahum qaaloo lillazeena karihoo maa nazzalal laahu sanutee'ukum fee ba'dil amri wallaahu ya'lamu israarahum

ayah.transliteration: Fa kaifa iżā tawaffathumul-malā'ikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa adbārahum.
ayah.translation: Fakaifa izaa tawaffat humul malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum wa adbaa rahum

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahumuttaba‘ū mā askhaṭallāha wa karihū riḍwānahū fa aḥbaṭa a‘mālahum.
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahumut taba'oo maaa askhatal laaha wa karihoo ridwaanahoo fa ahbata a'maalahum

ayah.transliteration: Am ḥasibal-lażīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun allay yukhrijallāhu aḍgānahum.
ayah.translation: Am hasibal lazeena fee quloobihim maradun al lan yukhrijal laahu adghaanahum

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau nasyā'u la'arainākahum fala‘araftahum bisīmāhum, wa lata‘rifannahum fī laḥnil-qaul(i), wallāhu ya‘lamu a‘mālakum.
ayah.translation: Wa law nashaaa'u la-arainaakahum fala 'araftahum bi seemaahum; wa lata'rifan nahum fee lahnil qawl; wallaahu ya'lamu a'maalakum

ayah.transliteration: Wa lanabluwannakum ḥattā na‘lamal-mujāhidīna minkum waṣ-ṣābirīn(a), wa nabluwa akhbārakum.
ayah.translation: Wa lanabluwannakum hattaa na'lamal mujaahideena minkum wassaabireena wa nabluwa akhbaarakum

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna kafarū wa ṣaddū ‘an sabīlillāhi wa syāqqur-rasūla mim ba‘di mā tabayyana lahumul-hudā lay yaḍurrullāha syai'ā(n), wa sayuḥbiṭu a‘mālahum.
ayah.translation: Innnal lazeena kafaroo wa saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi wa shaaaqqur Rasoola mim ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudaa lany yadurrul laaha shai'anw wa sa yuhbitu a'maalahum

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū aṭī‘ullāha wa aṭī‘ur-rasūla wa lā tubṭilū a‘mālakum.
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasoola wa laa tubtilooo a'maalakum

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna kafarū wa ṣaddū ‘an sabīlillāhi ṡumma mātū wa hum kuffārun falay yagfirallāhu lahum.
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena kafaroo wa saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi summa maatoo wa hum kuffaarun falany yaghfirallaahu lahum

ayah.transliteration: Falā tahinū wa tad‘ū ilas-salm(i), wa antumul-a‘laun(a), wallāhu ma‘akum wa lay yatirakum a‘mālakum.
ayah.translation: Falaa tahinoo wa tad'ooo ilas salmi wa antumul a'lawna wallaahu ma'akum wa lany yatirakum a'maalakum

ayah.transliteration: Innamal-ḥayātud-dun-yā la‘ibuw wa lahw(un), wa in tu'minū wa tattaqū yu'tikum ujūrakum wa lā yas'alkum amwālakum.
ayah.translation: Innamal hayaatud dunyaa la'ibunw wa lahw; wa in to'minoo wa tattaqoo yu'tikum ujoorakum wa laa yas'alkum amwaalakum

ayah.transliteration: Iy yas'alkumūhā fa yuḥfikum tabkhalū wa yukhrij aḍgānakum.
ayah.translation: Iny yas'alkumoohaa fa yuhfikum tabkhaloo wa yukhrij adghaanakum

ayah.transliteration: Hā antum hā'ulā'i tud‘auna litunfiqū fī sabīlillāh(i), fa minkum may yabkhal(u), wa may yabkhal fa innamā yabkhalu ‘an nafsih(ī),  wallāhul-ganiyyu wa antumul-fuqarā'(u), wa in tatawallau yastabdil qauman gairakum, ṡumma lā yakūnū amṡālakum.
ayah.translation: haaa antum haaa'ulaaa'i tud'awna litunfiqoo fee sabeelillaahi faminkum many yabkhalu wa many yabkhal fa innamaa yabkhalu 'an nafsih; wallaahu Ghaniyyu wa antumul fuqaraaa'; wa in tatwal law yastabdil qawman ghairakum summa laa yakoonooo amsaalakum

ayah.transliteration: Innā fataḥnā laka fatḥam mubīnā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaa fatahnaa laka Fatham Mubeenaa

ayah.transliteration: Liyagfira lakallāhu mā taqaddama min żambika wa mā ta'akhkhara wa yutimma ni‘matahū ‘alaika wa yahdiyaka ṣirāṭam mustaqīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Liyaghfira lakal laahu maa taqaddama min zambika wa maa ta akhkhara wa yutimma ni'matahoo 'alaika wa yahdiyaka siraatam mustaqeema

ayah.transliteration: Wa yanṣurakallāhu naṣran ‘azīzā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yansurakal laahu nasran 'azeezaa

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī anzalas-sakīnata fī qulūbil-mu'minīna liyazdādū īmānam ma‘a īmānihim, wa lillāhi junūdus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa kānallāhu ‘alīman ḥakīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazeee anzalas sakeenata fee quloobil mu'mineena liyazdaadooo eemaanamma'a eemaanihim; wa lillaahi junoodus samawaati wal ard; wa kaanal laahu 'Aleeman Hakeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Liyudkhilal-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wa yukaffira ‘anhum sayyi'ātihim, wa kāna żālika ‘indallāhi fauzan ‘aẓīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Liyudkhilal mu'mineena walmu'minaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa wa yukaffira 'anhum saiyi aatihim; wa kaana zaalika 'indal laahi fawzan 'azeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yu‘ażżibal-munāfiqīna wal-munāfiqāti wal-musyrikīna wal-musyrikātiẓ-ẓānnīna billāhi ẓannas-sau'(i), ‘alaihim dā'iratus-sau'(i), wa gaḍiballāhu ‘alaihim wa la‘anahum wa a‘adda lahum jahannam(a), wa sā'at maṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yu'azzibal munaafiqeena walmunaafiqaati wal mushrikeena walmushrikaatiz zaaanneena billaahi zannas saw'; 'alaihim daaa'iratus saw'i wa ghadibal laahu 'alaihim wa la'anahum wa a'adda lahum jahannama wa saaa' at maseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi junūdus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa kānallāhu ‘azīzan ḥakīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahi junoodus samaawaati wal ard; wa kaanal laahu 'azeezan hakeema

ayah.transliteration: Innā arsalnāka syāhidaw wa mubasysyiraw wa nażīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaaa arsalnaaka shaahi danw wa mubashshiranw wa nazeera

ayah.transliteration: Litu'minū billāhi wa rasūlihī wa tu‘azzirūhu wa tuwaqqirūh(u), wa tusabbiḥūhu bukrataw wa aṣīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Litu minoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa tu'azziroohu watuwaqqiroohu watusabbi hoohu bukratanw wa aseelaa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yubāyi‘ūnaka innamā yubāyi‘ūnallāh(a), yadullāhi fauqa aidīhim, faman nakaṡa fa'innamā yankuṡu ‘alā nafsih(ī), wa man aufā bimā ‘āhada ‘alaihullāha fa sayu'tīhi ajran ‘aẓīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yubaayi'oonaka innamaa yubaayi'oonal laaha yadul laahi fawqa aydehim; faman nakasa fainnamaa yuankusu 'alaa nafsihee wa man awfaa bimaa 'aahada 'alihul laaha fasa yu'teehi ajran 'azeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Sayaqūlu lakal-mukhallafūna minal-a‘rābi syagalatnā amwālunā wa ahlūnā fastagfir lanā, yaqūlūna bi'alsinatihim mā laisa fī qulūbihim, qul famay yamliku lakum minallāhi syai'an in arāda bikum ḍarran au arāda bikum naf‘ā(n), bal kānallāhu bimā ta‘malūna khabīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Sa yaqoolu lakal mukhal lafoona minal-A'raabi shaighalatnaaa amwaalunaa wa ahloonaa fastaghfir lanaa; yaqooloona bi alsinatihim maa laisa fee quloobihim; qul famany yamliku lakum minal laahi shai'an in araada bikum darran aw araada bikum naf'aa; bal kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeeraa

ayah.transliteration: Bal ẓanantum allay yanqalibar-rasūlu wal-mu'minūna ilā ahlīhim abadaw wa zuyyina żālika fī qulūbikum wa ẓanantum ẓannas-sau'(i), wa kuntum qaumam būrā(n).
ayah.translation: Bal zanantum al lany yanqalibar Rasoolu walmu'minoona ilaaa ahleehim abadanw wa zuyyina zaalika fee quloobikum wa zanantum zannnas saw'i wa kuntum qawmam booraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mal lam yu'mim billāhi wa rasūlihī fa'innā a‘tadnā lil-kāfirīna sa‘īrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa mal lam yu'mim billaahi wa Rasoolihee fainnaaa a'tadnaa lilkaafireena sa'eeraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), yagfiru limay yasyā'u wa yu‘ażżibu may yasyā'(u), wa kānallāhu gafūrar raḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahii mulkus samaawaati wal ard; yaghfiru limany yashaaa'u wa yu'azzibu many yashaaa'; wa kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

ayah.transliteration: Sayaqūlul-mukhallafūna iżanṭalaqtum ilā magānima lita'khużūhā żarūnā nattabi‘kum, yurīdūna ay yubaddilū kalāmallāh(i), qul lan tattabi‘ūnā każālikum qālallāhu min qabl(u), fasayaqūlūna bal taḥsudūnanā, bal kānū lā yafqahūna illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Sa yaqoolul mukhalla foona izan talaqtum ilaa maghaanima litaakhuzoohaa zaroonaa nattabi'kum yureedoona any yubaddiloo Kalaamallaah; qul lan tattabi'oonaa kazaalikum qaalal laahu min qablu fasa yaqooloona bal tahsudoonanna; bal kaanoo laa yafqahoona illaa qaleela

ayah.transliteration: Qul lil-mukhallafīna minal-a‘rābi satud‘auna ilā qaumin ulī ba'sin syadīdin tuqātilūnahum au yuslimūn(a), fa'in tuṭī‘ū yu'tikumullāhu ajran ḥasanā(n), wa in tatawallau kamā tawallaitum min qablu yu‘ażżibkum ‘ażāban alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul lilmukhallafeena minal A'raabi satud'awna ilaa qawmin ulee baasin shadeedin tuqaati loonahum aw yuslimoona fa in tutee'oo yu'tikumul laahu ajran hasananw wa in tatawallaw kamaa tawallaitum min qablu yu'azzibkum 'azaaban aleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Laisa ‘alal-a‘mā ḥarajuw wa lā ‘alal-a‘raji ḥarajuw wa lā ‘alal-marīḍi ḥaraj(uw),  wa may yuṭi‘illāha wa rasūlahū yudkhilhu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), wa may yatawalla yu‘ażżibhu ‘ażāban alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw wa laa 'alal a'raji harajunw wa laa 'alal mareedi haraj' wa many yutil'il laaha wa Rasoolahoo yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wa many yatawalla yu'azzibhu 'azaaban aleemaa

ayah.transliteration: Laqad raḍiyallāhu ‘anil-mu'minīna iż yubāyi‘ūnaka  taḥtasy-syajarati fa‘alima mā fī qulūbihim fa'anzalas-sakīnata ‘alaihim wa aṡābahum fatḥan qarībā(n).
ayah.translation: Laqad radiyal laahu 'anil mu'mineena iz yubaayi 'oonaka tahtash shajarati fa'alima maa fee quloobihim fa anzalas sakeenata 'alaihim wa asaa bahum fat han qareebaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa magānima kaṡīratay ya'khużūnahā, wa kānallāhu ‘azīzan ḥakīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maghaanima kaseera tany yaakhuzoonahaa; wa kaanal laahu 'Azeezan Hakeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘adakumullāhu magānima kaṡīratan ta'khużūnahā fa‘ajjala lakum hāżihī wa kaffa aidiyan-nāsi ‘ankum, wa litakūna āyatal lil-mu'minīna wa yahdiyakum ṣirāṭam mustaqīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa'adakumul laahu ma ghaanima kaseeratan taakhuzoo nahaa fa'ajjala lakum haazihee wa kaffa aydiyan naasi 'ankum wa litakoona aayatal lilmu'mineena wa yahdiyakum siraatam mustaqeema

ayah.transliteration: Wa ukhrā lam taqdirū ‘alaihā qad aḥāṭallāhu bihā, wa kānallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ukhraa lam taqdiroo 'alaihaa qad ahaatal laahu bihaa; wa kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeera

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau qātalakumul-lażīna kafarū lawallawul-adbāra ṡumma lā yajidūna waliyyaw wa lā naṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa law qaatalakumul lazeena kafaroo la wallawul adbaara summa laa yajidoona waliyanw-wa laa naseeraa

ayah.transliteration: Sunnatallāhil-latī qad khalat min qabl(u), wa lan tajida lisunnatillāhi tabdīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat min qablu wa lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī kaffa aidiyahum ‘ankum wa aidiyakum ‘anhum bibaṭni makkata mim ba‘di an aẓfarakum ‘alaihim, wa kānallāh bimā ta‘malūna baṣīrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa Huwal lazee kaffa aydiyahum 'ankum wa aydiyakum 'anhum bibatni Makkata mim ba'di an azfarakum 'alaihim; wa kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera

ayah.transliteration: Humul-lażīna kafarū wa ṣaddūkum ‘anil-masjidil-ḥarāmi wal-hadya ma‘kūfan ay yabluga maḥillah(ū), wa lau lā rijālum mu'minūna wa nisā'um mu'minātul lam ta‘lamūhum an taṭa'ūhum fa tuṣībakum minhum ma‘arratum bigairi ‘ilm(in), liyudkhilallāhu fī raḥmatihī may yasyā'(u), lau tazayyalū la‘ażżabnal-lażīna kafarū minhum ‘ażāban alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Humul lazeena kafaroo wa saddookum 'anil-Masjidil-Haraami walhadya ma'koofan any yablugha mahillah; wa law laa rijaalum mu'minoona wa nisaaa'um mu'minaatul lam ta'lamoohum an tata'oohum fatuseebakum minhum ma'arratum bighairi 'ilmin liyud khilal laahu fee rahmatihee many yashaaa'; law tazayyaloo la'azzabnal lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaaban aleema

ayah.transliteration: Iż ja‘alal-lażīna kafarū fī qulūbihimul-ḥamiyyata ḥamiyyatal-jāhiliyyati fa anzalallāhu sakīnatahū ‘alā rasūlihī wa ‘alal-mu'minīna wa alzamahum kalimatat-taqwā wa kānū aḥaqqa bihā wa ahlahā, wa kānallāhu bikulli syai'in ‘alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Iz ja'alal lazeena kafaroo fee quloobihimul hamiyyata hamiyyatal jaahiliyyati fa anzalal laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaa Rasoolihee wa 'alal mu mineena wa alzamahum kalimatat taqwaa wa kaanooo ahaqqa bihaa wa ahlahaa; wa kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in Aleema

ayah.transliteration: Laqad ṣadaqallāhu rasūlahur-ru'yā bil-ḥaqq(i), latadkhulunnal-masjidal-ḥarāma in syā'allāhu āminīn(a), muḥalliqīna ru'ūsakum wa muqaṣṣirīn(a), lā takhāfūn(a), fa‘alima mā lam ta‘lamū faja‘ala min dūni żālika fatḥan qarībā(n).
ayah.translation: Laqad sadaqal laahu Rasoolahur ru'yaa bilhaqq, latadkhulunnal Masjidal-Haraama in shaaa'al laahu aamineena muhalliqeena ru'oosakum wa muqassireena laa takhaafoona fa'alima maa lam ta'lamoo faja'ala min dooni zaalika fathan qareebaa

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī arsala rasūlahū bil-hudā wa dīnil-ḥaqqi liyuẓhirahū ‘alad-dīni kullih(ī), wa kafā billāhi syahīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazeee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullih; wa kafaa billaahi Shaheeda

ayah.transliteration: Muḥammadur rasūlullāh(i), wal-lażīna ma‘ahū asyiddā'u ‘alal-kuffāri ruḥamā'u bainahum tarāhum rukka‘an sujjaday yabtagūna faḍlam minallāhi wa riḍwānā(n), sīmāhum fī wujūhihim min aṡaris-sujūd(i), żālika maṡaluhum fit-taurāh(ti), wa maṡaluhum fil-injīl(i), kazar‘in akhraja syaṭ'ahū fa āzarahū fastaglaẓa fastawā ‘alā sūqihī yu‘jibuz-zurrā‘a liyagīẓa bihimul-kuffār(a), wa‘adallāhul-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti minhum magfirataw wa ajran ‘aẓīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Muhammadur Rasoolul laah; wallazeena ma'ahooo ashiddaaa'u 'alal kuffaaari ruhamaaa'u bainahum taraahum rukka'an sujjadany yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi wa ridwaanan seemaahum fee wujoohihim min asaris sujood; zaalika masaluhum fit tawraah; wa masaluhum fil Injeeli kazar'in akhraja shat 'ahoo fa 'aazarahoo fastaghlaza fastawaa 'alaa sooqihee yu'jibuz zurraa'a liyagheeza bihimul kuffaar; wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati minhum maghfiratanw wa ajran 'azeemaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tuqaddimū baina yadayillāhi wa rasūlihī wattaqullāh(a), innallāha samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tuqaddimoo baina yada yil laahi wa Rasoolihee wattaqul laah; innal laaha samee'un 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tarfa‘ū aṣwātakum fauqa ṣautin-nabiyyi wa lā tajharū lahū bil-qauli kajahri ba‘ḍikum liba‘ḍin an taḥbaṭa a‘mālukum wa antum lā tasy‘urūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tarfa'ooo aswaatakum fawqa sawtin Nabiyi wa laa tajharoo lahoo bilqawli kajahri ba'dikum liba 'din an tahbata a 'maalukum wa antum laa tash'uroon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yaguḍḍūna aṣwātahum ‘inda rasūlillāhi ulā'ikal-lażīnamtaḥanallāhu qulūbahum lit-taqwā, lahum magfiratuw wa ajrun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yaghud doona aswaatahum 'inda Rasoolil laahi ulaaa'ikal lazeenam tah anal laahu quloobahum littaqwaa; lahum maghfiratunw waajrun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yunādūnaka miw warā'il-ḥujurāti akṡaruhum lā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yunaadoo naka minw waraaa'il hujuraati aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau annahum ṣabarū ḥattā takhruja ilaihim lakāna khairal lahum, wallāhu gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa law annahum sabaroo hatta takhruja ilaihim lakaana khairal lahum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū in jā'akum fāsiqum binaba'in fa tabayyanū an tuṣībū qaumam bijahālatin fa tuṣbiḥū ‘alā mā fa‘altum nādimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo in jaaa'akum faasqum binaba in fatabaiyanooo an tuseeboo qawmam bijahalatin fatusbihoo 'alaa maa fa'altum naadimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa‘lamū anna fīkum rasūlallāh(i), lau yuṭī‘ukum fī kaṡīrim minal-amri la‘anittum wa lākinnallāha ḥabbaba ilaikumul-īmāna wa zayyanahū fī qulūbikum wa karraha ilaikumul-kufra wal-fusūqa wal-‘iṣyān(a), ulā'ika humur-rāsyidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa'lamooo anna feekum Rasoolal laah; law yutee'ukum fee kaseerim minal amrila'anittum wa laakinnal laaha habbaba ilaikumul eemaana wa zaiyanahoo fee quloobikum wa karraha ilaikumul kufra walfusooqa wal'isyaan; ulaaaika humur raashidoon

ayah.transliteration: Faḍlam minallāhi wa ni‘mah(tan), wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fadlam minal laahi wa ni'mah; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa in ṭā'ifatāni minal-mu'minīnaqtatalū fa aṣliḥū bainahumā, fa im bagat iḥdāhumā ‘alal-ukhrā fa qātilul-latī tabgī ḥattā tafī'a ilā amrillāh(i), fa in fā'at fa aṣliḥū bainahumā bil-‘adli wa aqsiṭū, innallāha yuḥibbul-muqsiṭīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in taaa'ifataani minal mu'mineenaq tataloo faaslihoo bainahumaa fa-im baghat ih daahumaa 'alal ukhraa faqaatilul latee tabhee hattaa tafeee'a ilaaa amril laah; fa-in faaa't fa aslihoo bainahumaa bil'adli wa aqsitoo innal laaha yuhibbul muqsiteen

ayah.transliteration: Innamal-mu'minūna ikhwatun fa aṣliḥū baina akhawaikum wattaqullāha la‘allakum turḥamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamal mu'minoona ikhwatun fa aslihoo baina akhawaykum wattaqul laaha la'allakum tuhamoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā yaskhar qaumum min qaumin ‘asā ay yakūnū khairam minhum wa lā nisā'um min nisā'in ‘asā ay yakunna khairam minhunn(a), wa lā talmizū anfusakum wa lā tanābazū bil-alqāb(i), bi'salismul-fusūqu ba‘dal-īmān(i), wa mal lam yatub fa ulā'ika humuẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa yaskhar qawmum min qawmin 'asaaa anyyakoonoo khairam minhum wa laa nisaaa'um min nisaaa'in 'Asaaa ay yakunna khairam minhunna wa laa talmizooo bil alqaab; bi'sal ismul fusooqu ba'dal eemaan; wa mal-lam yatub fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanujtanibū kaṡīram minaẓ-ẓann(i), inna ba‘daẓ-ẓanni iṡmuw wa lā tajassasū wa lā yagtab ba‘ḍukum ba‘ḍā(n), ayuḥibbu aḥadukum ay ya'kula laḥma akhīhi maitan fa karihtumūh(u), wattaqullāh(a), innallāha tawwābur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanuj taniboo kaseeram minaz zanni inna ba'daz zanniismunw wa laa tajassasoo wa la yaghtab ba'dukum ba'daa; a yuhibbu ahadukum any yaakula lahma akheehi maitan fakarih tumooh; wattaqul laa; innal laaha tawwaabur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nāsu innā khalaqnākum min żakariw wa unṡā wa ja‘alnākum syu‘ūbaw wa qabā'ila lita‘ārafū, inna akramakum ‘indallāhi atqākum, innallāha ‘alīmun khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu innaa khalaqnaakum min zakarinw wa unsaa wa ja'alnaakum shu'oobanw wa qabaaa'ila lita'aarafoo inna akramakum 'indal laahi atqaakum innal laaha 'Aleemun khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Qālatil-a‘rābu āmannā, qul lam tu'minū wa lākin qūlū aslamnā wa lammā yadkhulil-īmānu fī qulūbikum, wa in tuṭī‘ullāha wa rasūlahū lā yalitkum min a‘mālikum syai'ā(n), innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qaalatil-A 'raabu aamannaa qul lam tu'minoo wa laakin qoolooo aslamnaa wa lamma yadkhulil eemaanu fee quloobikum wa in tutee'ul laaha wa Rasoolahoo laa yalitkum min a'maalikum shai'aa; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Innamal-mu'minūnal-lażīna āmanū billāhi wa rasūlihī ṡumma lam yartābū wa jāhadū bi'amwālihim wa anfusihim fī sabīlillāh(i), ulā'ika humuṣ-ṣādiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamal muu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee summa lam yartaaboo wa jaahadoo biamwaalihim wa anfusihim fee sabeelil laah; ulaaaika humus saadiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul atu‘alimūnallāha bidīnikum, wallāhu ya‘lamu mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), wallāhu bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Qul atu'allimoonal laaha bideenikum wallaahu ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ard; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Yamunnūna ‘alaika an aslamū, qul lā tamunnū ‘alayya islāmakum, balillāhu yamunnu ‘alaikum an hadākum lil-īmāni in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yamunnoona 'alaika an aslamoo qul laa tamunnoo 'alaiya Islaamakum balillaahu yamunnu 'alaikum an hadaakum lil eemaani in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha ya‘lamu gaibas-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wallāhu baṣīrum bimā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha ya'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu baseerum bimaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Qāf, wal-qur'ānil-majīd(i).
ayah.translation: Qaaaf; wal Qur aanil Majeed

ayah.transliteration: Bal ‘ajibū an jā'ahum munżirum minhum faqālal-kāfirūna hāżā syai'un ‘ajīb(un).
ayah.translation: Bal 'ajibooo an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiroona haazaa shai'un 'ajeeb

ayah.transliteration: A'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turābā(n), żālika raj‘um ba‘īd(un).
ayah.translation: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Qad ‘alimnā mā tanquṣul-arḍu minhum, wa ‘indanā kitābun ḥafīẓ(un).
ayah.translation: Qad 'alimnaa maa tanqu-sul-ardu minhum wa 'indanaa Kitaabun Hafeez

ayah.transliteration: Bal każżabū bil-ḥaqqi lammā jā'ahum fahum fī amrim marīj(in).
ayah.translation: Bal kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum feee amrim mareej

ayah.transliteration: Afalam yanẓurū ilas-samā'i fauqahum kaifa banaināhā wa zayyanāhā wa mā lahā min furūj(in).
ayah.translation: Afalam yanzurooo ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa wa zaiyannaahaa wa maa lahaa min furooj

ayah.transliteration: Wal-arḍa madadnāhā wa alqainā fīhā rawāsiya wa ambatnā fīhā min kulli zaujim bahīj(in).
ayah.translation: Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjim baheej

ayah.transliteration: Tabṣirataw wa żikrā likulli ‘abdim munīb(in).
ayah.translation: Tabsiratanw wa zikraa likulli 'abdim muneeb

ayah.transliteration: Wa nazzalnā minas-samā'i mā'am mubārakan fa'ambatnā bihī jannātiw wa ḥabbal-ḥaṣīd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa ambatnaa bihee jannaatinw wa habbal haseed

ayah.transliteration: Wan-nakhla bāsiqātil lahā ṭal‘un naḍīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wannakhla baasiqaatil laha tal'un nadeed

ayah.transliteration: Rizqal lil-‘ibād(i), wa aḥyainā bihī baldatam maitā(n), każālikal-khurūj(u).
ayah.translation: Rizqal lil'ibaad, wa ahyainaa bihee baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khurooj

ayah.transliteration: Każżabat qablahum qaumu nūḥiw wa aṣḥābur-rassi wa ṡamūd(u).
ayah.translation: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wa Ashaabur Rassi wa Samood

ayah.transliteration: Wa ‘āduw wa fir‘aunu wa ikhwānu lūṭ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa 'Aadunw wa Fir'awnu wikhwaanu loot

ayah.transliteration: Wa aṣḥābul-aikati wa qaumu tubba‘(in), kullun każżabar-rusula faḥaqqa wa‘īd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa Ashaabul Aykati wa qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa wa'eed

ayah.transliteration: Afa ‘ayīna bil-khalqil-awwal(i), bal hum fī labsim min khalqin jadīd(in).
ayah.translation: Afa'a yeenaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fee labsim min khalqin jadeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnal-insāna wa na‘lamu mā tuwaswisu bihī nafsuh(ū), wa naḥnu aqrabu ilaihi min ḥablil-warīd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana wa na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihee nafsuhoo wa Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil wareed

ayah.transliteration: Iż yatalaqqal-mutalaqqiyāni ‘anil-yamīni wa ‘anisy-syimāli qa‘īd(un).
ayah.translation: 'Iz yatalaqqal mutalaqqi yaani 'anil yameeni wa 'anish shimaali qa'eed

ayah.transliteration: Mā yalfiẓu min qaulin illā ladaihi raqībun ‘atīd(un).
ayah.translation: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqeebun 'ateed

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'at sakratul-mauti bil-ḥaqq(i), żālika mā kunta minhu taḥīd(u).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw wa shaheed

ayah.transliteration: Wa nufikha fiṣ-ṣūr(i), żālika yaumul-wa‘īd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa nufikha fis Soor; zaalika yawmul wa'eed

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'at kullu nafsim ma‘ahā sā'iquw wa syahīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw wa shaheed

ayah.transliteration: Laqad kunta fī gaflatim min hāżā fakasyafnā ‘anka giṭā'aka fabaṣarukal-yauma ḥadīd(un).
ayah.translation: Laqad kunta fee ghaf latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka fabasarukal yawma hadeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla qarīnuhū hāżā mā ladayya ‘atīd(un).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala qareenuhoo haazaa maa ladaiya 'ateed

ayah.transliteration: Alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ‘anīd(in).
ayah.translation: Alqiyaa fee Jahannama kulla kaffaarin 'aneed

ayah.transliteration: Mannā‘il lil-khairi mu‘tadim murīb(in).
ayah.translation: Mannaa'il lilkhayri mu'tadim mureeb

ayah.transliteration: Allażī ja‘ala ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhara fa'alqiyāhu fil-‘ażābisy-syadīd(i).
ayah.translation: Allazee ja'ala ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fa alqiyaahu fil'azaabish shadeed

ayah.transliteration: Qāla qarīnuhū rabbanā mā aṭgaituhū wa lākin kāna fī ḍalālim ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Qaala qareenuhoo Rabbanaa maaa atghaituhoo wa laakin kaana fee dalaahim ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya wa qad qaddamtu ilaikum bil-wa‘īd(i).
ayah.translation: Qaala laa takhtasimoo ladaayya wa qad qaddamtu ilaikum bilwa'eed

ayah.transliteration: Mā yubaddalul-qaulu ladayya wa mā ana biẓallāmil lil-‘abīd(i).
ayah.translation: Maa yubaddalul qawlu ladaiya wa maaa ana bizal laamil lil'abeed

ayah.transliteration: Yauma naqūlu lijahannama halimtala'ti wa taqūlu hal mim mazīd(in).
ayah.translation: Yawma naqoolu li'jahannama halim talaati wa taqoolu hal mim mazeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa uzlifatil-jannatu lil-muttaqīna gaira ba‘īd(in).
ayah.translation: Wa uzlifatil jannatu lil muttaqeena ghaira ba'eed

ayah.transliteration: Hāżā mā tū‘adūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓ(in).
ayah.translation: Haaza maa too'adoona likulli awwaabin hafeez

ayah.transliteration: Man khasyiyar-raḥmāna bil-gaibi wa jā'a biqalbim munīb(in).
ayah.translation: Man khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaibi wa jaaa'a biqalbim muneeb

ayah.transliteration: Udkhulūhā bisalām(in), żālika yaumul-khulūd(i).
ayah.translation: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin zaalika yawmul khulood

ayah.transliteration: Lahum mā yasyā'ūna fīhā wa ladainā mazīd(un).
ayah.translation: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona feehaa wa ladainaa mazeed

ayah.transliteration: Wa kam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum asyaddu minhum baṭsyan fanaqqabū fil-bilād(i), hal mim maḥīṣ(in).
ayah.translation: Wa kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fil bilaad, hal mim mahees

ayah.transliteration: Inna fī żālika lażikrā liman kāna lahū qalbun au alqas-sam‘a wa huwa syahīd(un).
ayah.translation: Inna fee zaalika lazikraa liman kaana lahoo qalbun aw alqas sam'a wa huwa shaheed

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnas-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā bainahumā fī sittati ayyām(in), wa mā massanā mil lugūb(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin wa maa massanaa mil lughoob

ayah.transliteration: Faṣbir ‘alā mā yaqūlūna wa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika qabla ṭulū‘isy-syamsi wa qablal-gurūb(i).
ayah.translation: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi wa qablal ghuroob

ayah.transliteration: Wa minal-laili fasabbiḥhu wa adbāras-sujūd(i).
ayah.translation: Wa minal laili fasabbih hu wa adbaaras sujood

ayah.transliteration: Wastami‘ yauma yunādil-munādi mim makānin qarīb(in).
ayah.translation: Wastami' yawma yunaa dil munaadi mim makaanin qareeb

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yasma‘ūnaṣ-ṣaiḥata bil-ḥaqq(i), żālika yaumul-khurūj(i).
ayah.translation: Yawma yasmaoonas sai hata bilhaqq zaalika yawmul khurooj

ayah.transliteration: Innā naḥnu nuḥyī wa numītu wa ilainal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Innaa Nahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa ilainal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Yauma tasyaqqaqul-arḍu ‘anhum sirā‘ā(n), żālika ḥasyrun ‘alainā yasīr(un).
ayah.translation: Yawma tashaqqaqul ardu 'anhum siraa'aa; zaalika hashrun 'alainaa yaseer

ayah.transliteration: Naḥnu a‘lamu bimā yaqūlūna wa mā anta ‘alaihim bijabbār(in), fażakkir bil-qur'āni may yakhāfu wa‘īd(i).
ayah.translation: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona wa maaa anta 'alihim bijabbaarin fazakkir bil quraani many yakhaafu wa'eed

ayah.transliteration: Waż-żāriyāti żarwā(n).
ayah.translation: Waz-zaariyaati zarwaa

ayah.transliteration: Fal-ḥāmilāti wiqrā(n).
ayah.translation: Falhaamilaati wiqraa

ayah.transliteration: Fal-jāriyāti yusrā(n).
ayah.translation: Faljaariyaati yusraa

ayah.transliteration: Fal-muqassimāti amrā(n).
ayah.translation: Falmuqassimaati amraa

ayah.transliteration: Innamā tū‘adūna laṣādiq(un).
ayah.translation: Innamaa too'adoona la-saadiq

ayah.transliteration: Wa innad-dīna lawāqi‘(un).
ayah.translation: Wa innad deena la waaqi'

ayah.transliteration: Was-samā'i żātil-ḥubuk(i).
ayah.translation: Wassamaaa'i zaatil hubuk

ayah.transliteration: Innakum lafī qaulim mukhtalif(in).
ayah.translation: Innakum lafee qawlim mukhtalif

ayah.transliteration: Yu'faku ‘anhu man ufik(a).
ayah.translation: Yu'faku 'anhu man ufik

ayah.transliteration: Qutilal-kharrāṣūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qutilal kharraasoon

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna hum fī gamratin sāhūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena hum fee ghamratin saahoon

ayah.transliteration: Yas'alūna ayyāna yaumud-dīn(i).
ayah.translation: Yas'aloona ayyaana yawmud Deen

ayah.transliteration: Yauma hum ‘alan-nāri yuftanūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma hum 'alan naari yuftanoon

ayah.transliteration: Żūqū fitnatakum, hāżal-lażī kuntum bihī tasta‘jilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zooqoo fitnatakum haa zal lazee kuntum bihee tas ta'jiloon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-muttaqīna fī jannātiw wa ‘uyūn(in).
ayah.translation: Innal muttaqeena fee jannaatinw wa 'uyoon

ayah.transliteration: Ākhiżīna mā ātāhum rabbuhum, innahum kānū qabla żālika muḥsinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Aakhizeena maaa aataahum Rabbuhum; innahum kaanoo qabla zaalika muhsineen

ayah.transliteration: Kānū qalīlam minal-laili mā yahja‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: kaanoo qaleelam minal laili maa yahja'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wa bil-asḥāri hum yastagfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa bilashaari hum yastaghfiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa fī amwālihim ḥaqqul lis-sā'ili wal-maḥrūm(i).
ayah.translation: Wa feee amwaalihim haqqul lissaaa'ili walmahroom

ayah.transliteration: Wa fil-arḍi āyātul lil-mūqinīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa fil ardi aayaatul lilmooqineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa fī anfusikum, afalā tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa feee anfusikum; afalaa tubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa fis-samā'i rizqukum wa mā tū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa fissamaaa'i rizqukum wa maa too'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa wa rabbis-samā'i wal-arḍi innahū laḥaqqum miṡla mā annakum tanṭiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fawa Rabbis samaaa'i wal ardi innahoo lahaqqum misla maa annakum tantiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Hal atāka ḥadīṡu ḍaifi ibrāhīmal-mukramīn(a).
ayah.translation: Hal ataaka hadeesu daifi Ibraaheemal mukrameen

ayah.transliteration: Iż dakhalū ‘alaihi fa qālū salāmā(n), qāla salām(un), qaumum munkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun qawmum munkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Farāga ilā ahlihī fa jā'a bi‘ijlin samīn(in).
ayah.translation: Faraagha ilaaa ahlihee fajaaa'a bi'ijlin sameen

ayah.transliteration: Fa qarrabahū ilaihim, qāla alā ta'kulūn(a).
ayah.translation: Faqarrabahooo ilaihim qaala alaa taakuloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa aujasa minhum khīfah(tan), qālū lā takhaf, wa basysyarūhu bigulāmin ‘alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Fa awjasa minhm khee fatan qaaloo laa takhaf wa bashsharoohu bighulaamin 'aleem

ayah.transliteration: Fa aqbalatimra'atuhū fī ṣarratin fa ṣakkat wajhahā wa qālat ‘ajūzun ‘aqīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fa aqbalatim ra-atuhoo fee sarratin fasakkat wajhahaa wa qaalat 'ajoozun 'aqeem

ayah.transliteration: Qālū każālik(i), qāla rabbuk(i), innahū huwal-ḥakīmul-‘alīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki innahoo huwal hakeemul 'aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla famā khaṭbukum ayyuhal-mursalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala famaa khatbukum ayyuhal mursaloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū innā ursilnā ilā qaumim mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Linursila ‘alaihim ḥijāratam min ṭīn(in).
ayah.translation: Linursila 'alaihim hijaa ratam min teen

ayah.transliteration: Musawwamatan ‘inda rabbika lil-musrifīn(a).
ayah.translation: Musawwamatan 'inda rabbika lilmusrifeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa akhrajnā man kāna fīhā minal-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa akhrajnaa man kaana feehaa minal mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Famā wajadnā fīhā gaira baitim minal-muslimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa wajadnaa feehaa ghaira baitim minal muslimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa taraknā fīhā āyatal lil-lażīna yakhāfūnal-‘ażābal-alīm(a).
ayah.translation: Wa taraknaa feehaaa aayatal lillazeena yakhaafoonal 'azaabal aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa fī mūsā iż arsalnāhu ilā fir‘auna bisulṭānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa fee Moosaaa iz arsalnaahu ilaa Fir'wna bisultaa nim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa tawallā biruknihī wa qāla sāḥirun au majnūn(un).
ayah.translation: Fatawalla biruknihee wa qaala saahirun aw majnoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa akhażnāhu wa junūdahū fanabażnāhum fil-yammi wa huwa mulīm(un).
ayah.translation: Fa akhaznaahu wa junoo dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi wa huwa muleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa fī ‘ādin iż arsalnā ‘alaihimur-rīḥal-‘aqīm(a).
ayah.translation: Wa fee 'Aadin iz arsalnaa 'alaihimur reehal'aqeem

ayah.transliteration: Mā tażaru min syai'in atat ‘alaihi illā ja‘alathu kar-ramīm(i).
ayah.translation: Maa tazaru min shai'in atat 'alaihi illaa ja'alat hu karrameem

ayah.transliteration: Wa fī ṡamūda iż qīla lahum tamatta‘ū ḥattā ḥīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa fee Samooda iz qeela lahum tamatta''oo hattaa heen

ayah.transliteration: Fa‘atau ‘an amri rabbihim fa akhażathumuṣ-ṣā‘iqatu wa hum yanẓurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa'ataw 'an amri Rabbihim fa akhazal humus saa'iqatu wa hum yanzuroon

ayah.transliteration: Famastaṭā‘ū min qiyāmiw wa mā kānū muntaṣirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Famas tataa'oo min qiyaaminw wa maa kaanoo muntasireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa qauma nūḥim min qabl(u), innahum kānū qauman fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa qawma Noohim min qablu innahum kaano qawman faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Was-samā'a banaināhā bi'aidiw wa innā lamūsi‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wassamaaa'a banainaa haa bi aydinw wa innaa lamoosi'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-arḍa farasynāhā fa ni‘mal-māhidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wal arda farashnaahaa fani'mal maahidoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa min kulli syai'in khalaqnā zaujaini la‘allakum tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min kulli shai'in khalaqnaa zawjaini la'allakum tazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Fa firrū ilallāh(i), innī lakum minhu nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Fafirrooo ilal laahi innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā taj‘alū ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhar(a), innī lakum minhu nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa laa taj'aloo ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara innee lakum minhu nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Każālika mā atal-lażīna min qablihim mir rasūlin illā qālū sāḥirun au majnūn(un).
ayah.translation: Kazaalika maaa atal lazeena min qablihim mir Rasoolin illaa qaaloo saahirun aw majnoon

ayah.transliteration: Atawāṣau bih(ī), bal hum qaumun ṭāgūn(a).
ayah.translation: Atawaasaw bih; bal hum qawmun taaghoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa tawalla ‘anhum famā anta bimalūm(in).
ayah.translation: Fatawalla 'anhum famaaa anta bimaloom

ayah.transliteration: Wa żakkir fa innaż-żikra  tanfa‘ul-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa zakkir fa innaz zikraa tanfa'ul mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā khalaqtul-jinna wal-insa illā liya‘budūn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa maa khalaqtul jinna wal insa illaa liya'budoon

ayah.transliteration: Mā urīdu minhum mir rizqiw wa mā urīdu ay yuṭ‘imūn(i).
ayah.translation: Maaa ureedu minhum mir rizqinw wa maaa ureedu anyyut'imoon

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha huwar-razzāqu żul-quwwatil-matīn(u).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha Huwar Razzaaqu Zul Quwwatil Mateen

ayah.transliteration: Fa inna lil-lażīna ẓalamū żanūbam miṡla żanūbi aṣḥābihim falā yasta‘jilūn(i).
ayah.translation: Fa inna lillazeena zalamoo zanoobam misla zanoobi ashaabihim falaa yasta'jiloon

ayah.transliteration: Fa wailul lil-lażīna kafarū miy yaumihimul-lażī yū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fawailul lillazeena kafaroo miny yawmihimul lazee yoo'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Waṭ-ṭūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wat-Toor

ayah.transliteration: Wa kitābim masṭūr(in).
ayah.translation: Wa kitaabim mastoor

ayah.transliteration: Fī raqqim mansyūr(in).
ayah.translation: Fee raqqim manshoor

ayah.transliteration: Wal-baitil-ma‘mūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wal baitil ma'moor

ayah.transliteration: Was-saqfil-marfū‘(i).
ayah.translation: Wassaqfil marfoo'

ayah.transliteration: Wal-baḥril-masjūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wal bahril masjoor

ayah.transliteration: Inna ‘ażāba rabbika lawāqi‘(un).
ayah.translation: Inna 'azaaba Rabbika lawaaqi'

ayah.transliteration: Mā lahū min dāfi‘(in).
ayah.translation: Maa lahoo min daafi'

ayah.transliteration: Yauma tamūrus-samā'u maurā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma tamoorus samaaa'u mawraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa tasīrul-jibālu sairā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa taseerul jibaalu sairaa

ayah.transliteration: Fawailuy yauma'iżil lil-mukażżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fawailuny yawma 'izil lil mukaazzibeen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna hum fī khauḍiy yal‘abūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena hum fee khawdiny yal'aboon

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yuda‘‘ūna ilā nāri jahannama da‘‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma yuda'-'oona ilaa naari jahannama da'-'aa

ayah.transliteration: Hāżihin-nārul-latī kuntum bihā tukażżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Haazihin naarul latee kuntum bihaa tukazziboon

ayah.transliteration: Afasiḥrun hāżā am antum lā tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Afasihrun haazaaaa am antum laa tubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Iṣlauhā faṣbirū au lā taṣbirū, sawā'un ‘alaikum, innamā tujzauna mā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Islawhaa fasbirooo aw laa tasbiroo sawaaa'un 'alaikum innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-muttaqīna fī jannātiw wa na‘īm(in).
ayah.translation: Innal muttaqeena fee jannaatinw wa na'eem

ayah.transliteration: Fākihīna bimā ātāhum rabbuhum, wa waqāhum rabbuhum ‘ażābal-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Faakiheena bimaaa aataahum rabbuhum wa waqaahum rabbuhum 'azaabal jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Kulū wasyrabū hanī'am bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kuloo washraboo haneee 'am bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Muttaki'īna ‘alā sururim maṣfūfah(tin), wa zawwajnāhum biḥūrin ‘īn(in).
ayah.translation: Muttaki'eena 'alaa sururim masfoofatinw wa zawwaj naahum bihoorin 'een

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna āmanū wattaba‘athum żurriyyatuhum bi'īmānin alḥaqnā bihim żurriyyatahum wa mā alatnāhum min ‘amalihim min syai'(in), kullumri'im bimā kasaba rahīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aamanoo wattaba'at hum zurriyyatuhum bieemaanin alhaqnaa bihim zurriyyatahum wa maaa alatnaahum min 'amalihim min shai'; kullum ri'im bimaa kasaba raheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa amdadnāhum bifākihatiw wa laḥmim mimmā yasytahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa amdadnaahum bifaa kihatinw wa lahmim mimmaa yashtahoon

ayah.transliteration: Yatanāza‘ūna fīhā ka'sal lā lagwun fīhā wa lā ta'ṡīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yatanaaza'oona feehaa kaasal laa laghwun feehaa wa laa taaseem

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaṭūfu ‘alaihim gilmānul lahum ka'annahum lu'lu'um maknūn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa yatoofu 'alaihim ghilmaanul lahum ka annahum lu'lu'um maknoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa aqbala ba‘ḍuhum ‘alā ba‘ḍiy yatasā'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa aqbala ba'duhum 'alaa ba'diny yatasaaa'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā musyfiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaalooo innaa kunnaa qablu feee ahlinaa mushfiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa mannallāhu ‘alainā wa waqānā ‘ażābas-samūm(i).
ayah.translation: Famannnal laahu 'alainaa wa waqaanaa 'azaabas samoom

ayah.transliteration: Innā kunnā min qablu nad‘ūh(u), innahū huwal-barrur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Innaa kunnaa min qablu nad'oohu innahoo huwal barrur raheem

ayah.transliteration: Fa żakkir famā anta bini‘mati rabbika  bikāhiniw wa lā majnūn(in).
ayah.translation: Fazakkir famaaa anta bini'mati rabbika bikaahininw wa laa majnoon

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūna syā‘irin natarabbaṣu bihī raibal-manūn(i).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloona shaa'irun natarabbasu bihee raibal manoon

ayah.transliteration: Qul tarabbaṣū fa innī ma‘akum minal-mutarabbiṣīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul tarabbasoo fa innee ma'akum minal mutarabbiseen

ayah.transliteration: Am ta'muruhum aḥlāmuhum bihāżā am hum qaumun ṭāgūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am taamuruhum ahlaamuhum bihaazaaa am hum qawmun taaghoon

ayah.transliteration: Am yaqūlūna taqawwalah(ū), bal lā yu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am yaqooloona taqawwalah; bal laa yu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Falya'tū biḥadīṡim  miṡlihī in kānū ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falyaatoo bihadeesim misliheee in kaanoo saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Am khuliqū min gairi syai'in am humul-khāliqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am khuliqoo min ghairi shai'in am humul khaaliqoon

ayah.transliteration: Am khalaqus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(a), bal lā yūqinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am khalaqus samaawaati wal ard; bal laa yooqinoon

ayah.transliteration: Am ‘indahum khazā'inu rabbika  am humul-musaiṭirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am'indahum khazaaa'inu rabbika am humul musaitiroon

ayah.transliteration: Am lahum sullamuy yastami‘ūna fīh(i), falya'ti mustami‘uhum bisulṭānim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Am lahum sullamuny yastami'oona feehi falyaati mustami'uhum bisultaanim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Am lahul-banātu wa lakumul-banūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am lahul banaatu wa lakumul banoon

ayah.transliteration: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim magramim muṡqalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaloon

ayah.transliteration: Am ‘indahumul-gaibu fahum yaktubūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am 'indahumul ghaibu fahum yaktuboon

ayah.transliteration: Am yurīdūna kaidā(n), fal-lażīna kafarū humul-makīdūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am yureedoona kaidan fallazeena kafaroo humul makeedoon

ayah.transliteration: Am lahum ilāhun gairullāh(i), subḥānallāhi ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am lahum ilaahun ghairul laa; subhaanal laahi 'ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yarau kisfam minas-samā'i sāqiṭay yaqūlū saḥābum markūm(un).
ayah.translation: Wa iny yaraw kisfam minas samaaa'i saaqitany yaqooloo sahaabum markoom

ayah.transliteration: Fażarhum ḥattā yulāqū yaumahumul-lażī fīhi yuṣ‘aqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fazarhum hatta yulaaqoo yawmahumul lazee feehi yus'aqoon

ayah.transliteration: Yauma lā yugnī ‘anhum kaiduhum syai'aw wa lā hum yunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma laa yughnee 'anhum kaidumhum shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna lil-lażīna ẓalamū ‘ażāban dūna żālika wa lākinna akṡarahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa inna lillazeena zalamoo 'azaaban doona zalika wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Waṣbir liḥukmi rabbika fa innaka bi'a‘yuninā wa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika ḥīna taqūm(u).
ayah.translation: Wasbir lihukmi rabbika fa innaka bi-a'yuninaa wa sabbih bihamdi rabbika heena taqoom

ayah.transliteration: Wa minal-laili fa sabbiḥhu wa idbāran-nujūm(i).
ayah.translation: Wa minal laili fasabbihhu wa idbaaran nujoom

ayah.transliteration: Wan-najmi iżā hawā.
ayah.translation: Wannajmi izaa hawaa

ayah.transliteration: Mā ḍalla ṣāḥibukum wa mā gawā.
ayah.translation: Maa dalla saahibukum wa maa ghawaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yanṭiqu ‘anil-hawā.
ayah.translation: Wa maa yyantiqu 'anilhawaaa

ayah.transliteration: In huwa illā waḥyuy yūḥā.
ayah.translation: In huwa illaa Wahyuny yoohaa

ayah.transliteration: ‘Allamahū syadīdul-quwā.
ayah.translation: 'Allamahoo shadeedul quwaa

ayah.transliteration: Żū mirrah(tin), fastawā.
ayah.translation: Zoo mirratin fastawaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwa bil-ufuqil-a‘lā.
ayah.translation: Wa huwa bil ufuqil a'laa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma danā fa tadallā.
ayah.translation: Summa danaa fatadalla

ayah.transliteration: Fa kāna qāba qausaini au adnā.
ayah.translation: Fakaana qaaba qawsaini aw adnaa

ayah.transliteration: Fa auḥā ilā ‘abdihī mā auḥā.
ayah.translation: Fa awhaaa ilaa 'abdihee maaa awhaa

ayah.transliteration: Mā każabal-fu'ādu mā ra'ā.
ayah.translation: Maa kazabal fu'aadu maa ra aa

ayah.transliteration: Afa tumārūnahū ‘alā mā yarā.
ayah.translation: Afatumaaroonahoo 'alaa maayaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad ra'āhu nazlatan ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Wa laqad ra aahu nazlatan ukhraa

ayah.transliteration: ‘Inda sidratil-muntahā.
ayah.translation: 'Inda sidratil muntaha

ayah.transliteration: ‘Indahā jannatul-ma'wā.
ayah.translation: 'Indahaa jannatul maawaa

ayah.transliteration: Iż yagsyas-sidrata mā yagsyā.
ayah.translation: Iz yaghshas sidrata maa yaghshaa

ayah.transliteration: Mā zāgal-baṣaru wa mā ṭagā.
ayah.translation: Maa zaaghal basaru wa maa taghaa

ayah.transliteration: Laqad ra'ā min āyāti rabbihil-kubrā.
ayah.translation: Laqad ra aa min aayaati Rabbihil kubraaa

ayah.transliteration: Afa ra'aitumul-lāta wal-‘uzzā.
ayah.translation: Afara'aytumul laata wal 'uzzaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa manātaṡ-ṡāliṡatal-ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Wa manaatas saalisatal ukhraa

ayah.transliteration: Alakumuż-żakaru wa lahul-unṡā.
ayah.translation: A-lakumuz zakaru wa lahul unsaa

ayah.transliteration: Tilka iżan qismatun ḍīzā.
ayah.translation: Tilka izan qismatun deezaa

ayah.transliteration: In hiya  illā asmā'un sammaitumūhā antum wa ābā'ukum mā anzalallāhu bihā min sulṭān(in), iy yattabi‘ūna illaẓ-ẓanna wa mā tahwal-anfus(u), wa laqad jā'ahum mir rabbihimul-hudā.
ayah.translation: In hiya illaaa asmaaa'un sammaitumoohaaa antum wa aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultaan; inyyattabi'oona illaz zanna wa maa tahwal anfusu wa laqad jaaa'ahum mir Rabbihimul hudaa

ayah.transliteration: Am lil-insāni mā tamannā.
ayah.translation: Am lil insaani maa taman naa

ayah.transliteration: Fa lillāhil-ākhiratu wal-ūlā.
ayah.translation: Falillaahil aakhiratu wal oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa kam mim malakin fis-samāwāti lā tugnī syafā‘atuhum syai'an illā mim ba‘di ay ya'żanallāhu limay yasyā'u wa yarḍā.
ayah.translation: Wa kam mim malakin fissamaawaati laa tughnee shafaa'atuhum shai'an illaa mim ba'di anyyaazanal laahu limany yashaaa'u wa yardaa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati layusammūnal-malā'ikata tasmiyatal-unṡā.
ayah.translation: innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil aakhirati la yusammoonal malaaa'ikata tasmiyatal unsaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā lahum bihī min ‘ilm(in), iy yattabi‘ūna illaẓ-ẓann(a), wa innaẓ-ẓanna lā yugnī minal-ḥaqqi syai'ā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa maa lahum bihee min 'ilmin iny yattabi'oona illaz zanna wa innaz zanna laa yughnee minal haqqi shai'aa

ayah.transliteration: Fa a‘riḍ ‘am man tawallā, ‘an żikrinā wa lam yurid illal-ḥayātad-dun-yā.
ayah.translation: Fa a'rid 'am man tawallaa 'an zikrinaa wa lam yurid illal hayaatad dunyaa

ayah.transliteration: Żālika mablaguhum minal-‘ilm(i), inna rabbaka huwa a‘lamu biman ḍalla ‘an sabīlih(ī), wa huwa a‘lamu bimanihtadā.
ayah.translation: Zalika mablaghuhum minal 'ilm; inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabee lihee wa huwa a'lamu bimanih tadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), liyajziyal-lażīna asā'ū bimā ‘amilū wa yajziyal-lażīna aḥsanū bil-ḥusnā.
ayah.translation: Wa lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi liyajziyal lazeena asaaa'oo bimaa 'amiloo wa yajziyal lazeena ahsanoo bilhusnaa

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yajtanibūna kabā'iral-iṡmi wal-fawāḥisya illal-lamam(a), inna rabbaka wāsi‘ul-magfirah(ti), huwa a‘lamu bikum iż ansya'akum minal-arḍi wa iż antum ajinnatun fī buṭūni ummahātikum, falā tuzakkū anfusakum, huwa a‘lamu bimanittaqā.
ayah.translation: Allazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi walfawaa hisha illal lamam; inna rabbaka waasi'ul maghfirah; huwa a'lamu bikum iz ansha akum minal ardi wa iz antum ajinnatun fee butooni umma haatikum falaa tuzakkooo anfusakum huwa a'lamu bimanit taqaa

ayah.transliteration: Afa ra'aital-lażī tawallā.
ayah.translation: Afara'ayatal lazee tawallaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa a‘ṭā qalīlaw wa akdā.
ayah.translation: Wa a'taa qaleelanw wa akdaa

ayah.transliteration: A‘indahū ‘ilmul-gaibi fahuwa yarā.
ayah.translation: A'indahoo 'ilmul ghaibi fahuwa yaraa

ayah.transliteration: Am lam yunabba' bimā fī ṣuḥufi mūsā.
ayah.translation: Am lam yunabbaa bimaa fee suhuhfi Moosa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ibrāhīmal-lażī waffā.
ayah.translation: Wa Ibraaheemal lazee waffaaa

ayah.transliteration: Allā taziru wāziratuw wizra ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Allaa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa al laisa lil-insāni illā mā sa‘ā.
ayah.translation: Wa al laisa lil insaani illaa maa sa'aa

ayah.transliteration: Wa anna sa‘yahū saufa yurā.
ayah.translation: Wa anna sa'yahoo sawfa yuraa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma yujzāhul-jazā'al-aufā.
ayah.translation: Summa yujzaahul jazaaa 'al awfaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa anna ilā rabbikal-muntahā.
ayah.translation: Wa anna ilaa rabbikal muntahaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū huwa aḍḥaka wa abkā.
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo huwa adhaka wa abkaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū huwa amāta wa aḥyā.
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo huwa amaata wa ahyaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū khalaqaz-zaujainiż-żakara wal-unṡā.
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo khalaqaz zawjainiz zakara wal unsaa

ayah.transliteration: Min nuṭfatin iżā tumnā.
ayah.translation: Min nutfatin izaa tumnaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa anna ‘alaihin nasy'atal-ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Wa anna 'alaihin nash atal ukhraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū huwa agnā wa aqnā.
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo huwa aghnaa wa aqnaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū huwa rabbusy-syi‘rā.
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo huwa rabbush shi'raa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū ahlaka ‘ādanil-ūlā.
ayah.translation: Wa annahooo ahlak a 'Aadanil oolaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ṡamūda famā abqā.

ayah.translation: 'A-antum tazra'oonahooo am nahnuz zaari'ooon

ayah.translation: Law nashaaa'u laja'al naahu hutaaman fazaltum tafakkahoon

ayah.translation: Innaa lamughramoon

ayah.translation: 'A-antum anzaltumoohu minal muzni am nahnul munziloon

ayah.translation: Law nashaaa'u ja'alnaahu ujaajan falaw laa tashkuroon

ayah.translation: Afara'aytumun naaral latee tooroon

ayah.translation: 'A-antum anshaatum shajaratahaaa am nahnul munshi'oon

ayah.translation: Nahnu ja'alnaahaa tazkira tanw wa mataa'al lilmuqween

ayah.translation: Fasabbih bismi Rabbikal 'azeem

ayah.translation: Falaa uqsimu bimaawaa qi'innujoom

ayah.translation: Wa innahoo laqasamul lawta'lamoona'azeem

ayah.translation: Innahoo la quraanun kareem

ayah.translation: Laa yamassuhooo illal mutahharoon

ayah.translation: Tanzeelum mir Rabbil'aalameen

ayah.translation: Afabihaazal hadeesi antum mudhinoon

ayah.translation: Wa taj'aloona rizqakum annakum tukazziboon

ayah.translation: Falaw laaa izaa balaghatil hulqoom

ayah.translation: Wa antum heena'izin tanzuroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa naḥnu aqrabu ilaihi minkum wa lākil lā tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa nahnu aqrabu ilaihi minkum wa laakil laa tubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Falau lā in kuntum gaira madīnīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaw laaa in kuntum ghira madeeneen

ayah.translation: Tarji'oonahaaa in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammā in kāna minal-muqarrabīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa ammaaa in kaana minal muqarrabeen

ayah.translation: Farawhunw wa raihaa nunw wa jannatu na'eem

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammā in kāna min aṣḥābil-yamīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa ammaaa in kaana min as haabil yameen

ayah.translation: Fasalaamul laka min as haabil yameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammā in kāna minal-mukażżibīnaḍ-ḍāllīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ammaaa in kaana minal mukazzibeenad daaalleen

ayah.transliteration: Fa nuzulum min ḥamīm(in).
ayah.translation: Fanuzulum min hameem

ayah.transliteration: Wa taṣliyatu jaḥīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa tasliyatu jaheem

ayah.transliteration: Inna hāżā lahuwal-ḥaqqul-yaqīn(i).
ayah.translation: Inna haaza lahuwa haqqul yaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa sabbiḥ bismi rabbikal-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Fasabbih bismi rabbikal 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Sabbaḥa lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wal ardi wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), yuḥyī wa yumīt(u), wa huwa ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi yuhyee wa yumeetu wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-awwalu wal-ākhiru waẓ-ẓāhiru wal-bāṭin(u), wa huwa bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Huwal Awwalu wal'Aakhiru waz Zaahiru wal Baatinu wa huwa bikulli shai'in Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa fī sittati ayyāmin ṡummastawā ‘alal-‘arsy(i), ya‘lamu mā yaliju fil-arḍi wa mā yakhruju minhā wa mā yanzilu minas-samā'i wa mā ya‘ruju fīhā, wa huwa ma‘akum aina mā kuntum, wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fee sittati ayyaamin summas tawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ya'lamu maa yaliju filardi wa maa yakhruju minhaa wa maa yanzilu minas samaaa'i wa maa ya'ruju feeha wa Huwa ma'akum ayna maa kuntum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa ilallāhi turja‘ul-umūr(u).
ayah.translation: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wa ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

ayah.transliteration: Yūlijul-laila fin-nahāri wa yūlijun-nahāra fil-lail(i), wa huwa ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil lail; wa Huwa 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Āminū billāhi wa rasūlihī wa anfiqū mimmā ja‘alakum mustakhlafīna fīh(i), fal-lażīna āmanū minkum wa anfaqū lahum ajrun kabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Aaaminoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa anfiqoo mimmaa ja'alakum mustakh lafeena feehi fallazeena aamanoo minkum wa anfaqoo lahum ajrun kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā lakum lā tu'minūna billāh(i), war-rasūlu yad‘ūkum litu'minū birabbikum wa qad akhaża mīṡāqakum in kuntum mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa lakum laa tu'minoona billaahi war Rasoolu yad'ookum lituu'minoo bi Rabbikum wa qad akhaza meesaaqakum in kuntum mu'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī yunazzilu ‘alā ‘abdihī āyātim bayyinātil liyukhrijakum minaẓ-ẓulumāti ilan-nūr(i), wa innallāha bikum lara'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee yunazzilu 'alaa 'abdiheee Aayaatim baiyinaatil liyukhrijakum minaz zulumaati ilan noor; wa innal laaha bikum la Ra'oofur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā lakum allā tunfiqū fī sabīlillāhi wa lillāhi mīrāṡus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), lā yastawī minkum man anfaqa min qablil-fatḥi wa qātal(a), ulā'ika a‘ẓamu darajatam minal-lażīna anfaqū mim ba‘du wa qātalū, wa kullaw wa‘adallāhul-ḥusnā, wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maa lakum allaa tunfiqoo fee sabeelil laahi wa lillaahi meeraasus samaawaati wal-ard; laa yastawee minkum man anfaqa min qablil fat-hi wa qaatal; ulaaaika a'zamu darajatam minal lazeena anfaqoo mim ba'du wa qaataloo; wa kullanw wa'adallaahul husnaa; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Man żal-lażī yuqriḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanan fa yuḍā‘ifahū lahū wa lahū ajrun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: man zal lazee yuqridul laaha qardan hasanan fa yudaa'ifahoo lahoo wa lahooo ajrun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Yauma taral-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti yas‘ā nūruhum baina aidīhim wa bi'aimānihim busyrākumul-yauma jannātun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā, żālika huwal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Yawma taral mu'mineena walmu'minaati yas'aa nooruhum baina aydeehim wa biaymaanihim bushraakumul yawma jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feeha; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yaqūlul-munāfiqūna wal-munāfiqātu lil-lażīna āmanunẓurūnā naqtabis min nūrikum, qīlarji‘ū warā'akum faltamisū nūrā(n), faḍuriba bainahum bisūril lahū bāb(un), bāṭinuhū fīhir-raḥmatu wa ẓāhiruhū min qibalihil-‘ażāb(u).
ayah.translation: Yawma yaqoolul munaa fiqoona walmunaafiqaatu lillazeena aamanun zuroonaa naqtabis min noorikum qeelarji'oo waraaa'akum faltamisoo nooran faduriba bainahum bisooril lahoo baab, baatinuhoo feehir rahmatu wa zaahiruhoo min qibalihi-'azaab

ayah.transliteration: Yunādūnahum alam nakum ma‘akum, qālū balā wa lākinnakum fatantum anfusakum wa tarabbaṣtum wartabtum wa garratkumul-amāniyyu ḥattā jā'a amrullāhi wa garrakum billāhil-garūr(u).
ayah.translation: Yunaadoonahum alam nakum ma'akum qaaloo balaa wa laakinnakum fatantum anfusakum wa tarabbastum wartabtum wa gharratkumul amaaniyyu hatta jaaa'a amrul laahi wa gharrakum billaahil gharoor

ayah.transliteration: Fal-yauma lā yu'khażu minkum fidyatuw wa lā minal-lażīna kafarū, ma'wākumun-nār(u), hiya maulākum, wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Fal Yawma laa yu'khazu minkum fidyatunw wa laa minal lazeena kafaroo; maawaakumun Naaru hiya maw laakum wa bi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Alam ya'ni lil-lażīna āmanū an takhsya‘a qulūbuhum liżikrillāhi wa mā nazala minal-ḥaqq(i), wa lā yakūnū kal-lażīna ūtul-kitāba min qablu faṭāla ‘alaihimul-amadu faqasat qulūbuhum, wa kaṡīrum minhum fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam yaani laillzeena aamanooo an takhsha'a quloo buhum lizikril laahi wa maa nazala minal haqqi wa laa yakoonoo kallazeena ootul Kitaaba min qablu fataala 'alaihimul amadu faqasat quloobuhum wa kaseerum minhum faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: I‘lamū annallāha yuḥyil-arḍa ba‘da mautihā, qad bayyannā lakumul-āyāti la‘allakum ta‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: I'lamooo annal laaha yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; qad baiyannaa lakumul Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-muṣṣaddiqīna wal-muṣṣaddiqāti wa aqraḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanay yuḍā‘afu lahum wa lahum ajrun karīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innal mussaddiqeena wal mussaddiqaati wa aqradul laaha qardan hassanany yudaa'afu lahum wa lahum ajrun kareem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna āmanū billāhi wa rasūlihī ulā'ika humuṣ-ṣiddīqūn(a), wasy-syuhadā'u ‘inda rabbihim, lahum ajruhum wa nūruhum, wal-lażīna kafarū wa każżabū bi'āyātinā ulā'ika aṣḥābul-jaḥīm(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rusuliheee ulaaa'ika humus siddeeqoona wash shuhadaaa'u 'inda Rabbihim lahum ajruhum wa nooruhum wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi aayaatinaaa ulaaaika As haabul jaheem

ayah.transliteration: I‘lamū annamal-ḥayātud-dun-yā la‘ibuw wa lahwuw wa zīnatuw wa tafākhurum bainakum wa takāṡurun fil-amwāli wal-aulād(i), kamaṡali gaiṡin a‘jabal-kuffāra nabātuhū ṡumma yahīju fatarāhu muṣfarran ṡumma yakūnu ḥuṭāmā(n), wa fil-ākhirati ‘ażābun syadīd(un), wa magfiratum minallāhi wa riḍwān(un), wa mal-ḥayātud-dun-yā illā matā‘ul-gurūr(i).
ayah.translation: I'lamooo annamal hayaa tud dunyaa la'ibunw wa lahwunw wa zeenatunw wa takaasurun bainakum wa takaasurn fil amwaali wal awlaad, kamasali ghaisin a'jabal kuffaara nabaatuhoo summa yaheeju fataraahu musfaaran summa yakoonu hutaamaa; wa fil aakhirati 'azaabun shadeedunw wa magh firatum minal laahi wa ridwaan; wa mal haiyaa tuddun yaaa illaa mataa'ul ghuroor

ayah.transliteration: Sābiqū ilā magfiratim mir rabbikum wa jannatin ‘arḍuhā ka‘arḍis-samā'i wal-arḍ(i), u‘iddat lil-lażīna āmanū billāhi wa rasūlih(ī), żālika faḍlullāhi yu'tīhi may yasyā'(u), wallāhu żul-faḍlil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Saabiqooo ilaa maghfiratim mir Rabbikum wa jannatin 'arduhaa ka-'ardis samaaa'i wal ardi u'iddat lillazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rusulih; zaalika fadlul laahi yu'teehi many yashaaa'; wal laahu zul fadlil 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Mā aṣāba mim muṣībatin fil-arḍi wa lā fī anfusikum illā fī kitābim min qabli an nabra'ahā, inna żālika ‘alallāhi yasīr(un).
ayah.translation: Maaa asaaba mim musee batin fil ardi wa laa feee anfusikum illaa fee kitaabim min qabli an nabra ahaa; innaa zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

ayah.transliteration: Likailā ta'sau ‘alā mā fātakum wa lā tafraḥū bimā ātākum, wallāhu lā yuḥibbu kulla mukhtālin fakhūr(in).
ayah.translation: Likailaa taasaw 'alaa maa faatakum wa laa tafrahoo bimaaa aataakum; wallaahu laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhoor

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yabkhalūna wa ya'murūnan-nāsa bil-bukhl(i), wa may yatawalla fa'innallāha huwal-ganiyyul-ḥamīd(u).
ayah.translation: Allazeeena yabkhaloona wa yaamuroonan naasa bil bukhl; wa many yatawalla fa innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed

ayah.transliteration: Laqad arsalnā rusulanā bil-bayyināti wa anzalnā ma‘ahumul-kitāba wal-mīzāna liyaqūman-nāsu bil-qisṭ(i), wa anzalnal-ḥadīda fīhi ba'sun syadīduw wa manāfi‘u lin-nāsi wa liya‘lamallāhu may yanṣuruhū wa rusulahū bil-gaib(i), innallāha qawiyyun ‘azīz(un).
ayah.translation: Laqad arsalnaa Rusulanaa bilbaiyinaati wa anzalnaa ma'ahumul Kitaaba wal Meezaana liyaqooman naasu bilqist, wa anzalnal hadeeda feehi baasun shadeedunw wa manaafi'u linnaasi wa liya'lamal laahu many yansuruhoo wa Rusulahoo bilghaib; innal laaha Qawiyyn 'Azeez

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad arsalnā nūḥaw wa ibrāhīma wa ja‘alnā fī żurriyyatihiman-nubuwwata wal-kitāba fa minhum muhtad(in), wa kaṡīrum minhum fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohanw wa Ibraaheema wa ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihiman nubuwwata wal Kitaaba faminhum muhtad; wa kaseerum minhum faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma qaffainā ‘alā āṡārihim birusulinā wa qaffainā bi‘īsabni maryama wa ātaināhul-injīl(a), wa ja‘alnā fī qulūbil-lażīnattaba‘ūhu ra'fataw wa raḥmah(tan), wa rahbāniyyatanibtada‘ūhā mā katabnā ‘alaihim illabtigā'a riḍwānillāhi famā ra‘auhā ḥaqqa ri‘āyatihā, fa'ātainal-lażīna āmanū minhum ajrahum, wa kaṡīrum minhum fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa qaffainaa 'alaa aasaarihim bi Rusulinaa wa qaffainaa be 'Eesab ni Maryama wa aatainaahul Injeela wa ja'alnaa fee quloobil lazeenat taba' oohu raafatanw wa rahmatanw wa rahbaaniyyatanib tada' oohaa maa katanaahaa 'alaihim illab tighaaa'a ridwaanil laahi famaa ra'awhaa haqqa ri'aayatihaa fa aatainal lazeena aamanoo minhum ajrahum wa kaseerum minhum faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanuttaqullāha wa āminū birasūlihī yu'tikum kiflaini mir raḥmatihī wa yaj‘al lakum nūran tamsyūna bihī wa yagfir lakum, wallāhu gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamaanut taqullaaha wa aaminoo bi Rasoolihee yu'tikum kiflaini mir rahmatihee wa yaj'al lakum nooran tamshoona bihee wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Li'allā ya‘lama ahlul-kitābi allā yaqdirūna ‘alā syai'im min faḍlillāhi wa annal-faḍla biyadillāhi yu'tīhi may yasyā'(u), wallāhu żul-faḍlil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Li'alla ya'lama Ahlul kitaabi allaa yaqdiroona 'alaa shai'im min fadlil laahi wa annal fadla bi Yadil laahi u'teehi many yashaaa'; wallaahu Zul fadilil 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Qad sami‘allāhu qaulal-latī tujādiluka fī zaujihā wa tasytakī ilallāh(i), wallāhu yasma‘u taḥāwurakumā, innallāha samī‘um baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Qad sami'al laahu qawlal latee tujaadiluka fee zawjihaa wa tashtakeee ilal laahi wallaahu yasma'u tahaawurakumaa; innal laaha samee'um baseer

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna yuẓāhirūna minkum min nisā'ihim mā hunna ummahātihim, in ummahātuhum illal-lā'ī waladnahum, wa innahum layaqūlūna munkaram minal-qauli wa zūrā(n), wa innallāha la‘afuwwun gafūr(un).
ayah.translation: Allazeena yuzaahiroona minkum min nisaaa'ihim maa hunnaa ummahaatihim in ummahaatuhum illal laaa'ee waladnahum; wa innaahum la yaqooloona munkaram minal qawli wa zooraa; wa innal laaha la'afuwwun ghafoor

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yuẓāhirūna min nisā'ihim ṡumma ya‘ūdūna limā qālū fa taḥrīru raqabatim min qabli ay yatamāssā, żālikum tū‘aẓūna bih(ī), wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yuzaahiroona min nisaaa'ihim summa ya'oodoona limaa qaaloo fatabreeru raqabatim min qabli any-yatamaaassaa; zaalikum too'azoona bih; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Famal lam yajid faṣiyāmu syahraini mutatābi‘aini min qabli ay yatamāssā, famal lam yastaṭi‘ fa iṭ‘āmu sittīna miskīnā(n), żālika litu'minū billāhi wa rasūlih(ī), wa tilka ḥudūdullāh(i), wa lil-kāfirīna ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Famal lam yajid fa siyaamu shahraini mutataabi'ayni min qabli any-yatamaaassaa famal lam yastati' fa-it'aamu sitteena miskeena; zaalika litu'minoo billaahi wa rasoolih'wa tilka hudoodul laah; wa lilkaafireena 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yuḥāddūnallāha wa rasūlahū kubitū kamā kubital-lażīna min qablihim wa qad anzalnā āyātim bayyināt(in), wa lil-kāfirīna ‘ażābum muhīn(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha wa Rasoolahoo kubitoo kamaa kubital lazeena min qablihim; wa qad anzalnaaa aayaatim baiyinaat; wa lilkaa fireena 'azaabum muheen

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yab‘aṡuhumullāhu jamī‘an fa yunabbi'uhum bimā ‘amilū, aḥṣāhullāhu wa nasūh(u), wallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'in syahīd(un).
ayah.translation: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamee'an fayunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo; ahsaahul laahu wa nasooh; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in shaheed

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara annallāha ya‘lamu mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), mā yakūnu min najwā ṡalāṡatin illā huwa rābi‘uhum wa lā khamsatin illā huwa sādisuhum wa lā adnā min żālika wa lā akṡara illā huwa ma‘ahum aina mā kānū, ṡumma yunabbi'uhum bimā ‘amilū yaumal-qiyāmah(ti), innallāha bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Alam tara annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi maa yakoonu min najwaa salaasatin illaa Huwa raabi'uhum wa laa khamsatin illaa huwa saadisuhum wa laaa adnaa min zaalika wa laaa aksara illaa huwa ma'ahum ayna, maa kaanoo summa yunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiloo yawmal qiyaamah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in aleem

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara ilal-lażīna nuhū ‘anin-najwā ṡummā ya‘ūdūna limā nuhū ‘anhu wa yatanājauna bil-iṡmi wal-‘udwāni wa ma‘ṣiyatir-rasūl(i), wa iżā jā'ūka ḥayyauka bimā lam yuḥayyika bihillāh(u), wa yaqūlūna fī anfusihim lau lā yu‘ażżibunallāhu bimā naqūl(u), ḥasbuhum jahannam(u), yaṣlaunahā, fa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Alam tara ilal lazeena nuhoo 'anin najwaa summa ya'oodoona limaa nuhoo 'anhu wa yatanaajawna bil ismi wal'udwaani wa ma'siyatir rasooli wa izaa jaaa'ooka haiyawka bimaa lam yuhai yika bihil laahu wa yaqooloona fee anfusihim law laa yu'azzibunal laahu bimaa naqool; hasbuhum jahannnamu yaslawnahaa fabi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā tanājaitum falā tatanājau bil-iṡmi wal-‘udwāni wa ma‘ṣiyatir-rasūli wa tanājau bil-birri wat-taqwā, wattaqullāhal-lażī ilaihi tuḥsyarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa tanaajaytum falaa tatanaajaw bil ismi wal 'udwaani wa ma'siyatir rasooli wa tanaajaw bil birri wattaqwaa wattaqul laahal lazeee ilaihi tuhsharoon

ayah.transliteration: Innaman-najwā minasy-syaiṭāni liyaḥzunal-lażīna āmanū wa laisa biḍārrihim syai'an illā bi'iżnillāh(i), wa ‘alallāhi falyatawakkalil-mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaman najwaa minash shaitaani liyahzunal lazeena aamanoo wa laisa bidaaarrihim shai'an illaa bi-iznil laah; wa 'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā qīla lakum tafassaḥū fil-majālisi fafsaḥū yafsaḥillāhu lakum, wa iżā qīlansyuzū fansyuzū yarfa‘illāhul-lażīna āmanū minkum, wal-lażīna ūtul-‘ilma darajāt(in), wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa qeela lakum tafassahoo fil majaalisi fafsahoo yafsahil laahu lakum wa izaa qeelan shuzoo fanshuzoo yarfa'il laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum wallazeena ootul 'ilma darajaat; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā nājaitumur-rasūla fa qaddimū baina yaday najwākum ṣadaqah(tan), żālika khairul lakum wa aṭhar(u), fa'illam tajidū fa innallāha  gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa naajitumur Rasoola faqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqah; zaalika khairul lakum wa athar; fa il lam tajidoo fa innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: A'asyfaqtum an tuqaddimū baina yaday najwākum ṣadaqāt(in), fa iż lam taf‘alū wa tāballāhu ‘alaikum fa'aqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātuz-zakāta wa aṭī‘ullāha wa rasūlah(ūwallāhu khabīrum bimā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: 'A-ashfaqtum an tuqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqaat; fa-iz lam taf'aloo wa taabal laahu 'alaikum fa aqeemus Salaata wa aatuz Zakaata wa atee'ul laaha wa rasoolah; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon
