ayah.transliteration: Alam tara ilal-lażīna tawallau qauman gaḍiballāhu ‘alaihim, mā hum minkum wa lā minhum, wa yaḥlifūna ‘alal-każibi wa hum ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam tara ilal lazeena tawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim maa hum minkum wa laa minhum wa yahlifoona 'alal kazibi wa hum ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: A‘addallāhu lahum ‘ażāban syadīdā(n), innahum sā'a mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Ittakhażū aimānahum junnatan fa ṣaddū ‘an sabīlillāhi falahum ‘ażābum muhīn(un).
ayah.translation: Ittakhazooo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laahi falahum 'azaabum muheen

ayah.transliteration: Lan tugniya ‘anhum amwāluhum wa lā aulāduhum minallāhi syai'ā(n), ulā'ika aṣḥābun-nār(i), hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lan tughniya 'anhum amwaaluhum wa laaa awladuhum minal laahi shai'aa; ulaaa 'ika As haabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yab‘aṡuhumullāhu jamī‘an fa yaḥlifūna lahū kamā yaḥlifūna lakum wa yaḥsabūna annahum ‘alā syai'(in), alā innahum humul-kāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahujamee'an fa yahlifoona lahoo kamaa yahlifoona lakum wa yahsaboona annahum 'alaa shai'; alaaa innahum humul kaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Istaḥważa ‘alaihimusy-syaiṭānu fa'ansāhum żikrallāh(i), ulā'ika ḥizbusy-syaiṭān(i), alā inna ḥizbasy-syaiṭāni humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Istahwaza 'alaihimush shaitaanu fa ansaahum zikral laah; ulaaa'ika hizbush shaitaaan; alaaa innaa hizbash shaitaani humul khaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yuḥāddūnallāha wa rasūlahū ulā'ika fil-ażallīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha wa Rasoolahooo ulaaa'ika fil azalleen

ayah.transliteration: Kataballāhu la'aglibanna ana wa rusulī, innallāha qawiyyun ‘azīz(un).
ayah.translation: Katabal laahu la aghlibanna ana wa Rusulee; innal laaha qawiyyun 'Azeez

ayah.transliteration: Lā tajidu qaumay yu'minūna billāhi wal-yaumil ākhiri yuwāddūna man ḥāddallāha wa rasūlahū wa lau kānū ābā'ahum au abnā'ahum au ikhwānahum au ‘asyīratahum, ulā'ika kataba fī qulūbihimul-īmāna wa ayyadahum birūḥim minh(u), wa yudkhiluhum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā, raḍiyallāhu ‘anhum wa raḍū ‘anh(u), ulā'ika ḥizbullāh(i), alā inna ḥizballāhi humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa tajidu qawmany yu'minoona billaahi wal yawmil aakhiri yuwaaaddoona man haaaddal laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa law kaanooo aabaaa'ahum aw abnaaa'ahum aw ikhwaa nahum aw 'asheeratahum; ulaaa'ika kataba fee quloobihi mul eemaana wa ayyadahum biroohimminhu wa yudkhilu hum jannatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; radiyal laahu 'anhum wa radoo 'anh; ulaaa 'ika hizbul laah; alaaa inna hizbal laahi humul muflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Sabbaḥa lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī akhrajal-lażīna kafarū min ahlil-kitābi min diyārihim li'awwalil-ḥasyr(i), mā ẓanantum ay yakhrujū wa ẓannū annahum māni‘atuhum ḥuṣūnuhum minallāhi  fa atāhumullāhu  min ḥaiṡu lam yaḥtasibū wa qażafa fī qulūbihimur-ru‘ba yukhribūna buyūtahum bi'aidīhim wa aidil-mu'minīn(a), fa‘tabirū yā ulil-abṣār(i).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazeee akharajal lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi min diyaarihim li awwalil Hashr; maa zanantum any yakhrujoo wa zannooo annahum maa ni'atuhum husoonuhum minal laahi faataahumul laahu min haisu lam yahtasiboo wa qazafa fee quloobihimur ru'ba yukhriboona bu yootahum bi aydeehim wa aydil mu'mineena fa'tabiroo yaaa ulil absaar

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau lā an kataballāhu ‘alaihimul-jalā'a la‘ażżabahum fid-dun-yā, wa lahum fil-ākhirati ‘ażābun-nār(i).
ayah.translation: Wa law laaa an katabal laahu 'alaihimul jalaaa'a la'azzabahum fid dunyaa wa lahum fil Aakhirati 'azaabun Naar

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahum syāqqullāha wa rasūlah(ū), wa may yusyāqqillāha fa'innallāha syadīdul-‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahum shaaqqul laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa many yushaaaqqil laaha fa innal laaha shadeedul-'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Mā qaṭa‘tum mil līnatin au taraktumūhā qā'imatan ‘alā uṣūlihā fa bi'iżnillāhi wa liyukhziyal-fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa qata'tum mil leenatin aw taraktumoohaa qaaa'imatan'alaaa usoolihaa fabi iznil laahi wa liyukhziyal faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā afā'allāhu ‘alā rasūlihī minhum famā aujaftum ‘alaihi min khailiw wa lā rikābiw wa lākinnallāha yusalliṭu rusulahū ‘alā may yasyā'(u), wallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaaa Rasoolihee minhum famaaa awjaftum 'alaihi min khailiinw wa laa rikaabinw wa laakinnal laaha yusallitu Rusulahoo 'alaa many yashaaa'; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Mā afā'allāhu ‘alā rasūlihī min ahlil-qurā fa lillāhi wa lir-rasūli wa liżil-qurbā wal-yatāmā wal-masākīni wabnis-sabīl(i), kailā yakūna dūlatam bainal-agniyā'i minkum, wa mā ātākumur-rasūlu fa khużūhu wa mā nahākum ‘anhu fantahū, wattaqullāh(a), innallāha syadīdul-‘iqāb(i).
ayah.translation: Maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaa Rasoolihee min ahlil quraa falillaahi wa lir Rasooli wa lizil qurbaa wal yataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis sabeeli kai laa yakoona doolatam bainal aghniyaaa'i minkum; wa maaa aataakumur Rasoolu fakhuzoohu wa maa nahaakum 'anhu fantahoo; wattaqul laaha innal laaha shadeedul-'iqaab

ayah.transliteration: Lil-fuqarā'il-muhājirīnal-lażīna ukhrijū min diyārihim wa amwālihim yabtagūna faḍlam minallāhi wa riḍwānaw wa yanṣurūnallāha wa rasūlah(ū), ulā'ika humuṣ-ṣādiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Lilfuqaraaa'il Muhaaji reenal lazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim wa amwaalihim yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi wa ridwaananw wa yansuroonal laaha wa Rasoolah; ulaaa'ika humus saadiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna tabawwa'ud-dāra wal-īmāna min qablihim yuḥibbūna man hājara ilaihim wa lā yajidūna fī ṣudūrihim ḥājatam mimmā ūtū wa yu'ṡirūna ‘alā anfusihim wa lau kāna bihim khaṣāṣah(tun), wa may yūqa syuḥḥa nafsihī fa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena tabawwa'ud daara wal eemaana min qablihim yuhibboona man haajara ilaihim wa laa yajidoona fee sudoorihim haajatam mimmaa ootoo wa yu'siroona 'alaa anfusihim wa law kaana bihim khasaasah; wa many yooqa shuhha nafsihee fa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna jā'ū mim ba‘dihim yaqūlūna rabbanagfir lanā wa li'ikhwāninal-lażīna sabaqūnā bil-īmāni wa lā taj‘al fī qulūbinā gillal lil-lażīna āmanū rabbanā innaka ra'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena jaaa'oo min ba'dihim yaqooloona Rabbanagh fir lanaa wa li ikhwaani nal lazeena sabqoonaa bil eemaani wa laa taj'al fee quloobinaa ghillalil lazeena aamanoo rabbannaaa innaka Ra'oofur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara ilal-lażīna nāfaqū yaqūlūna li'ikhwānihimul-lażīna kafarū min ahlil-kitābi la'in ukhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma‘akum wa lā nuṭī‘u fīkum aḥadan abadā(n), wa in qūtiltum lananṣurannakum, wallāhu yasyhadu innahum lakāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Alam tara ilal lazeena naafaqoo yaqooloona li ikhwaanihimul lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi la'in ukhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma'akum wa laa nutee'u feekum ahadan abadanw-wa in qootiltum lanansuran nakum wallaahu yashhadu innahum lakaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: La'in ukhrijū lā yakhrujūna ma‘ahum, wa la'in qūtilū lā yanṣurūnahum, wa la'in naṣarūhum layuwallunnal-adbār(a), ṡumma lā yunṣarūn(a).
ayah.translation: La'in ukhrijoo laa yakhrujoona ma'ahum wa la'in qootiloo laa yansuroonahum wa la'in nasaroohum la yuwallunnal adbaara summa laa yunsaroon

ayah.transliteration: La'antum asyaddu rahbatan fī ṣudūrihim  minallāh(i), żālika bi'annahum qaumul lā yafqahūn(a).
ayah.translation: La antum ashaddu rahbatan fee sudoorihim minal laah; zaalika bi annahum qawmul laa yafqahoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yuqātilūnakum jamī‘an illā fī quram muḥaṣṣanatin au miw warā'i judur(in), ba'suhum bainahum syadīd(un), taḥsabuhum jamī‘aw wa qulūbuhum syattā, żālika bi'annahum qaumul lā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yuqaatiloonakum jamee'an illaa fee quram muhas sanatin aw minw waraaa'i judur; baasuhum bainahum shadeed; tahsabuhum jamee'anw-wa quloobuhum shatta; zaalika biannahum qawmul laa ya'qiloon

ayah.transliteration: Kamaṡalil-lażīna min qablihim qarīban żāqū wabāla amrihim, wa lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Kamasalil lazeena min qablihim qareeban zaaqoo wabaala amrihim wa lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Kamaṡalisy-syaiṭāni iż qāla lil-insānikfur, falammā kafara qāla innī barī'um minka innī akhāfullāha rabbal-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Kamasalish shaitaani izqaala lil insaanik fur falammaa kafara qaala innee bareee'um minka inneee akhaaful laaha rabbal 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Fa kāna ‘āqibatahumā annahumā fin-nāri khālidaini fīhā, wa żālika jazā'uẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fakaana 'aaqibatahumaaa annahumaa fin naari khaalidaini feehaa; wa zaalika jazaaa'uz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanuttaqullāha waltanẓur nafsum mā qaddamat ligad(in), wattaqullāh(a), innallāha khabīrum bimā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laa; waltanzur nafsum maa qaddamat lighadiw wattaqual laah; innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā takūnū kal-lażīna nasullāha fa'ansāhum anfusahum, ulā'ika humul-fāsiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa takoonoo kallazeena nasul laaha fa ansaahum anfusahum; ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Lā yastawī aṣḥābun-nāri wa aṣḥābul-jannah(ti), aṣḥābul-jannati humul-fā'izūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yastaweee as-haabun naari wa ashaabul jannah; as haabul jannati humul faaa'izoon

ayah.transliteration: Lau anzalnā hāżal-qur'āna ‘alā jabalil lara'aitahū khāsyi‘am mutaṣaddi‘am min khasy-yatillāh(i), wa tilkal-amṡālu naḍribuhā lin-nāsi la‘allahum yatafakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Law anzalnaa haazal quraana 'alaa jabilil lara aytahoo khaashi'am muta saddi'am min khashiyatil laah; wa tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi la'allahum yatafakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Huwallāhul-lażī lā ilāha illā huw(a), ‘ālimul-gaibi wasy-syahādah(ti), huwar-raḥmānur-raḥīm(u).
ayah.translation: Huwal-laahul-lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwa 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash-shahaada; Huwar Rahmaanur-Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Huwallāhul-lażī lā ilāha illā huw(a), al-malikul-quddūsus-salāmul-mu'minul-muhaiminul-‘azīzul-jabbārul-mutakabbir(u), subḥānallāhi ‘ammā yusyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal-laahul-lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwal-Malikul Quddoosus-Salaamul Muminul Muhaiminul-'aAzeezul Jabbaarul-Mutakabbir; Subhaanal laahi 'Ammaa yushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Huwallāhul-khāliqul-bāri'ul-muṣawwiru lahul-asmā'ul-ḥusnā, yusabbiḥu lahū mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Huwal Laahul Khaaliqul Baari 'ul Musawwir; lahul Asmaaa'ul Husnaa; yusabbihu lahoo maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tattakhiżū ‘aduwwī wa ‘aduwwakum auliyā'a tulqūna ilaihim bil-mawaddati wa qad kafarū bimā jā'akum minal-ḥaqq(i), yukhrijūnar-rasūla wa iyyākum an tu'minū billāhi rabbikum, in kuntum kharajtum jihādan fī sabīlī wabtigā'a marḍātī tusirrūna ilaihim bil-mawaddah(ti), wa ana a‘lamu bimā akhfaitum wa mā a‘lantum, wa may yaf‘alhu minkum faqad ḍalla sawā'as-sabīl(i).
ayah.translation: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizoo 'aduwwee wa 'aduwaakum awliyaaa'a tulqoona ilaihim bilmawaddati wa qad kafaroo bima jaaa'akum minal haqq, yukhrijoonar Rasoola wa iyyaakum an tu'minoo billaahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihaadan fee sabeelee wabtighaaa'a mardaatee; tusirroona ilaihim bilma waddati wa ana a'alamu bimaaa akhfaitum wa maaa a'lantum; wa many yaf'alhu minkum faqad dalla sawaaa'as sabeel

ayah.transliteration: Iy yaṡqafūkum yakūnū lakum a‘dā'aw wa yabsuṭū ilaikum aidiyahum wa alsinatahum bis-sū'i wa waddū lau takfurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Iny yasqafookum yakoonoo lakum a'daaa'anw wa yabsutooo ilaikum aydiyahum wa alsinatahum bissooo'i wa waddoo law takfuroon

ayah.transliteration: Lan tanfa‘akum arḥāmukum wa lā aulādukum yaumal-qiyāmati yafṣilu bainakum, wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Lan tanfa'akum arhaamukum wa laaa awlaadukum; yawmal qiyaamati yafsilu bainakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloon baseer

ayah.transliteration: Qad kānat lakum uswatun ḥasanatun fī ibrāhīma wal-lażīna ma‘ah(ū), iż qālū liqaumihim innā bura'ā'u minkum wa mimmā ta‘budūna min dūnillāh(i), kafarnā bikum wa badā bainanā wa bainakumul-‘adāwatu wal-bagḍā'u abadan ḥattā tu'minū billāhi waḥdahū illā qaula ibrāhīma li'abīhi la'astagfiranna laka wa mā amliku laka minallāhi min syai'(in), rabbanā ‘alaika tawakkalnā wa ilaika anabnā wa ilaikal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Qad kaanat lakum uswatun basanatun feee Ibraaheema wallazeena ma'ahoo iz qaaloo liqawmihim innaa bura'aaa'u minkum wa mimmaa ta'budoona min doonil laahi kafarnaa bikum wa badaa bainanaa wa bainakumul 'adaawatu wal baghdaaa'u abadan hattaa tu'minoo billaahi wahdahooo illaa qawla Ibraheema li abeehi la astaghfiranna laka wa maaa amliku laka minal laahi min shai; rabbanaa 'alaika tawakkalnaa wa ilaika anabnaa wa ilaikal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Rabbanā lā taj‘alnā fitnatal lil-lażīna kafarū wagfir lanā rabbanā, innaka antal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Rabbana laa taj'alnaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo waghfir lanaa rabbanaa innaka antal azeezul hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Laqad kāna lakum fīhim uswatun ḥasanatul liman kāna yarjullāha wal-yaumal-ākhir(a), wa may yatawalla fa'innallāha huwal-ganiyyul-ḥamīd(u).
ayah.translation: Laqad kaana lakum feehim uswatunhasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal yawmal aakhir; wa many yatawalla fa innal laaha huwal ghaniyyul hameed

ayah.transliteration: ‘Asallāhu ay yaj‘ala bainakum wa bainal-lażīna ‘ādaitum minhum mawaddah(tan), wallāhu qadīr(un), wallāhu gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Asal laahu any yaj'ala bainakum wa bainal lazeena 'aadaitum minhum mawaddah; wallahu qadeer; wallahu ghafoorur raheem

ayah.transliteration: Lā yanhākumullāhu ‘anil-lażīna lam yuqātilūkum fid-dīni wa lam yukhrijūkum min diyārikum an tabarrūhum wa tuqsiṭū ilaihim, innallāha yuḥibbul-muqsiṭīn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena lam yuqaatilookum fid deeni wa lam yukhrijookum min diyaarikum an tabarroohum wa tuqsitooo ilaihim; innal laaha yuhibbul muqsiteen

ayah.transliteration: Innamā yanhākumullāhu ‘anil-lażīna qātalūkum fid-dīni wa akhrajūkum min diyārikum wa ẓāharū ‘alā ikhrājikum an tawallauhum, wa may yatawallahum fa'ulā'ika humuẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
ayah.translation: Innamaa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena qaatalookum fid deeni wa akhrajookum min diyaarikum wa zaaharoo 'alaa ikhraajikum an tawallawhum; wa many yatawallahum faulaaa'ika humuz zaalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā jā'akumul-mu'minātu muhājirātin famtaḥinūhunn(a), allāhu a‘lamu bi'īmānihinna fa'in ‘alimtumūhunna mu'minātin falā tarji‘ūhunna ilal-kuffār(i), lā hunna ḥillul lahum wa lā hum yaḥillūna lahunn(a), wa ātūhum mā anfaqū, wa lā junāḥa ‘alaikum an tankiḥūhunna iżā ātaitumūhunna ujūrahunn(a), wa lā tumsikū bi‘iṣamil-kawāfiri was'alū mā anfaqū, żālikum ḥukmullāh(i), yaḥkumu bainakum, wallāhu ‘alīmun ḥakīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa jaaa'akumul mu'minaatu muhaajiraatin famtah inoohunna Allaahu a'lamu bieemaanihinna fa in 'alimtumoohunna mu'minaatin falaa tarji'oohunna ilal kuffaar; laa hunna hillul lahum wa laa hum uahilloona lahunna wa aatoohum maa anfaqoo wa laa junaaha 'alaikum an tankihoohunna izaaa aataitumoohunna ujoorahunn; wa laa tumsikoo bi 'isamil kawaafiri was'aloo maaa anfaqtum walyas'aloo maaa anfaqoo zaalikum hukmul laahi yahkumu bainakum wallaahu 'aleemun hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa in fātakum syai'um min azwājikum ilal-kuffāri fa‘āqabtum fa'ātul-lażīna żahabat azwājuhum miṡla mā anfaqū, wattaqullāhal-lażī antum bihī mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa in faatakum shai'um min azwaajikum ilal kuffaari fa'aaqabtum fa aatul lazeena zahabat azwaajuhum misla maaa anfaqoo; wattaqul laahal lazeee antum bihee mu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu iżā jā'akal-mu'minātu yubāyi‘naka ‘alā allā yusyrikna billāhi syai'aw wa lā yasriqna wa lā yaznīna wa lā yaqtulna aulādahunna wa lā ya'tīna bibuhtāniy yaftarīnahū baina aidīhinna wa arjulihinna wa lā ya‘ṣīnaka fī ma‘rūfin fabāyi‘hunna wastagfir lahunnallāh(a), innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan nabbiyyu izaa jaaa'akal mu'minaau yubaai naka 'alaaa allaa yushrikna billaahi shai 'anw wa laa yasriqna wa laa yazneena wa laa yaqtulna awlaadahunna wa laa yaateena bibuhtaaniny yaftaree nahoo baina aydeehinna wa arjulihinna wa laa ya'seenaka fee ma'roofin fabaayi'hunna wastaghfir lahunnal laaha innnal laaha ghafoorur raheem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tatawallau qauman gaḍiballāhu ‘alaihim qad ya'isū minal-ākhirati kamā ya'isal-kuffāru min aṣḥābil-qubūr(i).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena amanoo laa tatawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim qad ya'isoo minal aakhirati kamaa ya'isal kuffaaru min as haabil quboor

ayah.transliteration: Sabbaḥa lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fisamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lima taqūlūna mā lā taf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo lima taqooloona maa laa taf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Kabura maqtan ‘indallāhi an taqūlū mā lā taf‘alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kabura maqtan 'indal laahi an taqooloo maa laa taf'aloon

ayah.transliteration: Innallāha yuḥibbul-lażīna yuqātilūna fī sabīlihī ṣaffan ka'annahum bun-yānum marṣūṣ(un).
ayah.translation: Innal laaha yuhibbul lazeena yuqaatiloona fee sabeelihee saffan kaannahum bunyaanum marsoos

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qāla mūsā liqaumihī yā qaumi lima tu'żūnanī wa qad ta‘lamūna annī rasūlullāhi ilaikum, falammā zāgū azāgallāhu qulūbahum, wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumal-fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaala Moosa liqawmihee yaa qawmi lima tu'zoonanee wa qat ta'lamoona annee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum falammaa zaaghooo azaaghal laahu quloobahum; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż qāla ‘īsabnu maryama yā banī isrā'īla innī rasūlullāhi ilaikum muṣaddiqal limā baina yadayya minat-taurāti wa mubasysyiram birasūliy ya'tī mim ba‘dismuhū aḥmad(u), falammā jā'ahum bil-bayyināti qālū hāżā siḥrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa iz qaala 'Eesab-nu-Mayama yaa Banee Israaa'eela innee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum musaddiqal limaa baina yadayya minat Tawraati wa mubashshiram bi Rasooliny yaatee mim ba'dis muhooo Ahmad; falammaa jaaa'ahum bil baiyinaati qaaloo haazaa sihrum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa man aẓlamu mimmaniftarā ‘alallāhil-każiba wa huwa yud‘ā ilal-islām(i), wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa man azlamu mimma nif taraa 'alal laahil kaziba wa huwa yad'aaa ilal Islaam; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Yurīdūna liyuṭfi'ū nūrallāhi bi'afwāhihim, wallāhu mutimmu nūrihī wa lau karihal-kāfirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yureedoona liyutfi'oo nooral laahi bi afwaahimim wallaahu mutimmu noorihee wa law karihal kaafiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa huwal-lażī arsala rasūlahū bil-hudā wa dīnil-ḥaqqi  liyuẓhirahū ‘alad-dīni kullih(ī), wa lau karihal-musyrikūn(a).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullihee wa law karihal mushrikoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū hal adullukum ‘alā tijāratin tunjīkum min ‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aammano hal adullukum 'alaa tijaaratin tunjeekum min 'azaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Tu'minūna billāhi wa rasūlihī wa tujāhidūna fī sabīlillāhi bi'amwālikum wa anfusikum, żālikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Tu'minoona billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa tujaahidoona fee sabeelil laahi bi amwaalikum wa anfusikum; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Yagfir lakum żunūbakum wa yudkhilkum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru wa masākina ṭayyibatan fī jannāti ‘adn(in), żālikal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Yaghfir lakum zunoobakum wa yudkhilkum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wa masaakina taiyibatan fee Jannaati 'Ad; zaalikal fawzul 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa ukhrā tuḥibbūnahā, naṣrum minallāhi wa fatḥun qarīb(un), wa basysyiril-mu'minīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ukhraa tuhibboonahaa nasrum minal laahi wa fat hun qaree; wa bashshiril mu 'mineen

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū kūnū anṣārallāhi kamā qāla ‘īsabnu maryama lil-ḥawāriyyīna man anṣārī ilallāh(i), qālal-ḥawāriyyūna naḥnu anṣārullāhi fa'āmanaṭ-ṭā'ifatum mim banī isrā'īla wa kafaraṭ-ṭā'ifah(tun), fa'ayyadnal-lażīna āmanū ‘alā ‘aduwwihim fa'aṣbaḥū ẓāhirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamaanoo koonooo ansaaral laahi kamaa qaala 'Eesab-nu-Maryama lil Hawaariyyeena man ansaareee ilal laah; qaalal Hawaariyyoona nahnu ansaa rul laahi fa aamanat taaa'ifatum mim Bannee Israaa'eela wa kafarat taaa'ifatun fa ayyadnal lazeena aammanoo 'alaa 'aduwwihim fa asbahoo zaahireen

ayah.transliteration: Yusabbiḥu lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍil-malikil-quddūsil-‘azīzil-ḥakīm(i).
ayah.translation: Yusabbihu lilaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardil Malikil Quddoosil 'Azeezil Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī ba‘aṡa fil-ummiyyīna rasūlam minhum yatlū ‘alaihim āyātihī wa yuzakkīhim wa yu‘allimuhumul-kitāba wal-ḥikmata wa in kānū min qablu lafī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee ba'asa fil ummiyyeena Rasoolam min hum yatloo 'alaihim aayaatihee wa yuzakkeehim wa yu'allimuhumul Kitaaba wal Hikmata wa in kaano min qablu lafee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ākharīna minhum lammā yalḥaqū bihim, wa huwal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Wa aakhareena minhum lammaa yalhaqoo bihim wa huwal 'azeezul hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Żālika faḍlullāhi yu'tīhi may yasyā'(u), wallāhu żul-faḍlil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Zaalika fadlul laahi yu'teehi many-yashaaa; wallaahu zul fadil 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Maṡalul-lażīna ḥummilut-taurāta ṡumma lam yaḥmilūhā kamaṡalil-ḥimāri yaḥmilu asfārā(n), bi'sa maṡalul-qaumil-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātillāh(i), wallāhu lā yahdil-qaumaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Masalul lazeena hum milut tawraata summa lam yahmiloonhaa kamasalil himaari yah milu asfaaraa; bi'sa masalul qawmil lazeena kaazzaboo bi aayaatil laah; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmazzaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul yā ayyuhal-lażīna hādū in za‘amtum annakum auliyā'u lillāhi min dūnin-nāsi fa tamannawul-mauta in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul yaaa ayyuhal lazeena haadoo in za'amtum annakum awliyaaa'u lilaahi min doonin naasi fatamannawul mawta in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yatamannaunahū abadam bimā qaddamat aidīhim, wallāhu ‘alīmum biẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yatamannaw nahooo abadam bimaa qaddamat aydeehim; wallaahu 'aleemum bix zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul innal-mautal-lażī tafirrūna minhu fa innahū mulāqīkum ṡumma turaddūna ilā ‘ālimil-gaibi wasy-syahādati fa yunabbi'ukum bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul innal mawtal lazee tafirroona minhu fa innahoo mulaaqeekum summa turaddoona ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi wash shahaadati fa yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū iżā nūdiya liṣ-ṣalāti miy yaumil-jumu‘ati fas‘au ilā żikrillāhi wa żarul-bai‘(a), żālikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa noodiya lis-Salaati miny yawmil Jumu'ati fas'aw ilaa zikril laahi wa zarul bai'; zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā quḍiyatiṣ-ṣalātu fantasyirū fil-arḍi wabtagū min faḍlillāhi ważkurullāha kaṡīral la‘allakum tufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa-izaa qudiyatis Salaatu fantashiroo fil ardi wabtaghoo min fadlil laahi wazkurul laaha kaseeral la'allakum tuflihoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ra'au tijāratan au lahwaninfaḍḍū ilaihā wa tarakūka qā'imā(n), qul mā ‘indallāhi khairum minal-lahwi wa minat-tijārah(ti), wallāhu khairur-rāziqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa ra'aw tijaaratan aw lahwanin faddooo ilaihaa wa tarakooka qaaa'imaa; qul maa 'indal laahi khairum minal lahwi wa minat tijaarah; wallaahu khayrur raaziqeen

ayah.transliteration: Iżā jā'akal-munāfiqūna qālū nasyhadu innaka larasūlullāh(i), wallāhu ya‘lamu innaka larasūluh(ū), wallāhu yasyhadu innal-munāfiqīna lakāżibūn(a).
ayah.translation: Izaa jaaa'akal munaafiqoona qaaloo nashhadu innaka la rasoolul laah; wallaahu ya'lamu innaka la rasooluhoo wallaahu yashhadu innal munaafiqeena lakaaziboon

ayah.transliteration: Ittakhażū aimānahum junnatan faṣaddū ‘an sabīlillāh(i), innahum sā'a mā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ittakhazoo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laah; innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahum āmanū ṡumma kafarū faṭubi‘a ‘alā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahum aamanoo summa kafaroo fatubi'a 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yafqahoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā ra'aitahum tu‘jibuka ajsāmuhum, wa iy yaqūlū tasma‘ liqaulihim, ka'annahum khusyubum musannadah(tun), yaḥsabūna kulla ṣaiḥatin ‘alaihim, humul-‘aduwwu faḥżarhum, qātalahumullāh(u), annā yu'fakūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa ra aytahum tu'jibuka ajsaamuhum wa iny yaqooloo tasma' liqawlihim kaannahum khushubum musannadah; yahsaboona kulla saihatin 'alaihim; humul 'aduwwu fahzarhum; qaatalahumul laahu annaa yu'fakoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā qīla lahum ta‘ālau yastagfir lakum rasūlullāhi lawwau ru'ūsahum wa ra'aitahum yaṣuddūna wa hum mustakbirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa qeela lahum ta'aalaw yastaghfir lakum rasoolul laahi lawwaw ru'oo sahum wa ra aytahum yasuddoona wa hum mustakbiroon

ayah.transliteration: Sawā'un ‘alaihim astagfarta lahum am lam tastagfir lahum, lay yagfirallāhu lahum, innallāha lā yahdil-qaumal-fāsiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Sawaaa'un 'alaihim as taghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lany yaghfiral laahu lahum; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmal faasiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Humul-lażīna yaqūlūna lā tunfiqū ‘alā man ‘inda rasūlillāhi ḥattā yanfaḍḍū, wa lillāhi khazā'inus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa lākinnal-munāfiqīna lā yafqahūn(a).
ayah.translation: Humul lazeena yaqooloona laa tunfiqoo 'alaa man inda Rasoolil laahi hatta yanfaddoo; wa lillaahi khazaaa' inus samaawaati wal ardi wa laakinnal munaafiqeena la yafqahoon

ayah.transliteration: Yaqūlūna la'ir raja‘nā ilal-madīnati layukhrijannal-a‘azzu minhal-ażall(a), wa lillāhil-‘izzatu wa lirasūlihī wa lil-mu'minīna wa lākinnal-munāfiqīna lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaqooloona la'ir raja'naaa ilal madeenati la yukhrijanal a'azzu minhal azall; wa lillaahil 'izzatu wa li Rasoolihee wa lilmu'mineena wa laakinnal munaafiqeena laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā tulhikum amwālukum wa lā aulādukum ‘an żikrillāh(i), wa may yaf‘al żālika fa ulā'ika humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tulhikum amwaalukum wa laa awlaadukum 'anzikril laah; wa mai-yaf'al zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa anfiqū mimmā razaqnākum min qabli ay ya'tiya aḥadakumul-mautu fa yaqūla rabbi lau lā akhkhartanī ilā ajalin qarīb(in), fa aṣṣaddaqa wa akum minaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa anifqoo mim maa razaqnaakum min qabli any-yaatiya ahadakumul mawtu fa yaqoola rabbi law laaa akhkhartaneee ilaaa ajalin qareebin fa assaddaqa wa akum minassaaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lay yu'akhkhirallāhu nafsan iżā jā'a ajaluhā, wallāhu khabīrum bimā ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lany yu 'akhkhiral laahu nafsan izaa jaaa'a ajaluhaa; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Yusabbiḥu lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamdu wa huwa ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Yusabbihu lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi lahul mulku wa lahul hamd, wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai 'in Qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī khalaqakum fa minkum kāfiruw wa minkum mu'min(un), wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee khalaqakum faminkum kaafirunw wa min kum mu'min ; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

ayah.transliteration: Khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqqi wa ṣawwarakum fa'aḥsana ṣuwarakum, wa ilaihil-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqqi wa sawwarakum fa ahsana suwarakum wa ilaihil maseer

ayah.transliteration: Ya‘lamu mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa ya‘lamu mā tusirrūna wa mā tu‘linūn(a), wallāhu ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa ya'lamu maa tusirroona wa maa tu'linoon; wallaahu 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul-lażīna kafarū min qabl(u), fa żāqū wabāla amrihim wa lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Alam yaatikum naba'ul lazeena kafaroo min qablu fazaaqoo wabaala amrihim wa lahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Żālika bi'annahū kānat ta'tīhim rusuluhum bil-bayyināti fa qālū abasyaruy yahdūnanā, fa kafarū wa tawallau wastagnallāh(u), wallāhu ganiyyun ḥamīd(un).
ayah.translation: Zaalika bi annahoo kaanat taateehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faqaaloo a basharuny yahdoonanaa fakafaroo wa tawallaw; wastaghnal laah; wallaahu ghaniyyun hameed

ayah.transliteration: Za‘amal-lażīna kafarū allay yub‘aṡū, qul balā wa rabbī latub‘aṡunna ṡumma latunabba'unna bimā ‘amiltum, wa żālika ‘alallāhi yasīr(un).
ayah.translation: Za'amal lazeena kafarooo al-lany yub'asoo; qul balaa wa rabbee latub'asunna summa latunabba'unna bimaa 'amiltum; wa zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

ayah.transliteration: Fa āminū billāhi wa rasūlihī wan-nūril-lażī anzalnā, wallāhu bimā ta‘malūna khabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Fa-aaminoo billaahi wa rasoolihee wannooril lazeee anzalnaa; wallaahu bima ta'maloona khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yajma‘ukum liyaumil-jam‘i żālika yaumut-tagābun(i), wa may yu'mim billāhi wa ya‘mal ṣāliḥay yukaffir ‘anhu sayyi'ātihī wa yudkhilhu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā(n), żālikal-fauzul-‘aẓīm(u).
ayah.translation: Ywma yajma'ukum li yawmil jam'i zaalika yawmut taghaabun; wa many-yumim billaahi wa ya'mal saalihany yukaffir 'anhu sayyi aatihee wa yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaaa abadaa; zaalikal fawzul 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna kafarū wa każżabū bi'āyātinā ulā'ika aṣḥābun-nāri khālidīna fīhā, wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi aayaaatinaaa ulaaa'ika ashaabun naari khaalideena feehaa bi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Mā aṣāba mim muṣībatin illā bi'iżnillāh(i), wa may yu'mim billāhi yahdi qalbah(ū), wallāhu bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Maaa asaaba mim musee batin illaa bi-iznil laah; wa many yu'mim billaahi yahdi qalbah; wallaahu bikulli shai;in Aleem

ayah.transliteration: Wa aṭī‘ullāha wa aṭī‘ur-rasūl(a), fa'in tawallaitum fa innamā ‘alā rasūlinal-balāgul-mubīn(u).
ayah.translation: Wa atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasool; fa in tawallaitum fa innamaa 'alaa Rasoolinal balaaghul mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huw(a), wa ‘alallāhi falyatawakkalil-mu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wa 'alal laahi falyata wakkalil mu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū inna min azwājikum wa aulādikum ‘aduwwal lakum faḥżarūhum, wa in ta‘fū wa taṣfaḥū wa tagfirū fa innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo inna min azwaaji kum wa awlaadikum 'aduwwal lakum fahzaroohum; wa in ta'foo wa tasfahoo wa taghfiroo fa innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem

ayah.transliteration: Innamā amwālukum wa aulādukum fitnah(tun), wallāhu ‘indahū ajrun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innamaa amwaalukum wa awlaadukum fitnah; wallaahu 'indahooo ajrun 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Fattaqullāha mastaṭa‘tum wasma‘ū wa aṭī‘ū wa anfiqū khairal li'anfusikum, wa may yūqa syuḥḥa nafsihī fa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fattaqul laaha mastat'tum wasma'oo wa atee'oo waanfiqoo khairal li anfusikum; wa many-yooqa shuha nafsihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

ayah.transliteration: In tuqriḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanay yuḍā‘ifhu lakum wa yagfir lakum, wallāhu syakūrun ḥalīm(un).
ayah.translation: In tuqridul laaha qardan hasanany yudd'ifhu lakum wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Shakoorun Haleem

ayah.transliteration: ‘Ālimul-gaibi wasy-syahādatil-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: 'Aalimul-Ghaibi wash-shahaadatil 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu iżā ṭallaqtumun-nisā'a fa ṭalliqūhunna li‘iddatihinna wa aḥṣul-‘iddah(ta), wattaqullāha rabbakum, lā tukhrijūhunna mim buyūtihinna wa lā yakhrujna illā ay ya'tīna bifāḥisyatim mubayyinah(tin), wa tilka ḥudūdullāh(i), wa may yata‘adda ḥudūdallāhi faqad ẓalama nafsah(ū), lā tadrī la‘allallāha yuḥdiṡu ba‘da żālika amrā(n).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu izaa tallaqtummun nisaaa'a fatalliqoohunna li'iddatihinna wa ahsul'iddata; wattaqul laaha rabbakum laa tukhri joohunna mim bu-yootihinna wa laa yakhrujna illaaa any yaateema bifaahishatim mubaiyinah; wa tilka hudoodul laah; wa many yata'adda hudoodal laahi faqad zalama nafsha; laa tadree la'allal laaha yuhdisu ba'dazaalika amraa

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā balagna ajalahunna fa amsikūhunna bima‘rūfin au fāriqūhunna bima‘rūfiw wa asyhidū żawai ‘adlim minkum wa aqīmusy-syahādata lillāh(i), żālikum yū‘aẓu bihī man kāna yu'minu billāhi wal-yaumil-ākhir(i), wa may yattaqillāha yaj‘al lahū makhrajā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa balaghna ajalahunna fa amsikoohunna bima'roofin aw faariqoohunna bima'roofinw wa ashhidoo zawai 'adlim minkum wa aqeemush shahaadata lillaah; zaalikum yoo'azu bihee man kaana yu'minu billaahi wal yawmil aakhir; wa many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo makhrajaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yarzuqhu min ḥaiṡu lā yaḥtasib(u), wa may yatawakkal ‘alallāhi fa huwa ḥasbuh(ū), innallāha bāligu amrih(ī), qad ja‘alallāhu likulli syai'in qadrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yarzuqhu min haisu laa yahtasib; wa many yatawakkal 'alal laahi fahuwa husbuh; innal laaha baalighu amrih; qad ja'alal laahu likulli shai'in qadraa

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lā'ī ya'isna minal-maḥīḍi min nisā'ikum inirtabtum fa ‘iddatuhunna ṡalāṡatu asyhur(in), wal-lā'ī lam yaḥiḍn(a), wa ulātul-aḥmāli ajaluhunna ay yaḍa‘na ḥamlahunn(a), wa may yattaqillāha yaj‘al lahū min amrihī yusrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallaaa'ee ya'isna minal maheedi min nisaaa 'ikum inir tabtum fa'iddatuhunna salaasatu ashhurinw wallaaa'ee lam yahidn; wa ulaatul ahmaali ajaluhunna any yada'na hamlahun; wa many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahoo min armrihee yusraa

ayah.transliteration: Żālika amrullāhi anzalahū ilaikum, wa may yattaqillāha yukaffir ‘anhu sayyi'ātihī wa yu‘ẓim lahū ajrā(n).
ayah.translation: Zaalika amrul laahi anzalahoo ilaikum; wa many yattaqil laaha yukaffir 'anhu saiyi aatihee wa yu'zim lahoo ajraa

ayah.transliteration: Askinūhunna min ḥaiṡu sakantum miw wujdikum wa lā tuḍārrūhunna lituḍayyiqū ‘alaihinn(a), wa in kunna ulāti ḥamlin fa anfiqū ‘alaihinna ḥattā yaḍa‘na ḥamlahunn(a), fa in arḍa‘na lakum fa ātūhunna ujūrahunn(a), wa'tamirū bainakum bima‘rūf(in), wa in ta‘āsartum fasaturḍi‘u lahū ukhrā.
ayah.translation: Askinoohunna min haisu sakantum minw wujdikum wa laa tudaaarroohunna litudaiyiqoo 'alaihinn; wa in kunna ulaati hamlin fa anfiqoo 'alihinna hattaa yada'na hamlahunn; fain arda'na lakum fa aatoo hunna ujoorahunna waatamiroo bainakum bima'roofinw wa in ta'aasartum fasaturdi'u lahooo ukhraa

ayah.transliteration: Liyunfiq żū sa‘atim min sa‘atih(ī), wa man qudira ‘alaihi rizquhū falyunfiq mimmā ātāhullāh(u), lā yukallifullāhu nafsan illā mā ātāhā, sayaj‘alullāhu ba‘da ‘usriy yusrā(n).
ayah.translation: Liyuntiq zoo sa'atim min sa'atihee wa man qudira 'alaihi riquhoo falyunfiq mimmaaa aataahul laah; laa yukalliful laahu nafsan illaa maaa aataahaa; sa yaj'alul laahu ba'da'usriny yusraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ka'ayyim min qaryatin ‘atat ‘an amri rabbihā wa rusulihī fa ḥāsabnāhā ḥisāban syadīdā(n), wa ‘ażżabnāhā ‘ażāban nukrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin 'atat 'an amri Rabbihaa wa Rusulihee fahaasabnaahaa hisaaban shadeedanw wa 'azzabnaahaa 'azaaban nukraa

ayah.transliteration: Fa żāqat wabāla amrihā wa kāna ‘āqibatu amrihā khusrā(n).
ayah.translation: Fazaaqat wabbala amrihaa wa kaana 'aaqibatu amrihaa khusraa

ayah.transliteration: A‘addallāhu lahum ‘ażāban syadīdan fattaqullāha yā ulil-albāb(i) - allażīna āmanū - qad anzalallāhu ilaikum żikrā(n).
ayah.translation: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan fattaqul laaha yaaa ulil albaab, allazeena aammanoo; qad anzalal laahu ilaikum zikraa

ayah.transliteration: Rasūlay yatlū ‘alaikum āyātillāhi mubayyinātil liyukhrijal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti minaẓ-ẓulumāti ilan-nūr(i), wa may yu'mim billāhi wa ya‘mal ṣāliḥay yudkhilhu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā(n), qad aḥsanallāhu lahū rizqā(n).
ayah.translation: Rasoolany yatloo 'alaikum aayaatil laahi mubaiyinaatil liyukhrijal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati minaz zulumaati ilan noor; wa many yu'mim billaahi wa ya;mal saalihany yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa abadan qad ahsanal laahu lahoo rizqqq

ayah.transliteration: Allāhul-lażī khalaqa sab‘a samāwātiw wa minal-arḍi miṡlahunn(a), yatanazzalul-amru bainahunna lita‘lamū annallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un), wa annallāha qad aḥāṭa bikulli syai'in ‘ilmā(n).
ayah.translation: Allaahul lazee khalaq Sab'a Samaawaatinw wa minal ardi mislahunna yatanazzalul amru bainahunna lita'lamooo annal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeerunw wa annal laaha qad ahaata bikulli shai'in ilmaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu lima tuḥarrimu mā aḥallallāhu lak(a), tabtagī marḍāta azwājik(a), wallāhu gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu lima tuharrimu maaa ahallal laahu laka tabtaghee mardaata azwaajik; wallaahu ghafoorur raheem

ayah.transliteration: Qad faraḍallāhu lakum taḥillata aimānikum, wallāhu maulākum, wa huwal-‘alīmul-ḥakīm(u).
ayah.translation: Qad faradal laahu lakum tahillata aymaanikum; wallaahu mawlaakum wa huwal'aleemul hakeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa iż asarran-nabiyyu ilā ba‘ḍi azwājihī ḥadīṡā(n), falammā nabba'at bihī wa aẓharahullāhu ‘alaihi ‘arrafa ba‘ḍahū wa a‘raḍa ‘am baḍ(in), falammā nabba'ahā bihī qālat man amba'aka hāżā, qāla nabba'aniyal-‘alīmul-khabīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa iz asarran nabiyyu ilaa ba'di azwaajihee hadeesan falammaa nabba at bihee wa azharahul laahu 'alaihi 'arrafa ba'dahoo wa a'rada 'am ba'din falammaa nabba ahaa bihee qaalat man amba aka haaza qaala nabba aniyal 'aleemul khabeer

ayah.transliteration: In tatūbā ilallāhi faqad ṣagat qulūbukumā, wa in taẓāharā ‘alaihi fa innallāha huwa maulāhu wa jibrīlu wa ṣāliḥul-mu'minīn(a), wal-malā'ikatu ba‘da żālika ẓahīr(un).
ayah.translation: In tatoobaaa ilal laahi faqad saghat quloobukumaa wa in tazaaharaa 'alihi fa innal laaha huwa mawlaahu wa jibreelu wa saalihul mu'mineen; walma laaa'ikatu ba'dazaalika zaheer

ayah.transliteration: ‘Asā rabbuhū in ṭallaqakunna ay yubdilahū azwājan khairam minkunna muslimātim mu'minātin qānitātin tā'ibātin ‘ābidātin sā'iḥātin ṡayyibātiw wa abkārā(n).
ayah.translation: 'Asaa rabbuhooo in tallaqakunna anyyubdilahooo azwaajan khairam mnkunna muslimaatim mu'minaatin qaanitaatin taaa'ibaatin 'aabidaatin saaa'ihaatin saiyibaatinw wa abkaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū qū anfusakum wa ahlīkum nāraw waqūduhan-nāsu wal-ḥijāratu ‘alaihā malā'ikatun gilāẓun syidādul lā ya‘ṣūnallāha mā amarahum wa yaf‘alūna mā yu'marūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena samanoo qooo anfusakum wa ahleekum naaranw waqoodu han naasu wal hijaaratu 'alaihaa malaaa'ikatun ghilaazun shidaadul laa ya'soonal laaha maa amarahum wa yaf'aloona maa yu'maroon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna kafarū lā ta‘tażīrul-yaum(a), innamā tujzauna mā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena kafaroo la ta'tazinul yawma innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū tūbū ilallāhi taubatan naṣūḥā(n), ‘asā rabbukum ay yukaffira ‘ankum sayyi'ātikum wa yudkhilakum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), yauma lā  yukhzillāhun-nabiyya wal-lażīna āmanū ma‘ah(ū), nūruhum yas‘ā baina aidīhim wa bi'aimānihim yaqūlūna rabbanā atmim lanā nūranā wagfir lanā, innaka ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aammano toobooo ilal laahi tawbatan nasoohan 'asaa rabbukum any-yukaffira 'ankum sayyi aatikum wa yudkhilakum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru yawma laa yukhzil laahun nabiyya wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo nooruhum yas'aa baina aydeehim wa bi aymaanihim yaqooloona rabbanaaa atmim lanaa nooranaa waghfir lana innaka 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhan-nabiyyu jāhidil-kuffāra wal-munāfiqīna wagluẓ ‘alaihim, wa ma'wāhum jahannam(u), wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: yaaa ayyuuhan nabiyyu jaahidil kuffaara walmunaa-fiqeena waghluz 'alaihim; wa maawaahum jahannamu wa bi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Ḍaraballāhu maṡalal lil-lażīna kafarumra'ata nūḥiw wamra'ata lūṭ(in), kānatā taḥta ‘abdaini min ‘ibādinā ṣāliḥaini fa khānatāhumā falam yugniyā ‘anhumā minallāhi syai'aw wa qīladkhulan-nāra ma‘ad-dākhilīn(a).
ayah.translation: Darabal laahu masalal lillazeena kafarum ra ata Noobinw wamra ata Loot, kaanataa tahta 'abdaini min 'ibaadinaa saalihaini fakhaanataahumaa falam yughniyaa 'anhumaa minal laahi shai anw-wa qeelad khulan naara ma'ad Daakhileen

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḍaraballāhu maṡalal lil-lażīna āmanumra'ata fir‘aun(a), iż qālat rabbibni lī ‘indaka baitan fil jannati wa najjinī min fir‘auna  wa ‘amalihī wa najjinī minal qaumiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa darabal laahu masa lal-lillazeena aamanumra ata Fir'awn; iz qaalat rabbibni lee 'indaka baitan fil jannati wa najjinee min Fir'awna wa 'amalihii wa najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa maryamabnata ‘imrānal-latī aḥṣanat farjahā fa nafakhnā fīhi mir rūḥinā wa ṣaddaqat bikalimāti rabbihā wa kutubihī wa kānat minal-qānitīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa Maryamab nata 'Imraanal lateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehi mir roobinaa wa saddaqat bikali maati Rabbihaa wa Kutubihee wakaanat minal qaaniteen

ayah.transliteration: Tabārakal-lażī biyadihil-mulk(u), wa huwa ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayah.translation: Tabaarakal lazee biyadihil mulku wa huwa 'alaa kulli shai-in qadeer

ayah.transliteration: Allażī khalaqal-mauta wal-ḥayāta liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu ‘amalā(n), wa huwal-‘azīzul-gafūr(u).
ayah.translation: Allazee khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; wa huwal 'azeezul ghafoor

ayah.transliteration: Allażī khalaqa sab‘a samāwātin ṭibāqā(n), mā tarā fī khalqir-raḥmāni min tafāwut(in), farji‘il-baṣara hal tarā min fuṭūr(in).
ayah.translation: Allazee khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqam maa taraa fee khalqir rahmaani min tafaawutin farji'il basara hal taraa min futoor

ayah.transliteration: Ṡummarji‘il-baṣara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal-baṣaru khāsi'aw wa huwa ḥasīr(un).
ayah.translation: Summar ji'il basara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal basaru khaasi'anw wa huwa haseer

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad zayyannas-samā'ad-dun-yā bimaṣābīḥa wa ja‘alnāhā rujūmal lisy-syayāṭīni wa a‘tadnā lahum ‘ażābas-sa‘īr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad zaiyannas samaaa'ad dunyaa bimasaa beeha wa ja'alnaahaa rujoomal lish shayaateeni wa a'tadnaa lahum 'azaabas sa'eer

ayah.transliteration: Wa lil-lażīna kafarū birabbihim ‘ażābu jahannam(a), wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayah.translation: Wa lillazeena kafaroo bi rabbihim 'azaabu jahannama wa bi'sal maseer

ayah.transliteration: Iżā ulqū fīhā sami‘ū lahā syahīqaw wa hiya tafūr(u).
ayah.translation: Izaaa ulqoo feehaa sami'oo lahaa shaheeqanw wa hiya tafoor

ayah.transliteration: Takādu tamayyazu minal-gaiẓ(i), kullamā ulqiya fīhā faujun sa'alahum khazanatuhā alam ya'tikum nażīr(un).
ayah.translation: Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaizi kullamaaa uliqya feehaa fawjun sa alahum khazanatuhaaa alam yaatikum nazeer

ayah.transliteration: Qālū balā qad jā'anā nażīr(un), fa każżabnā wa qulnā mā nazzalallāhu min syai'(in), in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīr(in).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo balaa qad jaaa'anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa wa qulnaa maa nazzalal laahu min shai in in antum illaa fee dalaalin kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū lau kunnā nasma‘u au na‘qilu mā kunnā fī aṣḥābis-sa‘īr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo law kunnaa nasma'u awna'qilu maa kunnaa feee as haabis sa'eer

ayah.transliteration: Fa‘tarafū biżambihim, fasuḥqal li'aṣḥābis-sa‘īr(i).
ayah.translation: Fa'tarafoo bizambihim fasuhqal li as haabis sa'eer

ayah.transliteration: Innal-lażīna yakhsyauna rabbahum bil-gaibi lahum magfiratuw wa ajrun kabīr(un).
ayah.translation: Innal lazeena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa asirrū qaulakum awijharū bih(ī), innahū ‘alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa asirroo qawlakum awijharoo bihee innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

ayah.transliteration: Alā ya‘lamu man khalaq(a), wa huwal-laṭīful-khabīr(u).
ayah.translation: Alaa ya'lamu man khalaq wa huwal lateeful khabeer

ayah.transliteration: Huwal-lażī ja‘ala lakumul-arḍa żalūlan famsyū fī manākibihā wa kulū mir rizqih(ī), wa ilaihin-nusyūr(u).
ayah.translation: Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul arda zaloolan famshoo fee manaakibihaa wa kuloo mir rizqihee wa ilaihin nushoor

ayah.transliteration: A'amintum man fis-samā'i ay yakhsifa bikumul-arḍa  fa'iżā hiya tamūr(u).
ayah.translation: 'A-amintum man fissamaaa'i aiyakhsifa bi kumul arda fa izaa hiya tamoor

ayah.transliteration: Am amintum man fis-samā'i ay yursila ‘alaikum ḥāṣibā(n), fa sata‘lamūna kaifa nażīr(i).
ayah.translation: Am amintum man fissamaaa'i ai yursila 'alaikum haasiban fasata'lamoona kaifa nazeer

ayah.transliteration: Wa laqad każżabal-lażīna min qablihim fakaifa kāna nakīr(i).
ayah.translation: Wa laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakaifa kaana nakeer

ayah.transliteration: Awalam yarau ilaṭ-ṭairi fauqahum ṣāffātiw wa yaqbiḍn(a), mā yumsikuhunna illar-raḥmān(u), innahū bikulli syai'im baṣīr(un).
ayah.translation: Awalam yaraw ilat tairi fawqahum saaaffaatinw wa yaqbidn; maa yumsikuhunna illaar rahmaan; innahoo bikulli shai im baseer

ayah.transliteration: Am man hāżal-lażī huwa jundul lakum yanṣurukum min dūnir-raḥmān(i), inil-kāfirūna illā fī gurūr(in).
ayah.translation: Amman haazal lazee huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min doonir rahmaan; inilkaafiroona illaa fee ghuroor

ayah.transliteration: Am man hāżal-lażī yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah(ū), bal lajjū fī ‘utuwwiw wa nufūr(in).
ayah.translation: Amman haazal lazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjoo fee 'utuwwinw wa nufoor

ayah.transliteration: Afamay yamsyī mukibban ‘alā wajhihī ahdā ammay yamsyī sawiyyan ‘alā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayah.translation: Afamai yamshee mukibban 'alaa wajhihee ahdaaa ammany yamshee sawiyyan 'alaa siratim mustaqeem

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwal-lażī ansya'akum wa ja‘ala lakumus-sam‘a wal-abṣāra wal-af'idah(ta), qalīlam mā tasykurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul huwal lazee ansha akum wa ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idata qaleelam maa tashkuroon

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwal-lażī żara'akum fil-arḍi wa ilaihi tuḥsyarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qul huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-wa‘du in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamal-‘ilmu ‘indallāh(i), wa innamā ana nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Qul innamal 'ilmu 'indallaahi wa innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā ra'auhu zulfatan sī'at wujūhul-lażīna kafarū wa qīla hāżal-lażī kuntum bihī tadda‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaammaa ra-awhu zulfatan seee'at wujoohul lazeena kafaroo wa qeela haazal lazee kuntum bihee tadda'oon

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum in ahlakaniyallāhu wa mam ma‘iya au raḥimanā, famay yujīrul-kāfirīna min ‘ażābin alīm(in).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aytum in ahlaka niyal laahu wa mam ma'iya aw rahimanaa famai-yujeerul kaafireena min 'azaabin aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwar-raḥmānu āmannā bihī wa ‘alaihi tawakkalnā, fasata‘lamūna man huwa fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
ayah.translation: Qul huwar rahmaanu aamannaa bihee wa 'alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamoona man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Qul ara'aitum in aṣbaḥa mā'ukum gauran famay ya'tīkum bimā'im ma‘īn(in).
ayah.translation: Qul ara'aytum in asbaha maaa'ukum ghawran famai yaateekum bimaaa'im ma'een

ayah.transliteration: Nūn, wal-qalami wa mā yasṭurūn(a).
ayah.translation: Noon; walqalami wa maa yasturoon

ayah.transliteration: Mā anta bini‘mati rabbika bimajnūn(in).
ayah.translation: Maa anta bini'mati Rabbika bimajnoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa inna laka la'ajran gaira mamnūn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa inna laka la ajran ghaira mamnoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa innaka la‘alā khuluqin ‘aẓīm(in).
ayah.translation: Wa innaka la'alaa khuluqin 'azeem

ayah.transliteration: Fasatubṣiru wa yubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fasatubsiru wa yubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Bi'ayyikumul-maftūn(u).
ayah.translation: Bi ayyikumul maftoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbaka huwa a‘lamu biman ḍalla ‘an sabīlih(ī), wa huwa a‘lamu bil-muhtadīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa Rabbaka Huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee wa Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen

ayah.transliteration: Falā tuṭi‘il-mukażżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaa tuti'il mukazzibeen

ayah.transliteration: Waddū lau tudhinu fayudhinūn(a).
ayah.translation: Waddoo law tudhinu fa-yudhinoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tuṭi‘ kulla ḥallāfim mahīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tuti' kulla hallaa fim maheen

ayah.transliteration: Hammāzim masysyā'im binamīm(in).
ayah.translation: Hammaazim mash shaaa'im binameem

ayah.transliteration: Mannā‘il lil-khairi mu‘tadin aṡīm(in).
ayah.translation: Mannaa'il lilkhairi mu'tadin aseem

ayah.transliteration: ‘Utullim ba‘da żālika zanīm(in).
ayah.translation: 'Utullim ba'da zaalika zaneem

ayah.transliteration: An kāna żā māliw wa banīn(a).
ayah.translation: An kaana zaa maalinw-wa baneen

ayah.transliteration: Iżā tutlā ‘alaihi āyātunā qāla asāṭīrul-awwalīn(a).
ayah.translation: Izaa tutlaa 'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen

ayah.transliteration: Sanasimuhū ‘alal-khurṭūm(i).
ayah.translation: Sanasimuhoo 'alal khurtoom

ayah.transliteration: Innā balaunāhum kamā balaunā aṣḥābal-jannah(ti), iż aqsamū layaṣrimunnahā muṣbiḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Innaa balawnaahum kamaa balawnaaa As-haabal jannati iz 'aqsamoo la-yasri munnahaa musbiheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yastaṡnūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yastasnoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa ṭāfa ‘alaihā ṭā'ifum mir rabbika wa hum nā'imūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fataafa 'alaihaa taaa'i fum mir rabbika wa hum naaa'imoon

ayah.transliteration: Fa aṣbaḥat kaṣ-ṣarīm(i).
ayah.translation: Fa asbahat kassareem

ayah.transliteration: Fa tanādau muṣbiḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fatanaadaw musbiheen

ayah.transliteration: Anigdū ‘alā ḥarṡikum in kuntum ṣārimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Anighdoo 'alaa harsikum in kuntum saarimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fanṭalaqū wa hum yatakhāfatūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fantalaqoo wa hum yatakhaafatoon

ayah.transliteration: Allā yadkhulannahal-yauma ‘alaikum miskīn(un).
ayah.translation: Al laa yadkhulannahal yawma 'alaikum miskeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa gadau ‘alā ḥardin qādirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ghadaw 'alaa hardin qaadireen

ayah.transliteration: Falammā ra'auhā qālū innā laḍāllūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falammaa ra awhaa qaalooo innaa ladaaalloon

ayah.transliteration: Bal naḥnu maḥrūmūn(a).
ayah.translation: Bal nahnu mahroomoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla ausaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lau lā tusabbiḥūn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum law laa tusabbihoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū subḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo subhaana rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa'aqbala ba‘ḍuhum ‘alā ba‘ḍiy yatalāwamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fa aqbala ba'duhum 'alaa ba'diny yatalaawamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qālū yā wailanā innā kunnā ṭāgīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo yaa wailanaaa innaa kunnaa taagheen

ayah.transliteration: ‘Asā rabbunā ay yubdilanā khairam minhā innā ilā rabbinā rāgibūn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Asaa rabbunaaa any yubdilanaa khairam minhaaa innaaa ilaa rabbinaa raaghiboon

ayah.transliteration: Każālikal-‘ażāb(u), wa la‘ażābul-ākhirati akbar(u), lau kānū ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kazaalikal azaab, wa la'azaabul aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna lil-muttaqīna ‘inda rabbihim jannātin-na‘īm(i).
ayah.translation: Inna lilmuttaqeena 'inda rabbihim jannaatin na'eem

ayah.transliteration: Afanaj‘alul-muslimīna kal-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: Afanaj'alul muslimeena kalmujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Mā lakum, kaifa taḥkumūn(a).
ayah.translation: Maa lakum kaifa tahhkumoon

ayah.transliteration: Am lakum kitābun fīhi tadrusūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am lakum kitaabun feehi tadrusoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna lakum fīhi lamā takhayyarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Inna lakum feehi lamaa takhaiyaroon

ayah.transliteration: Am lakum aimānun ‘alainā bāligatun ilā yaumil-qiyāmah(ti), inna lakum lamā taḥkumūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am lakum aymaanun 'alainaa baalighatun ilaa yawmil qiyaamati inna lakum lamaa tahkumoon

ayah.transliteration: Salhum ayyuhum biżālika za‘īm(un).
ayah.translation: Salhum ayyuhum bizaa lika za'eem

ayah.transliteration: Am lahum syurakā'(u), falya'tū bisyurakā'ihim in kānū ṣādiqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Am lahum shurakaaa'u falyaatoo bishurakaaa 'ihim in kaanoo saadiqeen

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yuksyafu ‘an sāqiw wa yud‘auna ilas-sujūdi falā yastaṭī‘ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma yukshafu 'am saaqinw wa yud'awna ilas sujoodi falaa yastatee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Khāsyi‘atan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum żillah(tun), wa qad kānū yud‘auna ilas-sujūdi wa hum sālimun(a).
ayah.translation: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillatunw wa qad kaanoo yud'awna ilassujoodi wa hum saalimoon

ayah.transliteration: Fażarnī wa may yukażżibu bihāżal-ḥadīṡi sanastadrijuhum min ḥaiṡu lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fazarnee wa many yukazzibu bihaazal hadeesi sanastad rijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa umlī lahum, inna kaidī matīn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa umlee lahum; inna kaidee mateen

ayah.transliteration: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim magramim muṡqalūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaloon

ayah.transliteration: Am ‘indahumul-gaibu fahum yaktubūn(a).
ayah.translation: Am 'indahumul ghaibu fahum yaktuboon

ayah.transliteration: Faṣbir liḥukmi rabbika wa lā takun kaṣāḥibil-ḥūt(i), iż nādā wa huwa makẓūm(un).
ayah.translation: Fasbir lihkmi rabbika wa laa takun kasaahibil boot; iz naadaa wa huwa makzoom

ayah.transliteration: Lau lā an tadārakahū ni‘matum mir rabbihī lanubiża bil-‘arā'i wa huwa mażmūm(un).
ayah.translation: Law laaa an tadaara kahoo ni'matum mir rabbihee lanubiza bil'araaa'i wa huwa mazmoom

ayah.transliteration: Fajtabāhu rabbuhū faja‘alahū minaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayah.translation: Fajtabaahu rabbuhoo faja'alahoo minas saaliheen

ayah.transliteration: Wa iy yakādul-lażīna kafarū layuzliqūnaka bi'abṣārihim lammā sami‘uż żikra wa yaqūlūna innahū lamajnūn(un).
ayah.translation: Wa iny-yakaadul lazeena kafaroo la-yuzliqoonaka biabsaarihim lammaa saml'uz-Zikra wa yaqooloona innahoo lamajnoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā huwa illā żikrul lil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Al-ḥāqqah(tu).
ayah.translation: Al haaaqqah

ayah.transliteration: Mal-ḥāqqah(tu).
ayah.translation: Mal haaaqqah

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā adrāka mal-ḥāqqah(tu).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa adraaka mal haaaqqah

ayah.transliteration: Każżabat ṡamūdu wa ‘ādum bil-qāri‘ah(ti).
ayah.translation: Kazzabat samoodu wa 'Aadum bil qaari'ah

ayah.transliteration: Fa'ammā ṡamūdu fa uhlikū biṭ-ṭāgiyah(ti).
ayah.translation: Fa-ammaa Samoodu fauhlikoo bittaaghiyah

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammā ‘ādun fa'uhlikū birīḥin ṣarṣarin ‘ātiyah(tin).
ayah.translation: Wa ammaa 'Aadun fa uhlikoo bireehin sarsarin 'aatiyah

ayah.transliteration: Sakhkharahā ‘alaihim sab‘a layāliw wa ṡamāniyata ayyām(in), ḥusūman fataral-qauma fīhā ṣar‘ā, ka'annahum a‘jāzu nakhlin khāwiyah(tin).
ayah.translation: Sakhkharahaa 'alaihim sab'a la yaalinw wa samaaniyata ayyaamin husooman fataral qawma feehaa sar'aa ka annahum a'jaazu nakhlin khaawiyah

ayah.transliteration: Fahal tarā lahum mim bāqiyah(tin).
ayah.translation: Fahal taraa lahum mim baaqiyah

ayah.transliteration: Wa jā'a fir‘aunu wa man qablahū wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi'ah(ti).
ayah.translation: Wa jaaa'a Firawnu wa man qablahoo wal mu'tafikaatu bilhaati'ah

ayah.transliteration: Fa ‘aṣau rasūla rabbihim fa akhażahum akhżatar rābiyah(tan).
ayah.translation: Fa'ansaw Rasoola Rabbihim fa akhazahum akhzatar raabiyah

ayah.transliteration: Innā lammā ṭagal-mā'u ḥamalnākum fil-jāriyah(ti).
ayah.translation: Innaa lammaa taghal maaa'u hamalnaakum fil jaariyah

ayah.transliteration: Linaj‘alahā lakum tażkirataw wa ta‘iyahā użunuw wā‘iyah(tun).
ayah.translation: Linaj'alahaa lakum tazki ratanw-wa ta'iyahaa unzununw waa'iyah

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri nafkhatuw wāḥidah(tun).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa nufikha fis soori nafkhatunw waahidah

ayah.transliteration: Wa ḥumilatil-arḍu wal-jibālu fa dukkatā dakkataw wāḥidah(tan).
ayah.translation: Wa humilatil ardu wal jibaalu fadukkataa dakkatanw waahidah

ayah.transliteration: Fayauma'iżiw waqa‘atil-wāqi‘ah(tu).
ayah.translation: Fa yawma'izinw waqa'atil waaqi'ah

ayah.transliteration: Wansyaqqatis-samā'u fahiya yauma'iżiw wāhiyah(tun).
ayah.translation: Wanshaqqatis samaaa'u fahiya yawma 'izinw-waahiyah

ayah.transliteration: Wal-malaku ‘alā arjā'ihā, wa yaḥmilu ‘arsya rabbika fauqahum yauma'iżin ṡamāniyah(tun).
ayah.translation: Wal malaku 'alaaa arjaaa'ihaa; wa yahmilu 'Arsha Rabbika fawqahum yawma'izin samaaniyah

ayah.transliteration: Yauma'iżin tu‘raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyah(tun).
ayah.translation: Yawma'izin tu'radoona laa takhfaa min kum khaafiyah

ayah.transliteration: Fa ammā man ūtiya kitābahū biyamīnihī fa yaqūlu hā'umuqra'ū kitābiyah.
ayah.translation: Fa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenihee fa yaqoolu haaa'umuq ra'oo kitaabiyah

ayah.transliteration: Innī ẓanantu annī mulāqin ḥisābiyah.
ayah.translation: Innee zannantu annee mulaaqin hisaabiyah

ayah.transliteration: Fa huwa fī ‘īsyatir rāḍiyah(tin).
ayah.translation: Fahuwa fee 'eeshatir raadiyah

ayah.transliteration: Fī jannatin ‘āliyah(tin).
ayah.translation: Fee jannnatin 'aaliyah

ayah.transliteration: Quṭūfuhā dāniyah(tun).
ayah.translation: Qutoofuhaa daaniyah

ayah.transliteration: Kulū wasyrabū hanī'am bimā aslaftum fil-ayyāmil-khāliyah(ti).
ayah.translation: Kuloo washraboo haneee'am bimaaa aslaftum fil ayyaamil khaliyah

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammā man ūtiya kitābahū bisyimālih(ī), fa yaqūlu yā laitanī lam ūta kitābiyah.
ayah.translation: Wa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo bishimaalihee fa yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam oota kitaaabiyah

ayah.transliteration: Wa lam adri mā ḥisābiyah.
ayah.translation: Wa lam adri maa hisaabiyah

ayah.transliteration: Yā laitahā kānatil-qāḍiyah(ta).
ayah.translation: Yaa laitahaa kaanatil qaadiyah

ayah.transliteration: Mā agnā ‘annī māliyah.
ayah.translation: Maaa aghnaa 'annee maaliyah

ayah.transliteration: Halaka ‘annī sulṭāniyah.
ayah.translation: Halaka 'annee sultaaniyah

ayah.transliteration: Khużūhu fagullūh(u).
ayah.translation: Khuzoohu faghullooh

ayah.transliteration: Ṡummal-jaḥīma ṣallūh(u).
ayah.translation: Summal Jaheema sallooh

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma fī silsilatin żar‘uhā sab‘ūna żirā‘an faslukūh(u).
ayah.translation: Summa fee silsilatin zar'uhaa sab'oona ziraa'an faslukooh

ayah.transliteration: Innahū kāna lā yu'minu billāhil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Innahoo kaana laa yu'minubillaahil 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yaḥuḍḍu ‘alā ṭa‘āmil-miskīn(i).
ayah.translation: wa laa yahuddu 'alaa ta'aamil miskeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa laisa lahul-yauma hāhunā ḥamīm(un).
ayah.translation: Falaysa lahul yawma haahunaa hameem

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā ṭa‘āmun illā min gislīn(in).
ayah.translation: Wa laa ta'aamun illaa min ghisleen

ayah.transliteration: Lā ya'kuluhū illal-khāṭi'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Laa yaakuluhooo illal khati'oon

ayah.transliteration: Falā uqsimu bimā tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaaa uqsimu bimaa tubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā lā tubṣirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maa laa tubsiroon

ayah.transliteration: Innahū laqaulu rasūlin karīm(in).
ayah.translation: Innahoo laqawlu Rasoolin kareem

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā huwa biqauli syā‘ir(in), qalīlam mā tu'minūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa ma huwa biqawli shaa'ir; qaleelam maa tu'minoon

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā biqauli kāhin(in), qalīlam mā tażakkarūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa laa biqawli kaahin; qaleelam maa tazakkaroon

ayah.transliteration: Tanzīlum mir rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayah.translation: Tanzeelum mir rabbil 'aalameen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau taqawwala ‘alainā ba‘ḍal-aqāwīl(i).
ayah.translation: Wa law taqawwala 'alainaa ba'dal aqaaweel

ayah.transliteration: La'akhażnā minhu  bil-yamīn(i).
ayah.translation: La-akhaznaa minhu bilyameen

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma laqaṭa‘nā minhul-watīn(a).
ayah.translation: Summa laqata'naa minhul wateen

ayah.transliteration: Famā minkum min aḥadin ‘anhu ḥājizīn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa minkum min ahadin'anhu haajizeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū latażkiratul lil-muttaqīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innahoo latazkiratul lilmuttaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innā lana‘lamu anna minkum mukażżibīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa inna lana'lamu anna minkum mukazzibeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū laḥasratun ‘alal-kāfirīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa innahu lahasratun 'alal kaafireen

ayah.transliteration: Wa innahū laḥaqqul-yaqīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa innahoo lahaqqul yaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa sabbiḥ bismi rabbikal-‘aẓīm(i).
ayah.translation: Fasbbih bismi Rabbikal 'Azeem

ayah.transliteration: Sa'ala sā'ilum bi‘ażābiw wāqi‘(in).
ayah.translation: Sa ala saaa'ilum bi'azaa binw-waaqi'

ayah.transliteration: Lil-kāfirīna laisa lahū dāfi‘(un).
ayah.translation: Lilkaafireen laisa lahoo daafi'

ayah.transliteration: Minallāhi żil-ma‘ārij(i).
ayah.translation: Minal laahi zil ma'aarij

ayah.transliteration: Ta‘rujul-malā'ikatu war-rūḥu ilaihi fī yaumin kāna miqdāruhū khamsīna alfa sanah(tin).
ayah.translation: Ta'rujul malaaa'ikatu war Roohu ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhoo khamseena alfa sanah

ayah.transliteration: Faṣbir ṣabran jamīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Fasbir ssabran jameelaa

ayah.transliteration: Innahum yaraunahū ba‘īdā(n).
ayah.translation: Inaahum yarawnahoo ba'eedaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa narāhu qarībā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa naraahu qareebaa

ayah.transliteration: Yauma takūnus-samā'u kal-muhl(i).
ayah.translation: Yawma takoonus samaaa'u kalmuhl

ayah.transliteration: Wa takūnul-jibālu kal-‘ihn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa takoonul jibaalu kal'ihn

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā yas'alu ḥamīmun ḥamīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa laa yas'alu hameemun hameemaa

ayah.transliteration: Yubaṣṣarūnahum, yawaddul-mujrimu lau yaftadī  min ‘ażābi yaumi'iżim bibanīh(i).
ayah.translation: Yubassaroonahum; ya waddul mujrimu law yaftadee min 'azaabi yawma'izim bibaneeh

ayah.transliteration: Wa ṣāḥibatihī wa akhīh(i).
ayah.translation: Wa saahibatihee wa akheeh

ayah.transliteration: Wa faṣīlatihil-latī tu'wīh(i).
ayah.translation: Wa faseelathil latee tu'weeh

ayah.transliteration: Wa man fil-arḍi jamī‘ā(n), ṡumma yunjīh(i).
ayah.translation: Wa man fil ardi jamee'an summa yunjeeh

ayah.transliteration: Kallā, innahā laẓā.
ayah.translation: Kallaa innahaa lazaa

ayah.transliteration: Nazzā‘atal lisy-syawā.
ayah.translation: Nazzaa'atal lishshawaa

ayah.transliteration: Tad‘ū man adbara wa tawallā.
ayah.translation: Tad'oo man adbara wa tawallaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa jama‘a fa'au‘ā.
ayah.translation: W jama'a fa aw'aa

ayah.transliteration: Innal-insāna khuliqa halu‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Innal insaana khuliqa haloo'aa

ayah.transliteration: Iżā massahusy-syarru jazū‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Izaa massahush sharru jazoo'aa

ayah.transliteration: Wa iżā massahul-khairu manū‘ā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa izaa massahul khairu manoo'aa

ayah.transliteration: Illal-muṣallīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illal musalleen

ayah.transliteration: Allażīna hum ‘alā ṣalātihim dā'imūn(a).
ayah.translation: Allazeena hum 'alaa Salaatihim daaa'imoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna fī amwālihim ḥaqqum ma‘lūm(un).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena feee amwaalihim haqqum ma'loom

ayah.transliteration: Lis-sā'ili wal-maḥrūm(i).
ayah.translation: Lissaaa 'ili walmahroom

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna yuṣaddiqūna biyaumid-dīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena yusaddiqoona bi yawmid Deen

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum min ‘ażābi rabbihim musyfiqūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum min 'azaabi Rabbihim mushfiqoon

ayah.transliteration: Inna ‘ażāba rabbihim gairu ma'mūn(in).
ayah.translation: Inna 'azaaba Rabbihim ghairu maamoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum lifurūjihim ḥāfiẓūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum lifuroo jihim haafizoon

ayah.transliteration: Illā ‘alā azwājihim au mā malakat aimānuhum fa innahum gairu malūmīn(a).
ayah.translation: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aymaanuhum fainnahum ghairu maloomeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa manibtagā warā'a żālika fa ulā'ika  humul-‘ādūn(a).
ayah.translation: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum li'amānātihim wa ‘ahdihim rā'ūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum li amaa naatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'oon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum bisyahādātihim qā'imūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum bishahaadaatihim qaaa'imoon

ayah.transliteration: Wal-lażīna hum ‘alā ṣalātihim yuḥāfiẓūn(a).
ayah.translation: Wallazeena hum 'alaa salaatihim yuhaafizoon

ayah.transliteration: Ulā'ika fī jannātim mukramūn(a).
ayah.translation: Ulaaa'ika fee jannaatim mukramoon

ayah.transliteration: Famālil-lażīna kafarū qibalaka muhṭi‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa lil lazeena kafaroo qibalaka muhti'een

ayah.transliteration: ‘Anil-yamīni wa ‘anisy-syimāli ‘izīn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Anil yameeni wa 'anish shimaali 'izeen

ayah.transliteration: Ayaṭma‘u kullumri'im minhum ay yudkhala jannata na‘īm(in).
ayah.translation: Ayatma'u kullum ri'im minhum anyyudkhala jannata Na'eem

ayah.transliteration: Kallā, innā khalaqnāhum mimmā ya‘malūn(a).
ayah.translation: Kallaaa innaa khalaq nahum mimmaa ya'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Falā uqsimu birabbil-masyāriqi wal-magāribi  innā laqādirūn(a).
ayah.translation: Falaaa uqsimu bi Rabbil mashaariqi wal maghaaribi innaa laqaadiroon

ayah.transliteration: ‘Alā an nubaddila khairam minhum, wa mā naḥnu bimasbūqīn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Alaaa an nubaddila khairam minhum wa maa Nahnu bimasbooqeen

ayah.transliteration: Fa żarhum yakhūḍū  wa yal‘abū ḥattā yulāqū yaumahumul-lażī yū‘adūn(a)
ayah.translation: Fazarhum yakhoodoo wa yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo yaw mahumul lazee yoo'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Yauma yakhrujūna minal-ajdāṡi sirā‘an ka'annahum ilā nuṣubiy yūfiḍūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yawma yakhrujoona minal ajdaasi siraa'an ka anna hum ilaa nusubiny yoofidoon

ayah.transliteration: Khāsyi‘atan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum żillah(tun), żālikal-yaumul-lażī kānū yū‘adūn(a).
ayah.translation: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillah; zaalikal yawmul lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon

ayah.transliteration: Innā arsalnā nūḥan ilā qaumihī an anżir qaumaka min qabli ay ya'tiyahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayah.translation: Innaaa arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee an anzir qawmaka min qabli any yaatiyahum 'azaabun aleem

ayah.transliteration: Qāla yā qaumi innī lakum nażīrum mubīn(un).
ayah.translation: Qaala yaa qawmi innee lakum nazeerum mubeen

ayah.transliteration: Ani‘budullāha wattaqūhu wa aṭī‘ūn(i).
ayah.translation: Ani'udul laaha watta qoohu wa atee'oon

ayah.transliteration: Yagfir lakum min żunūbikum wa yu'akhkhirkum ilā ajalim musammā(n), inna ajalallāhi iżā jā'a lā yu'akhkhar(u), lau kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayah.translation: Yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum wa yu'akhkhirkum ilaaa ajalim musammaa; innaa ajalal laahi izaa jaaa'a laa yu'akhkhar; law kuntum ta'lamoon

ayah.transliteration: Qāla rabbi innī da‘atu qaumī lailaw wa nahārā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala rabbi innee da'awtu qawmee lailanw wa naharaa

ayah.transliteration: Falam yazidhum du‘ā'ī illā firārā(n).
ayah.translation: Falam yazid hum du'aaa 'eee illaa firaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa innī kullamā da‘autuhum litagfira lahum ja‘alū aṣābi‘ahum fī āżānihim wastagsyau ṡiyābahum wa aṣarrū wastakbarustikbārā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa inee kullamaa da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'alooo asaabi'ahum fee aazaanihim wastaghshaw siyaabahum wa asaarroo wastakbarus tikbaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma innī da‘autuhum jihārā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa innee da'aw tuhum jihaara

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma innī a‘lantu lahum wa asrartu lahum isrārā(n).
ayah.translation: Summaa inneee a'lantu lahum wa asrartu lahum israaraa

ayah.transliteration: Faqultustagfirū rabbakum innahū kāna gaffārā(n).
ayah.translation: Faqultus taghfiroo Rabakam innahoo kaana Ghaffaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Yursilis-samā'a ‘alaikum midrārā(n).
ayah.translation: Yursilis samaaa'a 'alaikum midraaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa yumdidkum bi'amwāliw wa banīna wa yaj‘al lakum jannātiw wa yaj‘al lakum anhārā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa yumdidkum bi am waalinw wa baneena wa yaj'al lakum Jannaatinw wa yaj'al lakum anhaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Mā lakum lā tarjūna lillāhi waqārā(n).
ayah.translation: Maa lakum laa tarjoona lillaahi waqaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qad khalaqakum aṭwārā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qad khalaqakum at waaraa

ayah.transliteration: Alam tara kaifa khalaqallāhu sab‘a samāwātin ṭibāqā(n).
ayah.translation: Alam taraw kaifa khalaqal laahu sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘alal-qamara fīhinna nūraw wa ja‘alasy-syamsa sirājā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'alal qamara feehinna nooranw wa ja'alash shamsa siraajaa

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu ambatakum minal-arḍi nabātā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu ambatakum minal ardi nabaataa

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma yu‘īdukum fīhā wa yukhrijukum ikhrājā(n).
ayah.translation: Summa yu'eedukum feehaa wa ukhrijukum ikhraajaa

ayah.transliteration: Wallāhu ja‘ala lakumul-arḍa bisāṭā(n).
ayah.translation: Wallaahu ja'ala lakumul arda bisaataa

ayah.transliteration: Litaslukū minhā subulan fijājā(n).
ayah.translation: Litaslukoo minhaa subulan fijaajaa

ayah.transliteration: Qāla nūḥur rabbi innahum ‘aṣaunī wattaba‘ū mal lam yazidhu māluhū wa waladuhū illā khasārā(n).
ayah.translation: Qaala Noohur Robbi innahum 'asawnee wattaba'oo mal lam yazid hu maaluhoo wa waladuhooo illaa khasaara

ayah.transliteration: Wa makarū makran kubbārā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa makaroo makran kubbaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qālū lā tażarunna ālihatakum wa lā tażarunna waddaw wa lā suwā‘ā(n), wa lā yagūṡa wa ya‘ūqa wa nasrā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaaloo laa tazarunna aalihatakum wa laa tazarunna Waddanw wa laa Suwaa'anw wa laa Yaghoosa wa Ya'ooqa wa Nasraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qad aḍallū kaṡīrā(n), wa lā tazidiẓ-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qad adalloo kasee ranw wa laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa dalaalaa

ayah.transliteration: Mimmā khaṭī'ātihim ugriqū fa'udkhilū nārā(n), falam yajidū lahum min dūnillāhi anṣārā(n).
ayah.translation: Mimmaa khateee' aatihim ughriqoo fa udkhiloo Naaran falam yajidoo lahum min doonil laahi ansaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Wa qāla nūḥur rabbi lā tażar ‘alal-arḍi minal-kāfirīna dayyārā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa qaala Noohur Rabbi laa tazar 'alal ardi minal kaafireena daiyaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Innaka in tażarhum yuḍillū ‘ibādaka wa lā yalidū illā fājiran kaffārā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaka in tazarhum yudil loo 'ibaadaka wa laa yalidooo illaa faajiran kaffaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Rabbigfir lī wa liwālidayya wa liman dakhala baitiya  mu'minaw wa lil-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināt(i), wa lā tazidiẓ-ẓālimīna illā tabārā(n).
ayah.translation: Rabbigh fir lee wa liwaa lidaiya wa liman dakhala baitiya mu'minanw wa lil mu'mineena wal mu'minaati wa laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa tabaaraa

ayah.transliteration: Qul ūḥiya ilayya annahustama‘a nafarum minal-jinni fa qālū innā sami‘nā qur'ānan ‘ajabā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul oohiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinnni faqaalooo innaa sami'naa quraanan 'ajabaa

ayah.transliteration: Yahdī ilar-rusydi fa'āmannā bih(ī), wa lan nusyrika birabbinā aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Yahdeee ilar rushdi fa aamannaa bihee wa lan nushrika bi rabbinaaa ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū ta‘ālā jaddu rabbinā mattakhaża ṣāḥibataw wa lā waladā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa mat takhaza saahibatanw wa la waladaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū kāna yaqūlu safīhunā ‘alallāhi syaṭaṭā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo kaana yaqoolu safeehunaa 'alal laahi shatataa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annā ẓanannā allan taqūlal-insu wal-jinnu ‘alallāhi każibā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan taqoolal insu wal jinnu 'alal laahi kazibaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū kāna rijālum minal insi ya‘ūżūna birijālim minal-jinni fa zādūhum rahaqā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo kaana rijaa lum minal insi ya'oozoona birijaalim minal jinni fazaa doohum rahaqaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum allay yab‘aṡallāhu aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annahum zannoo kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annā lamasnas-samā'a fa wajadnāhā muli'at ḥarasan syadīdaw wa syuhubā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annaa lamasnas sa maaa'a fa wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadeedanw wa shuhubaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annā kunnā naq‘udu minhā maqā‘ida lis-sam‘(i), famay yastami‘il-āna yajid lahū syihābar raṣadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il aana yajid lahoo shihaabar rasada

ayah.transliteration: Wa annā lā nadrī asyarrun urīda biman fil-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rasyadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annaa laa nadreee asharrun ureeda biman fil ardi am araada bihim rabbuhum rashadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annā minnaṣ-ṣāliḥūna wa minnā dūna żālik(a), kunnā ṭarā'iqa qidadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annaa minnas saalihoona wa minnaa doona zaalika kunnaa taraaa'ilqa qidadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annā ẓanannā allan nu‘jizallāha fil-arḍi wa lan nu‘jizahū harabā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi wa lan nu'jizahoo harabaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annā lammā sami‘nal-hudā āmannā bih(ī), famay yu'mim birabbihī falā yakhāfu bakhsaw wa lā rahaqā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihee famany yu'mim bi rabbihee falaa yakhaafu bakhsanw wa laa rahaqaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annā minnal-muslimūna wa minnal-qāsiṭūn(a), faman aslama fa ulā'ika taḥarrau rasyadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annaa minnal muslimoona wa minnal qaasitoona faman aslama fa ulaaa'ika taharraw rashadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ammal-qāsiṭūna fa kānū lijahannama ḥaṭabā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ammal qaasitoona fa kaanoo li jahannama hatabaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa allawistaqāmū ‘alaṭ-ṭarīqati la'asqaināhum mā'an gadaqā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa alla wis taqaamoo 'alat tareeqati la asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqaa

ayah.transliteration: Linaftinahum fīh(i), wa may yu‘riḍ ‘an żikri rabbihī yasluk-hu ‘ażāban ṣa‘adā(n).
ayah.translation: Linaftinahum feeh; wa many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihee yasluk hu 'azaaban sa'adaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annal-masājida lillāhi falā tad‘ū ma‘allāhi aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annal masaajida lillaahi falaa tad'oo ma'al laahi ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa annahū lammā qāma ‘abdullāhi yad‘ūhu kādū yakūnūna ‘alaihi libadā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa annahoo lammaa qaama 'adul laahi yad'oohu kaadoo yakoonoona 'alaihi libadaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul innamā ad‘ū rabbī wa lā usyriku bihī aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul innamaaa ad'oo rabbee wa laaa ushriku biheee ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarraw wa lā rasyadā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul innee laaa amliku lakum darranw wa laa rashadaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul innī lay yujīranī minallāhi aḥad(un), wa lan ajida min dūnihī multaḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul innee lany yujeeranee minal laahi ahad, wa lan ajida min doonihee multahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Illā balāgam minallāhi wa risālātih(ī), wa may ya‘ṣillāha wa rasūlahū fa inna lahū nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadā(n).
ayah.translation: Illaa balaagham minal laahi wa risaalaatih; wa many ya'sil laaha wa rasoolahoo fa inna lahoo naara jahannama khaalideena feehaaa abadaa

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā iżā ra'au mā yū‘adūna fasaya‘lamūna man aḍ‘afu nāṣiraw wa aqallu ‘adadā(n).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa izaa ra aw maa yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu naasiranw wa aqallu 'adadaa

ayah.transliteration: Qul in adrī aqarībum mā tū‘adūna am yaj‘alu lahū rabbī amadā(n).
ayah.translation: Qul in adreee a qareebum maa too'adoona am yaj'alu lahoo rabbeee amadaa

ayah.transliteration: ‘Ālimul-gaibi falā yuẓhiru ‘alā gaibihī aḥadā(n).
ayah.translation: 'Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibiheee ahadaa

ayah.transliteration: Illā manirtaḍā mir rasūlin fa innahū yasluku mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihī raṣadā(n).
ayah.translation: Illaa manir tadaa mir rasoolin fa innahoo yasluku mim baini yadihi wa min khalfihee rasadaa

ayah.transliteration: Liya‘lama an qad ablagū risālāti rabbihim wa aḥāṭa bimā ladaihim wa aḥṣā kulla syai'in ‘adadā(n).
ayah.translation: Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risaalaati rabbihim wa ahaata bima ladihim wa ahsaa kulla shai'in 'adadaa

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-muzzammil(u).
ayah.translation: Yaw ayyuhal muzzammil

ayah.transliteration: Qumil-laila illā qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Qumil laila illaa qaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Niṣfahū awinquṣ minhu qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Nisfahooo awinqus minhu qaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Au zid ‘alaihi wa rattilil-qur'āna tartīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Aw zid 'alaihi wa rattilil Qur'aana tarteela

ayah.transliteration: Innā sanulqī ‘alaika qaulan ṡaqīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaa sanulqee 'alika qawalan saqeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Inna nāsyi'atal-laili hiya asyaddu waṭ'aw wa aqwamu qīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Inn naashi'atal laili hiya ashadddu wat anw wa aqwamu qeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Inna laka fin-nahāri sabḥan ṭawīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Inna laka fin nahaari sabhan taweelaa

ayah.transliteration: Ważkurisma rabbika wa tabattal ilaihi tabtīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wazkuris ma rabbika wa tabattal ilaihi tabteelaa

ayah.transliteration: Rabbul-masyriqi wal-magribi lā ilāha illā huwa fattakhiżhu wakīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Rabbul mashriqi wal maghriibi laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fattakhizhu wakeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Waṣbir ‘alā mā yaqūlūna wahjurhum hajran jamīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wasbir 'alaa maa yaqoo loona wahjurhum hajran jameelaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa żarnī wal-mukażżibīna ulin-na‘mati wa mahhilhum qalīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa zarnee walmukaz zibeena ulin na'mati wa mahhilhum qaleelaa

ayah.transliteration: Inna ladainā ankālaw wa jaḥīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Inna ladainaaa ankaalanw wa jaheemaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ṭa‘āman żā guṣṣatiw wa ‘ażāban alīmā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ta'aaman zaa ghussa tinw wa'azaaban aleemaa
