ayah.transliteration: Yauma tarjuful-arḍu wal-jibālu wa kānatil-jibālu kaṡībam mahīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Yawma tarjuful ardu waljibaalu wa kaanatil jibaalu kaseebam maheelaa

ayah.transliteration: Innā arsalnā ilaikum rasūlā(n), syāhidan ‘alaikum kamā arsalnā ilā fir‘auna rasūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Innaa arsalnaaa ilaikum rasoolan shahidan 'alikum kamaaa arsalnaaa ilaa Fir'awna Rasoolna

ayah.transliteration: Fa ‘aṣā fir‘aunar-rasūla fa akhażnāhu akhżaw wabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa'asaa Fir'awnur Rasoola fa akhaznaahu akhzanw wabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Fakaifa tattaqūna in kafartum yaumay yaj‘alul-wildāna syībā(n).
ayah.translation: Fakaifa tattaqoona in kafartum yawmany yaj'alul wildaana sheeba

ayah.transliteration: As-samā'u munfaṭirum bih(ī), kāna wa‘duhū maf‘ūlā(n).
ayah.translation: Assamaaa'u munfatirum bih; kaana wa'duhoo maf'oola

ayah.transliteration: Inna hāżihī tażkirah(tun), faman syā'attakhaża ilā rabbihī sabīlā(n).
ayah.translation: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa

ayah.transliteration: Inna rabbaka ya‘lamu annaka taqūmu adnā min ṡuluṡayil-laili wa niṣfahū wa ṡuluṡahū wa ṭā'ifatum minal-lażīna ma‘ak(a), wallāhu yuqaddirul-laila wan-nahār(a), ‘alima allan tuḥṣūhu fa tāba ‘alaikum faqra'ū mā tayassara minal-qur'ān(i), ‘alima an sayakūnu minkum marḍā, wa ākharūna yaḍribūna fil-arḍi yabtagūna min faḍlillāh(i), wa ākharūna yuqātilūna fī sabīlillāh(i), faqra'ū mā tayassara minh(u), wa aqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātuz-zakāta wa aqriḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanā(n), wa mā tuqaddimū li'anfusikum min khairin tajidūhu ‘indallāh(i), huwa khairaw wa a‘ẓama ajrā(n), wastagfirullāh(a), innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayah.translation: Inna Rabbaka ya'lamu annaka taqoomu adnaa min sulusa yil laili wa nisfahoo wa sulusahoo wa taaa'ifatum minal lazeena ma'ak; wal laahu yuqaddirul laila wanna haar; 'alima al lan tuhsoohu fataaba 'alaikum faqra'oo maa tayassara minal quraan; 'alima an sa yakoonu minkum mardaa wa aakharoona yadriboona fil ardi yabtaghoona min fadlil laahi wa aakharoona yuqaatiloona fee sabeelil laahi faqra'oo ma tayassara minhu wa aqeemus salaata wa aatuz zakaata wa aqridul laaha qardan hasanaa; wa maa tuqadimoo li anfusikum min khairin tajidoohu 'indal laahi huwa khayranw wa a'zama ajraa; wastaghfirul laahaa innal laaha ghafoorur raheem.

ayah.transliteration: Yā ayyuhal-muddaṡṡir(u).
ayah.translation: Yaaa ayyuhal muddassir

ayah.transliteration: Qum fa'anżir.
ayah.translation: Qum fa anzir

ayah.transliteration: Wa rabbaka fakabbir.
ayah.translation: Wa rabbaka fakabbir

ayah.transliteration: Wa ṡiyābaka faṭahhir.
ayah.translation: Wa siyaabaka fatahhir

ayah.transliteration: War-rujza fahjur.
ayah.translation: Warrujza fahjur

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā tamnun tastakṡir(u).
ayah.translation: Wa laa tamnun tastaksir

ayah.transliteration: Wa lirabbika faṣbir.
ayah.translation: Wa li Rabbika fasbir

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā nuqira fin-nāqūr(i).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa nuqira fin naaqoor

ayah.transliteration: Fa żālika yauma'iżiy yaumun ‘asīr(un).
ayah.translation: Fazaalika yawma 'iziny yawmun 'aseer

ayah.transliteration: ‘Alal-kāfirīna gairu yasīr(in).
ayah.translation: 'Alal kaafireena ghayru yaseer

ayah.transliteration: Żarnī wa man khalaqtu waḥīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Zamee wa man khalaqtu waheedaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa ja‘altu lahū mālam mamdūdā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ja'altu lahoo maalam mamdoodaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa banīna syuhūdā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa baneena shuhoodaa

ayah.transliteration: Wa mahhattu lahū tamhīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa mahhattu lahoo tamheeda

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma yaṭma‘u an azīd(a).
ayah.translation: Summa yat ma'u an azeed

ayah.transliteration: Kallā, innahū kāna li'āyātinā ‘anīdā(n).
ayah.translation: Kallaaa innahoo kaana li Aayaatinaa 'aneedaa

ayah.transliteration: Sa'urhiquhū ṣa‘ūdā(n).
ayah.translation: Sa urhiquhoo sa'oodaa

ayah.transliteration: Innahū fakkara wa qaddar(a).
ayah.translation: Innahoo fakkara wa qaddar

ayah.transliteration: Faqutila kaifa qaddar(a).
ayah.translation: Faqutila kayfa qaddar

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma qutila kaifa qaddar(a).
ayah.translation: Summa qutila kaifa qaddar

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma naẓar(a).
ayah.translation: Summa nazar

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma ‘abasa wa basar(a).
ayah.translation: Summa 'abasa wa basar

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma adbara wastakbar(a).
ayah.translation: Summaa adbara wastakbar

ayah.transliteration: Faqāla in hāżā illā siḥruy yu'ṡar(u).
ayah.translation: Faqaala in haazaaa illaa sihruny yu'sar

ayah.transliteration: In hāżā illā qaulul-basyar(i).
ayah.translation: In haazaaa illaa qawlul bashar

ayah.transliteration: Sa'uṣlīhi saqar(a).
ayah.translation: Sa usleehi saqar

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā adrāka mā saqar(a).
ayah.translation: Wa maaa adraaka maa saqar

ayah.transliteration: Lā tubqī wa lā tażar(u).
ayah.translation: Laa tubqee wa laa tazar

ayah.transliteration: Lawwāḥatul lil-basyar(i).
ayah.translation: Lawwaahatul lilbashar

ayah.transliteration: ‘Alaihā tis‘ata ‘asyar(a).
ayah.translation: 'Alaihaa tis'ata 'ashar

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā ja‘alnā aṣḥāban-nāri illā malā'ikah(tan), wa mā ja‘alnā ‘iddatahum illā fitnatal lil-lażīna kafarū, liyastaiqinal-lażīna ūtul-kitāba wa yazdādal-lażīna āmanū īmānaw wa lā yartābal-lażīna ūtul-kitāba wal-mu'minūn(a), wa liyaqūlal-lażīna fī qulūbihim maraḍuw wal-kāfirūna māżā arādallāhu bihāżā maṡalā(n), każālika yuḍillullāhu may yasyā'u wa yahdī may yasyā'(u), wa mā ya‘lamu junūda rabbika illā huw(a), wa mā hiya illā żikrā lil-basyar(i).
ayah.translation: Wa maaja''alnaaa As haaban naari illaa malaaa 'ikatanw wa maa ja'alnaa 'iddatahum illaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo liyastayqinal lazeena ootul kitaaba wa yazdaadal lazeena aamanooo eemaananw wa laa yartaabal lazeena ootul kitaaba walmu'minoona wa liyaqoolal lazeena fee quloo bihim maradunw walkaafiroona maazaaa araadal laahu bihaazaa masalaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu many yashaaa'u wa yahdee many yashaaa'; wa maa ya'lamu junooda rabbika illaa hoo; wa maa hiya illaa zikraa lil bashar

ayah.transliteration: Kallā wal-qamar(i).
ayah.translation: Kallaa walqamar

ayah.transliteration: Wal-laili iż adbar(a).
ayah.translation: Wallaili adbar

ayah.transliteration: Waṣ-ṣubḥi iżā asfar(a).
ayah.translation: Wassub hi izaaa asfar

ayah.transliteration: Innahā la'iḥdal-kubar(i).
ayah.translation: Innahaa la ihdal kubar

ayah.transliteration: Nażīral lil-basyar(i).
ayah.translation: Nazeeral lilbashar

ayah.transliteration: Liman syā'a minkum ay yataqaddama au yata'akhkhar(a).
ayah.translation: Liman shaaa'a minkum any yataqaddama aw yata akhkhar

ayah.transliteration: Kullu nafsim bimā kasabat rahīnah(tun).
ayah.translation: Kullu nafsim bim kasabat raheenah

ayah.transliteration: Illā aṣḥābal-yamīn(i).
ayah.translation: Illaaa as haabal yameen

ayah.transliteration: Fī jannātin - yatasā'alūn(a).
ayah.translation: Fee jannaatiny yata saaa'aloon

ayah.transliteration: ‘Anil-mujrimīn(a).
ayah.translation: 'Anil mujrimeen

ayah.transliteration: Mā salakakum fī saqar(a).
ayah.translation: Maa salakakum fee saqar

ayah.transliteration: Qālū lam naku minal-muṣallīn(a).
ayah.translation: Qaaloo lam naku minal musalleen

ayah.transliteration: Wa lam naku nuṭ‘imul-miskīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa lam naku nut'imul miskeen

ayah.transliteration: Wa kunnā nakhūḍu ma‘al-khā'iḍīn(a).
ayah.translation: Wa kunnaa nakhoodu ma'al khaaa'ideen

ayah.transliteration: Wa kunnā nukażżibu biyaumid-dīn(i).
ayah.translation: Wa kunnaa nukazzibu bi yawmid Deen

ayah.transliteration: Ḥattā atānal-yaqīn(u).
ayah.translation: Hattaaa ataanal yaqeen

ayah.transliteration: Famā tanfa‘uhum syafā‘atusy-syāfi‘īn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa tanfa'uhum shafaa'atush shaafi'een

ayah.transliteration: Famā lahum ‘anit-tażkirati mu‘riḍīn(a).
ayah.translation: Famaa lahum 'anittazkirati mu'rideen

ayah.transliteration: Ka'annahum ḥumurum mustanfirah(tun).
ayah.translation: Ka annahum humurum mustanfirah

ayah.transliteration: Farrat min qaswarah(tin).
ayah.translation: Farrat min qaswarah

ayah.transliteration: Bal yurīdu kullumri'im minhum ay yu'tā ṣuḥufam munasysyarah(tan).
ayah.translation: Bal yureedu kullum ri'im minhum any yu'taa suhufam munashsharah

ayah.transliteration: Kallā, bal lā yakhāfūnal-ākhirah(ta).
ayah.translation: Kallaa bal laa yakhaafoonal aakhirah

ayah.transliteration: Kallā innahū tażkirah(tun).
ayah.translation: Kallaaa innahoo tazkirah

ayah.transliteration: Faman syā'a żakarah(ū).
ayah.translation: Fa man shaaa'a zakarah

ayah.transliteration: Wa mā yażkurūna illā ay yasyā'allāh(u), huwa ahlut-taqwā wa ahlul-magfirah(ti).
ayah.translation: Wa maa yazkuroona illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; Huwa ahlut taqwaa wa ahlul maghfirah

ayah.transliteration: Lā uqsimu biyaumil-qiyāmah(ti).
ayah.translation: Laaa uqsimu bi yawmil qiyaamah

ayah.transliteration: Wa lā uqsimu bin nafsil-lawwāmah(ti).
ayah.translation: Wa laaa uqsimu bin nafsil lawwaamah

ayah.transliteration: Ayaḥsabul-insānu allan najma‘a ‘iẓāmah(ū).
ayah.translation: Ayahsabul insaanu al lan najm'a 'izaamah

ayah.transliteration: Balā qādirīna ‘alā an nusawwiya banānah(ū).
ayah.translation: Balaa qaadireena 'alaaa an nusawwiya banaanah

ayah.transliteration: Bal yurīdul-insānu liyafjura amāmah(ū).
ayah.translation: Bal yureedul insaanu liyafjura amaamah

ayah.transliteration: Yas'alu ayyāna yaumul-qiyāmah(ti).
ayah.translation: Yas'alu ayyyaana yawmul qiyaamah

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā bariqal-baṣar(u).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa bariqal basar

ayah.transliteration: Wa khasafal-qamar(u).
ayah.translation: We khasafal qamar

ayah.transliteration: Wa jumi‘asy-syamsu wal-qamar(u).
ayah.translation: Wa jumi'ash shamusu wal qamar

ayah.transliteration: Yaqūlul-insānu yauma'iżin ainal-mafarr(u).
ayah.translation: Yaqoolul insaanu yaw ma 'izin aynal mafarr

ayah.transliteration: Kallā lā wazar(a).
ayah.translation: Kallaa laa wazar

ayah.transliteration: Ilā rabbika yauma'iżinil-mustaqarr(u).
ayah.translation: Ilaa rabbika yawma 'izinil mustaqarr

ayah.transliteration: Yunabba'ul-insānu yauma'iżim bimā qaddama wa akhkhar(a).
ayah.translation: Yunabba 'ul insaanu yawma 'izim bimaa qaddama wa akhkhar

ayah.transliteration: Balil-insānu ‘alā nafsihī baṣīrah(tun).
ayah.translation: Balil insaanu 'alaa nafsihee baseerah

ayah.transliteration: Wa lau alqā ma‘āżīrah(ū).
ayah.translation: Wa law alqaa ma'aazeerah

ayah.transliteration: Lā tuḥarrik bihī lisānaka lita‘jala bih(ī).
ayah.translation: Laa tuharrik bihee lisaa naka lita'jala bih

ayah.transliteration: Inna ‘alainā jam‘ahū wa qur'ānah(ū).
ayah.translation: Inna 'alainaa jam'ahoo wa qur aanah

ayah.transliteration: Fa iżā qara'nāhu fattabi‘ qur'ānah(ū).
ayah.translation: Fa izaa qaraanaahu fattabi' qur aanah

ayah.transliteration: Ṡumma inna ‘alainā bayānah(ū).
ayah.translation: Summa inna 'alainaa bayaanah

ayah.transliteration: Kallā bal tuḥibbūnal-‘ājilah(ta).
ayah.translation: Kallaa bal tuhibboonal 'aajilah

ayah.transliteration: Wa tażarūnal-‘ākhirah(ta).
ayah.translation: Wa tazaroonal Aakhirah

ayah.transliteration: Wujūhuy yauma'iżin nāḍirah(tun).
ayah.translation: Wujoohuny yawma 'izin naadirah

ayah.transliteration: Ilā rabbihā nāẓirah(tun).
ayah.translation: Ilaa rabbihaa naazirah

ayah.transliteration: Wa wujūhuy yauma'iżim bāsirah(tun).
ayah.translation: Wa wujoohuny yawma 'izim baasirah

ayah.transliteration: Taẓunnu ay yuf‘ala bihā fāqirah(tun).

ayah.transliteration: Lakum dīnukum wa liya dīn(i).
ayah.translation: Lakum deenukum wa liya deen.

ayah.transliteration: Iżā jā'a naṣrullāhi wal-fatḥ(u).
ayah.translation: Iza jaa-a nas rullahi walfath

ayah.transliteration: Wa ra'aitan-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīnillāhi afwājā(n).
ayah.translation: Wa ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajah

ayah.transliteration: Fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastagfirh(u), innahū kāna tawwābā(n).
ayah.translation: Fa sab bih bihamdi rabbika was taghfir, innahu kaana tawwaaba

ayah.transliteration: Tabbat yadā abī lahabiw wa tabb(a).
ayah.translation: Tab bat yadaa abee Lahabinw-wa tabb

ayah.transliteration: Mā agnā ‘anhu māluhū wa mā kasab(a).
ayah.translation: Maa aghna 'anhu maaluhu wa ma kasab

ayah.transliteration: Sayaṣlā nāran żāta lahab(in).
ayah.translation: Sa yas laa naran zaata lahab

ayah.transliteration: Wamra'atuh(ū), ḥammālatal-ḥaṭab(i).
ayah.translation: Wam ra-atuh hamma latal-hatab

ayah.transliteration: Fī jīdihā ḥablum mim masad(in).
ayah.translation: Fee jeediha hab lum mim-masad

ayah.transliteration: Qul huwallāhu aḥad(un).
ayah.translation: Qul huwal laahu ahad

ayah.transliteration: Allāhuṣ-ṣamad(u).
ayah.translation: Allah hus-samad

ayah.transliteration: Lam yalid wa lam yūlad.
ayah.translation: Lam yalid wa lam yoolad

ayah.transliteration: Wa lam yakul lahū kufuwan aḥad(un).
ayah.translation: Wa lam yakul-lahu kufuwan ahad

ayah.transliteration: Qul a‘ūżu birabbil-falaq(i).
ayah.translation: Qul a'uzoo bi rabbil-falaq

ayah.transliteration: Min syarri mā khalaq(a).
ayah.translation: Min sharri ma khalaq

ayah.transliteration: Wa min syarri gāsiqin iżā waqab(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min sharri ghasiqin iza waqab

ayah.transliteration: Wa min syarrin-naffāṡāti fil-‘uqad(i).
ayah.translation: Wa min sharrin-naffaa-thaati fil 'uqad

ayah.transliteration: Wa min syarri ḥāsidin iżā ḥasad(a).
ayah.translation: Wa min shar ri haasidin iza hasad

ayah.transliteration: Qul a‘ūżu birabbin-nās(i).
ayah.translation: Qul a'uzu birabbin naas

ayah.transliteration: Malikin-nās(i).
ayah.translation: Malikin naas

ayah.transliteration: Ilāhin-nās(i).
ayah.translation: Ilaahin naas

ayah.transliteration: Min syarril-waswāsil-khannās(i).
ayah.translation: Min sharril was waasil khannaas

ayah.transliteration: Allażī yuwaswisu fī ṣudūrin-nās(i).
ayah.translation: Al lazee yuwas wisu fee sudoorin naas

ayah.transliteration: Minal jinnati wan-nās(i).
ayah.translation: Minal jinnati wan naas
